26a6(rgyud): 'tshams chu lha'i rgyal po s+t+wa~M// bu ru ba zhes bya bas bskyed// chu srin gyi ni stan la gnas// mdog dkar gzi brjid chen po ste// lag na mchod sbyin zhags pa thogs// cod pa ni dmar pos nye bar mdzes// de yi g.yas su pang las
26a7(rgyud): byung / long spyod ldan ma byi ru'i mdog/ spyi bo r-i steng kas brgyan pa ste// g.yas pa yis ni rnga yab thogs// g.yas pa lha yi lus la mnyes// rang gi nu ma lta zhing gnas// g.yon du ud pa la las byung // ud pol dga' ba'i rnal
26a8(rgyud): 'byor ma/ mdog dka r-i gzi brji de chen mo ste// nor bus brgyan pa'i gdangs ka brgyan// g.yas kyi ud dpal thogs nas ni// lag pa g.yon pa pus mor brkyang // 'jig rten pa yi sbyor bI ga dan// rdo rje phreng bsra shin du
26b1(rgyud): bdo coM la gnas ni zlum po la// dpa' bo nyi shu'i re'u mig bya// shar gyi phyogs su dgod bya ba// keng rus 'jigs byed kang lus byung // de mi nga bar dgod bya ba// pad ma 'byung ba ka las byung // de rigs su khaM \u0f7f las byung // 
26b2(rgyud): T+wAM ga'i srin po ste// de yi phreng bar dgod bya ba// khi byung lha mo ser nom// de yi g.yon du gaM las byung // sgra zab ces bya'i dpa'o ste// de yi paM dgod lha mo ni// ge ma las byung ba'i sgra zab ma// 'khor lo byang gi dbus su ni// drin
26b3(rgyud): zhes pa gaM las byung / de yi pang gnas lha mon// bum pa'i nu ma ga~M las byung // g.yas kyi cha las brtsams nas ni// byung ba'i gtum pa'i dbang phyug ste// de dag mkhyud pa yi lha mo ni// g.yo ba'i gcong can tsaM las byung // 
26b4(rgyud): dri'i g.yon du tsang byung ba'i// ser ka'i gdon can zhes bya ba// dri dang mkhyud pa'i lha mo ni// so yis 'bras tsa las byung // nub kyi ri'u rgya dbu ma li// dzam byung ba la mtshan cha rkang // de dang lhan cig gnas pa ni// blo nam
26b5(rgyud): ste dzaM las byung // g.yas kyi re'u char gnas pa yi// sgra 'jigs zhes bya dzaM las byung // de dang mkhyud pa'i lha mo ni// sgra byed dga' ma'ang dza las byung // de yi g.yon gyi re'u cha la// chu skyar za ba ta las byung // de yi pang par gan
26b6(rgyud): pa ni/ thor cag gis brgyan taM las byung // lho'i re'u mig dbu ma la// maM las byung ba grags pa can// da yi baM ma par gnas pa ni// dor thabs la dga' thi las byung // de yi g.yas su dgod pa ni// cang te'u 'dul ba d+ha las
26b7(rgyud): 'byung / de yi ba bar gnas pa ni// 'di d+hi dzan d+hi las byung // g.yon gyi re'u cha gnyis pa la// 'da' ka'i 'ur s+tha d+hi las byung // de'i dbang par gnas pa ste// d+ha kas rol ma ha las byung // dbang ldan gyi ni re'u chal// rtsod pa dga'
26b8(rgyud): ba ti las 'byung // de yi pham par gnas pa ni// byin phran ma ste te las byung // de yi re'u cha gnyis pa la// lag ring zhes bya ba las byung // de dang lhan cig gnas pa ni// rnam par g.yo ba thaM las byung // me yi 'tshams kyi re'u/ 
27a1(rgyud): chal/ mche ba gcig pa te las byung // de yi drang bar gnas pa ni// 'od non pa snyed las byung // de yi re'u cha gnyis pa la// brtan zhing 'jigs pa de las byung // de yi bang gnas nal 'byor ma// dal bus
27a2(rgyud): sgro 'da' d+haM las byung / bden bral gyi ni re'u mig la// lus rgyas zhes bya bang las byung // de yi bang par gnas pa ni// mig ser ma'ang dang las 'byung // de yi re'u cha gnyis pa la// sgyu ma'i gdong can po las byung // de yi pad+ma gnas
27a3(rgyud): lha mo ni/ paM las byung ba'i mag rgya ma// rlung 'tshams re'u mig la gonas// tshangs pa dbyangs can la rgyu/ de la 'phyang ba'i rnal 'byor ma// mdzes ma'i lus can baM las byung // de yi re'u mig gnyis pa la// sgra 'jigs zhes bya
27a4(rgyud): baM las byung / de yi yan lag la gnas pa// bum sbram ste baM las bya// nam mkha' yi ni grong khyer mchog/ dpa' bo nyi shu kun gyis bskor// rtse bran lngas ni brgyan pa ste// gcer bu sgra ni rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ma dang phan// 
27a5(rgyud): tshun mkhyud/ rnal 'byor snod dang mtshon cha bsnams// bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang // btung ba zhim po dag bkang nas// ye shes gdan dang gzhan gyi gdan// sbyor gdan mchod pa lnga yis mchod// de dag gi ni gzugs
27a6(rgyud): mdun du/ dam tshig dag ni bstan par bya// rlung dang me yi gdan don la// rdo rje ma yi sa bon dbye// sgra dang thig le yang dag mnan// char pa yi rgyun zhes bya bar brjod// phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg byed mtha'// ye shes mkha'
27a7(rgyud): 'gro'i sa bon yin// dbyangs thogs sa bon dang po ni// phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg byed mtha'o// shar phyogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i// sa bon du ni rab tu grags// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed
27a8(rgyud): sbyar bar bya/ 'di ni byang go phyogs gnas la// mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sa bon yin// sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la// dbyug pa blo ru bzhag par bya// phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg byed mtha'// nub phyogs ro langs ma yi yon// 
27b1(rgyud): sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la// steng du thig le sbyin par bya// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed mtha' sbyar ba// lho phyogs gtum pa'i dbang mo yin// ma nings bon dang po na// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed mtha' dang sbyar// dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma'i// 
27b2(rgyud): sa bon du ni rab tu grags// ma ning sa bon gnyis po ni// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed mtho dong sbal// mi 'tshams lha mo stag mo na// de kho na nyid kyi sa bon bshad// de bzhin ma ning sa bon gsum// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed mtha'
27b3(rgyud): dang sbrel/ bden bral lha mo lha spyang mo// khyad par gyi ni so bon yin// ma ning yig bzhi pa la// phyag 'tshal bsreg byed mtha' dang sbyar// rlung 'tshams hUM byad 'ug pa ma'i// sa bon du ni rab tu sbyor// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi/ 
27b4(rgyud): yigrik+ki/ gnyis pa gzung // sa bon rtsa ba sgro dang sbyar// phyag 'tshal thog ma bsreg byed mtha'// shar gyi mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo// sa ban du ni shes par bya// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// de bzhin yig gnyis pa bzung // e
27b5(rgyud): dang theg ler sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal thog ma bsregau byed mtha'// byung phyogs lha mo 'bar byed ma'i// sa bon yig sbyar bar bya// sna tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// yig gnyis pa bzung bar bya// oM dang ra ba thig ler sbyar
27b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal thog mar po sreg byed mtha'// nub phyogs lho mo 'jigs byed mo'i// khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa'i// yi ge gnyis pa bzung nas su// ra ba thig le lcags kyur sbyar// phyag 'tshal bsreg po'i
27b7(rgyud): / mthar sbyar byas lhor gnas lha mo 'phrog pad ma// sa bon du ni rab tu grogs// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// dbu ma gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang // rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni// ye shes lha mo sbyar bar bya// lag gnyis phan
27b8(rgyud): tshun sbyor na su// dbu ma dang ni mthe bo sprod// cung zad cig ni bskyed par bya// shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan// khu tshur mnyam par bcings su// mthe bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su// byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ 
28a1(rgyud): rgya 'di drag mo la bstan bya// phyag rgya de gnyis bcings nas su// the'u chung gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// nub du gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i/ d+ya/ ru ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya de gnyis bcings nas su// gung
28a2(rgyud): mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// lho phyogs phyag rgyar bshad pa ste// de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// khro bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo spyad de gnas po ni// 'tshams bzhi'i ni phyag rgya yin/ 
28a3(rgyud): lag gnyis thal mo khor bcug nas// phu zhes pa dang sbyar bar po// shar phogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin// log gnyis thal mo kha sbyar nas// spyi bo ru ni bzhag par ba// byang du gnas pa'i 'bor ma la// phyag
28a4(rgyud): rgya 'di ni snyan par bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su// kha ru bzhog ste hUM zhes bya// nub phyogs lha mo 'jigs ma yi// phyag rgya ru ni sbyar b.raro bya// lag gnyis kun du bskor nas su// sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo sbyar// gsang
28a5(rgyud): ba'i gnas su bzhog nas kyang // lho yi phyogs su ma la bstan// zla ba'i phyogs su brkyang nasau su// 'jigs pa dang ni rnam shes sbyar// steng du nyi ma'i lag pa bzhag/ lbos mo la sogs rab tu grags// oM ho hau hri swA hA// 
28a6(rgyud): / spos ma la sogs pa'i 'o// nyi ma zla ba bairkyang nas su// kha sbyar nas ni stong du bzhag/ oM g+hi g+ha swA hA// drag mo la sogs pa yi'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// nyi ma yi ba phye ste spro// oM ku ru ku ru swAhA// drag shul
28a7(rgyud): can la sogs pa yi'o// nyi mu zla ba rab brkyang nas// rgyab dang rgyab gnyis sbyor byas te// lag pa yi no sor mo rnams// phan tshun rtswa mo sgrog du sbrel// oM ba tA li hUM swA hA// tha~Md pa n+dan la sogs pa yi'o// rdo rje khro
28a8(rgyud): tshur gnyis bcings nas// rkang pa'i 'tshams su bzhag par bya// snyoms dang bcas par rab brtags na// sgeg mo yin dam tshig 'gyur// oM hU~M swA hA// sgeg mo'i'o// zla ba'i lag pa brkyang nas su// rnam shes
28b1(rgyud): dang ni 'jigs par sar// nyi ma'o lag pu gzung bar bya// dri yi dung zhes bya bar grags// oM su prI yang g+han d+ha hUM swA hA// dri'i 'o// zla ba thal mo bshibs te brkyang // gung mo gyen du bsgreng bar bya// nyi ma'i sor mo bsgre
28b2(rgyud): ba ni/ pi wa phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM hUM swA hA// pau waM ma'i'o// zla bo nya ma snyim par sbyar// gyen du bskyed de gtor bar bya// me tog snyim par sbyar ba yis// me tig gi ni dam tshig 'gyur// oM sr-i swA hA// me
28b3(rgyud): tog gi'o// khu tshur bcangs nas dkar po bsgreng // hUM hUM zhes bya bskyod par bya// khu ru byug pa'i tshul byas la// glu mkhan ma'i dam tshig bshad// oM hU~M hUM hUM swA hA// glu mkhan ma'i 'o// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// zla ba
28b4(rgyud): khrig mar bzung nas suH/ bdug spos 'bul ba'i tshul byis la// bdug spos dom tshig gsum// i oM s+t+wa~M hA// bdug spros kyi'o// rked pa g.yas kyi cha ru ni// zla ba'i log pa gzhag nas kyang // nyi ma'i lag pa bskyed de
28b5(rgyud): bzung / de yi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur/ oM su ro pr-i te swAhA// gar gyi'o// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byis nas// spyi bo'i steng du bzhag par bya// lus ni g.yon du cung zad dgug/ mar ma'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags// 
28b6(rgyud): i g+h+raM swA hA/ ma ro ma'o// nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas su// dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar// du ba la sogs bsgreng bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje phyag rgyar grags// oM hUM swAhA// rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de ltar zla ba'i lag byas
28b7(rgyud): pa dril bu'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags// oM ho swA hA/ dril bu'i sngags dang phyag // nyi ma zla ba kha sbyar te// gsang pa'i gnas su bzhag nas kyang // pad mo saM btugs bskyod par bya// a lo'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags/ 
28b8(rgyud): oM oM swAhU~M// mkhra' 'gro thams cad sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyis ni pad ma gnon// lkog ma gsum ni brkyang ste bsgred // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor// mtshon cha'i phyag rgya zhes byar grags
29a1(rgyud): oM tog stsa// mtshon nA'i sngags dang byugats+tsha'o// d+hA 'i mag pa de bzhin du// byas pa bde bar gshegs pa yis// mang 'gro ba'i kyil 'kho du// tshon mod pa'i drug rgyu shA / 
29a2(rgyud): oM g+hu ra ni tahU~M phaT// mtshon cha med pa rnams kyi sngags dang pado rgya'o// gzhon yang chung mar bcas po yi// sngags dang ngag rgyar bstan par bya// nyi ma'i khu tshur dam bcings nas// gyen du rnam par grol bar bya// oM Sha
29a3(rgyud): sha swA hA/ seng ge'i'o// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni// rang gi snying khar bskyod par bya// tshangs pa yi ni dam tshig tu// bde bar gshegs kyis mdo bsdus gsung // oM aM swA hA/ tshangs pa'i'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur bcings
29a4(rgyud): nas ni/ bya dan gsum pa gyen du bsgreng // 'di ni mdung can phyag rgya ste// dam tshig 'joms pa'i dam pa'o// oM hUM swAhA// ru tri'i'o// zla ba'i khu tshu re bcings nas ni// gi haM dge ni bsgreng bar bya// nyi ma'i sor mi kun brgyung
29a5(rgyud): naswa/ oM a mu mu hA swA hA// brgya byin gyi'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings la// dkar po dud pa bsgreng bar bya// dpral ba'i steng gi thod sor byug/ dbang po yi ni dam tshig 'dod// oM mu mu hU~M swA hA// dbang po'i'o// rdorje
29a6(rgyud): bcing ba bsdam byas nas// dkar po dang ni gi haM bsgreng // rin chen lta bur sbyar nas ni// lus dag la ni bsten par bya// oM d+ha ne a kle hUM swA hA// lus ngag gi'o// khu tshur bcings nas dkar po ni// brkyang nas gyen du
29a7(rgyud): bsgreng bar bya// 'byung po'i bdag po dam tshig du// thub pa rnams kyis bshad pa yin// oM khA d+hA ni hUM phaT// 'byung po'i bdag po'i'o// khu tshur de ni bzhag nas su// dkar po dang ni du ma brkyang // phyag rgya yi ni rgyal ba
29a8(rgyud): yis gdongs ka'i bdag po'i dam tshig yin par bshad// oM bur b+ha swAhA/ klu'i bdag po'i'o// de dag gi ni chung ma rnams// bdag po'i dam tshig phyag rgya nyid// bcings pa dam tshig yin por bshad// sngags/ 
29b1(rgyud): ni so sor bstan par bya// oM lagra smr-i ye swA hA/ oM b+ha ra h+ye swAhA// oM sa ra sa te swA hA/ oM pra ne swA hA// oM mah+ye shwa re swA hA/ oM ga~M ga ye swAhA/ oM in dra ya swA hA// oM ta lo ta mA ye swA hA// oM sa tsa ye swA hA// oM ra~M ma ye swAhA
29b2(rgyud): oM b+ha su ma te swA hA/ oM ha ri ne swA hA/ oM lang ki shar+ya swAhA/ oM ra ga pri ya ye swA hA/ oM b+haM ga ba t+ye swA hA// oM ud pa la pri ya yai swA hA// 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag 'tshal dang ni
29b3(rgyud): bsreg pa yi// dbus su hU~M zhes bya ba sbyar// log pa'i kun du brkyang la sogs// dri sngags phyag rgya rig par bya// bdud rtsir dang thig ler bcas// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha'i mtha'o// dri yi phyag rgya brkyang nas su// 
29b4(rgyud): khro ba dang ni mthe bong sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// thams cad rig pas thams cad dbul// sngo chen dang ba'i dang po ni// phyag 'tshal thog ma'i bsreg byed mtha'// phyag rgya de nyid sbyar nas su// dbu ma'i
29b5(rgyud): sor me bsgreng bar bya// bdug pa'i sngagaso dang phyag rgya yis// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// dgu mtha' yi ni sa bon gzung // phyag 'tshal dang ni bsreg byed mtha'o// khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong bsgreng // mar me'i
29b6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya ste// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa gzung // sgra dang thig le sbyar ba dang // phyag 'tshal dang ni bsreg byed mtha'// gtor ma'i phyag rgya dang ni sbyar// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su
29b7(rgyud): mthe bong gung mo bskyong bar bya// thams cad du ni skad cig bskyod// gtor ma'i sngags ni snga mar sbyar// gnyis med gtor mo snga ma bzhin// de nyid 'di yis mchod par bya// sngon du rdzas ni rnam pa lnga// sna tshogs pa yi lcags kyu dang
29b8(rgyud): dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs// sngags dang phyag rgya phul nas kyang // phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis// nges shes can gyis mchod par bya// hUM zhes bya ba'i gru blangs nas// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyi
30a1(rgyud): bam pa da pa'i phyogs su banagan pa // sman rgyag gsum du gas pastod// khri nul du bsne pa dang / gling bu'i num du bung ba dang // ngas dung tshul du 'byung ba dang // sa gros pa'i
30a2(rgyud): grol ba dang / btag tar brdung ba'i dang // gar gyi rdul du bskyod pa dang // gzil lab chus du gsob ba dang // phyag mtshan tshul du bsnying ba dang // bla ri'i tshul du bye ba dang // bangadan tshul du 'byar ba dang // gdugs kyi chul du dag
30a3(rgyud): pa dang / rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang // rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dong // 'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhed pa dang // khro ba'i tshul du khro ba dang // sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang // bgying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang // phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste// 
30a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyi// dngos po kun gyis mched par bya// hU~M zhes bya ba bdag gi sbrul// hUM gis glu ni blangs par bya// rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis gzigs// yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stobs kyi rol// dngos
30a5(rgyud): dang dngos med las grol dbu ma mkhyen// mi 'gyur kun bcom lhag mi sems dpa' bo// gnyis spyod kun mkhyud mtshus bya ba can// gnyis med tshes skyes thar pa'ang brnyes pa po// bde bas 'khor mnan thar pa btab pa po// 
30a6(rgyud): thams cad dngos kyis rnal 'byor ma sngags rol// rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen// gzugs mar sgyu mas sems can smin mdzad pa// rdo rje kun rtogs chos kyis rmongs pa gcod// rnal 'byor ma rmongs snying
30a7(rgyud): chos tshogs la 'dud// rnal 'byor ma'i chos grol ngas pa gco la 'dud// sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal// thams cad bdag skyes gcig gis dngos la bstod phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba'i
30a8(rgyud): rgya mtsho rmongs la bstod phyag 'tshol// de nyid cig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal// zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing // glu dang bstod pas mchod par bya'o// bar bar du hUM gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la// smon
30b1(rgyud): ma rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings na// sgying kha'i phyogs su bcing bar bya// oM swa b+ha ba shud d+har+tha d+harmas b+hA ba shud d+hotrA~M// oM badz+ra shud d+ha sar+b+ba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho b+h+rU~M// oM yo ga shud d+d+ho sar+b+ba d+ham
30b2(rgyud): ga shud+d+hoH// g.yas par bdam bsams nas su// g.yon pa rdo rjer bsgrung nas kyang // pad ma'i bskor ba bskor nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bstan par bya// mo ho ha~M hrI swA hA// phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang / 
30b3(rgyud): rgya'o// rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs pa ru// lha rnams thams cad bsam par bya// 'jig rten pa sogs ye shes can// phyi yi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// so sor dri yis byug pa dang // so sor me tog gtor ba dang // so sor
30b4(rgyud): bdug pus bdug pa sogs// so so'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni bsros nas su// nya phyis la sogs dbul bar bya// haM zhes pa yis kha dogang brog/ ho zhes pa yis dri bcom ste// hI zhes pa yis nus pa gzhom// go
30b5(rgyud): rams de ltar mngon par brjod// nom gsum lan gsum badz+rod nas su// lha gsum du ni bsam por bya// pad ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes gser gyi mdog/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin du rnam snang mdzad// myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phrag/ 
30b6(rgyud): rdo rje k-i wI gaHdu ni bsgom par bya// g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi// zla ba'i dbus su bdud rtsi yi// yi ge kun rig gug bskyed bcas// mthe bo sor mos nyid de// srin lag dag ni pib bo// bsrubs pa'i stob kyi bdud rtsi yi// yog
30b7(rgyud): chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la// mthe bo'i thor ma so sor dbul// de 'og rang gi dngos po yis// bdag nyid ldan bsam par bya// rgyas pa lnga'i mchod rten ni// rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya// 
30b8(rgyud): lce rtser thig gi steng du yang // blo dang ldan pas gnas gsum mchod// ltos shig shin du mdzes pa'i chos// 'di la rtog pa yod min mthong // bram ze khyi dang gdol po gsum// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// rnal 'byor
31a1(rgyud): rgyan/ po me'i dkyil 'khor la/ tshigs bcad 'di yis sbyin par bya// pad ma'i bskor ba sngon 'gro bas// sems ni shel ltar bsams nas su// g.yas pa pad ma'i bstan sa ni// rdo rje rtse gsum bsgreng bar
31a2(rgyud): bya/ 'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i// rin thang med las legs 'ong so tshos 'dzin dang 'dzin min rnam spangs pa// de ni nyid bdag phyag 'tshal lo// sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni// kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor
31a3(rgyud): paM yis kun du sbyang // ji ltar bde ba spyod ces brjod// gnyis su med pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar bde ba'i sbyin bsreg bya// lpags par brtag pa k+ta sogs pa// gtor ma yis ni mchod par bya// gal te 'byor na gzhan dong
31a4(rgyud): bcas/ med ni bdag nyid gcig pu yis// mtshon chen gyi ni gos dag gam// dar sogs sar pa bgos nas ni// rdo rje drol bu de bzhin du// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes par bya// brgya byin gdugs ni thogs pa dang // tshangs
31a5(rgyud): pa bsil yab g.yo ba dang bcas// seng ga mdun nas gsol ka ba// 'phrog byed yon tan sgom par byed// rol pa'i stabs la gnas na ki hU~M zhes brjod cing shar du lta// nyi mas rdo rje gsor nas ni// zla bas dril bu bsil nas
31a6(rgyud): kyang / dri dkar maN+Dal gru bzhir bya// me tog dkar po tsal du dkram// dri dang me tog sogs ldan pa'i// sa lu'i 'bras zan rgya che ba// zho dang bu ram mar 'o thug/ shar gyi sgor ni sbyin par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab
31a7(rgyud): nas rgyab du sbyar bar bya// pad mos gdugs sbrel nas su// dkar paM dang ni gi haM bsgrang // dkar po cung zad dkrugs pa yis// lha dang lha min grub pa dgug/ oM pa ta li pa ti li ma hU~M pa ta li hUM hUM dza swA hA// shar phyogs kyi sgo
31a8(rgyud): dgug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla bas snod la gnas ni// nyi ma rdo rje khu tshur bcing // dkar po dang ni gi ha bsgreng // rol pa yi ni 'dug stangs kyis// stabs la gnas nas brjod par bya// oM rgyu ba dang cher rgyu ma// yid dgas
31b1(rgyud): rgyu ba nyim zla dngos grub gdong dang rgyal pa dang // ha si n+tas ga pa'i tshul// lha mo u mgag dang // gzugs mdzes dkar mo 'dus pa dang // gza' rnams kun dang tshogs kyi gtso// dkar ti ka dang dpal ldan ma// lha mor nga
31b2(rgyud): 'dzin ma nyid/ lha ba dang ni lhag pa che// lhag pa'i rgyal po lhag man nul// puk+ka si dang lbos chen mo// hUM ha~M a kar sha ya sa/ sha ya saM ma ya a be hUM phaT dza swAhA// spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las// dkar
31b3(rgyud): bo ga ha kri bar bya// oM b+hak+Sha b+ha k+Sha sa ma ya a ti po ti dza hU~M phaT swAhA// zhes bya bas mnyes par byas la// sngags dang phyag rgya btang bar bya'o// de nas byang phyogs sgo ru ni// mnyam pa'i stabs su gnas pa dang // nyi mas rdo rje gsor ba dang / 
31b4(rgyud): zla bas dril bu dkrol ldan pas// maN+Dal dkar pos byug par bya// 'o ma'i snod la sogs pa bzhag/ me tog dkar dang bdug pa dang // 'o mar bcas pa'i lha bshos/ 'bul// sbur gyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang // sngags kyang des ni sbyar bar bya// 
31b5(rgyud): zla ba khu tshur brtan bcings la// rnam par shes dang sa gdugasra brkyad// nyi ma'i lag pa legs brkyang ste// gdengs ka'i tshul da steng du sbyar// phyag rgya snod la reg nas ni// phyi rol byang du dgug par bya// oM mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas
31b6(rgyud): bu 'dzeg po dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// pad ma pad ma chen po dang // dung skyob ni rigs ldan rnams// lha mo lha mo chen mo dang / zla ba spyi gtsug spyi gtsug che// be con 'dzin dang bri tsA nau che// snying po med dong 'gul ste// dga' bo dang ni nyer
31b7(rgyud): dga' dang // rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che// gdung ba dang ni gdung ba mo// dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// rin chen 'od dang gzugs bzong dang // gzugs chen sbrul bzangs lto 'phye cha// smig sgyu dang ni smig rgyu che// oM a gad tsa a gad
31b8(rgyud): tsa ma hA ga na a ti ba te sar+b+ba b+hu ra bu ba phuM phaT swA hA/ byang phyogs gtor ma byin nas ni// se gol gsum gyis btang bar bya'o// zlum po'i stobs gnas sbyar ba'i bdag/ nub kyi phyogs kyi cha ru ni// maN+Dal dmar pos byugs nas su// 
32a1(rgyud): // me tog dmar pos btsal du dbu ma// gnod sbyin gyi ni dbang po rnams// sngar gyi phyag rgyas dgug par bya// me tog dri la sogs ldan pa'i// gtor ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas// sngon gyi rkang thabs bskyod nas ni// nub du
32a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dbang po mchod// oM nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang // rgyal po bzang po dga' byed phur// pur bu cha dang pad ma'i gtsug/ dung gi gtsug pud gar dang ni// garA chen 'bigs par byed pa dang // gcod par byed dang gang bar byed/ 
32a3(rgyud): nor dang nor min shin du nor// gzugs bzangs rol pha rol chen po// dgod dang rtse dang rnam par bskyod// dpal bzangs dang ni gzugs mdzes rnams// bde ba chen po'i bka' 'di yis// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo 'di shog/ hU~M a
32a4(rgyud): pad ra a pad ra/ oM pa ta li ba ti la ma hA pa ta li// b+hAk+Sha pri ya yo gi nI ma d+h+ye hUM hUM swAhA// khu tshur gronyis ni sbyar nas su// snying kha'i phyogs su btsir bar bya// oM d+han pa ti pa ta ye pa ta li ma hA pa ta la swAn+da// nub skar gnod sbyin gyi gautor
32a5(rgyud): ma/ byin sde gol gsum gyis btang bar bya'o// rdo rje yi ni rkang stobs kyis// lho sgo'i phyogs su bsten nas ni// dmar po zhi rjes rnams kyis// maN+Dal gru gsum gsum du byug/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar
32a6(rgyud): bar byo/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbrel nas su// 'dzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng ba ra ba// g.yas pa cung zad bkum nas su// sbyar bas lha rnams spyan drang ngo // oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a ti ba ti hUM swA hA// spyan drangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 
32a7(rgyud): me tog dmar po bdug pa dang // dri dang me tog la sogs dbul// nye ba'i ljongs spyod gtor mar ldan// shaM rlon dang ni nyo la sogs// btsong dang khrag gis bkang ba'i snod// sran chan dang ni til khur bcas// gza' ba'i rdzas rnams
32a8(rgyud): rnams thams cad la// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa dgod// bza' ba ci'i rnam po sna tshogs pa// lho yi sgor ni sbyin par bya// snga phyi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur dgug/ rnga chen la sogs gsum brdungs shing / 
32b1(rgyud): chen pa ni rgo bar bya// gson gyi cha du snod bzhag la// g.yas su khrab btsun par bya// ma nang gcig dang na dur khrod dang / ri bi dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang ba ni mdo grang dang no// khyad par bu 'ang stong dang // gdam dun
32b2(rgyud): gdol ba'i snod dang thong dang ni// khyad par du ni chu ka/ nag po drag po drug chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du sten pa dang // nag pa gtsigs dang mi sdug dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan bye ma drang drag mo dang / 
32b3(rgyud): mi sdug ma dang u ma dang // rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag tshun mo// nag spros ma dang rnal 'byo ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag du sdang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar
32b4(rgyud): me mai/ 'jig byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mi 'o gzugs dang gzugs can mo// mchi ba gtsigs dang rjod chen ma// zoda'i byeng can dang rnam// sbrul che rol gri dgu ston+dan// rdo rje de bozhin gan
32b5(rgyud): rganam/ de bzhin chen mkha' 'gro / lus kun rjes su bsgrub byung mo// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyugag so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku me ste/ rdul med
32b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/ thams cad kun nas 'drir spyon cig/ oM kra ga ka ta na d+ha na kha g+ha d+ha na// sar+b+ba dusta naM ha nA ha na g+ha ta sa g+hA ta ya// a mo ga sa shan ting ku ru hUM hUM phaT dza swA hA/ 
32b7(rgyud): bdud rtsis kho bkang nas// las kyi go 'dangs mngon par bsam// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma snyoms te// las rnams thams cad rjes su sgrub// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing nas// rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya// mthe'u
32b8(rgyud): nung gnyis ni bkris nas su// khro bdag ni lkog tu bcing // ma tog slob rdzab k+Sha ba // ji bzhin las la sogs sbyar naso// gtor ma'o mas la sogs pa sgyur// ni rgyas dbang dang dbug pa dang / 
33a1(rgyud): / bsad bskrad dbye dang bcing ba dang // phyi rol gton ma 'di nyid kyis// gtor ma'i las la sogs pasgrub// mtshan nyid ji skad gsungs pa zhin// sngo phyogs su ni gtor ma sbyin// de nas
33a2(rgyud): mchod pa'i khyad par las// rang dang mi rung rnam par spangs// lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa lnga// de nyid lnga ru byas pa ste// lcags kyu la dgod pa na// ye shes lhar ni dgod pa ste// rdo rje lcags kyu maM spyad pa/ 
33a3(rgyud): gnas kyi lcags kyur rin chen dbang // rgyal ba'i lcags kyur don yod grub// g.yo ba'i lcags kyu 'od dpag med// lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa la// de nyid thams cad sbyar bar bya// gang zhig 'dod na lha rnams kun/ 
33a4(rgyud): rnas 'byo mthun tshim par bya// 'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing / longs spyod phyir ni bsnyen mi bya// rang 'dod thams cad de nyid de// mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya// de yi dbus su dpa' ba rnams/ 
33a5(rgyud): wi/ so sbyor bar bya// a lo ka mi basbyor gyis// lha rnams thams cad tshim par gro// de yi dbus las byung ba yi// bdud rtsi ro kun myang bar bya// rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag mdag/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor du ni brtag
33a6(rgyud): zhes pa 'i glu ngon// bkra shis sgra mis dgang bar bya// lus can don phyir shes 'ob gsol btab pa// kun ma byud la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis spyod cing // snu ma lta bur sbyor bas shin du brtan// srid pa las tshul khyid
33a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal/ nga 'dod g+sashis med no//  nga dri bubasal// rdo rje bas nod cis zhes// s+yA la'i gnas kyu bzhags// ma kyi semam can byor// sngon ldam dgani ga / 
33a8(rgyud): bya sems can thams cad nad med cing // sems can thams cad 'di gyur gcig/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid dang 'drad bar shog/ ma bsgral pa rnams bsgras bya zhing // ma grol ba rnam
33b1(rgyud): bdag gis grol/ da ltar nyid du rjes rtse bas// rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// g.yon pa snying kar bzhag par bya// g.yas pa sa la brkyang nas ni// de yi 'og tu
33b2(rgyud): gshegs su gsol// oM ad ma tista hUM swAhA// de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni// bdag gi lus la bstim par bya// skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyis// bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba du sta g+hi na a gad
33b3(rgyud): tsa hUM phaT/ se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yis// phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol// gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las// rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis
33b4(rgyud): lcags kyus lnga po brlab// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos// gnyis kyis rnam rtog ji ltar spang // a li kau li ji ltar lags// phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni tsi// rnal 'byor bstan chos tshul rnams
33b5(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po bdud ce rdo rje'i chu// lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug/ reg na drob me yin te// du balhur snang rlung yin no// 
33b6(rgyud): sla ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya// gzugs su snang bas yin no// ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje nyid// lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya// ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni// zad par byed pa me nyid dang // de bzhin
33b7(rgyud): rtag tu rlung dang ni// dang po mtshungs de nas dbang po// sgra dang thig ler sbyor bar bya// ye shes kyi ni yig g+ha// de yi dbus su zla ba'i// dbus su bdud rtsi yi ge'o// lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya/ 
33b8(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i// rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis// des ni gti mug bsrings pa yin// phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po// ma yis btsos nas sbyangs pa ltar// lha sogs ye shes me yis
34a1(rgyud): ni/ lhag ma gshang dang gci ba yin// me yis bcos nas sbyangs me yi// dbus su sbyin bsreg rtag tu dbul// rdo rje yi chu'i sa bon ni// sa bon bcas pa bzlas nas kyang // 
34a2(rgyud): de yi dbus su nyi ma la// dur khrod yi ge bsams nas bsreg/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// ngo phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// pad ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin du bsdug/ dri
34a3(rgyud): chu'i ngo bo shin du rnam snang mdzad// myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje// lha gsum rnam gsum shes par bya// ho zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog/ ho zhes pa yis dri gzhom ste// hri zhes pa yis nus pa
34a4(rgyud): gzhom// go rims de ltar mngon par brjod// bdud rtsi chu zhes bya ba ni// lhan rnam pa gsum du grogos// dngos drang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir rmongs pa ring du stong // a li bung pa zhes
34a5(rgyud): brjod de// bung pa rdo rje 'jigs byed yin// a li nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can// lus ni ma lus bskyed pa po// bcu dang brgyad kyi
34a6(rgyud): rtswartsa rnams nas// dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams// de yi dbus su drangs nas su// a li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur// 'dzegs byed rdo rje'i sgra yis ni// sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin// rlung dang
34a7(rgyud): me'i bdun don la// rdo rje mo'i sa boni sbyar// sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan// tshar ba'i rgyuni zhes bya bar brjod// dbyangs yig dong po mchog sa bon// de yi dbus su bzung bar bya// dngos dang dngos
34a8(rgyud): med las grol ba// de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// ki li me tog kun tu mnan// rdo rje can gyi lus me tog/ 'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste// sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya// ye shes chu yi brgya mtsho
34b1(rgyud): 'dir/ de bzhin shes rab chu srin nya// gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni// thabs kyi nyu gu de bzhin de// ban d+hu ka ltar kha phye ba// sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ni gnas// ka li bdud rtsi'i de nyid ni// me tog
34b2(rgyud): chu yis kun tu bskor// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar// yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni// lha rnams kyis ni rigs kyi yum// zla ba'i dbus su bsam bya ba// bdud rtsi'i sa bon
34b3(rgyud): bsgoms pa yis// dngos dang dngos med med las grol ba// de phyir rmongs pa kun du spong // a li bung ba zhes byar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// lus gnyis la ni skyes pa dag/ bdud rtsi yi ni
34b4(rgyud): cho ga mchog/ sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum po gzung bar bya// dbyug pa'i phyi ma rdo rje can// ska bo che yis dkri bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid 'dris// lus can bdag nyid bkru bar bya// 
34b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur// 'gro po'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing // dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa// bdu rtsi'i sbyor ba kun shes pas// rang dkar bdud rtsi myang bar
34b6(rgyud): bya/ bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gis// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// gang gang shes nas zos pa yis// myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur// blo chen dang ni ngag ding ni// rigs la 'gran dang ring 'gro dang // 
34b7(rgyud): lcogs kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas// shel dang 'dra ba long spyad bya// rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni// de yi sa bon gzung bar bya// shel gyi sems kyis long spyad nas// rnal 'byor rmongs pa spong bar 'gyur
34b8(rgyud): bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te// de yi yan lag la sbyor ba// hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis// lcags kyu de ni sbyang bar bya// gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyun// g+h+r-i zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid// rab tu
35a1(rgyud): sbyar te bsams nas su// rnam par rtog pa ring du spang // rta yi lcags kyu dbus gnas par// thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor pa yis ji zhes pa// dag pa'i
35a2(rgyud): shel ltar bsam par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas// rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste// shriM zhes bya ba bkod de bza'// rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byung ngo // bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // khyad
35a3(rgyud): par du yang tshes brgyad la// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin// sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan btsos la// rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas na// spyod dang grol ba
35a4(rgyud): gang 'dod dang // las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po pho brang 'gro na yang // myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar// mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par
35a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ dbul po nor gyis phongs pa yang // khyim ni 'byor cing rgyas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i tshe ni rnal 'byor pa// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la// 
35a6(rgyud): yig bcu yi sngags dag ni// phyag 'tshal ba sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te// mkha' 'gro'i gte ro ma byin brlab pa// sgrub pos 'di yi ba dug pas gdug/ 'gro ba thams
35a7(rgyud): cang rmongs par 'gyur// gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu phan tshun ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor mi thig le bya// skyes bu 'gro ba skal bzangs 'gyur// tsan dan dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu dang
35a8(rgyud): ni ldan pa yis// yan lag thams cad dbyugs nas su// reg ni shaM ying mi gtong ngo // dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru// bza' dang btung ba sbyin byas na// 
35b1(rgyud): dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlas nas kyang // mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs na// de dag lus su sbyar bar bya// nges bstan pa la the tsom med// pho nya
35b2(rgyud): las kyi bya ba yis// grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gnyer phyir// rnal 'byor ma bzhi sgrub thabs ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// pho nya'i las su rab sbyar ba yi// de nyid ji
35b3(rgyud): bzhin rdo rjes nyon// las rnams kun gyi snying po pas// rab tu 'bad de phroM nya bsgrub// shing gcig pa ni drung ba ru// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas// khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi// thang
35b4(rgyud): ka la ni br-i byas te// 'theb sor bcu gnyis tshad du bya// kha dog ser po shin du mdzes// phyag gnyis mgo bor thul sbyar bas// 'od zer me 'bar lha mo dri// sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas su// 
35b5(rgyud): 'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga tsam// dri mang me tog dmar po dang // sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor mu sbyin// rdzas lnga dag ni dang sa
35b6(rgyud): po lnga/ mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nya dri bsnam// gsum par shing ni 'gyur ba ste// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// de yi
35b7(rgyud): sngags ni brjod nas kyang // dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM d+hi pi shwa ri hUM k+ShaM phu// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya// dam tshig sngags dang
35b8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkong ba mo// dmatshig tshu ni sbyin par bya/ 'bad de dmachog sbyin nas no// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med par/ 
36a1(rgyud): / byin gyis brlongs langs bsgrubs ni// de nas rang gi gzugs gtu nas// brda'adang tung sogs rnon mo dang // gas la sogs pa ni mang da/ b+hakA
36a2(rgyud): zhin d+ha du skye bar 'gyur// thung byed du ni rgyun cig snang // gabyig pa skyed pa'i rnas 'byor ma// gal te 'grub bar mthur ni// de tshe drag po'i sathon panas// sa bon gyis ni
36a3(rgyud): gzir tsam gyis// 'dir byed ma mo spyi bo'i goms// sems can don mdzad sgrub pa pos// 'bar ba chung ma bsgrub par bya// grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes
36a4(rgyud): nyon thang ka khru gnyis dman po la// mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te// de ldog gzugs ni bri bar bya// dkor zhing dmar la shin du mdzes// phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs
36a5(rgyud): shin du mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// phyag na sdig 'dzub lcags kyu bsnams// skra dgrol bas ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// dmigs g.yon ha ha ra gzhad maM bri/ 
36a6(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni sa phyogs su// sgrub pa po yis bri sku dkum// kun du khrag gis byugs nas ni// me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod// me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // sha dang nya sha btsang la sog
36a7(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin zhing // rnal 'byor sgom pas bzlas nas ni// 'bum gyis dngos po skye bar 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su// kha ru
36a8(rgyud): bcug ste brgad par bya// oM d+ha ki ni hUM phru phu// sgrub pa'i sngags dang rgya'o// dang pos ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa mdun du gang rgyang spogs// gsum par mdun du snang gyur nas/ rjen/ 
36b1(rgyud): ba la ni bka' lung nod// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru naM sgrub pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// ngagra rnams gsad cing gtse ba dang // yan
36b2(rgyud): lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i// las la sogs pa thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyang sgrub par 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis gdon zan// rdo rje ma yuM sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin
36b3(rgyud): mkhas pas gzir bar bya ste bzla// ra dag gi ni lpags pa la// 'bad da thang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jigs byed ma ni 'di ru bzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin du mdzes// lus la rgyan gyis rgyan pa dang // mdza
36b4(rgyud): pa'i gos ni gon par bri// g.yon nu sdig 'dzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dag sta dgod por bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni sgrub byas te// lAM ba yis ni byugs byas la// 
36b5(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tige gdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung ba kun gyi gtor mo sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' bdag ni sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bkong ba sbyin// 
36b6(rgyud): 'brad de bsam gtan gnas pas bzla// a tsu shrI ni a kar shra ya phu phaT// lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas su// snyim pa tshul gyis gar bskyod bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor
36b7(rgyud): ba yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jigs byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po kyi ni du ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa yi ni chen thogs nas// sdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar
36b8(rgyud): byed// bzhi pa mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' rtsol smros// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phran ba'i phyir// 
37a1(rgyud): dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gser srang phye bye ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying por
37a2(rgyud): gzir te zla// sa bon 'dri yis gzir tsam gyis// 'jig byed ma ni mgo 'gags so// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kau ma~M pa dzi ni bsgrub par// ba lang la sogs kau ng+ge ni// brkyang ste 'phrog byed
37a3(rgyud): ma 'drir gzhug/ lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra dgrol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni zhogs pa thog so// 
37a4(rgyud): he har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs// khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni// dri dang me tog bdug pus bdug/ nya dang sha dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga
37a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor ba ni sgom zhing bzlos// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa
37a6(rgyud): le ni char char 'bab// gsum par thog ni 'bob 'gyur te/ bzhi pa la ni bdun du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de ni 'brid de sgrub// oM kr-i kr-i phruM phruM phaT// 
37a7(rgyud): lug gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// dra yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti
37a8(rgyud): se gangs kyi rtse ru ni// rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'di ro ni 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod pa ni khrid shog ces// gser dang dngul dang zangs la sog
37b1(rgyud): bza' dang bgo dang btung ba ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer de 'ong // lha yi bu mo 'am mi 'ang rung // ti se gangs kyi rtsa ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub
37b2(rgyud): nA/ las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// monan to lnga brgyar bzlas nas ni// gdon
37b3(rgyud): mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang mgrub na// dpa' bo dbus su dkug nas su// dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// kri zhes bya dang gsod pa mthong // hUM gi sa bon bsgoms
37b4(rgyud): pa yis/ thams cad du ni bza' bsam// de nas sgrub bya'i rnal 'byor mA// thams cad kyo ni dbang phyug ma// gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bston pa'i lus kyis ma grub na// ba la tra ka nag pa'i
37b5(rgyud): shing me sbar ba'i dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i nyung oM ka ra ni// nyi ma pha na hUM zhes ni// brjod cing brgyad brgyad bsregs na ni// tshong nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su// nges par las rnams 'grub
37b6(rgyud): byed par mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ba// dris bstan pa la the tsom med// khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste/ khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen ces bcings pa// dbyug pa phyag na bsnam
37b7(rgyud): bau ste/ bdag nyid 'khor ba las bsgral phyir// dpa' bo gnang gis gtang du gsol// rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dbus su// bzang po'i sgro 'di phye ste mthong // rnal 'byor rnala'abar mo gsang chen// 
37b8(rgyud): bsang dang bsang ba zhes bya ba// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// ngag ni phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor
38a1(rgyud): g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de// sor mo khAr ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// g+ho g+hu/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// 'bar byed ma mi
38a2(rgyud): mtshan ma'o// gro g+h+ra// mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa ni// 'jib byed me yi mtshan ma'o// mu gu lag pazla bar gdengs bya ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed brtags yin no// lkog// sna sngar basbyor mo 'debs
38a3(rgyud): pa ni/ thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// dadz+ra/ sha'i ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// g+han d+ho de// gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug grogaso pa'o// a
38a4(rgyud): li ni d+hA hi/ so yis lha la 'chir byed pa// 'dus nas gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// pa kA yo/ log pa rtswa la 'ju byud na// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dri ra ti/ lag pa snying khar nyed byed na// da ni dmi
38a5(rgyud): yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsa ba ta ba/ sna rtsor khu tshur 'tshong ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shu na ta/ lag brkyang pa sti lhor rdegs na// phun sum ljon pA ra yod zhes pa'o// hri ka sa swA hA// lA~M ba ru ni nyed byed na/ 
38a6(rgyud): kha zas bzang por 'dod pa'o// tsan da la ka/ 'dzub mo bdun du ston byed na// zhe ga nag gtum la drag pa'o// ni la don ta pa ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston// a rni ga
38a7(rgyud): yu ta/ lce ni dril bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi ba shes pa'o// dur gr-i tau/ kun tu blta bar byed pa ni// tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ta r-i ka na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su// mtha
38a8(rgyud): bong ri myo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yig la sogs pa// sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg/ gau r-i/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin byed dga' bas rol pa'o// sa ma tsa ya/ 'dzum dang bcas par blta byad
38b1(rgyud): cing / lag pas lag pa gzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor zas sbyin zhes bya ba'o// 'dzir na pa ta lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// da ltar 'grogs la 'dong zhes pa'o// sa bab te/ 
38b2(rgyud): mthe bo yis ni srin lag la// reg pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// som/ mthe bo khro bo bza' la sogs su rba rgya bad// rnal 'byor pa dang ma rnams kyis dga' ba la rol pa'i brda'i mtshan nyid do// gzhan gyi
38b3(rgyud): gdan gyi rab tu byed pa rdzogs s+ho// / mtshon cha mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu// shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// 'khor ba las grol
38b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi/ yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dang po rdo rje de nyid de// ril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o// bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste// ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// de nyid bzhi yi rba brlabs kyis// / 
38b5(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol 'gro// dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// thams cad thog ma mi spyod pa// lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung // nub du snang ba mtha' yas dgod// byang gi phyogs su don yod grub// 
38b6(rgyud): mo lnga ni lha rnams so// pad ma byang chub yan lag brgyad// ji bzhin sarbabazhag par bya// phyag na pad ma byams pa dang // nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang // gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhon gyi dpal// sgrib pa rnam
38b7(rgyud): par sel dang sa// lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid// shar la sogs pa ji bzhin bsam// dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru// ye shes lha ni thim par bya// pad ma brgyad la lha mo rnams// ji bzhin gnas su sbyar
38b8(rgyud): bar bya/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du// zhags pa lcags sgrog dkrol ba ste// de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag/ de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin// 'tshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir// mkhas pa
39a1(rgyud): yis ni bsam bya ba/ bskul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can te// gzhan gyis mi thub zhes bya ba// 'tshams kyi mdab ma kun la dgod// rtse mo
39a2(rgyud): lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma// snga ma ji bzhon bsam par bya// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ste// nub du de bzhin ro langs ma// lho yi phyogs su gtu mo gnas// dbus su ye shes
39a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de ni kho na'i lha// mkhas po yis ni shes par bya// cha gsum gos la bar gzung ba'o// skye rigs kyi ni shin du brgyan// ud po la ku mu ta zhes mdzes/ rin chen dpad ma yang
39a4(rgyud): dag gnas/ phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni// dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu// rtse mo dgu yi lha nyid de// lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las ni byung ba yi// rtse mo 'od zer zla bar
39a5(rgyud): gnas/ rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba// ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol// rdo rje de nyid gang yin pas// bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam// rdo rje snying po rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje yi ni sems su bya// rdo rje dag pa
39a6(rgyud): bstan byas nas/ chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med// thams cad rdo rje de bzhin ldan// rdo rje las kyi snying po'o// rdo rje 'phro ba sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje 'khor bsgrol bar byed// rdo rje 'gugs pa
39a7(rgyud): bdag/ rdo rje bcing basbyor ba ldan// mun pa de bzhin nyon mongs rnams// rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni// ye shes rdo rje bcom nas su// phyogs kun du ni snang bar byed// rdo rje sgrub pa la sogs
39a8(rgyud): kun/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid blta bar bya// chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste// thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o// rdo rje pad ma bzung nas su// de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje pad mor zhugs pa ni// mkha
39b1(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgrub par byad/ dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni// thos pas sred pa las grol ba'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs par
39b2(rgyud): byang chub snying por rnam par gnas// thams cad rigs pas phyogs kun du// gnas pas 'jig rten khams mthar thug/ phyogs brgyad zhes ni bya ba rnams// lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags// yige/ 
39b3(rgyud): brgyad kyis sa bon ni// phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo// nub kyi phyogs su mA ma ki/ lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan// mdog bzangs
39b4(rgyud): dbyangs snyan mdzes ma dang // bzhi pa rdo rje phreng ba mo// dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin du mdzes// pad ma rgyas la rno yang dag byung // gzugs mdzes gnas kyi
39b5(rgyud): phyogs su ni// shes rab bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dra// shes rab bdud rtsi'i gnas dag lnga// de yi dbus su bstan la yang // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin lha mo// gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas
39b6(rgyud): snying gi pad ma rdo rje rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste// thams cad spro dang bsdud pa'o// a li ka li rab sbyor gyis// phyogs brgyad dag tu bskyod par bya// a li
39b7(rgyud): ka li rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed// rdo rje dril bu thabs yin te// thabs kyi rdo rje dbus gnas so// g.yas par nyi ma bsams nas su// grayon pa ru ni zla ba dgod// lag
39b8(rgyud): pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// pad ma rnam pa lnga ru bskor// lus rnams la ni thabs su basbyar// rang 'dod lha rnams bsam par bya// rdo rje gsor bas dkrol ba ste// 'khor ba bsgrol ba yang
40a1(rgyud): dga'abyung / hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya// rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis// sems can rnamathar bsgral bar bya// rnamatha
40a2(rgyud): chos su bya ba ste/ rdo rje shin du snying po mchog/ oM badz+ri g+han d+he hUM ha/ oM badz+ra g+han d+he ra ni ta pra ra ni te sar+b+ba b+h+yo ti pra tsal te brad nya par mi ta na da ta swa b+ha be na badz+ra d+ha ra hrid ya/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta pra tsa li ti prad nya par
40a3(rgyud): mi ta na dAn ta sA b+ha ba na/ badz+ra d+ha ra hri da yA/ a ba sa d+ho sha ni hUM hU~M hUM ho ho ho// a a a swA hA// shes rab thabs kyis gzugs zhig gis// shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya// shes rab
40a4(rgyud): thabs kyi chos kyis ni// 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs bya 'am// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can gdon phyir dkrol bar bya// rdo rje de kho na bzung bar// chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba ste// sems
40a5(rgyud): can don byed rnal 'byor pas// shes rab thabs su lta bar bya// de nyid med pas rnal 'byor pas// glang cheni dril sgre bu dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yis// dngos grub ring bar shes
40a6(rgyud): par bya/ ba grang phreng lo sogs bzung ba yi// yang dag ji bzhi ni rdo rjes nyen// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // gzhan yang nor bu
40a7(rgyud): dkar po sogs// zhi sogs las la khyad par gyi// bgrang phreng yi ni mtshan nyid yin// gser dang dngul dang bzangs ma dang // pad ma'i sa bon khyad par du// rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng du/ 
40a8(rgyud): mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya// gur kum la sogs dro zhim pa'i// dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las// ri lur byas te dmar pos bcos// dbang du bsdud par rab tu grags// mi yi rus
40b1(rgyud): pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar byas te// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug pa// bu da na dzi ba las kun byed// sngags 'grub pa lnga bcu ste// dbang la de yi phyed du
40b2(rgyud): bya zhi la brgya drag gcig yin te// rgyas pa la ni brgyad ldog pa'o// mngon spyod la ni drug bcu yin// las kyi bya brag gis ni sbyar// lus kyi dbye ba ji bzhin du// bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya// 
40b3(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams brgyad dang ni// dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dag/ lha dgu yi ni skud pa la// lha dgus byin gyis brlab par bya// gzugs rdzogs shin du mdzes pa dang // gtsang zhing drang ldan
40b4(rgyud): bosbyin par bya// de yis bkal ba'i baglang phreng gis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// skud pa thams cad sangs rgyas tshul// re lu rnams ni dgra bcom yin// steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin te// 
40b5(rgyud): mchod rten chos kyi dbang ba'o// lag pa nyi ma bsams nas su// dbyangs kyi dang po'i yig ni// lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu// dmar po la ni dmar pos sgom// g.yon pa bzla ba'i dbus su ni// bdud
40b6(rgyud): rtsi'i yige bsam bya ba// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam// g.yon pa'i pad ma mdab mar sgom// rdo rje pad mo sbyor ba yis// 
40b7(rgyud): sbyor dbus su skud bzhag la// de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis// bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya// yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos// sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste// rang bzhin med pa'i
40b8(rgyud): grongs bzlas ni// rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub// bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs gcig/ rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub// oM pa te ba de ma~M hA tA na saR+Wa bu ta ma hA b+ha be ta/ hUM hUM hUM ho ha ha a
41a1(rgyud): sngun du na pa/ nga gon na 'phrug/  rnamasathams cad 'grub 'gyur te// migs sa na / 9
41a2(rgyud): nyid bye brag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen po nyan// mau shos bye brag ring du gnas// thun meng ye shes brjod pa ste// dman dang rab dman dman pa bcad// gnod sbyin lha mi grub pa po// klu dang byol so
41a3(rgyud): gsong ba po// lto 'phya dang ni mi 'am ci// mi dang yid dgos mkha' 'grim// dmyal bar 'tshed pa'i sems can dang // byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste// phra mo sgre nga gzugs mi nus// chu dang mi dang rlung
41a4(rgyud): dang ni/ de bzhin du ni sa'i khams// brtan pa la sogs thams cad dang // rtswa dang mdab ma phra ba dang // bong brdo dang brag la sogs// thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs// ye shes med na skye ma
41a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o// ye shes khyad par gang gis ni// ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu// lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das
41a6(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// nyi shu tso gsum lha yi gnas// gang nas grong du gnyis 'gyur to// 'dod pa lnga yi ye shos drag/ gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel// gsang nga'i ye shes reg pa ste// 
41a7(rgyud): lha min ye shes khro ba'o// yi dgas ste shes zhan pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing // byol sang ye shes glen pa ste// brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa// mi rnams ye shes nam pa lnga// 
41a8(rgyud): brag du ni shes par bya// glen pas bsgribs dang zhugs pa dang // byis pas shes pa'i shes ba con// ye shes de nyid bye brag ga/ rnal 'byor bstan chos gyis sbyangs pa// skye babye ba skye na
41b1(rgyud): du/ sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas// 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// sna tshogs phyi rol bstan mo ni/ kha'i// gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa ste/ 
41b2(rgyud): nr-i n+dan nas 'byor bstan thos kyis// spyod dang grol po'i 'bras pa thog// snying po'i snying po bstan bcos te// rnol 'byu gas ba ma mo mnano// sbyor ba gdan kyi ba tu byed pa sa// rim
41b3(rgyud): phye ba dang po'o// 'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyod par dag/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang // bsrung dang mngon par spyad pa la// re mig dgu rdzogs 'khor lo ni// phyi rol mu
41b4(rgyud): mau khyud bskor bar bya// 'khor la las kyi kha dog gis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// sa bon de dag thams cad ni// phyag 'tshal tha ma dbus su bya// dbus
41b5(rgyud): su myong dang bsrung ba yi// tshig dang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chu so// bdag gos lus ni bkru bar bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pos gnas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
41b6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// ye shes can gyis bsru sgoms na// 'jigs pa kun la ring bar 'gyur// sems can dngos po med pa la// sbyor ba'i dngos po 'jigs pa las// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
41b7(rgyud): dbus gnaso par// bskol ma rgyud du bsgrims pa yis// bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprum// oM tA re swAhA// mgo bo la'o// oM tut+tA re swAhA/ mig la'o// oM tu re swAr+b+ba/ rna ba la'o// yo n+tu
41b8(rgyud): swAhA/ sna la'o// oM re swAhA/ lce li'o// oM ta re ni sAhA// / skyong khar ro// yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod// 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam par bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil cung
42a1(rgyud): btsas rgyun rnams thams cad kyis ni thubs// kun du mi 'jigs sbyin par dang // gzhan gyis rnargya mu pal bsnams// thams cad 'od zer can sgoman// khyad par du ni sngags
42a2(rgyud): bzlas bya/ oM tA re twAdat+tA ra shwa re swAn+ta// bsrung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so// rgyal po'i btson radagra phyogs nang // nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang // yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni// 
42a3(rgyud): dang dugo gis 'chi la sogs// gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas// de dang der ni bsam par bya// shes rab zhan dang le logs// 'khor lo bris nas bcang bya ba// bsrung ba bzang po 'di yis ni// 'jig
42a4(rgyud): pa kun la grol bar 'gyur// bsrung ba 'di dag thams cad ni// de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// 'khor lo mdab ma brgyad pa la// phyi rol mu mkhyud bskor nas su// dbus su thog ma tha ma ste// bzla
42a5(rgyud): pa thams cad bzhag par bya// mu mkhyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su// 'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya// yan lag thams cad phye ba yis// mnyam nyid stong pa bsams nas su// sngon gyi
42a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sngar bstan bzhin du bzhad par bya// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms nas su// las 'di shes rab 'bar por 'gyur// oM pradz+nyA ma hA pradz+nye hUM swA hA// 'od zer sna tshogs
42a7(rgyud): 'bar ba ru/ dngos po bsgom pas bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnam
42a8(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog dkar po shin du 'bar// shes rab dngos por bsgoms nas su// shes rab nyu gu 'phel bar 'gyur// glen dang snyoms las blun po yang // sbyor ba 'di
42b1(rgyud): rab 'phel snying po ra 'u mag dgu ru byA// de bzhin pa ma bcu gnyis te// phyi rol re'u mig bcu drug go// mthar thug mu ma khyud de bzhin te// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa'i// dbus su bdag
42b2(rgyud): gi sems gzhag la// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa yi// yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod// bcu gnyis pa la dbyangs sa ben// mo ning spangs pa bri bar bya// sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams// yi ge lcug ma gcig
42b3(rgyud): dang bcas/ sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag bcu drug gnas su bzhag par bya// gsod pa'i yige mu mkhyud la// thams cad rig pas kun du bskor// dang po dkar po bsam byas te// gnyis pa ser po bsgom
42b4(rgyud): par bya/ gsum pa dag ni dmar ba ste// de bzhi ni bzhi pa sngon pa'o// mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas// many+dzum nyid lta bar bskyed nas su// 'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom
42b5(rgyud): pa yiso// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste// me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg par byed// ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis// kun
42b6(rgyud): nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su// bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgom byas lo// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyi ma'i dkyil
42b7(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzung byas la// sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i// yi ge dang po bzung nas su// lcags kyu yis ni gzor bar bya// rtsa ba re ba sbyar nas su// bdud
42b8(rgyud): ci'i thog le steng du dgod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar ni// shin du mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rgyal po yi ni pho brang dang // yod can gyis ni bsam par bya// 
43a1(rgyud): yi ge gnyis 'gyur thigs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar ba// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du bsdud// bu mo rnams kyi gang bsams pa// ming dang
43a2(rgyud): bcas pa bsgrubs na ni// bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur bar// ngas bston pa la the tsom med// mngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni// sngar bstan bzhin du stong pa nyid// thams cad bdag gis
43a3(rgyud): bsams nas su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro// kha dog ser po shin du mdzes// gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsas
43a4(rgyud): rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa// thams cad rang gis dbugs kyi dgug/ bsgrub pa po yi lus la ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par
43a5(rgyud): bya/ kha dog la sogs dmar gsal zhing // gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// gzugs mdzes shin du rdzogs pa ste// 
43a6(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyi sa ni// yid ni 'gugs par bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i yi ge ra bsgoms pa yis// 'dzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par ba// yi ge
43a7(rgyud): gnyis 'gyur thogs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mthar zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub// de ltar bsgom zhing bzla sa nAs su// ser mo yang ni bskyod byas na
43a8(rgyud): sgrub pa yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo mdab me brgyad pa la// mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar ba// dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// mu khyud mkhas
43b1(rgyud): pas bskor bar bya/ sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa gzung nas su// i dang re ba sbyar nas su// 'bad pas dbus su bzhag par bya// ye shes can gyis sa bon 'di// sgra yi mdun pa dang sbyar la// 
43b2(rgyud): mdab ma rnams lo'ang de nyid bya// mdab mer 'di nyid bzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa
43b3(rgyud): ru sngar stan bzhin du mkhas pas sgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi// gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bya// gzugs mdzes shin du yongs su rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// thams cad
43b4(rgyud): lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni// phyag 'tshol bsreg pa mthar bzhag ste// de ltar sgom zhing bzlas pa yis// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par
43b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ lha mo rnal ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag dang // rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong po'i de nyid bsgoms
43b6(rgyud): nas su/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes rnam shes dngos po sgom// mdab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus
43b7(rgyud): su sa bon bsgoms nas su// phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar sbyor// phyogs kyi mdab mar bdud rtsi bzhi// gug bskyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// 'tshams kyi mdab ma bzhi
43b8(rgyud): la yang dri sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon par rgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// 'od zer sna tshogaso 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus la bsgom par bya// gang 'dod yid
44a1(rgyud): ni rtogs bya'i phyir/ de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// rmugs dang glen pa snyom las can// shes rab zhan cing lta ngan
44a2(rgyud): rnams/ rnal 'byor pa yis skrod cig la// snyom las lo sogs na spong // mnyam gzhag cung zad ltas nas su// rdul phran dkar po spyi bor bya// phyogs bcur song ste khab nas su// thams cad rig pas
44a3(rgyud): kun snang ba/  ye shos sems la bltas na ni// rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su// mnyam gzhog 'khor lor lta bar bya// mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis// 
44a4(rgyud): 'khor po'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sa bon gyis sprul pa// pad ma'i bstan la bzhugs pa yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// snying kha phyag gnyis
44a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// snying kha'i phyogs su 'tshir bar byed// kha dog dkar po mdzes pa yi// 'phags pa'i rnam par/ 
44a6(rgyud): snang mdzad gtso// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro// spro ba sna tshogs mi bzad pas// sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzod// shes rab ye shes 'gro sgrol ba// dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon// mtha
44a7(rgyud): ru tshig drag sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su// mnyam gzhag dngos po bzlas nas ni// byang chub rim par mthong bar 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab
44a8(rgyud): tu byed pa las// rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// byin brlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag/ gang gis sems can rnams la bstan// byin brlabs rim pa ji lta bu// lha la gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal// sems
44b1(rgyud): pas bskor bar bya/ sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa gzung nas su// i dang re ba sbyar nas su// 'bad pas dbus su bzhag par bya// ye shes can gyis sa bon 'di// sgra yi mdun pa dang sbyar lo// 
44b2(rgyud): mdab ma rnams lo'ang de nyid bya// mdab mer 'di nyid bzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa
44b3(rgyud): ru sngar stan bzhin du mkhas pas sgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi// gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bya// gzugs mdzes shin du yongs su rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// thams cad
44b4(rgyud): lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon no// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag ste// de ltar sgom zhing bzlas pa yis// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par
44b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ lha mo rnal ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag dang // rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong pa'i de nyid bsgoms
44b6(rgyud): nas su/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes rnam shes dngos po sgom// mdab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus
44b7(rgyud): su sa bon bsgoms nas su// phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar sbyor// phyogs kyi mdab mar bdud rtsi bzhi// gug bskyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// 'tshams kyi mdab ma bzhi
44b8(rgyud): la yang / sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon par rgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// 'od zer sna tshogasau 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus la bsgom par bya// gang 'dod yid
45a1(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar ba// rol gcig rol cig rdo rje khyod// zhan dang drag pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad kun nas khyod kyis
45a2(rgyud): gsol/ skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral// glo 'di yis ni gar byed de// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// oM tish+tsa yo ga ma hA kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM swA hA// 'di ni tshig bya thams cad bya// rnal 'byor ma kun
45a3(rgyud): bsten par bya// dman dang rab dang mchog rnams lnga// de yi 'og du chos stan b+ho// oM yo ka e be sha a// shin du mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pa sau// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya// gnyis med gtor ma ldan
45a4(rgyud): pa li/ rnal 'byor pa yi yungs kar dang // hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis// sgrub pa pau yis 'di dag bya// sngar mos pa yi sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// AM ma na g+hu ru g+hu ru hri kri tsi la tsi li
45a5(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na// bltas nas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur// mchod cing gang la bltas pa yis// mthong bas phab ste gar byed do// oM b+he ta le rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M phu phu phaT phaT/ 
45a6(rgyud): thal bar lan bdun bar du ni// mngon par bzlas te ro la tor// nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang // cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro// oM phu ru pu ru man tre dza hUM phu phaT// skud pa dmar lnga brgyad brgya ru// yongs
45a7(rgyud): su bzlas dang ldan pa yis// gang gi mgrin phrabacings gyur na// lce sbyang bzhin du pa 'khyam par 'gyur// skud pa dang ni bral gyur ni// bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed// byin brlabs rim pa'i rnam
45a8(rgyud): 'byor gyis// mnyam par gzhag pas sgo zhing bzlas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// 'od zer sna tshogs shin du 'dra
45b1(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mdun du bsgrub pa bya ba bsam// rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gis ni// sa bon bstan du bsgo bar bya// sgra dang thig ler ldan par ni// rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par/ 
45b2(rgyud): rlung gis bskor bar snying khar bzhag/ thams cad khe dog sngon por bsam// rang gi dbus kyi rtse mo yi// rlung gi mda' ru sbyar bar ba// oM yuM pre ra pa yuM a mu ka s+ya yuM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yis gsang sngag
45b3(rgyud): 'di/ brgyad brgyar bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur// glo ga la sogs bzung nas su// dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya// rnal 'byoraro mchog ni bzung nas su// thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas
45b4(rgyud): pa yis/ skud pa dmar pos bkris nus ni// shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya// rlung gis skur bar bsgom po ste// gang du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba// de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis
45b5(rgyud): bkrad pa ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te// bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlos nas// ga
45b6(rgyud): med gang pa'i gtor ma bzhin// da yi dbus su sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra Da gi ni d+hi shaM a ra ka sha ya a ra ka sha ya// hUM hUM phreM pre phaT/ maN+Dal dmar por byugs nas ni// seng ldang phur bu brgyad kyis gdab// 
45b7(rgyud): dbus su ming ni bris nas kyang // gtor ma yongs su gang b.raro ldan// skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang // lan bdun bsko bas rab bya// rdo rje lcags kyu sna drangs nas su// gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas byas
45b8(rgyud): nas dpag tshad rgya yi phyi rol nas// las 'dis bzlas nas 'gugs par 'gyur// maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu// las 'di 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mkha' 'gro
46a1(rgyud): drag mor bsam pa ste// rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// nya mo gcig ni bzung nas su// mkha' 'gro gtor ma byin gyis brlab// sngags
46a2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i ming bris la// nya yoM kha ru bcug nas su// rkang pas mgo bo rab man na la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// oM prA pr-I a mu kha sa mu khaM b+han d+ha b+ha na d+ha/ tra~M hriM hriM phu phaT/ de ni bzlas pa
46a3(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur// thams cad chu la bya ba ste// las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya// sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni// bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya// gang du ha ni gnas
46a4(rgyud): pa yid nya yi kho ru bzhug par bya// raM lu brgyad brgya byas nas ni// lan raM bzlos te zar bcug na// bya ba thams cad btsongs par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdog nyid tsan d+ha la yaM
46a5(rgyud): gzugs/ gzugs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas so// gnyis med gtor ma'i lngas rnams ni// de yi dbus su rab tu bya// lcibs pad ma'i gzugs
46a6(rgyud): byas la/ ming dang sngags ni bzhag par bya// oM shrI b+ha ya shAM b+hA ya/ b+ha gaM mu traM phruM phruM phaT// gsang sngags 'di dang ming dang ni// rkang pa g.yon pas mnanA nas su// lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas
46a7(rgyud): paur bya/ chung ma shin du g.yo can rnamaso// lus 'di yis ni 'dul bar bya// mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis// bak+ku swa pa nu bcings pa las grol 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo
46a8(rgyud): rdo rje mo ru bsgom// kha dag sngon mo shin du mdzes// 'od zer mo dang mtshungs par 'bar// yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan// rkyen rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// yi dgas kyis ni stan
46b1(rgyud): / la bzhugs/ ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // gnyis med gang ga'i gtor ma yi// las ni der byas nas kyang // 'bras phye la sogs khyad par las// pad ma'i dbyibs su byags su// khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya// 
46b2(rgyud): maung dang sngags su sbyar nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// las der byin gyis brlab par bya// oM kro sha ra phruM phruM phaT/ lan brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// rdo rje gsang bar bzhug par bya// las 'di sbyar na
46b3(rgyud): gzir ba yis// bA ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur// las 'di shin du grub pa ste// chung ni de las thar par 'gyur// chung ma shin du gdul dka' ba// las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 
46b4(rgyud): skyo bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge skom// rtsa rnams kun nas drangs nas su// bdud rtsi chu ni 'dzag par bya// ban du'i me tog rgyas pa yi// dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ga ste// kha dog dmar po shAn du 'bar// gsang
46b5(rgyud): zhing gsang bar bsgom par bya// khro bo'i sor ma'i rtse ba ru// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bI snams nas ni// sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya// sbyor ba gsum gyis bsams pa yis// de yi lus kyi gnas rnams
46b6(rgyud): nas/ bdud rtsi chu ni 'jog par bya// chung ma shin du gdul dka' la// 'di yis bA ga brtags par bya// 'od zer can dang bla mor bac+doMs// smyo byed yan lag lnga dang ldan// gu gul chen po'i cha dang
46b7(rgyud): bsre/ mar nag chen pos bsgo bor bya// sngags pas bdud rtsi chu dag ni// lce yis dbang pos myang du gzhug/ 'dir ni smyo 'gyur the tsom med// mar zos pas ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas gos
46b8(rgyud): ni ma ltung bas// mar me yi ni sdong bu bya// klu dbang goni kong bu bya// rkang gi mar gyis sbar bor bya// gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis/ 
47a1(rgyud): du bdag ni dbab par bya// dur khrod du ni gtor byin lnga// brgyad rgya r+ya ni bzlas nas su// ldum gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung // gang 'du babyugs pa des// mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong
47a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ lhag ma'i gtor ma gnyis bzung la// dur khrod kyi ni stsol ba yis// cha bA'i zas la bdar nas ni// bya rog sgo rtsas bri bar bya// oM ki rI ki ri kro ta u mu kaM phruM phruM phaT// snod ni
47a3(rgyud): gnyis las so ru// gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la// gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni// khro bos bkang sti drud par bya'o// oM ka ri bar ti li bi ra ta li kr-id+ha mu~M khaM a mu ka s+ya hI la hi
47a4(rgyud): badz+ra ti shA mu khi phruM phreM pra phaT// brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas na ni// myur du 'thab brtsod 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis med gtor mar ldan pA yi// dbang bskur nas ni zhi bar 'gyur// / sbyor ba'i gdan
47a5(rgyud): gyi rab tu byed pa las// rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po skye// gnyi med ming gis brjod pa yin// sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba// rol mo dag ni mnyan par 'chal// 
47a6(rgyud): gnyis maud gtor ma de nyid kyi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ so sor bzung ba de kho na yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// de nyid rdo rje zhes bya'i bdag/ chos kyi dril bu la mo'o// kha sbyar sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste// thabs
47a7(rgyud): ni de ru thim pa'o// dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// drag po rnam gsum brjod par bya// oM sa b+hA ba shud d+ho saR+Wa d+horma swa b+hA pra shud d+ho \u0f7f/ 
47a8(rgyud): oM badz+ri shud d+ho sarba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM shud d+ho sarA d+harma yo ga shud d+ho haM/ gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas// sbyin pa'i rab sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor ldan po'i sems kyi ni// thams cad rtsa bzhin btang
47b1(rgyud): bar bya/ sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 'gro rnams 'che bar mi bya sogs// sems can don ni dgag bya mi bya// steng du tshul khrims dra ba'o// gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs// bzod pa'i phur/ 
47b2(rgyud): bu 'og tu gdab// pur bu rab dra ba yis// snang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad// bdud ni bdud du byed mi 'gyur// rang gi sems kyis bsdams pa'o// rang gi rang sems btul ba na// bdud kyis 'tshe
47b3(rgyud): bar gal 'gyur// mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi pa ri byug par bya// lu saM la ste 'jog can dan byug/ sems ni yaM mnyam par gnas pa ste// bzod pa'i me tog rab 'byor pas// 
47b4(rgyud): 'dab dang ldan pas dgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yau// rang bzhin dag po'i bdug par bya// shes rab mar mi snang ba ste// khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// mar
47b5(rgyud): me 'di yis bcom nas su// ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs byung bya// mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du// gtor
47b6(rgyud): ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas su// shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul// bar
47b7(rgyud): du khru gang gzhag nas su// mnyam nyid lta bso gnas par bya// snying khar sbyi ni bsgom byas la/ thams cad rig pas kun stong bya// khams gsum zad par
47b8(rgyud): byas nas ni// thams cad nam mkha' yang dag gnas// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// maunyam nyid stong par bsams na su// pho brang yangs por ci 'dod par/ ri rab rtse mor rabs par bya// 
48a1(rgyud): lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis// hUM gi thig le las byung ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi g.yo rdo rje sgoms/ 
48a2(rgyud): nas su rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du// bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya// yi ge'i bkod pas bkod nas su// mkhas pas cho ga byas nas hUM// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste// gangs dang kun dazla ba'i
48a3(rgyud): mdog/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag rgya chen po snying khar bcas// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'brar ba las// sangs
48a4(rgyud): rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro// dngos po sgom pas bsgoms nas su// hU~M gau sgra yis bgrang bar bya// rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis// ye shes sa bon bzlas pa bya// gtso ma'i gser ltar shin du 'bar// sems
48a5(rgyud): can kun gyi don la chags// de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas babasngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis// / 
48a6(rgyud): dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro// de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ phyag gnyis sems
48a7(rgyud): dpa'i dkyil dkrung can// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// yig brgyad kyis sngags rnams ni// yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya// 
48a8(rgyud): phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// a li ka li las byung ba'i// de yi sa bon bzlas par bya// 'dod chags sems kyi stobs kyi ni// btso ma'i gser gyi 'od dang bcas// sems can
48b1(rgyud): bsgral phyir kun du mkhyud// nu ma mkhyad cing zhal gnyis 'jib// rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// lha mo g.yon gyi cha ru ni// bstan pa'i rtse mor bzung bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams naM/ 
48b2(rgyud): kun na bdud rtsi gang gnas pa// 'dzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur// gnyis kyi kun spyod btang nas su// shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod// rol pa'i bstabs kyis lha mo ni// rdo
48b3(rgyud): rje rkeng pa'i skabs kyis mnan// dril bu ge yon gyi bramanan la// nu ma 'ag bi gnyis kyis gzer// sgeg cing bshad pa'i bzhin can te// 'og ma gnon pos btsir rna bar bya// dril bu lag gnyis gsang ba sbyor// de
48b4(rgyud): bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzla// shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis// sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su// lho ru kha ni baHbar bya// rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su// rkang mthal
48b5(rgyud): gnyis ni de bzhin gzer// dril bu lag pa gnyis kyis ni// rkyed pa bsams te gzir bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang // de bzhin gsang bas brtse bar bya// rdo rje dril bu lus dag ni// yang dang yang du spyad
48b6(rgyud): par bya/ sa bon gnyis kyis bzlas pa yis// lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur// nub phyogs mnyam pa'i rkeng stabs kyis// lha mo nub tu blta bar bya// rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis// g.yas kyi
48b7(rgyud): bla ni mnan par bya// mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis mkhyud de// dril bu lce ni bsgril nas su// rdo rje lce la reg par bya// de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni// lag pa gnyis kyis
48b8(rgyud): bsdams pa'o// dril bu lag pa gnyis kyis kyang // rna ba'i drung bar bzung bar bya// gnyi ga'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas// de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas/ 
49a1(rgyud): / rdo rje dril bus rol par bya// sems can thams cad bder 'gyur cig/ kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog/ gang gi lum nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur cig/ skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can// 
49a2(rgyud): kun nas kun du skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang bar ston// dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de// rang lus lha mo bsam pa dag/ slar
49a3(rgyud): yang 'di nyid rab tu bya// rang gi rjes su chags pa'i sems// de nas rdo rje kun du mkhyud// de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru// ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya// rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod// chu las
49a4(rgyud): byung ba'i me tog ni// gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las// rtsa ba myu gu me tog dang // ban du ka yi rgyas pa 'dra// tha~Mng ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams// sa dang rlung bdag nyid yin no// 'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la// myu gu mi yAM sa bon
