94a6(rgyud): rim par 'gro// de nas brtan dang g.yo ba stsogs// sngags bsnyen pa la 'bad pa yis// de ma thag tu 'bab 'gyur bas// sngags ni yang dag bstan pas ste// oM badz+ra a pi sha dza/ gal te sangs rgyas mngon 'dod pas
94a7(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'bebs par byed// oM hi li hi li hUM dza/ bltas pas me ni 'bebs byed pa// 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'bebs par 'gyur// oM ma ti la hUM phaT/ thod pas 'gro ba 'bebs byed pa// stong
94a8(rgyud): phrag gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma ti la tsi ta tsa li te hUM hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gcig bzlas rnal 'byor pas// ring nas me ni drang por 'bebs// oM pa ta la pi ta li hUM phaT/ sngon du bsnyen stsogs byas
94b1(rgyud): nas ni/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas mkhas pa yis// klu dang gnod sbyin gsang ba sogs// thams cad kun nas 'bebs par byed// oM pa ti pa tra li hUM phaT// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas rnal
94b2(rgyud): 'byor pas/ chu dang bong bas rdo dang // shing srogs kun nas 'bebs par byed// dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis// sngon du bsnyen pa srogs byas nas// phyi nas dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// dul bar rab tu spyad par bya// lha nyid
94b3(rgyud): mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid yongs su bslus pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dril bu lag bzung nas// byin gyis brlab pa bsams la ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor cing // snying khor rlung gi sa bon dang
94b4(rgyud): rlung gi sa bon gyis bskul zhing // ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtser// de nas snying ni mchog tu mtsho// seng ge ma yi gzugs bsams nas// 'jigs pa'i hUM gis dgug par bya// sngon gyi sngags dang sngags stsogs kyis// me tog
94b5(rgyud): chu yis bsnun par bya// mchog dang dman dang 'bring po yi// khyad par me ni 'bebs par byed// oM ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ho hi ho a a phaT/ sbyor ba'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ba// gal te the tsom gyis ma phe bas// 
94b6(rgyud): 'di dag sngags kyis dbab byas pa// skad cig de nyid la myur phebs// de nas skal dman ye shes stsogs// de yis yongs su brtag pa'i rgyur// de nas dman pa'i rim pas dbab// skal ngan la sogs pa yi me// lha nyid
94b7(rgyud): dbang du byas nas ni// bdug pas bdug pa 'bebs par byed// rnal 'byor pa yis ra nag pa'i// yan lag lnga pa yongs su bzung // chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyis// ji bzhin gnas su bzlas pa bya// snying kha'i ye shes su
94b8(rgyud): bon gyis// 'bum phrag bdun du rab tu sbyar// gu gul chen po'i mar khu dang // mnyam pa'i char ni rab tu sbyar// sman bdun sa dang ldan par ni// rdo rje ma yis sa bon bzlas// bdug pa'i dus su rab bdugs na// 'di yi snang ba
95a1(rgyud): bsgoms pa yis// skad cig de la rnam par 'bebs// k+Sho ta ga dang tse ti ka/ lcags kyu lnga dang yang dag ldan// smyo byed lnga dang yang dag ldan// mnyam pa'i cha ni rab byas nas// til mar chen po rab tu bsgreng // 
95a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi chu dang rnam bsres pa'i// lce yi dbang pos myang byas na// skad cig de la 'bebs par byed// mtho dang dma' ba'i sems can gyis// sbyor ba 'di yis chos bstan te// shin du rnam sbyar slob ma la// slob dpon
95a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga bstan// rang bzhin gyis dag lus kyis ni rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mdun gnas// snying rjer bcas pa'i sems can gyi// 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang // thos po bsam gtan mchog tu
95a4(rgyud): brtson/ sbyin zhing dge ba sogs la dga'// theg pa che la mngon dga' sems// rtag tu bla ma la gus shing // gsang ba'i chos la mngon dga' ldan// 'di 'dra'i slob ma bzung bar bya// sngon du bsnyen pa rtogs pa'i le'u
95a5(rgyud): ste dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nyid thams cad kun gyi mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// ma dag pa yi phyogs spangs te// yid ni dga' ba'i sa phyogs su// snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// dang por sa ni/ 
95a6(rgyud): yongs su bzub dag pa'i sa ni bzung byas nas// blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor ni// dra ba dra ba mchog dang ni// na bza' sna tshogs rab tu sbyangs// rgyal mtshan gdugs drang ba dan gyis// gnas dang gnas su rnam par
95a7(rgyud): brgyan/ nyi ma lnga yi sngon du ni// sa gzung ba la mchog tu brtson// rnam pa kun du gru bzhi par// dri yi chu yis byug par bya// dkar dang ser sogs 'tshon gyis ni// pad ma mdab ma brgyad pa bri// thams cad las zhes bya ba'i mi/ 
95a8(rgyud): dbus su bum pa bzhag par bya// 'tshon rtsi lnga yis skud pa yis// shar gyi mdab mar rnam par dgod// lho ru rdo rje bzhag par bya// byang du dral bu rnam par dgod// bdud rtsi lnga yi dang chos ni// nub kyi mdab ma la ra bo brten// 
95b1(rgyud): kun nas 'tshon rtsi'i phye ma ni// pad ma'i ngos su rnam par bskor// de nas slob dpon rdo rje yi// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor du byas nas// me tog dri dang bdug pa sogs// lha bshos gtor ma kun du ldan// mchod pa 'di dang dngos ldan
95b2(rgyud): pas/ sa gzung ba yi mtshan nyid do// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// nu ma gnyis su mngon bzhag nas// de nyid so la rgyu ba rnams// kun nas kun du bskrad par bya// oM a pa ra yan du// ba b+had ta yo ga tsi te sta na sa mo na ga ya
95b3(rgyud): kA di gan dar pa pu ba pu ti ni Ti ki na sa sad ta an+ti tA ya/ a raM ba gad tsha thA/ tri si traM me wan tu/ oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bgegs kun bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// sa ya tshams su bzung
95b4(rgyud): byas la/ oM sa ta ku ru Ad ma ti ta ya cod/ tang hUM hUM dzuM swA hA/ sa spang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nyid kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis// de nas rdo rje dril bu gzung // rdo rje dril bu gzung byas nas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsam par bya// pad
95b5(rgyud): mo'i gdan la gnas pa ni// bum pa lha mo rdzogs pa ni// gzugs mdzes kun du gang bar ldan// kha dog dkar po mchog gi 'od// phyag na rdo rje dril bu bsnams// rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun sbyar bas// dngos po kun gyis rab tu mchod
95b6(rgyud): gnyis pa khu tshur dam btsangs nas// dkar pos gi haM bsgring byas nas// rtse dang rtse ni bskums byas la// snying po'i phyag rgya mngon par bstan// oM A swA hA/ snying po'i sngags dang phyog rgya'o// bum par rdo rje rtse bzhag la// sangs/ 
95b7(rgyud): rgyas lnga yi sa bon ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon bzlas pas// thig skud lnga la lnga gtor bya// oM hU~M swA hA/ seng ge sa bon sogs pa yis// 'tshon rtsi kun nas gsang bar bya// oM skr-i swA hA/ de yi gnas su rnal 'byor pas/ 
95b8(rgyud): gnyis med gtor ma kun du dag/ gnas brgyad du ni mar me dang // rgyas pa'i gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar nus pas mchod byas nas// sa ni kun du yongs su bzung // rdol 'tshon bzo yaM las mi la// dam tshig dang ni bslab pa/ 
96a1(rgyud): @/ sbyin/ kun nas thams cad bsdus nas ni// bum pa g.yas kyi phyogs su bzhag/ slar yang dri yis byugs byas nas// thig gdab pa ni rab tu bya// yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// rab tu/ 
96a2(rgyud): mkhas pa'i slob dpon gyis// khyad par du ni thig gradab po// tshon sna lnga yang btso bar bya// rang gi sa dbus thig le yi// phyogs brgyad kyi ni gnas brgyad du// gnas dang gnas su rnam par dpyad// de yang dman pas mi gnas
96a3(rgyud): pa'o// thams cad kun ni hUM gis ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid lus ni sprul byas la// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// thig ni dbus su bzung bar bya// mkha' 'gro/ 
96a4(rgyud): lnga yi sa bon gyis// sngags dang sngags kyis gsang bar bya// oM a a aM a hUM swA hA/ thig skud gsang ba yi sngags so// bla mas lag pas bzung nas ni// slob ma lag gis mtha' bzung ste// slob ma dbang
96a5(rgyud): ldan phyogs gnas la// de bzhin bla ma bden bral du// slob ma me yi phyogs gnas la// slob dpon chu ya phyogs nyid do// slob ma shar du gnas nas na// slob dpon nub kyi phyogs gnas la// slob ma byang gi char
96a6(rgyud): gnas nas/ bla ma lho ru rnam par gnas// phyogs brgyad kyi ni thig btab nas// phyi ni gru bzhir gdab par bya// kun nas thams cad yongs rdzogs nas// dbus su rdo rje dkyil 'khor yang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // re re
96a7(rgyud): mthar ni gnas pa'o// phyi rol rnal 'byor ma gonas pa// tha ma brgyad sogs kyis bskor ba'o// snying po'i cha ni dgu pa la// rdo rje ka bas nye bar mdzes// dbus kyi grwar ni sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje bzhi yis rab tu sbyar// cha lnga pa ni kun
96a8(rgyud): mnan nas// sgo yi gru bzhi pa nyid ni// phyogs kyi phyed ni gru bzhi pa'o// steng du ri mo mnyam por bcas// sgo yi bzhi cha nyid kyis ni// lha mo'i kha khyer du ni bya// sgo yi brgyad cha dag gis ni// tshon rtsi'i thad du rab tu 'dod// snying po'i
96b1(rgyud): rgyu yi cha la ni// phyi mas phyogs kyi mdog tu bya// rdo rje'i phyi rol gnas su ni// tshen ni dmar po'i phyi mas so// de yi phyi rol gnas su ni// ra ba lnga ni rab tu sbyin// de yi phyi rol gnas su yang // ji ltar nye bar mdzes par dgod// lha rnams
96b2(rgyud): kyis ni gnas su yang // kun ni gser bsregs pa yi mdog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis nye bar mdzes// rnam pa sna tshogs rabo tu bkod pas// dril bu ga ye ru kha dra ba'i phreng // da ba dra phyed kyis bskor cing // rdo rje
96b3(rgyud): ka bas nye bar mdzes// 'tshams kyi sna tshogs rdo rje ni// zla ba'i steng du rnam par brgyan// sgo ru rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba ni// gnyis gnyis bum pa brten pa'o// pad ma seng ge mtshan pa ni// shar gyi phyogs su rab tu gzugs// rma
96b4(rgyud): bya pad ma'i mtshan pa ni// byang gi phyogs kyi ming can no// ngang pa pad mas mtshan pa ni// nub kyi phyogs su rab tu bzhag/ chu srin gyis ni bud ma ni// lho'i phyogs su bzhag pa'o// rab tu 'chang bzhin bzar ldan// gnas dang gnas
96b5(rgyud): su rnam par sbyar// 'di nyid de nyid ldan dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin no// phyogs brgyad dag tu bum pa ni// dri yi chu yis rab bkang zhing // pa la sha yi rtse mos mtshan// sgo skyong gi ni phyogs nyid du// gzhan yang
96b6(rgyud): 'tshams ni bzhi pa ru// bum pa brgyad ni bzhag cing dgod// rgyal dang bkra shisra shar du'o// grub dang rdzu 'phrul byang phyogs su'o// nub tu rgyal byed bum pa'o// lho ru grub dang grub byed yin// kha cig lhag par bri ba dang // sbyang rje khu
96b7(rgyud): stong par du'o// zha rgyas dang ni don gnyer bas// ji ltar nus pa sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar gyi char// slob dpon gyi ni nges bya ba// rang gi lus po lha nyid du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sprul par bya// gal te slob mas 'byor gyur na// 
96b8(rgyud): sgo bzhi ru ni slob dpon pazhi// tha ma gcig gis brtag par bya// dang po tsham ngam sbyor ba yis// gdug pa'i bgegs sogs rab tu bskrad// g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor bya zhing // dril bu g.yon paso bsil nas ni// phyag rgya sngon 'gro
97a1(rgyud): @balnga stangs kyis// mkhyen pa gar gyis rab tu sbyor// mnyam pa'i 'gros dang mi mnyam 'gros// 'gros gcig po dang g.yon du bsgyur// 'jigs pa hU~M dang hUM sgrogs shing // lha mo rdo rje bdag ces brjod// oM hUM
97a2(rgyud): ha na ha na ma ra ya dustan g+ha ta ya a tha a tha hUM hri phaT/ byang gi sgo ru gnas nas ni// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgragos nas// lag pa gnyis la hUM rnam pa// drag mor sprul cing bsams nas ni// lag gnyis mngon par spang
97a3(rgyud): byas nas// snying kha'i phyogs su gzung bar bya// g.yos brkyab dang g.yon brkyang pa// zlum po dang ni sa ga'i 'gros// oM hUM a phaT/ ro langs ma'i gzugs bsams nas// nub kyi phyogs su 'phen par bya// lag po gnyis
97a4(rgyud): kyis mtshan ma yi// bskyed pa'i 'tshams su gzung bar bya// pus mo'i 'gros dang ru sbrul 'gros// rked pa'i 'tshams su gzung bar bya// g.yon pa'i lag pa rkang pa'i pus mor sbyar// bsgyur zhing rab tu 'phang ba ni// seng ge
97a5(rgyud): mnan pa zhes su bshad// hUM gis sgra yi dag bya zhing // oM hU~M a phaT/ gtum mo'i gzugs ni rdzogs byas nas// lho yi phyog su 'phang bar bya// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bo'i phyogs su bzung bar bya// 
97a6(rgyud): pus mo 'gros dang ru sbal 'gros// khro zhing 'jigs pa'i hU~M byas la// drag mo sngags bzlos pa la brtson// oM hU~M a phaT/ sngon gyi gnas dang gnas su ni// 'phen pa dag ni yang bya'o// snying khar rdo rje lag bzhag
97a7(rgyud): nas/ dril bu mgul du mngon par dgod// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro mar// hUM gi nga rgyal byas nas ni// g.yas brkyang pa dang g.yon brkyang gdan// g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang brkum nas ni// de nas phur bu
97a8(rgyud): dra ba dang // ra ba gau chas lus po bsrung // ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gnas nas// lag gnyis lcags sgrog ltar byas nas// steng gi phyogs su bsgyur dang bcas// 
97b1(rgyud): oM hU~M phu phaT/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gnyis pa khu tshur byas nas ni// pad ma dang ni ye shes brkyang // sa yi gdugs dang rnam shes basbed// rnam shes dang ni ye shes sprad// de bzhin sa gdugs pad mar sbyar// 
97b2(rgyud): phyogs brgyad dag tu bskor byas la// oM dza ba ni hUM/ dra ba chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gan rgyal log byas sa la gradab// oM dzu phaT/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon bde ldan pa'i// stan gnas
97b3(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gror byas// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// bum pa la sogs gsang gtor bya// thams cad de nyid mtshan ldan pa'i// dal bar 'gro ba'i chu grangs nas// bum pa chu yis kun nas gang // oM ta pa te ma hA ta pa te hUM/ 
97b4(rgyud): swA hA/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas nas// dal ba'i chu ni sngags kyis bsre// sna tshogs dri dang me tog dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// myu gu lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thams cad gdan du sbyin dang ldan// gos kyis mgrin
97b5(rgyud): pa bkri ba dang brgyan pa rgyun ni rab tu brgyan// bum par 'am bsres pa dang // me tog phreng po rnam par sbyin// sra yi gdugs dang rnam shes ni// sbyar la lhag par gyen du bsgreng // lan bdun bzlas par ldan pa yis// bum pa
97b6(rgyud): kun la reg par bya// oM hUM suM k+ShaM yuM hUM phaT swA hA/ bum pa thun mong gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ji bzhin sngon gyi gnas su ni// de bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya// de nas slob dpon bya ba la// tshon chen po yi gros dang ni// da
97b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i bgo ba dang // lus la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan byas// shin du mnyam gzhag sems bcas pas// go bar byang chub yan lag bya// de la go cha sbyin pa dang // mkhas pas bsrung dang / 
97b8(rgyud): bcing bar bya// lag gnyis rab tu brkyang byas nas// rnam shes ye shes bkri bar bya// ngang pa'i gshog pa'i tshul gyis ni// de bzhin go cha chen po'o// oM hU~M phruM phaT/ go cha'i sdigs dang phyag rgya'o// sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag
98a1(rgyud): @ldan/ rdo rje dril bu mngon par bzung // de kho na nyid kyis bzung nas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdug ces brjod// ba dan gsum gyi rdo rje bsgreng // de nyid du ni rdo rje ldan// yi ge brgyad dang ldan pa yis// yan lag brgyad la
98a2(rgyud): gtug par bya// lce la chun nyid dang ni// nam mkha' rna ba lnga la'o// sa gnyis dag ni dpung par sbyar// me ni de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas// rmongs pa shing rta mgrin par ro// g.yo ba snying kha snying du ste// thams cad nyon mongs
98a3(rgyud): byung la'o// lha phyugs kyi ni sa bon neno// yan lag brgyad la gtugs pa yis// bdag nyid lha ru shes pa yis// me tog spos dang dri la sogs// phreng bas rab tu mchod par bya// oM badz+ra ka ya ho// oM badz+ra ba k+Sha a/ oM badz+ra
98a4(rgyud): hr-id ya hUM/ swa b+ha wa shud+d+ho saR+Wa shud+d+ho sar+b+ba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+d+ho ha~M/ badz+ra shud+d+ho saR+Was badz+ra shud+d+ho ha~M/ ye ga shud+d+ho sAR+Wa d+harma yo ga shud+d+ho ha~M/ bdag nyid rdo rje rdo rje ni// byang chub rim pas kun du rtse// de nas dgug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad/ 
98a5(rgyud): rerimig dbus ma la sogs pa// ye shes spyan drang mchog tu brtson// seng ge gadran gyi gdan la ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// a li ka l-i'i dbus su ni// lha yi gzugs ni khyad par du// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
98a6(rgyud): bcings nas// sa yi gdugs dang dkar por sbar// gi haM lcags kyu 'gugs byed pa// dam tshig ga ni cho ga mchog/ oM badz+ra a gu sha dza/ spun drang po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zhal gsum phyag na dreg pa nyid// kha dog
98a7(rgyud): sngon po rab tu mdzes// rgod dang khro dang sgeg po dang // sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// dang po mda' na 'phyar ba dang // gnyis pa mtshan ma nu mar 'dzin// gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o// g.yon gyi dang po gzhu
98a8(rgyud): bsnams shing // bdud rtsi chu yis kun bkang ba// g.yon pa'i phyag mtshan gnyis pa'o// gsum pa dril bu sgra bsgrogs shing // shin du mdzes pa'i ni bza' klubs// dar gyi ral pa bcings mdzad cing // thod
98b1(rgyud): pasna cod pan du bgyis shing // de yis mtshan ma rnam pa lnga// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan cing // 'od zer 'bar ba mang po 'khrug/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nam mkha' dgod// kha dog dkar po rab tu mdzes// shes rab
98b2(rgyud): de yi gdan la yang // gnyis kyis mgrin pa mkhyud mdzad cing // tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// rkang pas 'tshums su rnam par bkris// rdo rje pad mar kun du thim// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// rab tu mdzes
98b3(rgyud): pa'i na bza' brgyan// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ni// sems kyi dbus su bsam par bya// ye shes shar gyi re mig la// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dgug par bya// klu dbang rol pa'i gdan la ni// 
98b4(rgyud): rol pa'i 'phen pas rnam par gnas// kun da ka dang mnyam pa'i 'od// phyag gnyis sgra ni rnam par bkram// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i sku// shin du mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs// 
98b5(rgyud): spyan gsum khro dang hUM mdzad cing // kha T+wAM ka dang rnal 'byor snod// 'od zer bya ba rnam mang po// glang chen lpags pa bsnams pa dang // de bzhin mi yi lpags pa bsnams// me yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing // rdo rje mkha' 'gro
98b6(rgyud): shor du'o byang du drag mo'i lha mo ni// rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya// kho dog gser po rab tu mdzes// ha hA zhes ni 'jigs mdzad cing // sgra ni gyen du 'bar zhing mdzes// sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan// dkyil dkrur
98b7(rgyud): phyed pa'i thabs kyis na// rma ba'i gdan ni kun tu mnan// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// phyag gnyis rgyan kun gyis brgyan cing // kha T+wAM ka dang rnal 'byor snod// glang chen lpags pa bsnams mdzad cing // de bzhin mi
98b8(rgyud): yi lpags pa g.yogs// ye shes byang gi cha ru ni// drag mo mkha' 'gro dgug par bya// ye shes nub kyi cha la ni// rdo rje can gyi ro langs dgug/ bya khyung gang+gAn la rnam gnas shing // mnyam por sos po yis gnas// kha dog
99a1(rgyud): dmar po mdzes pa'i sku// phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i hU~M bsgrogs shang // dbu sgyu 'bar zhing rnam par bkram// spangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan// khA T+wAM ka dang lhung zed snod// glang chen lpags pa rab
99a2(rgyud): tu gsol/ rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs nas ni// nub phyogs lha mo bsam par bya// ye shes lho yi che la ni// gtum mo zhes bya'i lha mo ni// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen mo// ha ha bzhad pas 'jigs byed pa// phyed dkur
99a3(rgyud): byas pa'i dkyil dkrung gis// mngag gzhug gi ni gdan la zhugs// dbu skra dmor po rnam par dgyes// dbu la sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan// phyag gnyis pa la rab tu bzhad// mi 'bar ma dang mnyam pa'i 'od// kha T+wAM ka
99a4(rgyud): dang rnal 'byor snod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// glang chen lpags pas smad g.yogs shing // mi yi lpags pa rab tu gsol// rdo rje lcags kyus dgug byas nas// gtum mo'i dbang phyug lho ru'o// lha
99a5(rgyud): mo seng ge dbang ldan 'tshams// seng ge'i gdan la mnyam brten cing // kha dog dkar dang ser ba dang // rol pa'i 'phen pas rab tu brgyan// me 'bar ba ni mchog gi 'di// phyog gnyis 'phros pa hUM bsgrogs shang // na
99a6(rgyud): bza' dmar po rab tu gsol// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pa steng du ral gri dang // g.yon pas sdibs 'dzub zhags pa yis// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg byed pa'i// 'di 'dra'i seng ge dgug
99a7(rgyud): par bya/ rdo rje mchu yi gdan gnas par// me phyogs lha mo stag mo ni// dkar dang sngo ba'i kha dog can// zlum po 'phen pa'i gdan la ni// phyag gnyis pa la khro la bzhad// na bza' dmar po sngon bsnams pa// me yi gnas
99a8(rgyud): su dgug par bya// me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs 'dzub kyis// gdug pa kun nas gcod par byed// ma he'i gdan la mnyam zhon pas// bden bral lha mo lce spyang ni// dmar ba dang ni
99b1(rgyud): sngo ba'i mdog/ dgra sta zhags pa sdigs 'dzub kyis// phyag gnyis nye bar mdzes pa yi// na bza' dmar po sngon bsnams nas// gdan phyed la ni mnyam par gnas// me yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan cing // mche ba
99b2(rgyud): cung zad gtsigs pa dang // ha ha dgod par 'jigs par byed// bden bral mnga' bdag lha mo ni// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis dgug/ lce sbyang gdan la mnyam gnas pa'i// rlung phyogs lha mo 'dug pa'o// dmar ba dang ni
99b3(rgyud): dkar ba'i mdog/ gdan la gcig pur gnas nas ni// drag po'i gzugs kyis 'jigs mdzad pa// phyag gnyis mnyam par sbyar ba yi// dbyug pa sdigs 'dzub zhags pa dang // rgyan rnams kyis ni rab tu brgyan// na bza'
99b4(rgyud): dmar po brgyan byas shing // me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od// dbus kyi lha mo brgyad rnams kyi// rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya// rdo rje ra bo'i phyi rol gyi// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma gnas su// sbos mo gtum mo khro gnyer ma
99b5(rgyud): shar gyi gnas kyi lha me ni// bdud kyi chu dang yang dag ldan// gnyis pa'i phyag na thod pa'o// drag mo khrag 'thung sha za ma// lcagaso kyu la sogs lnga rnams kyis// bkang po'i thod pa phyag na bsnams// drag mo'i gzugs
99b6(rgyud): can lha mo ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan// khro mo 'bar byed 'jigs byed ma// nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni// gtor ma'i gdon sogs 'dzin pa'o// lag gnyis su ni rnam par dgod// thod phreng rdo rje'i bum pa yang // 
99b7(rgyud): bza' dang btung ba sna tshogs pas// lag pa gnyis kyis kun nas bsnams// sgeg mo dri chub dbang ldan phyogs// me ru pi wang me tog bzhin// bden bral glu dang bdug pa ma// rlung du gar dang mar me ma'o// rgyun kun gyis/ 
99b8(rgyud): ni brgyan pa yi// lha mo nyi shu rnam par sgom// mchod pa nyi shus brgyan pa ni// 'jigs byed me ni nub du'o// de yi gdan la gnas pa yi// rdo rje ya ni lcags kyu 'gugs// yi dgas ston la gnas pa ni// shar gyi lho ru mkha'
100a1(rgyud): @'gro ma de yi gdan la mnyam gnas pa// me 'bar ba ni byad du dgod// shi ba'i gdan la gnas pa ni// 'jigs byed ma ni nub du'o// de yi gdan la gnas pa yi// ngag 'phrog ma ni lho phyogs su// gzugs dang
100a2(rgyud): mtshan sogs mdzes pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu yis ni dgug/ lha dang lha mo thams cad la// rdo rje zhags pa bstan par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po gi hiM sbrel byas nas// oM badz+ra pa sha hUM/ rdo rje zhags pa'i
100a3(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya'o// shar gyi sgo dang lho ru ni// khyab 'jug dbyug pa 'dzin pa nyid// tshangs pa lag na rnga yab 'dzin// byang gi sgo ru bzhag par bya// drag po snyan pa'i dbyangs sgrogs pa// nub kyi sgo ru rnam par dgod// lag pa
100a4(rgyud): rin chen gdugs 'dzin pa// brgya byin lho yi sgo ru'o// lha mo yaM ni gnas rnams su// rgyal dbang bzhi ni dgug pa'o// zla ba dbang mo btsun mor bcas// pa dang ha dang dbyangs len dang // sna tshogs mchod pa yis brgyan cing
100a5(rgyud): gang dang sgra dngos ldan pa yi// brgya byin dbang ldan 'tshams su dgod// phyag na rin chen zhags pa dang // mu tig phreng bas nye bar mdzes// zla ba dbang po btsun mos bcas// ku pa ra ni shar lhor ro// gdugs dang rgyal
100a6(rgyud): mtshan pa dan dang // 'byung po sdud pa'i rgyal dbang po// zla dbang btsun mo lhan cig tu// bden bral phyogs su rnam par dgod// pi wang gling bu'i mchod pa dang // glu dang gar la sogs pa yas// zla dbang btsun mo lhan cig/ 
100a7(rgyud): tu/ ba ru na ru k+Sha dbang po// phyi ma 'jig rten pa yi lha// dad pa lcags kyus 'gugs par bya// g.yon pas khu tshur bcings nas ni// gi hi dud pa gsum bsgreng nas// dri ma gsum gyis tshig gsum la// gau haM gis ni sor
100a8(rgyud): mo sbyar/ oM aM ka ra na ya ni hU~M phaT/ 'jig rten pa spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 'di yi lha dang lha mo no// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'o// de la gzugs na rdzogs byas nas// rang lha dgug pa'i sems/ 
100b1(rgyud): kyis ni// dam tshig phyag rgya sngon 'gro bas// mkhas pa yis ni brtan par bya// khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni// dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgred// gnyis kar yang dag dmigs byas nas// rdo rje rtse me brtan par bya// oM tista a s+tha
100b2(rgyud): na hUM phaT dam tshig gi sngags dong phyag rgya'o// pad ma ye shes bkris byas la// rnam shes kyis ni sa dugs mnan// gnyis ka lcags sgrog ltar bcings nas// lhag ma ba dan gsum par bsgreng // dri ma gsum dang dud pa
100b3(rgyud): spre/ lnga pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// oM hU~M a swA hA/ rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyi ma kha sbar nas// pad ma'i tshul gyis dbye bar bya// oM a a tha swA hA/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// 
100b4(rgyud): sa dugs dang ni rnam shes bkri/ lce rdo rje ltar bsgreng nas// oM su aHswAm+b+ha/ rdo rje mo'i sngags dang phyag rngu byed 'di yi phyag rgya gnyis sbyar naso// thol mo log par sbyar byas te/ oM k+ShaM a swA hU~M/ drag mo'i sngags dang phyag
100b5(rgyud): rgya'o khu tshur gnyis ni bsgreng byas nas// sngon dang 'tshams dang kha phye ba// oM yu~M oM swA hA/ ro longs sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis ka dam bcings nas// dkar po gi hiM bi sgril nas ni// rtse mo kun nas 'dud byas
100b6(rgyud): nas/ ran chen tshul du sbyar ba ni// oM hUM aHswA hA/ gtum mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya kun gyi sngon du ni// pad+ma ma'i lag pa sngon du bsgyur// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// dkar po ga haM sbrel byas nas// oM sru~M sum
100b7(rgyud): swA hA/ seng ge'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de yi phyag rgya dam bcings te// sa gdugs pad ma sbrel byas nas// oM s+thA yuM swA hA/ bden bral gyi rkyeH kyeHsa dang phyag 'i che rti ba&rnaMs pa gnyis bcings te// phan tshun lan gsu
100b8(rgyud): gdab par bya// oM k+Sh+mAM k+ShuM swA hA/ rlung gi phyogs kyi d+hiHsa dang phyag rgya 'bus kyi lha me dgu rnams kyi// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma zla bra'o lag pas kya ljon pa dang ni rnam shes sbyar// gnyis ka rtse me sprad
101a1(rgyud): // byas la/ bdud rtsi nu yi sngon du'o// oM ha he hri swA hA/ shar gyi rnal 'byor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyi ma brgyad byas te// nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar ba// oM g+hi g+ha swA hA/ byang gi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi sngags
101a2(rgyud): dang byang/ rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo dam btsongs nas// zla ba nyi ma rnam par bkram// oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ nub kyi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyi ma rab brkyang na// rgyab dang rgyab kyi sbyor po bya// rtse me sbyar nas
101a3(rgyud): sprad par bya// lho yi rnal 'byor ma gsum gyi'o// oM bar d+ha li hUM phaT// lho yi rnal 'byor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// gnyis ka bskyed pa'i 'tshams su bzung // oM hUM swA hA/ sgeg me'i sngags
101a4(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyi ma rab brkyang ste// 'byed pa dang ni rnam shes bsgreng // bzung nas kun nas bzlas nas ni// dung gi phyag rgya de bzhin no// oM sU gan te swA hA/ dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// pi wang tshul gyis pi wang garde ba/ 
101a5(rgyud): oM hUM ha swA hA/ pi wang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gnyis ka thal mo kun sbyar nas// gyen du bsrung zhing 'phang bar bya// oM shrI swA hA/ me tog sngags dang phyag rgya'o// sngon du khu tshur bcings nas no// dkar po rab tu brkyang
101a6(rgyud): nas su kha ya mdun du sprul byed pa// oM hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ klu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i khu tshur dam bcings nas// 'tshams su zla ba bzung nas su// oM a~M swA hA/ spos kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bde bral du'o// nyi ma ra du
101a7(rgyud): tshur bcings nas ni// ye shes gyen du bsgreng bar bya// oM k+ShaM swA hA/ mar me ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// brla bu g.yas kyi rked 'tshams su// zla ba'i lag pa 'phang bar bya// g.yas pa skra yi 'tshams su ni// nyi ma'i lag pa
101a8(rgyud): 'phang byas la// oM su pri te hUM swA hA/ gar mkhan sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba nyi ma kha bcug dgod// oM pu puM swA hA// mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed cing // pheM phuM swA hA/ mar me'i sngags dang / 
101b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o yi dgas lha mo kha bcug nas// oM paM baM swA hA/ 'jigs byed ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i khu tshur dam bcings nas// rna ba'i rtse ru sbyar bar bya// oM pr-i pra swahA/ dag 'phrog ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgyas kun
101b2(rgyud): nas so so ru snying po'i sngags dang sbyar bar bya// lha mo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog bstan par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// rgyab dang rgyab tu rab tu sbyar// oM badz+ra s+pho tA/ oMk+Sha swA hA/ lcags sgrog gi'o// 
101b3(rgyud): bar mda' dka' snying g.yo ba// oM k+Shu~M swA hA/ mda'i 'o// bdag nyid nyi ma mkhyud nas ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bzung bar bya// oM pra ya ta me hUM/ nu ba 'dzin pa yi'o// nyi ma cha ni rab brkyang nas// ye shes dang ni dkar po sbyar// 
101b4(rgyud): de yi dud pa bsgong ba ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan// oM hUM swA hA/ de nyid zla ba la sbyar nas// dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu grags// oM ho swA hA/ dril bu'o// zla bi nyi ma kha sbyar nas// pad ma dang ni sa gdugs bskyod// gsang ba'i
101b5(rgyud): gnas su sbyar bar bya// u la a la'i phyag rgya'o// oM a swA hUM/ g.yas pa'i lag pa gsang gnas su// ye shes kyis ni pad ma mnan// lhag ma rtse ltar bsgreng ba ni// dbus kyi phyogs su bstan par bya// oM shr-I tig shwA hUM swAhA/ 
101b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nyid zla ba rab sbyar nas// thams cad g.yas pa'i phyag rgya bzhin// oM gur ni swA hUM phaT/ g.yon pa'i 'o// khu tshur bcings nas 'phral ba ru// dkar po dud
101b7(rgyud): pa bshibs te brkyang // oM muM hUM swA hA/ brgya byin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis ka bsre ba nas// dkar po dang ni gi haM bsgreng // rtse dang rtse ni spang byas la// rin chen tshul du rnam par sbyar// oM da na a gre hUM swA hA/ 
101b8(rgyud): ku be ra'o// khu tshur bcangs nas dkar po bsgreng // oM kha ta ni hUM phaT/ 'byung po'i bdag po'o// khu tshur 'og tu bcings byas la// dkar po dang ni tud ma bsgreng // oM bur bu ba swA hA/ klu'i dbang po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ 
102a1(rgyud): @khu tshur bcangs nas steng du 'phen// oM khA sha swA hA/ khyab 'jug gi'o// ba dan gsum pas stong du 'phen// oM hUM sa swA hA/ drag po yi'o// khu tshur gnyis pa gnas su bskyod// oM oM swA hA/ tshangs
102a2(rgyud): pa yi'o// zla ba'i khu tshur bstan byas nas// gau haM dang ni rang nyid bsgrang // nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas// de yi rtse mor sbyar byas la// oM mu muM hUM swA hA/ gdugs 'dzin pa yi'o// dri yi chu dang 'o ma dang // me long gis ni
102a3(rgyud): rab tu mdzes// de yi dbus su spyan drangs nas// rnal 'byor ma na ji bzhin thim// dud pa dang ni mar me ldan// me tog dkar pos rab tu mchod// bkra shis klu yi rnam pa dang // hUM gi rnam pas dril sgra bsgrogs// hUM hUM hUM ra bi/ 
102a4(rgyud): a bi te ha su na ni a dze AM ni saR+Yo tu hu g+ha ni b+han d+ha ni g+hu l+yA ba dza bu dza li a ba bi Ne du bram+ba ma hA ro pa ri ha ru dan ti sa k+Sha dan tu ki na ra ro sa/ a na sang g+ho ma ga la g+hi I A A/ bkra shis pa yi g+hu yis ni// rdo rje dril bu mngon
102a5(rgyud): par sbyar/ rnga dang gling bu pi wang dang // khrus kyi dus su rnam par sbyar// drang po dri yi chu dang ni// gnyis par sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // gsum par dang por chu dang ni// bzhi par me tog gis mchodado// rdo rje dril bu'i sgra yis ni// lhan
102a6(rgyud): cig gnas su sbyar bar bya// de nas bsrung ba bcing byas la// sngon bzhin mchod pa'i rnam pa bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// dkar po dang ni gi haM bsgreng // gnyis ka bsgyur cing rab bsgyur bas// gnas gsum du ni/ 
102a7(rgyud): bcing bar bya/ spyi bo mgrin pa rgyab dang ni// gsum pa snying khwa'i gnas su ni// gnas gsum du ni bcing bar bya// oM ha tu hUM swA hA// bsrung ba chen mo ya'o// gnyis ka'i spyi bor bcing byas nas// lhag par dar bzhin 'phyang
102a8(rgyud): ba'o/ oM hUM swA hU~M/ dar phyangs bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o// nyi ma kun nas mgo bo la// gnas lnga ru ni gtug par bya// oM hU~M swA hA/ cod pan gyi'o// nyi ma'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// dkar po cung zhig brkum pa ni/ rno ba
102b1(rgyud): gnyis su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin mgrin pa'i rtsa bar dgod// oM hUM swA hA/ rna ba yi'o// rgyan gyi rnam pa'i rigs pa yis// gnas kun du ni sbyar bar bya// oM hUM swA hA/ rgyan thams cad dkri ba'o// rab mgo rnam pa'i phyag rgya yis// 
102b2(rgyud): rab tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan// oM hA swA hA/ zla ba rab tu brkyang byas nas// rnal 'byor ma kun la rab bstan// oM pra ta tsi su gan d+ha hU~M swA hA/ dr-i'i 'o// dkar po mchog tu brkyang nas ni// ye shes dang ni kun du sbyar// oM shu
102b3(rgyud): sho bai ta sU Sh+pe hUM swA hA/ me tog gi'o// rgya chen po'i bdug pa yis// gnas kun du ni rab tu sbyar// de yi phyag rgya brtan bcings te// dud pa bsgreng nas bdug par bya// oM d+hU pa ma l-i ni hU~M swA hA/ spos kyi'o// rgya chen po'i mar me yis/ 
102b4(rgyud): gnas brgyad de ni mchod par bya// de yi phyag rgya dam bcings te// dung bsgreng nas ni rab tu sbyar// oM prA ti ha ta hUM swA hA/ lbu bshos kyi'o// de nas arga dbul byas te// khu tshur mnyam po brtan bcings nas// dri ma gsum da
102b5(rgyud): dud pa bsgreb rtse mo kun nas spyod pa ni// oMrga chen por rab tu brtan// oM pra ti tsa argi hUM s+pho hA/ arga'i'o// bil ba la sogs 'bras bu gzhan// gzhan yang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa// zla ba nyi me mnyam ldan pas// thal sbyar
102b6(rgyud): 'bras bu'i dbyibs byas la// oM badz+ra swA hA/ 'bras bu thams cad kyi'o// de nas bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// nya phyis chen pos bkang nas ni// gdan du nyi ma zla ba dgod// 'byed pa rnam shes
102b7(rgyud): sbyar nas ni/ de nyid kun nas rab tu bas// oM ha ho hri hU~M swA hA/ lha gsum gyis na mingon bsrubs la// kun nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya// snod brgyad kun nas bkang ba ni// gnas brgyad du ni sbyin par bya// lcags kyu
102b8(rgyud): lnga la sogs pa na// ji bzhin de nyid kyis bsang ngo // bza' ston rnam pa mang po dang // thams cad kun nas dbul bar bya// oM shra hU~M g+h+raM d+h+waM a swA hA/ lcags kyu yi'o// rdo rje dril bu bsgrags nas ni// rab tu dbyangs snyan hUM ga glu// 
103a1(rgyud): @oM hU~M hUM hUM hUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM r+m+mA hUM hUM/ oM pheM hU~M pheM g+hu hU~M swAhA/ dgyes pa chen po'i sngags so// thams cad kun nas sngags brjod cing // de nas rdo rje dril bu bsgrogs// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// rgyu ba dang rgyab
103a2(rgyud): tu rab tu sbyar// sa yi ge degis dong pad mai sbrel// hUM rnam pas gnyis bskyod cing // oM badz+ra g+han d+ha ho/ oM badz+ra g+han d+ha ra ni pra ra ni saR+Wa bud+d+ha pra tsa le te prad nya pa ra mi ta na ta swa b+ha ba b+hi ne badz+ra swA hA/ hri ta ya to sa ni hU~M hUM hUM swA hA/ 
103a3(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i sngags so// bdug pa me tog dkar po spogs// sa la zho dang bza' ba dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi zas kyis ni// dbang ldan mchod par dbul bar ldan// spros dang me tog dkar po srogs// 'o ma chu yi snod dang ni// lha
103a4(rgyud): bshos mchod pa sna tshogs pa// rlung gi phyogs su dbul bar bya// shra dang nya dang zan dron dang // snod na khrig gis kun bkang ba// til gyi khu ba'i bza' ba yas// bden bral phyogs su dbul bar bya// zhe dang sbrang rtsi nas
103a5(rgyud): kun ldan/ ske tshe khu ba'i bza' ba dang // bre dang ldan pas khyad par du// me yi phyogs su dbul bar bya// dri dang me tog rgya chen dang // spros dang mar me rgya chen dang // rgya chen gtor ma'i gnas su ni// thams cad mchod pa rgya
103a6(rgyud): che ba/ slob dpon shin du mnyam gzhag pas// kun nas sems kyis rdzogs par bya// zla bas dril bu mngon bsgrags shing // nyi mus rdo rje gsor nas ni// kun nas kun du mchod par bya// sgeg dang bzhad pa'i zhal dang
103a7(rgyud): ni/ hUM gI rnam pa'i glu ya ni// rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya// phyag rgya ldan zhing ljon pa dang // gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa yi// gang gang phyag mtshan gyis mchod pa// de yi gzugs su bsam par bya// hUM gi rnam
103a8(rgyud): pas glu ni dgyes// bkra shis sgra yisau kun nas dgang // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rkad pa'i 'tshams su rnam par dgod// sgeg dang rgod dang khro ba dang // yan lag ji bzhin gzhan du bsgyur// sgog pa'i tshul
103b1(rgyud): gyis sgeg pa dang / pi wang tshul gyis rdebs pa dang // gling bu'i tshul gyis bud pa dang // dung gi tshul gyis 'bud pa dang // phyag 'aral tshul gyis 'dud pa dang // sbrang gsab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba
103b2(rgyud): dang bA ri'i tshul gyis bri ba dang // rgyal mtshan tshul gyis 'phyang ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul gyis 'gebs pa dang // rdo yab tshul gyis bsgrogs pa dang // sa ta ha'i tshul dang ni// gar byed tshul gyis bskyod pa dang / dgod pa'i
103b3(rgyud): tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang // bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bsnyems pa dang // khro ba'i tshul gyis 'phen pa dang // mda' 'dren pa'i tshul dang ni// rdo rje gsor phyag nu ma mchir// thal sbyar tshul gyis rdebs pa dang // de nyid mchod pa nyi shu ni// hUM
103b4(rgyud): gi glu yis rab tu sbyar// khu tshur gnyis ni dam bcings nas// ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgron// rtse dang rtse mer reg pa ni// me long bzhin du rab tu bstan// de nas bstod pa rab tu bya// sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog/ dag
103b5(rgyud): ba chen po dga' chen po// kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag/ sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje rdo rje stobs po che// bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// kun du bzang po spyod
103b6(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal lo// ma bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan dang // snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub// phyag na pad ma byams pa dang // nam mkha' mdzod dang kun du bzang // gnod sbyin bdag po 'jom
103b7(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs// sgrib sel sa yi snying po dang // sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// mA ma ki dang sangs rgyas spyan// mdog mdzes dbyangs snyan yid 'ong ma// rdo rje phreng ba phyag 'tshal lo// kun nas byang chub byang chub che// sangs rgyas
103b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchog tu skyes// rdo rje hUM dang hUM bsgrogs pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug nor bu'i 'od// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// 'dod dang thar pa don gnyer ba// srid pa gsum po dus gsum po// 'jig rten gsum po
104a1(rgyud): @khams gsum mchog/ pra dang rags pa bsdus pa'o// brtan pa mchog gi gtso bo'o// srid pa'i 'khor ba bskyod mdzad pa// g.yo ba dbang mchog bsnyems pa'o// thog ma tha ma mnan mdzad nas// thams cad
104a2(rgyud): sngon du gnas pa nyid// dam pa chen po sems dpa' che// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i snying kha brgya// rdo rje khro bo khyo bo che// rab tu 'bar bas 'jigs pa'i tshogs// bdug pa chen po 'dul mdzad cing // drag cing rab drag zad par
104a3(rgyud): mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa grub chen dang // chos dang chos mchog chen po'o// dge ba dang ni mi dge lam// byang chub sems kyis rtogs mdzad pa// shes rab thabs kyi nor chen po// thams cad dag pa pad ma che// 'dod chags/ 
104a4(rgyud): rnam dge ting 'dzin mchog/ chags pa sna tshogs dbang phyug che// nam mkha' mtha' med rtag pa'i don// 'byung ba chen po kun gyi gzhi// dpal gyi 'byor pa 'byor pa'i brgyan// kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad// phyag
104a5(rgyud): 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub ldan// gus pas bdag la bka' drin skyobs// kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa'
104a6(rgyud): dngos grub ldan// gus pas bdag la bka' drin skyobs// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// mchod pa 'di yis nye bar mchod// de nas rdo rje'i glu la sogs pa blangs te// hUM hUM hUM/ d+he ma d+ha ru sa la ru d+ha ru han d+ha pa// ga na dza/ 
104a7(rgyud): u du ra ha badz+ra tu smr-i/ te na hUM te na te te hUM/ su ra na pa ra d+ha ke tsa ra na d+ha tu ku ru ma bi ni ro ma tha ro sha ka ru te badz+ra tu hUM te na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ bA bi ni mud ti bi se sa mU ru ni/ ga dzA dza ai ai ra mA ro ma ho badz+ra na hUM hU~M/ g+hu na hi ni pa ti/ 
104a8(rgyud): a kaM tsa tu hUM/ a mr-i ta a naN ta bi sin tsa ma a e ma tu/ saM sa bi ti ru pad na se na ni a e/ tsa ru na Na tsa tu na dri mo na d+hu ba ra na/ d+ha pa la sa saM ga man ti ta nu/ a mr-i ta bi si sau tsin ta na tsa san ha/ badz+re a tsa pa ru sha
104b1(rgyud): kAn ti ma hu sa hi ba stu ri go man ti a e sa da ka pa la so ni a ba khe dza ya dza ya/ ud ta rod bi ma hUM/ ma ra ka ta ra ga su so hi a o/ sa ko pa ti hUM ki a na/ du so sanya tsa g+ho ra dan du ka ba la/ bsri ma de sa ma ni ta ya/ d+hu so
104b2(rgyud): hi ta ni la tsi bi tsi dza la ha ro ha ra mu ra ti/ a na sa da ma bi ra/ ha ha na du kro te hUM/ ru tsa hUM ta kro ta d+ha yo na na ma hUM/ de nyid lnga yi glu dang ni// rdo rje dril bu rab tu sbyar// lnga pa'i gnas kyi gla yis ni// rab tu mchod pa blang bar bya// hUM/ 
104b3(rgyud): hUM hUM pad tsi ba nud ta a I pan tsa na mi a sra sar+b+ba a dze na tad tra shu ny+tsi sam pa re/ bA ba bA ba/ badz+ra yi gaM a de taM ta/ sma be mi dzi dze na/ A dz+nyA bu ba dzi oM bud+d+ha dze i ni d+ha he/ sad d+he su sa bi a ma d+ha la ka dz+nyA ra e mo de bin+taM/ 
104b4(rgyud): bi gai tu/ b+ha kha b+ha khA bi badz+ra a b+hu dza/ a li a badz+ra tsa li ad ma a ni e pan tsa ad ma bi na/ a b+hu shra se b+hak+Sha na dze du/ ki li bin g+hu saM b+hur+tha/ dza u sa d+ha mi si ru bi bo d+ha pi sha tsa ru/ d+harma a mo b+h+raM si ha paM pa khA na ha ana?/ 
104b5(rgyud): Na bi bu i du h+ya/ hi pu pi hi bu ba sa ru tu ru ban ti a man ta/ lu ta ru badz+ra g+hu sing ha/ bi ru baM khr-i a dwe hUM/ ba ga bi du tha da hi a/ b+h+ya sa tha gar ni tha khu/ ke ke sa ra de pu pu phu pa ka re/ ma ga pi sa ts+tshi na swA hA/ a ne ma hA badz+ra tu hUM/ bi
104b6(rgyud): ru saM sa ru tA g+hu hUM/ pan tu a d+hu oM na me hUM ma hUM/ rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid glu// kha dog lnga pa yi ni gnas// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// sna tshogs mchod pas mchog tu brtson// shwe tId tA ra se ra mi sa ra tAd tA mu li
104b7(rgyud): shrI gu h+ye bi ti ba ra kan ti bu dza la swe/ shrI badz+ra gan d+ha ra na tsa la nA yo ga tud tu a su pra shri dz+nyA na ba ba la me sa ra bo ga bu ga ta/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bstod pas nye bar mchod par bya'o// rdo rje thal mo kha sbyor nas// snying kha'i
104b8(rgyud): phyogs su bzung bar bya// oM shud d+harma hUM a hUM a hUM swA hA/ phyi rol gtor ma mchod pa ni// rab tu brtags shing mchod par bya// 'byir na dpa' bo gzhan dang ni// ma 'byor na ni bdag nyid do// mtshon chen po'i gos kyis
105a1(rgyud): @/ ni/ sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgya// rgyan kun gyis ni lus brgyan nas// lag gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs shing // byang du tshangs pa snang g.yab dang // me tog dkar
105a2(rgyud): deShI ra ba bzhin// spos dang mar ma yang dag ldan// sa la'i bza' ba rgya chen po// zho dang bu ram 'bras thug dang // khyab 'jug lag na dbyug pa dang // drag po yon tan bsgrogs par byed// rol pas 'phen zhing hU~M byas
105a3(rgyud): nas/ lta sa sngon du sgrogs shing // zla bas dril bu bsil nas ni// nyi mas rdo rje bskyod byed cing // tri yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// me tog dkar pos ra ba bzhin// spos dang mar me yang dag ldan// sa li'i bza'o brgya
105a4(rgyud): chen po/ zho dang bu ram 'bras thug dang // shar gyi sgo ru sbyin par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyong du sbyar bar bya// sa gdugs dang ni pad ma sbrel// gi haM dang ni dkar po bsgreng // dkar po kun nas bsgre
105a5(rgyud): ba ni/ lha dang lha min grub pa'o// oM pa ti la ma hA pa ta li hU~M hU~M dzA swA hU~M/ shar sgor spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM b+ha ha ni mau hA b+ha ha ni/ pra te b+ha ha ni sur+ya tsan tra sid d+hI mu khi dzA ra dze sa ma ra dzi u ma de bo gang ga su
105a6(rgyud): ru bi ta ra yang sa gadra na ga bre ga na ba ti/ ka rau ti ka ra sri saM sai de po a lo u pa la yo ka lo a su ra su ra dza oM bu ga si ma hA si hU~M hU~M hUM ho a kar sha ya a kar sha ya sa ma ya a ta b+he hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags
105a7(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'o// dkar po gi haM bkris nas ni// oM b+hak+Sha b+hAk+Sha sa ma ya a ti ba ti hUM phaT swAhA/ dgyes pa chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas byang gi sgo ru ni// mnyam pa'i rkang pa mnan byas kyang // zla ba dril bu mngon
105a8(rgyud): bsgrags shing // nyi ma de bzhin rdo rje gsor// dkar po'i maN+Dal mngon byas nas// 'o ma'i snod sogs bzhag par byas// me trogr-i dkar po bdug pa dang // lha bshos bza' ba'o ma'o// sngon gyi spyan drang phyag rgya dang // de yi
105b1(rgyud): sngags kyis sbyar bar bya// oM a nan ta b+ha su ki tak+Sha ka ka rA ko ta pad ma ma hA pad mo sang ga pa la gu li sha pa la de bi sa do sa me som seng gi dan d+ha a ba la hu lon ta/ nan to sa~M ga ra pa ta ma hA pa ta shri kan ti su ru pa pa tra ho ma ho ha ra/ 
105b2(rgyud): dz+wa li mahA dzi li/ oM a god tsa ya a gad tsa ya ma hA na gA a ti pa ti sarbe b+hur b+hu ba phuM phaT swA hA/ zla ba'i khu tshur byas nas ni// rnam shes dang nas gdugs bsgre // gdengs kwa'i tshul du rab tu sbyar// ji bzhin cho ga'i rim pa
105b3(rgyud): yis/ byang du klu la gtor ma sbyin// zlum po'i tshul du 'phen pa yis// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// nub du gnod sbyin dbang po ni// sngon gyi phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo // dkyil 'khor dmar po mngon byas nas// me tog dmar po ser
105b4(rgyud): po sogs// gtor ma 'dug pa mar mer ldan// khyad par du ni bdud rtsi lnga// oM na mo b+ha tra su b+ha tra nan ta kyi le/ pad ma si ka ka ka na Ta ma ta na ta be ta ni tshi d+ha ni su ra ni d+ha ra na na su ru pa ke le r-i ta ke la a si ta tri ta/ na ma k+She b+ha shrI ya/ 
105b5(rgyud): / ru san kan kan ti/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bka' yaus// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo 'dir shog/ hUM a pa da ra a pa da ra/ oM pa ta la pi ta li pak+Sha pri ya/ rnal 'byor ma kun bza' dang btung // hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ lag gnyis khu tshur
105b6(rgyud): sbrel bcings nas// snying kha'i phyogs su rnam par mnan// oM d+ha na a ti pa ta li s+t+waM swA hA/ nub phyogs su gtor ma sbyin pa'o// ji ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yis// rdo rje rkang pasA mnan nas ni// e li ka li sbyor bas sbyar// 
105b7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// yang ni mchod pa nyi shus mchod// kun nas glu blang gar ba'o// su ka ri d+ha ri i pa yo bi ya su kha saM mo ha ka ru/ go ra bi ru sa pi ya sidi sa ra i da man da la ba k+Sha ba k+Sha bri bad dza a par ti ha ni/ 
105b8(rgyud): a e a ka ra na/ bi sa ra na bu dza sa pa ri mo ba na/ bkra shis cho ga rdo rje glus// bstod pa dang na nye bar mchod// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// yadu ni mchod pa nyi shus mchod// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma dbul ba ni// 
106a1(rgyud): oM ku ru ku ru ba ta li ma hA ba ta li sa de mu kho/ sa ma sa ni wa si ni pre ta mu khe tsan Da ko ra la/ ru ti ra pra ye sa ma ya rak+Sha ti yo ga a ma ba bi ki li ki li re be pi b+ha ha na ma he bun dzaM bak+Sha bak+Sha ha se ha ga na du te du na pa ri tsan da
106a2(rgyud): li ka ra li ka ra li raSha sa ku ru hUM/ g+h+ri swa g+ni hA/ sar+b+ba du Ti ni bak+Sha bak+Sha po phruM pre phaT sam+ba/ rdo rje khu chur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po ga ha bsgred nas ni// gnyis pa rtse mo kun bkug nas// nga yi 'gram du mngon bkug na
106a3(rgyud): lhag ma'i gtor ma dud pa'i sol ba zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bzhi mdor dang pa yi tshal// shing gcig ri dang chu chen por// mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing // 'thor 'thung gsum ni ldan par dbul// de nas rdzas
106a4(rgyud): bcu rab ldan pas// dri zhim chu dang 'o mar bas// dung gi snod du kun bkang nas// dam tshig chu yisku gsang gtor bya// oM a hUM a swA hA/ ldan bdun yongs su bzlas byas pas// dam tshig chus ni brtag par bya// de nas sa
106a5(rgyud): phyogs re rer ni// slob ma la sogs dbang bskur bya// gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gzhug/ slob dpon gyi na mdun logs su// me tog dang bcas thal mo sbyar// byang chub sems bskyed sngon
106a6(rgyud): lam gdab/ der grwa ding 'khor ba las rgal lo// de nas slob ma bya ba'i las// swa b+ha ba shud d+ho sar+b+ba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho haM/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag pa ru ni skyabs su mchi// lus can kun la skyabs su mchi// 
106a7(rgyud): gzhan gyi nor la mi reg cing // byams dang snying rjes sems can la// tshul khrims sdom pa rab tu bsrung // oM pan ka d+ha ki ni pu tse u pa dra na ad ma naM/ ni ra yA ta ya mi/ oM a tsar+ya u paSh+Ta na ni d+ya ta ya naM/ oM sa ka la sa ta
106a8(rgyud): par stan pu tse paSh+TA na ad ma na nir+ya ta ya mi/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M sa ma ya he he he ho// a ni sreg 'bru kun gyi mchog/ ngag ni rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// hUM gi rnam pa'i ye shes kyis// snying kha'i rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// oM hi li hi la
106b1(rgyud): man g+hu ra ta ti badz+ra tsa le yuM yuM hUM swA hA/ deng 'dir ye shes 'di zhes pas// bdud rtsi'i ran myang bar sbyin// oM a swA hA/ dung chos kyi ni bdud rtsi lngas// sngags ni khar bzlas sbyin par bya// sems ni spro ba'i rgyu yis ni// de nas
106b2(rgyud): dbab par rab tu bya// snying kha rlung gis bskor ba dang // dbus su rlung gi sra bran no// rkang par rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam// snying kha'i rlung ni 'bar bar bsam// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gror bya// 'jigs pa'i hUM ni rnam
106b3(rgyud): par bstan/ oM li la aM a/ sngags pa nga rgyal dang ldan pas// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// rdo rje hU~M gis glu blang zhing // rab tu mi zad lus kyi gar// 'dod pa'i gar gyis gar byed cing // bdag nyid rang 'dod mnyam par
106b4(rgyud): bya/ oM tista badz+ra sa ma ya pra ti pa la ni hUM hUM hUM ho haM swA hA/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas me tog 'phang byas te// ji bzhin lha yi gnas su ni// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan par dbul// oM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu hUM aHswAhA
106b5(rgyud): mig ni legs par bkrol byas la// bla ma'i zhabs kyi rtsa ba ru// mgo btud mngon par phyag rgya'o// khyad par nyid du arga'i snod// rang 'dod chos kyi gsol ba gdab// rjes su bzung zhing bka' drin mdzod// de nyid bslab par
106b6(rgyud): bya ba ni/ thal mo kha sbyar byas nas ni// oM badz+ra man d+ha ra bdi kha sto ha haM/ sA ma yo ho sa ma ya ho// slob ma shes pa don dam smra ba'i seng ge yis// rnal 'byor cho ga nyon mongs g.yos pa gcad pa'i phyir// nyon mongs skyes pa nyes pa/ 
106b7(rgyud): skye ba'i sa gzhom phyir// rnal 'byor rgyal po don dam nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ rtse gcig pa yi rdo rje yis// khyad par du ni bcing bar bya// spyi bor k+ShAM/ mig tu hUM/ rna ba dang sna la yuM/ lce la suM/ mgrin par s+t+waM/ dpung par b+h+rUM/ 
106b8(rgyud): snying khar s+yAM/ lte ba dang gsang po ruk+ShaM/ bdag nyid phyag rgya phyag rgya yis// yan lag brgyad du sa bon gzung // sa ma ya ho/ ma ti hU~M/ badz+re ha/ ma ti a/ d+hi no ha/ d+ha no ha mi ti/ me d+ha no a he a/ bar d+ha ma no haM/ ho pud pa la~M haM/ 
107a1(rgyud): a a oM hU~M swA hA/ de kho na nyid smon lam gyis// bdag nyid ye shes lus zhes brjod// gsang ba'i bslab pa la sogs bslabs// de la dbang bskur rab tu bya// lho yi phyogs su slob ma'i dbang // nub
107a2(rgyud): phyogs su ni gnyis med de// byed du de kho na tshig go/ shar gyi sgo ru bum pa yis// slob dpon gyis ni dbang de skur bya// bde ba'i stan la bzhag nas ni// spyi bor gdugs kyis rab tu brgyan// mnyam pa'i rkang pas mnan
107a3(rgyud): nas ni/ thal mo kha sbyar me tog bzhin// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang // smon lam gyis ni sems can dgrol// bkra shis glu yi dbyangs dang ni// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags na// slob dpon nub tu bltas na s+ya ni// gnyis
107a4(rgyud): pa shar du yang dag blta// rdo rje sems dpar mngon sbyar nas// zla ba nyi ma bum pa bzung // oM dz+nyA no da ka kum pas badz+ra a sha a pau she gan du saM bo dwe ar+ya sa~M pa ra u ta raM oM a phruM pheM phaT hU~M swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags/ 
107a5(rgyud): dkar po gi haM sbrel nas ni// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// oM badz+ra ka ya hUM a swA hA/ gnas dang gnas ni brgyad dag tu// bsrung dang bcing ba'i rnam pa bya// zla ba dril bu ldan par sbyin// sangs rgyas lnga yi spyi bo ru/ 
107a6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam par sbyar// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi haM bsgreng // rtse mo sprad cing bskrad par bya// dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng nas// oM hUM a swA hA/ sangs rgyas lnga'i tsid pan
107a7(rgyud): gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas shar du gom brgyad 'gro/ gos bzang bzang po yang bgos nas// sangs rgyas zhing gi gnas su ni// yang ni mchod pa'i rnam pa bya// de nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin chos// lan gsum
107a8(rgyud): po na bstan par bya// byin brlabs yang dag bstan par bya// dang por slob ma'i mchod la sogs// ji bzhin sems can rim dang rim// gnyis med mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// lha la rab tu mchod par bya// 
107b1(rgyud): thams cad kun nas slob ma la// de kho na nyid rab tu bstan// rtag tu 'byor pa'i slob ma yis// slob dpon la ni yon dbul lo// rang gi bu dang chung ma dang // gnyen dang bran du bcas pa dang // glang chen rta dang ba lang dang // yul
107b2(rgyud): dang khang khyim zhing la sogs// gser dang dngul dang zangs dag dang // sna tshogs 'bru dang so ba dang // stan dang lham dang mal cha dang // gdugs dang longs spyod 'di rnams nyid// mtha' ru rang gi lus dang ni// slob dpon
107b3(rgyud): la na yon du dbul// ma gus pa yi slob ma ni// de yi dngos grub ring du bstan// de nas slob dpon gyi yang mchod pa la sogs byas te// me tog bdug pa dri la sogs// phyag rgya'i rnam pa kun rnam 'dir// bkra shis gla
107b4(rgyud): yis rnam pa dang // rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// hUM hU~M hUM na tha tu hU pa rI me tsa tu hu de sa yi d+harma tu g+ha yi bu ru ni pu ru mo k+Shan tAM ma ho k+Shan tu/ b+ha ba b+hi ba butwAd tA bi me tsu ha de ba hu tu pa na ma hA badz+ra/ da ra ha badz+rA tu hUM/ bkra shis
107b5(rgyud): glu'o// sna tshogs pa yi bstod pa yis// mchod dang nye bar mchod par bya// oM ra ma ra mo he hUM hUM hUM ho a/ oM ra ma ra ma ho hUM hU~M hU~M ho haM a/ oM ra ma ra ma phruM phruM phruM hUM hUM hU~M phruM phreM aHoM ra ma ra ma ho g+hA g+hu g+haM g+ho a swA hA/ mkha'
107b6(rgyud): 'gro ma brgyad kyi phreng ba'i sngags so// zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas// me tog gis ni yang dag mchod// thams cad kun nas smon lam ni// sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pos bya// ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// ma grol
107b7(rgyud): ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// bdag gis dkyil 'khor bya ba'o// sngon bzhin rgyal po'i dbang po ltar// 'dir ni shis pa brjod par bya// yon bdag gis ni kun nas yon// thams cad thal mo
107b8(rgyud): sbyar ba'i gnas// dung chos chu dang me tog gis// 'bad pas shis pa brjod la sbyin// 'khor ba'i srid pa dgon pa las 'grol zhing // rdo rje las byung bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' che/ sangs rgyas dar byangs mngon bsams pas// 
108a1(rgyud): @sems can don la myur ba'i sems// zhes pas shis par brjod do// gshegs su gsol bar rab sbyor bas// rdo rje thal mo snying khar bca'// oM na ma te hUM/ na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ phyag 'tshal ba'i
108a2(rgyud): / sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// zla ba snying khar mnan byas la// be ro ba na ma sU te/ de nyid mchod pa nyi shus mchod par bya// hUM hUM hUM shu nya twad ta na tad ta sa ga ru pa dar si ti/ se sa b+ha ba a b+ha ban tu
108a3(rgyud): se sa na mo stu te/ de nas gzhan gyi spyan bsreg bshad// zho dang sbrang rtsi ldan po yis// bil sa la ni de bzhin bsgre// yam shing byang chub shing las ni// lnga brgya ru ni bsreg par bya// de yi dbus su dbang bskur dang / 
108a4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas smon lam gdab// rgyal srad shor ba'i rgyal po yang // myur du rab mdzes sa la dbang // mar gyis bskus pa'i sbrang rtsi dang // yam shing chu la bsgres pa la// sna tshogs me tog spos kyis ni// 
108a5(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// kun nas rab tu bstan par bya// rdo rje dral bu mngon bsgrags na swa// mchod pa nyi shus mchod par bya// oM badz+ra gan d+ha swa ra na te saR+Wa pu ta
108a6(rgyud): pra tsa le re prad nya pa ra mi ta na sau b+ha bA hUM hUM hUM ho swA hA/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya'o// lcags kyu rnam pa lnga dang ni// gzhan yang lcags kyur byas pa yis// dbus dang phyi rol kun btsos pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga rnams dang / 
108a7(rgyud): thams cad rnal 'byor ma la dbul// log gnyis khu tshur bcing byas nas// ye shes rnam shes rnam par sbrel// oM A hUM dzA guM suM swA hA/ lcags kyu lnga yi phyi rol du// lho dang nub du bdug par bya// gnas dang gnas
108a8(rgyud): ni gzhan du yang // khrog gis rab tu gang ba'i snod// rab tu mkhas po'i slob dpon gyis// bdud rtsi lnga ldan dbul bar bya// nya phyis la sogs snod chen por// rab tu mdzes par yongs bkang nas// nyi ma zla ba rab brkyang
108b1(rgyud): nas/ sa yi gdugs dang rnam shes sbyar// bsgreng ste rdo rje brtags nas ni// rtse mor nya phyis la reg nas// de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni// bdud rtsi lnga ni sbyang bar bya// de yi dbus su zla ba las// bdud rtsi yi ger rab brtan nas// 
108b2(rgyud): oM a ho shri hriM hU~M a swA hA/ bdud rtsi lnga sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnam shes 'byed pa sbyar nas ni// blo dang ldan pas lan gsum dkrug/ rnal 'byor ma dang lha kun la// 'bad pas 'thar 'thung dbul bar bya// nya phyi sa
108b3(rgyud): la sogs kun bkang nas// cha dang cha yis dbul bar bya// gnyis med mchod pa sna tshogs pos// mkhas pa yas ni rnam par mchod// rdo rje dril bu mngon bsgrags nas// yang ni glu yi rnam pa bya// hUM hUM hU~M ni thung du badz+ra satwa
108b4(rgyud): oM ha u me/ ku me ta li sa bi ru sa ru a be dzA oM aM g+hu ma hu me sma ta ma tha na po nu ma ho e ka pi saM ka ru badz+ra su ko ra d+han ni/ be ta lo ma hA bi ha ru sa sa ra ra ni ma hu pa te tse bi dzi a ka ma hA ma nu ba a na mA~M la// mi khaM me ho tshaM bi sa ma
108b5(rgyud): na ra na pan tsa/ bi b+ha u ra u mo e tsA rA dz+nyA tu na Ni/ a po ta dze g+hu su ra na ban te ta ra ra na pra ki pu da/ pu ran da ra da ru a tsha du ka ri sam bu sa ta/ di so na ga ma la/ a sa na tsa ma raM i ba na/ a bya ni na ta ra sa te ha ru bya ha ro na
108b6(rgyud): ma pu ka re dza ya dza ya badz+ra satwa trai ling gra daM da ma ma/ de nas dpa' bo'i mchod pa la sogs bya/ phyogs brgyad la sogs bkris nas ni// gdan rnams rab tu ldan par sbyin// rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gnas// 
108b7(rgyud): gnyis sum yang na gcig gi gdon// de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mkhyud dang 'o byed nu ma 'chir// dgod pas rdo rje dril bu ni// rdo rje nyid kyis bzung bya zhing // dri kun rjes su dbul bar bya// me tog gis ni
108b8(rgyud): kun nas mchod/ bdug pas kun nas bdug pa dang // me tog thams cad dbul bar bya// sngon du gtor ma thams cad dang // thams cad phud na phul ba dang // lcags kyu'i dngos po sna tshogs dang // khyad par du ni
109a1(rgyud): @rnam lnga'o// gnyis med gnyis med de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor pa yis kun nas brtsam// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i rang bzhin lus// rnal 'byor pa yi nges byas nas// bdud rtsi lnga yis
109a2(rgyud): bkang ba yi// mchog tu brtson pas zla bas dbul// sngon du gsungs pa de nyid kyis// sngags bstod nas ni sbyar bar bya// gnas gsum du ni nges byas nas// phyis ni dpa' bo la ni dbul// dam tshig spyod par
109a3(rgyud): ldan pa yis/ tshigs bcad kyis ni blang bar bya// kun nas gtsang sbra rab tu bya// thams cad rang 'dod byin brlabs pas// bkra shis glu yi rnam pa bya// yongs su dag pa'i dpa' bo yos// dam tshig yod du
109a4(rgyud): 'ong ba la rin chen 'byung ba'i rigs mchog la// nyin ra bzhin du lan drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bgyi// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad ma chen po'i rigs dag la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa
109a5(rgyud): gsum/ dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// sdom pa thams cad dang ldan pa// ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa'i las// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la de bzhin nyid du so sor bzung // bla na med pa'i byang chub seMs/ 
109a6(rgyud): mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas ni// sems can thams cad don byed phyir// sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi// ma bsgral pa ni bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis grol// dbugs ma phyin rnams
109a7(rgyud): dbugs dbyung ste/ sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu 'byung // lam khyed lam nas gang 'gro ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid du grub par shog
109a8(rgyud): sta gon sngon du ci rigs par// dam po'i chos ni bstan par bya// bsam pa rdzogs pa'i slob ma la// phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon dang gnas dang // bsam gtan la sogs rab brtson// 
109b1(rgyud): pas/ rdo rje dril bu srogs glu yis// yang na glu yi rnam pa bya/ ha ra so ra ma ku ta kri Ti Ni Ni su ta ra tsa na su kadra da su ni ba ha bi ta ka to drad d+he ha da ra/ dza li ta ya ra la na dza la gu tod ga la pad ma su ka so ha/ oM l+la badz+ra satwa badz+ra pa ra
109b2(rgyud): me tsa ra ba ra me sa dang / lha rnams rab tu tshim byed pa// de nas sprin bsreg la sogs brtsom// dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar phyogs dang // byang dang de bzhin nub du ni// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// kha khyer 'bar bas brtsam
109b3(rgyud): par bya// bzhi dang phyed bcas gnyis kyis mnan// gru bzhi de nyid kun du rdzogs// kha khyer gyi ni gsum pa yi// cha gnyis su ni bgo bar bya// de nyid kyi ni bzhi che yis// kha ran du yang rab tu bya// kha ran dbus kyi 'og tu ni
109b4(rgyud): de 'og pad ma mdab ma brgyad// sngon bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya yis// khyad par du ni sbyang bar bya// dra ba dra ba phur bu yang // gong dang gong bzhin rab tu sbyar// mchod sbyin bsrubs las byung ba'o// de yis me yis rnam
109b5(rgyud): par brtag/ yam shing 'o ma spyan lnga sogs// 'o mas byug cing bsgreng bar bya// 'o mo zho dang sbrang rtsi mar// sa li bza' bar ldan pa dang // thams cad kun nas 'bru yis ni// che gar ldan pas sngon bzhin bsreg/ kun nas
109b6(rgyud): me yi de nyid ni// rab tu brtag cing dpyad pa'o// me tog bdug sogs byug pas ni// me 'bar ba la rab tu mchod// de bzhin dbus ma pad ma'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i lha// lha rnams kun nas spyan drangs nas// de yi dbus
109b7(rgyud): su thim par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gzugs kun rdzogs pa'i sems can bcas// sngags dang phyag rgya kun rig pas// sngon bzhin dngos pos mchod par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya gong gsungs bzhin// 
109b8(rgyud): de nyid rig pas mchod par bya// bsreg blugs kun nas dbul ba'i sa// lha rnams rab tu tshim par bya// oM saR+Ye shro ta ni hU~M phaT/ gsang ba thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang por yam shing sngon 'gro bas
110a1(rgyud): @gnyis par mar dang ldan par dbul// sbrang rtsi mar dang 'o mar bsres// de bzhin 'bru rnams thams cad ni// gsum par bsregs par brtags pa'o// bzhi par 'o ma'i thug pa dang // sa li bza' ba'o// 
110a2(rgyud): ma'i bar/ dkyil 'khor mdun du bsreg par bya// gal te 'byor na lhag pa ru// de nyid lnga brgyar mchod par bya// ji ltar nus pa'i sbyin bsreg gis// lha rnams kun du tshim par bya// phye nis mar dang 'o ma yis// 
110a3(rgyud): zhal dang lce la sbyin bsreg dbul// slar yang de bzhin mchod pa yis// yam shing dang ni ldan par dbul// mar dang sbrang rtsi dngar ldan pas// dgang blugs su ni rab tu brtag/ rdo rje dal bur mngon sgrags nas/ 
110a4(rgyud): glu ni blang bar bya// hUM hUM hUM sriSh+Ti ta bi dza da ra ye/ ne rad na ye ma yo ga ge da bA ka/ sa mA na yo gra nu ma naM/ oM d+ha na a ti pa ta li sruM swA hA/ nub phyogs su gter ma sbyin pa'o// de ltar mtshan nyid mtshan pa yis// rdo rje rkang pas
110a5(rgyud): mnan nas ni// gsum pa yis ni dbus gsum du// dmar po khrag gis rdzas kyis ni// gru gsum dkyil 'khor du ni dgod// dmar po me tog spros sogs kyis// rgyas pa'i gtor mar yang dag ldan// skam po'i
110a6(rgyud): sha dang nya dang ni// sgog skya dang ni khrag gi snod// til gyi khu ba sran chan dang // sna tshogs bza' ba ston mo dang // bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// lho phyogs su ni gtor ma sbyin// pa ta ha ni lan gsum brdung // sngon gyi phyag
110a7(rgyud): rgyas kun nas dgug/ oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri dang brag dang phug gi sa// yul gyi mdo dang lam dang zhing // khyad par du ni khyim stong la// snod dang tha dad sa steng dang // khyad par gdol pa'i khyim gnas pa
110a8(rgyud): nag po drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin ma rungs bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs byed 'jigs byed pa// dga' las 'das pa'i bgegs rgyal po// rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang // 'jigs byed ma dang u mas bstod// 
110b1(rgyud): rgyal mo rnam par rgyal mo dang // thub byed gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo// nag mo nag mo rnal 'byor ma// dga' byed ma dang za ba ma// drag mo sdang ba'i lam pa ki/ 'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma// 'joms
110b2(rgyud): byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag po'i gzugs dang gzugs chen po// mche ba gtsigs pa thod can ma// thod phreng thod pa'i phreng can ma// kha T+wAM ka ma rdzu 'phrul che// ral gri dgra sta'i lag pa dang // rdo rje de bzhin gzhu lag
110b3(rgyud): dang mkha' 'gro lnga yi de nyid che// las kun rjes su bsgrub byed pa'i// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po che// rdo rje dbang phyug de bzhin gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// gos med sbyor bar bskyed byed ma// rdo rje dbang
110b4(rgyud): phyag ma bka' yis// spyan drang phyag rgya de nyid las// thams cad ga hU~M bskong ba'o// oM kak+ShA ka ha na ba ba dan da na/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ka kha kha khA drA na hA hUM hUM phaT phaT dza sAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur dam
110b5(rgyud): bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// sa gdugs kyis ni pad me dkri// dkar po gi haM sbrel byas nas// oM TaSh+Ti hUM bak+Sha dz+nyA phaT swA hA/ lho phyogs kyi gtor mo'i// gnas brgyad dang ni nye bar ni// kun
110b6(rgyud): nas phyogs dang gnas su yang // pa ta ho ni lan gsum gdab// rdo rje dril bu mngon par bsgrags// de nas skra gon cho ga ni// shar dang byang du slob mA ni// rgyal mtshan dang ni rgyal mtshan nyid// sna tshogs na
110b7(rgyud): bza' rab tu sbyangs// sna tshogs mchod pa kun nas sbyar// seng ge'i gdan ni rab tu brtag/ 'byor na gzhan gyi dpa' bo dang // ma 'byor na ni bdag nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa' sngon sbyor bas// rgyan kun
110b8(rgyud): gyis ni rab tu brgyan// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// slob ma mdun du bkug nas ni// mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i// so shong la sogs bza' ba sbyin// oM a dzi pa paM bar d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ lan bdun
111a1(rgyud): yongs su bzlas nas ni// slob ma kuHldan par sbyin// 'bad pas chu la bzlas nas ni// kha ni kun nas sbyang ba'o// mi bskyod pa dang rin chen mchog/ snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub// kun nas
111a2(rgyud): bdag la dgongs su gsol// sangs rgyas bang chub sems dpa' kun// che ge mo zhes bya ba bdag/ dus 'di nye bar bzung nas ni// byang chub snying po thob pa'i brda// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// mchog tu bdag
111a3(rgyud): gis bskyed par bgyi// ji ltar des gsum mgon po yas// byang chub tu na nges byas shing // tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos na bsdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// so
111a4(rgyud): sor bdag gis brtan por bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog/ sdom pa sangs rgyas 'byor skyes pa// dang por di ring bzung bar bgyi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ so
111a5(rgyud): sor de bzhin nyid du bzung // rin po che'i rigs mchog la// slob dpon nyid du bzung bar bgyi// nyi ma sa la brkyang nas ni// nan tan gyis ni sngags brjod pa// oM g+ha tsha g+ha tsha sa b+ha ba naM hUM swA hA/ dbus kyi lha thams
111a6(rgyud): cad gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM g+ha tsha g+ha tsha su ra na g+ha ma na ya hUM phaT swA hA/ se gol lan gsum brdabs la/ 'jig rten gyi lha rnams gshegs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM
111a7(rgyud): g+hi lA g+hi li na ta hUM ba swA hA/ rdul tshon bsdu ba'i sngags kyi rdul tshon 'bad pas bsdus la chu bo chen por rab tu bsgyur bar bya'o// gtor ma'i lhag ma'i khyad par ni// bzhi mdo ru ldan par sbyin// oM hi li hi li
111a8(rgyud): phru le pheM pheM swA hA/ lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so// bza' ba btung ba lnga sogs kyis// slar yang mchod pa'i rnam pa bya// de yi gnas dang gnas su ni// ser po'i tshon gyi rnam pa ni// mdab ma brgyad
111b1(rgyud): pas rnam par brgyan// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// gnyis med mchod pa rab tu sbyar// slob ma grogs dang lhan cig tu// bkra shis glu blang gar bya zhing // rgyas pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// ji ltar rnal 'byor
111b2(rgyud): nam mkha' ni// de bzhin mnga' bdag rnam snang mdzad// ji ltar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin 'phags ma sgrol ma'o// ji ltar drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin lha mo gos dkar mo// ji ltar ro langs mkha' 'gro ma/ 
111b3(rgyud): de bzhin du ni sgrol ma dang // ji ltar gtum me'i mkha' 'gro ma// de bzhin du ni mA ma ki/ grub pa'i pho nya ma bzhi ni// lus ni lus las yang dag 'byung // dag pa'i zhing dang zhing sa la// khyad par du ni sbyin pa btang // dmang
111b4(rgyud): rigs stong phrag gcig dang ni// bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang sbyar// bram ze stong phrag gcig dag ni// dge slong gcig dang rab tu sbyar// dge slong stong phrag gnyis dang ni// rgyal po gcig dang yang dag sbyar// rgyal po
111b5(rgyud): steng phrag brgya dang ni// ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar// ye shes ldan pa stong dag ni// slob dpon gcig dang rtag par sbyar// de dog dag tsang dag pa'i zhing // gang byin sbyin pa ldan par dbul// gtong po'i chos kyi gzhi
111b6(rgyud): yin pas/ dag pa'i zhing la sa bon gdab// mtshams med lnga yi las can yang // tshen rtsi mthong bas grol bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor zhugs dang dbang bskur bso// gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// sbyin bdag
111b7(rgyud): las mkhan rnal 'byor pas// byang chub rim pa myur du thob// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// stong phrag bcu gnyis rgya chen las// gdan gnyis kyi ni gnyis pa las// dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong nas ni// rigs pa'i
111b8(rgyud): de yi snying po ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa yin// dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o rdzogs s+ho// / 
112a1(rgyud): #// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI na ma sang gI ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
112a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// pad ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan// pod ma
112a3(rgyud): rgyas 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba// rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang da gsor byed pa// khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs// lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba // 'jigs su rung
112a4(rgyud): dang dpa' byad can// rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi las sre gsor byed pa// snying rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs
112a5(rgyud): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// 
112a6(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la smin pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod// nyon mongs pas ni
112a7(rgyud): sems dkrugs shing // mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshig chen po
112a8(rgyud): de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor che ga gi bdag/ ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// mang ni yang dag brjod pa'i
112b1(rgyud): mchog/ don dang don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rangab zhi pa// thog ma par dang mthar dge ba// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs
112b2(rgyud): rgyas/ yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang // rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams kyi dga' bzhin du// glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// mgon po rdzogs sangs
112b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'chir ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir// nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di// bdag gi bsam pa brtan pos bzung // rton pos malus pa da drim dus su ma phyir// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// sems can rnams la
112b4(rgyud): bshad par 'tshal// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang
112b5(rgyud): gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba// ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad po ste// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar
112b6(rgyud): byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// snying rje dang ldan gyur pas// 'gro la phan pa'i don
112b7(rgyud): du khyod/ ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi// ming brjod pas ni don che ba// dag par byed cing sngag sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// gsang ba'i bdag
112b8(rgyud): po'i phyir ngas// khyod la legs par bstan par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // gsang sngags
113a1(rgyud): @#/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs tshon dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // rigs chen gtsug
113a2(rgyud): tor cher gzigs nas// tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // ma skye'i chos can 'di gsungs pa// a A/ i I/ u A/ e ai/ oM au/ aM aH
113a3(rgyud): s+thi to hr-i di/ dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ t+ye d+hA brti ta nAM/ oM badz+ra tik+Sha pu khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ lA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa nA ya/ te na moH/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a
113a4(rgyud): las byung a ni yi ge 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po
113a5(rgyud): 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po
113a6(rgyud): dgra che ba/ mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa tham cad sel bar byed// mchod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba
113a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste// nyon mongs chen po'i lcags kyu mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang/ 
113a8(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po'i mig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po// 
113b1(rgyud): brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin// bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje
113b2(rgyud): chen po'i blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// 
113b3(rgyud): srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul tshe// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ theg chen po'i tshul
113b4(rgyud): la gnas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mcheg/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pa
113b5(rgyud): rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// mgon pa sa bcu dbang phyug ste// sa bcu la ni gnas pa po// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam
113b6(rgyud): pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// 
113b7(rgyud): ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyisu med dang gnyis med ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun du 'gro ba'i don yod stobs// de bzhin
113b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor lo bsgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste/ 
114a1(rgyud): tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden pa dang bden par smra// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // 'dren
114a2(rgyud): pa rang rgyal bas ru'i tshul// nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob// bsil bar
114a3(rgyud): gyur pas rnyog pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bde ba gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa// bya ba byas pa skam
114a4(rgyud): sar gnas/ shes pa 'ba' zhig nges gsal ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs
114a5(rgyud): pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub bsam pa grub pa ste// kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shis// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes
114a6(rgyud): ye shes 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshogs gnyis tshegs ni bsags pa po// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag/ so so rang rig mi g.yo ba// mchog gi
114a7(rgyud): dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can ka khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang // sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa po// sangs
114a8(rgyud): rgyas sras po dam pa mchog/ shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med// chos las 'byung ba srid ba sel// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang 'byung ba// 
114b1(rgyud): shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam ma pa// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// gsang sngags
114b2(rgyud): rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can bskyed pa po// mchod
114b3(rgyud): cing brjed pa drang srong che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang // dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par
114b4(rgyud): rgyal 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhugs// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// hA la hA
114b5(rgyud): la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i snying // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag// rdo rje'i snying po mkha' 'dra ba// maM/ 
114b6(rgyud): g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa// hi hI zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad mo chen mo gad rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo tshor sgrogs pa// rdo rje sa sa
114b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' cha// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje drag po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs pa// mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa// rdo rje'i ral gris ma lus gtsad// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje
114b8(rgyud): gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar bas mig mi bzad// sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can// rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus// 
115a1(rgyud): @sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje snying po lpags pa mkhregs// rdo rje'i phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs swA ha nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i
115a2(rgyud): ste/ 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ga// 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa// nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dge mtha' skye
115a3(rgyud): yi ge med/ stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya chu sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan// chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che// ma gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med
115a4(rgyud): gzugs bzang dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// tshugs pa med cing che bar grags// khams gsum
115a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin du mtho la gnas// dar ba chen po chos kyi rtog/ 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig/ gnas brtan rgan po skye rgu'i bdag/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang
