115a6(rgyud): ba/ sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten shas legs slob dpon te// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyobs 'jig rten yid gcugs pa// skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med// nam
115a7(rgyud): mkha'i mtha' la long spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho// ma rig sgong nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// 
115a8(rgyud): ye shes dbang bskur cid pan can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// mkha'
115b1(rgyud): ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sems can kun gyi glu chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba/ 
115b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// 
115b3(rgyud): phan 'dod sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang dran shes shing dus shes la// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan
115b4(rgyud): zhing yon tan shes// chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' dron che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ 
115b5(rgyud): bkur bsti rim gro phun sum tshogs// mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// 'jigs chen dgra ste rab kyi mchog / 'jigs
115b6(rgyud): pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo tsAn// ral pa muny+dza tsad pan thogs// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa// tshungs par
115b7(rgyud): spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che// gtsang gnas dam pa go ta ma// bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes// mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob// grol pa thar pa rnam grol lus/ 
115b8(rgyud): rnam grol zho ba zhi ba nyid// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa// chags bral lus las 'das pa po// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// mi mngon
116a1(rgyud): / mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra zhing zag med sa bon no// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin
116a2(rgyud): du sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rog dam pa po// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum
116a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug sku
116a4(rgyud): ba che/ smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med// kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ba blta na stug/ 'od bzang 'bor ba
116a5(rgyud): dpal gyi be'u// lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug du 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nad do cog gi dgra che ba// stug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi
116a6(rgyud): mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par// chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs// 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang
116a7(rgyud): snang rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad ma gar gyi bdag khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba// sangs rgyas kun
116a8(rgyud): gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ 
116b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags
116b2(rgyud): bral la sogs chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil dkrungs rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad ma skyes// kun mkhyen
116b3(rgyud): ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// 
116b4(rgyud): mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo dzi na jig/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag
116b5(rgyud): ye shes zla 'od bzang // brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dA ba ste// rgyud kun gyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje'i gdan na mi lus ldan// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang / kun du bzang po blo gros bzang // sa
116b6(rgyud): yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chad// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos te sna tshogs
116b7(rgyud): don/ chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chad// chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog 'byung po'i mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang
116b8(rgyud): ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// 
117a1(rgyud): @mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo
117a2(rgyud): ldan sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan// brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya po kun skyod cing // gom pa'i stabs kyi gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha'
117a3(rgyud): khyab par gar byed pa// sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon// rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon// rkang 'theb sen mo'i khyon gyis bkyang // tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// don gcig gnyis
117a4(rgyud): med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don ni 'jig pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'// stong pa nyid dga' 'dod
117a5(rgyud): chags blo/ sred pa'i 'dod chags stsogs spangs pa// srid gsum dga' ba chen po ste// sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char kha'i dkyil ltar
117a6(rgyud): mdzes sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar// cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse// skra mchog mthon ka chen po can// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig
117a7(rgyud): rten khams brgya kun skyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa bzhin po'i ting 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog spos// de bzhin gshegs
117a8(rgyud): pa'i yon tan mche// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig pa// yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid
117b1(rgyud): la 'jug/ sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// nges
117b2(rgyud): 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas// nges 'byung ba kun gyi lam la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa
117b3(rgyud): bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam
117b4(rgyud): par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku// bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna
117b5(rgyud): tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs khyams rnams dag pa'i bdag/ las kyi
117b6(rgyud): khams rnams zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes
117b7(rgyud): rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing // rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed// sems can kun yid yul dang ldan// sems can kun gyi yid rig
117b8(rgyud): pa/ sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang 'thun par 'jug/ sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nor
118a1(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tsom med pa'i glo/ kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ phung po lnga don dus gsum du// skad cig thams cad bye brag
118a2(rgyud): phyed skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' na rtogs pa pa// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du
118a3(rgyud): ston/ nor bu chen po rin chen rtog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags las byung yi ge med// gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang
118a4(rgyud): sngags don kun bskyed pa po// thig le chen po yi ga med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thigri le skong pa yi ge brgya// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// yan lag med
118a5(rgyud): pa'i rtsis las 'das// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can// bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs
118a6(rgyud): sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha dang lha dbang lha yi lha// lha
118a7(rgyud): yi bdag po lha min bdag/ 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla// 'joms byed 'joms byed dbang phyug po// srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba// ston pa gcig pa 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur
118a8(rgyud): rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi na ya lad bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngas lo// dpa'
118b1(rgyud): bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag
118b2(rgyud): tu ri mer bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os brjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rag/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig
118b3(rgyud): gtsang mo dag pa ste// mngon shes drag ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyis
118b4(rgyud): ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la phan pa gang zag mchog/ dper bya kun las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste// phyag
118b5(rgyud): rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum ni bskal bzong che// dpal
118b6(rgyud): ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas
118b7(rgyud): byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas
118b8(rgyud): 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas
119a1(rgyud): 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba ston khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la
119a2(rgyud): 'dud/ thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// / lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
119a3(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi sku// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa yin te// khyod kyis dga' ba dang // dang ba dang / mgu ba chen
119a4(rgyud): po bla na med pa skyed pa dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba yongs su dag par bya ba dang // yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang // yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang // pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
119a5(rgyud): bsod nams dang // ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag par bya ba dang // / bla na med pa'i don ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang // ma thob pa thob par bya
119a6(rgyud): ba nas/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul// yang dag par gzung ba'i bar gyi phyir// / ngas bshad cing bstan te// bkrol cing rnam par phye la
119a7(rgyud): gsal bar byas so// byin gyis brlab par yang bya'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la yang gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis
119a8(rgyud): brlabs so// / lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // gzhan yang ming dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba shin du
119b1(rgyud): yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// bde gshegs pa
119b2(rgyud): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa thugs su chud pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par mdzad pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams
119b3(rgyud): cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa po// byang
119b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang // ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dri ma med cing shin du rnam dag pa'i skye gnas so// nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams
119b5(rgyud): cad kyi zhing ngo // lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o// theg pa chen po'i gzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyi 'byung khungs so// 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyi
119b6(rgyud): mtha'o// rnam par grol ba rnams brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam skye ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab
119b7(rgyud): tu 'phel ba'o// pha rol phyin gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i stobs kyi dpung dang sde pham par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad
119b8(rgyud): yang dag par bsdud pa'o// nges par 'byung ba bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to// sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi/ 
120a1(rgyud): bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba la brtson pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// kun du sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon
120a2(rgyud): mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o// rdzas thams cad las thar pa'o// sems kyi g.yeng ba thams cad zhi ba'o// 
120a3(rgyud): 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad sel ba'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la
120a4(rgyud): mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'
120a5(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
120a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med par so sor rtogs par mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'o// pha rol du
120a7(rgyud): phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
120a8(rgyud): rnams sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o// ming yang dag par brjed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / 
120b1(rgyud): gzhan yang ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun du spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam
120b2(rgyud): par spong ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mkhom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad
120b3(rgyud): rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par 'jigs par byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o// brdangs dang bgegs thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// 
120b4(rgyud): bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du spong bar byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags
120b5(rgyud): pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus por 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi bskyod par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
120b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgya dang gsang
120b7(rgyud): sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad
120b8(rgyud): med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su
121a1(rgyud): bcad pa dang / bstod pa grags par byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// shin du dag pa rnams kyi yang shin dag pa'o// shan
121a2(rgyud): du dag byed rnams kyi yang shin du dag byed do// shin du 'byor ldan rnamos kyi yang shin du 'byor ldan no// shin du bkra shis pa rnams kyi yang shin du bkra shos pa'o// skyangs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs
121a3(rgyud): so/ gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo // 'khra sa med pa rnams kyi 'khru/ 
121a4(rgyud): sa bla na med pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro ba rnams kyi grwa'o// nad thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po'o// blang ba dang dor ba'i dngos po'i bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab nyid do// 
121a5(rgyud): lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu
121a6(rgyud): lta bu'o// 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o// zang zing dang / 
121a7(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o// bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa
121a8(rgyud): bcu thob pa'o// chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do// sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang // gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// 
121b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir// yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i tshad tshang brgya stong ma lus par sel ba'i phyir// rnam pa thams
121b2(rgyud): cad rnam pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don gyi ming yang dag par 'dzin pa ston pa'i phyir// chos thams cad
121b3(rgyud): brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// / lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la las/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam
121b4(rgyud): dpal ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa/ ming ni gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams
121b5(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med par chags su bcad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis/ nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang / klog
121b6(rgyud): pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam
121b7(rgyud): dpal ye shes kyi sku l-i dmigs te/ kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang / chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog/ rnyog pa med pa'i dad pa dang ldan bzhin pa dang / mos pa dang
121b8(rgyud): de kho na nyid yid la byed pas/ sems rtse gcig tu sgom pa de la ni/ dus gsum gyi dus med pa dang / ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas/ chos kyi
122a1(rgyud): @#/ sgo thams cad ston par mdzad dengo sku yang ston to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad kyis de'i
122a2(rgyud): rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phan gdags pas kyang phan 'dogs paro mdzad do// chos thams cad le mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang sgrub par
122a3(rgyud): mdzad do/ dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la 'dzin pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang nye bar ston par byed do// ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i khro bo'i rgyal
122a4(rgyud): po chen po rnams dang / rdo rje 'chung chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa rnams kyang sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyis mdangs dang stobs dang / gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa dang / gsang sngags
122a5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed do// gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ma lus pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi dgra dang / phyir bzlo/ 
122a6(rgyud): pa dang gzhan gyis ma thub pa chen po thams cad kyang / nyin mtshan phyed par skad cig ra ra la spyod lam thams cad du bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sprad pa byed do// tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang nye dbang po dang / drag po dang / 
122a7(rgyud): tshan po che dang / kun 'ged gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / smin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku ba ra dang / 'phrog ma dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig
122a8(rgyud): rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang / rtag tu rgyuni mi 'chad par nyin mtshan phyed par 'gro yang rung / 'greng yang rung 'dog kyang rung / nyal yang rung gnyid lag kyang rung / ma log kyang rung ba na bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang / 
122b1(rgyud): spyod pa byed do/ mnyam par gzhag kyang rung mnyam par ma gnag kyang rung / gcig pur 'dug kyang rung / skye bo mang po'i ning na 'dug kyang rung / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i
122b2(rgyud): pho brang na 'dug kyang rung / sgo dang sgo khang dang / khri la ma dang srang dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang / grong bar dang tshong khang na 'dug kyang rung / khang stong dang ri dang / chu klung dang tshal dang / nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung gtsang
122b3(rgyud): sgra ma byas pa dang / ra ro ba dang / bag med par 'dug kyang rung ste/ rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du ci'i sgo nas kyang / mchog tu bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa byed do// nyin mtshan du yang mchog tu bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// 
122b4(rgyud): gang yong lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / gzhan dag dang gza' dang / rgyu skar dang ma mo rnams dang / tshogs kyi
122b5(rgyud): bdag mo gzhan dag dang / ma mo bdun po gang yin pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / sha za mo gang yin pA de dag thams cad kyang / 'du zhing gcig tu 'thun par dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas
122b6(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mdangos stobs dang / gzi brjid mchog kyang de yi lus la 'jug par byed do// nad med pa dang / stabs dang tshe 'phel ba yang sgrub par byed do// lag
122b7(rgyud): na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / gzhan yang ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ gang nyin gcig bzhin du ma nyams par yi dim du lan gsum du kha don du 'don tam/ glegs bam du byas pa klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam
122b8(rgyud): dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs yid la dmigs shing / gzugs dang 'thun par sems te/ de'i gzugs dang 'thun par bsam gtan du byed pas ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring po mi thogs par de nyid kyi
123a1(rgyud): sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa dag kyang man/ 
123a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de ni nam yang ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mthu' 'khob tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur
123a3(rgyud): dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba dang / lta ba ngan pa'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bzhugs na yang des
123a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// lha tshwa rings po'i nang du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang nad dang / mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa'i nang du yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// skyigs ma lnga'i dus su
123a5(rgyud): yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang dgra dang / chom rkun gyi ni 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// cis kyang dman pa dang / dbul ba'i 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// drings dang / skur pa dang / 
123a6(rgyud): smad pa dang mi snyan pa dang / gtam ngan gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyud dang rus dang / rigs bzang po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes pa dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang ldan/ 
123a7(rgyud): par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams la sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang / 'grogs na bde ba dang / mthong na dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams la mdzes pa dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang rlig rtsan pa
123a8(rgyud): yang 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang dar yang tsha rabs dran par 'gyuraro// longs spyod kyi gzhi che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod kyi gzhi mi zad pa dang / 'khor mi zad par yang 'gyur ro// sems
123b1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi mchog dngapa yon tan mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyuraro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa da
123b2(rgyud): bzhin dang thabs dang stobs dang / smon lam dang ye shes dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang / sgra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// ma blun pa dang / tshig gsal ba dang sprin byor
123b3(rgyud): yang 'gyur ro// shes nyan can dang le lo med pa dang / chog shes pa dang nor mang ba dang / sred pa med par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang bla mar yang
123b4(rgyud): bkur bar 'gyu ro// des sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang / sgyu rtsal dang / mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang yi ge'i sgo nas shes par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang 'tshe ba dang kun du spyod
123b5(rgyud): pa shin du yongs su dag par spyod pa dang / legs par byung ba dang / lags par bsnyen pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom po
123b6(rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa la nam yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan dag
123b7(rgyud): dang yang ldan par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dron dam pa yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags shing / sangs rgyas
123b8(rgyud): kyi yon tan rnams shin du myur du bsgrubs nas/ ring po ma thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa mang por yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i/ 
124a1(rgyud): chos su mi 'gyur bar/ sems can thams cad la bla na med pa'i chos ston pa dang / phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra chen po rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// 
124a2(rgyud): oM saR+Wa d+harmA a b+hA ba/ sA b+hA ba bi shudad+ha badz+ra a a/ aM a pra kri ti pa ri shud+d+ha saR+Wa d+harma ya duta/ sauR+Wa ta thA ga te/ dz+nyA na ka ya many+dzu shrI/ be ri shud+d+hi tAM/ mu pA da ya ti A a oM saR+Wa ta thA ga tA hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra a hUM
124a3(rgyud): hrI b+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUr t+ti/ wI gI sha ra me hA bA tsa/ sar+b+ba d+harma ga ga na/ a ma lA~M su pa ri shud d+hi/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon po
124a4(rgyud): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// do ni mgon po gsang ba'i b+hadage/ lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu// gsang bstod nas na tshig 'di gso/ 
124a5(rgyud): mgon po bdag cag yid rang ngo // legs so legs so legs par gsungs// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don
124a6(rgyud): chen mdzad/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// 'di ni rnam dug lpags pa'i lam// zab cing yang sa la rgya che ste// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
124a7(rgyud): kun gyis bshad// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzog s+ho// / 
124a8(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ka la tsakral gu tan tra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad
124b1(rgyud): mkhyen dang ye shes sku dang nyi ma'i sku ste pad ma'i mdab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan/ sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs phyir lha yi mchog gis phyag 'tshal ba dang zla ba bzang po yis// spyi bos btud tu
124b2(rgyud): lag pa'i pad mthal mo sbyar nas yan lag mchog la rab tu bzhag nas zhus// a sogs ka sogs 'dus pas dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor mi rnams grol ba'i rgyu ru'o// stong pa dang ni ye shes thig le rdo rje/ 
124b3(rgyud): mchog 'dzin sangs rgyas lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang gzhan la rang bzhin rnams dang skyes bu nyid shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang // lus la sna tshogs pa yi tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi spros pa lha dang lha
124b4(rgyud): min bza' ba dang // dkyil 'khor dbang dag de lta bu rnams thams cad lha dang mi yi bla mas yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang po bdag dregs de ni rab mchog lha dang mi drang srin po lha ma ya ni dang klu// gang zhig
124b5(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba rnams dang mchog gi drang srong rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa la sogs pa'i// 'dzin pa'i mthar thug khyod kyis zhus pa de mi shes pas tshig gi gnas ldan lus dbus ma lus pa// dkyil 'khor
124b6(rgyud): dag ni dbang dag rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par bshad par bya yi sau mi bdag shin du nyon// dus kyis stong pa rnams las rlung dang ma dang chu dang sa dang gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// rgyu skar rnams dang nyi zla skar ma gza'
124b7(rgyud): tshegs drang srong rnams dang lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // byol song skye ba rnam bzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang sa 'og dag la mi dang dmyal po'i rnams// chu las tshwa 'byung bzhin du sgo nga las kyang yin te stong pa las ni 'byung
124b8(rgyud): ba nyid rnams bskyed// sku dang ye shes nam mkha' ngas par rlung dang ma dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang skye 'gro dang // mi mthong ba yi lha nyid skye ba rnams dang gnas ni rnam pa bcu ru brjod pa rdo rje'i sku// yang dag 'byung ba'i
125a1(rgyud): sngags kyi skye gnas yin te 'di nyid slar log pu las 'jig rten mi bdag kye// de ltar gang gi yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs ma yin te sems kyi rnam rtog grol ba'o// g.yon pa'i yan lag
125a2(rgyud): lani dkar po'i 'od zer skye 'gro'i bdud rtsi'i cha ste g.yas su kha dog dmor// sgra gcan dus me zla nyi zla ba'i bu dang mig dmar dag ste pa wa songs dang phur bu dang // 'jug rings spen pa drag dang char dang rdo rje dang ni chu
125a3(rgyud): dang ma ste bdun zung 'jig rten du/ mun pa bral ba'i yod pa'i zung cig mun pa'i mtha' ma rnams la nges par 'od zer 'bar ba rnams// skar ma rnams ni gzhu dang sa ge nyis dbye bas de rnams bzhi ste srog gi mi
125a4(rgyud): nirlung gcig la/ rnam pa bcu ni stong dang 'og dang shar dang nub kyi phyogs su gnag dang ser ba rnams su 'gyur// dbus su rdo rje steng du sa bon de nyid nus pa 'og ni yon tan tshogs ldan yang dag gnas/ kun gyi steng
125a5(rgyud): dusteng dang ya shes zhi ba'i tshig ldan dngos rnams thams cad kyis ni rnam par grol// a sogs gang zhig ha y+ra ra wa lar ldan dbyangs rnams sum bcud rnams zla ba nyi ma'i cha ka sogs snga tshan dbyangs dang
125a6(rgyud): bcas rnams nyi ma rgyu ba stong pa dang ni drug dang ma rnams kyis// ha sogs dbyangs rnams dang ni lha dang mi dang gdangs ka rnams dang 'byung po'i skye gnas sngags rnams kyis// de ltar a sogs ka sogs ldan pa
125a7(rgyud): yin ta nges par rgyal po khams gsum skye bar 'gyur ba'o// dbyangs rnams ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan ka sogs yang dag sbyor ba rnams kyi skye gnas mgrin pa dang // rkan dang spyi bo'i cha dang mchu dang so las skye ste nam mkhan
125a8(rgyud): rlung ma chu dang sa yang ngo // a sogs gtsug gtor 'khor lo dang ni snying kha mgrin pa mgo dang lte ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa yis// sna tshogs gnag dang dmar dang ri bong can dang ser rnams kyis ni phung po khams
125b1(rgyud): rnams lhag pa'i lha/ rlung gi mtha' nas lhun dro'i dbus la dmyal bu klu'i grong khyer dag la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// ri rab lhun po 'bum gyi tshad ste gza' tshogs gnas la stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ mgrinapa
125b2(rgyud): nyid dang gdong la lnga bcu mi g.yo'i gnase la nges par nyi shu rtsa lnga de bzhin no// de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med pa de nyid dman pa'o// rlung gi mthu' nas rlung gi 'tsham su brtan par
125b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i steng du gling dreng ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// gzhi yi phye la 'bum phrag gnyis sti me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// de steng dbus kyi ri rab lhun po la ni nyi khyim 'khor lo
125b4(rgyud): bskor mar bcas pa nyin mtshan 'khor// phyogs rnams drug tu 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag du sa sbyor las ni rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams rnams ma lus kun la zhing la sum 'gyur/ 
125b5(rgyud): mtha' sgor rnams kyi tshad la yin pa las// sa yi mtha' bskor la ni 'bum phrag gsum snga chu mu rlung la drug dgu nyi rnams rim pa yis// gang zhig phyi rol du ni sred gsum gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig ste/ 
125b6(rgyud): lus po nyid la yang // khru gang ba ste sa stangs gnas pa rnams la rang rang tshad ni yang dag yin te ma dbang kye// rdol phran brgyad kyis phra mo gcig ste phra mo 'di brgyad kyis ni skra'i rtse mo'i phra mo dang // nya rdul dang ni shig
125b7(rgyud): dang nas dang sor mo'i lho nyid rnams ste sor tshigs nyi ma zung rnams kyis// khru ste de bzhi rnams kyi gzhul 'di ro ni gzhu ru gyur pa stong phrag rnam pa gnyis kyis ni// rgyang grags 'gyur ste rgyang grags bzhi yis
125b8(rgyud): dpag tshad zhes brjod de yis sarma steng so nam mkha'i tshod// dang por chos bzang skal pa zung dang zung ljon bzhi ste tshangs pa 'jig rten las ni 'das pa'o// dpal gyi skal ba dkar po'i skal pa shin du dbang gyur
126a1(rgyud): srid pa la gnas 'dod pa bcu gcig ste/ gzugs med rnams kyi a la sregs pa bzhi rnams ha 'khrig bral bcu drug ya la sogs pas gzugs// hu sogs mtha' yis 'dod pa gas
126a2(rgyud): par rnam pa bcu sde gsal byed kyi sna gcig ni ka dang Sha/ srid pa sum bcu rtsa gcig kyang ni 'di ru srid pa gsum 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo// de lta bu yi rdo rje sum 'gyur srid gsum mtha' dag
126a3(rgyud): dang na a sogs ka sogs dbyi ba'o// rin chen 'od nas gseg ma'i chu rungs par brjod pa'i dmyal ba'i bye ma'i chu gnyis pa'o// 'dam gyi chu dang bzod // du ba tsha ba dang yang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa'o// tsha dang
126a4(rgyud): chung dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar sti sbrang rtsi rgya mtsho rnams drang ri bdun ni// 'od sngon po dang man d+ha ra po'i rI sta rtsub ldan nor 'od tshad ldan drang ba'i rwa rdo rje// gling rnams zla ba dang ni 'od dkar rab mchog ku shA mi 'am ci
126a5(rgyud): ste khrung dkrung drag po rnams// longs spyodas rnams nyid ste 'dzam gleng bdun pa las kyi sa rnams la ni mi rnams gnas pa'o// shar du klung ni shin du zlum po yin ste mi yi bA dag pa lho ru me ste gru gsum mo// byang du zla
126a6(rgyud): ba phyed pa'i rnam pa chu ste nub tu rgya mtsho'i bdag nyid gser mchog chen po bzhi// stong pa'i rnam pa ri rab lhun po rdo rje'i mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus nyid na// ri rnams dang ni klu rnams gza'o
126a7(rgyud): rnams dang ste phyogs gyur sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong // ri rab lhun po'i steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi'i gnas la nges par dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni// lnga bcu dang ni bcu drug dang ste rab mchogs stangs gcig
126a8(rgyud): gis mtha' skor nyid du yang dag byed// steng du ra rnams lnga po dang ni sa yi steng gi gnas la phyogs rnams kun du khor yug ste// de yi phyi rol du ni gling dang rgya mtsho ri rnams phyogs kun du ni ma dang rlung rnams ste// 
126b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho drug po rnams la stong phrag re re dag las zla dang zla ba gcig rnams kyis dman pa// gling rnams dang ni rigs mchog ri rnams de bzhin stong phrag rnams de stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// 'dzam bu gling rnams kyis ni
126b2(rgyud): rgya rnams dang ste ba tsha'i rgya mtsho 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad rnam so// de bzhin du ni me dang rlung dang srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa'i mthar ni 'di'i tshad rnams so// tshangs pa'i sgo lnga la gnas dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba'i mchog
126b3(rgyud): bcas rnams la lha'i tshogs kyis bstod// ri rab lhun po la ni lha'i 'khor lo yin te sa'i 'og tu gnas pa kha dog lnga'i sbrul// dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun gyi sa wi dkyil 'khor gyur par gnas dang
126b4(rgyud): nye ba'i gnas dag dang // zhing dang 'dun pa dang ni 'dus be che 'do dur khrod rnams ni me dang rlung gi mtha' ru'o// shar du brgya byin me ru ma ste gshi ni rje bde ni bral chu rnams laM ni gshin rje bden bral chu// rlung dang gnod
126b5(rgyud): sbyin dbang ldan rnams la rlung dang nor bdag drag po nyid ste stang cha 'og rnams su// tshangs pa dang ni khyab 'jug mtshon char bcas pa'i g.yog rnams dang ldan rang rang phyogs 'tshams skyong // de rnaMs dbus na dus kyi
126b6(rgyud): 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog ni skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'i 'og dang phyogasu 'khor ba sA'i steng du rgyal bar dka' ba'i lha ma yin rnams phyir// gang du chos ni rnam par zhig par 'khor lo can ste/ 
126b7(rgyud): brtsod ldan dus nyid de dang do ru 'gro/ kla klo'i tshes bcom pa dang 'thub pas rnam par bcad nas rang gi chos lo bkod de sngon du bzhag/ rdzogs ldan dus dang gsum ldan dus ste gnyis ldan dus dang brtsod ldan
126b8(rgyud): dus su gyur pa dus sbyor los// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can ste rab tu zhugs pa rdzogs ldan dus su 'gro ba'o// gsum ldan rgyal po'i rjes dang brtsod ldan sngon du gnyis ldan de nyid gnyis kyi dbus
127a1(rgyud): / gnyis su yang ngo ngo/ spyong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ni ro brgya nges par ldan pa'i lo rnams dus kyi grangs rnams kyi/ gang zhig re re'i tshad la dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba nyid rnams mi rnas kyi
127a2(rgyud): ni lo brgya la/ phra dbugs 'dru dang chu tshod nyi ma d+hA du saM stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ni drug brgya rnams// drug gi ched kyi rim pas prA ba lus las skyes dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang / sa gA ti 'bar du dang ste
127a3(rgyud): sa yi steng du dus rnams sa ga ti'i nyi ma gcig gi ched kyi gnas// dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang la dgod 'khor lo can 'gro nyi ma gcig la bcu gnyis 'byung // zla ba phyed dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni 'tshams dang dus
127a4(rgyud): dang ma dang bgrod pa gnyis rnams dang / rgyal po lo nyid mtha' dag la ni nyin mtshan dus sbyor chu tshod dang ste chu srang ma lus rnams// de lta bu yis 'gro ba lus skyes phra mo nyid dang 'byung po lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang // / 
127a5(rgyud): sag ti drang ni b+hur tu'i nyi ma gcig la srid gsum gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no// 'di yi lo nas drug brgya'i li yis gsal bar grags pa'i rgyal po sham pa la zhes bya bar 'gyur// de nas klu rgya'i lo// 
127a6(rgyud): rnams kyis ni nges par mkha'i yul du kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug/ de'i dus kyis rnams ni bsdus pa'i rtsis ni skad cig gis gsal mdzad par rig par bya// grub mtha' rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa mtha' dag sa yi ste
127a7(rgyud): dus kyi sbyor la 'byung bar 'gyur// me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'dres pa bsres pas kla klo'i lo ni rab tu 'grub// kla klo'i dbang po'i l-i las lag pa gdengs ka ri bong can gyis chad pa'i lhag
127a8(rgyud): ma nyi mis bsgyur// dpyid zla 'bring po la sogs bsres pa'i zla gnas 'og ma'i dus kyis bsgyur nas mkha' ma zla bas dbye// rnyed pa steng du rab tu bcug pa mi yi bdag po zla ba bsdus pa rnam par dag pa'o// gang
127b1(rgyud): zhig zla rna gan gsum 'gyur ba'i dbu ma'i phung por gnas pa lag pa dang ni ma yis bsgyur// rtsa bar drug gis cha thob gyur pas de yi bu lon dbus ma ru ni drag par bya/ stang dang 'og tu mig dang sum bcu nor du byin pas
127b2(rgyud): rab gsal byas nas drug bcu'i cha rnams kyis// thob pa steng du rab tu bcug par gyur pa thub mchog rnams kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma gza'// gnas gnyis la ni nyi ma zla bas bsres pa 'tshams dang nyi mas bgros
127b3(rgyud): ba 'byung bas bsres pa ste// de ni steng gi phung por sbyin la dang por lag pas bsgyur la bsdus pa brgyad dang gnyis kyis bgro/ gnas gsum dbus ma dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og lnga dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis
127b4(rgyud): thob la gnyis bsres pas// dbus su chu bu tshod rnams kyis byugos nas tshogs la gnyis kyis bsgyur sti stang du nor byin pas// ldan pas skar mas rab tu phyir gyur lha gri ma nyi ma'i ska tshogs longs spyod 'gyur
127b5(rgyud): rgyal po kye/ gza' la gza' ni rab tu sbyin ste chu tshod du ni rgyal po gnyis 'gyur 'og bsdus par ni gnyis// sgur mar gnyis dang chu tshod nyid la drag po'i nor rnams byin pas nyi ma'i longs spyod rab tu gsal// de ltar
127b6(rgyud): / zla ba'i nges par spyod pa yang dang yang du zla ba zla bar rab tu sbyin par bstan// chos rnams smin dang 'brid dang yang smon pa yang gardza' dang chu tshod dang ni bsdus pa rnams la s+ho// bsdus pa rgya mtsho zla ba rnams kyis bgos pa
127b7(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa snron 'brid rkang pa'i don// snying pa stong pa rnam par dag ste bcu gsum ri bong can la lnga ste nyi ma mig la phyogs// tshes zhes bya ba bcu gcig ma ste bcu dang rgya mtsho'i rkang par nyi shur
127b8(rgyud): gcig gis ma gang ba// lnga dang bug par nyi shu gnyis te 'tshams dang nor la rgyal ba nyid dang bdun par nye shu lnga// chos kyi chu tshod de rnams nyi ma'i rab tu dbye ba rnams kyis snron dang 'brid par 'gyur ba ste// 
128a1(rgyud): 'byung dang 'byung ba mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can rnams sngon gyi cha dang gzhan la yang // bsdus pa'i cha la rgya mtsho zla ba rnams kyis mnyam dang mi mnyam song bas rgyu la sman dang 'brid/ 'chas
128a2(rgyud): dang nyi ma yis ni cha thob pa yi lhag ma yang dag rgyu ba de bzhin bsgyur bar bya// de nyid nyi ma'i dbye ba nyi ma'i rkang pa chu tshed rnams kyis snron dang 'brid par 'gyur ba ste// tshe sna la rig byed kyis bsgyur de la nor gyis gsal/ 
128a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te da yi gsum gyi cha yis bsra// 'tshams skar rkang pa gsum dang bcas pa bu lon byas pas nyi ma sbyor byed dbus su za ba'o// lhag ma bya ba bkra shis ji bzhin ro dang dus dang ri bong can te dal bya'i rkang pa rnam
128a4(rgyud): chu tshod longs spyod rnams kyis bsgyur nas mda' dang yon tan ri bong can gyi chu thob longs spyod bcas// nyi mor snon pa dang ni 'brid dang bgrod 'gro'i di bang las gzhan du rnam par dag pa yod pa min/ nyi mar dus
128a5(rgyud): dang ro dang rlung dang bcu dang bde byed bde byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug/ mi dang nam mkha' dang ni bgrod pa'i mtha' ru 'gyur te nor dang bu lon byang dang lho phyogs su// zla ba drug la phyed kyis dbye bas nyin me phyed
128a6(rgyud): brgyu ba zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba las// nyi mar tshes byin pa dang slar yang 'og tu ro yis bsgyur te gza yi longs spyod kyis bsres nas// chad par 'gyur ba zla bar 'gyur te mi'i bdag po nyi ma zla ba bsres pa sbyor
128a7(rgyud): ba'ordo mig gis chos la yang dag bsgyur gang ri bong can bral bdun gyi cha yi lhag ma byed par 'gyur// dag pa'i lo la klu bsras mkha' dang nam mkha' rgya mtshos bsgyur ba la ni klu bsras rnams kyis sbyang // ra dang
128a8(rgyud): zla ba ma yis rab tu phyal nam mkha' dang na ros bsgyur chu tshod ri sogs dbye gnyis dang sum bcu gza' dang chu tshod de dag la ngas par 'dir ldan la ni lo 'pho'i zla bar 'gyur// lug las sogs pa gza' dang chu
128b1(rgyud): tshod rim pas yongs su byas pa'i bcu gnyis rnams smon pa ste// zla ba ri 'byung rig byed dag drang yon tan mda' dang ri bong can ri zla rnams gsum par ro// rig byed me dang 'byung ba zla ba rnams dang mig lag dus dang
128b2(rgyud): rig byed mig rnams drug par ro/ drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba ri dus me dang drug dang zla ba rig byed re 'jig rten// drug byed rig byed stong dang stong pa mig dang mda' rnams nyis khyim rtsags nya ma'i rkang par ro// zla ba drug tu
128b3(rgyud): 'grib pa dang ni 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i nyin mo mtshan mo'i nyi ma rgyu ba la// rgya mtsho'i srog dang ma yi chu srang nyi ma so so'i dus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa'i yan lag gis// lho ru nub mo 'bol bar 'gyur ba dang ni kha ba can ri
128b4(rgyud): byang phyogasu ni nyin mo'o// zla ba mig dang nyi ma rnams bsres pa la mig gis bsgyur bar zla ba gang ba gcig bsres pa// nam mkha' 'tshams dang rgya mtshos rab dpya thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba la ni mkha' sogs cha yas
128b5(rgyud): skoro lhag ma drug bcus bsgyur ba chu tshod nyid dang de lngas sogs kyis bsgyur ba chu srang dbugs rnams so// 'khor los thob rnams sbyang ba khar 'gyur ba dang mun pa can la 'jug me skar ma phyed bsres pa// zla ba
128b6(rgyud): sum bcus bsgyur dang so so'i nyin zhag ldan pa las ni ri dang nam mkha' ris thob po// gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa nyid kyang rgya mtsho ro yis thob pas dman pa nyin zhag gsal// ri ding 'tshams dang
128b7(rgyud): gcig gis bsres pa gsal bar nyin zhag tshogs sta ri dang rlung 'tshams chas phye ba// lhag ma ska rA mas bsgyur nas cha bgos pa la nam mkha' ro yis bsgyur la ri sogs chu tshod rnams// phyed bcas dgu sbyang bkra
128b8(rgyud): shas la ste gal te bu lon lhag na 'khor lo bsres nas rnam par sbyong // 'khor lo phyed ni dor bya phyed ni lhag par yang 'gyur dor ba lhag pa rim pa min par 'gyur// skar ma drug bcus bsgyur po chu tshod rab tu ldan par/ 
129a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba 'byung ba me zlas char che ba'i/ gang zhig thob pa dal ba'i las ste gzhan skor dang bu lon rim dang rim pa ma yin pas// de nyid bco brgyad rnams dang ri ni gsal bar ro rkang 'khor lo
129a2(rgyud): phyed de 'og dang steng du ste/ chu tshed longs spyod kyis bsgyur mda' dang yon tan ri bong can gyis 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa// snga ma'i phyed du gzung byar 'dod pa yin te rkang pa'i dbang las phyi ma'i phyed du dor ba nyid zos
129a3(rgyud): byas gcig tu bsdus pa gza'i 'gro ba'i dbang gis bsnan pa dang ni dbri ba chu tshed la'o// nyi maras skyes rnam par sbyong ba bla ma dang ni nyi skyes myur ba'i las la de bzhin du/ zla ba'i bu dang pa wa sangs kyang nyi mar 'gyur te
129a4(rgyud): myur ba'i bya bar rim pas nges par nor// dag pa'i lhag ma 'di la longs spyod gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma bsgyur ba chu tshod nges// drug bcu'i cha yis thob pa gza' rgyu ba yi rkang pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang 'phrog pa
129a5(rgyud): de bzhin no spyad par byas pa nyid dang gcig tu bsdus pa gza' 'gro'i dbang las mtha' dag snron dang 'brid pa ste// sa yi bur gyur rgyal ba las sogs gsal bar ma nu'i rkang pa ru ni mtha' dag bzhag par bya// de ltar
129a6(rgyud): gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim pa'i rtsis rnams yongs su rig par bya'o mi dbang po// zla skyes khu ba dag na nyi ma rnam par dag pas zla skye ba wa sangs nyid dag par 'gyur// nyin zhag tshogs rnams mtha' dag stong pa
129a7(rgyud): nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur las ma dang nyi ma res phri lnga// ri dang bug pi r-i klu rnams kyis char phye ba ste lhag ma yang ni skar tshegs dbye bas bsgyur// gsungs pa'i cha yis rgyu skar rnams dang chu tshod la sogs pa
129a8(rgyud): rnams zla skyes longs spyod du ni 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su rgyu skar phyed bcas mi bdag yang dag dor bya mi yi bdag po kye// lhag ma'i bya ba bkra shris ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur te nor dang bu lon dal dang myur
129b1(rgyud): ba'i las zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i bya bar bcu ri me rnams yin te myur ba'i bya bar mi bdag sogs// nyin zhag bsdus las mkha' dang nam mkha' ro/ mig rnams kyis chad byas pa la so me rgya mtshos dbye lhag
129b2(rgyud): ma rgyu skar gyis bskur byas pa rgyu ska rau slar yang chu tshod dal ba'i bya bar bla ma yi// rgyu skar rnams las nyi mas sbyang bya bde byed dgu dang mi rnams dral ba'i bya ba'i rkang pa rnams// slar yang myur las rkang pa rnams ni gas
129b3(rgyud): bar ma nu'i rkang pa rnam ste phyogs sogs rkang pa rnams nam mkha'i zla bas nyin zhag la bsgyur rgya mtsho nor rnams kyisau dman ri dang rgyal ba mig gis dbye// rgyu skar rnams kyis bsgyur ba rgyu skar longs spyod slar yang
129b4(rgyud): chu tshod myur ba'i bya bar pa waM sangs// 'tshams kyi rgyu skar nyi ma las sbyang mda' dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i bya ba'i rkang pa rnams// myur bar de nyid la sogs dbu bas gsal bar ma nu'i rkang par snon 'bring
129b5(rgyud): bkra shis bzhin du'o// nyin zhag tshogs gsal nam mkha'i mig brgyad rig byed kyis chad ro drug ri dang nam mkha' gcig rnams kyis// char phye ba dang rgyu skar gyis bsgyur rgyu skar 'gyur te spen par bco brgyad
129b6(rgyud): dor bar bya ba'o// rkang pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis tshes dang 'tshams kyis ro rkang rab gsal myur ba'i bya bar ro las sogs// myur dang dal bar rgyu ba rkang par rim pas 'gro ba dang ste 'khyog po'i rim pa man pa yis// 
129b7(rgyud): snga ma phodra dang phyi ma phyed du nyi ma dag ni 'gro ba'i dbang las gza' rnams 'byung ba'o// gang dang zla ba sum bcu rtsa bdun rnams la lag pus bsgyur ba myur dang 'khyog po 'jug ring so// de dag gang zhig nyi ma'i longs
129b8(rgyud): spyod lo ni nges por rob tu zhugs na gza' de nub par 'gyur// nyi mas dor nas 'char bar 'gyur ba bgrod par 'gro ba rnam par dbye bas de rnams lam du 'gyur/ g.yon gyi lam du gnas pa gang zhig nyi ma 'gro
130a1(rgyud): ba'i dbang las de ni g.yon phyogs 'gro ba ste/ g.yas su gnas nas g.yas phyogs kyis nags sa blar yung ni dag rnams phan tshun 'di ru 'thub pa'o// rang gi ning du yang dag gnas pa rnams
130a2(rgyud): ni gal te dag ru gyur na nges par 'di ru 'thab// gzhan yang rgyu skar 'thab dang gcig la gcig nyid 'thun par 'gyur bar 'dir ni nges par ste// gal te nyi ma'i g.yon du zla ba rab tu zhugs par gyur nangs par byang
130a3(rgyud): phyogs 'byung dus su/ byang dur 'thor gyur te gal te bgrod pa'i dbang gis g.yas pa la ni lho phyogs gnas pa'o// gang ba'i mtha' dang sgra gcan gdong mnyam 'gro bar gyur na yang dag kha yis 'dzin pa kho na s+ho// 
130a4(rgyud): g.yon nas rgyu bas g.yas man phyogs dang nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g.yas phyogs su ni g.yas kyi cha// de bzhin du ni ra bong 'dzin pa sgra gcan gyis 'dzin 'tshams su brgyab nas yang dag 'byung gnas so// thA
130a5(rgyud): skar la sogs nag po'i phyed kyis nyin mo mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su mgo la ri mo'o// g.yas dang g.yon du rgyu skar ma rnams ni nges par sa yi chal khyim gyis dbye bas yang dag gnas// mtshams khyim gzhu yi
130a6(rgyud): rnam pa mgo la'i dbus nas lho ru me yi dkyil 'khor du na 'gyur ba'i ba ri nyid dang // bad du drang ba'i ri sta pad ma'i mo ba ma dang mtshungs shar du lug dang srang la sogs ste// me dang drang ba'i ris mtshams su nam mkhwa ma [ऽ]
130a7(rgyud): nam mkha' mda' ri rnams kyi dpag tshad stong // 'khor lo'i dbus su ri mo phyed mor mnyam pa 'gro ba yang ni nyin mo mtshan mo gcig la'o// phyis ni lho dang byang du rgyu ba nyin mo rgyu skar rnams kyi dbye ba'i rim pa yis// nyi
130a8(rgyud): ma'i lam rnams nam mkha' klu dang zla ba 'dor ba nyin mtshan dbang las 'di ru bgrod pa'i mthar// chu tshod drug bcu rnams las nyin mtshan drug gi cha yis nges par nyi ma ri bong can 'phel 'grib/ gang las ral
130b1(rgyud): skye ba rnams su 'gyur ba mnyam pa lug gi nyi ma srang gi nyi ma ru de nas brgyad gnyis dum pur nges par glang gi cha dang sdig pa'i gnas la de bzhin kho na'o// bug pa dang ni me yi grangs la 'khrig pa gzhur gyur pa dang
130b2(rgyud): phyogs kyi tshad gyur bzhi pa la/ ka ra ka ta dang chu srid gyur par nyi ma gnas par 'gyur te lnga dang bcu gcig pa nyid la// seng ge bum pa dag la rabazhugs bcu gnyis po dang ro chen po la nya dang bu mor 'gyur/ 'dir ni bu mo
130b3(rgyud): bgrod par 'gyur ba nyi ma chu srin la gnas gnyis pa bum par nyi ma gnas// dum bu gsum par nye ste bgrod pa'i dbang gis mi yi bdag po nyi ma lug la bzhi pa'o// 'byung ba zhes bya glang la nyi ma gnas dang 'khrig la nyim
130b4(rgyud): sa drug dang ste bdun pa la// nyi ma ka rA ka ta la gnas pa yin ste seng gar gyur pa si yi dum bu brgyad par ro// bu mor bug pa dang ni srang gi nyi ma bcu par yin te sdig pa drag po'i dum bu ru// gzhu ru gnas pa bcu gnyis pa ru
130b5(rgyud): 'gyur te mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa yang ni bcu gnyis rtsibs// da ltar lho yi bgrod par 'gyur te nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang las kar ka ta sogs khyim du 'gyur// steng du drug dang klu yi grangs rnams yang dag tsha ba dang ldan nyi ma bgrod
130b6(rgyud): pa byang gi mthar// de las lho yi phyogs su 'bri bar yang ni 'gyur te mi yi bdag po drag po'i grangs ni stong // stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa gcig rnams las mda' brgya dang ni brel ba'i mgo la'i ri mo dbus su'o// de las 'phelnga dang / 
130b7(rgyud): 'grib par 'gyur ba nam mkha' nam mkha' mda' dang mda' rnams byang dang lho ru'o// nyin mo'i byed pa tshwa'i rgya mtsho las ni rgal te lho phyogs 'gro ba ji srid ma'i bar du'o// kA la sa'i byang phyogs kha ba can gyi ril 'gro ste byung
130b8(rgyud): phyogs nas kyang byang phyogs gnas pa la mda' rnams tshes kyis bosgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams kyis phyogs kyi bgrod par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o// phyed bces mig dang klu dang zlas thob lnga dang ri yi stong phrag do
131a1(rgyud): ba nyid dang nyin lnga'o// khyim gcig la gnas nyi ma mtshams la sogs pa mtha' dag zla ba zla ba byed pa rnams byed ste// dum bu dum bu ru ni zla bar 'gyur ba sa yi steng du bcu gnyis rtsibs kyi
131a2(rgyud): ba yis/ ga ga tshad ni nyin mo 'dibang los dum bu bdun parnya ni gang zhig nu mor 'gyur ba'o// bye trai la mal 'odum drag gsum me nyi me'i midon dang rmyab tu yang ni nyon mo nub mo'o// ri la rgyal ba chen po sgotshom
131a3(rgyud): lus rnams kyi byang na gnas par 'gyur romi yi bdag g-i kye+e// nyi ma shar bA gyur pa shar phyogs yin te ri dang mnyam bgrod pa dring nub pa nub phyogs so// dus rnams dang ni 'tshams rnams bzhi dang thun dang
131a4(rgyud): nyin mo dang ni mtshon mo thams cad du ni 'pho// lhun po lho phyogs 'khor ba'i nyims la rab gsal dbye ba dus sbyor rnams kyi 'byed de'o// chu tshod dus la drug dang rkang par bcas pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnas
131a5(rgyud): kyis nyi ma 'pho bar 'gyur/ drug bcu rnams kyis mI'i 'bum dang lnga dang ri'i stong phrag nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo 'khor ba ste// mgo lo'i phyed la mkha' ma'i chu ched rnams kyis nyin mtshan rgyu bar 'phel ba dang na
131a6(rgyud): 'grib pa lngas// mgo la'i g.yas dang g.yon par yin te nyi ma so so'i dus su dbugs ni gnyis dang chu srang gsum// lug gi dus sbyor chu srang rnams ni nam mkha' dgu dang lag pa rnams dang khyu mchog ma
131a7(rgyud): mtshams mig/ zung la nam mkha' nam mkha' gnyis dang mda' ro chu tshod rnams gyur ka ra ka ta dang seng ge'i 'o// bu mor phyed dang btsos pa drug yin pa dang dris par srang sogs thams cad rim min kho na'o// 
131a8(rgyud): dus sbyor drug gis nub dang dpa 'char ba yang ni de bzhin nyi ma rgyu skar debye rnams kyis// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang ni ro brgya ldan pa so byi rnams kyis nges par bgrod pa na// lus la dbugs lhag pa ni
131b1(rgyud): gagrang zhi gnyi ma so so'i dus la 'byung ba ri dang 'tshams rnams grangs// stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis bsgyur ba yang ni lo brgya'i tshad ni rab tu 'grub pa ste// stong pa 'tshams dang me yi rgyas phye chu tshod rab tu
131b2(rgyud): yin te drug bcu cha las nyan zhag go// zla ba'i zla ba phyed dang nyin mor bgrod pa nyid de zla ba dgu ni saM skyes nub me'o// lo drug rnams la bla mar gyur te pa wa sangs dang zla skyes dag la bgrod pa bgrod por 'gyur tshes
131b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ba'i lo rnams sman pa de bzhin mun pa tsan dgu 'jug rings bral lo rgyal po kye// de rnams thams cad gcig tu bsdus na klu yis dus la bsgyur ba'i lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum// nyin zhag 'khor
131b4(rgyud): lo'i phyed kyi grangs kyis lo brgyar yang ni 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor lo chad pa 'dir// srog rnams rgyu ba snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rab tu nges par lus ngag sems kyi dbye rnams kyis// de nas lnga nyid 'gyur
131b5(rgyud): ba yin te lha mi klu rnams phyed bcas zla ba nyin zhag gis kyang brjod// grangs 'di rnams ni rab tu grub par 'gyur ba ru dus kyi 'khor lor shin du nges te mi dbang po// dus kyi 'khoru lo ma chad pa la bgrod pa'i bu lon
131b6(rgyud): dgu bsnan byas pa nyid ni mtha' dag rnams// bkra shIs lus sogs gza' rnams lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las kyis rkang pa'i chu tshod de rnams su 'gyur// sa skyes la ni rig byed 'tshams dang me rab yin te/ 
131b7(rgyud): srid pa'i gnas la rkang pa'i dbye rnams kyis// snga ma phyi ma phyed nyid mnyam par bu lon nor du 'gyur ba gnas rnams dbye bas nges par sbyar// chu tshod rnams la dang por rgyal ba'i dbang po'i grangs rab yin te/ 
131b8(rgyud): me dang mig gi rnam pa gsum// gnas gnyis gcig bcas mig dang bco brgyad ches dang bde byed rnams dang me dang rtsa ba las bde byed// sum bcu rtsa brgyad dang ni brgyad bcur gnas dang srid pa'i rkang par
132a1(rgyud): / gsum dang bcas pa'i lnga bcur 'dir// de la nyi ma rnam par dag par du lon dang ni nor ste rim pa min dang rim pa yis// rig byed bug pa zla ba'i grangs rnams chu tshod du ni gyur pa gza' lag myu
132a2(rgyud): ba'i bya ba rnams/ gnyis kyi gnas la bcu drug gzhan la tshes dang ma na 'dod rnams dang ste drag po ri dbang mkha'// rtsa ba'i gnas las rig byed bde byed dang ni nges par gsal bar bcu gnyis pa la nyi shu ste/ 
132a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa brgyad sum bcu so bzhi yang ni ma nu'i rkang par rgyu ba'i dbye bas yang dag gnas// rgya mtsho nam mkha' zla ba'i grangs rnams nyid du gyur pa'i chu tshod bsdus pa de ltar bla ma'o// gnas gnyis su ni phyog kyi
132a4(rgyud): tshad ste dgu dang nor 'tshams drug lag zla ba dang ni rtsa ba las// me dang drug dang bug pa drag po mi yi bdag po dang ni thub pa thams cad rim gyis rgyu// myur dang dal dang 'khyog por gza' tshogs nges par nya ma'i
132a5(rgyud): dbye ba rnams kyis rgyu bar byed po'o// drug dang zla ba rgya mtsho'i grangs kyi chu tshod rnams su 'gyur te myur ba'i bya bar pA waM sangs// gnas gsum rnams su nyi shu rtsa lnga gnyis las rgyal ba zhes bya de bzhin lag
132a6(rgyud): mig rnams nyid 'gyur// sbyin tshes brgyad dang rtsa ba'i las ni drug dang nam mkha' yon tan gcig gos ma gang ba'i rgya'o// mthar ni me dang ri yi grangs dang srid par gnas pa'i rkang pa pa wa sas rgyu rim pa yis
132a7(rgyud): spen pa la ni drug dang 'byung ba'i grangs kyi chu tshod bsdus par de ltar 'gyur ro mi dbang po// drug dang 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba rig byed rgya mtsho mig dang gnyis dang stong pa rtsa ba las// phyogs dang rig byed 'byung po
132a8(rgyud): ro dong nor dang mi rnams rab tu gnag par bye ba'i rimi pe yis// de ltar gza' rnams mtha' dag rkang pa'i rnams kyis shin du ngas por gyur pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// sum bcu rtsa drug zla ba phyed bcas nges par nor
132b1(rgyud): glagrang zhig nyi ma so so'i dus la 'byung ba ri dang 'tshams rnams grangs// stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis bsgyur ba yang ni lo brgya'i tshad ni rab tu 'grub pa ste// stong pa 'tshams dang me yi rgyas phye chu tshod rab tu
132b2(rgyud): yin te drug bcu cha lasi nyin zhag go/ zla ba'i zla ba phyed dang nyin mor bgrod pa nyid de zla ba dge ni se skyes nu bo me'o// lo drug rnams la bla mar gyur ta pi wa sangs dang zla skyes dag la bgrod pa bgrod por 'gyur tshes
132b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ba'i lo rnams sman pa de bzhin mun pa tsan dag 'jug rings bral lo rgyal po kye// de rnams thams cad gcig tu bsdus na klu yis dus la bsgyur ba'i lo dang phyed bcas zla ba gsum// nyin zhag 'khor
132b4(rgyud): lo'i phyed kyi grangs kyis lo brgyar yang ni 'gyur te dus kyi 'khor lo chad pa 'dir// srog rnams rgyu ba snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rab tu nges par lus ngag sems kyi dbye rnams kyis// de nas lnga nyid 'gyur
132b5(rgyud): ba yin te lha mi klu rnams byed bcas zla ba nyin zhag gis kyang brjod// grangs 'di rnams ni rab tu grub par 'gyur bar dus kyi 'khor lor shin du nges te mi dbang po// dus kyi 'khoru lo ma chad pa la bgrod pa'i bu lan
132b6(rgyud): dgu bsnun byas pa nyid ni mtha' dag rnams// bkra shis lus sogs gza' rnams lnga po rnams kyis myur ba'i las kyis rkang pa'i chu tshod rnams su 'gyur// sa skyes la ni rig byed 'tshams dang me rab yin te/ 
132b7(rgyud): srid pa'i gnas la rkang pa'i dbye rnams kyis// snga ma phyi ma phyed nyid mnyam par bu lon nor du 'gyur ba gnas rnams dbye bas nges par sbyar// chu tshod rnams la dang por rgyal ba'i dbang po'i grangs rab yin te/ 
132b8(rgyud): me dang mig gi rnam pa gsum// gnas gnyis gcig bcas mig dang bco brgyad ches dang bde byed rnams dang me dang rtsa ba las bde pyad// sum bcu rtsa brgyad dang ni brgyad bcur gnas dang srid pa'i rkang par
133a1(rgyud): phyed kyi longs spyod kyis ni bgos/ thob pa 'jug rings kyi yang chu tshed nyi ma so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las// chu srang bdun drang phyed ni phrogs la nges par yon tan gyis
133a2(rgyud): bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod la sbyang po// 'jug rings nyi ma dang ni btsos pa rnam par longs spyod bdun dang rgya ba nas myur dang 'khyog po ru phyed bcas chu srang gnyis nyid rgyu ba nyid dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod la
133a3(rgyud): ni rim pa yis// zla ba glang ba sum bcu rtsa drug rnams la longs spyod chu tshod rnams ni 'jig rteni chos kyis bsgyur// phyed bcus zla ba chu tshod rnam gnyis nyin zhag so sor 'char ba myur 'khyog bdun dang rgyab tu'o// 
133a4(rgyud): phyed dang bcas pa zla ba'i bar du de nyid 'char bar 'gyur te mi yi 'jig rten rnams su snang // phyis ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor ldor rab zhugs dgang lo yI ljongs spyod du yang snang ba med// de yi 'char ba'i cha nyid shA
133a5(rgyud): ni de yi 'char ba dag gis mtha' yas dus kun shes par 'gyur ba'o// lo yi nyi ni zhag lnga yis bsgyur la ying ni mda' yis nges bsgyur bgrod pa'i nyi mas rang dman la// bug pa rnams kyis nges par bsgo
133a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba rang 'gro yon tan dbang las gza' rnams dkyil 'khor te// sa'i bu'i ri dang klu dang drug rnams nyin zhag tshogs su 'gyur ta ri dang bug pa ri klu rnams// zla skyes kyis ste so me'i rig byed lha yi/ 
133a7(rgyud): b+h+ra mAr 'gyur te ba wa sangs kyi ri rgyal mig/ nyi ma'i bu yi drug dang drug ste ri dang nam mkha' gcig glo nyin zhag tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor ro// ri dang 'tshams dang gcig rnams skyes bu da ni nor nges
133a8(rgyud): yin te zla ba'i bu ru brgyas bsgyur la// me gnyis ri yis dman byas pa wa sangs la bcus bsgyur nyi ma rnams las rgya mtsho brgyad dman pa// sngags par stong pa nam mkha' 'tshams mig yin te/ 
133b1(rgyud): nyi skyes mkha' lag gdengs ka dus rnams bu lon 'gyur// sa skyes su ni phyed bcas dgu dang gza' lag phyed bcas mi yi bdag po nyi skar bla mar 'gyur// pa wa sangs la drug ste nyi ma'i bu la skyon zhes mtha'
133b2(rgyud): dag longs spyod dbus su sbyang ba'o// de ltar dag pa'ang de rnams mi yi dbang po skye ba'i sgor ma rgyu ba'i dbang las gyur pa'o// rang gi yan lag tu ni chu ngu'i dag par 'gyur te nyin dbus chen por gyur pa 'gro dbang
133b3(rgyud): la zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur bya yin te dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo dang zla ba yis// tshe thob longs spyod bu lon 'gyur te nyi ma ri bong can gyis longs ma spyad pa chu chod byed// 'jug rings kyi ni slar yang
133b4(rgyud): lhag pa geng zhig so so'i nyi dus zlo ba'i nyin zhog rnams kyis bsgyur// drug bcu'i cha yis chu tshod rnams ni so so'i nyin zhag dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba'o// zla skyes sngags pa myur bar rib tu skye
133b5(rgyud): ba yin te stobs ldan sa skyes 'jug rings 'khyog por ro// dal dang pu wa sangs dag dral te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lhag mo rgyu ba stobs med do// myur la shar du gdong phyogs yin te yang ni nub tu
133b6(rgyud): gdong phyogs 'khyog por rgyu ba rab tu zhugs// dol bar lho ru gdong yini rang gi 'gro ba'i yon tan dbang las nges par 'byung ba byang phyogs 'gyur// zla ba'i nyin zhagasum bcu rgya mtshos bsgyur na na mi ma
133b7(rgyud): mig dang zla ba zla ba'i rkang pa ste// phung po bcu gnyis rnams la dus kyis bsgyur na brgyad dang rig byed nyi ma rnams kyis rkang pa'o// de yi dbus su 'grib pa dang ni 'phel ba nyid ni bgrod 'gro'i dbang la
133b8(rgyud): rim ma ni rim pa yis// 'khor lo'i phyed dang phyed du klu dus chogs rnams kyis ni mi yi bdag po mtha' dag rig par bya// 'tshams kyis gcad la sgragacan dkyil 'khor rab tu 'jug pa ri bong can gyi kyi
134a1(rgyud): 'khor nyid lalo/ thams cad rnam par dag par bzung na ri bong can gyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor drug bcu'i chu tshod 'gyur// phyed bzung ba ni phyed kyi dag pa yin ste ri bong can gyi dbang
134a2(rgyud): gris chu tshod yod pa'i bar// nyin mtshan dus su dkar dang gnag lnga 'tshams kyis bcad la nyi ma zla ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba'o// mi rnams kyi ni ldo la brgya yisra bsgyur bar byas pa'i lo rnams gza' rnams kyi
134a3(rgyud): ni longs spyod de// gnas gnyis pa la phyogs kyis cha thob pa yis sbyang dang phung por bu lon du ni sbyang bar bya// 'bum phrag nyi shu dang ni gcig dang drug khri rnams kyi lo grangs rnams kyis dus kyi phyed nyid
134a4(rgyud): do phyis ni khyim gnyis dag gis rab tu yini par 'gyur ba nges par lo yi grangs ldan bzhi rnams so// stong pa dang ni stong pa nam mkha' klung dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan tshad// mkha'
134a5(rgyud): dang nam mkha' stong pa dang ni ro dgu nyi ma rnams kyis gsum ldan lo grangs rab tu 'grub// stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang sbrul zhes pa ni gnyis ldan ro rnams yang dag pa// stong pa dang ni nam
134a6(rgyud): mkha' mkha' mig yon tan rgya mtsho'i lo glengs rnams kyis brtsod ldan dus su 'gyur// lo 'di rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru ga dzA yi tshogs kyi rkang pa rnams kyis khyim rnams stong par gnas// tha skar
134a7(rgyud): la sogs phyis ni rab tu skye ba zhes pa de bzhin dpyid zla 'bring po la sogs dang // gza' dang sbyor ba dang ni tshes dang byed pa la sogs nges par de bzhin gzhan yang de dus sulha rnams dang ni lha ma yin
134a8(rgyud): rnams sa stongs gnas su drag po'i 'thab mo rab tu 'gyur ba'o// sde tshan drug dang dbyangs rnams bcas pa rnams ni nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur lo gsum nyin zhag rnams// a sogs thung ngu la sog
134b1(rgyud): zhes bya ri bong can cha yon tan gsum gyis phyed bcus zla ba'o// gang zhig rtsa rnams ha sogs dbyangs dang bcas pa sum bcu nyin dang mtshan mo rnams la sgra gcan gyi// dpal ldan stong pa gzhom du med pa la ma
134b2(rgyud): gsum gyis bsgyur ba gang de sgra gcan dus sbyor te// mi yi bdag po lo gsum phyed bcas zla ba rnams la 'byung ba nyi ma zla ba'i grangs su 'gyur// phyed bcas zla ba dror nas thub pa mchog rnams kyis ni bcad
134b3(rgyud): pa dus kyi 'khor lor 'gyur ba'o// zla bar gza' gcig nor yin mi bdag gnyis 'gyur chu tshod la sta bsdus pa lnga gnyis rkang pa mda'o// 'khor ltos rnam par phye bas gza' ru 'gyur te drug bcu rnams
134b4(rgyud): la de bzhin sbyin par bya ba ni// sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnams kyis chu tshod la ste thub pa klus bsgyur bsdus pa bya bar gnyis bcas sbyin bsnon dang 'bringad dang bsnun pra ri bong can yin rkang pa lnga dang bcas pa
134b5(rgyud): drug po 'di rnams kyis// zla phyed gsum gyi nyin zhag yon tan sum ldab tu yang 'gyur te longs spyod rab tu 'grub// skar ma gnyis la drug bcus bsgyur dang dang po'i chos kyi nyin zhag dang bcas drag po'i
134b6(rgyud): longs spyod rnams// de ltar dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gza' tshogs ldan pa phyi dang lus rnams su ni tha ma dad// bsdu dang spro ba'i rgyur ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dus kyi rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shing
134b7(rgyud): rta thabs dang shes rab rab tu dbye bas minyam dang mi mnyam rims kyis myur 'o khyog la sogs rgyu ba rnams// 'dod chags bral ba rnams dang thub mchog rigs rnams dang ni tshangs drug la sogs
134b8(rgyud): lha rnams kyis mi shes// gang zhig oM sogs dbyangs lnga rnams dang dang po'i tshes sogs dbang las dga' ba la sogs lnga rnams sbyor// de rnams 'dir ni 'char bar byed de gal te mi yi bdag pos skye
135a1(rgyud): la sogs gza' rnams dang bral na// sa skyes mi 'dod pa la shar bAr nges par gal te gyur na yang ni smin drug sbyor nyid dang // de ru g.yul dang nad rnams gal te byung na mi rnam
135a2(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang po'i dbyangs ldan no// bzang por zla skyes mchu dag sbyor ba gal tu yin na gnyis pa 'chi ba nyid 'dir gza' ru'o// rgyal bar bla ma nyid dang skag dag gal te 'gro ba yin+dan gsuM
135a3(rgyud): pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o// stong pa'i ches su pa sangs mon gru lag te 'gro ba yin na bzhi pa 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o// gang ba spen pa dang ni bre nyer bcas pa rab tu gyur na lnga pa 'gro ba 'chi ba la// nyi ma dag
135a4(rgyud): bar shwa rA na dmar yang 'gyur te nad pa rnams ni nyon mongs nyid du 'gyur ba'o// zla ba bzang por shar ba la yang de bzhin nges par rab tu 'thab mo nad nyid rnams su'o// lnga rnams 'char la bde
135a5(rgyud): par yin te 'bras bu mang po 'chi ba'i sbyor ba rnams las rnam par bral// shes par bya ba nad dang 'thab mo dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yul nas 'gro dang bag ma ldan// de ltar skar ma dang ni gza' rnam
135a6(rgyud): dbyangs tshogs chos rnams de nyid lnga yi rab tu dbye ba yis// zla ba phyed dang zla ba bgrod dang lo ru yang ni 'char ba 'dir 'gyur drug bcu'i lo rnams la// dpyid zla 'bring po la sogs de nyid yan lag bcu
135a7(rgyud): gnyis kyis 'char zla ba phyed kyi dbye ba yis// bdun bcu rtsa gnyis nyi ma rnams kyis 'char ba 'dir ni 'gyur ba zla ba'i dbye bas dbyangs rnams so// zla drug rnams ni bgrod pa'i chu dang rab tu skye ba'i sgor
135a8(rgyud): gyur rnams kyis bcu gnyis lo rnams la// de ltar dbyangs lnga rnams kyis 'char bar 'di ru 'gyur ba dang ni nub pa de ltar phyi nas so// thog mar byis pa'i dbyangs ni rang rang chos kyi yon tan dbang las
135b1(rgyud): dpal ldan gzhon nu'i gnyis pa ru/ lung 'tsho dang ni rgyus pa dag rnams rims kyis me dang rgya mtsho'i nyi ma lnga par nub par 'gyur// a sogs dbyangs lnga rnams la gang zhig nges par yon tan rnams kyis
135b2(rgyud): bsgyur ba gnyis sum bcu nyid de// ka sogs sde tshan yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las mtha' dag rnams kyis sbyor ba'o// thung rgyu rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs la 'char bar 'gyur te de nyid lnga yi
135b3(rgyud): rab tu dbye ba yis// ring po rnams ni nag po'i phyogs la nges par rab tu bskyed dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba 'gyur ba'o// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams las nyi ma'i dus sbyor gsal bar mda' yi chu tshod rnams ni dgu/ 
135b4(rgyud): yi cha/ de ltar yang ni rang bzhin gsum gnas g.yo dang brtan dang nyam pa lug gi dus sbyor la sogs 'dir// lug dang ka ra ka Ta dang srang dang nges par chu srin 'dir ni g.yo ba gnyis dang brtan pa dang // 
135b5(rgyud): lhag ma gzhan rnams nyin mtshan du sA la bcu gnyis g.yo dang brtan pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin 'char ba'o// de ru yud tsam sum bcu rnams kyang nyin zhag dus la chu tshed yang ni drug bcu tham pa ste// dang po
135b6(rgyud): dbyangs rnams sum bcu 'char ba 'dir ni 'gyur ba dang nyid nges par yud tsam yud tsam du// sde tshan sum bcu'i yi ga rnams su 'gyur ba chu tshod thung dang ring ba'i rab tu dbye ba yis// chos kyi cha yis zla ba'i
135b7(rgyud): dbus su nges par 'byung ba 'char dang nub pa de ltar de las so// a sogs dbyangs lnga pa rnams stong pa rlung dang me dang chu dang sar gyur rnams kyis yang dag rigs// sgra gcan
135b8(rgyud): dus ma zla nyi zla skyes bkra shis pa sangs bla ma ma rungs nyi skyes 'dir lhag lha// sngar gsungs pa yi dus sbyor re rer mtshan me nyin mo'i dbang las chu tshod 'di ru sgrub bya ste// de yi dbus su gang zhig
136a1(rgyud): dbyangs 'gyur gza' rnams stobs ldan dkyil 'khor de yis 'dir ni bsgrub bya'o// 'dir ni g.yon du dbyangs rnams thung ngu 'char bar 'gyur te gzhan yang gnas su dbyangs rnams
136a2(rgyud): gzhon ma'o/ g.yon du stong pa la sogs de nyid rnams dang gza' tshogs rgyu ba kun gyi gtso bo sgra gcan no// g.yas su sa sogs de nyid rnams dang gza' tshogs nges par nyi ma'i bu la sogs pa nyid kyis ste// pa'i
136a3(rgyud): dus kyi chu tshod dang ni gza' yi gnas dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa nyid rnams bsgrub pa'o// g.yul du brtsod phyir dus me stong pa 'char ba'i dus dag rnams la dris na 'chi bar rab tu 'gyur// rlung la nyi ma
136a4(rgyud): 'pham pa dang ni gzhan yang me las sa skyes dag dang 'char ba rma ru 'gyur ba'o// chu la bla ma yin na 'dum par 'gyur te sa la smin pa dag 'char brtsod par mi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba dang ni nyon mongs pa dang dmar 'gyur ba de
136a5(rgyud): dang mnyam rnams 'dri ba po ste nad pa yi// g.yul nyid du ni dgra rnams 'jig par rab tu 'gyur ba nges par sgra gcan stong par 'char ba dang // rlung du zla ba 'pham par 'gyur dang me la zla ba'i bu nyid 'char na g.yul du
136a6(rgyud): rma ru 'gyur// chu ru ba wa sangs kyis nor rnyed pa dang sar ni mjug rings dag 'char dgra rnams dbang du 'gyur// de ltar ltad mo dang ni bgra mar 'bras bu mang por 'gyur te g.yon pa'i lam du gza' rnams kyis/ 
136a7(rgyud): nya yis ni smras pa'i dbyangs rnams gang zhig nges par bcus bsgyur bral khyim gyi 'khor los bsres// phyis na 'byung bas bsgyur ba skya bo de yi nye ba rnams bsnan pa las bdun cha lhag ma rnams// zla ba me dang
136a8(rgyud): mda' dang ri rnams mi mnyam rkang par song bas mi rnams dngos grub med pa ste// mig dang rig byed ro rnams nges par shin du mnyam po'i rkang par song bas bya ba grub par 'gyur// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed dang nyin
136b1(rgyud): dang mtshan gyi dus rnams dus sbyor dbus su rabazhugs pa// dus sbyor gcig la lnga yi dbye ba rnams kyis gza' tshogs ldan pa dbyangs bcos de nyid dbye ba'o// de nyid gcig la dbugs rnams drug bcu
136b2(rgyud): lhag pa'i yon tan brgya rnams dus kyi chu tshed de 'jug par 'gyur// chu tshod cha rnams la ni chu srang drug bcu rnams te de yi chur 'gyur da bugs drug mi dbang po// dbugs 'byung 'jug pa'i dbus su mi dag drag
136b3(rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu shes par 'gyur ba rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// dag dang mi dge shes min chu tshod dus la nyin mtshan 'gro ba'i dbang las bsgrub bya nyid zla dag/ da ltar dus mI shes pa mi dge ba dang dge ba'i
136b4(rgyud): 'bras bu gang dag smra ba 'jig rten 'dir// long pa de yis long ba khrid nas dgon par glang po seng ge dag gis gang bar rab tu zhugs// phra mo'i rnal 'byor mi shes pa nyid rnams la bza' stobs ldan
136b5(rgyud): pa'i dus sbyor sbyin par bya ba ni// dus ma nyi ma sa skyes nyi phyed bu rnams skye ba'i dus sbyor bdun pa rnams la gnas pa na// tshe ba dang ni nad dang rma dang nges paro mtha' dag nor 'jig par yang de la byed pa yis// 
136b6(rgyud): des na de spangs pa yang nges par nga yi tshig gis dus sbyor gzhan la bsngags pas rab tu sbyin// sgra gcan zla ba zla ba'i bu dang bla ma pa sangasra skye ba'i dus sbyor bdun pa la gnas na// dgra 'jig bdag nyid rgyas
136b7(rgyud): dad g.yul du rgyal ba zhes bya nor dang bud med bcas par thob par byed// yang dag dus sbyor thams cad kyis ni gal te rang nyid lus kyi g.yon gyi rtse nas yin pa na// mtha' dag sa stengs du ni drag pa'i ga
136b8(rgyud): dang chos kyis nges par don rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// skar ma cha gsum byas pas dgu dang dgu dang dgu pa rnams kyis skye ba'i skar ma dang po ru// ma rungs pa rnams zla ba dang bcas mi mnyam rkang
137a1(rgyud): par song ba 'chi banang pa rnams kyi'o// tha skar la sogs rnams kyis rtsa gsum ldan pa sprul bzhin bya ste na mgu'i bar du'o// sdig pa'i zla ba dang ni skye skar gal / 
137a2(rgyud): rtsa gcig gyur na mi de rnams ni 'jig pa'o// drug tshes brgyad ri zla ba bcu dang dgur bcasu bcu dang nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams lo bzangs la// nyi ma zla ba dag dang gza' lhag spen pa bla ma klu dang
137a3(rgyud): dkar po rnams kyis rim pas spyod// der ni bye brag granas skabs dbye bas yang dang yang ste de las tshan brgya pa yi yi ge rnams// mu rungs rnams kyis zhi ba ma yin byed sde zhi ba'i ngo bos dri bar
137a4(rgyud): byed pa'i gza' rnams so// dgun 'bring mtha' rum rig nyi ma chu sprin la gnas bum par nyi ma dgun zla tha chungs drang // 'du byed yin te mi bdag nya la nyi ma dpyid ru rnam shos nyid ste lug la nyi ma
137a5(rgyud): gnas/ dpyid 'bring ming dang gzugs ste glang 'khrig gyur pa re nye gnas dpyid zla tha chungs dbar zla ra ba la// skye mched drug dang rag pa dag snga ka ra ka Ta dang sang ga nyi gnas gyur pa tshor ba sred/ 
137a6(rgyud): dbyezla 'bring dang tha chungs yin te bu mo dang ni srang gnas nyis gyur ston zla 'bring po la// len pa dang ni srid pa rab tu yin te ston zla tha chungs sdig par nyi ma gnas pa la// skye bar 'gyur te gzhul nyi ma
137a7(rgyud): gnas la rga shi dgun zlar 'gyur te dri bzhin rim pa yis// de ltar nyi ma zla ba'i dbya bas gnyi kar 'gro ba'i dbang las rgyal po yin lag bcu gnyis so// dgun zla 'bring po dang ni tha chungs mngon pa'i
137a8(rgyud): 'tshams su chu srin nyom song bar ma rig pa// de la rga shi gnyis pa ru ni yon te mi yi bdag po skye ba nyi ma gsum par ro// de ltar srid pa la sogs thams cad yan lag bcu gnyis bar du rim pa
137b1(rgyud): yongs su brtsi bar bya'o// de ltar me dang rgya mtsho mda' dang gal te bcu drug 'gyur bu'i dbang las sred pararaM brjod pa'o// phyogs dang tshes kyi nyin zhag grangs rnams nyi ma rgyu ba'i dbang las bcu drug cha ni
137b2(rgyud): gal te ni// dgun zla tha chung sA 'tshams su bum par nyi ma song bar gyur na de la 'du byed nyid du brjod// rnam pararwa shes pa de ni gnyis pa nyi gnas rab tu yin te ming dang gzugs ni gsum pa ru// da
137b3(rgyud): ltar zla ba gnyis su yan lag yin te nyi ma'i dbang las skye dang sdud pa'i sbyor ba las// de yang ma reg la sogs mi mnyam pa yi yan lag gyur pa dag pa'i bya ba rnams la shis// 'du byed la sogs gang
137b4(rgyud): zhig mnyam pas dbang dang 'gro dang bag ma rnams la rgyun du 'byung // dkar po dang ni nag po'i phyogs la dang po chos kyi dbang las skye dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yiso// da ltar zla phyed rab dbye rnams kyis gang
137b5(rgyud): zhig ri bong can 'gro'i dbang las yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// nyi ma dgra dang 'jug rings dal rnams g.yas dang rgyab tu yang dag gnas ni dag rnams 'jig par byed// g.yon dang mdun du zhi ba'i ngo bo
137b6(rgyud): gza' tshogs mtha' dag rnams ni 'thab pa'i se ru de bzhin nyid// rnal 'byor ma dang biSh+Ti nyid dang ma rungs rnams dang rlung ldan pade ster g.yos dang rgyab tu'o// g.yon dang mdun du 'chi ba'i gzugs ste/ 
137b7(rgyud): mnyam drang mi mnyam gyur pa gnyis ka'i stobs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// tshangasra ma drag mo gzhon nu ma ste nam mkha' 'gro ba'i bdag mo phag me rdo rje lagra ba ma'o// tsA mun Ta dang bkra shis ma rnams
137b8(rgyud): nor lha'i tshes su 'gyur ste dang po'i chos kyi dgu pa ru/ brgya byin gnod sbyin me yi 'tshams dang srin po gshin rje dang ni chu bdag rlung dang dbang ldan du// de ltar 'dir ni byed pa de rnams brgyad gnyis
138a1(rgyud): dbye ba rnams kyis tshes rnams 'char ba thu dad do// biSh+Ti rnams ni dkar po'i phyogs lnga 'char bar 'dir 'gyur brgya byin gshin rje chu lha gnod sbyin du// nag po'i phyog
