138a2(rgyud): rnams la yang phyis ni me dang srin po rlung dang dbang ldan 'tshams rnams rim pa yis// dreg po shar nas nub phyed 'gro ba nyi ma'i dbang las nyi ma byung du bgrod na byang phyogs su// chu na saM me dang ldan par
138a3(rgyud): 'gro ba nges pa dong bcas nyi ma lho phyogs bgrod na lho phyogs su// shwar nas thun phyed nas ni rab tu zhug so nas rlung dang lho phyogs su yang 'gro ba de bzhin du// dbang ldan chu me gnod sbyin du 'gro srin
138a4(rgyud): bo rnams la nyi nub bar du gzhu bkang rlung ldan 'di// dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan spangs nas rab tu zhugs na rlung gi yan lag gnyis 'thab pa las rgyal// g.yul du rtsa ba'i sgra gcan sgra yi stobs
138a5(rgyud): rnams 'joms pa de dang mnyam pa gzhan na yod pa min// mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam pa rnams g.yul du 'thab na dbyangs rnams dman pas lhag pas sdug par byed// mi gnyis dag gi snying la dbug
138a6(rgyud): rnams rab tu zhugs pa gang zhig 'thab mo las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// pho nyas dang blor ming brjod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur te phyi nas ming ni pham par 'gyur ba'o// mtshan ma khwa dog dbyangs la sogs pa
138a7(rgyud): rnams kyis mnya ma dang mi mnyam song bas 'bras bu med pa gsungs// 'thab par mi rnams g.yas su dus kyi ma dang g.yon du gang tshe mun pa can du gyur pa na// g.yul du lha yi mgon po dang ni khyad 'jug
138a8(rgyud): bde byed ldan pa mi rnams kyis ni 'joms pa ste// de phyir 'khyog dang drag po lha min 'joms pa dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan srid gsum rnam rgyal nyid// shes par bya ba 'thab dus sa yi dkyil
138b1(rgyud): 'khor bsgyur bar yin te gzhan du dag rnams 'jig pa min// sa la skar ma dgod pa thub pa dus rnams bya ba dbang po gnod sbyin rgyal po gshin rje ru/ 'khor lo de ni 'khor bar 'gyur ba nyin mtshan 'gro/ 
138b2(rgyud): ba'i dbang las rig par bya ba mtha'i dge go/ skar ma grang du dus me rab yin pa dang mun pa can dag lta ba 'joms par gyur pa ni// g.yul du dgra yi sde ni ma lus skad cig gis ltung 'gyur de lto ba'i dbus
138b3(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur// sgra go can du snga ma dag la gnas pa'i sde rnams mnyam par 'chi ba dang bcas ltung bar 'gyur ba ste// lto ba 'phya 'gro ba'i dbang las lta ba'i cha ru nges par song rnams gnas der sngo
138b4(rgyud): rnams 'joms pa yis// lta ba'i cha rnams spangs nas lte bar gnas dang g.yas dang g.yon par gnas na rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// de ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i sgra gcan bla ma'i tshig 'gyur shes par
138b5(rgyud): bya ba dus kyi 'khor lo ru/ 'khyog po dang ni drag po gza' dang rnal 'byor ma tshogs ldan pa rnams ni dbyangs dang bcas 'char ba// de rnams thams cad sbyangs te srid pa gsum na rnam par rgyal ba rgyal rig
138b6(rgyud): rnams kyi gzung bya ba/ khwa nyi ma zla ba blta rnams gang gis bzung bas 'jig pur byed pa drag po'i lus sti mig smon mdog/ shar dang nub dang lho dang byang gi phyogs rnams sa la nyin mtshan dus su gang zhig
138b7(rgyud): 'khor byed pas// gal te rdzong gi nang du rab tu dgra rnams zhugs par gyur na de tsho myur du gzhom bya ba// phyi rol rnams su rtag tu rdo dang mi dang mnga' rnams rab tu ltung bar byed pa'i 'khrul 'khor bca' ral gri hram
138b8(rgyud): 'khor nyid kyis gcod ste sa mnyam gnas la gur dang khang rtse'i bye brag la sogs pas// de yi rdzong la phye mar byed pa nyin zhag cung zad rnams kyis ma rungs pa rnams bsgrub par bya// rkang pa bzhi po brgya/ 
139a1(rgyud): gnyis khru ldan rnams ni mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la bug pa brgyad bya ste// ka ba rnams la tha drad gdang bu rgya mtsho dus dang dus rnams kyis ste rgyab tu gcig gis so// 'khrul 'khor gyi ni
139a2(rgyud): rtsa bar khru bcu'i tshad ni steng gi cha ru da yi phyed nyid 'gyur ba'o// de las sgyogs mda' khru gnyis ma gang pa ru 'gyur te o log bcu'i rtse mor cha lhag pa'o// sboms la phyed bcas khru gnyis pa la thub pa ma nu'i
139a3(rgyud): sor mo rnams rnams kyi bug pa gcig nges pa'o// oM log bcu la sgyogs mda' khru gang spangs pa rab tu bcug nas rgyab kyi cha ru gzar ni gdab// mgo bo'i snying gi yang dmig tshad ldan zlum pa dag las thag pa
139a4(rgyud): lnga bcu tham pas bcings par bya// skyugs mda'i mtha' ru ser dang mtho gang ldan pa'i gnya'u non gyis ni bskor bar rab tu bcug pa yi// sgrogs mda'i lcags kyu la gnas 'phen pa'i thag pa phyed dang bcwa
139a5(rgyud): pa'i khru gsum nges par 'gyur ba ste// de dbus rdo ni rab tu bcug ste stobs dang ldan pa'i 'thun par byed pa rnams kyis 'thon 'gyur ba// dkrol bas nam mkhar myur song khang bzangs rab stsogasu skad
139a6(rgyud): cig nyid la nges par ltung gyur nas// mtha' dag phye mar byed par 'gyur te sa stangs su ni rdo rje ltung bar gyur pa de bzhin no// de yi lcags kyu zla phye rnam pa su stengs rnams tshangs pa'i ri mo'i g.yas dang
139a7(rgyud): g.yon dag tu brgyad kyong bu byas 'gro ba'i phyogs dang log mthil gnyis kyi khu tshur gnyis bcings pa dang dgrol ba'o// 'grol dus sa lnga rig pa nyid te mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pas nges par 'khrul
139a8(rgyud): 'khor nang du gnas// rang 'dod dbang las rngo na ltung ba rnam gsum 'gyur te rjong rnams rnam par gshig pa'i don du'o// de yi rma rnams kyis ni glang chen sa dad la 'gyel 'gyur da yis phran tshegs sbyang
139b1(rgyud): gang zhig phyi rol gnas la yang dag gnas nas mkhar khar gnas pa'i dgra yi stobs rnams ltung bar 'gyur// se stangs gnas su zhum pa med pa de nyid gzhug par gzung gang dag rdzong la 'thab
139b2(rgyud): byed pas/ 'khrul 'khor gshin rje'i khar gyur pas drug rnams gang zhig rdzong du zhugs pa rme ru 'gyur ba'o// drug drug ka ba'i bar du khru zung rnams kyis chod par kha gdangs rnams kyis kha sprad gnyi
139b3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i// lhag dang chad pa med pa'i khog pa rnams ni re rer nyi ma'i khru ldan khrog pa gnyis mnyam pa// re mig so so rnams la spang li ba dang ni lpags pa spra tshil gos rnams nyid kyis bkab pa yi// 
139b4(rgyud): khog pa rnams ni 'tshams dang brgyad dang skyon dang nyi phyed sum 'gyur rnams kyis 'khrul 'khor gcig rab byed// khog pa so so'i kha gdang ka bug rnamasu ka ba bcug ste kun nas bkab pa'i lhag ma yi
139b5(rgyud): rgyub tu gdos pa 'dzin pa drug gam kha ga dang gnyis la mnyam ldan rnams kyis 'khrul 'khor gtong ba'o// kau ba rnams la 'phran rnams bcings pasA rlung rnams gre yaHsa ste bskyod par byed dang rlung gi
139b6(rgyud): bskyod pa nyid// de ru gnon pa rang gi sde rnams rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba chu yi rjod rnams gra shig don du// rgya mtsho'i zur ldan la gnas ka ba'i stangs bcings rlung grayab gos dang rgyal mtshan gcig de
139b7(rgyud): bcas pa de// phyogs dang rgyab kyi mi rnams kyis ni sa las thag pa rab tu bskyod pas stang du 'gro ba la// rlung gis yang dag bus pa nam mkhar 'gro bar byed ste nges par ri yi rdzong gi steng nyid du der ni
139b8(rgyud): me yi mar khu phrogs pas rdzong na gnas pa'i dgra'i stobs rnams thams cad bsreg par byed// 'khor lo rtsa bar o log bcu ni mi bskyod rab tu yin te stong du 'khor lo gzhan rnamaso// sor ma gnyis
140a1(rgyud): / gnyis par rnams ldan pa'i rtsibs rnams nyid kyang byas ste dkyil 'khor mtha' yi bar nyid du// 'khor lo kun nas phyed bcas khru gnyis yin te gzhan yang o log bcu'i steng
140a2(rgyud): na mde'u bcas/ mde'u yi rtse mor ral gri rnon po myur du bskor bar bya ba 'khrul 'khor rtsu ba 'khror bas so// nam mkhar srad bu rlung gi 'khrul 'khor gyi sra nr-i 'gro ba rang giyul gyi phyogs kyi rim pa yis// 
140a3(rgyud): rdzong gi steng du dgra yi khang pa so sor 'gro ba nges par srad bu la ni tshad byo ba// se la tshad ni de yis nges par bstan par yang ni 'gyur te dgra rnams mkhar rtse'i bye brag gis// dgra yi gnas kyi mkhar rtsa kun
140a4(rgyud): gyi steng dang mkhyams su mo ni rab tu ster bar byed par 'gyur// 'khor lo rnams kyi steng gi cha ru khang pa chen po lcags dang shing rnams la ni byas pa ste// kun nas yongasu zlum po'i rnam pa de la phub
140a5(rgyud): dang ma he'i lpags pa rnams kyis bkab pa ste// mi rnams kyis ni btag te 'gro ba'obs kyi rtswa ru kunA nasra mnyam pa'i sa la bzhag par bya// 'o bas de bkang bar byas ste skad cig de la khang pa gshig/ 
140a6(rgyud): nas nang du rab tu 'jug par byed// gnas la phur bu gnyis dbus nges par rgyud dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni mi g.yo'i 'khrul 'khor nyid du bya// rgyab tu lcags kyi phur bu gnyis ni legs byas o log bcu
140a7(rgyud): yi dbus su ser mo phyed mkhyud pas// sor me'i rtse mo dag gisra gzhu rgyud rab tu mang po lcags mda' rnams dang mnyam pa'i mda' bkong ba// g.yul gyi dus su bkrol bas go char ldan pa'i glang po
140a8(rgyud): che'i lus pa'i bugaso par byed pa nyid// sa yi 'og tu ka ba gnyis pa yang ni dma' bar btsugs ste thag pa rnams kyis bcing ba ni// thag pa'i dbus su ral gri'i yub bcug ste skor ba rnams kyis bcing
140b1(rgyud): pa dang / de yi dbus su ral gri'i yu ba rab tu yin par gyur pa nges par mi skyod phur bu dang // bcas pa 'khor ba rgya gyur pa yis ral gri'i rtse mo'i cha nyid rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba'o// de yi steng du spang leb g.yo
140b2(rgyud): pa de nyid byung nas 'khor ba'i bug pa mA rtogs pa dag gos// ral gri'i steng du sbyin pa lcags byas shin du yang ba'i zla ba kho na dbus kyi chu ru'o// gang zhig zla ba'i steng du rab tu lhung ba rnams ni skad cig
140b3(rgyud): de la ral gris gcod par 'gyur// mi yi bdag po'i gnas kyi mkhar sgro spangs na sa 'gren 'khrul 'khor nyid ni rlab tu rma byad pa'o// sreg shing stang du rtsa ba'i gnasu 'gyur zhing nyi me'i kha brjing rnams kyis 'khor la
140b4(rgyud): nyid do/ rgya mtsho'i zur du ka ba ga dang bu rnams kyis mi mnyam mnyam pa'i shing rta'i phyed kyis gnas pa ste// chu yi phyed du 'thab pa'i sar 'gyur mi mnyam pa dang mAnyam pa'i khog pa rta rnams sam ni glang po yi// de lwa
140b5(rgyud): steng gi gnas kyi phyed la me long do shal rgyal mtshan la sogs rnams kyis brgyan par bya// phyed bcas gcig ginyis gsum pa rnams la rtsa ba'i gnas su ri bong can lag ma yi gdang bu yis// bskor ba byed
140b6(rgyud): bcas gcig gi tsho la brad ma'i shing rta dga' ba'i dbye bas mnyam pa'i gnas su 'gyuraro// phyed bcas tshad ni rta ste phyed bcas khru rnams dbang las glang po rnams kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibasu 'gyur// lha rnams rig
140b7(rgyud): pad ma nyid sta lha las skyes pa'i rag da'i rnaMs kyis byas dga' ba'o// brgyad dang rgya mtsho mig gi 'khor lo rnams kyis rnam pa gsum ste 'di ru shing rta cha sogs mnyam// lha rnams nyid dang ma yi 'khor lo gcig
140b8(rgyud): la mi mnyam rta yi shing rtas lha mi yin rnams 'jig/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shing rta chen po rgyal rigs rnams kyi g.yul du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur// mnyam dang mi mnyam phyed nyid nges par bshig pas g.yu
141a1(rgyud): du sngon du bcom dang bcom nas ldog par 'gyur// drug lnga rgya mtsho rnams la me yi cha yis ka ba'i logs rnams mnyam par bug par rab tu 'gyur// rtsa ba las ni sdeng dang sdang du cha gnyi 'gyur
141a2(rgyud): zhing brtsegs pa'i dbang gi sa lha rnams gzhal yas khang // de 'dir sa la mi yi bdag po rnams kyi rnam gsum brtsegs pa g.yul gyi ltad mo'i don du'o// phyogs rnams kun la khru gsum khru gang dag gis
141a3(rgyud): rab tu bskor ba gzhal yas khung du rab tu 'gyur// 'khor lo'i steng du ka ba brtsegs pa dang bcas pa rnam gsum gyi phyogs rnams kun du khyogs su 'gyur// brgyad pa gnyis dang brgyad dang de las phyed rnams
141a4(rgyud): phyogs dang 'tshams dang dus kyi kha gdang rnam gsum sar// steng dang 'og tu bskor bar bya zhing lag pas o log bcu la bzung nas btsun mo'i gdan la gnas// nang dang phyi rol 'gro dang 'og dang steng du 'gro
141a5(rgyud): zhing phyogs brgyad rnams su bskyod par byed// stang dang 'og tu 'khrul 'khor 'khyog po bum pa can du 'gyur zhing kun lnga sdug gu'i rnam pa'o// bum pa'i khar gyur bum pa'i sbu gur gyur par sbu gu tsha dang mnyam
141a6(rgyud): pa bcug par gyur pa yis// chu ni 'gugs par byed ste g.yo ba'i chu yis gang pa bum pa'i bug pa nas ni bkrol ba yis// bskyed mos tshul dang ldum rar mnyam pa'i sa ni gang deng gang du 'dod pa de ru 'gro bar
141a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ bsgrub bya gdug pa can rnams don dang rab mtshogs yi steng du chos pa ma lus rgyal don du// sngon du dang blo'i sangs rgyas las ni sa gsum bla mas zla ba bzang la gang zhig kun gsungs las// de rnas
141a8(rgyud): nang nas cung bod yuli 'dir rab tu gsal ba rang yis da ltar de nyid rna mi bstan pa// rang gnas bsrung ba'i don du 'di rnams mtha' dag gis la ni sdang chags pas ma yin nyi ma kye// tshong dang tshe yi dbus sus
141b1(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor las kyis sa la thub pa yang dag gnas pa yis// dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum gyis bskor ba'i nyi ma'i dum bu rnams la rim pas bskor ro mi bdag kye// dum bu gcig la dpag tshad rnams ni stong
141b2(rgyud): phrag nyi shu lnga yin yang na nor ma dpe ldan pa dang // gangs ri mchog gis phyogs rnams ma lus kun nas yang dag bskor ba de dag dbus su kye la sha/ sa la ka la sha yi dum bu gangasA rir ldan pa de yi sum cha kan nA
141b3(rgyud): shes par bya ba ste// phyi rol du yang yul rnams nyi phyed mdab ma ra re gling rnams kun gyis brgyan par rjod pa ste// g.yas kyi phyed du thub mchog gnas 'gro sham pa zhes bya ba grong khyer bya ba yang dag gnas// grong khyer
141b4(rgyud): bye ba rnams kyis nges par bcings pa yin pa yul ste grong khyer 'bum rnams kyi ni ljongs// gcig dang gnyis gsum rgya mtsho dbyi bo dus ldan nyi ma rnams kyis 'jig rten lnga sogs da bye ba yis// mI yi bdag po
141b5(rgyud): 'khor lo can ni sra stengs tha dad rnamasu bskor bar byed pa'i mkhas pa rnams// 'khor lo can a dum bu can dang yul gyi bdag po phyag rgya lag dang de las gzhan// phyi ru dus kyi dbye bas nges pa yin te 'jig rten
141b6(rgyud): mgon po yis ni ji bzhin de bzhin du// 'od zer bdun par ri yi gazla'adung thub rnams 'di ru de bzhin snying stobs ldan pa lha yi skye gaun swa dang // nya dang rus sbal dag dang phag pa dang ni mi yi seng grwar ldan dang
141b7(rgyud): mi'u thung dang gshin rdzu ma// ra ma na dang de bzhin brgya dri sta lha ma yin rigs 'dzugs pa ster brdul skyas 'byung ste gnas// nyi shu rtsa gnyis gdan mthar lha min dgrar gyur 'khor lo log pas 'dzin pa tshe lo
141b8(rgyud): brgya pa la ar dang ni go phag mo rnams ni lha ma yin te lto 'phye'i rigasu mun skyes gzhan yang lde// kla klo gis dkar can dang sbrang rtsi'i jo bo 'khrug byed brgyad pa gang zhig lha ma yin du 'gyur// yang dag 'byung ba
142a1(rgyud): bdun pa rnams kyis gsal bar ma ka'i yul du grong khyer ma kA la sogs rnams// 'jig rten gang la gnas pa'i lha min cha ldan stobs dang ldan pa snying rje med pa kla klo'i lus// rnga mo
142a2(rgyud): rta dang ba lang rnams bsod khrag bcas sha dag rlon pa dang ni cung zod btsos pa yis// ba lang sha dang mngal gyi chu dang mar dang tsha ba rnams mnya mo 'bras dang lo ma bsres pa rnams// gcig tu byas
142a3(rgyud): nas mA yis bcos pa nags kyi 'bras bu rnams dang ldan pa mo rnams bza' ba dang // bya rnams kyi ni sgo nga btung po yin te mI yi bdag po lha ma yin rnams da ltar gnas// shes pa po drang nus ljin
142a4(rgyud): / rlung lha'i btsun mo'i bu dang bya khyud lha yi chu dang mis byin dang // 'dod 'jo dang ni drag mo glog rnams kun gyis lha skad bzang pos yi ge mchog tu rig pa yi// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang ldan 'di rnams ris
142a5(rgyud): kyis sa la 'jug pa rgyal ba'i ye shes sku// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung bar gyur pa rig byed tshad sogs bstan bcos mtha' dag rab tu gsungs// phyogs bzhi rnamasu brgya la mtha' yis bsgyur
142a6(rgyud): ba'i dpag rnams kyi tshad ldan ri yis bskor bA yi// sham pA la yi kA lA pa ru dpal ldan rgyal po nyin zhag cung zad bzhugs par rab tu grags// rang gi gran su khyod 'gro bye na rab mchog mi yi bdage ba
142a7(rgyud): bzhag par bya ba'i lho yi bla ma'o// dpal ldan mi bdag bdun ni shAkya'i rigasu rab tu gsal te brgyad pa dpal ldan grags pa ste// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje lo lha'i mchog gis phyag byas pa rnas
142a8(rgyud): 'dir ni rdo rje rigs gcig tu/ rdo rje dbang byin nas ni mtha' dag rigs gcig byas pas shAkya'ang rigs rnams nyid du 'gyur ba'o// yang dag ye shes mngon bgrod dpal ldan gragaso pa phyog na du
142b1(rgyud): bsnams lha min rig su rnams 'jigs pa ste// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru rab tu gsal ba yang ni sa la dus 'khor byed par 'gyur// de rnams dbus nyi shu rtsa lnga rim pas rab tu rtsis pa'i gdun
142b2(rgyud): rnams kyi ni dus kyi mthor// rigs gcig rigasu lha yi dbang po 'gyur te lha mchog phyag byis pa de drag po rigs gtsug pa// logs pa'i nang nas zhi ba'i rang bzhin bde ster de nas kyis kle klo rnams ni
142b3(rgyud): mtha' ru byed// rta mchog phyibs nas 'khor lo can gyis stobs bcas dgra yi sde go sod 'phang mdung bcas pas nyi zer ltar// rigs gcig rigs rnams dbusu lag pas dus la bsgyur ba'i bu dang
142b4(rgyud): tshwa bo dag ni 'das pa dang / dusA dar gyur par nges par ma ka ta yi yul du kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug par nges pa ste// ji srid kla klo'i dbang po ma rungs pa dang lha mchog phyag byas dgra bo'i rigs gcig dag
142b5(rgyud): gi 'tshams rba dus da ru ni gnyis po yang ni sa stangs gnasu 'thab mo drag po rab tu 'gyur ba ste// kla klo rnams las sa stengs ma lus yan lag bzhi yi rang sde rnams kyi g.yul du brgya ba pA dang // ke la sha
142b6(rgyud): yi rI la dus kyi mtha' ru lhag byas khang steng 'khor lo bsgyur ba 'gro 'gyur ste// drag po gzhon nu tshegs bdag khyab 'jug rnams kyang rogs por byas te rigs gcig len par byed pa ni// rta mchog glang
142b7(rgyud): po'i dbang po gser gyi shing rta'i mi dbang lag na mtshon 'dzin dpa' ba'i 'khor rnams las// rta mchog rlung gi shugs ldan yon tan yon tan gyis bsgyur bye ba rnams ste kha dog sna tshogs dang // rig byed
142b8(rgyud): dbang po 'bum grangs chang gis myos pa'i glang po rnams dang shing rta 'byung 'bum dang // ther 'bum drug rnams nyid dang bya ba ro dang dgu bcu rigs rnams dbu brgyan bcings pa mi dbang po// de ltar rnams dang
143a1(rgyud): rigs gcig gyur pa'i khyab 'jug bde byed ldan pas kA klo 'jigs par byed par 'gyur// mchog tu dpa' ba rno bzung 'khor gyis kla klo'i tshogs la brdeg byed glang mchog gis ni glas
143a2(rgyud): la mchog rta bas rta pa rnams ste mnyam dang mi mnyam g.yul du sa bdag rnams kyis sa bdag la// lha ma yin la zla chen bu sta ha nu mna? tas mtshon cha rnon po rnams kyis brdeg par 'gyur// dag pos kla klo'i dbang
143a3(rgyud): po lha min bdag po mgon 'gyur ma lus 'joms dang 'jigs byed rigs gcig pas// yul du klu klo thams cad bcom nas nor lha bde byed ldan pa'i snga sta rigs gcig rnams ni// kye la sha yi ri la gshegs pa
143a4(rgyud): 'gyur te lhas spras khang pa brtsegs pa 'khor lo can gnas par// da dus la mtha' dag skye bo'i rigs rnams chos dang 'dod pa nor rnams yongasu gang pa dang // 'bru rnams dgon par skye ba dang ni nges par shing // 
143a5(rgyud): rnams 'bras bu brtan pas madrangs par 'gyur ba dang // kla klo'i tshigs rnams skye bos yongasu ldan pa rnams ni bcad nas mi rnams lo brgya'i phyed rnams kyis// rigs gcig gyur nas ltos spras khang pa brtseg// 
143a6(rgyud): pa mthon bai kye la sha yi steng du dngos grub thob// lha dang mi yi bla ma'i sras dag lho yi bla ma bram ze dag gis chos zung du ni 'gyur ba yin// bram ze rgyab kyi dum bu gcig tu yin te mo yi bdag po g.yas kyis ru
143a7(rgyud): sA'i lha'i bla ma so// g.yas kyi l-I m+binA kle klo'i chos rnams mtha' dag srid pa gsum gyi bla mas gcod par byang ba ste// bcad na sa brgyad brgya'i lo ru gnas ste bram ze bzhag nas bde ba'i gan su 'gro bar byed// 
143a8(rgyud): phyis ni de nyid dbusu mi yi bdag po rigs kyi dbye bas sras rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te// de rnams dbusu lho min dbang po mi yi bdag po thub pa rnams te tha ma la gzhan bcas 'gyur// lha rnams bdag po dus/ 
143b1(rgyud): bubacug nyis rnams su dbang po la phyogs 'gro ba gagro 'jig par rgyu// dus budang nr-i dum bur k+Sha klo'i chos rnamasaM bac+doMs nas 'khor lo can de bde ba'i rang bzhin 'gro/ dus gsum lnga mi prA m+bu'i sgras te bram pa
143b2(rgyud): dang ni lU yi dbang po nyid dge rgyab dang mdun nas ste// rgyub tu bram ze liso gsuM rigs ni ni mI ba sde tshogs sa yi snying du mi ni tshum na na na na kyi na
143b3(rgyud): ma / ma dzun dang // rigs gcig bar du tshig brgya'i lo yi grangs ni skye bo rnams kyi tsher ni rab tu 'gyur ba'o// de ltar dum bu thams cad la yang dus kyi dbye bas kla klo'i chos ni rab tu 'jug pa ste// lo ni brgya/ 
143b4(rgyud): brgyar rnams su nges par gnas ste de nas gzhan yang kla klo'i chos rnams 'jig pa'o// de nas stong phrag nyi shu la ni nyis brgya bral ba'i sangs rgyas chos ni rab tu 'jug pa'o// rdzogs ldan gsu
143b5(rgyud): ldan gnyis ldan nges par brtsod pa'i dus rnams sa ga ti tshad kyis sa skyengs gnas su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams rnams skye dang gza' dang rkang pa lo rnams nyid dang 'khor lo can rnams byung gyur
143b6(rgyud): nas kla klo rnams kyi chos 'jig pa dang bde ba dam pa'i rang bzhin rigs gcig pa yi lAm ster ba'o// don rnams 'di dag thams cad zla bzang khyod kyi don du bdag gis ji ltar bzhin du dus glasu
143b7(rgyud): stan slad ma skye bo mtha' dag rnams la phan dang thar pa'i rgyu ru bdag la khyod ni ci zhig 'dri// dpal chen po'i sangs rgyas las btus pa// dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba las/ 'jig/ 
143b8(rgyud): rten khams kyi rnam par dgod pa ste/ le'u dang po'o// / rdzogs s+ho// 
144a1(rgyud): rgyal ba bskyed byed khyed kyis rab tu bstan pa'i sna tshogs tshad rnams gang lags bdag gis mi shes pas// slar yang bdag nyid nyan par 'tshal te srid pa gsum po mtha' dag lus kyi
144a2(rgyud): dbus su ji lta bar zla ba bzang po'i tshig 'di shin du bde bar gshegs pas gnas nas legs so zhes gsungs gnang ba mdzad// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru dam pa'i snying rjes lus la yang ni sna tshogs tshud
144a3(rgyud): rnams/ sa chu me rlung rnams dang rdo rje dang ni lha yi gzhu dang rlung dang khyim gyi 'khor lo dang // zla nyi dag dang sgra gcan lhun po gdeng ka ma dang lha yi gnas dang 'khyog po skar mar bcas// 'pho ba dang ni zla ba phyed bcas dang ni nyin
144a4(rgyud): mtshan chos rnams ma lus lus kyi dbus nyid du/ rnal 'byor pa yis shes bya rang rang rigs kyi khyab bdag rnam gsum gnas pa stong pa'i dbye ba yis// lus 'di nyid la ro drug ma lus zos shing 'thungs pa
144a5(rgyud): lus ni khams rnams tshogasu gyur pa'o// 'byung ba rnams las ro drug nges par rab gsal 'gyur te 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams nam mkha'i khams las 'byung // stong pa dang ni ye shes rnam par 'dres par gyur
144a6(rgyud): pas ro mnyam pa la 'gyur med rtag pa'o// de ltar 'byung ba la gnas zhi ba srid gsum la gnas kyim gyur pa rang gi lus la rig par bya// pad mar 'dzem pa'i sa bon sa yis 'dzin te de las gang zhig phyi nas chu yi
144a7(rgyud): bskyed par byed de ro nyid ro zos pa rnams ma yis smin par byed cing rlung gis 'di nyid 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'phel ba las na nam mkhas go skabs 'byed de mi'i bdag po dus kyi dbang gis de ltar grub/ rab
144a8(rgyud): bskyod dus ni lha mo rnams kyi gnas skabs rnams su byed pa byis pa la sogs dus la'o// sa bon la na sa yis gsal bar lci dang 'khregs par byed ste de ltar chu yis gshar ba nyid// 'di na me yis smin par
144b1(rgyud): byed ste rlung mchog rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis 'phel bar byed pa ste// 'phel ba las ni phyi nas nam mkhas go skabs 'byed ste dus kyi dbang gis de ltar skye ba'o// gong ba sgra dang yid bcas nus pa rnams ni dngos po sna tshogs
144b2(rgyud): du ma rnams kyis spro bar byed/ gsang ba'i chu skyes khrag gi dbus su gang tshe byang chub sa bon srog bcas lhung ba'i tshe// nya dang rus sbrul dang ni phag par 'gyur zhing mi yi seng ge mi thung rangs byed ram dang // nag po sangs
144b3(rgyud): rgyas 'dus pa nyid rnams mi dbang bcu ru 'gyur te 'di bcu rnams kyi gnas skabs kyang // mngal du rnam pa gsum dang btsa' dus de bzhin gcig ste byis pa yi ni dus kyang gnyis nyid las/ gzhon nu lang tshe dag yin
144b4(rgyud): rgyas pa gzhan zhes pa ni de bzhin yang dag re re nyid du 'gyur// rgyas pa nyid nas zhi ba'i ba la gcig ste srad 'jig mtha' ma rnams ni mngal skyes rnams kyi'o// nyin zhag cung zad par la nya'i gnas skabs
144b5(rgyud): nya dang ru sbal nyid kyang ru sbal rnam par snang // phag pa de nyid nyi ma'i skye mchod rnams ni skye 'gyur gzhan yang mi yi seng ge nyid kyang ngo // mi'u thung la byis pa nyid dang rang byed zhes la mi yi
144b6(rgyud): bdag po gnyis kyi sgo skye 'gyur ba dang // slar yang ra ma so lhung gyur pa de nyid nag po'i gnas skabs nyid na gsal bar rgyu byed 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyid la zhing dang brtul zhugs dag
144b7(rgyud): kyang nges par byed ste rigs gcig zhi 'chi bar 'gyur// khu ba las ni rkang mar rus pa rtsa ru 'gyur te khrag las dris par lpags pa khrag dang sha/ mda' dbus za ba gcig tu khrag dang sa
144b8(rgyud): bon dag las rab tu bskyed pas 'chi med ror gyur pa// phyis nas sa bon myu gu las ni rang gi snying khar rtsa ni shin du 'phra ba rnam pa bcu// lte bar brgyad pa brgyad ste
145a1(rgyud): @##/ gzhan yang lag pa rkang pa gdong rnams phyi ru 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni// zla ba gnyis pa rdzogs nas lag pa rkang pa gdong rnams cung zad 'dir ni mdo ru bstan pa'o// zla gsum rdzogs nas
145a2(rgyud): lag pa rkang pa dag dang mgrin pa rnams kyi rtse mo ma lus mnyam par 'gyur// zla ba bzhin lag pa rkang pa gdong dang mgrin pa rnams kyi phyogs su rtsa ni phra mo rnams// zla ba lnga par sha rnams la ni rten pa'i rus pa na mkha'
145a3(rgyud): ro dang ma dang tshig rnams kyang // zla ba drug pa la yang sha dang khrag dang tshe ra ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rnams su 'gyur// thub pa mchog lho smin ma dang na skra dang bug pa spu rnams kyang ste zla ba'i rjes nyid la// nyan zhag so so'i
145a4(rgyud): dus su rtsa rnams rab tu 'phel ba stong pa stong pa mig ga grangs rnams kyis// gnad dang rus pa rnams dang rkang dang rIr ldan dri chen dra chu rnams ni brgyad pa nyid le'o// bug pa zhes byar skye ba'i dus su de la skye gnas
145a5(rgyud): kyis bsdams mi bzed sdug bsngal chen por 'gyur// mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal la// gzhon nu lang tshe dag la bud med nor dang bkra shas
145a6(rgyud): 'dod pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang // rga sra dang 'chi ba'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bod la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ste ba// 'gro ba'i 'de rnams ma lus sgyu ma la rmongs gyur pas/ 
145a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal gyur pa'o// 'khor ba'i nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi bla na brgya lam zhig na'o// de las dge ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags 'gyur dang dang po'i
145a8(rgyud): theg par rab tu 'jug de las dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po bsgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na'o// de las sangs rgyas nyid ste 'dod mchog bde ba'i go 'phang la 'jug e ma shin du dka' ba'o// 
145b1(rgyud): mngal du yang dag pa'i sku ste skye ba'i dus nas so skye'i bar nyid chos kyi sku// so rnams rjes pa'i bar gyis rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs skur nges par 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// de nas nges par mi rnams 'chi ba'i mtha'
145b2(rgyud): ru sprul po'i sku ru rab tu bsol bar brjod pa ste// slar yang 'dir ni ye shes rnams shes dbye bas mngal dang phyi ru rnam po bzhi ru 'gyur ba'o// slar yang rnam shes zla ba nyi ma pad mar 'dres par gyur pa rnams ni mnga'
145b3(rgyud): du dag pa'i ske/ khams ca phung po rnam pa bcu po skye bar 'gyur ba gang zhig rgyal ba'i chos skur 'gyur ba'o// de nas rna ba sgra la sogs pa skye ba yon tan dbang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur// de nas rna ba sgra
145b4(rgyud): la sogs pa skye ste mngal nas skye ba'i dus 'di sprul pa'i sku ru brjod pa'o// gang zhig skyes nas dbugs dbyung ba ni nges par de nyid dag pa'i sku ru rab tu 'gyur bar nges// de nas gang zhig sa skye gyur nas tshig mi gsal
145b5(rgyud): bar slar yang de bzhin chos kyi sku ru brjed// de nas gnyis skye ba rnams rjes pa rgyal po'i longs spyod rdzogs par 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// sa rnams rjes nas 'chi ba'i mthar thug rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sprul pa'i
145b6(rgyud): sku ru 'gyur ba phyi rol du// ye shes dang ni rnam shes 'dres po'i nyi ma ri bong can bcas ye shes rdo rje la sogs rnams// mngal du sku rdo rje la sogs pa stobs dang ldan pa yang dag rim pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// dang
145b7(rgyud): par mngal 'dir dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur ste gsung gi rang bzhin rab tu skyes pa'i dus// so rnams skyes pa nges par thugs ste slar yang byung nas skyes pa ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa'o// sa yi snying por me
145b8(rgyud): nyid du ni 'gyur ste stong pa'i snying por sa dang rlung dag nyid kyang ngo // rlung dang sa nyid dag gi snying por chu nyid 'gyur ste rang bzhin med dang rang bzhin bcas pa yin// sa yi rten ni chu ste rma/ ka chu yi mer brjod
146a1(rgyud): me'i 'dir ni rten nyid rlung zhes bya'o// rlung gi stong pa yin te ji ltar rten dang rten pa rnams kyi tshul du rab tu 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// phung po'i rten ni 'byung ba rnams su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la
146a2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rtsa rnams so// rtsa rnams kyi ni sreg gi rlung 'gyur rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ste srog gi rlung gi sems dpa'o// sems kyi drang bzhin gnyis su 'gyur te yon tan dbang las rang bzhin bcas dang rang bzhin
146a3(rgyud): med pa yi/ rten du 'gyur ba'i gtso bo de ni srid pa gsum pos phyag byas kun 'gro gzhom du med pa'o// sa las dri skyed pa ste yang ni me las ro dang chu las gzugs kyi khams kyi rnam pa'o// rlung las reg bya nyid dang
146a4(rgyud): zhi ba las kyang sgra te namA mkha' las ni chos kyi dbyings nyid do// stong pas sgra rnams 'dzin par byed ste nges par rgyal bskyed byed pas chos kyi dbyings dang rlung nyid kyis// dri dang chu yis me'i rang bzhin ro dang gzugs ste/ 
146a5(rgyud): sa yis rlung ste reg bya nyid kyang ngo // srid pa gsum gyi gnas su sa las gzugs su grub ste yang ni chu las 'du shes grub par 'gyur// me las nges par tshor ba rab tu brjod ste rlung las 'du byed phung por 'gyur bar
146a6(rgyud): nges pa'o// nam mkha' rdo rje dgra las rnam par shes dang ye shes 'byung ste 'dir ni drug pa 'dres pa'i lus// khams dang phung po la sogs thams cad khrag dang byang chub sems las sogs pa sbyor ba la ni 'gyur// 
146a7(rgyud): rna ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin yan ste sems ni nam mkha' rang bzhin 'gyur ro ma ya bdag po kye// sna ni sa yi rang bzhin 'gyur te de ltar ro ma zhes su brjod pa'i me'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba'o// mag ni chu yi rang bzhin nyid dang
146a8(rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi gnas su rlung gi rang bzhin lus pa'o// de ltar rna ba la sogs thams cad yon tan dbang las 'gyur te ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba las// lus kyi mchog la ye shes kham su ser snar 'gyur te nam
146b1(rgyud): mkha'i khams las zhe sdang rdo rje'o// rlung las phrag dog rdo rjer rab tu gsal bar gsungs ste de bzhin me las 'dod chags rdo rje'o// chu las nga rgyal sa las gti mug dag tu 'gyur ste rang bzhin dbang las yon tan rnams
146b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ ngag rkang lag pa gshang pa'o lam rnams rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams las mi 'gyur ba'o// ye shes khams su thur sel rnam pa gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur sti stong pa las kyang srog gi rlung // rlung gi dbus
146b3(rgyud): nas mnyam dang mo las slar yang gyen du rgyu bar brjod dang chu las khyab byed nyid// sa las rlung dang de nas ru sba la rtsangs pa lha sprin nor rnams las ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rlung // bzhi po rnams ni rlung dang mi dang chu dang sa rnas
146b4(rgyud): nyid las rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba'o// stong pa'i khams las lha dang mI rnams kyi ni gcud shi tsed gyur te ye shes khams los gsang ba'o// gsal bar rlung gi khams las snying khar pad mar 'gyur te nges par me
146b5(rgyud): las mgrin pa'i 'khor lo smros// chu las sman ma'i dbus kyi pad ma dang ni sa las nor dang nor mdab lte ba'i pad ma dag/ rkang pa lag pa dag la tshigs drug sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams gsum gyi grangs kyis so// 
146b6(rgyud): sa las stsogs pa khams lnga yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid las rkang pa lag pa dag tu gyur// 'thab mo la sogs sor mo bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i tshigs kyi tshogs rnams mtha' dag gyur pa rnams/ 
146b7(rgyud): de rnams sen mo'i mtha' ru yang dag bzung ste slar yang sngo rnams de nyid rab tu dbye ba yis// gi zhag gzhan yang lus mchog pa spu'i mtha' ru yin te de nyid de'i khams su rig par bya// gsang ba gtsug tor dang na lte ba
146b8(rgyud): rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba sku ni rang bzhin mad// snying kha la 'khor lo re chos kyi sku ru 'gyur te thig le'i pad mar yang na sprul pa sku nyid dang // mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru yang dag 'gyur te yon tan
147a1(rgyud): dbang la rims kyis lhag pa'i lha// snying kha'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi ba'i pad mar chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang dag pa'o// lte ba mgrin pa gsang ba spyi bo snying kha nas dang
147a2(rgyud): de bzhin gtsug gtor dbus nyid rnams la ni/ yum dang gtso bo sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rim pas rnam pa gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba ste// pad ma rnams las 'khor lo rin chen nam mkha' chu las ral gri rdo rje
147a3(rgyud): rnams ldan rogs drug mchog/ de rnams steng 'og rtsa gsum rnams la zla ba nyi ma ma'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// lus la bsam pa rab zhugs nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam pa dang bsam pa'i dbus
147a4(rgyud): lus nyid kyang / rang bzhin yon tan dbang las kha dog rnams kyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ldan pas rag par bya ba ste/ kha dog ser po nag po dmar po dkar po rnams ni swa dang rlung dang ma dang chu rnams la// ye shes
147a5(rgyud): nam mkha' dag kyang lus drang bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas sngo dang ljang khu dag tu 'gyur// shes rab thabs dag rus pa dang ni sha ste chu dang khrag bcas pa dang me dang lci ba nyid// rlung dang gshang pa dag dang stong pa khu
147a6(rgyud): ba dpal ldan rdul dang byang sems mchog gi lus la 'gyur// gzhan yang rna ba sgra la sogs pa rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang las ngag gi rang bzhin stsogs// de ltar lha mo rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams bcas
147a7(rgyud): yul dang yul can dkyil 'khor la ni brjod par bya// stong phrag drug gi rtsa rnams nyi byad kyis bsgyur ba yas mngal gyi dbus su rab tu byed pa dang // ra bong 'dzin pa spangs nas nyid longs pa'i bar rnams la ni
147a8(rgyud): rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// lo rnams bcu gnyis par la rang rang lus la nyam khams rnams 'phel ba dang na spong ba ste// nyin dang nyi zung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i da bya bas skyes nas rtsa rnams 'chad par
147b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan 'byung ba rnams dang dbang po rnams ni bcu ru 'gyur te las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang // de tsam sngar gsungs pa dang yon tan bcas pa'i yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin pa dang bzang po ste// de nyid 'di
147b2(rgyud): rnams lus dang sred pa gsum gyi gnas su khyab bdag gis ni kun la longs spyod ste// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid srid pa rnam gsum 'gro ba'i bdag nyid rang gi las skyes pa la'o// sa sra ba dang chu gsher ba
147b3(rgyud): ste me ni nges par tsha dang rlung nyid yang ba nyid du brjod// bug pa stong pa sra ba rus pa lha ri mchog tu brjod ste char pa 'dir ni bdud rtsir 'gyur// rdo rje sgra dang dbang po gzhu dang bshad pa yang ste chu tshod dbugs 'byung
147b4(rgyud): 'jug pa'i zung dag go/ zung 'di dag ni dgu brgya nyis 'gyur rnams kyis 'pho ba gcig yin bug pa'i dbye bas skar ma rnams// rgyu skar so so'i rim pa nyid ste nyin zhag so so'i chu tshod rnams ni tshigs kyi dbye bar
147b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ rtswa rnams chu bo chu ba rnams dang rgyu mu sprin dang ri bong can gzhan cha dgo rang bzhin gnyis// ba spu shig rnams dang ni srin bu khu ba rnams ni 'byung ba'i skye gnas rnam pa bzhi rnams ste// dga' ba la sogs
147b6(rgyud): sor mo'i tshigs dang mgo bo'i pad ma dang ni lte ba'i pad+ma mar rdzogs pa'o// tshangs gnas mtho ris 'jig rten nyid ste mchog gi lag rkang dag gi ma yul sa 'og 'jig rten ste// rgya mtsho'i glang dang ri rnams gshe
147b7(rgyud): dang 'jam dang sra ba rnams kyi khams rnams gsum gyi rang bzhin no// bA tshwa'i rgya mtsho me dag 'dir ni gcig ste bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor khrag dang lpags pa rgyal po kye// spu rnams mtha' dag rab tu rdzogs pa
147b8(rgyud): srid gsum gnas su du ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis 'grub pa'o// snying dang mgrin pa lte ba'i pad ma rdo rje nyi ma me rnams rim pas yang dag spro bya ba// gzhu yi rnam pa zlum po nyid ste nyi ma so so'i sbyin bsreg rgya mtshor
148a1(rgyud): @ gzur ldan thab khung du/ de rnams kyi na steng du me mchog dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes sku ste mun pa'i mthar// gang du nyi ma glog gis bsreg min ri bong 'dzin dang gza' dang skar ma la sogs snang ba
148a2(rgyud): med/ gza' rnams snyang kha'i pad ma'i ma dab ma rnams ste gsal bar chu tshod lte ba'i pad ma drug bcu'o// smin ma'i dbus su zla ba'i rkang pa ma nu yin te longs spyod 'khor lo rgyu skar mi bdag kye/  pad ma'i lha
148a3(rgyud): bar rgyu skar rnams kyi slar yang chu tshod rnams su rnal 'byor rnams kyi reg bya ba/ chu tshod rnams la chu srang rnams ste gsal bar mtha' dag lus kyi lag rkang la sogs chags kyang ngo // lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma mdag
148a4(rgyud): mar mchog gi cha rnams 'khor po rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur ba ni// srog zung rnams kyi 'pho ba dgu brgya nyes 'gyur rnams kyis kar ka Ta ya dus sbyor ma dbang kye/ dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pa nyon mtshan
148a5(rgyud): 'khor ba de nyid de ru rig par bya ba ni// dus sbyor tshad rnams shes par bya ste bu lon nor du g.yas dang g.yon du mnyam par bgrod pa'o// pad mo'i mdab ma re rer nub kyi phyogs su sa dang byang du nyag rab tu rgyu ba'o// 
148a6(rgyud): lho ru me dang shar du rab tu rgyu ba rlung ste gzhan yang mdab ma'i dbus su stong pa'o// 'pho ba lnga'i dbye ba rnams kyi mtshams nas rab tu rgyu ba drug bcu'i dbus las dman pa'o// de ltar 'pho bo'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin
148a7(rgyud): zhag so so'i dus su dus sbyor rnams kyis dbye bar 'gyur/ stong pa la sogs// de nyid lnga rnams byang nas nges par rab tu rgyu ste sa la sregs pa g.yas// sgra gcan dus me dag dang zla ba nyi ma gza'i lhag skyes sa pa
148a8(rgyud): bsangs dang bla ma dang / 'jog rings dal ba rnams ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po bcu rnams zhing can 'gyur// g.yon du zla ba dbang por 'gyur te g.yas phyogs su na nyi ma nyid de mi bdag
148b1(rgyud): kye/ da ya steng du snying khwa'i phyogs na nor gyi mdab ma'i rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams ni yang dag gnas pa'o// srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs rnams ri bong can dang nyi ma me rnams g.yon dang g.yas dang dbus/ g.yon gyi zla ba'i
148b2(rgyud): rtsa nas ri bong can mtshon yin te g.yas kyi nyi ma las ni khrag nyid do// dbus nas dus ma'i rang bzhin dus sbyor rnams kyi 'tshams su drug bcu'i dbugs las dman pa rgyu ba'o// nor gyi pad ma'i mdab mar srog dang thur
148b3(rgyud): du rgyu dang mnyam gnas gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams dang // khyab byad dang ni klu dang ru sbal dag dang rtsangs pa gzhon yang lha min nor rgyal rlung rnams te// de ltar rtsa yi 'khor lor las kyi dbye bas rlung rnams rnam pa bcu ru
148b4(rgyud): yang dag gnas pa ni/ snar mo la sogs dung can mthar thug rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag rnams ni snying kha'i pad ma'o// srog gis srog ldan byed cing nyi ma ri bong can nyid lam nas 'gro ste bza' btung mtha' dag
148b5(rgyud): rnams/ 'og tu khyer ba thur du rgyu ba yin ste lus la ma lus ro mnyam byed pA mnyam par brjod// lus la skyong byang gyen du rgyu bar brjod par khwa dang lag pa rkang pas glu gar byed pas so// nad nyid byed pas khyab byed
148b6(rgyud): zhes pa rang bzhin yon tan dbong las de bzhin lus 'joms byed paso// klu yas bsgregs pa nyid ste gsal bar lag pa dang na rkang pa 'gags par byed pa ru sprul lo// khro dang 'khrug pa mtha' dag rtsangs pa'i rlung
148b7(rgyud): gis byed ste dbul bar byed pa lha sbyin nyid kyis so// lus la lnga 'gyur mtha' yang rlung gcig gis ni mi gtong pa de nor rgyal nyid ste mi bdag kye// de ltar srog las stsogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad kyis na
148b8(rgyud): rang bzhin gyur pa'i yon tan rnams mi 'dor// ser skya phra mo lug ste rtsa rnams lam gsum nyid gnas pa snar ma dani glang chen lce// rgyal nyid drug pa dang na rgyal ba 'gro med 'phyang ba nor ste dpal ldan kun ku ha
149a1(rgyud): //  bu ban phyogs kyi grangs dgang nig byang chubs thon ba pa'i ma na 'gag slo bdag go// desngar dang la ldan du 'kho ma rgyanas kyang byo bdums rnam pa chung por 'gyur / 
149a2(rgyud): dbang po ma dang gshin rdzob deni bral chu ltar bcas pa rlung dang nor dang dbang ldan nyid rnams kyis// gnas 'di rnams su gnas pa nyin canapo ni de yi rang bzhin rgyu zhing longs spyod do// de stengs mgrin pa'i 'khor lor
149a3(rgyud): graza' tshogs dang bcas rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas par brjod pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas gyur dpal ldan dpral bar dbyangs kyis yongs bskor ba la thig le dka' nges par 'dzag rtsa bar sa dang g.yon du chu
149a4(rgyud): nyid rab tu yan te g.yas su byin za dang ni steng du rlung // dbus su nam mkha' yin te sna yi bug pa gnyis po dag nas rim pas mnyam par rab tu rgyu// 'di rnams nus pas rab tu phug nas mchog gi rang bzhin 'gro
149a5(rgyud): / zhing bcu gnyis mtha' nas cho mtha' yang // zhing lo stsogs pa lag pa rkang pa dag gi pad ma gnyis kyi sor mo ma lus rnams kyi mthar// 'khor lo tsan ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can sti lha mchog bdag po yan lag bcu
149a6(rgyud): gnyis 'gog/ rigs gcig yang dag ye shes yin te shring rta mngal gzhug pa rnams 'phags pa'i tshad med do// drag po rang rgyal mang can nyid du rab tu 'gyur ste ha nu man ta nyan thos srog chags so// ma rudwa/ 
149a7(rgyud): kla klo'i dbang po sdig pa nyid ske gcod byed sdug bsngal star nyid mi dge ba yi lim// rta yi stobs nyid ma rig pa ste lha min+da stobs ni bdud kyi phyogs rnams bzhi po ma lus pa'i// dri rnams 'thab pa sdud pa srid pa'i 'jig
149a8(rgyud): 'joms pa ste rgyal bas dpal dang ldan pa thar pa'i lam// ke la sha ru chos ster sred pa'i 'joms pa po ste rdzas kyis gang po'i sa nyod khams dag pa// bu dge lha dang mi ya bla ma bram ze lha dbang rgyab dang
149b1(rgyud): mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'od srid gsum rnam par rgyal ba 'jas dpal 'jig rten mgon dag dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sa bon no// sa stangs rgyab du bram ze lasogs sna tshogs rigs ni rnam dag pa'i sa/ 
149b2(rgyud): rgyas du mi'i// de ltar kla klo'i dbang po nges par 'thab par 'gyur ba lus can rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su'o// phyi ru rgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi nges yin nam mkha' yul du kla klo'i 'thab mo 'thab pa min/ dus lo ma yi
149b3(rgyud): grangs ste lo nyid nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur ba bgrod pa'i dbye bas rags drug 'gyur// sum bcu'i chas thob zla ba sum bcu rtsa drug ro la ro yas bsgyur ba rnal 'byor mo rnams rags// gza' yi dbye bas cha thob pa
149b4(rgyud): rnams nges par rab tu gsal bar dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams so// zla ba phyed kyi dbye bas lha dang lha mo rnams su mngon par brjod 'gyur mi bdag kye// nyin zhag yan lag las ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum du
149b5(rgyud): 'gyur te bug pa rig byed dang / slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho dang ni me dang chu gtor dag tu 'gyur ste dpal ldan dus dbye bas// de nyid zhes byas gzhan yang drug gis dman dang slar yang de dag phyed kyi dbye bas ste/ phyis
149b6(rgyud): ni gnyis kyi dbye ba bsres ste bcu gsum dgu phyogs rnams dang bug pa de nyid dang bcas rnams/ zla ba'i tshe yi nyin zhig tshogs las nges par gza'a'i cha yis thob par 'gyur ba nyin zhag drug po nyid// rdo rje can gyi phyag
149b7(rgyud): rgya drug po nyid dang gzhan yang nyin zhag tsho gas lhag sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya'o// shes rab thabs dag sku la gsum gnas rnal 'byor ma da pa rgya gyu sa rab tu gsal// nu mas khro bo dag rnams rim pas bcu ru rab
149b8(rgyud): 'gyur ste sangs rgyas lha mo rnams na lnga// gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang dmigs sogs drug ste slar yang lha'i tshogs rnams drug gnyis mi'i bdag po kyi/ rnal 'byor mi dang klu dang gtum po brgyad du gnas pa
150a1(rgyud): 'di rnams thams cad nyos 'gyur brjod pa'o// 'di rnams dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor ma thon yos lhag pa'i brgya dang do'i pyod ni gnas gsum la'o// nyi ma'i cha la zla ba'i nyon zhag so so
150a2(rgyud): nang nas chu tshod drug bcu rnams na nges par 'byung // rnal 'byor ma rnams dus sbyor dang bsres de rnams mtha' dag gnyis kyis bsgyur ba srid gsum gnas su'o// nyi ma'i sa nyan zhag rab tu phye ba gnyis
150a3(rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams 'dir// brjod pa dang bcas mtha'o dag bsdus par gyur pa rnams ni nyi ma'i yon tan gsum gyi nyin zhag rnams// nyan phyed la ni lo'i dbye bar 'gyur zhing ri bong 'dzin
150a4(rgyud): la phyogs kyi dbye bar mtho' dag go// de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas la ni mkha' lag mi'i bdag po rnams kyi lha dang lha mo rnams// thabs dang shes rab nyan mo mtshan mor 'gyur te chu mnyam mtshan byed dang na nyan mo
150a5(rgyud): phyed nyid do// nyan mtshan dus kyi yang dag zla ba'i 'pho ba'i dbye bas gang gis rang gi lus la shes pa'i// de na dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjes srid 'jigs bcom nus skye ba 'di nyid ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// sum
150a6(rgyud): bcu cha yis 'thob dang de las gsum gyos bsgyur ba'i lha dang bdag po dus kyi 'khor lo dang // phyi rol du ni phyag rgya drug ste gzhan yang de nas de bzhin du ni rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang // spyi gtsug tu ni rgya mtsho snying khyer
150a7(rgyud): brgyad dang mgo bor ma'i bdag po mgrin par so'i grangs rnams dang / lte bar brgyad kyis brgyad bsgyur rnams dang mi'i bdag po nyes 'gyur gsung ba'i dbus su rab tu 'grub// rtsa drug 'khor lo 'gog 'gyur/ 
150a8(rgyud): bcu yis yul rnams 'joms ste de rnams 'dus pa'i rang bzhin rnams su brjod// yang dang yang du nyes gyur du yang bsgyur bas bad kan dang ni 'khris pa rlung gi tshe rnas so// de rnams kyis ni nges par 'chi ba
150b1(rgyud): ster zhing bla ma'i nges pa'i rdo tshaM las tshe dang nad med ste// 'khor lo drug la dus kyi rtsa yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni ngo mtshar med// spyi gtsug tu ni rgya mtsho dpral bar chu gtar dus kyis
150b2(rgyud): bsgyur bas bad kan khams rnams rab 'khrugs byed// mgran par so dang snying khwa'i chu skyes la ni dmag gas dus bsgyur 'khris pa'i khams rnams rab 'khrug byedapa e mar rgya mtsho drag btso slar yang gsang
150b3(rgyud): bur ma bdag de bzhin rlung gi khams na rab 'khrug byed// gzhan yang gsang bar phyogs dang drug po gsungs pa rnams kyis nges par 'dus par 'gyur zhing 'gog pa'o// rtsa drug 'khor lo dgag gsungs la
150b4(rgyud): nyid rnam gsum 'gro ba zla ba nyi ma me'i dbye bas so// de dag lus la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog chags gang la 'chi ster ba// drug rnams gang tshe sreg 'jug 'gyur na ma rnams nyid la/ 
150b5(rgyud): rgyun du 'chi ba spong bar ngas// phra mo ru ni srog mi 'jug na rnal 'byor pa rnams 'cha ba'i yul nyid gang gas gcod par byed// gang zhag srog na nyan dang mtshan du rtsa nyid cig nas rgyun dus lo'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ 
150b6(rgyud): gang tshe zla phyed rgyun ma 'chad par rgyun mi rnams kyi no phyed bcas lo'i tshwa ru 'gyur// zla ba gcig tu rnam par ma 'chang rgyun 'tsho ba zla ba gsum gnas ma yi bdag po kye// de ltar rnal 'byor rang gi lus la ri ba
150b7(rgyud): can song ba'i che ba dus kyi 'khor los shes par byed nyin zhag lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar gyur gyi bar du lnga lnga bgrod cing 'phel bar byed pa dang // de nas re res bgrod pa rdzogs pa'i dus dang bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur
150b8(rgyud): dang gsum nyid lhag pa yi/  de srid par la mnyam ste de rnams gsum mag ri bong can dang drug dang gsum zung zla ba rnams// zla ba de rnams lhag ma nyin zhag tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan gnyis dang zla ba'i
151a1(rgyud): 'tsho ba'o// rang gnas khyim gyi 'khor lo chu mchog nyid kyis 'dor ste 'chi ltas lhag ma rnams ni mtshungs pa las// lo dang zla ba dang na nyin nag rnams kyis gsum mag ri bong can dang drug gsum zung
151a2(rgyud): zla ste/ nyi ma mnyam par rdzogs na nges par 'chi ltas nyid de tshos phyogs mda' dang yon tan lte bar zhugs// nyin zhag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyi mtha' ru nyin phyir 'chi ltas sbyor ba yis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// shar du lo
151a3(rgyud): gsum nyin zhag tshogs las mda' dang 'jig rten rnams kyis dor bar byed pa'o// de nas bgrod bcos mda' dus ma ru nges ste mkha' ra zla ba rnams ni gsum pa nyid la'o// mig dang klu dang ri dang mda' dang de bzhin
151a4(rgyud): gzhan yang nor dang log pa bdun pa dag la gnas// de nas tsho la sogs pa nyan zhag tshogs rnams thams cad de ltar lte ba ya na bar nyid do// dus kyi lo nas nyin zhag 'gro ba'i dbang las ji srid rgyu ba yang dag 'phro
151a5(rgyud): ba'i bar du'o/ zla ba zhes pa dang ni nyi ma'i lAm nas mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag cag gi rim pas 'phel// gzhan yang 'pho ba'i dbang gis mi mnyam mnyam bya'i nyin zhag rnams kyis bcu gnyis rtsibs la
151a6(rgyud): spong bar byed/ ji srid phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i bar dang bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang 'tsho ba'i nyin mtshan gsum// dbugs dang chu srang chu tshod rnams dang nyan zhag nyid dang dus rnams la ni rim pas 'phel
151a7(rgyud): bas ste/ lo bdun bgrod pa'i yan lag dang ni drug bcu'i lo rnams la yang bgrod par 'gro ba'i dbang gis so// sum bcu'i lo rnams zla ba gsum gyis dbye ste nyan zhag 'gro ba'i dbang las dus lo zla ba phyed// 
151a8(rgyud): dus 'khor las na sum bcu gnyis phyed dang bcas pa'i bgos pa'i nyan zhag tshogs rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ lte ba'i 'khor lo log pas 'gro la dgus bsgyur phyogs dang phyogs kyis rtsa rnams 'chad par
151b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// tshigs rnams re re'i rtsa la nyin zhag rnams kyis spong ba las kyi 'khor lo dang ni bya ba stan// mgrin par rgyu skar rtsa rnams zla ba'i dbus su ram pas nyin dang nyin las spong bar 'gyur ba'o// theg le la
151b2(rgyud): gnas zla phyed dbus su ri bong can nang snying khar gazla' rtsa gsang gnas rnams la spong // sde tshon rnams ni dbyangs dang bcas rnams nyan phyed 'pho ba bgrod pa'i khyim gyi dbye ba rnams kyis ste// phyi nas re ris
151b3(rgyud): lhag bras 'phel dang rim min nyin dang nyin zhag dus kyi lo nyid bar du'o// lo gcig nas na zla phyed gsum gyi dbus su dbyangs dang nyin zhag dbang las 'phel nas 'chi ba dang // 'tsho ba'i nyin dang mtshan mo gcig gi
151b4(rgyud): dus kyis dbugs 'byin pa dang dbugs rngub pa rnams mdzad par 'gyur// lte ba mgrin pa dpral ba snying kha'i padad+ma ma rnams dang rtsa gzhan lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams la// gnas pa nyi mA ro dang me dang rang snying pad ma/ 
151b5(rgyud): thun phyed dang bcas chu tshad de bzhin du// rkang pa lag pa'i tshigs rnam la ni tshes la dus kyi 'khor lo bsgyur dang nyin zhag drug ga pa'i bar nyid ste// mtha' ru phra mo thams cad rab tu rgyu ba nyan zhag gcig gi snying khwa'i
151b6(rgyud): chu skyes spong bar 'gyur/ lo brgya'i nyin zhag tshogs ste stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams la zung gi rtsa yis 'phral ba'o// gang dang gang gi nyin mtshan dus la nyi ma zla ba rang rang rdzogs pa'i long spyod nus pa med// 
151b7(rgyud): nyi mo'i nyin zhag nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni bu lon du 'gyur zla ba'i longs spyod do ye byad/ rgyu skar nyan zhag dbye bas nyi ma ri bo can dag rgyu ba zla bas stongs ste spangs pa rnams// lus la srog lhag pa ni gsol bar
151b8(rgyud): 'pho ba'i bar du rkang spangs rigaso byed kyis dman drug bcu ste// 'pho ba mo lus dbye ba rnams kyis nyan zhag so so'i dus la rtsa zung nges par 'joms pa'o// lo nyid gzhan dang gzhan gyi dbusu nyi ma ri bong can rgyu ba
152a1(rgyud): ldanalas stong mig ra yi grangs// lha mi rnams kyi rang rang tshe ma tshad kyis de ltar lo brgya rnams kyis dus kyis 'pho bar byed// mi rnams dus rgya'i chen sos btab pa'am nad dam cung zad ma ra gyur pa
152a2(rgyud): na/ de la brtan nas myur bar rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rnams su dus nyid thogs pa med par 'jug/ 'khor lo rnams kyi rtsa nyid 'gags te nyi ma ri bong can 'gro mtha' dag gcod par byas nas kyang // gang zhig la ni dbus
152a3(rgyud): su phra mo la brtan srog chags rnams kyi srog nyid 'phrog ge mi bdag kye// snying kha'i pad ma dang ni dpal ldan dpral bar longs spyod lte ba'i 'khor lo rnams la zla ba yi// rkang pa rgyu ba 'byung phyogs tshis dang bcu
152a4(rgyud): la dgu ldan pa dang drag po zung dang rgyal ba dang // de nyid rnams ni nyan zhag bdun phrag rnams kyis spong ste slar yang rim pas ri bong can// thig le gang bar rab tu byas ste yang ni snying khar dkar po'i phyogs la nor
152a5(rgyud): du 'jug/ slar yang nag por de bzhin bu lon 'jug pa rkang pa dang na rkang pa lte bro'i pad ma'i bar// snying kha mgo bor rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs ni de bzhin chu skyes gnag dang dkar ba nyid/ mgrin par su
152a6(rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis rtsibs dang gzhan yang lta bar nyis 'gyur dmar po dang ni ser po'o// brgyad pa gnyis ni mgrin pa lte ba las ste mgo dang snying khar dkar dang gnag po grang pa'o// a sogs hA ya ra wa lar ldan
152a7(rgyud): dbyangs rnams sum bcu thig le dpal ldan tsheg drag gis phye na// drug bcur 'gyur ste de rnams dus dang mi bdag klu dang so'i ge sar rtse mo rnams la'o// rtag sogs sde tshan rnams la thig le A dang A dang po
152a8(rgyud): sar rga yis phye na pad mchog 'dab rta nyi shu lhag pa'i tshigs brgya rnams la thun gyi 'gro ba'i dbang gis nyi ma 'phel dang 'grib pa'o// zla ba phyed du zla ba nyid rgyu ba la nyin zhag cog gi rkang pas bu lon du yang byed/ 
152b1(rgyud): slar yang zla ba gnyis la nyin zhag nyid kyis 'phel bar 'gyur te gzhan yang le nyid sbyor ba yis/ gang ba'i lo la nyin zhag drug tu 'gyur te yang ni de bzhin 'tsho ba'i 'tshams su 'phel ba'o// de bzhin 'dir ni nyi mar gnyis
152b2(rgyud): 'gyur dag tu lo dang lo la bu lon 'phel lo mi bdag kye// dbugs drug gis ni chu srang gcig tu rab tu 'gyur te chu srang drug bcus chu tshod zhes su brjodad / chu tshod drug bcus nyin zhag nyid du 'gyur te gnan sum thun 'gyur
152b3(rgyud): ba rnams kyis zla ba gcig/ zla ba drug gis bgrod par 'gyur ste bgrod pa nyis gyur dag gis la gcig tu ni rab tu grub// skyes bu rnams kyis tshes 'gyur lo brgya rnams la bu lon 'gro ba dus kyi rtsa yi dbang gis so// 
152b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na lha dang lha mni mo rnams nang nas rang gi lus la nyi zla rgyu ba dag/ rnal 'byor stobs kyis gang pa nus pa med pa zla ba nyin zhag tshogs la longs mi spyod pa dang // nyi mas rgyu skar thams cad la ni srid par
152b5(rgyud): lo nyid dbus su rim pas longs spyod pas sa// lo dang lo yi nang nas bu lon gyis 'bring dus kyi 'khor lo gcig nyid dpa' bas sred pa 'joms// gang gis rtsa gcog chad par gyur na gcig ni skyur mo nyid du 'gyur ro ma
152b6(rgyud): bdag kye/ gong bu rnam par 'chad pa'i dus su de tsam ldan nyin zhag lnga dang mchog gi cha spong ba// rna bar sgra dang kha yas nges par ro rnams spong ba yin te mig gi dbus su gzugs nyid do// sna yis dri dang mi rnams kyi ni rkang
152b7(rgyud): pa lag pa dus kyi drod rnams rang bzhin rim pa yis// skra'i rtse mo 'phyang bar gyur pa dang ni spyi bor lag pas bzung na de'i rang bzhin mthong ba dang // lag mthil gnyis su rgya sgyogs dmar po rab tu byugs par gyur kyang
152b8(rgyud): dmar por mi 'gyur ba nyid dang // nya ma kha dog gnag dang ri bong 'dzin pa yongasu gang bar gyur pa kha dog ser por mthong // gcin dang lus po drang mor gyur na de'i nyin zhag nyin la 'chi bar nges so mo'i bdag po kye/ lce 'og
153a1(rgyud): dugs teg pa nigs mtha'ad mi sag nga chos mthong thu na matsun pa sus ze ba nus pa ngas shing sems med lan sa gribasnga ba rnams ni tshigs mtshan nyid du/ gang zhig skye dang ba tu skye
153a2(rgyud): / dus dang byis pa dang ni gzhon nu las gas gzugs su byed// 'jig rten du ni slar yang sdud par byed pa de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo can ste nyi mas min// mtshan mo'i chas zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas
153a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das des sdud de/ gzhan yang nyin mo'i dus su skyed pa'i don du ma lus pa la ster bar byed pa rim pa yis// sgra las sogs pa drug rnams las su 'gyur zhing gzhan yang bya ba shes pa dbang po drug
153a4(rgyud): rnams dang / lo dang zla ba rnams dang phyogs dang nyin mtshon tshes dang zla ba nyi ma rnams kyi byed pa po// bskyed po'i byed po de rnams bsdud pa'i byed por mi 'gyur 'dir ni byeng po gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir// nam
153a5(rgyud): mkhas khyab pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje can ni yul dang rnam bral yon tan bral zhing rang bzhin mid/ dwa dang kha dog r-i dang reg bya zhes bya ba rnams dang sA chu me dang rlung rnams te// brgyad ni nges par gzugs can rnams
153a6(rgyud): su 'gyur te kun 'byung yul rnams ma 'dus pa la gtso gcig/ sgra dang stong pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings dang yid rnams gro zug so med 'gyur ro ma yo bdag pa kye// de lta 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag dus
153a7(rgyud): kyi nus pas ba sgyid dang bsdud par 'gyur ro zhing 'gro ba'o// dag gi rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin yon tan gyur pas 'ching ba dar gyi srin bu ji bzhin no// gzhan yang bdag gi rnam par mi rtog pa'i yi / 
153b1(rgyud): u pa gnyid kyim pa gyur /  phyi nalas gyung banan yod na myur bas pa dang drug pacwa khyod pa tho pa // nga banon thal spyong na byu ga sa gdon pa rnams mo shes pa mos paslong // 
153b2(rgyud): sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i yon tan rnams dang yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin rnams// rags dang 'dra dang gzhan rnams yon tan rnam pa gsum du gyur pa'i yig ge thig le sogs dbye bas// rags pa dbang
153b3(rgyud): po rags pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur te phra mo phra mo'i sems su yang ni brjod// ye shes nyid ni ye shes sku ste rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i 'tsho bar gyur pa 'byung ba min// a la sogs pa stong pa lnga rnams rang bzhin ma
153b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba ste dpal gyi cha dang thig le sgra// dus dang sems dang blo rnams de bzhin rnam 'gyur yon te de yang dbyangs rnams rlung las sogs pas so// sde tshan yig rnams ni bcu pa sum 'gyur rags pa nyid ste
153b5(rgyud): / gzhan yang bcu drug 'gyur ba'o// de rnams dbus su rdo rje can gnas mi 'gyur rnam 'gyur khyab byed 'gyur po rnams ni yod pa min// 'khor bar bde dang sdug bsngal ba ni rang bzhin yon tan gyur pa'i las las skyes
153b6(rgyud): pa de la za/ rags dang pra dang gzhan dang gsum po 'do rna'i rnams 'dus las su 'gyur ba ste// blo dag nyid byed pa las dang bral dang gzhan yang dbang phyug phyogs dag byed po yod zhes 'dod pa las// bdag gam
153b7(rgyud): gzhan gyi byed pos mi byed rang bzhin rnam bral dri ni lam med shes par bye ba'o// de phyir byed pa po las sgrog chags rnams la bde dang sdug bsngal cung bad skar dang 'phrog pa man// 'khor bar gang zhig gis ni sngon du
153b8(rgyud): las nyid ma gsum byos pa'i 'dras bu 'du ra bar 'gyur/ rmongs po rnams kyi blo sa dang 'breg pa dang mi byed dang drung par byed par dade bapa ste// 'ang gi dbang bas lus pa skyon dgam mthong ba yis dpa'i
154a1(rgyud): med dge ba 'phrog par byed pa'o// 'dod pa dang ni bya ba'i nus pa dag dang shes pa'i nus pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rang yid gsum// dngos po snang bar byed dang rab tu 'jug par byed dang ro mnyam don
154a2(rgyud): nyid dmigs par byed pa'o// phyi nas dor bas bzhi pa srid pa gsum gyis page byas gnyis su med pa'i rim par nges pa'o// de rnams nang nas cung zad 'dzin dang dor bar byed pa rdo rje can min mi yi bdag po kye/ 
154a3(rgyud): bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rab tu sbyar bar byed pa bdag nyid min no mi yo bdag po kye/ sems kyi nus par spangs pa'i gzhan ma mching dang 'grol bar byed pa cung zad yod pa min// bum pa'i nang na nam mkha' rab tu g.yo
154a4(rgyud): med gnas par chu khyer gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin du yang nam mkhas khyab pa nam mkha' rdo rje can ni lus dbus lus bral ba'o// de ltar las yod smra bar 'gyur ba da ni bcom ldan 'das te ston pa cig tu
154a5(rgyud): byed po min/ thams cad mkhyen dang dang po'i sangs rgyas srid gsum phyag byas dus 'khor yin gyis 'khor lo can ma yin// gang gi zhabs kyi chu skyes drung du tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po lhag par skyabs su song ba'i/ 
154a6(rgyud): phyir/ rgyal mchog skyed par mdzad pa rtogs med yon tan bral ba dus kyi 'khor lo de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba'i sems kyis lha nyid 'gyur te mun pa'i bsam pas dmyal ba nyid do mo bdag kye// rdul gyi bsam pas// 
154a7(rgyud): dud 'gro nyid du 'gyur te rab mchog sa yi steng du 'dres pas ma rnams nyid// snying stobs nyid dang rdul dang mun pa rnam pa gsum ni nges par phan tshun 'dres pas 'byung po nyid// 'chi ba'i dus su gang gis bsam pas
154a8(rgyud): yid la dran pa'i sems can de ru skye bar 'gyur ba'o// lha mchog gnas su lha nyid brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams kyis yin te de ltar ma rnams kyis ni gcig/ dud 'gro rnams kyis rgya mtsho'i rnam par nges te de bzhin dmyal bar
154b1(rgyud): gyur pa'i gcig nyid kha rnam gnas 'di rnams su ror 'gyur 'gro bar 'khyams pa las kyi zhags pa rnams kyis nges par bcings pa na// de las thar mchog bde ba'i gnas su skye bar 'bum phrag du mas grol bar 'gyur ba
154b2(rgyud): ma yin no// srid gsum 'jig par byed pa phung po khams dang dbang po rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga po rnams dang // de tsam dang ni las kyi skyon dang yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin dang bcas pa la sogs pa// 'di
154b3(rgyud): rnams kyis bcings ro'i gnas su srog nyid 'khyam pa dang ste slar yang 'phra mo'i rang bzhin gyi// bsam pa dor nas mi 'gyur mchog gi gnas su gang zhag rab tu gshags na slar yang skye ba man// rag byed yan lag bcas
154b4(rgyud): dang dran pa'i gzhung ldan rtog ge grub pa'i mtha' nyid bcas dang de nas gzhan// rgyas pa dang na ma bzhin 'jug sogs 'jig rten bstan cos mkhan rnams kyis byas snyan ngag rig byo mun// reg bya nang gi rig bya dang
154b5(rgyud): ni mi 'gyur ba dag thub pa rnams kyis 'jig rten 'dar gsungs nyid// 'jig rten gsum po ma lu la ga zhi / gang zhig 'gag la yin no ma bdag kye// rnal 'byor dbang po rab tu g.yo ba'i yid ldan gal te rnal 'byor ma
154b6(rgyud): thob 'chi bar 'gyur ba na// dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan par 'gyur// de yis sngon du goms pas slar yang ye shes rnal 'byor mchog tu rgya che nyams su len par 'gyur
154b7(rgyud): ye shes thob par gyur na ma bzad mchog gi gnas gter slar yang gang yang skye ba ma yin la// rgyal ba rnams kyi nyin mo nyi ma'i dus la ye shes skye ste mtshan phyed dang ni nub mo'i mthar// lho min rnams kyi mtshan mo ra
154b8(rgyud): ra bong dus te nyi ma phyed dang nya ma nges par nub dus la// yang dag ye shes dang ni rnam par nyams par rab tu gyur dang legs par sbar dang tha mal tshig/ las ni zhi ba drag po dag dang sred pa gsum gya gnas dam pa
155a1(rgyud): byung na byu myur sa ga rgyas kyi ga 'a sa na/  gakyang du 'dags pa lung gas N+DI tshogs bcung dang mang dum du
155a2(rgyud): gos ni dmar dang dkar po dag ste TI ma ri bong can 'gro bzhin du mtho ros snga ga gnas/ do gsod gsod pa nyid dang bla ma'i nges pas 'dug sangs rdo rje zhes dang l+h+wa ma yon// 'byung po rnams kyi las nyid
155a3(rgyud): 'gres par rab tu 'gyur ba sha pa zhes su brjod// chesra ni myi ga song bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las srog gtsad la sogs nyes pa rnams// mchod spyan la sogs don du rab tu 'jug par gyur dang brgyal snu
155a4(rgyud): go y-i bdug pa rtsi// ba 'drang btung bar 'dres dang ni ma bong can dag 'gro ba'i dbang las lam 'dres gzhan pa'o// 'od zer lam ske nyin mo na ma 'od 'dro'i dus dang dkar dang byang du bgrod pa mo bying nga/ 
155a5(rgyud): du ba'i lam+ba ste mtshan mo zla bA'i 'od 'phro ba dang dkar min pa dang lho phyogs bgrod pa'o// 'od 'phros mtho ras su ni lha nyid 'gyur te dkar min pa yis klu yi 'jig rten lha mon 'gro// 'dres pas mi yi 'jig
155a6(rgyud): rten du ni yi dwags dud 'gro nyid du 'gyur ro mri bdag kye// gang zhig grong gi dbus su rab tu zhugs pa'i brtul shugs dga' rnams nges par las kyi zhags par bcings// de yi dbus su rang rang rang bzhin pa/ 
155a7(rgyud): gyur pa de yi rigs la de las 'dzin na ma ya bdag po kye// ji srad sems kyi rang bzhin srid pa rnam gsum dbang gis tshor ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal ste// de srad mtho ris ma yul sa 'og 'khor ba mi
155a8(rgyud): bzang rnams su 'khyam mo mi yi bdag po kye// ka sogs sde tshan dbyangs dang bcas rnams yon tan rnams kyis bsgyur dang gang zhig phyogs gsum dbyangs rnams dang // gsal byed sum bcu rnams
155b1(rgyud): ni nges par rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dab kyis de rnams song nas 'chib ste// gapa' lnga'i rkang pa rnams dang nyi ma bong can nang sgra gcan 'jug pas dag gi nang ba'o// sum bcu cu gnyis lo la yon tan
155b2(rgyud): gyis sbya pa mas na hrI/ mo ga ma rnams kyi rgyu byed rnams kyang ri bang can gyi yon tan dang ni dus mo 'i byed gnyis// ma brgyam marnam mnyam pa nyi 'gro ba rnams las tshad
155b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i lhag mo d+hA phyi rnams// 'jig rten ma dang mig gi grangs so nyon mtshan dus rnams ma lus pa las gtso bis dman pa'o// dbyangs dang gsal byed la sogs sde mtshan rnams ni nyi zla dag tu
155b4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i dbang gis zos nas 'chi// phyed bcas 'khor lo chu tshod gis bya sgyur ri bo'i can rkang gzi'i chu tshad dag gis dman rnams la// thabs dang shes rab rab tu dbye ba rnams kyi nyin mtshan dus su de rnams
155b5(rgyud): la ni zos nas 'chi// de ltar sde tshan dbyangs dang bcas pa dang ni dbyangs tshogs gsal byed ldan pa rnams kyi rkang pa la// dman pa dang ni bar ma ri bong can dang nyi ma 'chi bar 'dod ste gsal byed lhag pa'i lha// nyin
155b6(rgyud): mtshan sum bcu gnyis dang gcig gis ri bong can bcas nyi ma 'gro bar rtsa 'di 'chad pa'o// gzhan yang nyin mtshan sum bcu rtsa gsum dor bas rigs ldan dang bcas phung po khams dang dbang po sogs// zla ba
155b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i rtsa dag dor nas srog gi rlung nyid nyid nyin zhag gcig tu me la 'jug pa ni// sa dang chu dang byin za dang ni rlung dang na ma mkha'i khams rnams rnam par chad pa'i bar nyid do// dang por rgyal ba ma lus pa yi lus
155b8(rgyud): nyid sngags pa rnams kyis dngos grub don du yang dag bsrung // lus dngos med na dngos grub med de bde ba rim pa skye ba 'di la thob pa yod pa men// de phyir lus kyi don du nyi ma so so'i dus su rtsa ba'i sbyor gyi
156a1(rgyud): rnam par byas pa yis/ lus grub pas ni dngos grub gnanam sred gsum gnas su bdag gtsug nyid du rab tu 'gyur ba'o//  ma ngas pa'i dbang gis stong bar du ba la sogs gzugs
156a2(rgyud): brnyan las ni bsgom par bya ba'o// de nas rtsa bo'i 'khor lo rnams su srog dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams yang na brtan par bya// gzhan yang zla ba nyi gza' 'gog par byed pa bzhin du byang chub sems kyang
156a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yas te// gang zhig de las khyad par 'dod pa yin te cung zad nyin zhig rnams kyis skye ba 'di ru thog// nyam zla ba dag ni dgrag cing mnyam dang ma mnyam 'gro ba dbus ma dang ni dus mer gtsug
156a4(rgyud): srog dang thur rgyu gnyis po dag tu nyin zhag dang po song pas dus mini 'chu ba bzla ba ste// srog gi kun du gang bar bya ba nyan lag rkang pa 'thab bo'i tshogs dang mtha' dag bcas par ro// 'khor lo drug tu
156a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ni lha mo ma 'jigs phyag dang pad+ma 'dzin rnal 'byor pa yis sgrom// 'thur du rgyu ba kun nas skum par byed par gyur na lus mchog rlung nad mI lus pa rnams 'joms// srog sdom brad krin+da
156a6(rgyud): la na yan te slar yang de dag rnam par spongs pa 'khris pa'i nad la'o// steng dang 'og ni yang dge 'gog pas 'dus pa dang na rams kyi nad rnams bde bar byed pa ste// lte ba'i steng du srog gi rlung gis nado// 
156a7(rgyud): rnams mtha' dag 'joms ste lte ba'i rtsa bar gzhan ma'o// 'thur rgyu rlung na rnam gsum lam du song ba kun nas bcing ste de bzhin srog nyid steng du yang // yang dag bsdus pa'i bar du stobs ldan gyis
156a8(rgyud): ni lus po ma lus mi yis khyab par byas pa na/ sman dang mtshan na ga zhing nad rnams kyang gzhan yang dmu tshu la sogs pa rnams zla ba'i sbyor bas 'jims// dbugs mi bde ba dang klu yi nang dang rnam pa
156b1(rgyud): smra ngas smra na/ smras nan su nas na
156b2(rgyud): sa pa phyis// klu byed sa kya'i bu bskyems mam sa pa rnal 'byas na pa'i rnam gyu rdzog// rkang pa dag ni rdo rje kyil dbyung gan se las la ga pa
156b3(rgyud): mas bzung bas rgyab kyis zung du 'joms// stang du nang pa drag dang srog blo 'og tu byas na bad kan nang rnams mthong dag rnam par 'joms// rab tu 'dzag la nyin zhag cung zad rnams su srog nyid bkag na gcin
156b4(rgyud): nang nges par 'joms par byed// tho rangs chu dral kha nyid srin lag gis n+nis rnams rim pa sa rab tu gsal bar 'dar ba yis// mig gi mag smin 'gyur te chu yos gtor ba las kyang mag gi sdug bsnga
156b5(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa'o// gan rgyal nyal nas lte bar lag pa'i padad+ma mas rnam par bzung nam zhu ba yi zug rngu 'joms// skad 'bur byung ba rnams la nges par tsha dang mar bcas rnams kyis brdugs ni 'phel ba
156b6(rgyud): 'jig par byed// arga'i 'o mas rab tu byugs ste cung zad so yi srin bu zug rngu bcas pa la// stag shing sa bon gyi ni du be sbu gu la sogs par bsdus na ni srin sogs 'joms par byed// shes rab dang ni 'dus
156b7(rgyud): pas rang gi byang sems 'bab pa rgyun du sreg rlung yang dag bkag pa yis// stegs pa rnams kyis lo phyed nyid kyis lus kyi mchog la 'dza kar 'joms na gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de ltar lo gnyis rdzogs
156b8(rgyud): pas bdun bcu'i lo la sgra dkar mo nyi ri mar bcas pa rgas pa nges par 'joms// do ye rjes la zung zod nyin zhag rnams kyis lam sems rab tu 'dres pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// srog col rab tu
158a1(rgyud): @bya ba snying kha dang ni mgo bo de bzhin ji srid mer 'gyur bar da ste// de yi steng du stobs kyis rtsol ba mi bya byas na shin du pad mar brgyal bar gyur nas kyang // spyi gtsug
158a2(rgyud): dbye ba byas nas phung po dang khams rnams rnam par spangs te shi bAr gyur pa na// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rab tu zhig pas skyes bu rnams la tshe 'dir bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba min// nyin mtshan dus su
158a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bsten pa sgom pa'i don du bshad kyis 'dod chags zad pa'i don du min/ to chang ni sngags pa rnams kyi gsung gi rdo rje tshim pa'i don du gsungs kyi nges par 'thung don man// nyin zhag so so'i
158a4(rgyud): dus su bza' ba thams cad bde ba'i don du gsungs kyi mi 'ju'i rgyur ma gsungs// dpal ldan dur khrod mtshan mo skor zhing spyod pa byed pa dngos grub don du yin gyi brtse don min// mi bskyod pa ni cung zad do// 
158a5(rgyud): bas kha'i sdug bsngal nyid dang so'i zug rngu dang bcas zhi bar byed// tho rangs mo bskyod sna yis 'thungs na mgo bo'i sdug bsngal 'joms ste sna'i chu yang de bzhin no// rna ba dang ni mig ta mi bskyod gre dang grang mo
158a6(rgyud): blugs pa gnyis ka'i sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms/ rta'abyung pos bzung la mi bskyod tsha ba gsum ldan sna ru blugs na bde ster so btab pa la yang // gshang ba gci ba khu ba khrag dang mi shar bcas rnams
158a7(rgyud): zas pa sna tshe na ster bar 'gyur ba'o// ni rtobasam gtan dang bcas me tog snas 'thungs pa yas rgas pa'i yan lag skad kar gnyer ma la sogs 'joms// mar mi lnga dang sbrang bu'i skyugs pa bsres pa
158a8(rgyud): zos pa yis na sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'joms par 'gyur/ bud mad me tog khu ba nyid dang bsres pa lo cig zos pa yis na rgas pa 'joms pa'o// len tshwa dang ni sgyur bas rlung rnams rab tu
158b1(rgyud): 'joms par 'gyur te mngar dang ska ba 'khris pa'i dgra/ kha ba ma lus pa dang tsha ba gsum gyi de bzhin sman nam bcud kyis bad kan 'joms par byed// ra yi 'o ma tshwa gsum dang ldan pas bad kan 'joms
158b2(rgyud): ste ma he'i 'o ma 'khris pa'i dgra/ rnga mo'i 'o mas rlung 'joms pa ste ba lang 'o ma mar gyis sdug bsngal rnam par 'joms pa'o// 'dza' te skol ba'i chu ni dron mos kha'i sdug bsngal zhi ste so'i zug rngu ma bzad
158b3(rgyud): pa yang po/ mar khu dang ni dngos po'i chu bskol bar ni tsha ba gsum dang tsha yis rna ba'i nad rnams 'joms pa'o// mar dang 'o ma skol bar a hi ni dang dmar po rnam par blugs pas sna yi nad 'jig pa'o// 
158b4(rgyud): kar ko ta dang thong pa an ta bong bu'i chur bcas sha ro dag la byugs pas 'joms// lag pa dang ni 'phyang bar byas la rkang pa'i pad ma mnyam par byas te srog rlung 'gog pa'o// ji srid sa la lus po ma
158b5(rgyud): ltung ba yi bar ma gzhan yang rims rnams bral gyi bar du ste// yang dang yang du ting 'dzin la gnas pas ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed tsher ma nges par rab tu 'joms// snying kha'i pad mar zla ba'i steng du dri
158b6(rgyud): mad ri bong can nyid lta bu'i sna tshogs yum bsam bya/ rtasran chung btags nas mi rnams kun la byin na rims ni rnam par bcom ste tsher ma rab tu 'jig/ rims kyi mtha' ru thod pa madrar ba
158b7(rgyud): dang na mi bskyod pa dang bsres pas 'jigs byed 'joms par byed// sngags ni chu dang me dang rlung rnams sngon du aM yig brjod te ming gi sngon du badz+ra ste// de dag rnams kyis mgo bo mgrin pa
158b8(rgyud): snying kha lte bo gsang sogs rnams la bsrung bar bya ba'o// dwe tre ta n+ya mnyam po nyid deng gzhan yang de bzhin te ti ra yi mdab ma phye ma rnams// zla ba nyi ma bstan pa'i chu nyid de 'dri ma bral ba
159a1(rgyud): @ rdobaskol ba las ni rkang lhag ma/ bskor ba de dang karA bsres pa nyin zhag gsum gyi mtshan ma'i dus su de nyid 'thung ba yis// so ka' nya ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis
159a2(rgyud): bsregs pas 'chi ba ster ba khams bdun song ba rnams kyang spong // gser dang nyi ma shel gyi lcags dang pA ta la skyes lcags dang g.yo byed ma kA ka rnams bsre// sa bon dpyid ldan de
159a3(rgyud): dang rtul chu dri bral dang ni bcas pa srang drag rnams su byas nas kyang / ba yi dar ba nges par ma rungs ma yI'o ba'i chur khu 'dir ni bzung bar byas pa de// gnur ba de dang lhan cig
159a4(rgyud): chu shel lcags kyi bar bur slar yang bskol ba ji srid phyed kyi brla// da bsdus pa dang dag pa'i ka rA srang brgyad dam ni yang na dgu nyid de ru blugs par bya// bgrod pa'i bAr du
159a5(rgyud): dus rnams kun la zas gzhan bral bar ston mo de nyid bza' bar byas pa yas// gang zhig de yas lha yi lus ste skra dkar gnyer ma bral zhing zla ba drug gros mchi med 'gyur/ de phyar nyin
159a6(rgyud): zhag so so'i dus su ston mo bza' ste 'on kyang ma nur ba rnam par bral ba'i bar// sngar gsungs pa ya sa bon rgyal po phyed ldan dang ni mnyam pa'o de bzhin gzhan yang nyul chu'o// gshang
159a7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs mang po'i tshe dang skyur mo rnams kyis mnye bya ji srid gcig tu 'gyur gyi bar// 'khris pa dang ni skyur po mu zi la sogs d+ha ra shi la rnams dang btul chu mnyam par mnye// brdul gyi mdab
159a8(rgyud): ma nyid la de dag phyed kyi tshad kyis bskus ste bskol na gser du 'gyur ba'o// rnon po mkha' skyes dag dang a la ma tsha dang ya bag kA ra sa 'dza kA ra rim pa yis// 'phel bar nyi ma nyis
159b1(rgyud): 'gyur du ni ro mnyam du ni ra mnyam bzhu bar bya nyi ma lhag pa'i bar du'o// / slar yang tsha yis dag par 'gyur ste de bzhin pa lang las byung la sogs pas ni mnyes gyur pa// cha gsum 'gyur gyis dngu la la
159b2(rgyud): blugs nas bkang 'am brdungs pa dag pa'i me tog nyid du 'gyur ba'o// a lag pur dag dang phrang ba g.yo ba sra ba 'bras ldan dang ste kha drang da ra skyos// ka ko la dang seng gcin ud pal 'bras bu ra dag
159b3(rgyud): skyes dang dmar po de t+ya rul pa dang // klu dang grang ba ra na mdab ma pa la chu dang khri shing nam mkha' yon po de ltar rnams/ rdzas lngas dri bzangs byas spos ri dgas ri bong tsan dang me tog a swa ba
159b4(rgyud): sogs rnams kyis dbug/ mig dang zla ba me dang rgya mtsho mda' dang yon tan+ta chu gter mnga' lag zla ba mda' mig dang // zla ma rgya mtsho zla dus du su madra' mig dang rgya mtsho madra' mig zla ba 'jig rten nyid rnams
159b5(rgyud): ste/ lnga dang lnga 'gyur mug rnams la e la la sogs cha yi grangs rnams rimo pa'i yongs byas pa'i// rdzas rnams kyis na dri ru 'gyur te gnas kyi ri mig brtsegs pa'i dag pa'i cha rnams tshes kyis bstan/ 
159b6(rgyud): 'dza' ti e la 'khri shing madrab ma bum pra la sogs rtsog ma rnams la rim pras bkod pa la// rgya ba skyugs sra rtsa dang ni 'o ma su ra dag dang dkar po rnams kyis spos kyi bya bar spos/ ga bur dang ni
159b7(rgyud): ka rar bcas pa'i me tog bcud dang sen mo rnams kyi me ya cha yis bya// de rnams bral nas sbrang rtsi bral ba'i chu rnams btags la spos kyi rang bu rab tu bya// lte ba la sogs seng ge'i gcin dang ri
159b8(rgyud): bong can dang nam mkha' rnams kyi gnas la khrus sbyor dgod// mdud pa stag sen ha ru Na dang ha ha/ gzhan yang de bzhin shing tshe'i cha yang // d+ha n+yo mo'i dang ni brgya pa d+ha ma ma d+hA ri ste de bzhin de rnams
160a1(rgyud): byug par ro// gzhan yang sngar gsungs ma bzlog pa la chu skyes bzhin du lus dang mdud pa'i mdab ma til mar la// bye ma la ni mdud pa de ltar 'gyur zhing slar yang
160a2(rgyud): lus dang ha ta btung dang gar bsgo bar// shang tsha bo la mdud pa dung ste 'bras bu mdob ma ti la kha sbyor ngang pa la sogs smin pa'o// de ltar sum bcu'i bar du dbye ba legs byas rnam pa
160a3(rgyud): sna tshogs dri dang spos sogs sbyor ba las// rdzas rnams rnam par dag par bya ba 'bras bu kha sbyor smin la dbug pa rnams kyis bsres pa yis// rdzas rnams dbang las brgyad kyi cha yi sku
160a4(rgyud): bar rab tu 'gyur te de yi nyis 'gyur drag po'i spros// phyi nas rdzas kyi tshad kyi bu ram sos ka yin te sbyor ba rim pas 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o// rkang pa'i cha yi dung dang bsregs ste sbrang rtsi
160a5(rgyud): dang ni dkar po dag kyang rdzas dang mnyam par bsreg/ gong bu dung gi tshad ste ma la yang dag yang ba bskyod pa rnams la zla ldan de bzhin no// smin pa'i dri la me tog bzang po rnams kyis nyon
160a6(rgyud): zhag cung zad bdugs na rab tu 'dod pa grub// phyi nas 'bras bu gsum dang ri bong can chang sa be rnams brgya'i cha yis 'bugs par byed// si gru chu dang ri yi chu dang me tog bcud mnyam/ 
160a7(rgyud): bskol bya me tog las skyes gnas kyi mthar// zla gcig so bas smin par 'gyur zhing ri dgas dang mnyam a sa ba ste lte bas dbug par bya// gsang ba'i dri rnams rul ta pa ro dang san
160a8(rgyud): mo bskyod pa rnams ni spos sbyor rnams su gsang ba'o// de bzhin grang dang du ru ka dang lci dang ri bong can rnams dang ste bgo bar me tog go// dbug par ga bur lte bar 'bras bu gsum dang
160b1(rgyud): ma da su yin te yang dag khrus sbyor du// gsang ba shing tsha mdud pa'i mdab ma nags rgyug ldan par 'gyur te dril phyis la ni mdud pa'o// dag pa'i chu skyes rdzas gzhan bral bar sbrang rtsi rnam par spangs
160b2(rgyud): pa'i dri yi chu dang btag pa bya// smon pa'i smos kyis ska ba sbrang rtsir bcas dang ma rungs lag skyes rnams la za ba rim pas 'phel// gnyis kyis kha ra ma kyang dag bsres pa lnga g.yo ba a kai rU
160b3(rgyud): dang ga pur gcig/ zla ba'i thog ma tha mar sbrang rtsi dang ni dkar po nges par bsregs pas spos nyid smin par bya// nyi ma cung zad bar la me tog bzang po rnams kyis bgo bar bya na dri yi chu yi bsre// rmi
160b4(rgyud): 'dzag pa yi thod par spra tshil ras rnams kyis ni kha nyid dam du bkri zhing gcad byas nas// snod yangs nyid du de bcug pa des 'og tu ni bye ba rnams kyis dgang bar byas pa la// chu yi sbyor ba zla ba drug
160b5(rgyud): tu byas pa'i smin par gyur pa lte ba mchog gi dri ru brjod// smin pa'i tikha rnams mdab ma'i chu dang dri dang byug pa la sogs rnams kyis dag par bya ba'o// phyi nas 'dza' ti la sogs me tog rnams
160b6(rgyud): kyis nyin zhag cung zad ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du bsgo/ 'khrul 'khor gyi ni til mAr blangs sti mkhas pas 'ching bu'i snod du bzhag par bya'om bdag kye// khrus sam sku mnyes nga rgyal byed
160b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba rnams kyi me tog til mar ma smin pa ru brjod// raM dang nyi ma zla ba ma nu mag dang 'dod pa nor dang drag po dang ni rgyal po me// phyogs dang 'byung ba dag dang bug pa 'tshams dang
160b8(rgyud): tshes dang rgya mtsho re mig mtha' dag dgod par bya// re mig bzhi yi grangs kyi dbye ba ma lus rnams la chu gter me rnams bri bar bya ba ni// dpal ldan 'khor lo 'dzem byed rgyab tu yin te/ 
161a1(rgyud): snum ma rnams la rab tu bskyed dus bstan par bya// // rnal 'byor ma rnams gsal bar swa stengs brgyad pa brgyad rnams gang zhig ma rnams su ni rab tu grub// mngal gyi
161a2(rgyud): sum 'gyur dgu ru bstan te nyini zhag rnams ni bcu dang gzhan yang bcu gtsug lnga pa gsum// zla ba rnams dang lo nyid rnams su bstan ste sa stengs ma lus de nyid rnams kyis byis pa 'dzin// mngal
161a3(rgyud): gyi gnas su rab tu skye ba'i dus dang skye gnas kyang ste zug rngu nad ni byed pa ni// byas pa skyes pa rnams la tan trar byas ste nyin zhag zla ba lo re dbye bar 'gyur ba ste// ma rungs lnga yas gzhon nu rnams
161a4(rgyud): la rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis chos gi 'tshams su yang dag gnas// nges par rang gi tshes la 'jigs par 'gyur bas byas pa gzung ba de rnams mi gtong rgyal po kye// 'dir ni de rnams zhi
161a5(rgyud): bar bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor khrus dang sbyin bsreg sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur// ru rta u si ra dang ka se ru dang rgya spos u pa la dang mdam skyes gi sar rnams// chu srang gras na btags dang rigs/ 
161a6(rgyud): ldan sngags mchog rnams kyis mngal gyi zug rngu rnams la sbyin par bya// gzhan yang mngal rings pa la ne'u le'i sku brgyad dang na rma bya'i madrongs dog rab tu btags pa sbyin// 'o ma dang ni thug pa zho dang / 
161a7(rgyud): bu ram dang bcas nyin zhag dbang ma rnams la rab tu sbyin// smin pa tha dad lnga dang bza' dang zho dang bu ram ldan dang khur ba sran bsres rA lu dang // dri dring me tog mor ma dang ster mdab ma rnams
161a8(rgyud): kyis khrus bya ba rnams mtshan mo lnga ru bya/ ba lang so dang lu gu ri dgas spu dang mi yi skra dang sen mo sbrul lpags rjes pa'i spos// byis pa zla bas 'phel bar bstan pa rnams ni rgyas pa'i rgyu ru
161b1(rgyud): 'gyur bas gtor ma mtha' dag bya// bza' ba lnga dang smin pa lnga dang chu rgyus dang ni sha dang dri dang me tog mar me dang // chang dang sngar brjod spos dang khrus rnams de bzhin phyogs gyur rnams la phyogs
161b2(rgyud): kyi dbye bas gtor ma sbyin// byis pa blo yis 'phel ba nga rnams ces la brla sa stengs rgyas pa'i don du brjod do mA~M bdag kye// mngal nas lho rnams lnga gsum gyur gyi bar du nges par
161b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu mchod par bya// lus nyid rnam par g.yeng dang mig dang gdong dang lag rkang zug rngu dang ni ser por 'gyur ba dang // mi skyong kha dog ser por 'gyur ba tshad pa che
161b4(rgyud): dang skyug dang skam dang brgyal bar gyur pa na// de rnams mtshan ma shes nas dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin bsreg bya ste slar yang mi'i bdag po kye// sbyin pa spangs na rang bzhin yon tan dbang las ma
161b5(rgyud): dang 'byung po skyes pa rnams kyis gtong mi 'gyur// ma yi bdag po lus so thams cad dkar por gyur dang shin du phra ba'i 'brum pa dang / mgrin pa lus por bcas pa yo zhing kha dang gsang
161b6(rgyud): ba gshang pa'i lam nas khrag ni rab tu 'dzag pa na// de la mchod pa bya ba min ste sngags pa rmongs pa rnams la gzhan gyi dpyad par 'gyur ba ste// de na lha dang mi dang lag 'gro// rnams kyis bsrung bar
