161b7(rgyud): mi nus nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o// klu dang gnod spyan bzla' dang gzhan yang lha min rags skyes srin po sha za nges par 'byung po dang // shes byed ma dang gdung ba dang ni lam
161b8(rgyud): khrag dgyes ma dang mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can ma// sran mo rnams dang grul bum bzhin skyong dag dang tshogs kyi bdag po yi dgas ro langs grub pa dang / mkha' lding dbang po
162a1(rgyud): brjed bcas rnams kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du mchod na mchog tu bde bar 'gyur// bdug pa rnams la mchod pa'i don du grong gi phyi ro lA du ni dkyil 'khor
162a2(rgyud): bri'o ma yi bdag po kye// shing cig gnas sam dur khrod dang ni lha mchog gnas sam chu bo'i 'gram mam 'dus pa'i nyid rnams su// khru ni gang dang gnyis dang bzhi pa rnams la dgu la
162a3(rgyud): bcu gsum mi ya bdag pos lha rnams tshad// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa 'am rags kyi dbang gis 'gyur te dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha// sgo na 'khor lo'i brgyad
162a4(rgyud): char 'gyur zhing de'i phyed kyis mchod snam nyid sta do shal la yang de'i tshad// mchod snyam phyed kyis rtsig pa dag dang sgo'i tshad las gsum du 'gyur ba rta babs lta yang nges// thab
162a5(rgyud): khung zlum po che gsum bya zhing pad ma dkar po'i rang bzhin mchod rtsi dkar pos dgang par bya// dpal ldan tshon sna lnga rnams rang rig phyogs su gyur pa'i dpaSh+Ti lis lha rnams mtshan
162a6(rgyud): ma dgod bya ba// dbus su rdo rje dang ni dbang por ral gri yan te rigs kyi dbang las lho ru rin chen dmar// byang du pad ma dkar po mdab ma brgyad ldan pa dang nub kyi phyogs su 'khor
162a7(rgyud): lo'i mad+ma 'o// me'i pad ma'i mdab mar kI gug nyid dang srin po'i mtshams su nges par lcags kyur 'gyur ba'o// rlung du rdo rje zhags par 'gyur te dag po'i mdab mar rtse
162a8(rgyud): gsum nyid do mi yi bdag po kye// shar gyi sgo ru ril gri sprin nag lta bu nyid dang lho phyogs su ni rdo rje dbyug pa'o// chu ltar dpal ldan dbyug to rab tu yon ti zhes par byang gi phyogs
162b1(rgyud): ma da su yin te yang dag khrus sbyor du// gsang ba shing tsha mdud pa'i mdab ma nags rgyug ldan par 'gyur te dril phyis la ni mdud pa'o// dag pa'i chu skyes rdzas gzhan bral bar sbrang rtsi rnam par spangs
162b2(rgyud): pa'i dri yi chu dang btag pa bya// smin pa'i smos kyis ska ba sbrang rtsir bcas dang ma rungs lag skyes rnams la za ba rim pas 'phel// gnyis kyis kha ra ma sang dag bsres pa khri g.yo ba a ka ru
162b3(rgyud): dang ga pur gcig/ za ba'i thog ma tha mar sbrang rtsi dang ni dkar po nges par bsregs pas spros nyid smin par bya// nyi ma cung zad bar la me tog bzang po rnams kyis bgo bar bya na dri yi chu yi bsre// 
162b4(rgyud): 'dzag pa yi thod par spra tshil ras rnams kyis ni kha nyid dam du bkri zhing gcang byas nas// snod yangs nyid du de bcug pa des 'og tu ni bye ba rnams kyis dgang bar byas pa la// chu yi sbyor ba zla ba drug
162b5(rgyud): tu byas pa'i smin par gyur pa lte ba mchog gi dri ru brjod// smin pa'i til rnams mdab ma'i chu dang dri dang byug pa la sogs rnams kyis dag par bya ba'o// phyi nas 'dza' ti la sogs me tog rnams
162b6(rgyud): kyis nyin zhag cung zad ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du bsgo// 'khrul 'khor gyi ni til mAr blangs sti mkhas pas 'ching bu'i snod du bzhug par bya'o ma bdag kye// khrus sam sku mnyes nga rgyal byed
162b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba rnams kyi me tog til mar ma smin pa ru brjod// raM dang nyi ma zla ba ma nu mig dang 'dod pa nor dang drag po dang ni rgyal po me// phyogs dang 'byung ba dag dang bug pa 'tshams dang
162b8(rgyud): tshes dang rgya mtsho re mig mtha' dag dgod par bya// re mig bzhi yi grangs kyi dbye ba ma lus rnams la chu gter me rnams bri bar bya ba ni// dpal ldan 'khor lo 'jom byed rgyab tu yin te
163a1(rgyud): yang med par 'gyur bar de ltar tshangs pas bstan pa'o// byed pa po dang bdag dang las dang dus dang rang bzhin yon tan rnams dang zhig pa stong pa'i chos// 'bras bu'i byed pa rgyu ste nges par rab tu
163a2(rgyud): gsal bar 'dir ni khyab 'jug 'dod par bstan pa'o// lam drug rnams dang de nyid lnga dang mchog gi gnas ni ma lus pa ste gzhan yang sngags lus dang // rig bya dang ni bdag dang mchog tu zhi ba rnam gsum la/ 
163a3(rgyud): gnas gyur dang sbyor dang dngos po gtong // thig le'i dbye ba zhi ba nyid ni mtha' dag lus la gnas dang mdud pa'i bye ba bcu gnyis rnams// gang du 'di rnams thams cad rab tu nges par bstan par 'gyur ba de ni
163a4(rgyud): zhi ba rab tu brjod// dbang phyug byed po las kyi rnam smin mtha' dag med ste yon tan yul rnams 'byung tshogs rnams kyis spyod// de yi dngos po med na 'bras bu med pa gsal bar 'chi med bla mas bstan par
163a5(rgyud): rig par byed// byed pa po'i g.yo bcas g.yo med ma lus bskyed pa skyob pa rnams kyis bza' ba'i don du gsungs// ha ha ma de rab tu mgu bas mi rnams kyis ni mtho ris nges par thob par 'gyur bar bstan/ 
163a6(rgyud): dus gsum rdzas drug dag dang gnas dgu ldan dang lus drug rnams la srog gi rang bzhin cung zad dang // gzhan yang lus dang brtul shugs sdom pa 'gro ba ye shes lnga ru 'gyur te spyod pa'i dbye ba rnams// 
163a7(rgyud): sr-ig gi lus kyi chung ste srid pa dpag tu med par srog nyid rtag par thar par 'gro ba dang // thar mi'i tshad ni sted du bstan rnams gang du de ltar 'chad pa rgyal ba zhes su brjod pa'o// srid por gsum gyi gnas
163a8(rgyud): su rig byed 'di ni rang 'byung men te sgra yis don brjod byed pa'i phyir// sgra dang don yang cig na da ltar min me zhes sgra zhes pa'i ci phyir kha mi 'tshig/ tshangs pa gdod bzhis phyis kyang rig byed sgra yis don rnas
163b1(rgyud): rab tu gsal bar gyur pa 'dod pa ste// de phyir mi shes yul du 'das dang ma 'ongs don du rig byed ston par byed pa rab tu grub// 'dir ni rig byed nam mkha' dang mtshungs yin te gnas kyi dbye bas kha
163b2(rgyud): nas brjod pas byas pa'o// rigs pas phogs gcig mi gnas skye gnyis kha yis brjod pas gzhan rnams kun la khyab par 'dod pa yi// kun la khyab pa'i rig byed 'di rnams dmang rigs la sogs
163b3(rgyud): rigs kyis klog dang dri min ci yi phyir// de'i phyir mkhas pa shes pa dang ldan mi nyid rnams kyis byas pas rig byed tshad mar 'gyur ba min// kha dog pa las bram ze la sogs rigs bzhi skyes na gtum po'i
163b4(rgyud): skye gnas med par 'gyur// gzhan yang tshangs pa'i kha nas bram ze skyes pa ltar na bram ze mo yang skye 'am snying mor 'gyur// de ltar rigs gsum po yang 'gyur bas sring mo dang bcas mi ro 'gyur kla klo dang
163b5(rgyud): mtshungs pa ste rigs zad do// gal te kun gyi byed po dbang phyug yod na de tshe 'gro ba gzhan gyis las lo spyod mi 'gyur// gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed pos min na ma lus thams cad byed por de nyid mi 'gyur
163b6(rgyud): ro/ gal te byed po gzhan gyis byed du bcug na de phyir byed po de tshe gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur// de phyir dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu ster ba srog chags rnams kyi las spangs dbang phyug byed po min// gal te
163b7(rgyud): 'dir ni nam mkhar sa chu me rlung rdul phrin rnams dang dang por byed po med pa na// rdzas kyi dngos po med pas yul dang rnam par bral phyir kun gyi byed pos sna tshogs byed mi 'gyur// yul dang bral ba'i byed po 'di
163b8(rgyud): nyid sgrub pa'i mngon sum dang ni lkog gyur pa'i tshad ma med// yang dag sbyor las thams cad 'gyur te las kyi ngo bo 'dod pas byed po ma yin mi bdag kye// sbyor ba las byung chu shal dag las chu oM long dang / 
164a1(rgyud): ni ngos las gzugs brnyan no// sgyur ba'i rgyu las lce 'dzag pa dang rang sgras sgra snyan dag pa'i sa bon las ni myu gur 'gyur// khab len gyis kyang lcags thur g.yo bar yang ni 'gyur ba
164a2(rgyud): 'dod pa 'di rnams cung zad yod sbyin te// dngos po rnams kyi nus pa 'di rnams pa srid pa gsum gyi gnas su sus kyang cung zad byas pa min// gal te bdag ni kun la khyab na gnyen dang bral ba'i sdug
164a3(rgyud): bsngal ji ltar nyams su myong bar gyur// gal te 'di ni rtag par 'gyur na 'dod pa'i mda' yis rgyab pas ci phyir gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur// gal te byed pa dang bcas gnas par 'gyur na ga nyid
164a4(rgyud): log dus su 'di nyid rmongs par ci phyir 'gyur// de ltar nges par kun la khyab par 'gyur dang khyab bdag dang ni byed bcas 'di rnams bdag ma yin// bdag med pa dang skye ba yod pa dag dang dge
164a5(rgyud): dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yod de byed po spongs// 'gro ba po med ma lus ched du thar par 'gro ba yod do 'ching yod 'ching bar byed pa med// dngos po dang ni dngos med rang bzhin med pa yod de skad cig rnam par
164a6(rgyud): bral ba'i srid pa yod// nga yi bde ba'i tshig 'di rnams la lha dang klu'i cha 'dzin bcas pa'i tshig rnams kyis ni 'joms pa min// gang zhig gang zag zhes bya ba'i de nyid lus kyi nang gnas smra ba de'i rang
164a7(rgyud): bzhin gyis de 'jig/ kun rdzob smra ba nyid ni yod pa ma yin pa ste don dam rig par mi byed pas// rnam par shes par 'dod pa srid gsum mtha' dag rnam par shes pa nyid las gzhan ma yin par smras// 
164a8(rgyud): gang zhig phyogs bral nyid las gnas pa rnams kyis don du stong pa dang ni snying rje gnyis med smras// skye bos sngar byas rnas/ dag ni nyams su myong zhing 'dir byas pa ni skye ba gzhan du na// gal te de
164b1(rgyud): ltar na ni mi rnams skyes nas skye ba gzhan du las rnams 'jig par 'gyur ba ste// 'khor ba nas ni nges 'byung med cing dpag tu med pa'i srid pas thar par 'jug pa med par 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi 'dod
164b2(rgyud): pa de ltar nges par rab tu 'gyur na skye gzhan shin du spangs par 'gyur// 'byung ba gcig tu 'dus pas dbang po sems dang bcas par rab tu 'gyur ba chang gi nus mtshungs na// shing rnams la yang sa dang
164b3(rgyud): chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' 'dus pas ci phyir yod pa min// 'on te bstan pa rnams la skye ba'i nus med zhe na 'byung ba 'dus pa'i nus pa shin du brdzun// de phyir tsa ra ka yi tshig gis ma nyid rnams
164b4(rgyud): la bde ba'i 'bras bu ster med lam 'jig byed// gal te srog nyid lus kyi tshad na lag pa dang ni rkang po bcas pas ci yi phyir mi 'jig/ rtag na lus po'i rang bzhin nyid las phra bar 'gyur ba dang ni sbom
164b5(rgyud): bo nyid du ci phyir 'gyur/ gang zhig 'khor bo'i las las grol nas 'jig rten steng du bde ba'i gnas la 'gro bar 'gyur ba na// 'jig rten gsum dang rdul phran rnams kyis gang bskyed dus kyi dbang
164b6(rgyud): gis rgyun du de nyid rtag pa min// de lta bu la sogs pa ye shes gsal bar bya ba'i don du sa stengs dus 'khor bstan pa ni// sngon gyi bag chags stobs kyis skyes bu tha ma 'bring
164b7(rgyud): dang mchog rnams sems kyis rjes su 'brang ba ste// shel la gzugs brnyan 'char ba bzhin du sems ni nges par 'dod la chags pa bsgyur bas 'gyur ba yis// de phyir rnal
164b8(rgyud): 'byor pa nyid rnams kyis rang bzhin rigs su gyur pa'i chos la cung zad sun 'byin min// chos ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogasu yul bral yin te bya ba ma yin byed pa chos ma yin// rig byed tshad
165a1(rgyud): mar byas nas srog bcad pa yis bde ba'i 'bras bu'i ster med rgyun du sdug bsngal ster// byams pa dam pas sems can rnams la rjesu chags na rmongs pa'i tshig kyang mchog tu bde bar byed// de phyir sos
165a2(rgyud): can don ni gcig pu nyid dang yid kyi rang bzhin med pa'i sgom gyis mi bdag kye// mtho ris sa stengs 'jig rten rnamasu lha dang mi yi bla ma 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i dbang po bdag/ sa 'og tu ni klu rgyal gdengs ka'i rigs kyis phyag
165a3(rgyud): byas pa yang bdag ste kun 'gro rnams kyi mchog/ ye shes sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po mchog tu mi 'gyur khyab bdag rnal 'byor pa yi rdor rnal 'byor// dag byed rig byed oM yig dag kyang bdag yin pa yis bsam pa
165a4(rgyud): kun gyis skyabs song rgyal po kye// 'gro ba rnams kyi khyod ni ma dang khyod nyid pa ste bla ma yang khyod gnyen dang grogs bzang po// khyod ni mgon dang byed pa po khyod phan dang sdig 'joms pa dang phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas ni khyod/ 
165a5(rgyud): 'ba' zhig la gnas khyod ste khyod ni yon tan mchog gi bzhir gyur nyes pa rnams 'joms khyod nyid do// khyod ni dbul dang mgon med yod bzhin nor bu yin pas rgyal dbang khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchi// de
165a6(rgyud): ltar dpal chen dang po'i sangs rgyas las bsdus pa'i dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor lo nang gi bdag nyid gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa rdzog s+ho// // lus la sna tshogs pa yi tshad dang nyi mtshan dus dang
165a7(rgyud): zla ba 'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams dang ni// rtsa rnams phra mo'i grangs dang rang bzhin rnams dang skyes bu dang ste mu stegs can gyi 'dod pa rnams// rigs byed dang ni byed pa po la sogs pa'i dbye ba bdag gis thos pas dkyil
165a8(rgyud): 'khor bshad du gsol/ zla ba bzang po'i tshig thos nas ni bde bar gshegs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// dang por yang dog bsten byi'i bla ma rnams ni dam tshig ldan dang rdo rje theg la lhag b+ha
165b1(rgyud): gnas/ de nyid sgom pa dang ldan dang ma chags sdig pa rnam par spangs dang bzod dang rang bzhin lam la gnas// slob ma rnams la lam ster dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms dang de kho na yi tshangs par spyod pa dang / 
165b2(rgyud): de rnams ldan pa bdud rnams rdo rje dbyug pa sa yi steng du rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grub// nga rgyal ldan dang 'khro ba mngon du gyur dang dam tshig bral dang rdzas la chags dang thos pa med// slob ma rnams ni sku
165b3(rgyud): ba dang ste bde ba dam pa'i gnas la 'jigs sems dang ni dbang ma thob// longs spyod la zhe na bag med pa drang tshig rtsub bcas pa dang ste 'dod can dbang po'i don gnyer rnams slob ma rnams
165b4(rgyud): kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu ru de rnams dmyal ba po rnams bzhin du blo yis spangs par bya// zab cing rgya che'i sems dang bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan yon tan shes/ 
165b5(rgyud): thar pa don du gnyer dang rgyud lnga gus dang g.yo med sems dang de nyid rnyed pa zhes bya gsang // gdug pa rnams kyis dge 'dun 'joms pas de nyid rig pa'i bla ma shin du stsol ba dang bcas pas/ 
165b6(rgyud): shes rab dbang sogs rgyu ru yin te gzhan zhes bya ba dang ni dbu ma bsod nams rgyu ru'o// dpyid zla 'bring po'i dkar po'i mtha'i nya'i 'tshams su gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas dkyil 'khor bris byas
165b7(rgyud): la/ bu rnams bsod nams don dang sdig pa'i dri ma dang bral bya phyir dbang bdun la sogs sbyin bya ba// rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod par bya ba yon tan mtha' dag ter ni bstan par bya ba'i don du'o// 
165b8(rgyud): mchod pa med na lo gcig bar du rgyud kyi rgyal po bla mas bstan par bya ba mo yin no// // dbang gi don du sa ni brtag par bya ba nag dang khang brtsegs grong
166a1(rgyud): grong rdal grong rnams phyogs kyis dbye// dge dang mi dge mtha' dag shes pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis 'bras bu'i don du zhi sogs rab tu bya// thab khung rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang ni nges par
166a2(rgyud): mtha' dag rdul tshon bcas pa'i sbyin bsreg phur sogs dang // slob ma bsrung bar bya ba rnams la gang zhig rgyal ba mchog gi bdag pos dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sa ni rigs bzhir 'gyur te yon tan dbang las dam
166a3(rgyud): rigs dang ni rje rigs rgyal rigs bram ze rnams// gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ri bor 'dzin dkar lta bu'i kha dog rnams su rig par ba'o// rul dang lan tshwa chu skyes dri bzangs rnams ni ri me bzhin 'gyur bar blo bzang/ 
166a4(rgyud): rnams kyis shes par bya// skyur dang lan tshwa dmangs rigs nyid ste mngar dang tsha ba rje rigs rgyal rigs dag ste gzhan skye nyis// dkar po zhes bya zhi ba dang ni rgyas par 'gyur te sprin dang mtshungs pa gsad dang skud pa la/ 
166a5(rgyud): dmar po dgug dang dbang du 'gyur ste gser mchog dang mtshungs rangs pa dang ni rmongs pa la// ljang ku las kyi cha brjod thams cad du ni nges par 'gyur bsra lnga pa mtha' ma'i rigs nyid do// dri dang ro rnams ma lus pa/ 
166a6(rgyud): la yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya'o// dbang ldan dang ni byang gi sa'i steng du nges par zhi ba dang ni rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// me dang shar gyi cha ru rab tu gsal bar gsad pa dang ni nges par dbye dang
166a7(rgyud): spyad pa'o// bden bral dang ni lho yi phyogs su gsal bar rtag tu dbang dang dgug par bya ba kho na'o// rlung dang nub kyi phyogs su nges par rmongs pa dang ni rengs par 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// thab khung grong gi/ 
166a8(rgyud): phyogs mtshams brgyad du rab tu yin te nges par zlum po rgya mtsho'i zur can dang // zla phyed pa dang zur lnga pa dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang las zur bdun pa dang zur gsum pa// zur drug zur brgyad gyur pa rnams
166b1(rgyud): kyi nang du rigs kyi dbang las de nyid rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams// pad ma 'khor lo gri gug nyid dang ral gri mda' zhes pa dang rdo rje lcags kyu lcags sgrog sbrul// gcig dang gnyis dang phyed dang khru gang mkha' dus mkha'
166b2(rgyud): mig mkha' me nam mkha' mtshams kyi sor mor 'gyur// rgya yi phyed dang cha drug pa dang nyi ma rnams par dbye bas bskor ba zabs dang kha khyer dang // kha khyer steng du mchu la rims kyi dbang las kun nas mtshan ma'i
166b3(rgyud): phreng bas bskor bar bya ba dang // kha khyer phyi ru zhi dang rgyas la chu skyes phreng bas byas te mi yi bdag po gzhon la min// rdo rje las rnams thams cad pa ru yang ni 'gyur te so la phur bu brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams// n+ya
166b4(rgyud): gro ta dang a sha tha dang rus pa lcags dang seng ldeng am la arga ba lA skyes/ 'di ltar bum pa rnams ni shel dang mchog gi dul las byung dang dpal ldan thod pa dang ni lcags// zangs mau zhes bya ba dang gisde
166b5(rgyud): gyi bum pa rnams dang rab gsal nges par shing skyes sa las byung // rgya dang 'phang la sor mo brgyad pa gnyis drang bcu pa nyis 'gyur gsungs te mchu la sor mo gnyis// mgrin la sor drug kha la sor brgyad
166b6(rgyud): ri bong 'dzin ltar dkar bzhi dang rgyas las gzhon du min// nyin re bzhin du snga dro nas ni thun brgyad dus su zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs pa ru 'gyur// de ltar de rnams kun la thun phyed dbye bas nyin mtshan dus
166b7(rgyud): la las brgyad rnams ni rab tu bya// nyin mtshan dus chod rnams las nywa mi phyed dang nam phyed la ni zhi dang rgyas pa spong byed pa// dus sbyor ma rungs pa la gza' gnas pa yis bsod pas 'jigs
166b8(rgyud): par byed par de bzhin rab tu 'grub// zhi dang rgyas la 'o mar ldan pa shing nyid mda' rgya'i yam shing yin te gsar par mi rus so// dbye bar bya rog 'jug ma nyid dang seng ldeng skyes dang kyin shu ka dag dbang dang
167a1(rgyud): dgug pa la// bil ba dang ni bsgo byed 'khrug byed pa nyid mda' brgya'i grangs rnams rengs dang rmongs par byed pa la// 'o ma mar dang khrag dang nag dang rdul dang rdo rje chu dang mchil mchang
167a2(rgyud): rnams sbyin bsreg tu// du ra ba dang ni 'bru dang sha dang dug du bcas pa dag dang de bzhin skyo ma me tog dmar// bil ba me tog phreng ba snying dang ste ba ru ra'i me tog zhi ba la sogs rnams la'o// gshin rje bden dral
167a3(rgyud): 'tshams dang chu lha rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po dbang po dang ni mi rnams su// slob dpon rnams kyi gdan du nges pa yin te me'i bdag po zhi ba'i las la sogs pa la'o// tshon gyi las ni gnyis gnyis dag tu 'gyur bas
167a4(rgyud): gtso bo'i pad mar dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang ser// phyi ru sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje chu lha byang phyogs rnams su tshon gyis// thab khung 'am ni dkyil 'khor dag la rigs kyi dbang las rdul
167a5(rgyud): tshon bri bar bya ba phyogs rnams su// bkod pa dang ni bsang gtor la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo rje nyid las lha rnams spro bar bya// shel la sogs pa yon chab snod rnams pad ma nor gyi 'dab ma 'theb
167a6(rgyud): sor bcu gnyis pa nyid do// yu ba snyim pa dang ldan dgang gsar nyid dang sbyor ma can gyi blugs gsar dag gis sbyin bsreg bya// zhi dang drag dang chags bcas 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang las lha rnams
167a7(rgyud): bsgyings pa'i sku nyid kha dog dag/ de ltar las ni gnyis su 'gyur te rab tu gsal bar nges par dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha// rgyal ba'i dbang pos rnams pa lnga ni snying gsum gnas su gyur pa'i
167a8(rgyud): phung po khams sogs dbye rnams kyis// rnam pa lnga ru de phyir 'gyur bas rdul tshon dkyil 'khor du yang lha rnams nyid du 'gyur ba'o// skud pa khru brgyad pa ru 'gyur ba yin te gsum bsgril mthe bo'i
167b1(rgyud): lto gcig tshad du bya ba'o// slob dpon mthe bo'i lto chad rnams gsum lam du gyur pa yi thig gi skud pa gcig ste gzhan du min// zhi ba la sogs rnams la rim pa yongs su bya ba dkyil dkrung rdo rje lha min tsog pu
167b2(rgyud): dang / dkyil dkrung phyed pa'i dbye ba gnyis dang rkang pa gshang pa'i lam gyur rnams ni las kyi dbye rnams kyis// shel dang mu tig dag dang mi dang bong bu'i so dang rus pa nyid ste bo tau tsa rnams dang // pad
167b3(rgyud): ma dbang po mig dang lung tang rnams kyi phreng bas bde gshegs rigs dbang las ni bsngags bzlas so// dri zhim me tog dkar po rnams dang bcas pa gnag pa dang ste dmar dang ser rnams kyis mchod bya/ 
167b4(rgyud): grang dang sbrang rtsi gshang pa sha chen spos dang khrag ldan pa dang ma rungs spos dang ska ba rnams// 'khrul 'khor rnams ni n+ya gro ta'i mdab ma dur khrod ro ras gro ga a ga'i mdab rnams la// shi ri kha 'da'
167b5(rgyud): dang ni sa lu btags rnams dur khrod gnas 'gyur sel ba khrag dang dug rnams dang // kha che khrag dang grang ba rnams dang 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba yung ba ba bla bri bya ba// dur ba grang pa rus 'jug sgro gser/ 
167b6(rgyud): shing seng ldeng skyes dang byil skyes a ga'i smyug gus so// sa mi kham por dpal ldan thod par mngar ba gsum dang khrag ste spra tshil gyis g.yogs so phag dbus// rlan dang bcas pa'i gnas dang dur
167b7(rgyud): khrongs dang mi yis gdungs pa nyid dang sa sgra mi rnams kyi 'og/ 'khrul 'khor rnams ni gzhug par bya ba mi dag dge ba'i dbang las bsngags pa rnams kyis rig par bya// zla ba glang po yi dgas dang ni rnga ma
167b8(rgyud): dgas rta dang phyugs dang ru sbal rnams kyi lus la rim pa yis// dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis phyogs rnams kun la gnas pa'i bdud kyi tshogs rnams nges par bsregs// phyis ni 'khor lo rtsibs
168a1(rgyud): bcu pa la phyogs mtshams gyur pa la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams sgom par bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su khro bo'i dbang po gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i lag pa rdo rje shugs te dus kyi zhal// de phyir khro
168a2(rgyud): bo'i dbang po bla ma'i nges ldan gang zag cung zad 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po yis sgrub// sa gzhi dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i ring por mthong ba'i mtha' ru rdo rje gsum gyi ra ba gsum du brjod// snga dro'i grib ma'i mtha' ru sI
168a3(rgyud): 'og dang nam mkha' la gnas rdo rje gzhal yas khang nyid kyi// dbus su chu skyes nyi ma'i khrur 'gyur dus kyi khru yis lte ba nyid ni gdan dang bcas pa la// bdag nyid de stangs rnam par gyur pas sdig spangs pa ru rnag
168a4(rgyud): 'byor pa yis sgom par bya ba'o// sa phyogs rnams su rdo rje gsum gyis dang po kho nar zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin byas la// phyis nas rdo rje bzhi rnams kyis ni phyogs mtshams gyur par gnas pa'i bdud
168a5(rgyud): kyi sde rnams nges par bsreg/ sa yi lha mo spyan drangs pa la chu bcas me tog yon chab rnams ni 'di la rab tu sbyin// phyis nas sa stengs ji ltar 'dod pa sbyin du sbyang bar bya phyir de la gsol ba gdab dang bstod
168a6(rgyud): mo bye// lha'i bdag pa dang bcas bdud kyi rgya bris bcos dus lnga mo khyod ni dbang du gyur pa'i tshe// khyod la lha'i mchog gis mchod dang phyag byas gnas po'i phyi na de bzhin ngami son cha pa 'di 'ang gzhes// 
168b1(rgyud): de rnams kun la gsol ba btab ste sing ldeng lus byung mkhrang ba'i phur bu rnams kyis sral gdab// phyogs bcu'i khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi char gyur rnas la bsrung ba'i don du bgod// sa'i nang du rus pa
168b2(rgyud): sol bar bcas pa'i rwa rnams gsod 'jigs byed pa nges par yod pa na// de phyir gnas de rnam par 'jig pa la yang sbyang bar byas pas yon tan kun ldan 'gyur ba ni// rin chen dang ni dung dang 'ching bu mthong na bde bar byed pas/ 
168b3(rgyud): sar bzhug dkyil 'khor don nyid dang // khang bzangs don dang khang pa'i don dang mchog sbyin la sogs don du nges par 'di ni gsal bar gsungs// gang bar sa sbyang ba dang sra bzung ba yang de bzhin du ni bu ldan rnaMs kyi bsdu ba'o// 
168b4(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab pa dang 'dod dang ma nu'i nyi mar dpal ldan rdul tshon dge ba nyid// dbang la sogs pa nya la sbyin te bla ma dam pas bdud 'joms pa yi nyi ma yin phyir dang // de nub rab tu gnas pa ru yang 'gyur te rgyal ba'i
168b5(rgyud): rigs kyi mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min// dus sbyor rnams dang gza' sogs bdag ni mtshan mo gzhan nyid la yang rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste// srog dang pa wa sangs dag rgas nas med par gyur
168b6(rgyud): na bag ma dang ni rab gnas nges pa med// slob dpon nyid kyis mtha' dag rab shes stengs gnas su 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa yi// gang dang gang la byad ba byed pa de dag rab
168b7(rgyud): tu yin pa de dang de la 'bras bu mtha' dag ster// spro ba ma rnams la bsrung ba bya ste mgo dang snying kha de bzhin spyi gtsug lte ba mgrin pa dang // dpal ldan gsang ba'i chu skyes rnams su rgyal
168b8(rgyud): sogs gnyis ka'i rigs su gyur pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rjes// de ltar sku gzugs la sogs rnams kyi rab tu nges par 'gyur te dpal ldan dbyangs rnams kyis po ta'o// sems can rnams kyi tha / 
169a1(rgyud): @rgyu ru gtso bo che ge mo'i dkyil 'khor bdag gis bri bar bya// dag pa'i gnas su shin du gang zhig rab tu mnyam par byas pa'i rus sbal rgyab ltar mtho ba'i// khru gang tshad nas dus
169a2(rgyud): dang nor dang mi yi bdag po la sogs stong nyid gyur gyi tshad du ste// thig skud rdo rje brdul tshon rdo rje dril bu rnams ni lha dang gshin rje chu dang bya rnams la// mtshan ma snyed nas gsal bar dang po dang ni nub phyogs
169a3(rgyud): dag la gnas ste dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// thig skud chad na bla ma 'jig ste gzhan yang yongs su 'joms byed 'goms na bu rnams de bzhin 'gyur// brdul tshon rlung gis bus na rab tu gsal
169a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ste rgyal pos yul 'khor nyid kyang 'jig par 'gyur// mtshan ma ngan pa de nyid mthong na yang nas yang du gtso bo'i sngags kyis bzlas par rab tu bya// phyis ni mtshan ma rnyed nas mnyam
169a5(rgyud): dang mi mnyam rkang pas thig rnams yang dag gdab par bya ba'o// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus kyi yongs su 'joms 'gom dkyil 'khor du ni spang bar bya ba yin// g.yul gyi
169a6(rgyud): dus su mo dang rlung du gyur par sde yi dbus su sa la gdengs ka bzhin du'o/ yongs 'joms 'joms na sde 'jig pa dang sa yi steng du gnyis mthab pa la rma dang brtsod par 'gyur// de phyir
169a7(rgyud): 'thab dang dbang gi gnas su shin du stobs ldan yongs 'joms nyes pa sngags pas rig par bya// a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas rnams kyi rang gi snying kha'i pad mar zla ba nyi ma'i steng
169a8(rgyud): dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo'i g.yas brkyang stabs kyis ri bong 'dzin pa dang ni 'dod mnan bsam pa dang / shes rarje brdzun nyid kyi snying kha'i chu skyes nyi ma zla sbyar ba'i rang rang ngo
169b1(rgyud): rje lcags sgyu yis// sangs rgyas lha mo rnams ni spyan drangs brdul tshon ro mnyam dgod dang thig skud dag la thim par sgom// tshangs pa'i thig nas ro dang dgu bcu'i thig 'dri rnams kyis phyogs kyi cha
169b2(rgyud): rnams dbye bas rab sbyin pa// thig rnams sor phyed nyid du gsungs par 'gyur te nor dang dus rnams tshad kyi nang dbus 'gyur// nang nas phyi ru mtha' dag nyis mtha' bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo yi
169b3(rgyud): mtha' thug pa ru ste// phyi rdol gnas la rab tu rta babs sa deng chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa rnams kyi sum 'gyur gyis ni gtso bo'i bdan du 'gyur ba'o// 
169b4(rgyud): tshangs pa yi gnas nyi mo yi ri mig rnams te ri bong can gyis ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas la sogs chu skyes bzhi yis rab 'gyur ri bong can gyis phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba'o// lha mo sangs rgyas rnams kyi
169b5(rgyud): bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa'i bdan rnams re mig gsum gyis 'gyur// gnas de nyid nas ri mo gsum gyi bar lo nyi phyed rnams kyis brdul tshon gnas su 'gyur ba ste// phyogs 'tshams rnamasu rgya mtsho re mig
169b6(rgyud): rnams dang nyi ma'i re mig pad ma rnams la dri sogs lha// phyed bcas gcig gis ri mo gsum du 'gyur de 'tshams dang ro nyid dag gis sgo dang sgo khyud dang // re shig 'gram dang logs la yang ste// rnam gsum
169b7(rgyud): gyis kyang 'dod yon nyid dkra bdu yi phyed// de yi yang ni phyed dang dus kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do sha la sa ru 'gyur// bcu ni gsum 'gyur rnams kyis sgo ngos la sogs pa dang ka steng rta babs bcas
169b8(rgyud): pa'i gan su 'gyur// thig phyed steng du spangs nas dra ba phyed pa'i mtha' ru bgu li ri ni rab tu 'gyur ba'o// rta babs 'og gis snam bu'i ri mig drug la nor gyi bad ldan la gnas rnal 'byor ma rnamaso// de yi phyi nas/ 
170a1(rgyud): dpal ldan mtshan gyis ni du la ros bsgyur rnams kyis ri mo lnga yi bar du'o// phyogs 'tshams rnams su nyi ma'i pad ma ma nu nyis 'gyur pad ldan nyi ma'i rimag chad kya bya// snying po'i sgrolas yon
170a2(rgyud): tan dbang las nyis 'gyur 'gyur ste 'di ni phyi yi sgo nyid la yang ngo // de nyid kho nar rtsig pa gsum la sogs pa yang yin te dkyil 'khor gsum la brgyad gsum rab tu bya// de rnams kyi ni thog ma'i cha la nyi ma ri bong can
170a3(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor phyi ru rdo rje phreng // re mig rnams kyi phyed la bya ste gang zhig rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor dbus su 'khor lo'o// ka ba'i 'og tu brdengs ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rab yin pa ste lha mo rnams kyi shing rta'o// 
170a4(rgyud): nyi ma'i rnams kyi sgo dbus nam mkha'i steng dang sa yi 'og ste shar gyi cha dang nub du'o// // rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang mar gad dang na byi ru mu tig la sogs pa// nor bu mang po'i dbye ba nyid dam 'bru
170a5(rgyud): lnga rnams kyi dbye ba btags pa'i tshon gyis de bzhin nyid// phyogs kyi cha'i brtul chen gnas su sangs rgyas dbye bas brtul chen dgye bar bya'o mi yi bdag po kye// ser po dkar po dmar po la sogs rnams
170a6(rgyud): kyis sa chu me rlung rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa yis// shar du dpal ldan sa gzhi nag por 'gyur te nyi ma dang ni mtshungs par lho dang nub nyid du// gser mtshungs pa dang gzhan yang byang du ri bong 'dzin
170a7(rgyud): ltar dkar po rdo rje can gyi zhal dbye bas// dgar dang dmar ba nag po rnams ni 'dod yon snam bu 'dod yon rnams kyi rim pas yongs su bya// pad ma rnams ni zla nyi mdog rnams kyis ste dri med ri bong
170a8(rgyud): can mtshungs dmar gnag reg gsum// dbus su pad ma mdab brgyad ljang khu bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur// dbang ldan srin po me dang rlung du ri bong can nyi mdog dang gnag dang ser ba'i
170b1(rgyud): rim pa yis/ dung dang g+han d+he nor bu dang ni shing zhes pa dang de bzhin phyogs rnams bum pa dkar po brgyad// zla ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du nyi phyed pad ma dkar po rnams kyi steng// chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba
170b2(rgyud): ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan rnams kyi zur rnams la gnas par 'gyur// chu skyes dkar po'i lte bar nyi phyed rnams la lha rnams kyi yang phyogs rnams su ni 'gyur ba'o// phyi ru rdo rje phreng ba gtso bo'i pad ma'i dab
170b3(rgyud): gis 'gyur te 'dod yon nyid ni dkar po'i mdog/ b+ha gu li ste ka ba'i ser po gser dang mtshungs par rab tu 'gyur te rta babs sna tshogs mdog/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni snam bu dkar po mtshungs ste nor gyi
170b4(rgyud): pad ma phyogs 'tshams thams cad du// phyogs kyi cha ru pad ma dmar po 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang las 'tshams rnams pad ma dkar po rnams// zla nyi rnams dang bral ste de bzhin ma nu nyis 'gyur mdab ma
170b5(rgyud): rnams la lha rnams kyi yang ngo // nam mkha' la sogs ri mo lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang las de yi cha gsum par yang gnas// ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi 'tshams su brdengs ka rnams kyi gdan ni rlung
170b6(rgyud): la sogs par rab tu 'gyur// sa yi dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i dbang ldan dang ni srin po'i 'tshams su zla ba nyi ma'i bdag po kye// phyi rol sgo steng cha ru chos kyi 'khor lo sprin mtshungs ra dgas bcas
170b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'o// lho ru bum pa dmar po yin te nor spyon chu lhar bcas par rnga bo che dang byang chub shing // dril bu me long ba dan rnams ni ri bong 'dzin ltar dkar ba rta babs rnams la 'phyang gyur pa// shal phyed pa
170b8(rgyud): dog dkar po 'gyur te rig kyi dbang las shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o// sgo yi phyi ru rlung gnas 'khor lo dkar po dang ni dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rig dbang las// phyi ru rdo rje'i phreng ba rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro bo rnamasu 'gyuraro mo yi bdag
171a1(rgyud): // bo kye sbom pos nad phyed pa dang re gang na dang 'phra bas rdzas rnams bri bar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po skye bor bcas pa bsgod ste de bzhin du// mtshan ma dang ni nyi ma
171a2(rgyud): zla ba chad na 'jigs 'joms sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min// rdul tshon rnam par 'dres pas rigs 'chad pa de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis dkyil 'khor du ni rig par bya// rgyal ba rnams kyis rgyud kyi nang du
171a3(rgyud): rab gsal ma gsungs pa rnams dkyil 'khor rnams su de mi sbyin// mtshan ma mdzes bya'i don du bkod na rgyal ba bskyed byed rigs su de rnams bdud kyi mtshan ma ste// de phyir dkyil 'khor du ni sgo 'tshams bar du
171a4(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang las rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur// de shol phyed pa dang ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'tshams su pad ma bum stsogs rnams kyis rab tu brgyan// nag po las stsogs rkang pas 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 
171a5(rgyud): mtshon gyi spangs ni nges par nas gcig tshad du'o// rtsig pa rnams kyi sum 'gyur pad ma nyi phyed ri bong can dang ri mo gzhan rnams nyis 'gyur ro// snying po las ni phyi ru rim pas nyis 'gyur nyid du dkyil 'khor
171a6(rgyud): spangs su 'gyur rom bdag kye// do shal phyed pa'i mtha' ni nas gtsig sa dang byin za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba ru// snying po nas ni sgo la sogs pa'i 'tshams su nor ldan 'gyur te dkyil 'khor 'jig rten khams nyid do// 
171a7(rgyud): sgo rnams na swa ni tsa ra rtsi ka mtha' gdengs ka gsum 'gyur bsregs pa rin chen gnas kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// de yi phyi rol rgyal ba'i dbang po'i ri dmig rnams kyis mi yi dkyil 'khor de nas rlung yang de ltar 'gyur// de yi
171a8(rgyud): phyi rol nyid du de yi rnam par dag pas sa chu'i byin za rlung rnams bstan pa ru ni bya// spyi gtsug zhal dang mgrin la gdengs ka sum 'gyur bsregs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyis ni spang bar bya// de ltar lhun po mtha' dag
171b1(rgyud): la ni gdengs ka sum 'gyur bsregs pa rnams kyis sa yi mthar thug par// red mig drug dang drug rnams rim pas klu gnas gsal ba nyid dang sa 'og bdun gyi dbye ba'o// de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad kyang ni de
171b2(rgyud): bzhin rang gi lus la spang bar bya ba'o// gnyis dang rgya mtsho gcig 'tshams ro me me phyed dus dgu khyes kyis so// 'tshams la dus kyis bsgyur dang 'tshams dang ro dang skon gyi cha rnams kyis ni nges par rim pa yis// snying po'i
171b3(rgyud): phyed dang chu skyes 'dab mo yang ste de nas kra ba rdo rje phreng ba dang // pad ma dang ni rdo rje phreng bar rab tu 'gyur te de las sgo khyud nyid la sogs pa'o// rtsa ba dang ni rtsig pa 'dod yon rnams kyang de nas snam bu do shal phyed pa zhes pa'is
171b4(rgyud): me long rtsa ba'i snam bur 'gyur te mi yI bdag po rta babs ji ltar gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis// phyi'i sgo la sogs pa thams cad nyis 'gyur yang ni yin te de yi nyis 'gyur gyis kyang phyi rol du// phyi rol pad ma rnams dang / 
171b5(rgyud): 'khor lo zhes pa nyi phyed rnams kyis shing rta dang ni dkyil 'khor rnams// oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad mar zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i gdan stengs na// a sogs ka sogs stong par bcas pas srid pa gsum bskyed
171b6(rgyud): sgra tsam nad rnams ni bzhag par bya// stong dang a yi ga gta bi sarga rnams dbyangs dang bral ba mchog las sku gsung thugs rdo rje// yang dag 'byung ba bsngags kyi skye gnas bde ba dam par byed pa ye shes rdo rje bzhi pa'o// hU~M
171b7(rgyud): yig sna tshogs pa yi mdog ni rgyal ba'i bdag po pad ma zla ba nyi ma me steng du// phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su a sogs stong pa dang ni 'tshams kyi mdab mar he sogs stong pa bzhi// dbang ldan dang ni bden bral 'tshams
171b8(rgyud): dang me dang rlung rnams nyid la sku gsung thugs dang chags pa rnams// hi yig la sogs bum pa rnams kyar 'gyur te 'dir ni mtha'i haM haHdang bcas bcu nyid do// shar gyi chu skyes steng du i yig dang ni me ya pad mar gyur par i
172a1(rgyud): yig ring po nyid// gshin rje bden bral dag dang nor sbyin bde byed gyur par thung dang ring ba re dang u yig go// chu dang rlung gi 'tshams su yang ni pad mar gyur pa dag la thung dang ring ba'i e yig dag/ nag po dag ni
172a2(rgyud): dmar po dag dang dkar dang mchog gi ser mtshungs pa dag zhal gyi dbye bas dgod// shar gyi sgo yi g.yas dang me yi pad mar gyur pa dag la thung ngu dang ni ring por de bzhin e// de bzhin du yang Ar yig zung nyid gshin rje srin
172a3(rgyud): por gyur te nu ba dang rlung du al yi ga zung // oM I gnod sbyin drag por yin te lha dang chu bdag gshin rje gnod sbyin rnams kyi g.yon rnams su// aM dang a sogs rim pa nyid kyis gzhan yang ra wa la sgo yi pad mar ngag dbang
172a4(rgyud): sogs shar sgo dang ni byang sgo dag tu ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdon dag nyid dang khro bo dag gir 'gyur// lho dang nub du pod ma rnams kyi steng du nyi ma'i gdan la gnyis su rab tu 'gyur ba'o// thabs dang shes rab dag gis dbye bas rnam
172a5(rgyud): kyi pad mar nyi ma zla ba'i gdan du 'gyur// lho dang nub du yin te lha yi bdag po dang ni nor sprin du ni zla gdan yin// pad ma rnams la thig le a yig la sogs nges par khyab par 'gyur ba'i ka sogs sde tshan rnams// sdong bu sbu gu
172a6(rgyud): dang ni mdapa mi ge sar lte ba rnams su rim pas yongs su dgod bya ba// sa sogs nam mkha'i mthar ni ka khA ga g+ha nga zhes pa thung dang ring ba rang rang sngar// lte ba'i steng du thig les zla ba dang ni bis rga yiswa ni nyi phyed gdan du 'gyur ba'o// rang
172a7(rgyud): thung sde tshun drug rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang las 'dod yon kA rtsa'i g.yas dang g.yon rnams su// shar gyi cha nas dri so gas rim pa yis ni rang rigs rnams la gnas rang rang phyogs rnams su// phyi ru thig le mA la sogs dbye ba
172a8(rgyud): rnams ni nyi ma gsum gyis bsgyur bas 'dod yon dag la ste// 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs rnams la gnas rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye ba yis// thung dang ring po'o ha yig rnams ni dbang po'i pad ma'i nub dang / 
172b1(rgyud): lhor ni tsar tsi ka sogs kyis// khyab 'jug ma sogs k+Sha yig rnams la a sogs khyab pa me dang bde byed rlung dang srin po'i bar// hi sogs k+Sha sogs grangs brgyad dag ni pad ma'i mdab ma la gnas shar dang rgyab dang phyogs
172b2(rgyud): gzhan ste// ya sogs drug po thung dang rang po dbang po'i pad ma' med pa ma dang ni ma mdab rim pa yis// de ltar gshin rje dang ni srin po'i pad ma'i madrab mar ra sogs thung dang ring po'i rab dbye bas// gnod sprin drag por wa sogs
172b3(rgyud): pa ste rgya mtsho rlung bcas pa yi pad mdab du ni la sogs so// shar sgo'i g.yas su pad ma'i med pa ma la gnas gyur pa phyi mos khyab pa tsa yi sde tshan no// me ya 'tshams la gnas pa dag ni thung ngu lha mo'i bu ste ring po rlung lha nyid du 'gyur/ 
172b4(rgyud): de ltar gshin rdza Ta yi sde tshan me dang re yig drong gi thung dang ring ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis so// g.yon dang dbang ldan du ni pa yi sdo mtshan thung dang ring ba'i dbye bas rgya mtsho tshogs bdag 'gyur// rgya byin dang ni tshangs pa'i nges par chu bcas rlung
172b5(rgyud): du thung dang ring po ta yi sde tshan no// shar sgo'i byang du srin po'i dgra ni pad ma'i mad ba ma ra ka yi sde tshan thung ngu rnams su 'gyur// ring po rnams ni lho yi shar du gshin rje rab tu yin te ma yi bdag po byang gi nub phyogs su// sa sde thung ngu pha
172b6(rgyud): phyuphyogs bdag gis sde nub kyis lho ru ring po'idzam b+ha la yin rgyal po kye// srin po la sogs rnams kyi sa bon rnams ni rang rang sde tshan mtha' dbus yin te med pa mar min// mdab mar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams su yang ni nyin zhag dbang
172b7(rgyud): las rang rang sde tshan yi ga rnams// ya ra wa la haHha nges par drug kyang shing rta rnams la steng dang 'og dang shar sogs la// sgo rnams g.yas dang g.yon du gdengs ka rnams ni ha yig yaM sogs bsnan pa'i yi ge rab tu yin// sde
172b8(rgyud): tshan drug po brtsegs pa nyid kyang ha ya ra wa la kA sogs ldan pa phyogs kyi 'khor lo'o// ka sogs sde tshan bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa dang ni me la tsA sogs gzhan du lugs 'thun rnams// shar dang gshin rje byang dang chu bdag
173a1(rgyud): dang ni me dang srin bu dbang ldan dang ni rlung 'tshams su// aM a zla ba nyi ma dag ste nges par dur khrod la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams so// hUM yig chos kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu yin te de bzhin du ni sa
173a2(rgyud): bon aHyig bum pa yi// oM yig rnga bo che yir 'gyur te chu bdag tu ni byang chub shing gri ho ru rab tu 'gyur// de nas de ltar phyi mo rnams kyi yin te rigs kyi dbang las dkyil 'khor du ni sngags kyi dbye / phyag rgya dang ni mtshan
173a3(rgyud): ma rnams dang kha dog mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas yin// thab khung sbyin bsreg de bzhini rab tu yin te gzhan yang spyan 'dren pa ni gtsang ba'i gnas rnams nas// dpal ldan sa la gsang gtor dang ni yon chab
173a4(rgyud): cho ga gzhan yang de bzhin bdud rnams gzhom par bya// sgo rnams bsrung ba'i don tu brtul zhugs nges par ldan dang dag pa'i slob mo rnams la rab tu sbyin// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ni dpal gyi bum bzung mi dang srin po rlung
173a5(rgyud): dang dbang ldan 'tshams rim gyis// mi yi bdag po slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs dbang gyur nas las kyi rdo rje can gyis rab bya ba// sbyin bsreg la sogs par 'gyur te slob ma med na tshegs kyi bdag po rang gis bya ba dang / 
173a6(rgyud): zlum po'am ni rig byed zung nyid rigs kyi dbang las zhi dang rgyas pa'i thab khung dag brjod pa// byang ngam drag po'i 'tshams su 'gyur te gzhan ni sa gzhi dkar dang dbus kyi pad ma' nyes 'gyur ro// zabs nyid pad ma'i tshad du
173a7(rgyud): 'gyur te de yi nang du dbus kyi pad ma mtshan mar bcas pa'o// pad ma phyed kyi tshad kyis pad mo'i phyir ni bum bcas ral gri rin chen la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur// de yi phyed kyis dbye bas mchu dang kha khyer dag ste de las
173a8(rgyud): nyis 'gyur kha khyer chen po brgya yi cha// kha khyer phyed kyis de nyid steng du rdo rje phreng ba'i spangs su nges par rab tu 'gyur ba'o// phyi rol 'og tu pad ma'i mdab ma rnams kyang yin te ku sha bzhi pa phyogs kun du ni bya// de nyid mthar
173b1(rgyud): gyur nub du nges par sgo gcig pu la ri mo gsum ni rab tu 'gyur ba'o// slob dpon bdag nyid snying po'i pad ma nyis gyur dang ni mnyam pa nges par rab tu 'gyur ba'o// g.yon du arga'i gdun du 'gyur te sbyin pa drag gzar bu'i
173b2(rgyud): gdan dag g.yas su 'gyur rom bdag kye// kun la pad ma dang ni yum gyi nam mkha'i pad mar rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur// zhal drang gsang ba'i thab khung rnams gnyis su yang 'gyur te phyi rol dang na la
173b3(rgyud): lus su rgyal po kye// khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pa ma lus pa yis thab khung phyogs 'tshams dkyil 'khor bsrung bar bya// dpal gyi rdo rje rnams kyis gsang gtor la sogs me tog chu bcas yon chab nyid ni me lha
173b4(rgyud): la/ sprin bya de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas rang snying pad mar zla ba ru ni gsang bar bya ba nyid// zhal gcig sku mdog dkar po dus kyi phyag ste g.yon par spyi blugs dang ni dung nyid bsnams pa'o// g.yas na dbyug pa dang ni phreng ba
173b5(rgyud): dgra sto ral pa spyan dag dmar ser na bza' dang bcas pa// me lha'i thugs khor zla ba'i steng du dza las lcags kyu 'od zer dri med 'phro ba nges par bsom// de yis bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la stabs
173b6(rgyud): gcig shin du ro mnyam bya ba'o// de ltar thab khung du yang yang dag me lha spyan dang bya ste mi yi bdag po de bzhin no// mchog sprin lag pa g.yas pa mthe bos me lha'i kha ru sbyin bsreg rab tu nges par bya ba ni// gtso bo rdo rje yan
173b7(rgyud): lag gis kyang mdab brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang dur ba mar dang 'o ma yis// dkyil dkrung la gnas rab tu zhi dang sems mi groyo dang snying po yi sngags rigs gsang sngags lus ldan pa'i// slob dpon nam ni las kyi rdo rje can
173b8(rgyud): gyis me yi ched du dgang blugs nges par smin par bya// sbyin bsreg rim pa bzhin du byas nas me dang bdag nyid la yang de bzhin 'thor 'thung byas pa dang // dri dang spos la sogs pa byin te rang gi snying kha'i pad mAr ye shes me lha
174a1(rgyud): gshegs su gsol// phyis ni dpal ldan bla ma rnams la yon tan mtha' dag ster 'gyur dbang rnams nges par sprin// dang por bdud rtsi lnga rnams nges par rgyal ba mchog gis dag po'i don du byin gyis
174a2(rgyud): brlab par bya// rang rang sngags kyis sprin bsreg grub nas rdul tshon dgye dang sngags sam mtshan ma rab tu sbyin pa dang // shel gyi bum pa dkar po rnams la skud pa lnga yis rnam par bkris te 'tshams rnam la gzhag bya// slob
174a3(rgyud): dpon shar du kha bltas rdo rje pad+ma ma las skyes bzhengs nas khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis ni// ye shes 'khor lo 'gugs pa gnyis kyis rdul chen ro mnyam byed pa dbang gi rgyur// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ni lha dang lha
174a4(rgyud): mo rnams kyi ming gi sngon du oM yig nyid du 'gyur// sbyin bsreg la ni snying pos sngags kyi mthar ni swA hA yang ste de bzhin mchod mthar na ma nges// dze hUM baM ho lcags kyu la sogs pa yi rim pas yongs su bya ba spyan drang rab gzhug
174a5(rgyud): dang bcing dang mnyes dang bdag gi yon chub dbul pos slar yang yon chab phul ba 'di bzhes shig/ rgyas pa'i sngags mthar swA hA 'gyur te de bzhin du ni dbang las nges par Sha Ta mtha' ru'o// mngon spyod lo sogs rnams la
174a6(rgyud): hUM yig mthar ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang las phur sogs phaT yig mthar// dkar dang dmar dang gnag dang gser mchog dang mtshungs pa yi sngags rnams las kyi dbye ba rnams kyis so// shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje
174a7(rgyud): nag po sprin dang mtshungs pa dang ni byang du sku rdo rje// gsung rdo rje ni lho dang rang gi rigs kyi mchog gyur dbang las nub du ye shes rdo rje'o// dkar dang dam dang ser por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang las khyab par byed pas sa yi cha la'o// 
174a8(rgyud): rlung me chu dang sa nyid rnams kyi i ri u l-i lha rnams skye gnas 'gyur rom bdag kye// oM dang A hUM phyag rgya gsum dang swA hA'i tshig dang ldan pa ring po'i dbye ba las ni lnga// hU~M a oM ho rnams ni zhal bzangs yin te gzhan yang de
174b1(rgyud): bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga pa'o// sa sogs hUM yig drug ldan ro rkang rnams dang yan lag drug las dpal ldan nag mo dang por ro// phreng yig sna tshogs yum gyi rab tu 'gyur te rnam bcu bsregs pa'i sngags ni rgyal po nyid
174b2(rgyud): kyi'o// hUM yig ye shes sa bon dang ste snying po'i sngags nyid brtsegs pa chen po zhal dang bcas pa'o// hraM yig la sogs yan lag drug rnams sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang ldan 'di rnams nye snying ngo // de bzhin gzhan yang las kyi dbye
174b3(rgyud): ba rnam po mang po du ma rnams kyis phreng ba'i sngags su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las shes par bya ba'o// rin chen dang ni gser dngul me tog sna tshogs mang po rnams dang
174b4(rgyud): dri spos mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ste rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu nyid dang bya dan sgra gar dang // mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya ste gzhan yang rnam pa bcu pa bdag gi nus/ ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// slob dpon gyi ni zhab
174b5(rgyud): kyi drung du mchog gi bu yis dag pa'i rgyu ru yon nyid dbul ba ni// rnam gsum dag phyir rdzas dang bdag dang bu dang bu mo gzhan par bcas dang rigs skyes gzhan yang dbul// de nas gser gyi me tog bcas pa'i maN+Dal byas te/ 
174b6(rgyud): bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par bya// lus ngag sems dag pa yis nges par 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms phyir khyod kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes la// bodag ni ding nas brtsams te rgyal ba nyid la mi bzad 'khor bas 'jigs
174b7(rgyud): pas skyabs su lhag par mchi// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma rnams ste 'dod pa'i rdo rje rnams sbyor gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs su 'dir ni sbyin pa sbyin bya 'khor lor rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bya// ral gri'i rig
174b8(rgyud): su mchod pa bya ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs su sdom pa yang dag bskyang bar bya// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru bskyed byed rigs su byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// brtul zhugs nges par ldan pa khrus byas dri yig/ 
175a1(rgyud): byugs nas shar phyogs kyi ni sa ru nges par gnas// dngos grub dron du rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes so shing mngon par bsngags la sbyin par byas pa dang // rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig lce la bdud rtsi
175a2(rgyud): rnams smin yang ni nges par dbab pa'i don du spros// sngags ni hUM yig dang na gcig nyid dang sbyar a ra lar yang ldan pas khro bo rnams kyi gtso bo bskol// khro bo rgyal po phebs pas lag pa'i mtshon cha rnams dang sdig
175a3(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis kyis bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'joms// rkang pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i gar rnams g.yon brkyang la sogs pa yi sna tshogs gar rnams mdzad pa'o// hUM yig dang bcas bzhad pas dgral 'jigs ster ba dang
175a4(rgyud): gzhan yang rdo rje'i glu nyid mdzad pa'o// ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur ba yon tan dbang ste gzhan yang lha mo zhi ba'o// sku phebs pa yis rnal 'byor pa de rang bzhin yon tan dbang las lus kyis bya ba byed pa ste/ 
175a5(rgyud): gsung nyid phebs pas srid pa gsum du lha dang klu dang lha ma yin sogs las rtsod rgyal// thugs pabs pa yis 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba'i zhal gyi sems gyur thams cad shes pa'o// ye shes phebs nas
175a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'gyur te bla ma'i bla mi rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig kho na'o// sa phe bsra pA yis rnal 'byor pa ni rI dang mnyam par 'gyur te chu yis drang bar 'gyur ba'o// me phebs pa yis bsreg par 'gyur te de ltar
175a7(rgyud): rlung gis skam pa ru ni rab tu 'gyur ba'o// stong pa phebs pas mi snang ba ru 'gyur te sa yi steng du mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gro/ de ltar gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rim pas rig
175a8(rgyud): rig par bya ba dang // mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyis nges par phebs par 'gyur ba de yang sgom pa'i stobs nyid dang // bsnyen pa'i dbye ba rnams dang dam tshig rnam pa mang po dang ni gsang sngags bzlas pa
175b1(rgyud): la sogs kyis// gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyams su myong bar 'gyur dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor du ni skal ldan dpal ldan du// rang byin brlab pa dman te sna tshogs srid pa du mas sngags pa
175b2(rgyud): rnams la dngos grub yod pa min// phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying kha spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang // gsang ba rnams su bsrung ba rgyal ba rnams kyi rang rigs gnas 'gyur rnams la rang gi rdor
175b3(rgyud): gsum gyis// slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser bskon cing mig rnams bkab nos dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya/ 
175b4(rgyud): rtag pa ru/ gsod dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnam spang de bzhin gzhan nor chung 'thung dag kyang ste// 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams// gang zhig gang gi dus
175b5(rgyud): su 'byung ba'i lha dang mi'i bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'o// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis// rgyan 'gyang kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas
175b6(rgyud): dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya// grogs dang rje'u dang ni lha dang mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la
175b7(rgyud): mkhu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// dpal ldan sngags dang mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i pad ma'i kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te// dang / 
175b8(rgyud): por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad ma'i kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni dor// gnas 'gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su nges so ma bdag kye// phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang
176a1(rgyud): rnam gsum 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin// klu rnams kyis sam bzhis ste rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am// sa las byung ba rnams su
176a2(rgyud): rin chen sman dang dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu brgyan sbyin dang mchog gi bla mas nus mi rnams kyis dar sbyangs nyid// rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid ste brdul
176a3(rgyud): zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya// ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi rol bcas pa sbyin// rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin byin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i
176a4(rgyud): chos rnams bstan par bya// rdo rje'i rigs su nges par srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang // rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dong mchog gi pad ma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud meng 'phrog
176a5(rgyud): 'khor lor chang dang mar mau sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin du bsten par bya ba'o// gri gug tu ni rdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha'i pad ma smad mi bya// sems can rnams kyi don du nor
176a6(rgyud): dang lus bcas sbyin bya 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ma ni// rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges// chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams
176a7(rgyud): drang dbu brgyan rgyal ba rnams ste dar sbyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis byams pa sogs su sbyong // rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan
176a8(rgyud): srid pa'i 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pa// de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig po'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin// dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bskur na dge
176b1(rgyud): ba'i dbang gis sa bdurdo 'bang phyug nyid du 'gro ba'o// phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs la nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa
176b2(rgyud): 'joms pa 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o// 'gro ba'i g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis
176b3(rgyud): bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur// gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin// gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor/ 
176b4(rgyud): 'dir 'jug bya// rjes gnang thob nas phyi nang tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa lasani gzhon pa'o// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis ste dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi
176b5(rgyud): bka' las 'das pa gzhan ste de bzhin du ni spyan la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur// byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur ste gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las mi 'da'// grub mtha' smod pa
176b6(rgyud): drug pa yin ste gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri// phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur ste gzhan yang dgra pa'i chos lam dang dgu pa'o// rgyu yis byams pa phyogs ste ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba
176b7(rgyud): ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o// dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar gyur te dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan// bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa las gnas rnams kyis
176b8(rgyud): rgyal po klu rnams kyis sam bzhi la sogs nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am nos byung rin chen bcas// sman dang dri rnams ldan pa'i rgyal ba rnam rgyal bum pa rnams kyi gdan gyi dbus su khrus bya'o// klu yis nor gyi pad mI
177a1(rgyud): mdab mar dpal ldan dbu brgyan bcing dang bzhi yis dar sbyangs bcing ba'o// 'dir ni ri mo lnga rnams rnam par spangs pa'i pad ma bral bar dpal ldan phyag rgya bum gcig gis// dang por chu
177a2(rgyud): la sogs pas dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te gzhan yang bum pas dge tshul du ni 'gyur// gsang ba'i dbang gis dge slong du ni 'gyur te gong mas de ltar gnas brtan zhes byar 'gyur ba'o// dar spungs dbu brgyan dag
177a3(rgyud): dang mchog gi bla ma yis ni rdo rje yis ni phyag sa ma tod phyir thogs rnams sbyin// rang rigs rgyal ba'i dbang las rgyas gdab rnam par dag pa sbyin ste de rnams slob dpon nyid du'o// steng du bla re sbyin pa dang ste sa stengs gnas
177a4(rgyud): nyid du yang ri mo gsum ni kun nas so// de zur chu bcas nor bu rin chen gser gyi bum pa pad ma'i rgyan dang ldan pa la// dung sogs sam ni gser gyi snod dam yang na dul las byung bar dri chu ba rlug pa'i snod bzhag pas/ 
177a5(rgyud): snying por gsal bar nges par gser las byung ba'i stan bzhugs pa la khrus ni rtsam par bya ba ste// me tog la sogs dri dang 'bru mar rnams bsres nyi ma me tshogs drag las gdungs pas byug par bya// phyi ma rnams kyi
177a6(rgyud): dril bya sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma chu rnams kyis ni bkru bar bya// grub pa'i yungs dkar mar me rnams dang rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gi 'bras bu rnams kyis 'dir bsang bya// gnas de nas ni bsnod pa'i skul na
177a7(rgyud): bza' dmar po nyid kyis yang dag dgab par byas pa dang // dpal gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' rus mnyam gnas la rgyal ba'i cha rnams dbye bas ri mo lnga byas te// dbus su pad ma mdab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs
177a8(rgyud): su gyur pa mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan byas nas// de nyid dbus su lha 'am lha mo dag rnams zhal gyi pad ma nang du bltas par bzhug par bya// sku gdung sogs sam po ti bris sku zhes bya rnams dang de bzhin sngags pas
177b1(rgyud): zhal mtshungs byas pa dang // rgyal ba mchog gi ldan pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid byas nas// phyis ni sngar gsungs pa yi rnal 'byor ra dA so nyi hUM las skyes pa dus 'khor bsgom par bya/ 
177b2(rgyud): rig pa'i lha mo la sogs sangs rgyas rnams ni a li ke lo'i rang rang sa bon rigs las skyes// snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo bo spyi gtsug rnams kyi 'khor lo rigs dbang las ni bsgom par bya// de ltar nges paro// 
177b3(rgyud): rab tu bsgom par byas nas gzhan yang lha rnams ma lus rnams kyi sku rnams la// srid dang srid bral mtshungs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa yi lha rnams la// rang rang lus la dgug dang
177b4(rgyud): bcing pha dang ni mnyes pa bya dang ro mnyam nyid byas nas// de nas slob dpon nyid kyis rab tu gsal ba'i lha rnams zhal la phyag ni btsal bar byas pa dang // a sogs ga sogs sa bon gang zhig rang rigs yon tan
177b5(rgyud): gyur pa lnga dang lha mo nyid rnams kyi// snying dbus sa bon de yang ri bong can nyi la gnas pa dang sku gsung thugs ldan rnal 'byor bya// lus rnams ma lus la gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// pe byad rnams ni nam
177b6(rgyud): mkha' brgyad rnams te// yi ge rnams kyis po ta rnams kyi shog byang so sor brgyan pa rab tu gsol ba bsgom par bya// mchod rten nang du dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad ma ral gri rnams kyis mchod nyid bya// phreng ba'i
177b7(rgyud): rnog po rnams la hUM yig rnams ste grangs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams su brjod// dril bu'i lus su a sogs dbyangs bcu sum 'gyur rnams ste ka las sogs pa'i sde tshan rdo rje la// de ltar nges par lan bcu mchod
177b8(rgyud): phyir thogs pa la ni bcu la nor gyis bsgyur ba'i gsal byed rnams// ka sogs sde tshan phyi mor bcas pa mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni sus 'khyud dar sbyangs dag la bsgom ha~M hA/ dpal ldan rna brgyan gyis ste aM aHzhes bya/ 
178a1(rgyud): zung ni mgu lnga brgyan dang ni 'og pag la// de ltar a yi gzung ni lags nyid kyi 'gyur ba yin te rkang tha dag gi ha ha'o// lus nyid rnams la gnas pa'i thal ba rnams la stong pa'i rnam pa lnga ni bsgom
178a2(rgyud): par bya ba'o// rang rang lus la ye shes gsum bcas pa dang phung po khams la sogs pa thams cad du'o// lha rnams ma lus rang rang thugs kha'i pad ma rang rang sa bon rnams ni rim par dgod par ste// mi yi bdag
178a3(rgyud): po mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs la sogs rnams la sa bon bkod pa rab gnas yin// nye bar bsdus pa'i dus su lag par rdo rje rab gzung ba la sa bon gzhug par bya ba'o//  mo rnams dang ras ris la sogs rnams
178a4(rgyud): kyis dang po me long nyid du khrus tsam bya ba yin// phyi nas dri dang spros bzangs shin du dri zhim me tog rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya ba dang // glu dang rnga gar rnams dang sna tshogs mchog gi lhab lbu ba dang ni rnga yab
178a5(rgyud): gdugs rnams kyis kyang ngo // de ltar rab gnas byas nas sna tshogs ro mchog rnams kyis dge 'dun rnams la chos ston rab tu bya/ khron pa chu mig rdzing bu rnams kyi phyogs 'tshams rnams su klu'i rgyal po nor
178a6(rgyud): rnams dgod pa dang // dbus su chu lha dkar po lag na zhags thogs bsgoms te sbyin bsreg byas nas mthar ni khron gsogs su// rgya mtsho mdun gyi rang rang sa bon brjod cing sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i rnam lnga blugs par bya/ 
178a7(rgyud): bskyed mos tshal du shing cig dbang bskur nas ni mtha' dag shin du gyur pa'i dpog bsdam shing du'o// dbu brgyan dar sbyangs dang ni do shal lags kyang ste de bzhin rna brgyan 'og phag la sogs pa/ mi yi bdag po slob
178a8(rgyud): dpon ched du yin ste rang gi nus pas nor rnams kyang ni dbul bar bya// mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don gnyer ba'i yon tan bdag pos nges par bsod nams don ched du/ bsod nams 'di yis sems ca/ 
178b1(rgyud): srid gsum gyur pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par shog/ phyogs kyi lon gcig nas rnam pa bcu'i bar du blta dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste/ de nas mkhyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par
178b2(rgyud): bya ba g.yo ba la sogs pa// nyi shu lo'i 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung po lha min rigs// dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras steng ba dang gzhan ni sgom pa'i don du'o// 
178b3(rgyud): gang zhig dang por yang na dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod// ri bong 'dzin pa mya ngan gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur ba'o// mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan
178b4(rgyud): lag kha rnams sbyangs par bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya// rgyal ba dbang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir/ rnam pa thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i
178b5(rgyud): lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes// thams cad shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bu spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la// slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid
178b6(rgyud): phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs lngar yang // skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g.yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang // khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la tshags
178b7(rgyud): dang rtso dngapa dag yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa// de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin du 'da' ste bla mas spang bya mi dbang po// sngar gsung sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig can la phyag 'tshal ba dang mtsho
178b8(rgyud): bar bya 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyi ni 'khrug pa byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid/ yan lag mchog la lag pa las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid/ oMT dgug par byas
179a1(rgyud): pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar// snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams ste dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs pa yis de ltar ro// dang po yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis
179a2(rgyud): bltas pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste// phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pas mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o// 'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni padamar thig le 'dzag pa khyad
179a3(rgyud): par dga' ba'o// oM Ta rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o// 'dod dang dga' dang g.yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig/ gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba
179a4(rgyud): nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o// 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o// o Ta dang ni sgra tsam nyid ste go nyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'o ba
179a5(rgyud): nyid rnams bzhi pa'o// sems kyis bsamu par bya ba ma ste reg par bya zhing mkhyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje rab tu zhugs par bu mor brjod ste byed bcas shin du badre bar de bzhin tsha ma'o// thig le lhung
179a6(rgyud): bya chung mar 'gyur te tshogs bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do// de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos// chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab tu zhugs dang mer
179a7(rgyud): ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste// de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o// chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyar bas go/ 
179a8(rgyud): cha bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya rnams las yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o// shes rab yum dang srid gsum bskyed mdzad mchog gi yum ste spyan ma la sogs rnams ni sring mo'o// rdo rje/ 
179b1(rgyud): ma drug sring mo'i bu mo skye bo'i phyugs 'joms tsar tsi ka sogs bu mo'i bu mo'o// dus rnams kun du 'khor lo la gnas rnal 'byor rnams kyi rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas bsten par bya/ zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod dang
179b2(rgyud): ni skye bo bcas dang skye bo bral bar rgyun du dor mi bya/ dpal ldan rdo rje can dang dpal ldan bskyed byeng srid gsum rnams kyi yab ste sangs rgyas rnams ni spun// mig la sogs pa spun zla'i bu ste rnam pa mang po gzhan na bu
179b3(rgyud): dang bu mo'i bu// 'khor lo la gnas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ni rang rigs sar gnas bsten par bya ba gnyis pa'o// zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod dang ni skye bo bral bar nam yang spang bar bya// bud med gang gis bsod
179b4(rgyud): nams rgyur ni rnam gsum dag pas rdo rje'i mchod pa sbyin par bya ba ni// slob dpon la ni zla ba'i zhal dang ud pa la spyan ldan dri bzangs rnams kyis rjes su byugs phul ba'i bsod nams gang zhig sa gzhi glang chen rta dang
179b5(rgyud): shing rta bu mo du ma rab tu byin dang mtshungs// de'i bsod nams de ni nam mkha' la ni nyi ma zla ba gnas kyi bar du yin te mi dbang kye// sgrol ma dmangs rigs rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te sa yaM steng du gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs so/ 
179b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan ni rje rigs rnam pa gsum ste mA ma ki nyid gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes bdun// sgra rdo rje ma gar mkhan ma ste nges par ro rdo rje ma chang 'tshong mar brjod gzugs rdo rje/ nges par gser mgrar ma ru yang
179b7(rgyud): dag 'gyur te ma'i bdag po rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin ma rnams// phreng phyed ma ru ra bo grubo rang bzhin yon tan dbang la reb bya rdo rje ma nyid tha ga ma// mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma ni nor bu byed mar 'jig rten pa la rab tu grub/ 
179b8(rgyud): tsa mun da ma sha 'tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang las khyab 'jug mo na rdza mkhan me// phag mo khur mkhan ma ru nges 'gyur gdong drug ma nyid smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshim bu ma// tshangs ma nya ba mo ni yin/ 
180a1(rgyud): @6/ tes stengs granas su drag mo gar ma/ khan ma ru 'gyur ba'o// bkra shis ma ni chos mkhan ma ru 'gyur te zla ba nya ba'i zhal ldan brgyad po 'byung po skyes// rmugs byed ma nyid rgyu skyegs byed ma yin ste rengs byed
180a2(rgyud): ma ni srin pa la mkhan mo mi bdag kyi// nga rgyal ma ni/ mkhan ma ste shin du stobs can ma nyid lugs mgar ma ste zhi rnams so// 'od zer can mgo la lpags can du 'gyur ste de bzhin khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma ru
180a3(rgyud): brjod/ dpal gyi btsun dang 'dreg mkhan ma ste sa stengs gnas su lcags sgrog ma ni smig mkhan ma ru 'gyur// rdo rje spyan ni khron pa mkhan mo yin ste bcu pa shin du sngon mo smug thogs gar mkhan ma// khro bo las skyes khro
180a4(rgyud): bo'i yan lag bud med bcu rnams nges par rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// dpal ldan khyi gdong pa nyid kla klo mar 'gyur phyag dar ma 'o ma bdag kye// lce spyang gdong ma rdol lo stes stengs gnas su stag gdong ma ni sgrub
180a5(rgyud): gzig ma'o// bya rog gdong ma mtha' 'khob ma ste nges par rabA tra gsal bar bya rgod gdong ma spros ma'o// dpal ldan bya khyung gdong ma mi rgod mar 'gyur 'ug gdong ri khrod ma ste 'di brgyad rab tum mo// rigs ni sum bcu
180a6(rgyud): rtsa drug dbye bas sa stengs gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni rigs rnams ste// gnas dang zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang yul dang grong khyer mchog dang dpal ldan gnas rnams kyis// rmongs pa rnams ni 'ching shing rab
180a7(rgyud): mchog sA yi steng du rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub ster mdzad rnams// bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang nor bu btsas rnams so so rang rang rim pas so// sangs rgyas dbye ba bzhi ste gzhan yang nges pa
180a8(rgyud): 'tshams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbye ba'o// khro bo rnams kyi dbye ba phyogs ste sa stengs gnas su yi dgas rnams kyi dbye ba de bzhin brgyad// lha min rnams kyi dbye ba brgyad te gdengs ka'i gnas su
180b1(rgyud): gyur par rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// sna tshogs yum ni gcig pus srid gsum gnas su dpal gyi rigs nyid rnams la khyab par byed pa'o// sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad ste phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
180b2(rgyud): gnas la khro mo'i rigs rnams so// yi dgas 'jig rten du ni yi dgas brgyad bstan lha mchog gnas su sgra rdo rje ma la sogs drug/ tshungs pa'i gnas su dpal ldan bzhi ste zhi ba'i grong khyer mchog nyid du yang
180b3(rgyud): khams gsum yum gcig ma// rab tu khros pa'i gdong gis sna tshogs sdud par 'gyur ste dges pa yis ni skyong bar 'gyur ba'o// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dmangs rigs mthar skyes ma rnams bu mo 'am ni 'ang
180b4(rgyud): chom// rgan mo rnams kyi lus la dri ma dang ldan mig lag mchu dang ni bA sna rnams chad pa yang // slob dpon rnams kyi byang chub rgyuraru thugs ni snying rjes mchog dang bcas pa'i thabs dang shes rab ldan// sdig pa rnam
180b5(rgyud): par bral zhing byang chub spyod pa lnga gnas rnams kyis ma lus sten ni mi bdag kye// dang por bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing dpal ldan skyes pa phyag rgya bzang po dam tshig brjod// rol pa'i yan lag las kyi
180b6(rgyud): phyag rgya yin te dbang po gnyis nyid bde mnyam chos kyi phyag rgya'o// pho nya mo rnams kyi ni lus dang pad ma dri lnga rnams su 'gyur zhing de rnams rigs ldor brjod// zla ba dang ni pad ma'i dri chu nya dang gnag gi dri rnams rang bzhin
180b7(rgyud): dbang las te// dpal ldan bzang mor pad ma can dag des yin chu spyod ma dang ri mo can ma glang chen mo// dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar mo dang mA ma ki dang spyan ma rnams ni rigs kyi dbang las 'gyur// rnal 'byor
180b8(rgyud): pa na seng gi ri dgas rta dang khyu mchog glang po che yi rigs rnams dbye ba yis// mi bskyod pa dang don 'grub dang ni nor bu'i phyag dang pad ma 'khor lo can rnams so// lus po 'phra la sgra rnams srab dang rkang lag 'jam dang
181a1(rgyud): @#/ brtse ldan dpal ldan shin du bzang mo'o// cung zad lus po 'phral ring zhing sgra rnams 'khyil dang mig mi g.yo ba pad ma can nyid do// ngo tsha med cing 'dod chags drag la brtsod pa mang po byed cing sgra rnams nyung ba dung
181a2(rgyud): can ma/ bong rings yan lag thams cad rgyaso la skra rings 'dod chags chung rnams nges par re mo can du brjod// lus po sbom la thung zhing 'khregs te shin du yul yang skra rnams 'thag pa glang po ma ru nges// pho nya mo rnams
181a3(rgyud): dag pa'i rigs ni brgya las na ste rigs rnams thams cad 'dir ni 'dres par 'gyur// seng ge yul dang bral zhing dben pa la gnas 'jigs pa med cing gtong 'dod pa dang tshul khrims ldan// ri dgas myur du 'gro
181a4(rgyud): dang 'dzag dang yul yang ba dang skrag pa'i sems dang shin du 'jigs pa'o// rta ni nges par 'dod la chags shing gzhan gyi dbang phyug 'gyur gcig gi ste pha rol don du gnyer// mig mi g.yo dang dal bar 'gro dang rang
181a5(rgyud): bzhin yon tan blun pa nya yi dri ldan khyu mchog 'gyur// 'dod pa can dang dal bzo 'gyur gnag gi dri dang shin du rmongs rnams nges par glang chen bsgrags// sa stengs gnas su sum bcu rtsa drug dbye ba tha dad pa ni
181a6(rgyud): rigs dang dra yi rang bzhin no// mchod pa'i dron du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan kun gyi gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// shin du bde bas dgos pa med na rnal 'byor ma yis dngos grub ster mi 'gyur// bzang
181a7(rgyud): mo lha mo dag dang sha za mo ru 'gyur te ma mi sran mo dag dang klu mo rnams// bzang mo dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang las lha mo sgra rdo rje mar 'gyur// sha za mo na dri yi rdo rje mar 'gyur mi mo
181a8(rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rje ma'o ma bdag kye// ma rungs srin mo gang zhig de nyid rdo rje ma ste klu mo reg bya rdo rje ma'o// bzang mo sems can kun la phan byed brtul zhugs la dga' bsam gtan tshul khrims dag la spyod pa'o// 
181b1(rgyud): lha mo longs spyod rnams la rjes su chags 'gyur sha za mo nyid dri ma lhag ma rnams la chags// mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags shing mi yi khrag la dga' ste srin mo gsod pa'i sems ldan no// klu mo 'o ma'i zas la
181b2(rgyud): dga' ste de rnams rab mchog sa steng rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// de ltar 'dres pa gzhan yang rang bzhin yon tan dbang la rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya ba ste// sa stengs gnas su mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma rnam
181b3(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa drug dbye ba tha dad do// chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi bcas dang bu ram skyes dang 'bras las skyes dang ljon shing skyes// phyag rgya bral zhing gang zhig 'thung byed 'gyur ba de ni yul can bdud kyi tshogs kyis
181b4(rgyud): bskor ba ste// de phyir shes rab ldan na sdig pa'i dri ma shin du 'phrog byed sngags pa rnams la dngos grub ster// gang zhig gal te dam tshig bral na 'dir ni phyag rgya ma nyid btung ba'i don du bsten par bya// 'chi ba'i 'jigs
181b5(rgyud): pa 'joms pa ri bong 'dzin pa cig pu rgyun ma chad par bsten bya rgyal po kye// shes rab chos 'byung la nyi byed dang bcas pa bsten pas kyang ni rnal 'byor ldan pas smos ci dgos// mi bskyed pa dang don grub rgyal mchog ldan/ 
181b6(rgyud): khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang nga po che dang bcas// gzhan yang brgyad pa drag po rnams kyis nyon mongs rnams la rdo rje dbyug pas phyugs kyis skye bo 'joms// khyi rta ba lang glang chen lug dang raM dang sha ba bong bu phag dang rnga mo rnams
181b7(rgyud): ni phyogs// kum pa ri dang srin bu ka ka ri dang nya zhes pa dang chu srin sbal pa ru sbal du// bse dang phag dang dred dang ne la bcas dang 'bri ste lho spyang sbram dang byi la rnams dang ni// dgon pa'i khyi dang seng ge bcas pa 'di dag
181b8(rgyud): rnams ni 'byung skyes nor dang khro bo las skyes bcu// go d+ha byi ba sa la dzi ta spre'u ri bong gzungs mo i shu ka dang rtsangs pa brgyad// nga rgyal bya dang ne tse khu byug ri skyegs rnams ni rab tu gsal bar chu gter zhes su brjod// bya
182a1(rgyud): bang dang ni phug ron gzhan yang bya dkar mchil pa dag dang dur pa dang pa rnams// dpal ldan krung klung khu byug mig dang ra tsaka drang ba ga brag ti dang ni bsreg pa gzhad// so bya dang ni chu skyar dang bcas nor
182a2(rgyud): zhes bstan pa rim pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba'o// bya rog bya rgod dang nai 'ug pa ri dgas dgra dang rma bya khyim bya b+he dra g+ha ga ra// hor ba ljon shing dag gi dgra mchog rab tu yin te bcu rnams khro bo las ni khro ba'i rigs
182a3(rgyud): mig sngon dang ni dpal kyi tsa ko ra dang go bo kr-i ta mu khyi bu gi rkang steng nyal// b+hi ru NaT dang aM pa ri ka ra btsos pa bya bzangs brgyad du 'gyur te ma yi bdag po kye// rigs kyi dbye ba sum bcu rtsa drag rnams
182a4(rgyud): kyis su stengs gnas su gyur par sa spyod mkha' spyod rnams// mchod pa'i dus su rigs rnams la gnas dam tshig mtha' dag rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni bza' bar bya// gal te rmongs pas gti mug
182a5(rgyud): stobs kyis spangs na myur du 'jig par 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// so dang sgra dang lpags pa shar bcas pa dang rus pa grod pa pad ma rnams dang ni// shig dang ba spu srin bu rnams dang glo ba rgyu ma rdzi ma
182a6(rgyud): rnams so mi yi bdag po kye// bad kan 'khris pa mchin pa gnag ste sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul drang tshul rnams dang // kha spu 'chil ma snams dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang dri chen rnams dang kha
182a7(rgyud): drog dri rnams kyis// lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can dang nyin byed rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya// yi ge sum bcu rtsa drug rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang las byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams
182a8(rgyud): ste/ sum bcu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyis lus kun la gnas rigs nyid mtshan ma phyag rgya rnams// sum bcu rtsa drug rgyud rnams sa stongs gnas su 'di ni nges par rnal 'byor pa rnams mchod par
182b1(rgyud): bya/ chu dang yon chab dri dang bdug spos me tog 'bras bu rnams dang ma nyams mar me dag dang ni// lha bshos dang ni gos rnams rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba 'dir ni 'khor lo'i 'dus pa 'di nyid la'o// khu ba dri chu dag
182b2(rgyud): dang rkang mar dri chen shi dang mtshor pa 'khris pa dang ni khrag rnams dang // rgyu ma dang ni lpags pa rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis 'khor lo 'dus par yin no rgyal po kye// rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad ma mdab brgyad
182b3(rgyud): 'khor lo rnams dang mtshan ma lnga rnams so// pi wang me long bar bu me tog phreng ba gos nyid rnams su 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// drug pa chos 'byung nges par yin te lag 'thil sogs pa sgra rdo rje ma la sogs
182b4(rgyud): mtshan ma'o// de ltar gri gug las sogs pa yang de bzhin bum pa spros gang gos glasar nyid rnams dang // dung ngam tho ba dag dang nges par nya yi rgya dang mdung rtse gsum par gyur pa dang // bkra shis ma yi nges par rdo ru
182b5(rgyud): 'gyur te mtshan ma brgyad po las skyes mi yi bdag po kye// rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyi mar po nyi phyed dang mtshungs nyid dang dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang // mtshon cha dang ni cag lham spu gri dang ste de bzhin gzhan yang shing
182b6(rgyud): lham gdugs dkar dang // tog rtse smyug ma'i dbyug pa rnams ni khro bo las skyes rang gi mtshan ma bcu por rab tu 'gyur// ba lang ra dang kham por dang ni thigs su 'gyur te lag pa'i 'thil du 'phang dang sha mdung dang / 
182b7(rgyud): pi wang lta bu nyid dang mdangs gyur pa dang rma bya'i gzhug ma dang ni 'di rnams brgyad du 'dod// sum bcu rtsa drug rnams ni mtshan ma'i dbye ba sa mchog steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya// slar yang dmangs
182b8(rgyud): rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang las ud pa la'amathong ba'o// rgyal rigs ma ni rin chen nyid dam ras 'gyur mi'i bdag smyug gu'am ni rin chen phreng // rje rigs ma'am de bzhin du ste chu la rgyu ba
183a1(rgyud): 'am ni zangs ma'i pa ru skye gnyis ma'i// yum gyi mtshan ma bzhi ste Da mu ru'am ngaT+Ta ha dang dbu brgyan nyid dam phreng ba'o// gshang dang lci dang khrag dang shar bcas pa rnams lha mo rnams kyi
183a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur ba'o// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang gshang lam bA ga rnams ni sgra rdo rje ma la sogs drug/ gnag dang bad kani shig dang srin bu dang ni chu ser zhag dang ba spu skra rnams la yang brgyad// lus la
183a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i sna tshogs sgyu ma 'khris pa dang ni rus pa rkang mar mtshan pa dang ni glo ba dang // rtsa dang lpags pa mkhal ma rnams dang tshil bu dang bcas bcu ru 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang
183a4(rgyud): kha dang gshang lam bA gi rnams dang gnas pa dri ma dang // mchan khung yan lag la sogs brgyad ni lha ma yin ma brgyad du 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// sen mo so dang thod pa'i dum bu bcu gnyis rnams ni rnal
183a5(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur// gshang dang lci dang khrag dang sha rnams kun gyi lus la gnas pas gnas kyi dbye bas rnam pa bzhi// rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang gshing lam bA ga rnams ni zhing gi
183a6(rgyud): dbye ba rnam pa drug/ rnag la sogs pa skra'i bar gyis so'i stengs su gyur par bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam pa brgyad// rgyu ma la sogs tshil bu'i bar gyis 'dus pa'i dbye bas phyogs zhes bya'o ma yi bdag po kye/ 
183a7(rgyud): rna ba la sogs lus kyi yan lag brgyad kyi dri mi sna tshogs nges par dur khrod dbye ba brgyad// dus kyi ma dang zla nyi sgra gcan rab tu gsal bar nges par gnas kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// sa skyes zla ba'i bu dang pa
183a8(rgyud): wa sangs dang spen pa gdengs ka zhing gi dbye ba drug/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang nas skyes me skyes rlung las skyes pa rnams// bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam pa brgyad te gzhan yang de bzhin ro drug dang ni dri dang kha
183b1(rgyud): dog dang // reg bya sgra rnams de bzhin rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa'i dbye bras rnam pa bcu ru gyur pa'o// nub dang byang dang lho dang shar phyogs rnams su sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams zad pa dang // dri la sogs pa
183b2(rgyud): bzhi rnams 'tshams su zad pa rnams kyis dur khrod dbye ba rnam pa brgyad rnams so// gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs gnas pa nyid te gsal bar sgra rdo rje sogs de bzhin zhing du gsungs// 'dun pa tsa ra tsi ka la sogs
183b3(rgyud): par 'gyur te 'dus pa rmugs byed ma sogs mi bdag kye// khyi gdong la sogs mchog tu gyur pa rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang ba'i gnas bcas pa yi dur khrod ni// yum gyi gnas sa rnam pa gnyis nyid rab tu gsal bar
183b4(rgyud): sa la mtha' skyes dang ni mtha' skyes so// gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad ma rab tu yin te dam tshig 'dus par rdo rje nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa dur khrod rnams dang de bzhin kho nar ma lus pa
183b5(rgyud): rnams kyi// gnas ni lus kyi yan lag g.yon dang mdun ste de bzhin rgyab dang g.yas dag nye ba'i gnas nyid do// de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang par 'gyur ba'i sor mo'i 'tshams su thug pa'o// lha mo
183b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'gyur ba dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags pa'o// shes rab yum dang de bzhin gzhan yang sgra rdo rje la sogs ma drug rnams byang chub yan lag go// rgya mtsho yang dag slong ba rnams dang gzhan
183b7(rgyud): yang rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi ste brgyad du 'gyur// khro mo rnams ni stobs nyid lnga dang gzhan yang dbang po lnga rnams nyid du nges par rab tu brjod// lha min las skyes brgyad kyis rigs rnams yang dag lam du gyur pa'i
183b8(rgyud): yan lag brgyad do mi bdag kye// srid gsum gnas su sum bcu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye ba rnams kyi byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis// rnal 'byor ma rnams ma lus de bzhin sa stengs gnas su gyur par rnal 'byor pa yi/
