184a1(rgyud): rig par bya// de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad phyi dang lus la de bzhin 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// sangs rgyas pa 'am zhi ba gcer bu btsag bcos gos can rnams sam zhus byed pa'am
184a2(rgyud): bram ze 'am// thod pa can dang skra brags gyur pa nyid dang gros dkar can dang zhing skyong rig pa can rnams sam// mi smra ba dang smyon pa'i gzugs sam sdig pa spangs pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni slob pa yis// 
184a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor dngos grub don du yon tan ma lus gter 'gyur de nyid thob pa'i bar du mi dbod kye// mthe bong dang ni 'dzub mo dag dang de bzhin gzhan yang gung mo dang ste slar yang srin lag dang // de yi mtha' ru nges par mthe chung
184a4(rgyud): yon tan ma lus gter ldan rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// ming gis dbye bar 'gyur ba phyag rgya'i don du yon tan dbang las sor mo rnams ni rim pa yis// bcing ba gsungs pa rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te de bzhin
184a5(rgyud): slar yang nges par khu tshur bcing ba'o// rdo rje dkyil dkrung la gnas brla stengs khu tshur gzhag pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag g.yon dkyil dkrung la gzhag nas ni g.yas pa bu mo'i phyogs su gan
184a6(rgyud): nas sa la reg 'gyur ba// mi bskyod phyag rgya nyid dang gzhan yang mchog sbyin phyag rgyas la reg pa rin chen phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa'i phyag nyid gan rgyal mnyam gzhag gyur pa pad ma'i phyog rgya rab tu
184a7(rgyud): brjod/ dkyil dkrung steng du phyag g.yon gan rgyal gzhag nas slar yang gzhan nyid mi 'jigs ral gri phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs par gzhan yang g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa'i 'dzub mo ngar par bcug
184a8(rgyud): pa ni/ gsal bar snying khar bzung bar snang mdzad phyag rgyar 'gyur te gzhan yang 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbar ba lag gdub bzhin du gnas nas gung mo la sogs rab tu brkyang // lag pa
184b1(rgyud): g.yon pa dri med ri bong 'dzin pa gang ba slar yang g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste// nyi ma zla ba kha sbyar la gnas 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo las skyes rdo rje rtse lnga pa// bsams ste cod pan dang bcas mgo bo nas brtsams
184b2(rgyud): rkang pa'i mtha' ru yan lag kun la reg par bya// mi yi bdag po dpal ldan phyag rgya bzang po sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms byed dus kyi 'khor lo 'od ri// gang zhig cung zad gzung ba'i dngos pos chu skyes mngal skyes drod
184b3(rgyud): gsher skyes las sogs pa dang // bza' ba dang ni btung ba sa bon bcas pa rnams dang bla ma'i zhabs la phyag rgya reg par bya// bya ba gang dang gang dngos rnams kyi yon tan dbang las de la de yos rab tu sbyang bar bya// 
184b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor don du rkang pas sa las sogs pa bcag pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis reg par bya// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings par gyur pa khro bo'i mgron po'i chen po'i phyag rgyar nges par 'gyur// 'dzub mo dag
184b5(rgyud): dang mtha' dang khu tshur rnams bcings gtso bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ba'o// lha dang lha mo lhag ma rnams ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa bzhin du nges par rab tu gsol bar brjod// lag pa dag gis rdo rje
184b6(rgyud): rab tu bcings te gdangs ka'i rnam par bskyod pa klu rnams phyag rgyar 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang mthe chung dag sbyar ba dang gung mo gnyis po pad ma'i mdab ltar steng brkyang nas// 'dzub mo dag ni steng du phyed 'gyogs
184b7(rgyud): pa dang ming med rang gi lag 'thil nang du dgug par bya// 'di ni rdo rje rtse lnga po'i phyag rgyar rab tu 'gyur te rdo rje can gyis bstan par bya// lag pa gnyis ka mthe sogs sor mo ma lus rnams ni rtsibs kyi rnam par 'thil
184b8(rgyud): du bya/ lag gnyis dag ni rdo rje bcings pa'i khu tshur rdo rje rdo rje dril bur bcas por 'gyur ba'o// khu tshur phyed bcas 'dzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs par ral gri rnon por 'gyur ba'o// gzhan yang khu tshur phyed/ 
185a1(rgyud): bcas 'dzub mo la sogs rtse mo gsum du bkram pa yis ni rtse gsum mo// dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings te mthe chung zla ba phyed pa dpal ldan 'jigs byed 'gyur ba'o// rna ba'i steng du khu
185a2(rgyud): tshur bcings te mthe bong gung mo'i steng bzhag 'dzub me shin du dgug gyur pa// mda' mchog 'gyur te de bzhin khu tshur bcings pa lcags kyur rab tu 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// 'dzub mo sran lag mthe chung rtsa ba
185a3(rgyud): mnan te gung mo steng du mda' dang mtshungs pa mdung du 'gyur// khu tshur brkyang ba dbyug pa la ste lag 'thil shin du mnyam byas mthe bong brkyang pa dgra sta'o// steng du khu tshur gnyis bcas 'dzub mos lha ma yin gyi
185a4(rgyud): bdag po'i glang po'i lpags pa 'dzin par 'gyur// lag pa gnyis ka'i 'thil du khu tshur bcings te mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'di ni mche ba'o// lag pa g.yon steng du rab tu brkyang nas lag 'thil phyogs pa phub kyi phyag
185a5(rgyud): rgyar 'gyur ba dang // khu tshur bug pa byas te mthe chung phrag pa'i steng du brkyang ba kha T+wAM kha ru nges par 'gyur// lag pa'i sor mo rnams ni bkram pa pad ma'i mdab ma bzhin byas steng phyogs dpal ldan thod pa'o// lag
185a6(rgyud): pa'i khu tshur gan rgyal rnam par brkyang pa gzhur 'gyur te nges par lag pa g.yon pa yi// khu tshur steng du 'dzub mo bkug pas gung mo nges par rab tu mnan pa rdo rje zhags par 'gyur// sor mo rnams ni bsdus pa rin
185a7(rgyud): po che ru 'gyur te bkram pa pad ma dag go mi bdag kye// 'dzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar te mthe bong 'og nas khu tshur byas pa chun rgyu bar 'gyur// lag mthil sor mo bug pa med dang bcas pa shin du mnyam par
185a8(rgyud): mdun du phyogs pa me long ngo // mthe bong la ni 'dzub mo la sogs steng du rim pas yongs su bkug par byas pa lug sgrog go// mtho bong las sogs bzhi po gdong mnyam bsdus la mthe chung 'og tu bskum pa tshangs ni
185b1(rgyud): mgo bor 'gyur// lag pa dag gi dung gi phyag rgya'i steng du 'dzub mo dag sbyar dbu brgyan nyid du 'gyur ba'o// slar yang sor mo lnga rnams lag 'thil sbyar ba'i rgyab nyid sprad par gyur pa rna brgyan rnam pa'o// lag pa
185b2(rgyud): rgyab tu sbyar nas sor mo ma lus rim pas yongs su bcings par byas po mgul brgyan no// lag gnyis sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbar te dang po tho na skum par byas bya ske rags 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang gung mo
185b3(rgyud): gnyis ni rkang gdub bzhin byas gzhan ma khu tshur bcings pa rkang gdub dag/ de bzhin du ni 'theb 'dzub dag sbyar dpung brgyan nam ni gzhan yang lag gdub nyid du 'gyur ba'o// mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi
185b4(rgyud): ni rigs kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing 'dzub mo gsang ba rnams kyi// dri za rnams dang gdengs ka rnams kyi gung mo srin lag dag ni rim pas yongs su bstan par byas// 'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe chung nyid te
185b5(rgyud): srin po'i rigs kyi rab mchog lag pa'i 'thil du 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi rigs kyi mchog gi khu tshur bcings par 'gyur te lha min rnams kyi tshogs kyi 'tshams// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo lnga rnams lag
185b6(rgyud): 'thil bkug pa sder mo can rnams rigs kyi phyag rgya'o// khu tshur bcings ste 'dzub gnyis steng du phyed bkug nges par spyi bor phyogs par can rnam kyir 'gyur// mtho chung phan tshun bcings te lag pa'i 'thil
185b7(rgyud): las gzhan pa sbyar ba'i gshog pa sgong skyes rnams kyi'o// sor mo lnga rnams rtse mo bkug pa gdengs ka khyad par 'phags pa rnams kyi rig kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur// 'dzub mo dag mkhyud gzhan rnams rab tu brkyang
185b8(rgyud): nas mthe bong sbyor ba mchog ste so so yi// nyin mtshan rnams la sbyar te de ltar gzhan pas lag pa dag gi 'dzub mo sbyar te brkyang ba'o// 'dzub mo mthe bong nges par ston par 'gyur na rnal 'byor legs par 'ongs
186a1(rgyud): sam zhes ni brjod pa'o// gnyis kyis shin du legs par 'ongs par brjod ste mthe bong bcings pas mchog gi skal pa bzang mos brjod// 'dzub mo se gol brdabs pas khyod ni 'di ru mcho
186a2(rgyud): gri sngags pa nyid du nges par bstan pa'o// mthe bong dang ni srin lag dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim byar mtshon pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yis sor mo thams cad brkyang na skal pa bzang la
186a3(rgyud): legs par 'ongs par smra ba'o// yan lag g.yon la rig pa yis ni khyod ni bdag gi rtag tu gnyen nyid gcig tu brjod pa ste// skye gnas nyid la reg par dang ni mchu dang nu ma zung la sen mo 'debs na khyo ru brjod/ 
186a4(rgyud): sen mo phan tshun bcings nas dbu ma dang ni mthe bong brkyang bas dam tshig 'dus par bstan pa'o// mchu dang smin ma dang ni mig rnams yon por byed dang mgo la phrugs pas shin du rmongs pas brjod// mche ba'i
186a5(rgyud): bar du mthe chung bcug kyang 'dzub mo snying kha dang ni kha ru ston pas 'joms par byed// mthe bong khu tshur nang bcings lag pa dang ni rkang pa sa la rdobs pa bza'o zhes pa'o// lce la reg pas zos sam nyid ste
186a6(rgyud): gsus pa dang ni se la rdebs par byed na zos par brjod// lag pa'i rgyab gyis song cig par ni nges par smra ste mdun gyis brtan par sdod cig pa ru brjod// skal pa bzang mos pus mo dang ni brla la nyid na gan
186a7(rgyud): 'dir ngal so zhes su bstan pa'o// rkang pa rkyong ba nyol cig pa ste pus zung rkyong pas bdag la bde ba gyis shog pa ru smra// lag pa g.yon pas lus po kun la reg dang kha bgegs byed na bdag la 'du nus med
186a8(rgyud): par ston/ lag pa phan tshun bcings na de ring bdag gi khyim du 'khor lo rob tu 'dus par smra ba'o// mthe bong srin lag rtse sprad pa las sna tshogs dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod bzhin tshim par byas/ 
186b1(rgyud): rkang pa 'khrug par byed na phyi rol 'khor lo 'dus par 'gro bar de bzhin 'gro bar zhu ba'o// 'dzub mo phan tshun bcings pa nyid kyis 'dir ni di ring rdo rje spun khyod 'jigs pa bral bar bstan// rang gi so yis sgra
186b2(rgyud): la gcod par byed na mi yi phyogs khyod 'dir ni gsod par smras pa'o// so dag phan tshun 'cha' bar gyur na khyod kyi sha 'di de ring nga yis bza' zhes pa ru brjod// lce yis mchu ni 'dril bar byed na nges par khyod
186b3(rgyud): kyi lus por khrag rnams btung zhes smra ba'o// so yis ma mchu sdom na khyod kyi lto ba la gnas rgyu ma 'di nyid bza' bar ston pa'o// sgeg mo'i sbyor bas sgeg mor 'gyur te bzhong ma'i sbyor bas bzhed ma nyid do ma yi
186b4(rgyud): bdag po kye// gar ma'i sbyor bas gar mar 'gyur te sna tshogs skye yi rol mo'i sbyor bas sgra yi ril mo ma lnga'o// glu ma'i sbyor bas glu ma lA sde sna tshogs yon tan rnams kyis dri mchog sbyor bas dri ma la// phreng ba ni sbyor
186b5(rgyud): bas phreng ba mar 'gyur yon tan dbang las spos ma la// mar me'i rnam pas nges par mun 'joms ma la yin te bor bu'i sbyor bas bdud rtsir 'gyur// de ltar phyag rgya ma lus rnams ste de yang rnam par lnga'i dbye ba rnams/ 
186b6(rgyud): kyis tha dad do// gzhan yang lus 'gyur ma lus rnams la phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa yi sku rig bya ba// so yi steng gi dngos po gang dang gang gi rang bzhin gyur pa phyag rgya'i rang bzhin nyid du'o// pho nya mo na
186b7(rgyud): zur gyis ldan skal ldan ma khyod nyid gang nas 'ongs zhes brjod par 'gyur ba'o// rnal 'byor pa yis lag g.yon mgo bor gzhag nas de phyogs lta bar 'gyur na lan nyid smras par nges// steng du blta bas khyod ni bde ba
186b8(rgyud): 'am brjod te sa la blta bar 'gyur na 'dug la ngal so bstan// sdang mig lta bas song tsog pa ste pho nya mo nyid chags pa'i lta bas bde ba gyis shig go/ zhi bas lta na bdag gi grogs por brjod de khro gnyer bsdus nas
187a1(rgyud): // khros ste lto na 'jigs par ston// sgra la lta na bdag ni ma rungs pa ru ston te rang gi rang bzhin skal bzang mo yis smra// mdzod spu ltan mchog ste rnal 'byor ma yis sna la blta na yon tam du bstan// mchul
187a2(rgyud): lta na skal ba bzang mor smra ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang // snying khar lhan bdag gis bsgoms par smra ste phyag rgya zung ltan bdag ni rab tu gtum mor smra// phrag pa lta na bdag ni stobs ldan brjod de
187a3(rgyud): sen mo dang bcas lag 'brel ltan srin mor ston// rgyab tu lta na bdag ni brang 'gro ma ste lte bar lhan dam tshig can no ma bdag kye// gsang par ltan bdag ni dag pad+ma ste blo la ltan chags las rgyal bar dka' bar ston/ 
187a4(rgyud): pus mo lta na bdag ni grub thob mar brjod rkaHlta na nges par rdzu 'phrul ster ma ste// rkang pa'i mthe bong ltan bdag ni srid gsum la gnas rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo gcig mar stan// sor ma'i rtse mo thams cad ltan bdag ni srid
187a5(rgyud): gsum gnas rnams kun du 'gro ba'i sna tshogs yum// rnal 'byor pa yis pho nya rnams kyi lta bstangs nyid kyi rang bzhin sa stengs gnas su rig par bya// lus la gnas pa'i lag pa dang ni rkang pa lus nyid rnams
187a6(rgyud): dang drug cha dbul ba yan lag mchog/ lus kyi dbang po rnams la ngag ste gzhan yang dbang po rnams kyi nang nas yon tan bcas pa'i yid// khams kyi nang nas khams kyi cha ste bran dang phyugs rnams de yi cha
187a7(rgyud): yis 'gyur ro gzhan dag kyang // phyag rgya bzang mo slob dpon ched du rab tu phul bas bde ba'i gnas su rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur// srid pa rnam gsum la gnas 'jig rten khams kyi sems can gang zhig ye
187a8(rgyud): shes rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis// de rnams ma lus kun nas bkug ste snying rjes mchog gi dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur byas pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang bdud rtsi'i nyid dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can la thob/ 
187b1(rgyud): drim rnam par bral rnams rang rang gnas su btang ste byang chub spyod pa rjes su gnas par bsam// rdzas rnams spangs pa sa pa 'du ti rnams la rgyal ba'i bdag pa'i bka' yis dang rnams sbyin par gyu / 
187b2(rgyud): ltar du ba la sogs pa lam dang yon tan ma lus gtor ni brtse ba'i rnal 'byor ldan pa'o// bsnyen pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgyas rang sems dbang las nyes pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed// gzhan yang
187b3(rgyud): rgyal mchog thugs 'gyur yum gyi mchod pa rnam par bral ba rnams la sbyin par bya ba min// dbang gi mtha' ru dpal gyi bum pa rnams kyi steng du 'jam zhing bde ster ral gu gos zung rnams// dpal ldan rnal
187b4(rgyud): 'byor ma rnams don du dbus ste gzhan yang de bzhin du ni ral gu gos zung rnams// sgo rnams gnas kyi don du dbul te de bzhin gzhan yang tshegs rigs kun la bdag nyid ci nus pas// mtha' ni sbyin bsreg byas
187b5(rgyud): la rang gi snying kha'i pad mar ye shes sems dpa' bsdu bar bya// 'jig rten pa rnams rang rang gnas su gshegs nas nges par rdul 'tshen ma lus dag pa'i tsang por dor// go la dang ni dri dang spos dang me tog
187b6(rgyud): 'bras bur ras yug bcas pa gzhon nu ma rnams la// byin te slob dpon slob mar bcas pa rnams las tshogs kyi rigs rnams ji ltar 'dod bzhin mnyes par bya// slob ma rnams la gnas pa spyi nas rab
187b7(rgyud): mchog tshogs kyi rigs rnams rang rang granas su gshegs su gsol// dgra dang seng ge dang ni glang chen me dang lto 'phye'i rgyal po chom rkun zhugs pas 'ching ba dang // rgya mtsho 'khrug par byed dang sho za'i 'jigs
187b8(rgyud): pa nad kyis 'chi bar byed dang dbang pos 'tshe ba dang // dbul po dang bud med bral dang rgyal po khros pas 'jigs dang rdo rje ltung dang don nyams rnams// rnal 'byor ma'i zhabs 'gyur de nyid gang gis gsal bar
188a1(rgyud): @dran pas de rnams rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur// dbang gi le'u gsum pa'o// rdzogs s+ho// // rgyal ba bskyed byed dbang bdun rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dang shes rab ye shes
188a2(rgyud): kyi/ dbang de rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed dang rnal 'byor go cha bzhi pa bdag gis thob// slar yang rgyal po mchog dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs gtso bo sgrub pa'i thabs nyid yang dag bshad du
188a3(rgyud): gsol// zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyang gsungs// zla ba'i sku dang zhabs nyid zung ste me mgrin rgya mtsho zhal dang dpal ldan kha dog sna tshogs dang // dadung
188a4(rgyud): pa drug dang nyi ma'i lag ngar rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad ma stong pa drug dang me yi tshogs// ri bong can dang nyi ma byin za'i dkyil 'khor bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa ni zhabs gnyis kyis// rol pas gnon mdzad de nyid
188a5(rgyud): srid dang srid bral ro gcig gyur pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// bskyed mos tshal dang ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas 'gyur stong pa dang // grub thob gnas dang dur khrod mchog nas
188a6(rgyud): bzang po dang ni gsang ba'i sa rnams nyid la de bzhin du// gang du sems nyod rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba mi yi bdag po gnas sa de ru bsgrub par bya// 'jam pa'i nang tshangs dang ldan stan la nye bar 'dug byas
188a7(rgyud): nas ni sngar gsungs pa'i bsrung ba bya// dang por zhal la sogs pa dag par byas nas snying khar pad ma zla ba'i dbus kyi de nyid las// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs spros pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus nam mkha
188a8(rgyud): bsgoms te slar la yang // rnam pa sna tshogs mchos byas nas sdig pa'i rnam pa mang po bsams pa rab tu bshags par bya// bsgrub par byed pa po yis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams gus pas gsum la
188b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba ru bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis dge ba dpag med gang byas pa// de rnams kun la rjes su yid rung ba dang sdig bral byang chub spyod la
188b2(rgyud): bsngags pas rjes su 'jug/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms pa rnams la byang chub bar du skyabs su mtsho// 'dir ni sems can ma lus don phyir bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs
188b3(rgyud): rgyas gyur cig zhes pa'i smon lam gdab// 'gro ba ma lus 'od rnams dngos po rnam par bral bas stong pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba yis// de phyir sangs rgyas byang chub med pas mtshan ma med par dam 'chal
188b4(rgyud): snying rjes gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// de ltar shes nas mi yi bdag po de nas gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ma lus pa'i// dpag tu med pa'i yon tan dkyil 'khor rnams las dkyil 'khor gtso bo byang
188b5(rgyud): chub sems dpas bsgom par bya// dang por 'dir ni brtul shugs ldan pas lus kyi dbus su chu'i sa me rnams bshig par byed pa'o// phyi nas sa ni chu la thim par 'gyur ba tsha bzhin chu yi dbus su rab tu 'jug
188b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// chu rnams rlung gi so myur bar bskams par byas nas nam mkha' la ni nub nas 'gro bar bsam pa'o// yul dang rnam par bral ba'i sems drang me nyid mun pa'i mtha'i dbus kyi gnas la gzhag
188b7(rgyud): par bya// stong pa rlung dang me dang chu dang sa ste ri rab chu skyes zla ba nyam me rnams dang // rdo rje las skyes gur dang gzhal yas khang ni kun nas brtsegs pa dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ste// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa
188b8(rgyud): gzhi la ni rin chen 'od zer tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par spro bya ba// oM yig las byung rgyal ba mchog gi pad ma rnams la nyi ma zla ba gdan rnams ye shes mthar// phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor
189a1(rgyud): nor gyi pad ma rnams la nyi ma zla ba rnams dang bral// de yi phyi rol phyogs 'tshams chal nyin phyed pad ma rnams dang sgro rnams dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo dang nor bu gser
189a2(rgyud): gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod rnams so rgyal po kye// snying po la ni brgyad gnyis ka ba rnams dang rdo rje'i rang bzhin rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor// a sogs ka sogs rnams
189a3(rgyud): las zla nyi dag dang rdo rje dang bcas me long lta bu la sogs lngas// dri ma med pa'i 'od zer lnga rnams spro zhing 'gyed pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ba'o// rdo rjes brgyan pa'i sku can rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma ma
189a4(rgyud): nyi ma'i lag ngar dus kyi dpung pa can// mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan rnams zhal ni rnam par gdangs cing mchi ba phyed ni rnam par gtsigs// dpal ldan rgyal ba'i bdag po oM yig las byung nor gyi
189a5(rgyud): pad mar zla ba nyi ma me stang du// drag po 'dod lha dag gi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin du rol pa'i g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis ni// bdud nyid zhabs mchog g.yas pa dmar po'i 'thil dang drag po zhabs
189a6(rgyud): gyur g.yon pa dkar po yis ni nges// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon pa rnams ni bung pa dang ni nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba'i kha dog mgrin// phrag pa g.yas g.yon rnams ni sngo dang dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur
189a7(rgyud): dkar ba rnams su brjod// lag ngar g.yon rnams kyi gnyis kar min pa dang nyi ma'i kha dog dang ni zla ba'i mdog/ de bzhin nges par brgyad gsum phyag rnams kyis kyang yin ste rim pas mtshon cha rnams
189a8(rgyud): dang ldan pa'o// ri bong phyag gi pad ma rnams la tshig rnams gsum dang sor mo lnga la kha dog lnga rnams 'phro// gnag dang ngamar dang dkar ba dang ldan phyag mchog 'thil du mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams yang
189b1(rgyud): dag bsnams pa ni// rdo rje dang ni ral gri rtse gsum 'joms par byed pa'i gri gug rnams dang me mda' dang // de nas rdo rje lcags kyu dang ni nges par sgra btsos Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid// mdung dang dbyug pa dgra
189b2(rgyud): sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi g.yas kyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad mar bsnams// dril bu phub dang kha nyid rnam par gdengs pa'i kha T+wAM ka dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa'i dang // gzhu dang zhags pa dang ni rin po che dang pad ma
189b3(rgyud): dang ste chu spyod me long lcags sgrog dang // tshongs pa'i mgo bo reg byed gdong ldan gang yin de yis rgyal ba'i phyag g.yon pad ma rab tu brgyan// bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag gis sdug bsngal rdong du byed cing rkang 'thil
189b4(rgyud): dag las 'dzin par byed// sna tshogs yum nyid gser dang mtshungs pa'i rig byed zhal ste nor gyi padad+ma mas mkhyud par mdzad// g.yas pa rnams ni gri gug dang ni lcags kyu sgra bcas Da ma ru dang phreng ba rim pa
189b5(rgyud): bzhin/ de bzhin g.yon pa rnams na nya phyis zhags pa pad ma mad pa brgyad pa dang rin chen mchog nyid bsnams// g.yon brkyang ba dang nyi ma'i spyan ste rgyal ba'i bdag pos dbu la brgyan cing rgyas btab pa
189b6(rgyud): dang bcas// lha mo brgyad rnams mdab mo brgyad du nor gyi phyag gi pad ldan rigs byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan// de rnams nang nas bzhi nyid sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te mtshams rnams rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye ba
189b7(rgyud): yis/ dbang ldan dang ni bden bral ngag dang me dang rlung mtshams rnams su chos kyi dung dang g+han d+he dang // de ltar yid bzhin nor bur gyur pa dang ni gzhan yang dpag bsam shing du gyur rnams rim pa yis// nag
189b8(rgyud): mo 'bar ma'i phyag nyid dang po'i 'thil nas blas kyis snod ste gnyis pa na ni bsil ba'i snang // dmar po sbyor ba gsum pa na ste bla tso'i bang 'dzin pa dang bcas phyag g.yas bzhi pa na// g.yon pa rnams ni dril bu
190a1(rgyud): pang ma lha shing me tog dang ni me tog dreng rnams rim pa yis// dmar po 'bar ma'i phyag g.yas rnams na mar me do shal dpung rgyan lag gdub rnams te phyag g.yon na// gros dang ske rams dag dang
190a2(rgyud): gzhan yang dri med 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub rnams// ser mo 'bar ma'i phyag g.yas rnams na dang dang gling bu nor bu Da me ru rnams rim po yis// g.yon pa rnams na pi wang dang yon tan mchog
190a3(rgyud): ldan sgra bcas cha lang dang ni zangs dung bsnams// dkar mo 'bar ma'i 'o ma chu sman chang dang bdud rtsi dang ni bcud dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod// phyogs kyi pad ma rnams la rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas nges ste spyan dgu pa la
190a4(rgyud): me zhal rnams kyi phyag/ 'tshams rnams la ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams te gzhan yang de dag 'tshams brgyad bum pa brgyad// gnag dang dmar ba dang ni ser dang ri bong 'dzin ltar dkar ba lha dang lha mo rnams kyi
190a5(rgyud): 'tshams dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zla ba yi steng de nas phyogs dang dmar dang ser ba'i nyi ma'i steng // nam mkha' snying po la sogs ro bya rdo rje ma sogs rtsigs pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs 'tshams rnams la gnas// shar
190a6(rgyud): dang lho dang byang dang nub kyi phyog kyi pad mar kun du bzang po dang ni de bzhin du// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang ni sgra rdo rje ma chos kyi dbyings ma rnams ni rim pa yis// shar gyi sgo ru shin du stobs can nyid te rmugs byed rengs
190a7(rgyud): byed nga rgyal can rnams sgo skyong rnams// pado ma'i ri bong 'dzin par shes shes rab pang du thabs ste lha rnams kyang ni lha mo de bzhin du// phan tshun gnyis ni mkhyud pa'i rang rang lag pa'i chu skyes rnams kyis rang rang mtshan
190a8(rgyud): ma bsnams pa rnams// mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi phyag g.yas dang po'i mthil gyi phyag rgya de rnams 'dir ni pad mas mnan// thabs dang shes rab 'khor los mchog tu bde bar gyur te pad ma rdo rje dag las 'dug
190b1(rgyud): stangs gtso// nag po rnams kyi phyag g.yas rnams la ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum pa// phyag g.yon rnams na phub dang thod pa khA Ta~M ka ni dkar mo rnams su 'gyur te de bzhin du// dmar po rnams
190b2(rgyud): kyi phyag g.yas rnams na me mda' rdo rje lcags kyu sgra bcas tsang te rim pa yis// g.yon pa rnams na mda' dang gzhu dang zhags pa dri med 'od zer 'phro ba'i nor bu rnams dang de bzhin du// ser po rnams kyi phyag g.yas
190b3(rgyud): rnams na 'khor lo dbyug pa 'jigs byed rdo rje rnams ni rim pa yis// g.yon pa rnams na dpal gyi dung dang lcags sgrog sgra bcas rdo rje dril bu rnams su nges par 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin kar rnams kyi g.yas pa dpal
190b4(rgyud): gyi tho ba dang ni mdung dang rtse gsum rnams// g.yon pa rnams na pad ma dkar po mdab ma brgya dang ldan pa dang ni me long phreng ba'o// ljang khu rnams kyi g.yas pa rnams ni rdo rje gri gug dgra sta rnams su rim pas rab
190b5(rgyud): tu 'gyur// g.yon pa rnams ni dril bu thod pa yon tan mtha' dag gter 'gyur tshangs mgo rnams dang de bzhin du// sngon po rnams kyang rim par bya ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang las lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin du/ 
190b6(rgyud): gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang gser zhun dang mtshungs shar sogs ji bzhin me la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad ma rnams la du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams spang bar byas na ni// dpal
190b7(rgyud): ldan snying po'i 'khor lo'i dbus su nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yi bdag nyid 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// bcom ldan rang sems nus ma dang ldan 'di yang shes par byas la rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom par bya// dbang gi don du
190b8(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang de'i 'khor lo bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur ba'o// phyi ru pad ma brgyad kyi mdab ma brgyad brgyad rnams ste phyogs brgyad rnams kyi lha mo brgyad po rnams// tsa ra tsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma
191a1(rgyud): rnams nyi ma zla ba dang bral rig byed lag dang mi gsum ste// shar gyi chu skyes la ni tsar cika ste ma ru mkhar lding bdag mo phag mo gdong drug ma// gshin rje bden bral 'tshams ste chu ltar bcas pa'i
191a2(rgyud): rlung du rdo rje las dang rgya mtsho'i gdong ma'o// byang dang dbang ldan du ni drag po dpal mo dog ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la mkhyud// pad ma la gnas brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams gtso mo rnams kyi kha
191a3(rgyud): dag dbyibs dang mtshungs// shar la sogs pa'i lag pa g.yas kyi dang po dang ni gnyis pa rnams kyi 'thil gyur ma lus na// gri gug rtse gsum 'khor lo dbyug to rnams dang dbyug pa dang ni ral gri mdung dang lcags
191a4(rgyud): kyu dang 'o rdo rje mda' dang pad ma dang ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyug pa rtse gsum dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis spras pa'i sgra bcas Da mA ru dang pad ma nyid dang phreng ba dang // g.yon pa rnams na/ 
191a5(rgyud): nya phyis kha T+wAM ka ste yang ni pad ma chu spyod dag dang lcags sgeg dang // phu ba dang rin po che dang zhags par nges ste sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni// pa ra pu spyi blugs dang ni kha T+wAM ka dang sbrul dang de nas gzhan ya
191a6(rgyud): chu skyes rin pa chen ste// pad ma nor med pa rnams kyi brgyad brgyad rnal 'byor ma rnams phyag gi mtshon cha rnams kyang de bzhin du// tsa ra tsi ka la phyogs pa'i nir gyi pad ma'i mdo' ma la gnas 'jigs byed ma
191a7(rgyud): dang drag mo dang // mchu gnyis gtsigs dang kha nas me 'bar rlung shugs rab gtum drag dmig ma dang sna tshan ma rnams so// khyab 'jug ma la phyogs pa'i nor gyi pad ma'i mdab ma la gnas dpal mo sgyu 'phrul ma/ 
191a8(rgyud): dang / grags ma bkra shis ma dang shin du rgyal ma dpal las rgyal ma dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma brgyad// keng rus ma dang dus mtshan ma dang rab tu khra ga dang ma dang dus lcem dang rtsigs ma dang // nag mo 'jigs byed
191b1(rgyud): mdang gzugs ngan ma rnams pag mo'i pad ma'i nor gyi mdab ma'i lha mo rnams// pad ma yan lag suM gzhon nu ma dang ri dgas bdag mo rin chen phreng ma mig bzangs ma// rul pa ma dang bzang mo nyid rnams rma byal gnas
191b2(rgyud): gtso mo'i chu skyes mdab ma rnams la gnas// rdo rje 'od ma rdo rje lus ma gser mchog ldan ma rigs 'dzin ma dang sna tshogs ri mo 'dri// chu shing ma dang zug rngu spel ma shin du sgrol ma rdo rje lag mA'i nor pad mdab mar gnas
191b3(rgyud): mchod sbyin 'don ma pad ma'i mig ma gzhan yang chu skyes ldan ma blo ma ngag gi dbang phyug ma// glu len ma dang glog ma dang ni dran pa ma rnams rig byed zhal ma'i pad ma'i lha mo rnams// mgo ra da ni gang g+ha ma dang rtag ma
191b4(rgyud): shin du mgyogs ma 'degs ma dpal mo ma rnams dang // ser skya ma dang nag mo brgyad rnams gtso mo'i nor gyi pad ma'i mdab ma rnams la'o// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo tsan ma ri bong 'dzin zhal ngang pa'i
191b5(rgyud): mdog dang 'dzin byed ma// pad ma ma dang 'od zer mig ma dri med ri bong 'dzin mA bkra shis ma'i pad mar gnas// de'i phyi ru nyi ma'i pad mar lha min dang ni bskyod pa gshin rje me lha gdong drug dang // nor sbyin brgya byin rgya
191b6(rgyud): mtsho'i zhal dang drag po chu lha dpal ldan tshogs bdag khyab 'jug nyid rnams kyi// / ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha shing me tog dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung thung dang // dbyug pa sa ga ti dang ni mdung dong nor bu dag kyang
191b7(rgyud): dbyug to rdo rje nyid dang me mda' dang // dung dang phreng ba dag dang rtse gsum dang ni mda' dang zhags po rin chen dgra sta rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'khor long dbyug pa rnams ni khyab 'jug la sogs lag pa g.yas pas pad ma rnams
191b8(rgyud): ni bsnams// g.yon pa rnams la phu ba dang thod pa kar mini nor bu dang ni u dpal dang ni lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa chu skyes spyi blugs rnams ni lag g.yon rnams su rim bzhin 'gyur ro ma yi bdag po kye// rin chen me
192a1(rgyud): long dag dang de bzhin ne le chu skyes dang bcas rdo rje dril bu dang ni gzhu// pad ma spyi blugs dang ni sbrul dang gzhu dang gzhan yang de bzhin klu'i zhags pa rin po che// zhags pa rin po che dang pad ma rnams su 'gyur/ 
192a2(rgyud): te lha min dgra'i rnga las skyes pa'i dung // spyod zla 'bring sogs tshis rnams nor dang lag pa'i pado ma'i mdab ma rnams dang lte bar nya gnyis te// kun la stong pa 'tshams dang 'jig rten rnams kyi dam pa ri bong can cha lo gcig/ 
192a3(rgyud): sbyor bar shes// sgo rnams shing rta la gnas lha mo rnams kyi lag na ral gri rdo rje lag na mda' lcags kyu// lag na dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang las lag na tho ba dang ni mdung // lag na dpal ldan
192a4(rgyud): gro gug rdo rje lag na dgra sta rtse gsum dgra te yas pa rnams na'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi lag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang las lag na gzhu dang zhags// lag na dpal ldan dung dang rin chen de bzhin lag na ri
192a5(rgyud): bong 'dzin mtshungs pad ma me long dang // lag na nya phyis dpal ldan dril bu dang ni gzhan yang lag na lto bas 'gro dang kha T+wAM ka/ ma ri tse sogs gdong pa gcig ma dus kyi lag pa dang ldan rim pa bzhin du rig par bya// kau ba
192a6(rgyud): rnams kyi 'og tu rlung sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la pad ma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu la sogs// dus kyi lag ldan klu brgyad lag g.yas bum pa rdo rje g.yon gyi lag pas pad ma nor bu'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la ni khyi gdong
192a7(rgyud): ma dang phrag gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma stag gdong ma// byang gi phyogs kyi bar la gnas ste bya rog gdong ma bya rgod gdong ma mkha' lding bdag po'i gdong // 'ug gdong ma rnams 'tshams su gnas te rdo rje'i spyan ma shan
192a8(rgyud): du sngon mo'i 'og dang nam mkhor gnas// dur khrod la gnas rnams kyi lag na gri gug nya phyis bsnams te g.yo ba'i mtha' ru 'byung po gnas// phyogs dang 'tshams kyi pad ma'i gdan la yi dgas dmar dang mkho' lding
192b1(rgyud): dbang mo ma he rma bya dang // glang chen dang ba ba lang gadrong lnga rnam sa la tsa mun Da la sogs pa'i rim pas rab tu 'gyur// de ltar lha min la sogs rnams kyi yang ste nor bdag me lha chu lha rlung lha tshogs bdag rnams// rlung po dmar
192b2(rgyud): bo drong ni lcag dang chu srin yi dgas byi ba zhes bya rnams la rim pa bzhin// 'tshams rnams kun du kha gdong la sogs be duN Da dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang gdong rnams la ste// phyogs rnams kun du khyi gdong la sogs
192b3(rgyud): bsre dang dom dang seng ge g.yag rnams la ni rab tu 'gyur// sa 'og tu ni rdo rje mig ma'i shing rta rkang brgyad pas drangs mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta las// mkha' lding rlung mtshungs khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i lus
192b4(rgyud): rigs mig gsum pa yis so// phag parta dang glang chen seng ge bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta rnam sA lA ma ri tse nyid dang // tsun d+ha dang ni lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can rnams dbang po gshin rje chu lha byang du nges// shar
192b5(rgyud): du dri ma phreng ma gshin rje spos ma mar me mA ru 'gyur te chu lha sgeg mo dang // gzhang ma dag sta nor sbyin rol sgyu ma dang gar ma nyid ste nam mkha' glu ma 'dod ma rnams// snying po'i yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' sa 'og
192b6(rgyud): la gnas rta babs 'og tu sbyar bar bya// 'dzin ma rnams ni snam bu la ste gdengs ka'i rigs dang bcos pa'i mi 'dod ma rnams 'dod yon lo// dbye dang bskyod par 'dod ma dag dang de bzhin rgyas dang rangs par 'dod
192b7(rgyud): mar 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs rnams dag pa'i ste srid pa gsum bskyed ma ni gsad dang gsod 'dod ma// sgra ma la sogs rol mo'i sgra dang rgyan dang bza' 'drod ma rnams gsum du 'gyur rom
192b8(rgyud): bdag kye// dri 'dod ma dang gos 'dod ma dang 'khrig pa 'dod ma rnams kyis rab tu gsal por drug tu ngas// tsa muN Da sogs brgyad rnams lus la 'khrug par 'dod mkhar gyur 'chil ma dor bar 'dod ma dang // yan
193a1(rgyud): lag dri ma 'dod ma dang ni gar 'dod ma dang stan dang chu dang mngal 'dod ma rnams dang // rgyal por 'dod ma rnams ste de bzhin gzhan yang sa yi steng du khre mo las skyes 'dod ma rnams// yang dag gdung
193a2(rgyud): dang gnyen 'dun 'dod ma dang ni tshig 'jam ma dang snyems dang bskrad par 'dod ma dang // reg dang dgug dang bcing dang phur bus 'debs dang rgyug par 'dod ma rnams su 'gyur ro ma bdag kye// lha min rigs rnams rnam
193a3(rgyud): yan lag thabs cad bskyod par 'dod ma dang ni nges par rab tu gsal bar du// gshang lci 'dzag 'dod ma dang sems can glu bar 'dod dang ku tse mang po dang ni zas kyi lhag/ za bar 'dod ma dang ni g.yul 'dod ma dang sprul
193a4(rgyud): nyid 'ching dang byis pa sdigs par 'dod ma rnams// sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid ste de nas gzhan yang mi 'dod ma rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol 'dod yon la// sems can gang zhig bya ba cung zad nyin zhig so so'i dus su 'dir ni rnal
193a5(rgyud): 'byor ma yis byed// de lta bas na rdo rje can gyis de ltar srid gsum ma lus pa rnams dkyil 'khor rnams par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan rnams spro bsdus yang dag gnas pa dngos po'i rigs dang nam mkha' las skyes
193a6(rgyud): pa'o// de phyir nam mkha' rdo rje rtag ste srid pa rnam gsum la gnas mi rtag pa ru 'gyur ba min// mi rtag pa ni 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams nyid ste mig 'phrul ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// rtag dang mi rtag lta ba de yang blo dman
193a7(rgyud): rnams kyi sems nyid sbyang bar bya ba'i rgyu nyid du// brjod ste sgrub thabs 'di nyid nges par bsgrubs na snying por cung zad tsam yang 'gyur ba med pa yis// sgrub pa po yis rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs de rnams gang dag ma lus bsgrubs/ 
193a8(rgyud): na 'khrul pa ste// de phyir sgrub po rang sems sdig pa rnam par bral ba dkyil 'khor nyid du bye'o rgyal po kye// dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rje 'gyur ste nyi zla'i steng du a li ka li las// skyes pa'i lha'i rigs kyi 'khor lo
193b1(rgyud): gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni sku yi rdo rje mi bdag kye// sdong bu rtsa ba nyid la a ste de bzhin mdab ma ge sar dag la u yig nyid du 'gyur// dbus kyi dpal ldan lte ba la ni rnam gnyis gnas su 'gyur te zla ba nyi
193b2(rgyud): ma'i ma yig go/ ho yig dang po mtha' dang dbus kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba// shes rab nyid kyi chags pas zhu ba ri bong can bzhin khyab bdag rdo rje can yang mthong ba dang // lha mo
193b3(rgyud): rnams kyi glu len byed pa lha dang mi yi bla ma bcom ldan rdo rje can khyod kyis// sems can rnams la phan mdzad phyir dang bdag cag 'dod pa can rnams nyid la 'dod pa mdzad do bzhengs// rdo rje can gyis glu de gsan nas
193b4(rgyud): srid gsum ma lus pa rnams mig 'phrul ji lta ba bzhin du// gzigs te bskyed par byed pa dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dang ni rang gi mtshan ma las skyes pa// rdo rje rgyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan dag dang ldan pas shes
193b5(rgyud): rab ma la mkhyud pa dang // slar yang thabs dang shes rab bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus spro bar bya'o rgyal po kye// 'od zer sngon po 'jigs byed sku mnga' zhal rnams rab tu bzhad cing mche ba phyed nyid gtsigs pa dang / 
193b6(rgyud): sgra sgrogs mdzad cing nyi ma'i spyan ldan gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rigs byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// thabs dang shes rab dang bcas mtshon cha rnams dang ldan pa'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta la gnas pa/ brgyal ba'i
193b7(rgyud): dgra 'joms byed pa ye shes 'khor lo'i don du rdo rje shugs nyid bskul bar byas pa dang // dri med 'od zer 'phro ba'i dbang phyug nyid kyi lte ba nas ni lcags kyus nges par btab pa dang // de ltar phyag nyid rdo rje gdengs kas rab
193b8(rgyud): tu bcings ste mtshon cha rnams kyis sdigs par byed pa ste// bya ba bsgrubs ste slar yang 'dir ni rang gi gnas su log nas 'khor lo ma lus spyan drangs pa// rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis 'jug pa dang ni 'ching ba dag dang
194a1(rgyud): dgyes par byed dang ro mnyam byed// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sbyor bar gyur pa snying po'i pad ma dang ni me steng nam mkhar btsas pa dang // mchog gi padad+ma mad pa rnams la shar du dpal ldan nag pod+d+ha
194a2(rgyud): ni dmar mo 'bar ba'o// byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang las nub du ser mo 'bar ma'o// me yi phyogs su drub ma ste ldu minin skyes phyogs sdigs sgyu ma'i dbang ldan phyogs su me khyer ma/ 
194a3(rgyud): rlung du dpal ldan mar me yid bzhin nor bu chos kyi gaN+DI dung dag dngan dpag bsam shing // me dang lha min dag dang bde byed rlung rnams de bzhin du ni nang gi phyog dong 'tshams rnams la// shar gyi pad mar nges par byed
194a4(rgyud): sa dag rab tu gnas te lho ru tshor ba dang ni chu// byang du 'du shes dang ni me ste nub tu gzugs nyid rlung dang bcas pas rab tu 'gyur ba'o// me nyid du ni rlung dang gzugs ste lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes rnam pa
194a5(rgyud): gnyis su 'gyur// dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor bar nges ste gzhan yang rlung du sa dang 'du byed phung por 'gyur// lha mo dang ni sangs rgyas par bar rnams su bdud rtsi bcud kyi bum pa rnams ni phyogs brgyad
194a6(rgyud): gnas// gzhan yang phyi yi 'phar mo'i shar du sna dang dri ste de bzhin lhor ni mig dang gzugs dag dang // byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te de bzhin chu ru lus nyid dang ni reg bya dag tu nges// lho sgo'i g.yon/ 
194a7(rgyud): sa 'og tu ni rigs kyi dbang las rna ba dang ni sgra ru 'gyur ba'o// gzhan yang shar sgra'i g.yon dang nam mkhar nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su bcas par rab tu 'gyur// dang por
194a8(rgyud): thabs drug rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang las dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha nyid rnams su 'gyur/ phyis ni rang rang pad ma gdan la shes rab ma drug gtso bor rab tu gsal bar
194b1(rgyud): gsungs pa'o// 6/ shar gyi sgo ru rab tu gtum pa'i stobs can ral gri 'dzin dang shes rab rengs byed ma/ lho sgor rmugs byed nga rgyal ma spre nor sbyin du ni nga rgyal can dang rmugs byed ma ru 'gyur// tshul/ 
194b2(rgyud): lhar rangs byed dang ni brtson 'grus mtha' ya sa na ste sgo rnams dbus su pad ma la gnas 'gyur// dbang po lho dang nor sbyin nub sgo rnams la dbyug sngon can dang ma ri tse ste ta ka dang // tsun d+ha shing rta la gnas
194b3(rgyud): mi g.yo ba dang khro gnyer can dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma// 'og tu gnod mdzes dang ni drug mig ma ste nam mkhar gtsug tor can dang shin du sngon mo ste// shar dang nub kyi sgro dang gzhan du
194b4(rgyud): nges par shing rta gnyis la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor phyog brgyad rnams su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du nges par 'gyur ba ni// shar du tsa muN Da dang dbang po yin te mer ni khyab
194b5(rgyud): 'jug ma dang rigs byed zhal nyid do// gshin rje phag gdong ma dang drag po yin te srin po'i bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon// nub tu dbang mo dang ni srin mo yin te rlung du nges par dus zhal ma dang khyab 'jug
194b6(rgyud): nyid// gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rje dag yin dbang ldan nyid du bkra shis mA dang gdong drug 'gyur// phyi rol du ni dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su bden bral dang ni gzhan yang de'i phyag rgya srin mo yan// me ru rlung dang
194b7(rgyud): rab tu gtum mi nyid dang lho sgo'i g.yas su byin za dang ni chu lha mo// srin po'i bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug dang ni bkra shis mar nges nub g.yas dbang po rlung lha mo// rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog ma yin te gnod
194b8(rgyud): sbyin sgo g.yas rgya mtsho dang ni phag gdong ma// dpal ldan du ni tshogs bdag gzhon nu ma ste nges par gnod sbyin gshin rje ngag gi sgo yon char// drag po dang ni gshin rje shar
195a1(rgyud): @##/ dang nub kyi sgo'i g.yon du khyab 'jug gnod sbyin ste/ de rnams phyag rgyar rab grags ri'i sras mo gshin rje ma dang dpal mo dbang mo rnams su grags// phyi ru klu rnams ma lus dbang po dang ni
195a2(rgyud): gshin rje nor sbyin nub phyogs rnams kyi 'dod yon lo// dpe ma dang stobs kyi rgyu dgangs par rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas dang skyong dag/ me la gnas ste rigs ldan mtha' yas dag ni chu'i steng du rab tu grub
195a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po pad ma chen po sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid langs par gnas// de rnams shes rab dur khrod la gnas rab tu gtum par gyur pa'i khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'o// de
195a4(rgyud): rnams thabs gyur pad ma la sogs rnams ste rigs gzhan dbang las bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i shar phyogs rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas mdung gis phug po'i dur khrod du ni khyi gdong ma// gshin rje'i
195a5(rgyud): ro bsregs par ni nges par phag gdong ma ste byang phyogs gnas kyi rul par stag gdong ma// chu lhar gnag dang bcas pa'i rul pa'i dri dang ldan par de bzhin du ni lha spyang gdong ma nyid// me dang srin po'i bdag por lhag ma can
195a6(rgyud): dang 'jigs brtsod ldan du kha gdong bya rgod gdong ma'o// rlung du sbrul gyis zin par bya khyud gdong ma dang ni dbang ldan gyi ni byis pa shi ba ru// 'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor gyur par zla ba nyi ma sgom par bya/ 
195a7(rgyud): sna tshogs yum gyi g.yon brkyang yin te 'dab ma'i tshogs kyis mnyam pa'i rkang stabs rnams su nges// bcu dang nor gyi g.yon brkyang dang ni sa ga'i stabs ste zlum po lha ma yin pa rnams kyi'o// g.yon brkyang gis ni gnas
195a8(rgyud): pa rnams la g.yas brkyang bzhugs pa rnams kyis snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba'o// sa ga la ni sa gsanges par yin te gzhan yang zlum po la yang zlum po'i rigs nyid do// lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dkyil dkrung gis gnas
195b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru nges par brjod// rang rig phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni pad ma'i dkyil dkrung nyid kyis rang rang pad ma'i zla steng du// gdeng ka'i rigs dang lha rnams rdo rje'i dkyil dkrung dang bcas rang rang / 
195b2(rgyud): phyogs na bzhon pa dang bcas gnas// lha mo rnams kyi mdang ma'i lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas de bzhin 'byung skyes rnams// g.yas pa rnams ni bskum pas sa yi steng du bzhag ste gzhan yang rkang pa g.yon
195b3(rgyud): pa brkyang ba rnams// de nyid rnams ni g.yon brkyang stabs ste phyed dang bcas pa'i khru dor 'gyur ro mi dbang kye// g.yas brkyang ba rnams g.yon pa bskum pa yin te mnyam pa'i stabs ni rkang pazung mnyam 'gyur ba'o// sa ga dang ni
195b4(rgyud): zlum po gang zhig yon tan dbang gis pus mo zung brkyang ba ru 'gyur ba ste// cung zad pus mo phyed 'khyog gyur pa rol stabs yin te lhag ma nyid du rab tu grags pa'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni shes par bya ba nges par rkang las rdo/ 
195b5(rgyud): rje gar rnams bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje phan tshun rdo rje gcod pan 'gyur zhing gzhan yang gal te na ni sangs rgyas lnga rnams so// gzugs la stang du mi bskyod pa ste gsal ba'i pad ma'i 'dzin pa nyid la de bzhin rnam snang mdzad// 
195b6(rgyud): rin chen 'byung la chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub la rab mchog nor bu'i phyag gi gcod pan ste// drug ni ral pa'i gcod pan can du gsungs ste yon tan dbang las 'khor lo lhag ma'i gzhan du 'gyur// sa las 'khor lo/ 
195b7(rgyud): / rab tu bskyed par 'gyu ro te chu las pad ma dang ni ma las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri nyid ste stong pa las ni rdo rje mar 'gyur ba las gri gug rnams su 'gyur// gos dang bdud rtsi snod dang de bzhin du ni me long dri dang pi wang rnams
195b8(rgyud): su 'gyur ba'o// drug pa chos 'byung nges par yin te sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba'o// phub dang mdung dang dgra sta dang ni ma Da ma ru dang mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du// dbyug pa zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu thob
196a1(rgyud): @// rtse gsum rnams su nges par de bzhin 'gyur ba'o// gzhan yang de bzhi gzhu dang ud pa la dang mgo bo dang ni kha T+wA~M ka dang dril bu'o// de ltar lcags sgrog chu la spyod dang tsa sha ka dang gzig lpags glang po'i lpags pa/ 
196a2(rgyud): la sogs ngas// 'dir ni nye ba'i mtshan ma lhag ma sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa// de rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang la sangs par lha dang lha mo rnams su shes par bya ba'o// le la sogs pa dbyangs
196a3(rgyud): rnams sum bcu rang rang sngags ste rim pas thung dang ring po'i dbye ba rnams// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes mtshan ma rnams kyis yongs su byas pa yi// 'khor lo ma lus pa rnams pad ma dang bcas zla
196a4(rgyud): pa nyi ma'i gdan la nges par gnas pa nyid// gang du drug pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa da ni yon tan dbang las gzhom du med par 'gyur ba'o// sgra tsam dpal ldan rdo rje sems par 'gyur te a yig thugs kyi rdo rje nyid do mi bdag kya/ 
196a5(rgyud): i yig thung ngu ral gri can du 'gyur te gzhan yang ri yaMs phyag na rin po che can gyi// u yig thung ngu 'od dpag med du 'gyur te gzhan yang 'dir ni nges par la yig rnam snang mdzad// bsam pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams la
196a6(rgyud): dbyangs tshogs ring po ma lus rgyal ba drug gi rim pa bzhin// dpal ldan yum dag gzhom du med par 'gyur te de bzhin A i ri u le rnams byung dang // rim pa bzhin du nam mkha'i khams dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa
196a7(rgyud): rnams ma lus pa rnams ni// mchog tu bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam par 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni yum// mi bskyod pa dang stong pa'i khams ste phyag 'thil ral gri rnams dang spyan ma lus dang bsam par 'gyur/ 
196a8(rgyud): rin chen 'byung dang ma ma ki sta gzhan yang pad ma rnams dang gis dkar lus dang bsam pa dag/ de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma dag ste de bzhin yon tan dbang las thung ring dbyangs rnams kyis// lus kyi dbang las a ni kun
196b1(rgyud): du bzang por 'gyur te a yig phyag na rdo rje nyid du brjod// oM yig thung du nam mkha' snying por 'gyur ti de bzhin du ni Ar yig sa'i snying por 'gyur// oM yig 'jig rten mgon po de bzhin 'dir ni A la yig sgrib pa rnam par
196b2(rgyud): sal ta las su 'gyur// aHyaug chos kyi dbyings mar 'gyur zhing de bzhin du ni a yig las byung sgra'i rdo rje ma// aM yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste ar yig re rdo rje dang AM yig gzugs rdo rje mi ra 'gyur// de bzhin a yig las byung dri rdo rje
196b3(rgyud): ma rnams ni bsam pa'i dbye bar 'gyur ro mo bdag kye// dpal ldan kun du bzang dang chos kyi dbyings ste gzhan yang phyag na rdo rje sgra rdo rje mazung // nam mkha'i snying po dang ni dri rdo rje dang 'jig rten mgon po ro'i rdo rje ma dag gzung // sa
196b4(rgyud): yi snying po dang ni gzugs rdo rjer 'gyur sgrib pa rnam par sal dang reg bya rdo rje gzung // de ltar nges par rigs drug dbye ba rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang las yang dag rig par bya// lus kyi dbang las haM yig gtsug tor 'khom
196b5(rgyud): lo can du 'gyur zhing ha yig shin du sngon mo'o// ha yig thung du gnod mdzes nyid ste de bzhin ring po las ni drag mag mar 'gyur mi bdag kya// A la gnyis ni rim pa bzhin du rab tu gsal bar shin du stobs can rengs byed ma dag
196b6(rgyud): gzung // r-i wa rmugs byed nga rgyal ma sta~M wa rA zhes pas nga rgyal can dang rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro// laM da rengs byed dang ni shin du brtson 'grus ma ste lus kyi dbang las ya wa ra laM rnams// dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo 'dod pa'i
196b7(rgyud): rgyal po brtson 'grus mtha' yas 'gyur te lha mo rnams kyi ring po ni// yA wA rA lA rnams su 'gyur te glang pau rta dang seng gi phigs pa rnams kyi shing rta la// ma ri tsi dang dbyug sngon can ste mi g.yo khro gnyer can ma lcags sgrog
196b8(rgyud): ma dang brtson mtha' yas// Ta ki tsun d+ha zung du 'gyur te dkyil 'khor rnams su bde ba dam pa'i don du mi bdag kye// a yig dag dang aM dang batsheg drag haM dang haM/ zhes pa dang ha ha las skyes nus ma brgyad// de ltar
197a1(rgyud): / bum pa rnams kyi ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs rnams dbye bar 'gyur// oM hUM hoHa chos kyi dung dang dri mod nor bu dang ga bsam shing dang chos kyi g+han d+he rnams// ha yig nges pa ra tsa mun Da ste haM
197a2(rgyud): dang hA zhes pa ni dbang phyugs dang phagag dong mi// tak+Sha k+Sha k+Shi rnams dbang po mkha' 'gro'i dbang pos 'gro ma tshangs ma dpal mi gnon num// rgya kyimachog gi pad ma rnams la hI hri tu hruHk+She k+Shu k+ShI'i dbyangs yig ring po rnams/ 
197a3(rgyud): de bzhin mdun phyogs rnams la nges par rab tu gsal bar dbyangs yig thung ngu rnams te de dag kyang // sha rA dang lho dang byang dang chu lha dang ni me dang nor sbyin dbang ldan rlung rnams pad ma la// oM sogs dbyangs drug dbye ba pad
197a4(rgyud): mdab drug nyid rim pas yongs su byas par thung dang ring ba dang // hi k+Sha la sogs la mtha' ma lus nor la gdengs kas bsgyur ba lha mo rnams kyi mang po rnams la// tsa mun Ta la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbang las sngags kyi dbye
197a5(rgyud): bas thabs rnams mngon du phyogs par 'gyur// ta na brgya byin dang ni rgya mtsho'i gdong ste paM dang meHdag chu lha tshogs bdag gi'o// TaM NaHma dang gzhon nu ma ste tsa dang nya dgangs par srin po'i dbang po rlung lha yi// keng \u0f7fkhyab
197a6(rgyud): 'jug gshin rje dang ni de bzhin nges par sa dang skad ga dbang phyug nor sbyin no// tsa sogs sde tshan dbyangs dang bcas pa gtso bo rnams dang pad ma'i mdab me'i lha mo rnams kyis 'gyur// dpyid zla 'bring sogs tshes rnams la
197a7(rgyud): ni mtshams kyi nges pa'i dbang las stong pa drug drang ma yi grangs// de nyid mnan pa'i ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams nyid la shar sogs klu rnams kyi// brtsegs pA lA gnas sde tshon drug dang k+Sha ha dang ldan ya ra wA la
197a8(rgyud): dur khrod lha min gyi// gang zhig 'dir ni rigs kyi dbang las gdong gi phyogs pa thabs dang shes rab sku'i dngos por 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje can las kun bzang yin te rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'chang las phyag rdo rje/ 
197b1(rgyud): don yod grub las nam mkha' snying dang dri med nor bu'i phyag las sa'i snying po yang dag yin// 'khor lo'i phyag las sgrib pa rnam sel yin te rigs kyi dbang gis snang mtha' yas dang 'jig rten mgron// dpal ldan yum/ 
197b2(rgyud): las chos dbyings ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma las sgra rdo rje ma'o// dpal ldan sgrol ma las ni reg rdo rje dang rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar mo las ro rdo rje// mA ma ki las gzugs ma rangs te rigs kyi kyi dbang las
197b3(rgyud): spyan ma las ni dri rdo rje ma ru ni 'gyur// sna tshogs rdo rje las ni rgyal dbang 'gyur ta da las khro bo dbang po rdo rje shugs su 'gyur// mi bskyod pa las gtsug gtor can nyid dang ste gzhan yang don yod grub las shin du stobs can
197b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rin chen phyag las nges par rmongs byed yin te rigs kyi dbang gis snang mtha' yasangs rgyal can// rnam par snang mdzad las ni rangs byed yin de nges par phyag na rdo rje nyid la gnod mdzes so// nam mkha'i snying po nyid/ 
197b5(rgyud): las dbyug sngon can te rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa snying 'dod rgyal lo// rnam par sal las shin du brtson 'grus yin te rigs kyi dbang las 'jig rten mgon las mi g.yo ba// yum sogs rnams las chos da
197b6(rgyud): dbyings sogs bzhin de ltar rigs kyi dbang las khro dbang phyug rgya rnams su 'gyur// stong pa las ni shin du sngon mar bstan te rlung ma chu dang sa srogs rnams las brtson mtha' yas// rmongs byed ma dang nga rgyal can dang
197b7(rgyud): rangs byed ma rnams rim pas nges par gsal bar rab tu grub// sgra rdo rje las drag mig ma yin rigs kyi dbang gis reg bya rdo rje ma las lcags sgrog ma// dri rdo rje las 'od zer can ra ba yin te khro gnyer can dang tsun
197b8(rgyud): de dag ni grub byed pa/ rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro rdo rje dang gzugs rdo rje las shes par bya'o mi dbang kye// rangs byed gshin rje mthar byed nyid ste de bzhin nyid du shin du stobs can bgegs kyi dgra ru rab tu grag
198a1(rgyud): / rmongs byed shes rab mthar byed nges par rab tu yin te de bzhin nga rgyal can ni pad ma'i dgra// tsa mun dad dang phag gdong drag mo dbang mo rnams ni rlung me chus bzhi las de bzhin no// dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya rnams
198a2(rgyud): las rlung dang dbang ldan srin po dang ni mer gnas rnams// rnam par snang mdzad la ni sa las tshangs pa yin te rigs kyi dbang las dpag med rgya mtsho'o// dpal ldan rin chen phyag las me nyid yin te don grub las ni me bzhin kho nar
198a3(rgyud): rlung yin te// mi bskyod pa las lha min dgra yin pa ste rgyal ba'i bdag po las ni bad byed rab tu 'grub// rnam par sal las brgya byin yin te gzhan yang 'jig rten dbang phyug las ni de bzhin tshogs bdag go/ sa yi snying po las ni gdong
198a4(rgyud): drug yin te dpal ldan mkha' snying srin po'i bdag por rab tu 'grub// dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje las ni gshin rje yin te drug pa kun du bzang las nor gyi bdag/ rig ma drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang las de rnams rang rang phyag rgya
198a5(rgyud): ste/ lha'i bdag po phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma rnams ni dkar dang gnag pa rdzogs rnams dang / de rnams pad ma'i medab mar nor dang lag pa'i tshes rnams gang yin dgu zla tha chungs la sogs te// zla ba drug la snga ma drug yin
198a6(rgyud): pa dang rigs kyi dbang las phyi ma lha mo rnams kyi'o// gang zhig bum pa brgyad las klu rnams yin te khyab bdag pad ma'i lha mo rnams las rab gtum sogs// rigs kyi dbang las dpal ldan du ma las ni bya rog gdong 'gyur 'od
198a7(rgyud): zer can las bya rgod gdong // me khyer las ni 'ug pa'i gdong ste dpal ldan mar me nyid las bya khyud nyid kyang rab tu grub// nag mo 'bar ma las ni khyi gdong yin te dmar mo 'bar las shin du 'jigs byed phag gdong ma// dkar mo/ 
198a8(rgyud): 'bar ma las ni stag gdong ma yin rigs kyi dbang las ser mo 'bar las lce sbyang gdong // de ltar sgeg mo la sogs lha mo thams cad rnam pa chur gsal te yang sna tshogs yul las so// lha mo rnams dang sangs rgyas rig ma ljon
198b1(rgyud): shing bum par bcas dang rgyal ba rnams ni dag pa'i sku// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sgra yi rngom sogs rnams ni chos kyi sku yi de nyid do// rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste shing rtal gnas rnams dang nyi ma lta bu
198b2(rgyud): rab tu grub klu brgyad rab gtum ma rnams 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rnams ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku// de ltar slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni phyi dang nang du dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ni// mngal du skye ba ji lta ba bzhin
198b3(rgyud): nges par dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur ba'o// ston pa lha mo la sogs bum pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus gyur lhan cig skyes de'i sku// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa nges par
198b4(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// khro bo rnams ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang las dkyil 'khor snying por yang dag gnas// phyi rol du ni tsa mun Da la sogs pa lha mo brgyad ni 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku// lha
198b5(rgyud): la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste gdangs ka'i rigs rnams ma lus 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don du mi yi bdag po kye// lus nyid bskyed pa'i don
198b6(rgyud): du rgyal ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dang sku rdo rje gzung du 'gyur ba'o// chos nyid brtan pa'i don du gsung rdo rje dang chos kyi sku dag zung du rab tu 'gyur// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir na thugs rdo rje dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
198b7(rgyud): sku dgazung du 'gyur// sems can rnams la thar pa ster bas ye shes dang sprul pa'i sku dag zung du nges par 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs kyis nyi ma zla ba a sogs dang
198b8(rgyud): ka sogs rnams kyis srid gsum bskyed pa ye shes rnam shes dbye ba rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje rnams dang swA hA dang bcas 'di nyid rnams kyis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lta gsang spyi bo rnams// byin gyis
199a1(rgyud): @brlabs te rgyal dbang yan lag mchog la lha mo rnams kyis sku khrus gsol// sgrub pa po mi gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba brjod par byas nas de yi rang bzhin de nyid te// sdong pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings
199a2(rgyud): dang rigs gsum dam tshig ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa rnams// rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyi bor lhan cig skyes pa'i rtsibs ni bcu drug drangs rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
199a3(rgyud): kyis mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo mi bdag gnyis 'gyur rnams su 'gyur ba'o// 'jigs byed la sogs rnams kyis lta ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nor la gdengs kas bsgyur bar 'gyur ba'o// las kyi 'khor
199a4(rgyud): lo'i lha nyid rnams kyis lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs rnams drug bcu dus kyis bsgyur bar 'gyur// gtum mo klu rnams kyis ni bya bar bstan te sor mo'i tshigs su 'gyur ro mI yi bdag po kye// dus nyid dag pa dpal
199a5(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can du 'gyur te lo zla la sogs dbye'o mi bdag kye// sems kyi rnam pa nye ni mtshan min sta nyin mtshan so so'i dbye ba rnam par dag pa sna tshogs yum// rang gi snying kha'i pad ma'i 'khor lo'i rlung rnams dag pa
199a6(rgyud): du ba ma sogs rnams su 'gyur ba'o// khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu drag po bdud dag chung mar bcas te mnan pa nyon mongs bdud sde rnams// dung dang g+han d+ha nor bu dang ni ljon shing rnams ni de bzhin sku rdo rje la sogs
199a7(rgyud): pa yi// bum pa brgyad ni lus kyi bdud rtsi rnams ste rgyal ba rnam rgyal byang chub sems sogs kyis// 'du byed don yod grub pa nyid dang tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag ste 'du shes snang mtha' yas// gzugs nyid 'khor
199a8(rgyud): lo can ste ri bong can dang stobs dang khrag dang gci ba gshang ba rnam dag pa// khams drug lha mo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams// stobs rnams khro bo lnga ste slar la yang ni nges par las
199b1(rgyud): kyi dbang po rnams ni gzhan pa'o// thun brgyad tsa mun Da la sogs pa rnams ste dus sbyor nyi ma'i chu tshod pad ma'i mda' gnas rnams// zla ba bcu gnyis lha min la sogs rnams ste pad me pal gnas chu tshod dbugs
199b2(rgyud): kyi grangs rnams kyis// gsang bar ma yi bdag po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag pa klu dang gtum mo rnams su 'gyur// da ltar rang bzhin yon tan dbang po las kyi bya ba rnam par dag pa 'dod ma la sogs rnams// sgra rnams
199b3(rgyud): ma lus grub pa nyid ste bsgra rnams ni dur khrod la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams so// de nyid gtso bo'i mtshon tshwa rnams ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang las khams rnams phyi yi phyag rgya rnams// rdo rje rnams ni nang gi phyag rgya
199b4(rgyud): rnams te thugs khar rdo rje 'dzin pa zla snying gnas pa ni// dpal ldan rdo rje can ste srid pa rnam gsum mi 'gyur ye shes sbyor ba sna tshogs yum du brjod// dpal ldan dag pa lngas ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par
199b5(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur// longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur ta rgyal ba'i bdag po sems can kun gyi don mdzad phyir// tu ra r+ya'i gnas skabs dang ni shin du gnyid log pa dang sku'i dbye ba gzhan dang
199b6(rgyud): sad pa rnams// da ltar sku'i dbye ba rnams kyis yod gnyis gnas ste srog chags rnams kyi lus la rnam pa bzhi// sprul pa yid dang lus dang ngag gi dbang po rnams kyi longs spyod byed pa po ru 'gyur ba'o// longs spyod rdzogs
199b7(rgyud): pa yon tan dbang las sems kyis mthong bar 'gyur te chos kyi sku ni gnyid log pa// dag pa 'di ni nyon mtshan dus su thig la gsum nyid grol ba'i mtha' ru bde bar 'gyur ba yis// de phyir rnal 'byor pa yis nyin
199b8(rgyud): mtshan dus la de nyid sgom par bya ba mi 'gyur ba yi don du'o// gang zhig g.yon nas srog nyid rab tu rgyun de bzhin g.yas su bskum par 'gyur ba ni// g.yon brkyang 'dug stangs brjod de de ltar ma dang nyi ma rgyu ba mnyam
200a1(rgyud): @dang g.yas brkyang 'dug spangs so// sa ga zlum po dag dang nges par mchog tu rab tu rol pa rnams dang pad ma'i rdo rje'i 'dug stangs rnams// mnyam dang mi mnyam la gnas nam mkha' la sogs srog
200a2(rgyud): gi rlung lnga rnams ni rab tu rgyu ba'o// gtum mo lta ba'i 'khor lo log 'gro dgu yis bsgyur ba tsa ror tsi ka la sogs pa lhag pa'i lha// dbus kyi ho yig ye shes klog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa'i ya shes mA yis rab tu sad pa las
200a3(rgyud): mi yi bdag po lte bar nges par snang mdzad sogs dang spyan ma sogs ni mig la sogs pa rnams// thams cad bsregs te spyi bo'i zla bzangs la 'dzag thig la'i gzugs gyur gang zhing rdo rje nyid du ste// shes rab chos 'byung
200a4(rgyud): la gnas thig le slas de bzhin nges par ma lus spro bar bya ba ste// rgyan rnams sna tshogs dang ldan pa las me long nang gnas lta bu ye shes 'khor lo rab tu 'byung // 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang rnams te srid pa rnam
200a5(rgyud): pa gsum po rim pas sbyang bar bya// phyi nas ye shes 'bar bas srid gsum ma lus lan cig gis ni nges par 'gugs byed pa'o// zla ba nyi ma a sogs ka sogs rnam gsum 'gro 'gyur sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bzlas
200a6(rgyud): pa ste// so sor sdud pa l-i sog drug gis gsar bzang pad mar sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sbyor ba dang // rdo rje gsum bsgoms byas pas dga' ba la sogs rdo rje la ni chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa'o// shes rab chu skyes la ni
200a7(rgyud): thugs kyi thig le lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i dbang las gzhom du med par bsgom// bsnyen po bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams kyang sngags bzlas la sogs rnams kyis so// so sor sdud sogs rnams ni rdo
200a8(rgyud): rje pad ma las skyes bdud rtsi yi ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum gyis chu skyes ro mnyam gyur par bsgom pa sgrub par 'gyur ba'o// shes rab dang 'dus 'dzag med yang dag 'gyur ba phra
200b1(rgyud): mo'i rnal 'byor nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur// dang por stong pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur te slar yang de nas zla ba'i thig le sdud pa'o// gzugs bskyed pa dang de nas rab mchog ro yi rigs la yi ge rnams ni bkod pa
200b2(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur// chu gtar rdo rje 'di ni spyi'i bsnyen par 'gyur te gzhan yod sgrub pa zhes pa dbu ma'o// 'di ni sI dang 'khregs pa thabs ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur de bzhin bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i yan lag brjod// so sor sdud nga rgyal
200b3(rgyud): po'i dbang po nyid dang bsam gtan mi bskyod pa dag rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur// srog sdud pa ni ral gri can dang 'dzin pa rin po che'i phyag can dag kyang rnam pa bcu// rdol pa rjes su dran pa pad ma 'dzin pa yang ni 'gyur te dpal
200b4(rgyud): ldan ting nge 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// de nas slar yang/ dz+wal yang lnga'i dbye ba rnams kyis a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis dbye// so sor sdud pa yul dang yul can rnam pa bcu po 'brel pa rnams kyis rab tu mi 'jug nyid
200b5(rgyud): shes rab rtog pa dang ni spyod pa dga' ba mi 'gyur blang ba'i rtse gcig sngams ni bsam gtan no// srog nyid rtsol bas lan gnyis nyams par 'gyur gyi bar du bya ste dbus mar srog rnams bzhug pa'o// thig le ru ni sgrog
200b6(rgyud): zhugs pa ste gnyis ka'i 'gro ba gzhom zhing rtse gcig semasu byed 'dzin pa'o// gang zhig lta bar gtum mor gyur pas nges par lus dang nam mkha' ru ni rjes su dran par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis
200b7(rgyud): ni mi 'gyur bde ba'i dbang las ye shes sku ni ting nge 'dzin// de ltar chung ngu la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum ni rnam gsum 'gyur ba'i dbang las skabs
200b8(rgyud): gsum zhes bya yang dag rtog pa bzang po rnams// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral zhing sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mo yi bdag po bdag po bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pas mngon
201a1(rgyud): par shes pa lnga rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o// srog dang stsol ba dag pas ri bong can nyid bral nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod par byed// 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis bdud dang nyon mongs
201a2(rgyud): la sogs tshogs rnams rab tu btsem nas stobs bcur zhugs pa'o// rjes dran rab tu dag pas dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ni ye shes gzugs su 'gyur// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pas cung
201a3(rgyud): zad nyin zhag rnams kyis ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud sogs rnams kyis sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dngos grub gal te thob par ma gyur na// sgra tsam goms na rdo rje nor bu'i thig lnga chu skyes 'gro ba
201a4(rgyud): stobs kyis bzung ste sgrub par bya// bsnyen pa dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yis nam mkhar rnam bcu 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta stangs kyis// nye bar bsgrubs la 'gegs mthar byed kyi lta stangs kyis ni bdud rtsa'i gnas su gyur
201a5(rgyud): po yan lag drug/ shes rab las skyes zla ba'i thig le yis kyang rdo rje nor bu 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub par 'gyur// bde ba mi 'jigs rtse gcig zhi ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sbyor 'di sgrub pa chen po'i'o// srog sdud pa
201a6(rgyud): yis kun nas pad mnyam 'bras bu ster ba spyi bo'i bar ni de srid 'dod pa ste// de las steng du 'dod pa min pa phung po nges par nyams nas 'chi bas 'jigs par byed pa'i rgyu// gtsug gter dbye ba byas te bde ba dam pa'i/ 
201a7(rgyud): gnas su nges par sbyor bas 'gro bar bya ba'o// phung po dngos po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni baide mnyam 'gro ste 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams 'phya// dbu mar srog ni rab rab bzhug pa dang yul dang rnam por bral ba'i sna tshog
201a8(rgyud): yum la mkhyud pa ste// rang gi rdo rje pad mar bzhug cing spro dang de bzhin zla nyi dbus su rab tu gzhug pa'o// bde ba'i sa bon ma ltung ba las shin du bde bar 'gyur 'di rnal 'byor pa yis rdo rjer rnal 'byor ro// sgrus
201b1(rgyud): par bya ba phyag rgya'i don du gtso bo'i mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang chen las gsang chen// gtsug gtor du ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa ru 'gyur te gzhan yang de bzhin rtse mo gnyis 'gyur ni// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rjer 'gyur te gzhan
201b2(rgyud): yang nyes 'gyur nyid dang de las gzhan yang nyes 'gyur dang // de yi gzhan la nyis 'gyur yin te lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul 'khor rnams su'o// gsang ba'i pad ma'i dbus gnas pa dang de rnams dbus
201b3(rgyud): su rtse gcig pa rnams pad mnyam 'bras bu ster// rnal 'byor pa yis srog gcod pa ste srog rlung nyin mtshan 'jig par byed pa de la gsungs pA'o// gang zhig zhal gyi sgra rnams sems la rab 'jug 'gyur ba de ni brdzun
201b4(rgyud): du smra ba'i tshig nyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa nyid sgrub pa rnal 'byor pa rnams gang zhig ma byin len par gsungs// badri ba'i thig la ma ltung bar du gyur pa gzhan gyi bu mo 'dod chags ma bral bas// 
201b5(rgyud): srog bsdus pa'i me yis ri bong can las zhu ba'i btung ba rnams ni tshang gi btung ba'o// mthe bo'i tshigs na so gtsug gtor ba re la chos kyi dbang las nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ba dang // slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni sor
201b6(rgyud): mo rnams la nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru 'di nyid 'gro ba ste// gang zhig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor de la nges par nyin mtshan so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// sems dang 'dod dang yan lag tsha dang pad ma'i zhal mchog
201b7(rgyud): rab tu bskams dang zas mi zhim pa dang // 'dar ba dang ste skyo dang rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang rab tu brgyal ba ltar// rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rnam bcu po rnams rab gsal srog chags lus kyi
201b8(rgyud): gnas skabs te// 'jig rten du ni de rnams yid bsrungaso ba las rgyal ba gang dang gang 'dod nges par rab tu 'byung // gang zhig thig la dkar po'i rgyun rnams nyin mtshan bdag la dbab pa chang ste tshang gzhan cung
202a1(rgyud): @zad min/ mig la sogs pa nyin mtshan so sor 'phrog pa sha sta go ku la sogs sha gzhan cung zad min// bsnyen pa dag la rang rigs sar gnas lha rnams dag pa'i sku ni bdud rtsi lnga rnams spen
202a2(rgyud): pa'o// stong par sems ni zhugs pas ro mnyam bde bas khyab pa 'khrig pa yin te skye gnas ma yin te// nor rnams spangs pa sbyin pa yin te bud med dang ni 'dus kyang sems mi 'dzag pa tshul khrims so// sgra sogs
202a3(rgyud): rnams la mi 'jug bzod pa yin te gnyis 'gro ba'i rlung 'jig pa ni brtson 'grus so// lhan cig skyes der gyur dang 'gro kun thams cad sems dang skad shes pa dag bsam gtan shes rab ste// de las sems can
202a4(rgyud): don dang rdzu 'phrul srid 'joms pa dang skye med thob pa rnams mdzad pa// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas 'di ni srin po la 'gro'i rigs bsgoms pas ni 'grub par byed// dkar pos zhi ba dang ni rgyas
202a5(rgyud): par byed de rang gi yid la dmar pos dgug dang dbang du byed// sar pos rangs dang rmongs pa la ste srin nag dang mtshungs 'od kyis gsod dang bskyod par byed pa ste// bsgoms dang bzlas pa de bzhin kho nar rang rang
202a6(rgyud): yid la bya ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// 'byung po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi dbye ba rnams kyis sgrub// zla phyed gnyis lhag pa las byung ba gsar mtshungs g.yas pa dang ni
202a7(rgyud): gcig shos phyeg dag gis// glang po'i lpags pa mtha' dag bshus pa'i rkang lag gnyis nas 'dzin par byed pa phung po'i bdud nyid de// dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa phyag mchog 'thil gnas lha'i bu sna bdud mgo 'chi bdag dang
202a8(rgyud): bdud gnyis zhabs kyis mnan pa nyon mongs bdud ste gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du sgom// de'i yum ni zhal gcig gshin rje'i phyag gi pad ma gri gug dang ni dpal gyi thod pa'o// nyi ma zla ba rab tu rgyu ba'i dus
202b1(rgyud): su bgrod pa'i dbang gis bcu gnyis dang ni lhag pa gcig/ de phyir sku'i rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag po nyid dang sna tshogs yum dag de bzhin 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab yan lag ngo bos bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba nyi zla rab
202b2(rgyud): rgyu 'gog pa las// gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal dang phyag dang zhabs dang kha dog rnams ni du ma mun pa'i mtha'// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid dag dang zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa ni 'gog pas nges par bde mnyam ster// kun
202b3(rgyud): nas dri med nor bu dang mtshungs khyab byed la sogs rnams la stong pa gcig pu yis// thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus med yul mad yul ni sgrub pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'o// khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs la gnyis lhag rgyal
202b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa// spyan dmar dbu skra kham pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dbu rgyan mche ba rnon po rnam par gtsigs pa dang // sbrul gyis brgyan dang stag gi lpags pas sham thabs mchog byas khyab bdag
202b5(rgyud): bzhin du phyag na mtshon cha bsnams// kha dog lnga'i thod pa rnams kyis mgo la phrang ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rigs rnams so// dkyil 'khor la gnas sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma dag gi steng du dri med 'od 'phro'i sna tshogs mdog/ zhabs
202b6(rgyud): dag gis ni 'byung po'i mgon po stobs kyis shin du mnan te g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs// 'byung po lha min gdangs ka lha rnams la sogs skrag par byed dang ye shes skams pa gcig gyur pa// dur khrod
202b7(rgyud): gnas su song nas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams zla ba gcig tu sgom zhing sgrub par bya ba'o// klu rnams chu skyes mdab ma brgyad la gnas ste nyi ma'i steng du rgyal ba rnam rgyal 'gyel ba yi// gdangs ka'i bdag po gnyis dang pad
202b8(rgyud): ma'i mdab ma la gnas 'jug ma'i rtse mo rnams ni zhabs gnyis kyis// brtan par mnan pas srin gyi rigs rnams ma lus sdud pa las ni kun du spro bar byed pa yi// de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms nas nyin
203a1(rgyud): mtshan cung zad rnams kyis srin gyi tshogs rnams sgrub par bya// dbang po la sogs lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyis sgrub par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rdo rje can dang rang
203a2(rgyud): rlung rigs rnams so so'i dbang las las kyi dbye ba ma lus rnams// rangs dang zhi ba dang ni dbang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang gsod dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rnal 'byor ma rnams sum bcu drug dang bzlas dang
203a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg nges par rang gi sa bon rnams su 'gyur// zhi lde zhi ba'i bsam gtan lha rnams ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar la zhi ba'i gzugs nyid do// drag po la ni drag po'i bosam gtan lha rnams sprin nag nyid dang
203a4(rgyud): tu mtshungs pa'i drag po'i gzugs// dbang la chags pa dang ni bcas pa'i bsam gtan lha rnams nyin byed sku ste chags pa dang bcas gzugs// rengs pa la ni rmongs pa'i bsam gtan nyid de lha rnams ma lus
203a5(rgyud): gser mchog dang mtshungs gzugs// rgyal ba'i rigs dang sras bcas lha mo rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas pa sgrub par byed do mi bdag kyi// rang bzhin yon tan dbang dang khro bo las skyes rnams kyis dbye ba dang ni bskrad
203a6(rgyud): pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung po las skyes rnams kyis dbang la sogs pa nyid de gsal bar lha min rigs kyi phur bus gdab// yum gyi las rnams mA lus byed de gzhan yang rdo rje'i rigs kyis bsad pa dang ni
203a7(rgyud): gso ba'o// dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum bskyed mdzad 'bad pas sgrub par byas pa dang // phyi nas sa stangs gnas su gyur pa zhi ba la sogs las rnams gang zhig sgrub par bya ba ni// pha dang
203a8(rgyud): ma dag bral ba'i bu nyid grub par mi 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kun la grags// de phyir bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gnyis po sgrub par bya ba'i gzhan du las rnams 'grub pa min// gtso bo'i thugs ka'i
203b1(rgyud): pad ma'i dbus su ri bong can nyi ma rnams steng du rdo rje bgod bya ba// hUM yig ye shes las byung 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa'i rtse lnga pa ste 'od zer dang bcas pa// de'i dbus su dzaM yig las byung lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams
203b2(rgyud): kyis srid gsum mtha' dag gang byas nas// srid gsum dag par gyur pa'i ye shes 'khor lo bkug te rdo rje'i lam nas rab tu zhugs pa rnams// thams cad zla bzhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad mar sgo/ 
203b3(rgyud): bar byatad ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs yang dag ldan pa ste// de yi dbus su ya shas sa bon 'gyur ba rigs kyi dbang gis zhi ba la sogs las la'o// da las bskyed pa'i lha 'am lha
203b4(rgyud): mos rnal 'byor pa rnams li ni 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba'o// dza hUM baM hoHrnams las rim bzhin lcags kyi rdo rje rdo rje zhags pa dang ni dril bu rnams// oM A hUM ho rnams las gsungs pa bzhin du ri bong can nyid rdo rje gzhan
203b5(rgyud): yang de bzhin no// I ri u lI de bzhin gsal ba ra ya ra wa rnams las rlung dang ma dang chu dang sa// ha hUM haM phreng rnams las gsungs pa bzhin du nyi ma dang ni zla ba gri gug go/ zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su A li ka li dang ldan chu'i
203b6(rgyud): sa bon dngos las chu skyes sgom// de las bskyed pa'i zhal gcig lag pa'i pad ma zung dang zla ba'i kha dog dang ldan lha nyid ni// gling chen dkar la zhon pa phyag na chu skyes dkar po bsnams shing mi 'jigs pa stan bza'
203b7(rgyud): dkar// brgyan rnams dkar zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan pa bsgrub par bya ba'i khang par btad par bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzung ste slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu bzhug par bya// gtso bo'i
203b8(rgyud): bka' stsal rab tu thos nas spyan ma la sogs rab tu mnyes te bdud rtsi'i bu ma rnams kyis// bsgrub bya de la khrus gsol pa dang rab mchog nus ma rnam pa bcu pos mchod par byed pa'o// gzugs sogs rnams kyis/ 
204a1(rgyud): @rgyas par byed ste sgog mo la sogs bcu yis rab tu gsal bar mnyes par byed// brjod 'byung po rnams kyis mi 'jigs byed ste rab mchog khro skyes rnam pa bcu yis skyong bar byed// klu mo rnams kyis/ 
204a2(rgyud): 'o byed pa dang lha'i lnga bcom ste bcu gnyis rnams kyis mkhyud par byed// gtum mo rnams kyis srung bar byed ste sa stangs kun du zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i don du'o// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya bde ba dam par
204a3(rgyud): byed pa ma lus pa rnams bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hr-i las ud pa la kha ma bya ba'i mda' dang gur shing gzhu dag go// de las bskyed pa'i nyi ma lta bu 'jigs par byed pa'i mda' dang gzhu dag rna rtsar bkang
204a4(rgyud): bI yi// stag dang pad ma ri bong 'dzin la g.yon brkyang gnas pa bsgrub bya'i khang par btang bar byas pa yis// bsgrub bya'i snying ka dang ni lte ba gsang ba spyi gtsug kha rnams nyid la mda' yis bsnun byas ste// mgrin pa ga nu/ 
204a5(rgyud): yis bcings pas rab tu 'khrugs nas de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni khrid par byed pa'o// gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang phral byas pa dang slar yang ngas par klu mi rnams kyis bcing par byas// lha mo rnams kyis rgol bar byed ste/ 
204a6(rgyud): zo skyes rnams kyis rtun shin dbyug par bcas pas brdeg par byed// 'byung po rnams kyis bsdigs byed pa dang sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis sen mo rnon pos 'drad par byed// rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams par
204a7(rgyud): byad ste sa chu byin za rlung skyes rnams kyis bcings// nus ma rnams kyis gos dang nga rgyal ma lus phral nas gtso bo'i zhabs kyi drung du myos nas 'gyel// da ltar dbang du byas nas slar la yang ni gtso bos bsgrub bya de nyid mnyes
204a8(rgyud): por byed po ste// de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang sna tshogs rnams kyis dgug pa'i las su khams gsum rnams su 'gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin gnog dang ni mtshungs pa'i hUM yig ring las skyes pa'i
204b1(rgyud): ral gri sgrom// ne yis bskyed pa bung ba'i mdog 'dra phyag gis ral gri dang ni sdigs 'dzub phyag gis zhags pa ste// rnga mo'i steng na g.yon brkyang gnas cing rab tu khros pa'i zhal can bsgrub pa'i khang par gdang ba dang / 
204b2(rgyud): khros pa'i zhal dang bcas pas bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru 'khrid par byed// ya yIg las skyes 'gyogs pa'i rlung gis bskyon pa'i rnga me nyod la gtso bo'i bka' yis bsgrub byad// de la skyon
204b3(rgyud): bar byas nas ma dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor mtha' ru rab tu gtong bar byed pa ste// de ltar nges par lha'i dbang po yang ni bsgod por 'gyur na mi rnams la ni sme cid gos// dbye ba la yang rnga mo dang bral btsod par mang po byed cing
204b4(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon du 'gro bar bya// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su laM yig yongs su gyur pas 'khor lo ser po bsgom par byas nas ni// de nas bskyed pa'i zhal gcig gsar mchog dang mtshungs phyag na lcags sgrog dang ni 'khor
204b5(rgyud): lo bsnams pa yi// rus sgrol la ni lha min 'dug stangs nyid kyis gnas nas shin du dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khang par gtang // bsgrub bya la ni 'khor los bsdigs nas sa la rab tu bsgyel ste lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcis
204b6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis dkyil 'khor drung du nges par 'ongs te sa las bsgyel bar byas pa dang // gsar mchog lta bu'i lhun po dris par bsgrub bya de yi lus kyi steng du gnas par bya ba nyid// 'tshams drug rnams su phur
204b7(rgyud): bus gdab pa'i don du slar yang rdo rje lta bu rnams kyis gdab// sbrul gyis bzung nas 'gyel bar bsgoms pa rnams kyis shin du rmongs pa chen por bya ba bstan pa'o// nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i phreng
204b8(rgyud): las byung ba'i gri gug bsgom byas nas// de las bskyed pa'i gtum mo dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa'i phyag na gri gug dang ni nya phyis bsnams// g.yon pa brkyang zhing gos dang bral brta'i dgra'i steng du gnas pa bsgrub bya'i
205a1(rgyud): // khang par gdang byas nas// de yis bsrub bya'i spyanas myur du bzung nas gos dang bral ba dkyil 'khor du ni 'ongs pa dang // rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis dpal ldan dur khrod du ni khrid de ba rgod kha dang
205a2(rgyud): lce sbyang gis// yan lag kun gyi khrag rnams 'thung zhing sha yang zos ste de bzhin du ni khams rnams kun kyang ngo // de ltar sa'i steng du bsgrub bya'i ma lus rab mchog bsdad pa bsgom par bya ba'o// bsam gtan 'di
205a3(rgyud): yis brgya byin nyid kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes rnams smos ci dgos// rigs kyi dbang las chu yi sa bon las byung dkar po'i bsam gtan gyis ni zhi dang rgyas pas 'gyur// bsreg par byed pa mra
205a4(rgyud): sa bon rang bzhin las ni sku mdog dmar pos dbang dang dgug pa la// rlung gi sa bon rang bzhin las ni 'jigs pa'i sprin dang mtshungs pa dbye ba dang ni sprad pa ste// sa yi sa bon rang bzhin las byung gser mchog dang ni
205a5(rgyud): mtshungs pas rangs dang phur bus gdab sogs la// stong pa'i sa bon las ni sngon por snang dang ljang gu dag gis bsad pa la ni gso ba nyid// chu gter bgrod la kun nas zad par sa ste char gzhom zad par rlung du 'gyur
205a6(rgyud): ba'o// sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don du zad par me nyid 'gyur te me nyid gzhig pa'i don du ni// de bzhin zad par chu ru 'gyur te nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mi snang ba ni zad par stong pa'o// ma yi sa bon las byung gdong
205a7(rgyud): lnga pa'i bsam gtan gyis ni glang po'i bdag pos 'joms par byed pa'o// chu yi sa bon rang bzhin las ni zla bzangs dkar pos klu yi dbang po ma lus 'dul bar 'gyur ba nyid// rlung gi sa bon las ni rkang brgyad
205a8(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sprin dang mtshungs pas ral gri can dang sang ga 'bros// sa yi rigs kyi dbang las ral gri can gyis rta dgra la ste khro skyes rigs kyis srin po gzhom// rnal 'byor pa yis dang por dpal ldan sngags
205b1(rgyud): dang khyab bdag sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnams ni bsgrub par bya// phyi nas yon tan dbang las nyi ma dbye ba la gnas dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub pa na srid
205b2(rgyud): gsum gnas su cung zad kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur ba min par ngas// de phyir rang gi sems la rtog pa bral bas sngags dang gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya'o rgyal po kye// dpa' bo g.yul gyis ru bsad pa dag gam de bzhin
