205b3(rgyud): du ni rkun ma dpyangs pa nyid kyang rung // brgyad dam 'byung po'i mtshan mo dag la ro bsregs gnas su bum pa brgyad kyis khrus bya mi bdag kye// dri dang spos dang mar ma dang ni zhal zas sna tshogs pa dang me tog dmar po rnams
205b4(rgyud): kyis mchod// mgo dang snying kha spyi gtsug lte ba la sogs rnams su mchog gi rdo rje rnams ni bgod par bya// thab khung gru gsum gang zhig pad ma'i dbus su mtshan mar bcas pa brdul 'tshon dmar pos byas pa dang // phyogs kyi
205b5(rgyud): mdab mar rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshon ma de bzhin 'tshams su lha mos rang rang mtshan ma rnams// phyi rol du yang ri mo gsum dang dkyil 'khor phyogs 'tshams khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// de yi byang du yo dgas
205b6(rgyud): lag pa'i pad mar ral gri thogs pa dkyil 'khor las ni rkang pa lho// sngar gsungs pa yi de nyid skyon la rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung byas la// sngags pa rnams kyis thab khung dbus su khrag bcas
205b7(rgyud): sha rnams kyis ni sbyin bsreg rab tu bya ba ni// rdo rje 'dug stangs bcas te nges par lnga ri bzhin du g.yo bya med kyis mtshan byed na// oM hraM phreM hUM phaT kyi mthar gyur sngags rnams brgya la bcu yis bsgyur ba'i sbyin bsreg rab
205b8(rgyud): tu bya// sbyin bsreg rdzogs nas lha ni 'bar zhing 'dril ba ral gri bzhin dung mche ba rnon po spyan gsum po// gsal bar sgra bsgrogs byed cing rkang pa sa la rdebs par byed pa sgrub pa po la sdigs pa de// thab khung mtha' rug na
206a1(rgyud): nas lhang ljang rab tu dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed pa// de nyid sngags pas mthong bas 'jigs na sems nyams gyur pas skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro/ 
206a2(rgyud): sngags pa dur khrod gnas su dngos grub rgyu ru lha min dbang po la ni 'jigs par bya ba min// 'jigs pa med pa sems ldan mthong nas sgrub pa po la 'di skad 'byung po'i mgon gyis smra bar 'gyur// bdag ni rab tu grub
206a3(rgyud): pas da ni bdag gi da lta ci zhig bya ba smros shig dpa' bo kye// de skad brjod nas sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang gi yid la gang 'dod zhu bar bya// rag dang ral gri bcud lan dbang po dang ni bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ri lu gang
206a4(rgyud): 'dod mig sman dang // rkang byug dang ni rkang mgyogs rnams ste 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po bdag la khyod kyis gsol// 'byung po rnams ni dbye dang bskrad dang nges par rab tu 'joms dang rangs pa dang ni dgug dang
206a5(rgyud): dbang // dngos grub thams cad bdag gis thob par gyur cig brjod pas khyod kyis smras pa thams cad bdag gis bgyi// 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po rnams gang 'dod de ru 'gro ba mi yi bdag po kye// sa 'og
206a6(rgyud): dang ni nam mkha' sa yi steng gi ri rab ri dang rgya mtsho rnams kyi pha rol du// de la zhon nas ral gri phyag na thogs ste sa stangs gnas su 'jig rten byed par 'gyur// de phyir sems can don gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis lha
206a7(rgyud): min dbang po bsgrub par bya ba'o// lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ming gi yi ge dang pos thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// gsung rdo rje ni ming gi yi ga thams cad nyid ste de las lhag pa'i sku rdo rje'o// de nas yan lag so so'i
206a8(rgyud): sngags rnams rnam par rol rnams cung zad klags pas 'gugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba nyid kyi rigs kyi dbang las thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas bsgom bya mchod bya bzlas par bya// rigs rnams so so'i sngags la
206b1(rgyud): bya ba bzlas pas dngos grub ngas par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// de yi bcu chas sbyin bsreg bya ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang las ji srid grub pa'i bar nyid do// phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams kyi 'bras bu ster ste/ 
206b2(rgyud): gzhan du na ni 'grub par 'gyur ba min// bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin bsreg brtul zhugs nges par ldan pas sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya// mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ri lu grub pa lcags gsum rnams
206b3(rgyud): kyis bcings pas mkha' la spyod pa ster// khyi dang rta la sogs pa lus kyi bkris dang skom la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'joms// de rnams kyi ni mig dang 'khris pras mi mchog rnams kyis mig sman 'gyur bas sa 'og
206b4(rgyud): mthong ba dang // mi snang ba dang dbang dang lang tsho ma yi yid 'phrog ma rnams dpal ldan dur khrod du ni sgrub// nag po'i brgyad dam yang na shed bu'i nyin mtshan dag las mtshan mo dkyil 'khor bri bar byas pa dang // kun nas
206b5(rgyud): bsrung bar bya ste sha'i ri lu 'am ni mig sman de yi dbus su dgod par byas nas ni// shin du dri zhim me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod par byas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba ni// ji srid nam mkha' ru ni nyin zhag bzhin du
206b6(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro na de nas phyung ste blang bar bya// pho nya dang bcas srog gis mtsho ba nyid sta nam mkha'i phyogs gnas so yis btab pa 'chi bar 'gyur// pho nyas zhus pa mnyam na bde mang 'bras bu ster ste mi mnyam pa yis/ 
206b7(rgyud): 'chi bar brjod// pho nyas sbrul la sogs pa'i ming ni dang por sman sos btab de nyid nges par 'tsho ba thob// gang tshe srog 'jug pa la dris na dge ba yin te 'byung ba la ni mi dge ba ru 'gyur// pho nya'i rkang g.yon mdun du
206b8(rgyud): bzhag pa lang tshe ma ru bstan te g.yas pa mdun du bzhag pa skyes par shes// mi de'i lug pa rang gi lus kyi gang du rag par byed pa de yi phyogs su sos btab 'gyur// mig dang kha gdangs pa dang rna ba'i rtsa bar
207a1(rgyud): ri mo nag po byung na 'chi bar rab gsal brjod// gang tshe snying gi pad mar sgra nyid rlung zad gyur na de dag yang dag gzung bar bya ba ni// dang por bsrung ba'i cho ga bya ste sos btab pa dang bdag nyid 'ad
207a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ba yis// sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyang de bzhin mthe bong la sogs sbyar bar bya// la las sogs pa ha yi mthar thug rnams ni rim pas bla dang gsus pa snying kha kha dang dpral
207a3(rgyud): / hU~M k+Shu~M h+ya h+ya la sogs klu rnams bcu po mi mnyam mnyam pa thung dang ring ba'i dbye rnams kyis// lus kyi g.yon phyogs rna ba mgrin pa 'chan khung sku dang bla rnams thung ngu'i sa bon nyid du 'gyur// lus kyi g.yas phyogs rnams
207a4(rgyud): la ring po rnams su 'gyur te gdangs ka rnams ni skye 'jig sbyor bas so// rgyal ba'i sor bcas shin du mnyam par brkyang ba'i mdab la klu yi se bon ldan pas bsrung bar bya// hUM k+Sha ldan pas myur du bsnun na sos btab/ 
207a5(rgyud): pa ni g.yo bar 'gyur// dpral bar sa yi sa bon dang ni rkang pa la gnas mkha' las skyes kyis myur dude rengs par 'gyur// spyi bor chu yi sa bon rab tu zhugs pa dang gsung ma yis dug rnams med par 'gyur ba yin// 
207a6(rgyud): dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying khar ma yis nges par dug rnams 'pho bar byed// spyi bor stong pa'i sa bon rab zhugs pa dang rkang par sa gnas pa yis dug rnams rab tu gcod// dpral bar thig la dkar po
207a7(rgyud): bsams na dug ni rnam pa gsum yang dug mdangs par byed// dmar pos g.yo bar byed cing sprin nag mtshungs pas rab tu 'jug ste kha dog ser pos rengs par byed// tsha ba gsum gyis 'ad gus dril ba srog rab
207a8(rgyud): rgyu ba bcug ni dug rnams med par byed pa'o// kha ni rab tu gdangs ste lho chung 'phyang ba nyid la sor mos tshal de bzhin sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dza ti gzhu bum dang tsha ba gsum dang tshil lang ka la dang de pad li dang // 
207b1(rgyud): brah+ma ya bag k+Sha d+hA dri nyi byed ldan pa dang ni mog sham kar ko ti ka dang // gshang dang sha dang khu ba khrag mnyam pa yang mi bskyod pa yis sbyangs nas ri lu byas pa dang // sna ru byin pas 'byung po'am ni 'byung mo'i rigs
207b2(rgyud): brtan pa dang grang gro'i dag rnams 'joms// nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun rnams ni nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo'i dus la bdun gyi tshe yi mtha' ru ste// sngon po dang ni nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rgya bo rigs ldan 'chi gzugs chu tshod
207b3(rgyud): phyed nyid la// klu la brtse bar mi bya ba dang rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang bza' bar bya ba der ni min// de yi dus la sbrul gyi so sos bzung ba dang 'byung pos zin nam mtshon gyis phug ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro// nyi ma phyed dang
207b4(rgyud): nam phyed dang ni thi rengs dang sta nyi ma rgas pa rnams la de bzhin du// nyin mtshan du so la rtag tu gza' rnams rab tu bye bas 'chi bdag dus kyi chu tshod ste// stong pa rgya mtsho'i 'tshams kyi dbus su rigs ldan rab tu rgyu dus chu tshod
207b5(rgyud): gcig nyid longs spyod ste// 'di rnams la ni sgra gcan gdong pa yin par nyi ma r-i ra'i dus su yang dag rig par bya// nyin mtshan dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i cha la nyi ma dang ni mtha' yas dag gis longs spyod do// de nas lhag
207b6(rgyud): ma brang 'gro rnams kyi 'char ba 'di ni gza' bdun rnams kyis rab tu dbye bar 'gyur ba ste// mkha' 'tshams mkha' bug mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor rnams dang mkha' ri mkha' ma chu tshod rnams la ni// nyi ma la sogs
207b7(rgyud): gza' rnams dang ni gdangs ka rnams kyis nor gyi longs spyod dbyebaso nyid du 'gyur// mtha' yas dang ni rigs ldan gangs mtshungs bram ze'i rigs te nor rgyas dung skyong rgyal rigs kha dag dmar// pad mtshan po dang
207b8(rgyud): ni 'jog po dag kyang de bzhin rje rigs gser mchog dang ni mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma dmangs rigs sprin nag nyid dang mtshungs ste mthar skyes rigs dag sna tshogs mdog/ de nyid rnams kyi skye ba'i gnan
208a1(rgyud): @chu dang me dang sa dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams rnams so// mkha' lding rkang pa nas ni rkyed mthar ser po yin te de bzhin lte ba'i 'tshams su gangs dang mtshungs// mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po'i mdog dang
208a2(rgyud): mkhris shing lta bu'i smin ma'i bar nyid sprin nag mtshungs pa'o// de nas nges par sna tshogs mdog sto gdangs ka'i rigs ldan pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa// phyag rgya de nyid bsgoms pas gdangs ka'i dug dang
208a3(rgyud): 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa nges par 'joms par byed// rang gi snying ka'i pad ma'i steng du k+ShaM yig las ni 'dab chags mgon po bsgom byas nas// klu yi rgyan dang ldan pa mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang las kha dog rnam
208a4(rgyud): pa lnga ni 'phro ba'o// de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por oM dang de nas pak+Sha zhes brjod swA hA mtha'// bye ba gcig ni bzlas te gdengs ka'i rogs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po de nyid bsgrub
208a5(rgyud): par bya// bya khyud grub na klu rgyal gdengs ka'i dbang po sras bcas mngag gzhug nyid du rab tu 'gyur ba dang // 'byung po dang ni gnod sbyin gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams kyi rab mchogs steng du// sngags kyis
208a6(rgyud): bkug pas mtha' dag 'ongs par gyur nas dug gis bzung la smras pa ji bzhin byed pa yis// da phyir sems can don du dang por skyes bu rnams kyis mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya ba'o// rig byed dang ni mdab
208a7(rgyud): ma brgyad dang mi bdag so dang rgya mtsho drug dang gnyis skyes rnams las ni/ dbus su bsgrub bya rang phyogs dang por a zung dag ste i la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad nyid dang // a ya la sogs bcu drug rnams dang / 
208a8(rgyud): ka sogs bcu dang gsum gyis bsgyur ba dang ni ha k+Sha gnyis// thun 'tshams mdab mar bsgrub bya nyid ste tshes la dus kyis bsgyur ba rnams la la mthar dbyangs dang bcas// chu srin bum po la sogs re
208b1(rgyud): rI'i dpya las dbyangs dag ring ba dang ni thung bu lnga rnams so// phyi yi mdab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnams la rang gi snying kha rdo rje sna tshogs yi ge rnams// zhi ba la sogs lngas rnams la ni phyi nas de bzhin wa ya ra la rnams
208b2(rgyud): kyis bskor bar byo// dbang dang dgug laM yi ge yan lag mchog ni dbus su rkang pa me dang rlung du'o// zhi ba la sogs rnams la dbus su rkang pa ma yi dkyil 'khor du ni mgo bo sngags pas bri// sngags gsungs pa
208b3(rgyud): yi zhi dang rgyas pa dang ni srid 'joms pa dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang rnams dang // rengs dang rmongs par bcas pa rnams ni srid gsum gnas su 'khor lo 'di yis byed par 'gyur ba ni// 'dir ni bzlas dang
208b4(rgyud): sbyin bsreg rdo rje rnon po la sogs yi ge rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba'o// rtsibs brgyad pa dang rtsibs nyid bcu gnyis pa dang rtsibs ni bcu drug rnams kyis phyogs 'tshams la gnas pa// 'tshams rnams dang ni dbu
208b5(rgyud): suM bsgrub byar 'gyur stA ya ma ra dzA sa dro ma su NaM yo dang // dra naus dbus kyi rtsibs la da ru 'gyur te ni ra ya k+Shits+tsha dang de bzhin mtha' mar ni// o hriSh+Ti sta phyi nas rab tu brjod pa wi kri ta na na dang hUM nyid gnyis dang phaT/ 
208b6(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i ming dgar mig las ni ra mig bar du 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po sngags ni 'dir// dbye dang gsang dang dbang rnams la ni ya ra ru 'gyur sta k+Sha dang me do la sogs rnams// rangs dang dgug pa dang ni rmongs pa dang
208b7(rgyud): ste stobs yod byed dang zhi ba dang ni bslad rnams la// de nas dbus su yon tan dbang las ya yig dgod ste phyi rol thams cad snga ma nyid dang mtshungs// yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog la gang zhig mdun du rab tu/ 
208b8(rgyud): gyur pa'i dbyangs kyis mkhyud pa dang // yi ge rnams kyi sde tshan mtha' yi yi ge lnga rnams rdo rje rigs kyi do'ang las bdag por bstan// shes rab thig la gnyis te dbyings yig mchog tu gyur pa'i 'phe rom 'di
209a1(rgyud): / dag bdag gi u yig brjod// maM muHha hU/ saM su mdzum dza rnams ni nor mdapa las ste phyi rol nyi ma'i mdab ma la// shri badz+ra ShA nyid rab tu yin te sa dang bcas pa'i man ta b+ha tra trUM phaT te// 'dir ni lci/ 
209a2(rgyud): bar bsgrub bya ming dang sa man ta dang a mu ka ste ku ru tshegs kyis bskul// de bzhin sngar gsungs pa yi 'khor lo rnams la rtag tu bsgrub pa'i ming rnams bri bar byas pa na// 'di nyid rnams kyis mi rnams kun la
209a3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po bka' dang bdag gi drin gyis 'grub par 'gyur// mi mchog gang zhig rnams kyis snying kha'i gnas su 'gyur dang sgra ni rna ba'i bug par thos byed pa// de ni mi rnams sems nyid yang dag ro
209a4(rgyud): mnyam gcig tu gyur pa'i sbyor bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// 'jig rten rnams su gson pos sgra rnams gang zhig smras pa thos pa dang ste khyab bdag rnam shes kyis// rnam par shes ring por gnas pa yang ni
209a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste khyab bdag gi/ dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya ste kha phye ba dang so rnams phan tshun du ni reg pa min pa dang // bdud rtsi ldan byas nas ni ro dang rlung rnams bkug ste lte ba'i dbus su ga
209a6(rgyud): gzhug byas na// mchog gi lus la yang dag 'gags nas yang dag rdung ba dang ni lhogs dang skom dang dug rnams 'joms// dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bsams nas bdud rtsi
209a7(rgyud): rnams ni 'jog par byed// kha btsum pa ru byas nas phyir song rlung rnams mtha' dag sna'i bug rnam pa gnyis nas ni// srog nyid stobs kyis mgyogs par rab bkug dri med klog mtshungs thur rgyu'i rlung dang yang dag
209a8(rgyud): sprad de gzung // rnal 'byor goms pa'i dus su zla ba nyi ma dag ni ma yi dbus su ro mnyam 'gyur ba ste// lus la zas la sogs pa'i bkres pa dang ni skom pa 'joms shing 'chi ba med pa ster bar byed// snang ba
209b1(rgyud): la gnas nyi m+b+ha las ni gzhan du phyogs te rang grib phyogs su brtan pa'i lta bas blta// phyi nas nam mkha' la ni mngon bltas pa las skyes bus ro mnyam pa yi du ba'i mdog sogs mthong // rnal 'byor zla drug goms pa gan
209b2(rgyud): pa'i sa yi bug pa rnams las mthong bar 'gyur// yang na ljon shing grib ma las ni rab tu zhugs nas nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i 'phreng ba bsgom// srog gi bum pa gang zhig lte ba'i dbus gnas bcu gnyis mtha' dang
209b3(rgyud): cha yi mtha' yis gnas gzhan 'gro// de ni lte ba'i gnas nas dri med klog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs kyis yang drag langs nas ni// 'khor lo las ni 'khor lo'i mtha' rungs par dal ba mdzes par 'gro ba dbus
209b4(rgyud): ma'i rtsar song nas// ji srid stobs kyis spyi gtsug phye nas phyi yi lpags pa 'bugs par byed pa khab nyid bzhin du ste// dus dar rtsol ba dang bcas mchog gi stobs kyis steng gi lam du yang dag phul bar byas pa yis// spyi gtsug
209b5(rgyud): nges par phug nas zung gi rlung rnams 'gag ste gzhan gyi lus su 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni// de nyid rdo rje mthu yis yid kyi spyod yul de nas gzhan la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // gzhan yang mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid la
209b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni sna tshogs yum du brjod pa'o// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkhar sems nyid ma long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du ste// dri med mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed bsa'
209b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnams snang gyur pa// phyi dang lus rnams la ni tha dad med par yul dang bral ba'i snang ba tsam ni nam mkhar gnas// 'gro ba du ma'i sems kyi gzugs la sems nyid kyis ni mkhyud par byed ste de dag
209b8(rgyud): gcig pa'o// las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcos sems g.yangs byed ste ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas// yang dag spangs ste rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog bskyed byeng phyag rgya bzang po bsgom pa ni/ 
210a1(rgyud): @#gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkhas mtshungs rnal 'byor pa yis go bya ba// lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rdzas khyab
210a2(rgyud): pas// rdul phran dngos po med na rnam shes nyid ste de bzhin srid gsum med na rnam par shes pa min// sangs rgyas nyid la shes pa cung zad gnas pa min zhes tshig ni ston 'gyur sangs rgyas pa rnams ste// mi rnams
210a3(rgyud): gang gis 'gyur med bral ba'i stong nyid bral ba'i stong nyid bzung ba na ni stong par mi 'gyur bas// de phyir gtso bos 'dzag mod gang zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i sku yi bde bar sngags kyi theg par gsungs// ba lang bas rta glang
210a4(rgyud): po mgon po rnams kyi gzugs kyi mchod sbyin dbang po yul la 'gro dus su// gang zhig yul dang yul can shes pa de nyid 'gog pa'i rnal 'byor nyid la mchod sbyin zhes su brjod// blo ldan 'gyur ba gang zhig rnams kyis khrag
210a5(rgyud): bcas 'khris shing khu ba ba lang lpags sngo 'thung 'gyur pa// de nyid kun 'gro bde byed gzugs ste spyi bo nas byung zla ba'i bdud rtsi bA ga'i khrag bcas pa// tshangs pa sku dang dbang phyug gsung dang khyab 'jug thugs sde de bzhin
210a6(rgyud): srog rnams kyi ni rig byed gsum// oM yig rigs gsum yin te de ltar yon tan gsum ni ri bong can dang nyi ma byin za'i rtse// yon tan la gnas srid gsum nyid ni lus ste rigs gzhan las byung sgra tsam gyis ni gzug
210a7(rgyud): can nyid/ de nyid dbus na gzhom du med pa gang zhig yul dang bral zhing yon tan med par 'gyur med pa'i// rnal 'byor de nyid rig byed mtha' las gsang bar sngon du tshangs pas nges par rab tu bstan pa las// dus kyis
210a8(rgyud): shes pa rab tu nyams nas thub pa rnams kyis srog chags rnams la 'tshe ba bstan pa ste// mi rnams mtho ris don du de la 'jug 'gyur ba rnams 'bras bu ngan pa dmyal bar 'gyur ba ni// 'di ltar sol ba'o ma yi rgyun/ 
210b1(rgyud): la gnas nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te rang grib phyogs su brtan pa'i lta bas blta// phyi nas nam mkha' la ni mngon bltas pa las skyes bus ro mnyam pa yi du ba'i mdog sogs mthong // rnal 'byor zla drug goms pa gan
210b2(rgyud): pa'i sa yi bug pa rnams las mthong bar 'gyur// yang na ljon shing grib ma las ni rab tu zhugs nas nam mkha'i mthil du thig la'i 'phreng ba bsgom// srog gi bum pa gang zhig lta ba'i dbus gnas bcu gnyis mtha' dang
210b3(rgyud): cha yi mtha' yis gnas gzhan 'gro// de ni lte ba'i gnas nas dri med klog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs kyis yang drag langs nas ni// 'khor lo las ni 'khor lo'i mtha' rungs par dal ba mdzes par 'gro ba dbus
210b4(rgyud): ma'i rtsar song nas// ji srid stobs kyis spyi gtsug phye nas phyi yi lpags pa 'bugs par byed pa khab nyid bzhin du ste// dus dar rtsol ba dang bcas mchog gi stobs kyis steng gi lam du yang dag phul bar byas pa yis// spyi gtsug
210b5(rgyud): nges par phug nas zung gi rlung rnams 'gag ste gzhan gyi lus su 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni// de nyid rdo rje mthu yis yid kyi spyod yul de nas gzhan la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // gzhan yang mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid la
210b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni sna tshogs yum du brjod pa'o// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkhar sems nyid ma long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du ste// dri med mdog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed pas 'a
210b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnams snang gyur pa// phyi dang lus rnams la ni tha dad med par yul dang bral ba'i snang ba tsam ni nam mkhar gnas// 'gro ba du ma'i sems kyi gzugs la sems nyid kyis ni mkhyud par byed ste de dag
210b8(rgyud): gcig pa'o// las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g.yangs byed ste ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas// yang dag spangs ste rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog bskyed byed phyag rgya bzang po bsgom pa ni/ 
211a1(rgyud): gyur pa ste// 'di rnams kyis ni 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur ba yis de nas 'dod pa sbyin pa mdzad// gsang ba po yi sbyin pa de yis rgyal bskyed mdzad rigs pa rnams la sangs rgyas nges par
211a2(rgyud): bskyed// zangs kyi gser dang mtshungs te 'ching bu kartsi ra dum bu byin pas lha dbang dbu brgyan nor bu mtshungs// smad 'tsheng ma yi 'dod pa'i sbyin pas lha rigs bu mo yin ta lpags du ma byin pas lte ba dang // bung bus
211a3(rgyud): rta yis mchog ste rang yig glang po'i mchog tu gyur pa gang zhig rnyed par 'gyur// chung ma bin pas lha mo rgyal bskyed par byed pa'i rigs nyid de 'dir ci yi phyir mi thob// byams pa sems can ma las dbye bar med pas
211a4(rgyud): gnyen la sbyin par mi bya bde mnyam 'bras ster med// btang snyoms la gnas rgyal ba mchog gi rigs dang bdud kyi sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dbyar med bya// snying rje dga' ba dang bcas dman pa'i sems can dam pa
211a5(rgyud): zung dag gnas la rab tu sbyin byas na// tshogs gnyis dag ni rab rdzogs mi zad bde ba'i 'bras thob gzhan gyi don ni byed par gsheg par 'gyur// rang rig so tsho mar gyur ba 'i byud na ni tsad pa 'gyu ro mi bdag kye// gagi gibyed na 'gyu de'i brag su chod
211a6(rgyud): shi yun/ gi chod sbyin tshad mar 'gyur na de yi phyugs dang mi rnams sna tshogs gsod pa tshad mar 'gyur// gang gi gsod pa tshad mar 'gyur na sdig pa'i dbang gis de yi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa tshad mar 'gyur// 
211a7(rgyud): dpal gyi gtsug log khang de rab tu gnas bya bzhi yis gsol ba ra bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o// sman dang zas rnams sbyin par grags pa nad rnams zhi bar byed pa der ni sbyin pa po yis sbyin// sbyin pa med
211a8(rgyud): pa'i gtsug lag khang rnams 'di ltar sa stongs gnas su 'gyur bar byol song rnams kyi gnas kyi gnas// gang na dge 'dun gsol ba yod pa de na chos dang sangs rgyas dag bzhugs mi yi bdag po kye// sangs
211b1(rgyud): rgyas chos brgya dge 'dun la ni mi rnams skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba thar pa'i rgyu nyid ste// 'dir ni gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang ni bris pa'i po ti 'di rnams chos brjod dang // dur smrig 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis khyab
211b2(rgyud): bdag bde ba mchog gyur skye ba 'bum gyis ster ba min// sangs rgyas slob dpon nyid ste chos ni sa mchog steng du yis bstan pa rnams la bya ba'o// dge 'dun gang zhig de ru gnas pa'i sems can rnams la rjes su brtse bas sem
211b3(rgyud): mnyes byed pa ste// de nyid 'dir ni rnam pa bzhi gsungs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te nyan thos dang ni bla med dag/ dge slong ma dang dge slong pha dag rnams dang 'di ni dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma rnams dang // rnal 'byor dang ni rnal
211b4(rgyud): 'byor mo dang nges par lhan cig skyes dga' dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma// bsod nams ye shes don du rgyun mi chad par rnam pa sna tshogs shin du 'dod pa sbyin pa ni// nyan thos rnams la chos ston nyid ste mchog tu
211b5(rgyud): bde byed 'dod pa sbyin pa rnal 'byor pa rnams la// ster ba po yis rab tu chags pa'i sems dang kun nas dang ba'i sems kyis gang la byin 'gyur na// de yis bsod nams ye shes rdzogs nas skye ba 'di la mchog tu
211b6(rgyud): bde ba'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// slob dpon rgyal ba dres par smon par byed 'gyur rab tu mi shes pa yi nyan thos gang zhig rnams// de ni mchog tu 'jigs byed bgags kyi rgyal po rnams kyi bsad snga mnar med pa
211b7(rgyud): ni myur du 'gro// gang dag sngags kyi mthu yis bdag nyid byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa rgyal po'i dbang po mchog tu'o// brtul zhugasungs pa la gnas tshangs pa ro skyed pa'i dge slong de dag mtshungs pa'i me nyid med pa ste/ 
211b8(rgyud): mchog gi bde ba 'dod pas dka' ba ma lus spyod pa'i dge slong ngam ni kun du rgyu ba dang // gcer bu dang ni skra bregs ral pa cen dang thos dang klog la dga' dang mkhas pa lam 'jigs pas// 'dir ni byed pa po dang
212a1(rgyud): bdag dang rang gzhan 'dzin dang rtag tu bu dang chung mar 'dzin pa dang // gza' dang gza' men rigs dang rigs min rnams la dga' ba dang ni snod dang sdod min rnams su 'dzin pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing du
212a2(rgyud): bde mnyam 'bras bu sangs rgyas rab star sku dang gsung dang thugs chags pa// 'di rnams rab tu spangs par byas nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan dag mthong 'gyur te// zho dang khrus kyis gnas dang yul gzhan/ 
212a3(rgyud): rnams su brtul zhugs bsnang ba dang bcas ri las 'tshong pa dang// g.yul dang nyi ma bzung mtshan dang ni me la zhugs na yul gyi bde ba rnams la 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du 'di rnams ma lus bdud kyi mthu yis khrag
212a4(rgyud): rnams ma lus 'thung ba'i don du brjod pa ste// mtho ris thob phyir khrus gnas rnams su bsnyung dang 'chi bar 'gyur dang de bzhin g.yul du 'joms pa dang // ba lang nyi ma 'gro bar 'dod dang khyim dang nor dang yul dang / 
212a5(rgyud): bram ze'i ched du shi bar byed// de phyir gzhan yang bad mnyam la gnas bya ba'i don du rang gi lus 'di bsrung bar bya ba'o// gang zhig dbang rnams blang bar byas nas rgyud kyi rgyal po thos nas rgyal po'i spyod pa byed pa yis
212a6(rgyud): phyi nas phra dog byed na de nyid dmyal ba brgyad pa'i bar nyid du ni 'jug par 'gyur ba ste// mi dge ba yi 'bras bu'i dbang las khab kyi rtse mo'i sa gzhi gang yin dmyal bar yang dag rgyu// de phyir mi rnams ji srid phra dog sems
212a7(rgyud): ni yod pa'i bar du dbang rnams blang bar mi bya'o// rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pa dang brjod dang brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang
212a8(rgyud): smon lam stobs dang ye shes rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs byed pa// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis chung ma byin pas skye ba 'di la myur du'o// de nas rmongs pa gang zhig de la zhan par byed pa
212b1(rgyud): rnams dmyal bar myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// mnga' ris dpal mo'i don du yang ba'i sems ldan ma bzod nas ni ral gri rnon po bzung ba nyid// glang po zhon pa la sogs rab tu dpa' ba yan lag bzhi rnams
212b2(rgyud): kun nas g.yul du zhugs pa na// glang chen la sogs tshogs rnams mthong ste 'jigs pas de yi lag pa'i 'thil nas ral gri lhung ba na// de yi ral gri nyes pa med pa ji lta ba bzhin sngags kyi rigs kyang nges par
212b3(rgyud): de bzhin no// sngags pa rnams kyis dpa' bo'i rim pas lha man gdangs ka' lha rnams drag po'i sa ru rab bsgrub bya// rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pas dam chog rigs rnams lha mo bzlas dang bsam gtan sbyin
212b4(rgyud): bsreg bcas rnams kyis// sngags pas dga' ba chen po dang bcas dag pa'i sems kyis rgyun mi 'tshed par dbang rnams rim pas bgrod// de yis 'dir ni gang gi shes pa yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i rgyal po'i
212b5(rgyud): lam la rab 'jug 'gyur// dngul chu'i dgra ni me ste ma dang rnam par bral ba'i dngul chu bcings pas stengs gnas na med// ma bcings par ni gsar gyi byed pa min ste gsar dang bral na gsar 'gyur mkhan gyi
212b6(rgyud): longs spyod med// de ltar bud med sbyor dang bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor payi sems ni 'ching ba med par 'gyur// ma bcings pa yis 'bugs pa med de ma phug lus kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'dir ster
212b7(rgyud): min// zhi ba'i sngags rnams re 'am skye bo dang ni ri dgas bral bar bsgrub par bya// drag po drag po'i dur khrod rnams su bya ste lha mchog gnas su rangs pa dang ni rmongs pa'o// dbang dang dgug pa'i sngags
212b8(rgyud): rnams khyab bdag mchog tu bde ba'i phyag rgya kun dang rab tu 'dus pa'i sar// mi rnams nyid kyis gnas gzhan dang ni skye ba gzhan du skye ba 'bum gyi dngos grub star mi 'gyur// khyim dang gling du nyin mtshan
213a1(rgyud): du su phreng ba dang bcas sngags kyi bzlas pa byas par gyur na yang // ngal bar zad da rmongs pas chags dang rnam par bral bar smra yang 'di la sngags kyi dngos grub med// shin du
213a2(rgyud): rmongs pas stong pa la sogs gnas dang dus dag gang gis yang dag 'di ltar mi shes pa// rkang pa'i sor mo na pa nyid la mgo la sman rnams kyis ni rab tu yug par byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang ni sngags
213a3(rgyud): bzlas byed pa dang ste gzhan yang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang 'dug stangs dang // sbyin bsreg sngags bzlas rab gnas rnams dang rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan dang gshegs gsol
213a4(rgyud): dang // phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnams la khyab bdag bde ba mchog 'gyur bud med rab 'dus bral bas ster ba min// de phyir de nyid nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i don du rab tu bsgrub par
213a5(rgyud): bya// brgyal ba dang ni gnyid la rab zhugs pa la rang gi sems ni rang bzhin med do mi bdag kyi// sad pa'i rang bzhin rab tu gsal bar gyur pa da ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// dngos dang
213a6(rgyud): dngos med dang bral rnams kyis rnal 'byor rnams la thugs rdo rje la sogs pad mnyam 'bras star med// gang zhig shes rab la mkhyud rang gi sems la lan cig skyes pa'i bde mnyam 'gyur ba mthar
213a7(rgyud): ster ro// oM AHhUM/ ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu dag bya spel bar bya ba dang // rab tu sbar bya nyid dang ri bod tsAn zhu lta bu ma lus rim pas chang la bsgom byas la// snod
213a8(rgyud): de las ni nges par ri bong can gyi lag pa'i ming mad rtsa mos sa la thig le nyid// nyi phyed dang ni mtshungs pa'i dbus su zlum pa yin ta da yi phyi ru gru gsum byas pa la// da yi dbus su ye shes 'khor
213b1(rgyud): rnams dmyal bar myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// mnga' ris dpal mo'i don du yang ba'i sems ldan ma bzod nas ni ral gri rnon po bzung ba nyid// glang po zhon pa la sogs rab tu dpa' ba yan lag bzhi rnams
213b2(rgyud): kun nas g.yul du zhugs pa na// glang chen la sogs tshogs rnams mthong ste 'jigs pas da yi lag pa'i 'thil nas ral gri lhung ba na// da yi ral gri nyes pa med pa ji lta ba bzhin sngags kyi rigs kyang ngas par
213b3(rgyud): de bzhin no// sngags pa rnams kyis dpa' bo'i rim pas lha man gdangs ka'i lha rnams drag po'i sa ru rab bsgrub bya// rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pas dam tshig rigs rnams lha mo bzlas dang bsam gtan sbyin
213b4(rgyud): bsreg bcas rnams kyis// sngags pas dga' ba chen po dang bcas dag pa'i sems kyis rgyun mi 'chad par dbang rnams rim pas bgrod// de yis 'dir ni gang gi shes pa yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i rgyal po'i
213b5(rgyud): lam la rab 'jug 'gyur// dngul chu'i dgra ni me ste ma dang rnam par bral ba'i dngul chu bcings pas stengs gnas na med// ma bcings par ni gsar gyi byed pa min ste gsar dang bral na gsar 'gyur mkhan gyi
213b6(rgyud): longs spyod med// de ltar bud med sbyor dang bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yi sems ni 'ching ba med par 'gyur// ma bcings pa yis 'bugs pa med dam phug lus kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'dir ster
213b7(rgyud): min// zhi ba'i sngags rnams ri 'am skye bo dang ni ri dgas bral bar bsgrub par bya// drag po drag po'i dur khrod rnams su bya ste lha mchog gnas su rangs pa dang na rmongs pa'o// dbang dang dgug pa'i sngags
213b8(rgyud): rnams khyab bdag mchog tu bde ba'i phyag rgya kun dang rab tu 'dus pa'i sor// mi rnams nyid kyis gnas gzhan dang ni skye ba gzhan du skye ba 'bum gyi dngos grub ster mi 'gyur// khyim dang grong du nyin mtshan
214a1(rgyud): du 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa la gsungs pa ste// byis pa rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du sna tshogs gtso bos snying
214a2(rgyud): mchog gis sbas pa'o// de phyir de nyid dbye ba byas la nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya sgrub pa'i don du rgyal mchog skyed par byed pa gzhom du med pa dus kyi
214a3(rgyud): 'khor lo'o// de ltar dpal chen po'i sangs rgyas las bsdus pas dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i le'u bzhi po// rdzogs s+ho// // gtso bo khyod kyis gsungs pa'i
214a4(rgyud): sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa rnams ni cung zad shes pa yis// lha dang mi yi bla ma dkyil 'khor khams kyi dbye ba rnams dang rnal 'byor ma'i// rigs drug rnams dang a li ka
214a5(rgyud): li rnams su gyur pa bdag nyid slar yang nyan par 'tshal lo kye// zla ba bzang po'i tshig thos nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos mkhas la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sogs su gsungs// rus pa
214a6(rgyud): rnams kyis ka ba rdo rje'i phreng ba nges par sa'i dkyil 'khor rtsig par bcas rnams kyis// sha dang khrag dang chu dang gshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje'i nor sbyin gzhan du brdul tshon dgye/ 
214a7(rgyud): 'khris pa bad kan dag gis nyi ma ri bong can te de bzhin rgyus pa rnams kyis chu skyes rnams/ ra ba lnga yi ri bong rnams ni sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang mkha' skyes rnams kyis so// gtso bo'i chu
214a8(rgyud): skyes la sogs dus kyi rtsa sogs kyis ste rlung ma dkyil 'khor la sogs lpags sogs kyis// nyi ma'i sgo rnams bu ga rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin spras pa de bzhin rim pa so yis so// rlung
214b1(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gyur pa rnams kyis dur khrod brgyad kyi 'khor lo sor mo rnams kyis sen mos gyis/ rdo rje 'od 'phro lan ba spu rnams kyis nges te phyogs dang 'tshams su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor
214b2(rgyud): mthar/ de ltar nges par sku rdo rje ni yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs/ gsung rdo rje ni a sogs ka sogs rgyal ba ma lus rigs bcas rnams ni lha yi
214b3(rgyud): rnam pa nyid// stong pa drug gi thugs rdo rje ste srid pa rnam pa gsum la gnas pa'i gtso bo rnam pa gcig/ de ltar ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi ngo bo'o// 
214b4(rgyud): ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan drug rnams rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams ni rigs kyi dbye ba yis// rgyal ba rnams kyis rdo rje ral gri ral chen 'khor lo de bzhin kho nar chu skyes gri gug go/ slar
214b5(rgyud): yang rgyal mchog ma lus pa yi sde tshan rar rnam pa lnga yis dbye bar byas pa na// so so'i yi ge'i dbye bas sa dang chu dang byin zla rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyi rang bzhin gyiso// dang por stong
214b6(rgyud): pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams ni nga nya Na ma na d+ha de bzhin dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi dbye bas i yig dang ni g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha dang sha mi'i dbye ba sa ra la sogs/ chu yi dbye bas u yig dang ni kha tsha tha pa tha ku
214b7(rgyud): wa sta sa yi dbye bas le la sogs// de ltar rnam pa lnga yi dbye ba rgyal ba mchog gi rigs kyis ka sogs sde tshan rnam par dbye// gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste gzhan yang rigs gsum de bzhin sku
214b8(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra ba la k+Sha ldan pa'i ka sogs sde tshan ma lus pa// 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs bcas ha sa ra wa lar ldan pa'i 'jig
215a1(rgyud): @#/ rten 'jig rten 'das pa dang // ka sogs rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang por 'gyur te ma lus brtseg mar gnas pa'i sde tshan brgyad po rnams// ka sogs yi ge sum bcu
215a2(rgyud): nges pa ra hA ya ra wa lar ldan k+Sha bcas sum bcu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba rnams kyis phyen ro la ro yis bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo'i mgon por 'gyur// lus nyid gcig la gcig
215a3(rgyud): gis ngas ste gnyis dang ldan pa shes rab kyis ni mkhyud par 'gyur ba'o// lnga yi bdag nyid lnga rnams dang ldan dgu yis yongs su bcings pa'i mgon po'i 'khor lo dgu yi bdag nyid do// dbyangs
215a4(rgyud): rnams grangs kyi bdag nyid nges par bcu gsum dgu phyogs rnams kyi sum bcu rtsa drug bdag nyid do// a sogs rnams kyi sgo bskyong rnams ste mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs kyis 'di ltar lhag pa'i
215a5(rgyud): dbyangs rnams kyis// khro drug ha sogs rnams su 'gyur te rang rigs phyogs gnas rnams la rlung sogs dbyangs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis// yi ge so so'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro la ro yis
215a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud/ de ltar sa bon yi ge so sor ro la ros bsgyur dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs mtha' dag
215a7(rgyud): tshogs pa'i rigs pa'i rigs rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis sbyang // gzhom du med pa la sogs stong pa mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi lha rnams lnga ni rgyas btab pa// spyi gtsug
215a8(rgyud): nas ni chu skye mtha' ru mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo dbus su gdan// rdo rje rnams kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te dbyas kyi dbye bas phyag rnams la/ 
215b1(rgyud): de nyid rnams kyis rgyas gdab dbye ba la ste gzhan yang de bzhin sku rdo rje la sogs rnams kyis// rnal 'byor rgyud ni sum bcu rtsa drug rnams su dpag med yon tan rnams kyi yi ge du mar phye// yi ge
215b2(rgyud): so so'i ming rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam pa dang rigs su gyur pa lha drang lha mo rnams la'o// sa bon cig las dpa' bo gocig par 'gyur te rdul dang ro dang mnyam shes rab kyis ni mkhyud par 'gyur
215b3(rgyud): phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur te sa sogs khams kyi dbye bas byin gyis brlabs pas dgu// ngag la sogs pa dang ni mig bcas la sogs rnams kyis yongs byas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
215b4(rgyud): nyid dang // de ltar so rnams skyes dang slar yang nges par so skyes pa dang dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can// dpral bar yang dag pa yi chu las ri bong 'dzin ltar dkar ba pad mo'i mtshan ldan
215b5(rgyud): 'od dpag med// nga rgyal can dang 'jig rten dbang phyug rta dang shing rtas 'gro dang ma ma ki dang gzugs rdo rje// drag mo bkra shis ma dang tshogs dbang bram ze gdangs kar ldan pa dag dang stag
215b6(rgyud): gdong 'ug pa'i gdong // de rnams dpal ldan g.yon pa'i zhal nas snying rje mchog gis nges par rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o// chos la rlung nyid yang dag dag pa las ni phyag na ral gri don yod grub
215b7(rgyud): dang sgrol ma dang / nam mkha'i snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang stobs po che dang tsa ra tsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma// bden bral dang ni dmangs rigs ma dang rlung lha klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong bya rog
215b8(rgyud): gdong bcas dang // de rnams byams pa'i thugs kyis nges par srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod ma khams dag pa las ni nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs
216a1(rgyud): @rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo// sa snying rmugs byed ma dang nges par ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug ma yi lha// 'dod pa'i rgyal po gdangs ka'i dbang po
216a2(rgyud): gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer ma dang phag gdong bya rgod bcas// de rnams me lus dpal ldan g.yas pa'i zhal nas mchog tu dga' bas sna tshogs gtso bo yis ni spros/ lte ba ras nyid yang
216a3(rgyud): dag dag pa las ni gser mchog gi ni thub pa'i phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sgrib pa rnam par sAl dang spyan ma rangs byed ma dang dri rdo rje ma mi'i bdag po kye// 'od zer can dang dbang mo dang ni
216a4(rgyud): brgya byin dus zhal dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa rnams// khyab bdag btang snyoms kyis ni skye bo mo lus don du nub kyi zhal nas nges par rab tu spros// spyi bor stong pa dag pa nyid las phyag
216a5(rgyud): na rdo rje mchog bsnams mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug tor can dang chos dbyings ma ste gzhan yang phyag na rdo rje la sogs nam mkha'i yon tan no// gsang bar ye shes dag pa las
216a6(rgyud): ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra rdo rje la sogs pa rnams// stang dang 'og gi gnas nasangs par yon tan ma lus spros pa srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu// phyogs mdab pad mar
216a7(rgyud): spyan ma la sogs rnams dang 'tshams kyi mdab gyur khrag gis gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams// / sprin nag lta bu'i 'jig pa'i dus mtshungs nyi sta g.yon brkyang pa yis dbang phyug u ma dang bcas
216a8(rgyud): non// thod pa'i phreng ba bcings pa he ru ka nyid chu gter zhal te nyi ma'i dpung pa dang ldan pa// phyag rgya sbrul dang stag lpags dang ni rab mchog glang chen lpags pa bshus pa rlon pa rgyangs nas
216b1(rgyud): 'dzin// phyi rol 'khor lo gsum gyi lha mo rnams ni gnag dang dmar dang gsar mtshungs ri bong can lus rnams// rdo rje khro skyes drug ni phyag gnyis ri bong can zhal rnams dang de bzhin du ni 'byung skyes
216b2(rgyud): rnams// 'tshams rnams dang ni sgo rnams gtum mo rnams ni ro la gnas pa'i gri gug nya phyis phyag na bsnams// dpa' bo rnams kyi rig byed phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha Ta kha dang dril// dpal
216b3(rgyud): ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad rnams kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dag la nges par gnas nyid dang // zhing dang 'dus pa rnams dang dur khrod po la rnams ni me dang rlung gi dbus su'o// de bzhin
216b4(rgyud): yul dang grong khyer rnams kyi phyogs dang 'tshams la yang ni lha rnams gnas par rig par bya// shes rab rgyud rnams srid pa gsum gyi bla mas mdun gyi zhal nas rab tu spros par gsungs pa'o// 
216b5(rgyud): snying po 'khor lo cha dgur ri bong nyi ma ldan pad ma rnams la dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha// rdo rje'i gdung ma rnams dang ka ba rnams kyis spras par phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha chen po// rtsig
216b6(rgyud): pa'i ra ba'i nang na yul dang yul can rnams ni nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams la gnas pa// // sgo bskyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas pa ste tshogs gzhan rnams ni 'dod yon kun la gnas pa'o// 
216b7(rgyud): zhes ba la sogs pa dang de bzhin gzhan yang rnal 'byor rgyud du 'dus pa rnam pa drug gsungs pa// khro bo rnams ni 'tshams rnams 'dzam b+ha la nyid snya ma bsnams dang yul dang bcas pa'o// dag
216b8(rgyud): rkang dag dang lag pa gshang lam bA gnyi ma ri bong can rnams rtsa dus rang bzhin rnams// thabs dang shes rab ma lus zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan pa rnams g.yas pa'i zhal nas spros pa'o// mi
217a1(rgyud): mi bdag pa stong pa juga' ma mye'i rdur can ma 'khor gyi ni nges par smras nal// khams dang rlung pa lhags m+b+ha sgrasang ni 'drar ma gzhan la gzugs rdo
217a2(rgyud): la sogs pa brgyad// phyin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i tshogs rnams nyi ma la bzhugs dgod par bya// rtsig pa'i nang gir ba der ni chu gter dus kyis bsgyur ba'i ma lus
217a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ste/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsum gyis dbye ba rnams la zhal gsum ro'i phyag ldan lha rnams sku yi dbyabs so// rtog pa la sogs ma lus dman pa'i dbang las g.yon pa'i nas
217a4(rgyud): zhal nas yang dag spros pa'o// rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud drang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug dang ni dur khrod bcas rnams
217a5(rgyud): mi bdag nges par rgyab kyis zhal nas spros// drug dang bug pa'i theg le rnams chas rlung gi dkyil 'khor mtha' ru dkyil 'khor la ni thig gdab bya// snying po nas ni drug drug rnam par dbye ba yin te pad
217a6(rgyud): mdab lte ba phyed dang ldan pa'o// gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin po che dang ral gri rdo rje phreng rnams gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis// sgo dang sgo khyud nyi ma rnams kyis yon te 'tshams dang ro rnams
217a7(rgyud): kyis ni 'dod yon do shalas// ra ba lnga la cha 'gyur gsum te yang ni me yi do shal rtsa ba'i snam bu la yang ngo // nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste nyi ma phyed gsum 'gyur gyis ni ka
217a8(rgyud): ba'i steng gi rta babs la// sgo brgyad rnams kyi phyogs dang 'tshams rnams kun nas dkyil 'khor chen po zlum po 'di la bya ba'o// dbus su chu skyeso sna tshogs mdog la nyi ma ri bong
217b1(rgyud): can ni kha sbyar gdan ni lci bar ro// 'khor lo nyid dang phre ba sngon pos sa gzhi ljang gu rnams yin 'khor lo ser pos sa gzhi gnaga'akhor lo dkar pos sa gzhi
217b2(rgyud): dmar po nyid yin pa ste phreng bcas 'khor lo dmar zhing sa gzhi dkar/ sa gzhi dag ni ser dang sngo bar 'gyur na 'khor lo dag kyang gnag cing kha dog ljang gur brjod// cha drug rnams kyis
217b3(rgyud): mtshon gyi sa rnams bskyed byed zhal dbang las ste sgo rnams 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi ru brgyad gnyis dur khrod nyid ste gzhan yang de bzhin rigs kyi dbang las snying por lha mo brgyad// mdab
217b4(rgyud): ma'i lha mo brgyad kyi mdob mo ba ra bar mdab ma brgyad du thod pa bdud rtsi ro ldan brgyad dang bcas/ phyir ni sgyug mo la sogs ma lus phyogs dang 'tshams su rab yin de bzhin klu yi rgyal
217b5(rgyud): po brgyad/ da yi phyi ru sa dang chu dang ma dang rlung gi dkyila'akhor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// ring dang thung ba'i dbyangasau rnams kyis phye ba swa ta pa TaM tsa ka la sogs stong
217b6(rgyud): sogs yi ge rnams/ rlung la sogs pa'i rtsibs la ring po rnams la nyi rgyu dbang sogs khams kyi rang bzhin no// stang sogaso rtsi bsal thung ngu rnams la ri bo
217b7(rgyud): can rgyu'i dbang las rlung sogs rang rang 'khor lo'i steng / sgro dang sgo yi bar dag rnams la nam mkha' dang ni ha k+Sha dang ldan snga tshan sa stangs gnas// mkha'
217b8(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams thung ngu'i rang bzhin rnams dang ri bong 'dzin zhal gri gug dang ni nya phyis bsnams/ rang rang mdab mar g.yas brkyang thod pa lha min las skyes
218a1(rgyud): khrag gis bkang sde slad grol gos dang bral// rkang pa lag pa rked pa dpral ba rna ba mgrin par g.yer kha sogs dang rus pa'i phyag rgya dang / 
218a2(rgyud): thod pa'i dum bu'i phreng ba kha dog lnga yi rgyal ba rnams kyis mgo bo dang ni rnyed par mtshan// mkha' 'gro rnams ni zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje kha T+wA~M ka/ mgrin
218a3(rgyud): par mgo bo'i phreng ba dang ni mgo dang spyi gtsug dag tu rdo rje dor dpyangs nor bu dang // dpal ldan mgul brgyan nyid dang rkang gdub rkang pa la ste lag gdub dang ni 'od dpag rnar brgyan
218a4(rgyud): dang // thod pa rdzogs pa'i phreng ba rnams dang thal ba'i phyag rgya mtha' dag lus byugs mchu ba can rnams so// gtso bo'i dbul thod pa'i phreng ba rnams dang mgrin par
218a5(rgyud): mgo bo'i phreng ba brgya pa rnams kyis brgyan// zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan+da dang ni rang gi rked par stag lpags nyid dang phyag gi glang po'i lpags// klu dang phyag rgya ldan
218a6(rgyud): byas dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs pa mkha' 'gro ma la'o ni mdzad gyur cing // bdud dang dbang phyug zhabs 'og ri bong can nyi byin za'i dkyil 'khor steng mnan skul
218a7(rgyud): thal bor spras// phyogs kyi mdab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams phyag gI DA ma ru dang rdo rje kha Ta khA nyid do// 'tshams kyi mdab ma ral gnas phyag gis ga shang
218a8(rgyud): dang gcig dang khrag dang klod pa khu ba rnams kyi snod// lha mo brgyad po de bzhin gzhan yang gnyis ka/ bde ba snyoms par zhugs pa 'khor lo thams cad la// ser
218b1(rgyud): dang dkar dang dmar dang dkar min pa dang ldang pa'i mdog dang mdog sngon rang gi phyogs su'o// mdog dang mtshan ma gtso bo rgyal ba rigs rnams bskyed lta bu yi sngar bzhin
218b2(rgyud): spyan gsum la sogs can/ phan tshun mkhyud par bya ba rang dang gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang las ma lus rig par bya ba ste/ sbyin pa la sogs rnams dang phung po 'byung / 
218b3(rgyud): bo yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga rnams kyi// lha mo ma lus dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sras po'i phyogs kyi sa dang phyogs kyi stobs dbang rnam par spyad/ 
218b4(rgyud): lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni brgyad kyi dbye bas phyogs dang 'tshams rnams kun la gnas par nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'du ba 'dus pa dang ni dur khrod pa
218b5(rgyud): la ba 'am khang pa rlung gi phyed 'tshams su// lha mo'i rgyab tu dbang dang 'dir ni mdun du thim par 'gyur ba khams lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyis ste/ rlung dang / 
218b6(rgyud): dbang ldan bden bral ma dang 'og dang nam mkha' lha dang gashr-in rje gnod sbyin nub rnams dang / gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa dang ni mgor gyur pa dang lte
218b7(rgyud): ba'i gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnams// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad stang 'og nyid mtshan so so'i chu srin nas brtsams dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar du'o// nus ma dang ni sangs rgyas gtso bor
218b8(rgyud): bcas pa nyi ma zla ba'i dbye bas rigs ldan rgyu ba ste// de yang nyi ma'i gnas nas lus la skyes pa'i srin bu mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min nas// gtso bo'i chu skyes rnam la rdo rje'i thig la ma lus 'gyur ma na
218'a1(rgyud): bur gnas pa yis// dga' ba thams cad kun nas bde ba mnyam par gnas pa rdo rje can mas dus rnams thams cad du// zla ba zhu ba gang zhig zhugs pa de dag bla ma'i zhal ste de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo'o// 
218'a2(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus las grol bar byed dang bdud rnams 'jigs par byed pa mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo 'di// thabs dang shes rab yi ge dag ni gnyi ka'i rigs kyi dbang las ga pa' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro ma yi ming // bzlas
218'a3(rgyud): pa rdo rje gsum dang rkang pa gzhan ldan pa ste thog ma dang ni dbus dang thams dbye// gang gi tshe nas srog gis byin brlabs gnyis kar bgrod pa'i dbang las rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa// myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba
218'a4(rgyud): ro'i 'gro ba rnams las rab grol rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gang zhig skye ba'i dusu dbu mar dbugs rnams rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' ru 'gyur ba skye// de nas 'khor lo brgyad pa rnams su 'gyur te steng 'og dbang lnga
218'a5(rgyud): sgo dbus las nas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig las skyed pa srid gsum skyed mdzad phyag na gri gug dang ni nya phyis bsnams pa yi// nyi ma'i zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang bdud rtsi bde ba'i chal dus kyi 'khor lo nyid kyis
218'a6(rgyud): mkhyud lnga dang gsum dang rgya mtsho zla ba nyi ma yul dang yon tan dbang las gdon ste rgya mtsho rgyu// gzhan yang gza' bduni nyi ma nyid ste gang ba nyin phyed rnams kyi ri bong can 'gyur gdan rnams so// de ltar gnag dang dkar
218'a7(rgyud): ba'i gang ba nye ched nyi ma ri bong can dag gdan rnams nges par bya// gza' bdun nyi ma yang dag mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag la nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i gdan// rtsibs rnams dang ni pad ma'i mdab ma sgo bzhi 'tsham
218'a8(rgyud): ba ni zla ba nyi ma rgyu ba'i gdan rnams te// slar yang de las nyis 'gyur rgyu ba dang ni nyi ma ri bong can dag gdan rnams gang ba dang // gza' dang nyi ma rgyu ba rnams dang mnyam dang mi mnyam rgyu dang rgya mtsho rgyu ba'i gdan
218'b1(rgyud): dang dkar dang dmar dang dkar min pa dngaldang pa'i mdog dang mdog sngon rang gi phyogs su'o// // mdog dang mtshan ma gtso bo rgyal ba rigs rnams bskyed lta bu yi sngar bzhin
218'b2(rgyud): spyan gsum la sogs can/ phan tshun mkhyud par bya ba rang dang gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang las ma lus rig par bya ba ste/ sbyin pa la sogs rnams dang phung po 'byung
218'b3(rgyud): bo yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga rnams kyi// lha mo ma lus dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sras po'i phyogs kyi sa dang phyogs kyi stobs dbang rnam par spyad/ 
218'b4(rgyud): lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni brgyad kyi dbye bas phyogs dang 'tshams rnams kun la gnas par nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'du ba 'dus pa dang ni dur khrod pa
218'b5(rgyud): la ba 'am khang pa rlung gi phyed 'tshams su// lha mo'i rgyab tu dbang dang 'dir ni mdun du thim par 'gyur ba khams lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyis ste// rlung dang
218'b6(rgyud): dbang ldan bden bral ma dang 'og dang nam mkha' lha dang gshin rje/ gnod sbyin nub rnams dang // gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa dang ni mgor gyur pa dang lta
218'b7(rgyud): ba'i gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnams// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng 'og nyid mtshan so so'i chu srin nas brtsams dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar du'o// nus ma dang ni sangs rgyas gtso bor
218'b8(rgyud): bcas pa nyi ma zla ba'i dbye bas rigs ldan rgyu ba ste// de yang nyi ma'i gnas nas lus la skyes pa'i srin du mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min nas// gtso bo'i chu skyes rnam la rdo rje'i thig la ma lus 'gyur ma do
219a1(rgyud): bzhin gnyis su 'gyur// shes rab phyogs kyi bdag po'i bsam pas dbye ste 'tshams rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma rnams tshogs nyid do// g.yas dang g.yon pa zung ni nyi ma ri bong can te gzhan yang sku yi
219a2(rgyud): shar dang nub phyogs dag/ gnag dang ser po nyid ste de bzhin nam mkha' dang ni sa 'og sngo dang ljang khur yang dag gnas// shes rab dmar rnams dkar po rnams kyir 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin dkar rnams ni dmar po rnams kyi'o// ser po
219a3(rgyud): rnams kyi kha dog nag mo rnams te gser mchog mtshungs ma rnams ni dkar min rigan kyi// sngon po rnams kyi sna tshogs mdog ma rnams ste ljang khu rnams kyi de bzhin sngon mo rnams su gsungs// de ltar nges par lha mo rnams kyi rigs ni rang
219a4(rgyud): gi phyogs gyur lha rnams nyid du rig par bya// shes rab rgyud rnams mdun gyi zhal nas yin te rgya ba nyid nas ni rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid// zhal g.yas nas ni rnal 'byor rgyud dang g.yon pa'i zhal nas bya ba'i rgyud sogs rgyal mchog
219a5(rgyud): bdag pos gsungs// mdun zhal nyid nas rnal 'byor spyod pa yin te rgyab kyi zhal nas dbu ma ma lus gsungs pa'o// g.yas pa'i zhal nas nges par mdo sde pa ste dkar po dag pa'i zhal nas bye brag smra ba gsungs// rgyab kyi zhal nas nges badz+ra
219a6(rgyud): rig byed yin te rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog sprin gsungs// g.yas pa'i zhal nas snyan ngag rigs byed mdun gyi zhal nas me mchog sbyin bsreg srid srung rig byed yin// mdun gyi zhal nas lus kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud dang gzha/ 
219a7(rgyud): yang rgyab kyi zhal nas bya khyud 'byung ba'i rgyud// g.yon pa'i zhal nas grub pa'i mtha' ste nyi ma shar mtshungs pa'i g.yas nas khyab 'jug gi ni chos// rgyab nas skad cig nyid la ldog dang dkar po'i mchog ste g.yon gyi zhal nas lha'o rab
219a8(rgyud): gnas so// g.yas nas 'jigs med rig pa nyid ste gzhan yang sngon ma ni rlung gi zhal nas tshangs pa'i zhi bdag/ stong pa'i zhal nas stong dang dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa'i don du spros// gzhan yang rdzogs ldan
219b1(rgyud): gsum ldan gnyis ldan brtsod ldan dus rnams nges par rgyab kyi zhal sogs dbye ba yi// de ltar dpa' bo'i rim pa la sogs dbang las nyi ma bgrod 'gros bzhin du thun mtshams pazhi ru'o// g.yas pa'i zhal nas zas nas rgyab kyi na
219b2(rgyud): nas mchog tu mi 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spros pa'o// mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid dang nges par dkar po'i zhal nas rmi lam rnams so rgyal po kye// rgyab nas rje rigs dang ni skye gnyis ma yi bdag dang dmangs rigs de bzhin rim par 'gyur
219b3(rgyud): mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs te g.yas kyi zhal nas mang pos bkur// rgya ba zhal nas ni gnas brtan pa ste gzhan yang dge 'dun phal chen sde ni g.yon pa'i zhal nyid nas// mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams
219b4(rgyud): yin te gzhan yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros// g.yas pa'i zhal nas 'byung po dang ni lha ste dkar po dam pa'i zhal nas rgyu skar lha ma yin// mdun gyi zhal nas rang gi snying kha'i 'khor lo spro zhing yang ni rgyab gi zhal nas lte/ 
219b5(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lor 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa g.yas kyi zhal nas yin te lhan cig skyes pa ma lus g.yon pa'i zhal nas so// dbus kyi zhal nas 'khor lo dag ste lus kyi 'khor lo rnams ni spros dang sdud par 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten
219b6(rgyud): gsum po mtha' dag rgyal ba bskyed mdzad zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis nges par yang dag bskyed// dpal ldan zla ba dang ni chu shel dag las chu 'dzag bzhin du rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin nyid// rgyal ba'i bdag po phung po la brten nas ni// 
219b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams 'jig rten pa la mdzad// sa bon chu yi khams rnams ma lus ro mnyam nyid du 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin chos rnams kyang // sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs mthu yis sems can rnams kyi sems dag 'gyur/ 
219b8(rgyud): bar shes par bya ba'o// srid gsum gnas su sems can don mdzad yid bzhin nor bu lta bu sems la med po ma yin te// sems gnas de ni sems can rnams kyi sdig pa mi dge ba 'i las 'bras dbang gis ma mthong ba// yid
220a1(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i nyes pa min te sems can rnams ni dge dang mi dge 'bras bu rnams la spyod// mi rnams sems nyid dag pa rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur ste rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci yang bya ru med// gang gis myu gu 'di/ 
220a2(rgyud): bskyed nas ni bskyed byed de nyid skyes pas dngos po 'jig par 'gyur ba'o// bskyed byed nyams nas slar yang sa bon rgyal po de nyid bskyed par byed par rab tu 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig snga ma de ni gzhan bskyed pa las shi ba zhes
220a3(rgyud): brjod rang gi ngo bos skyes pa med// sa yi steng du stong pa las 'ongs pa'i stobs bcu bde ba'i skad cig gang yin de yis 'gro// bde ba la gnas bde ba rjes chags skad cig gcig nyid 'di lhan skyes yin bsam gzhan rjes chags
220a4(rgyud): min// des bskyed phung po gang zhig slar yang bskyed byed de ni 'di yi bde ba'i skad cig nyid du 'gyur// dag pa las ni chos ste de las gzhan yang slar yang de las gzhan te de las rnam par dag/ dag po'i sa las sa bon btab pa las
220a5(rgyud): / ni rtsa ba yal ge me tog 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhi no// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nor dang ro mchog nyid dang rdul phran rnam pa drug rnams ni// dri la sogs pa re res dman pa yul dang rnam par bral ba mtha' ma ye shes snang ba ste// 
220a6(rgyud): 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams la gshin rje gshin rje ri bong can dang mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings// de nyid rtag par dag pa kun du 'dzag med lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i kun gyi rten du 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i kham/ 
220a7(rgyud): rnams phan tshun gtso bo dngos dang phal pa'i rang bzhin du ni 'gyur ba'o// phan tshun phung por gyur dang yulo dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun btud dang ma rig pa nyid do// lnga pa phan tshun rjes su chags nas ro yi 'gro ba rnams su bde
220a8(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal skad cig 'gyur// rnam pa kun nas yon tan gzhan la dga' ba med par yang dag gnas pa mi phyed rdo rje'o// de lta bas na dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos sbrul sku du ma rab tu gsal ba yis// 'dod pa'i khas
220b1(rgyud): la gnas pa'i lha dang lA min mi rnams don du thugs rjes ldan pas spros pa ste// gzugs khams rnams la longs spyod rdzogs sku yis te mkha' la rgyal sras dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// ma lus srid gsums stengs zad par
220b2(rgyud): stongs pas stong pa la ste zad par rlung gis rlung la'o// zad par me yi cha yis me dang zad par chu yi ma.i chu yi 'gro ba rnams la spros// zad par sa nyid cha yi sa ste rten 'brel yul gyi dbye bas dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// gcig gi bdag
220b3(rgyud): nyid kun nas nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pas dag pa'i sa la ston par byed pa ste// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ni skar grwar 'chi med bde ba'i ye shes ro gcig rang bzhin gyur pa las// ma lus rgyal ba mchog nyid gcig po 'di las rnam pa lnga
220b4(rgyud): yis mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// de las rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin nyid dang gzhan yang sgyu 'amabazhin rnams// de yis skad cig gcig la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ste las gzhan rnams kyi mthu yis ma yin no// 
220b5(rgyud): 'di yi thabs la gang gi mi 'phro'i skad cig ma 'di ltan skyes pa yi chos dbyings rab tu bzhugs// sa pa da pa mahA sa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i nam mkha' la sogs khams ldan pa// skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa'i srid pa
220b6(rgyud): rnam gsum zhes bya'i 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams las ni// sangs rgyas khro bo lha mo bcas dang / rdza thugs lnga byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa yi// rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'di rnams la ni srid gsum 'du byed
220b7(rgyud): gcig nyid kho na la ni bde ba 'byung // ba spu lpags pa sha dang khrag dang ror bcas pa dang de bzhin rus pa ra dang rtsa rnams dang // srog la sogs pa'i rlung dang nyi ma ri bong can dag 'di rnams ma lus srog gi dbus su 'gro/ rnam par shes
220b8(rgyud): pazla ba'i dbus su dri bral nor bu bzhin du dngos po thams cad la ni mkhyud// dngos dang dngos med gnyis kyi pa/ byed pa 'chi med mchog gi go 'phang gzhom du med// gang gi lus kun la gnas pa spu la sogs zla ba'i ma
221a1(rgyud): thug pa rnams bcu ru de rnams gsungs// sde tshan drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor rnams la rgyun du bde mnyam 'bras bu ste// de'i phyir bla rwa'i zhangs su gyur pa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
221a2(rgyud): ni thar pa'i ched du btsal bar bya// lus dang bral ba las ni khyab byed thar ste sangs rgyas gzhan na gar yang cung zad yod pa yin// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te 'jig rten khams 'dir chen po'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni yod
221a3(rgyud): ma yin// de rnams rnam par mi rtog pa yis mnyes par byas na dpag tu med pa'i srid pa gcod par byed// rnal 'byor pa rnams mkhu bar byed na du 'bod dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi mthar 'gro 'gyur// de phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis
221a4(rgyud): skye bo mkhas pa mi mkhas dag la brgal bar mi bya'o// sems can rnams la byams pa la sogs dag pa'i sems kyis 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// yon tan can rnams zhe sdang la sogs mi dge sems kyis rnam pa drug
221a5(rgyud): tu 'khor bar 'gyur// byang chub sems rnams ma lus pa rnams 'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste// smon pa rnams dang rnam par bral dang thar pa 'jug pa sman na thams cad du ni bdud kyi sems// srid pa gcu
221a6(rgyud): gyi gnas su bdud dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma zhi ba dag zhi bar byed// mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul dman te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan// bdud dang skyob pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi sems la zhug
221a7(rgyud): pras bdad kyi klag dang bde ba'i blo ru 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa dpag tu med par srid pa gsum po kun la 'jug par 'gyur// gang zhig 'jig rten khams kyi tshad ni rgyal po rnams kyis gsungs pa de ni mi rnams// 
221a8(rgyud): ye shes mon// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig skyes sku mi dbang las tshad yod min te khru gcig pa dang du ma'o// tshad ni sems can rnams dang rjes su 'thun par rab gsal mdzad ste srog chags rnams kyi las kyi sa ra// ji
221b1(rgyud): 'dod pas tshad 'di nyid ni gal te smras na ci yang med pa can du smra bar 'gyur// gang gis nyis so so'i dbang las mngal nas phyung ste rgyal ba'i dbang po bskrad par byed pa dang // gang gis skad cig gis ni 'grub par gyur pa 'gyur
221b2(rgyud): ba rnam par bral nas rgyu 'thun 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig sangs rgyas mdzad pa de ni spangs te bde mnyam bral ba'i gzhan yang stong pa sgom byed pa// de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba ring ste bskal pa bye ba du mas min// nim pa'i
221b3(rgyud): shing las rgan 'brum dang ni dug las bdud rtsi dag dang tshangs pa'i shing las pad ma min// stong pa las na mya ngan 'das bde dang ni mi dge'i dbang gis srog bcad pa las dngos grub min// phyugs bsad mchod sbyin las ni mtho ris dang ste zhi ba
221b4(rgyud): dam pa'i go 'phang dbang po 'gags las min// rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba 'dzag pa med par 'gyur ba'i sems las min// sems can rnams la sdig pa'o sems su 'gyur ba bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brla
221b5(rgyud): so mi bdag kye// bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster rtag tu 'byung ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// gang phyir bde mnyam dbang gis nyon mongs bdud rnams ma lus bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur ba ste/ 
221b6(rgyud): de phyir nyi ma so so'i dus su de nyid rnams kyis de la bgegs ni rtag tu du mar byed// 'dir ni rgyal ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'phel ba'i don du dang por las kyi phyag brgya bsten// de nas nyi ma'i gzugs te lus dang gdong dang lag pa
221b7(rgyud): rkang pa spyi gtsug yan lag kun rdzogs pa'i// dbyug pa klog dang rjes su mthun mI 'gyur bde ba bskyed byed mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// rdo rje rnams kyis snang bar byas pas srid gsum lus la gnas par 'gyur ba chos kyi da
221b8(rgyud): su 'gyuraro// des na phyag rgya bzhi yis mi 'gyur ba de 'bras ster bas rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ba ni// dus rnams kun du rol pa'i dga' ba nyid la gnas na 'jig rten la mo las rnam par grol 'gyur te// grong dang 'brog dgon dur// 
222a1(rgyud): khrod mi gtsang ba dang gtsang dang gnas dang khang pa lha'i gnas rnams su// rigs dang rigs min rnam rtog spangs pa'i bza' btung la sogs longs spyod rnams kyis lus la stobs bde ster// rlung rnams
222a2(rgyud): yang dag bsdu ba byas pas glog gi me lce spyi bo las ni zla ba 'ju bar byed// gang dang gang gi thig le zhu nas de las mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba rnams su 'gag/ thig le zhu ba gang zhig 'dzags nas rdo rje nor bu song ba rgyal mtshan
222a3(rgyud): rtse mor yang dag 'gag/ shes rab ye shes skad cig gang tshe thig le phreng ba mi 'dzag de tshe bde ba yang dag ster// de phyir 'dzag pa med pa'i bde ba'i skad cig 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings ster ba// ro yi 'gro ba rnams su
222a4(rgyud): gyur pa'i srog rnams thams cad bkug ste nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas na// rdzu 'phrul dang ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid rnams rnal 'byor skye ba 'dir// gal te lam du zhugs par 'tsho bar 'gyur/ 
222a5(rgyud): ba de tshe zhen pa de yis skye ba gzhan la'o// gang zhig chung ba'i rang bzhin yon tan med cing yul dang bral ba'i sku yi phyag rgya de ltar gnyis// de nas chags pa rjes su chags pa yon tan gter ldan gzhan te gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa ga
222a6(rgyud): / gnag dang dkar la rjes su chags pa yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya gnyis su 'gyur// brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang mkha' dang dus dang stod pa rig byed pa rnams kyi lo yis te// rin chen mchog gyur ma mtho
222a7(rgyud): steng du rgyal ba mchog bskyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya// rin chen mchog gyur mthong ba'i dus su yon tan mtha' dag gter gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar byas pa nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlabs sngags rgod dang ni bde
222a8(rgyud): bde mnyam gsang ba'i pad mar sngags dang bcas pa spro// gsang ba'i pad mar bsrub pa byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya// gang gi de nyid lhag par gyur na rgyal ba bskyed byed sras po 'jam pa'i rdo rje de nyi
222b1(rgyud): do// gal te shes rab lhag pa las ni bu mo yin te sangs rgyas yum du nges par rab tu 'gyur// de las gzhan ni me tog gsum gyi pad dkar 'dzin dang dza ma b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje'o// gzhan ma me tog brgyad kyis phyogs dang 'tshams
222b2(rgyud): la gnas pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad rnams so// zla ba de steng gang ba rdul 'byung gyur na 'jam pa'i dbyangs su de nyid rab tu skye ba'o// lo ni nyi shu'i bar du so so'i rdul las byang chub sems dpa' 'am ni snying stobs chen por
222b3(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas cung zad snying stobs dman par 'gyur ste stong pa dang ni rig byed dag gi bar du'o// de nas kyang ni nyi shu'i bar du shin du snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus nyid kyang chung // de nas skye gnas rdul spangs min te yul
222b4(rgyud): 'jig 'gyur bas de zhig pa las dbang bskur yod pa med// 'on kyang shes rab ye shes dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yi sa bon zhig la sbyin par bya// de nyid rnams la sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag don
222b5(rgyud): du btsal bar bya'o// 'di ni sems can don rnams byed pas byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'bras bu du mar 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig khrag gi btung ba byed pa'i sha sbrang de ni rab mchog lha dang mi yi bdud rtsi gcig/ skyugs pa zos pa gsang
222b6(rgyud): ba'i zhal nas rdo rje nor bur gyur pa chu skyes nang du ma zhugs pa// gshing dang gci dang khrag dang shan mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa rnams ni nang du zhugs pa'o// de ltar ye shes bdud rtsi 'di ni srid pa gsum gyi bla mas rgyud rnams
222b7(rgyud): thams cad du ni bstan// gang tshe shes rab mchog 'byung du ni bde ba lhung na slar yang rab tu bza' bas bsrung bar bya// de yis sems can gang zhig de rnams rgyal ba'i rigs su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpar cung zad 'gyur// de phyir/ 
222b8(rgyud): nyi ma so so'i dus su de nyid zad par byed pa'i shes rab me tog dang ldan pa'i// zhi ba'i bde 'bras ster ba bza' bar ston byed srin po dang ni bdud kyi pho nya rnams su 'gyur// rdo rje las ni chu skyes drang bar mi bya mchog gi bde bar gyur pa
223a1(rgyud): 'khums pa ru ni bya// de la sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par gang tshe rab tu gyur na de tshe 'dod pa'i dngos grub dris// rdo rje chu skyes dag nas rab tu bcug pas rang rang rdo rje'i snying khar ye shes 'khor lo zhugs// 
223a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rnam par byang zhing slar yang snying kha'i lus su gyur pa 'od zer rnams kyis gang bar bya// gal te 'di yis grub par ma gyur pa ni rdo rje nor bus yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya// shes rab chos 'byung la gnas bsrung
223a3(rgyud): ba'i don du mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams dgod par bya ba'o// shes rab ldan pa nyid dam yang na gcig nyid dag ni sangs rgyas sku yi zhabs su yang dag brjod// rmongs pa gang zhig 'di la gal te 'jigs par mngon par
223a4(rgyud): 'dod pa rdo rje can gyis gsod par 'gyur// gang tshe srid gsum bdag pos ma rungs las kyi rang bzhin gsang sngags du ma rnams kyi gsungs gyur pa// de rnams thams cad bdud phyogs zad phyir 'jigs pa bskyed byed rnam
223a5(rgyud): ste srog chags rnams la cung zad min// dran pa rnams kyis byed po gang zhig g.yul gyi yul la dga' ba'i gsod byed rnams dA ru stegs can// de rnams la na de rnams sbyar bar byas pa rgyal sras dam pas srog chags ma lu/ 
223a6(rgyud): bsrung don du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la ni phyugs kyi skye bo bsad phyir mkhas pas gsol gdab mi bya// sems can rnams kyi bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten rnams kyi khams su spros// de phyir de rnam
223a7(rgyud): nyi ma so so'i dus su bsrung bar bya ste bsgrub pa po la sdang yang min// bsgrub bya las kyi stobs kyis shi bar 'gyur na bsgrub pa po'i 'di ni bdud du 'gyur ba'o// mi rnams sems ni kun nas mi dge ba yi 'bras bu'i dbang gis
223a8(rgyud): dman pa'i rig pa dag la mos// rig pa 'di ni bdag gis byas la srid gsum mtha' dag skad cig ma ni gcig gis dbang du bya// zhes pa'i 'dod pa'i bsam pa ye shes dang ni sbyin pa rnam par spangs pas dmyal bar rab tu
223b1(rgyud): 'jug/ rdo rjes rdzas dang rang gi chung ma gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te kye ma chos dran dag la zhugs// shes rab ma yin thabs ma yin te lhan cig skyes sku 'di la chos kyi skur ni 'gyur ba'o// / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin nges par mun
223b2(rgyud): pa bral ba ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba yis// de las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis brag cha bzhin du sems can du ma'i don rnams mdzad pa'o// 'dir yang sems can ma lus smin bya'i don du sangs rgyas las ni sprul pa'i
223b3(rgyud): sku ru 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' gcig po 'di las dus mtha' sprin dang mtshungs pa'i he ru ka ni nges par 'gyur// de yang dug rnams smin bya'i don ste rmongs pa rnams ni smin bya'i don du rgyal ba'i dam tshig go// rin chen 'byung
223b4(rgyud): ba sdug phongs rnams kyir 'gyur te pad ma 'dzin pa chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i phyir// bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don nyid du ni phyag gi pad mar ral gri 'dzin pa'i don yod grub par 'gyur// gang zhig zhe sdang las ni/ 
223b5(rgyud): sna tshogs yum ste de nyid dus mtha' mi mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma ru 'gyur// gti mug las ni spyan mar brjod ste mchog gi snying rjes nga rgyal rgyu las mA ma ki ru gsungs// 'dod chags las ni gos dkar mor gsungs yon ta/ 
223b6(rgyud): ma lus gter gyur phrag dog nyid las sgrol ma'o// 'di gnyis dag ni sna tshogs gzugs ste yul dang yul can 'di dag thams cad gzhan du 'gyur// phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rdo rje btsun mo'i bA ga nyid du snying rje yis ni zhugs gyur/ 
223b7(rgyud): pa// nyes pa bral dang bsod nams ma yin bsags pa'i sems can ma lus smin par bya ba'i don du'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sogs rnams su bcom ldan 'das nyid bzhugs pa nyan thos gang zhig rnams kyi don du'o// oM waM rnam
223b8(rgyud): par gang bzhugs mchog gi nges pa dang ldan ma lus gong du dgod du'o// sems can rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas bzhugs pa rnam pa gsum// nges par rdo rje can rnams phyi dang nang dang gzhan gyi dus
224a1(rgyud): rnams kun la rtag par rab byung ba// phyi rol rnams la sna tshogs cha ru 'gyur te lus la rlung gi rab tu rgyu ba gang zhig rnams// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang gtso bo gang zhig rdo rje btsun mo'i ba gar rab tu yin/ 
224a2(rgyud): gzhan ni gang zhig sgra la sogs pa'i yul gyur rnams la sems mi 'gro dang de bzhin de kho na// gang zhig e waM yi ger zhugs dang mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang las ni sku gsung thugs bzhugs pa// rdo rje can nyid gcig la gsu
224a3(rgyud): gyi dbye ba 'gyur ba yul dang yul can khams kyis bskor ba yi// srid pa gsum gyi sems can du ma rnams kyi don phyir dus gsum bder gshegs gnas gsum rnams la bzhugs// rgyud rnams su ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes
224a4(rgyud): bya ba'i tshig rnams 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste// mgo mgrin snying kha lta ba gsang ba rnams kyi pad mar zla ba zhu ba rdo rje can gyi dus// mchog gi pad ma de la thig le gsum gyis thar par gshegs pas rdo rje btsun mo'i bA gar
224a5(rgyud): brjod// sangs rgyas zhing der rab tu zhugs pa de 'dir bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// gcig de du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang las zhi dang chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'khor lo la/ 
224a6(rgyud): gnas skye ba snga ma nyid kyi bag chags stobs gyur rnams kyi sems las 'byung ba ni// don gcig lnga ni ma lus gsung rnams srog chags rnams kyi rang rang bsam pa dang sbyar rab tu 'jug/ 'khor lo la gnas khyim na gnas pa
224a7(rgyud): rnams kyi bsod nams don du bsod snyoms mdzad du gshegs pa ste// byol song ya dgas lha min brang 'gro lha dang 'phags pa mi dang ngu 'bod la sogs pa rnams lo// 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum du rta// 
224a8(rgyud): par bden pa'i chos rnams gsung ba ni// srid gsum ma lus rang rang skad rnams kyis ni lam la yang dag gnas par byed de gzhan gyis min// bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'di yin te lha ska/ 
224b1(rgyud): / rnams kyis 'byung ba min// sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ni mkhyen dka'i dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ston par mdzad pa srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dbang po'i gzhu dang mchu/ 
224b2(rgyud): pa yis// lha dang mi sogs rang rang sna tshogs bsam pa rnams kyis phye nas rgyal ba sems la 'jug pa ni// skye ba med pa'i chos 'di chu dang nam mkha' bzhin du 'khrul pa 'dir ni bskyed par byed pa'o// yul dang yul can rnams
224b3(rgyud): kyi sems par dka' ba'i kun gyi rnam pa dang ldan rgyal ba'i sku rdo rje// sems can kun gyi rang rang bsam pa dang sbyar skad rnams kyis ni chos rnams go 'byed gsung rdo rje// sems can rnams kyis sems kyi rang bzhin sa la rdo rje
224b4(rgyud): can gnas sna tshogs snang ba thugs rdo rje// 'dzin pa po rnams gang gis sems nyid dri med nor bu dang mtshungs de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs drug bzhi'i rnam pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba de rnams nus ma bcu/ 
224b5(rgyud): ru gsungs// de rnams thabs ni byang sems mchog tu dag pas gang bas bum pa rnam pa bcu po rnams su 'gyur// bdud dang nyon mongs nges par zad par 'dod lta bde byed dag ste rdo rje tshogs ni ljon shing la sogs so// phyag
224b6(rgyud): rgyu drug ni stong pa drug ste srid gsum skye bar byed pa shes dang shes bya gcig pa'o// srid gsum ma lus drang ba 'khor lo yin te bde dang chags pa 'di dag rin chen pad ma'o// nyon mongs zad pa ral gri nyid dang dbyer med pa'i ye
224b7(rgyud): shes chen po'i sku ni rdo rje'o// mi shes gcod pas gri gug yin te rigs kyi mchog gyur drug po 'di rnams kyis ni gang bskyed pa// de rnams 'di ltar rig par bya ba nam mkha' bzhin na ro mnyam phung po khams dang dbang po sogs// / 
224b8(rgyud): gang gis rig par rigs kyi gzugs su gyur pa bcom pa de la gzugs ni chen por gsungs pa'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'du shes
225a1(rgyud): bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje chen po'i 'du shes nyid du gsungs// 'khor ba'i 'phel ba bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje chen po'i 'du shes nyid du gsungs// gnyid la sogs pa'i gan
225a2(rgyud): skabs bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rnam par shes par gsungs pa'o// mi shes pa'i dngos po bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rnam par shes par gsungs pa'o// mi shes pa'i dngos po bcom par gyur pa gang yin de/ 
225a3(rgyud): ni thob pa'i ye shes nyid du gsungs// de rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rgyal mchog dam pa rnams ste rnam pa drug ni rigs drug go// gzhan yang khams drug dbye ba rnams ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi rnams las/ 
225a4(rgyud): gti mug mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni spyan ma yin te de nyid sa ru gsungs// nga rgyal mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni gos dkar ma ste de nyid chu ru gsungs// 'dod chags mtha' dag bcom par gyur/ 
225a5(rgyud): pa gang yin rnams ni gos dkar mo ste de nyid me ru gsungs// phrag dog mtha' dgagra bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni sgrol ma nyid te de nyid rlung du gsungs// zhe sdang mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni rdo rje
225a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbang ma yin ste mkha'// ser sna mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni sna tshogs yum ste mi 'gyur bde ba'o// yid kyi nam mkhar nges par gzugs mthong ba ste de ma mthong de mthong ba gang yin pa de mig
225a7(rgyud): ring nas sgra brjod rab tu gsal bar thos par gyur pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o// dri rnams thams cad 'dzin pa nyid ste mchog tu badre bar 'gyur ba de ni khyab bdag dam pa'i sna// rang gi zla bzang bdud rtsi rtag tu myong ba
225a8(rgyud): yang dag bde ba ster ba gang yin de ni lce// rdo rje rag bya kun nas rgyun tu 'phrog pa de ni rdo rje lus kyi dbang por 'gyur ba'o// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa chos ste de las bde ba mnyam par zhugs pa gang yin don yid// 
225b1(rgyud): drug po 'di rnams dbye bas chen yul dang yul can dag ste byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas// gzugs sogs 'di rnams rgyal ba mchog gi yul ste rnam pa drug rnams gzugs brnyan bzhin du sprul pa rnams// dang / 
225b2(rgyud): po mo skye mi 'gag pa dang mchog tu bde 'dzag med rnyog med ye shes go bya ba// 'gro ba gzhan gyis bzung bar mi nus khams rnams kun gyi dbang po'i sgo rnams yang dag go ba yis// 'dir ni ye shes dgug par bya ba shin tu stobs
225b3(rgyud): can gyis te slar yang zhug pa rmongs byed kyis// rengs byed kyis ni nges par 'ching ste bde ba dam pa'i dbang las nga rgyal byed pas mnyes par byed// 'khor lo la ni ye shes 'khor lo ro mnyam par ni byed par rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa'o// 
225b4(rgyud): de ltar nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu gsal bar bya// srid gsum gnas su bdud rnams ma lus gdung bar byed pa dbyug pa sngon po can gyis mdzad pa ste// dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro ga/ 
225b5(rgyud): mi g.yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson 'grus so// ta kis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig ste sa stengs gyur par gnod mdzes rgyal po rengs par byed pa'o// gtsug tor can gyis rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i
225b6(rgyud): lha mo rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du'o// de nas yi dgas rnams ni smin bya'i don du gtso bos tsar tsi ka la sogs pa spros pa'o// de bzhin skye bo ma lus bsrung ba'i don du phyog dang 'tshams su dbang po la sogs lha rnams so// klu rnams/ 
225b7(rgyud): smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs ka'i rigs rnams mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o// gzhan yang lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi gdong can la sogs pa spros pa'o// gzhan yang gang zhig cung zad yod pa
225b8(rgyud): spros te khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni 'byung skyes mthar thug go// sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs rang gi lus las rig par bya// de ltar rgyud rnams dang ni sngags rnams sna tshogs rigs kyu/ 
226a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye bas so// 'di ni dbang nyid rnam pa gnyis ste bu'i yon tan dbang las 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa'o// gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nus pa reg pa nyid dang gzhan
226a2(rgyud): yang bdud rtsi myong bar mkhyud pa'o// shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang // de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par
226a3(rgyud): bstan pa'o// gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa// sems kyi snad ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges// ma lu
226a4(rgyud): rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byas na// ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung g.yul bcas mtha' dag sregs pa dang // chags pa la sog
226a5(rgyud): rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes zhes pas sems kyi snang ba nyid ste de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o// dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma
226a6(rgyud): med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lto bur nges// de nas bde ba 'jog pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par nges// de na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa
226a7(rgyud): de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o// nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis// stong pa la ni du ba smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba'i dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang // 'bar dang
226a8(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o// chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor/ 
226b1(rgyud): rtse cig gnas pa'i lta bas lta bar bya ba ni// ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so// der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du med pa'i sna tshogs mdog/ yul dang rnams
226b2(rgyud): bral ba'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no// sku mthong gyur nas nyin mtshan so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang // brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems kyi
226b3(rgyud): zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o// ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar// chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad
226b4(rgyud): cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo// mtha' dang 'bar ba'i dbus dang khyab par dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang // gnyid dang rgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje pad ma dag
226b5(rgyud): gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa// de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'o stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tsom med// bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gci
226b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba me dang chu'i gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir// me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung gi gzugs su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin
