226b7(rgyud): yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min// rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis// sgra tsam thig le cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas
226b8(rgyud): su 'gro dang lcags sgrogs bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje bdam bcas dang pad ma rdo rje ldan pa yis// dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul dang yul can med par
227a1(rgyud): gyur pa dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig bzung dang 'di rnams thams cad gsang ba chen po'o// dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa g.yas dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang // phyag
227a2(rgyud): rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde bar gyur pa rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du pad mar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad mas gsor ba yis// sa bon ma btang bde ba de na 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'jom
227a3(rgyud): pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do// sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu dang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du// rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur/ 
227a4(rgyud): bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o// mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul mngon grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyis skye ba 'dir// 'dod pa sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba gsung du rab tu
227a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// 'bar bar sprul pa'i thugs ste oM dang las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod// dgo' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa 'di dag rim pa
227a6(rgyud): yis// gsung dang thugs ste lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed// g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung // gnyid ni
227a7(rgyud): nges par chos kyi thugs ste tur+ya de'i ye shes nyid yon srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms// yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i tshe dang thig la sgro tsam rim pa yis// gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa/ 
227a8(rgyud): rnam gsum dag la gnas pa'i sku ru bskyed par bya// sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin nyid lag pa dang tur+ya'i rang bzhin rnams// lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul bskyod
227b1(rgyud): med pa'i sems thim pa// ye shes gnas dang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni// sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba'o// de ltar
227b2(rgyud): sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog tshogs rnams kyi thog le'i dbus// khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar byas pa ni// rnal 'byor
227b3(rgyud): rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed byed sa bon thig le btang na thar pa ga la 'gyur// de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya// a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyi phyed
227b4(rgyud): dag dang gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi rten mo yin// hU~M yig ladz+ha ni mtshan ma yongs gyur pa dang gzhan yang kha dog dang ni gzugs rnams 'dod pa min// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba yis 'gyur ba bcom ste skyes par gyur pa 'di ni lha yi// 
227b5(rgyud): dbang po ste// rnam pa kun gyis thig le sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa rnams kyi bdag po'o// le la sogs pa dbyangs yig brgyud las dbyangs yig phyed kyis rnam pa yon tan gyur pa rnams// phan tshun dbye bas tha dad rkang pa
227b6(rgyud): dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbus ma'i dbugs rnams rgyu ba'o// dus sbyor gnyis par yul dang yon tan dbang gi ring po rnams ste phan tshun dbye bas / shes par bya// phyis ni thun mtshams gsum par yul dang yon tan
227b7(rgyud): dbye bas shin du ring por dbus mA'i dbugs rgyu ste// de ltar thun mtshams bzhi pa ra bzhi dang bcas pa'i ri dang ro'i dbyangs bcas pa yi dbus mo'i dbugs kyi tshad// ka sogs yi ge sum bcu rnams la sum bcur spya
227b8(rgyud): bso rab tu gsol bar dgu brgya nyid du 'gyur// dbyangs yig drug gi dbye bas phye/ ma mkha' mkha' dus mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum dang rtsa gsum ste// de ltar gzhan yang ring bas rab tu phyen nyin mo'i dus la du// 
228a1(rgyud): @#/ sbyor gsum dang rtsa gsum mo// slar yang dbyangs yig drug po rnams kyis phye na nub mo'i dus la dus sbyor gsum dang rtsa gsum dang // de ltar nub mo gzham yang ring pos rab tu rtse bar gyur na dus sbyor gsum
228a2(rgyud): dang rtsa gsum mo// nyin mtshan so so'i dus su mkha' dang mkha' drug zla ba mig rnams 'byung dang rngub pa'i dbugs rgyu lo// snga ma'i stong pa blangs nas mnyam dang mi mnyam gyur pa la gnas dbus ma sbyar bar bya ba'o// phyi ru
228a3(rgyud): chu tshod brgyad kyi phyed po gang yin sgra gcan longs spyod las gzhan rab tu gnas par 'gyur// gang zhig rang gi lus la snga ma phyed ni srid gsum mtha' dag stong par thim dang mun par bcas// de nas mun par zhugs pa de nyid
228a4(rgyud): bshig nas 'gro dang dbugs phyed nges par mun pa brel ba yi// 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed pa nyid ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor pa nyid gcig tu brjod// zla ba dman dang nyi ma lhag pa gang yin khyab bdag mchog
228a5(rgyud): gi cha ste de 'dir thun mtshams bzhi// thun dang thun du 'gyur ba nyin mo mtshan mo'i dbang las dus sbyor phyed kyi dbye ba rnams kyi ni// dus kyi pho nya sum bcu drug ste ma bdag nyis 'gyur nyin mtshan tshes la brgyad gnyis phye bas
228a6(rgyud): gza' rnams dbye ba brgyad kyis nges par rab tu yin te gzhan du thun mtshams du ma'i phyogs kyi so so// rig byed 'tshams kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum bskyed par byed pa mkha' 'gro ma ste sna tshogs gzugs// gang zhig zla
228a7(rgyud): ba'i dbus su dman pa rgyal mchog bdag po de ni rang gi phyag rnam gnyis su 'gyur// gong zhig nyi ma la gnas te nyid phyogs 'tshams mdab mar dbye ba brgyad ste thun mtshams longs spyod mthur// lhag ma gzhan ni 'khor lo'i
228a8(rgyud): lha mo ma lus rnams ste phyi dang lus la mchog tu 'jig par byed// dal bar bug pa mun ldan chos dang lha yi bla ma nyid la phyed dang phyed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs// phyed bcas drug dang rig byed rnams su gyur pa rgyal mtsha/ 
228b1(rgyud): bdag po thugs rje las ni de rnams byung // sa skyes stong klu zla ba nyi ma gza' lhag pa pa sangs dang 'jug rings stong pa klu mkha' gcig/ nam mkha' mig dang mig gcig grangs rnams nges par khyab bdag dam pa'i dag pa'i
228b2(rgyud): gsung las de rnams byung // gang zhig zla ba'i mtshams la longs srong mkha' dang nam mkha' ro med rnams sku rdo rje las byung ba// mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro dang drug dang klu dang dus dang chu tshod phyed rnams de bzhin no// mkha
228b3(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams ka la'i gzugs kyis mkha' dag lus la gnas pos srog chags rnams kyi srog 'joms byed// de phyir de rnams nyin mtshan so so'i dus su rang gi lam dag 'gog pas bsgrub par bya'o// ji srid gza'
228b4(rgyud): rnams longs spyod rang dang gzhan la 'gro bar gyur pa dbugs 'byung rngub pa'i rgyu ba las// de srid ka la'i pho nya mo rnams gang zhig khams gsum la khyab byed ma ci phyir mchog nyid ster// pho nya mo rnams phra mor rgyu ba bla ma
228b5(rgyud): gsung las go bya byang chub sems ni 'gyur med la// sdig pa rnam par bral ba'i rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes ste gzhan yang chags pa'i sems kyis mi ni// nyi ma zla ba dag gi rkang pa rnams ni gnyis ka 'gro ba'i dbang
228b6(rgyud): las sred par bsgyur ba'o// yan lag rnams kyis thob pa lhag ma'i rkang par sgra gcan longs spyod pa la 'jug rings nyid kyang 'jug/ srog chags rnams kyi nyin mtshan so so'i dus la thun mtshams thun brgyad dag dang yan la/ 
228b7(rgyud): bcu gnyis ste// dbugs rnams dus sbyor re rer dgu brgya gnyis 'gyur srog rgyu ba ni yan lag zhes su gsungs pa'o// 'pho ba'i dbye ba gnyis gnyis rnams la dang po'i nyi mar ma rig pa nas yan lag bcu gnyis par// de bzhin
228b8(rgyud): rga shi la sogs yan lag gzhon yang dgu sogs gang dag de rnams snga ma bzhin du ste// de ltar rnam pa lnga rnams kyis na mtshams rnams su yang 'gyur ste zla ba gnyis pa thams cad la// gang zhig dang po'i zla ba dag la zla bI
229a1(rgyud): cha ni gcig nyid rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ba ste// zla ba drug gis mtshams gsum rnams la 'dzin par 'gyur ba rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// nyi ma rgyu ba mtshams drug dbye bas
229a2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i dbang las zla ba'i dbus su rab tu 'jug pa ste// der na rig pa'i yan lag dbus su sgra gcan rgyu bas zla ba nyi ma 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste// nyis mtshan gyi dus la sgra gcan gyis mthong ba yi dman gyur de
229a3(rgyud): nyid rnams la grub pa ste// sa skyes pa sangs gza' lhag zla ba nyi ma gza' lhag phye sangs rgyas sa skyes sngags pa nyid du la// sngags pa rnams ni nyin mtshan so so'i dus la lug sogs khyim rnams la gnas zhing can dus
229a4(rgyud): kun la/ zhi ba zla ba nyi ma'i khyim ste gza' lhag pa sangs bkra shis sngags pa spen pa'i khyim rnams la// rgyas pa dbang dgug dbye ba bsad rnams yin ste 'dir ni gal te zhing gyur na'o// zhi la dang por dkar po'i zhal dang rgyas/ 
229a5(rgyud): la lag par dkar po dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa'o// rengs par me yi thun la ser po nyid ste rmongs la rgya mtshor gser dang nyi ma mtshungs pa nyid// dgug pa lnga par dmar por 'gyur ste dbang la drug pa'i thun la nyi ma dang ni sprin
229a6(rgyud): nag mtshungs// bsad pa la ni ri lu zhal nag nyid ste bskad la 'dir ni gnag dang dkar bas nyin mtshan mtha' ma la// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i ri bong can nyid srog gi longs spyod lha yi rang bzhin 'di// srog gi/ 
229a7(rgyud): longs spyod 'di rnams mi dge ba yi 'bras bu'i dbang las bdag gis longs spyod sred pa yis// sdug bsngal rnams la rjes su chags pas gza' dang lag 'gro lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs la gsol btab pa// des ni zhi
229a8(rgyud): bar mi byed pa ste gang zhig yid kyi bka' drin las ni thar bar rab tu 'gyur// dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan bdag nyid med steng nas rnam gsum yon tan dbang las grangs su 'gyur// yul gyi yon tan dbang las de rnams che
229b1(rgyud): su bstan ste de nas slar yang yon tan dbang rnams kyis// 'phel ba 'byung ba rgya mtsho grangs rnams slar yang rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis de rnams bsgyur ba la// chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs ste slar yang gnyis kyis bsgyur bas chu
229b2(rgyud): tshad nyid kyi dbugs kyi grangs// gnyis dang gsum dang rgya mtsho mda' dang mtshams ri brgyad dang gza' bcu rnams kyi 'phel ba'i chu tshod 'di// de phyir sde tshan rab tu phye bas rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam du song ba chu tshod mtshams rnam
229b3(rgyud): suHsrid pa gsum la zla ba nyi ma rab tu rgyu ba gang bar byas na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster// ji srid rig byed rlung me rab tu yin te nges par gri gug dang ni nye phyis phyag na bsnams// 'khor lo rnams la yul dang yon tan dbang la mad
229b4(rgyud): dang rgya mtsho'i grangs kyis lus ngag yid rnams la// bsrung ba byas pas gtso bo nyid la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bdu ba la sogs lha mo brgyad// de ltar nyi ma la zhugs gtso bo dam pa ri bong can chas mkhyud pa sna tshogs pa'i gzug
229b5(rgyud): lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams la yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla nyi rnams kyis phyag byas so// gtso bo gang gi phra gzugs yon tan yul gyur rnams ni nang dang phyi rol mchog gi phyag rgya ste// de rnams khams gsum rnams kyi ma
229b6(rgyud): 'gro ma ste mchog tu 'jigs byed khro ba rnams kyang sems kyis bskyed// gtso bo'i dbang po srid pa gsum gyi gnas su song ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams dang rang gi yul bcas yon
229b7(rgyud): tan gyi mi khyud pa dang bkra shis sogs// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang gzhan yang de bzhin reg bya dang ste mun pa dang ni rdul// snying stobs sems rnams rim pas rab tu gsal bar sgra gcan nyid kyis de rnams la ni mkhyud par
229b8(rgyud): mdzad// de rnams nyid las ngal bar rgyu ba drug ste rnam gnyis gyur pa 'di ni myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu// rgyu ba drug dang brgyad po rnams la nges par yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas// dang par
230a1(rgyud): dbugs rnams yul dang yon tan dbye ba brgyad kyis mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyid kyis bskor nas gnas// 'gro ba drug la gnas pa rnams la khyab ste rgyun tu rnam gsum btang bas du ba la sogs pa// de rnas
230a2(rgyud): dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i sku ni bdud rtsi'i cha 'phro ba yis mkhyud pa ste// gang gis dbugs rnams bcad pas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// dbugs rnams bcad pa'i mthar
230a3(rgyud): ni rnam pa gsum dang 'gro ba rnam pa drug po 'di yang yod ma yin// thig le kun nas bkag pas khyab bdag dam pa'i bde bskal pa mtha' yas gnas par 'gyur ba yis// 'khor ba spangs ste mchog gi bla ma'i zhal nas
230a4(rgyud): gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom par byaba'o// spyod pa dang ni sgeg pa'i gzugs kyis mchog nyid 'jigs par byed pas rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes pa min// khyab bdag dus sbyor dag gis dbugs rnams kun la gza
230a5(rgyud): tshegs ma lus rgyu ba nges par 'gyur ba ni// mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mkha' mig me dang chu gter thams cad nang du stong par 'gyur ba dang // phyi ru lo na rnams kyis khyab bdag dam pa'i gnas nyid 'gags shing
230a6(rgyud): 'jig pa'i tshul du gnas pa de// rgyal ni bdag por rang rang tshad kyis rgyu ba dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro zhing gnas par shes par bya// rang rang nyin zhag stongs nas 'gro ba'i dbang las su mkha' nges par 'gyur te ngal
230a7(rgyud): ba'i 'jug pa ni// stong pa nam mkha' mkha' bzhi chu gter ri bong 'dzin rnams nyin zhag rnams kyis nam gru'i longs spyod mthar// mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dang rig byed mig rnams rang 'gro'i nyin zhag gyur pa
230a8(rgyud): de la sgra gcan 'jug/ nam mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dang nam mkha' mtshams dus rnams kyi rang 'gro nga yi nyin zhag rnams la lha yi sngags pa 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa nam mkha' brgyad dang klu mi
230b1(rgyud): nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis rab tu 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' ste mkha' mig me dang rgya mtsho'i grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' dang nam mkha' chu gter klu gcig mdar gyur nyin
230b2(rgyud): zhag ste rnams nyid la zla ba 'jug/ de yi dus su 'gro rnams rang rang tshad kyis rnam par 'jigs pa rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag kye// nyi ma zla ba shar ba de las rtsa rnams yang dag rgyu ba 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni// gcig
230b3(rgyud): dang gnyis dang gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri dang nor rnams 'phel bar gtsang ma'i rtsa// bug pa zhes bya 'og dang bcu pa steng gi lam du yin te shin tu phra ba nyid rnams so// phye nas sde tshan tha dad yon tan yul dang
230b4(rgyud): bcas pa rnams ni 'khor lo'i rtse nyid rnams su 'gyur// gtsug tor snying khA ri bong can rkang gnas gyur mgo dang nyi ma rgyu ba'i gnas gyur mgrin pa dang // lte ba rnams su 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dus dang lag 'gro mo bdag
230b5(rgyud): zla rgyu rnams kyis tha mi dang // sum bcu rtsa gnyis nyis 'gyur rnams dang nyi ma'i rkang pa tha mi dad par bsres pa la// brgya dang brgya bcu gcig pa gnyis ni gang zhig rnams kyi lag rkang tshigs gyur rnams kyi phye ba'i rtsa// 
230b6(rgyud): gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i gnas skye mgrin dang 'khor lo lhag ma rnams// brgya bcu rtsa gcig mthar gyur gang zhig rab tu gsal bar rnam pa bcu po gza' ste zhi dang drag/ de rnams kyi ni thog ma tha ma'i
230b7(rgyud): cha yi khyab bdag zhags su gyur pa dus kyi rtsas za ba// gza' yi mtha' yis zos pas srid gsum bskyed par mdzad pa mkha' 'grom rnams rdo rje'i sku ru 'gyur// gang zhig dang por stong pa'i ngo bo de nyid yul dang yon tan lag
230b8(rgyud): rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// khams dang phung po rnams dang slar yang mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams dang mnyam par rab tu 'jug/ sad dang rmi lam la sogs pa la rab 'jug 'gyur bas mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du
231a1(rgyud): med par gzhug/ de nyid rig bya sangs rgyas sum ste rdo rje tshig la gnas las rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya// khyab bdag sku yi stobs kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams lus la mchog la lha'i mig nyid du na
231a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// de yi gsung gi stobs kyis lha'i snyan dang de'i thugs kyis gzhan gyi sems la gnas par shes pa'o// shes rab sku yi stobs kyis srid gsum la gnas gyur pa skye ba snga ma rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes
231a3(rgyud): gsung gi stobs kyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs ma lus pa la kun tu rdzu 'phrul ston par byed// shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin stobs kyis gang zhig ma lus bde mnyam gzhom du med par 'gyur pa ste// lha yi mig gis
231a4(rgyud): stobs kyis srid pa gsum gyis mig gis ma mthong ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ba'o// lha'i rna ba'i stobs kyis srog chags rnams kyis smras pa'i zhal gyis sgra thos 'gyur zhing thugs kyis kyang // de lta reg bya
231a5(rgyud): la sogs thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor bas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// gang zhig dbus kyi rtsa nas thur rgyu'i lam gsum gyur pa gaN+DI dang gshang ba khu ba 'brub pa rnams// srog las rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu
231a6(rgyud): dang mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal nyid rnams su 'gyur ba ni// rna ba sna dang mig rnams rnam pa gnyis gnyis zhes byar 'gyur zhing lce chung lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le dang ni gtsug tor rnams kyi bug par 'gyur
231a7(rgyud): zhing rgyas btab ye shes can gyur bcu pa ste// srog dang thur du rgyu ba 'gags na g.yo ba'i ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gzugs su 'gro ba ste// pad mo rdo rje rab tu sbyangs pa las kyang nyi ma 'od zer rnams kyis 'dir zhu
231a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ nyi ma zla ba'i rlung rnams 'gags par 'gyur ba na yang shes dang shes bya gcig tu 'gyur ba ste// de ltar de bzhin yang na de ltar rnam gsum du yang 'gyur te cung zad gzhan nyid yod pa min// zla ba
231b1(rgyud): nyi ma gzung ba'i gzugs ni nam mkhar nyin mo min ste mtshan mo nyid kyang cung zad min// thun mtshams de ni rnal 'byor pa rnams lus kyi dbugs su dus rnams kun tu bdud rtsi'i gnas gyur pa// zla ba phyed pa zad
231b2(rgyud): pa'i nam mkha' la gnas nyi ma bzhin du lus nyid ro mnyam 'gyur ba'o// lus la srog dang thur rgya nges par zad de 'gags pa'i dus na gsal ba grub par brjod pa'o// lam gnyis srog rlung rgyun tu 'gog pas zla
231b3(rgyud): / ba nyi ma'i gzugs dag rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba ste// pad mar rdo rje rab tu sbyangs pas ri bong cen nyid zhu nas nyi ma'i gzugs la rab tu zhugs// yang dag rab tu sbyangs pas dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur pa dang
231b4(rgyud): rnam gsum gcig gyur gzhom du med// de lta cung zad dus kyi rnal 'byor pa de gnyis su med pa'i go 'phang mchog la 'gro byed pas// khro ba dang ni sangs rgyas lha mor bcos dang nges par ro'i rdo rje ma dang sa yi snying la sogs// / 
231b5(rgyud): mkha' la mngon sum nyid du 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa yi rab tu dga' ba'i thugs ni grub pa'i dus// ri bong can gyis nyin mtshan dag gi tho rangs sam ni nam phyed de la 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// dus sbyor khyad par 'phags pa
231b6(rgyud): rin chen me tog char pa rnams kyis sa'i steng du 'bar bar 'gyur// sku ni rdul phran rab tu zhig pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs dang ba'i mtshan la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum nyid sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmil
231b7(rgyud): lta bur dang bas sna tshogs mthong ba'o// gsung na rgyun ma chad par skad gzhan du ma rnams kyis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug par 'gyur ba ste// thugs ni bde ba dam pas gang ste 'gyur ba med par lhan cig skyes pas dus kun mkhyud pa'o/ 
231b8(rgyud): sa'i pra rab rdul rnams kun nas chu dang me dang rlung nyid rnams las chu'i khams las 'jug par 'gyur// chu yi phra rab me rlung dag las me la yin te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams las// me nyid bkug ste rlung la nges so slar/ 
232a1(rgyud): yangs dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams stong pa las// gang zhig las kyi rlung gis 'phangs nas srid pa rnam gsum dbang gis zhing gzhan rnams su 'gro ba'o// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gyur ba srid gsum ma lus bskyed
232a2(rgyud): par byed pa'i las dang bral ba la gnas pa// dag pa'i rdul phran sangs rgyas rnams dang gnyis ka ro mnyam pa ste byang chub sems nyid bcings pa de// rdo rje'i sras ste so so re re'i rdul phran rnams ni gnyis ka'i rigs kyi
232a3(rgyud): dbang gis bcings pa las// sa sogs nam mkha'i mthar thug rdul phran ma lus rigs rnams mi g.yo ba la sogs par rab tu zhugs// de rnams kyis ni lhan cig rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkhar bzhugs pa sam par ti
232a4(rgyud): dus kyi byar// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran tshegs rnams yang dag 'dzin par byed pa'o// srub cing srub par byed pa rdul phran so so ma lus ji srid gcig tu 'gyur gyi bar du ste// de rnams thams
232a5(rgyud): cad phan tshun sbyor bas slar yang gtso bo'i dngos dang phal po'i dngos por 'gyur ba'o// rlung chen rnams kyis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mo lus sna tshogs pa yi dbyibs kyi rnam par byed pa ni// 'jig rten khams 'gyur ro// 
232a6(rgyud): so rnams la slar yang khor yug chen pos kun nas rab tu bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su 'jig rten khams te gcig ni las kyis chen rang bzhin nyid du rab tu 'gyur ro// lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin rnams kyis yul la bde
232a7(rgyud): bar byed ste rin chen kun gyi rab gang rnams// ri'i bdag po ma lus pa'i shar du dag pa'i in dra ni la lhor ni pad ma ra ga'o// nub du ka ra ke ta nyid ser po yin te byang du ri bong 'dzin ltar dkar ba'i chu shel lo// dbus su lA
232a8(rgyud): khur 'gyur te 'dir na de yi nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po de yi snying po dang // dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid steng de nas de yi nyis 'gyur bar ma gsung gi rang bzhin no// de nas gzhan yang nyis 'gyur yin te// 
232b1(rgyud): mda' dang nam mkha'i stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ba'i dpag tshad do// de nas de yi phyi rol du ni 'tshams kyi 'khor lo'i tshul gyis 'jig rten khams rnams rang bzhin te// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug rnams kyis rlung
232b2(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor rig byed 'bum du 'gyur// brgyad gnyis ka ba rnams kyis khang brtsegs ri bong can ma mi yi bdag po bdag pos bskor ba skye gnas gzugs// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i
232b3(rgyud): bar la phyed dang bcas pa'i nyi ma'i sor mor 'gyur// de nas de bzhin mgrin pa'i chu skyes snying kha dag dang slar yang lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no// rkang 'thil rje da ra rA dang dpyi rnams ma nu de nyid rig byed rnams kyi rim
232b4(rgyud): pa yis// srang phyed phyed dang bcas pa'i nyi ma dpung par lag ngar phyag 'thal mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma rnams// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya dang 'tshams gter rnams kyis 'jig rten mi rnams gang zhig rnams kyi tshad// rig
232b5(rgyud): byed dang ni phyed bcas bzhi dang chu'i gter dang phyed bcas rig byed nyid dang rig byed kyi// gtsug tor dang ni mgo dang rgyal ba'i bdeg po'i dpal ldan dpral ba rang ni sna ru 'gyur ba dang // sna yi 'og nas kos ko'i mtha' dang slar
232b6(rgyud): yang mgrin pa'i rtsa'i chu skyes dbus nyid bar rnams la// de nas snying kha gsang ba rnams la phyed bcas nyi ma'i rim par 'gyur ro mi bdag kye// lte ba'i rtsa ba gsang ba'i chu skyes nas ni thub pa'i rdo rje gtsug tor steng gi bar/ 
232b7(rgyud): mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su 'gyur med bde ba bskyed byed khu ba'i thig le gnas pa gang // 'di ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa ste gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang las sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// phyed bcas pa yi nyi ma
232b8(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga dag dang de'i nyis 'gyur rnams kyis thugs gsung sku 'khor lo// thugs phyed rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis snying gnas lhan cig skye ba'i ye shes 'khor lo'o// dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams las sgo rnams
233a1(rgyud): / brgyad char byas par nor bu'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mdzes par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams la 'gro dang 'ong ba'i dbye bas steng 'og gnyis su 'gyur ba'o// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
233a2(rgyud): sor mo phyed la bsgyur ba nyid dang lhun po la gnas dpag tshad stong rnams kyis// de ltar sku yi tshad kyis lha ri phyed kyi rgya'i sar gyur rnams kyi tshad la yang ni de bzhin te// slar yang de yi phyed kyi steng na de nyid rdo rje'i rna
233a3(rgyud): pa cha gsum brtsegs par 'gyur ba'o// de yi phyi rus chu me rlung rnams dang gzhan yang 'bar ba dang bcas rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i snying kha lce mgrin chu skyes 'khor lo rnams la phyed bcas nyi mar 'gyur ba
233a4(rgyud): yis/ gsung dang sku yi 'khor lor 'gyur ste rdo rje gsang gnas nas ni steng gi mdzod spu mtshams nyid la// sgo yi ngos nas dpal ldan sgo yi yang phugs 'gyur ro mi'i bdag po dpral ba'i steng na gtsug tor mtshams// phyed bcas
233a5(rgyud): nyi ma sa chu me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba dang bcas rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// steng 'og bzhin du sangs rgyas spu nyid mnyam par 'gyur ba sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// zheng gi tshad du kun nas rlung gi 'gro ba'i dbang nyid
233a6(rgyud): las ste gsum 'am yang na drug rnams kyis// 'khor lo brtsibs brgyad so so rnams la rgyal ba'i bdag po sor mo rkang pa dang bcas drug rnams ni// zlum pa sgo brgyad pa ste rang gi lag 'thil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dud khro
233a7(rgyud): rnams su brtag/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor steng 'og zhal dang gsang ba'i bar la gnyis dang rgya mtsho'i tshad du 'gyur// de nas gsum gyis 'khor lo drug dang bcas pa'i phyed la raba'i dbus su snying po'i pad ma ste// 
233a8(rgyud): 'khor lo kun gyi lnga cha rnams kyis sgo dang 'gram la sogs pa rnams su nges par 'gyur ba'o// ma lus mchod rten gzugs nyid 'di ni shes rab min cing thabs ma yin ste lhan cig skyes pa'i sku// lhun po'i phyi yi 'og tu sa
233b1(rgyud): ste gnas la nges par dngos grub brgyad po rnan ni gdu ba ste// shar sogs ral gri bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ri lu mig sman ro tsa na// lho ru dpal ldan shing lham dang ni mi zad gtor nyid me 'tshams nyid du yin te dkyil 'khor/ 
233b2(rgyud): gyidabus su mchod phyir thogs pa lha dang mi'i bla ma tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi de bzhin nyid ldan pa'o// nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba dang ni mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang gyur pa rnams la rdo rje rnams// gcig gnyis rgya mtsho mda' dang klu
233b3(rgyud): dbang dang ni dgu dang nyi ma'i sor mo rnams kyis rim pa yis// stong dang dbus dang 'og rnams cho gsum zum pa dang ni rnam pA kha gyes zhi dang drag po la// dril bu yang ni de ltar cha gsum pa ste 'og tu rdo rje dang mtshungs pa lang gdong dang
233b4(rgyud): pad ma'i gzugs// de rnams rgya'i sum cha dang ni dbus su zhal ste de yi sum cha nyid dang gzhan yang mdab ma dang // rwa yi rgyu rnams phyogs dang 'tshams rnams mnyam ste bzhi cha dang ni ldan par gyur te snrums la'o// phyi rnams
233b5(rgyud): ra rnams cha gsum pa ste 'og tu gnyis dang ba da ri'i tsher mas rnam par sbyar// de bzhin dril bu'i zhal dang mdab ma dang ni rdo rje ba lang gdong sogs la yang de bzhin no// rgyal ba mchog gi bdag po'i gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzad
233b6(rgyud): spu'i mtha'i cha yos mchod rten 'phang gi tshad// de rnams phyed kyi gdan gyi rgyu ste sa bzhin shin du mnyam pa'i de yi sum chas phyogs cha la// gcig dang phyed bcas phyi ru dbyung ste chu skyes snying kha la gnas khor yug zlum po gdan
233b7(rgyud): tshad gis// pad ma'i cha yis bcum pa zlum pa 'og dang brang mtshungs pa ste de yi phyogs cha rnams kyis mgrin// zhal la gdon phyed cha rnams kyis ste so bzhin shin du mnyam pa de'i phyogs chas phyogs cha la// gsang ba'i chu
233b8(rgyud): skyes nas ni phyed bcas nyi mas shin tu mnyam pa'i spangs kyi tshad du 'gyur// gdon las chu skyes la sogs mtshams dang snying kho la gnas khor yug mtha' ste de nas mgrin rtsal mtha'// de nas zhal gyi mtha' nyid de bzhin
234a1(rgyud): / chu gter phyed bcas dus dang rig byed rnams kyi dum bu gsum// gdan nas rig byed tshad kyis pad ma snying kha la gnas khor yug mgrin pa rnams la de bzhin no// phyed bcas brgyad kyi zhal gyi tshad
234a2(rgyud): de yi steng du bdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro me yi dbang po kye// mdzod spu'i mtshams nas de bzhin 'dir ni dpral ba mgo bo dag dang gtsug tor mthar thug par nyid ste// de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams rnams mtha' dag
234a3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sku ste lhun po'i mchod rten rang bzhin no// gser nyid sa'i khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma me yi khams su yang dag 'gyur ba'o// lcags nyid steng du khab long stong pa 'dres pa zha nye dkar nag 'di ni
234a4(rgyud): khams mchog rang bzhin no// rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur te slar yang dkar po chu dang rin po che ni dmar po me// nag po rlung dang sngon po dang na ljang gu de bzhin 'dres pa nyid ste khams rnams las byung phyir// lan tshwas ste
234a5(rgyud): dang ra ba chu dang chab me dang kha ba rlung du rab tu 'gyur ba dang // skyur ba 'dres par 'gyur ste ska ba ro dang de ltar shing dang rdorje'i skye gnas rnams kyang ngo // sman dang bcud dang mchog gi bcud dang gzhan yang nor bu'i dbang
234a6(rgyud): po rnams kyang khams drug rnams kyis so// sa yi steng du reg rdo rje ma ni chu rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis nad rnams ma lus 'joms par 'gyur// sa yis zug rngu ma lus 'joms ste chu'i khams kyis dug rnams
234a7(rgyud): 'joms shing gzhan yang me yis ni// 'byung po rnams ste rlung gi sa rengs par 'gyur zhing nam mkhas drug pa'i lta bas rab tu ltung ba 'joms// ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'joms ste mi bdag yan lag lagan
234a8(rgyud): nor bu yang ni de bzhin no// chu dang bcud dang nir reg rdo sngags dang ni sman rnams mthu ni bsam mi khyab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ni ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas zhing la kun nas rab tu zhugs pa las/ 
234b1(rgyud): phyis ni sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba bsod nams dbang gis sbyor ba thams cad 'tshogs pa dang // zla ba brgyad kyi rang gi nyin zhag dbang las yan lag bcu gnyis rdzogs pa 'dir ni lhun po ste// mchod rten rnam par
234b2(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i steng gi dbus su rdo rje'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mi yi bdog po kye// phyi ru skar ma'i 'khor lo rnams dang steng du 'gyur ba'i las kyis sa la mi rnams gnas// gling drug longs spyod sa la bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu bcu
234b3(rgyud): rnams longs spyod gzhan yang lha la sogs pa rnams// brgyad kyi ral zhon pa'i lha yi dbang po me dang gshin rje lha min rgya mtsho rlung rnams dang // gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du khyab 'jug rgya mtsho'i gdong rnams
234b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa'o// chu srin rnam par shes pa dang ni stong pa'i khams ste de ltar 'dir ni bum pa 'du byed rlung // nya dang lug dang khyu mchog 'khrig pa rnams su 'gyur ba rnams ni tsher po me dang 'du shes dang // chu dang gzugs
234b5(rgyud): dang sa dang 'gyur med pa ste lhan cig skyes sogs ro rnams ka ra ka ta sogs khyim// 'di rnams rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnams dang ka tsa Ta pa ta sa ring thung lhag pa'i lha// lug zung ka ra ka ta la ri bong can dang dkar po nyi ma saM/ 
234b6(rgyud): ge bu mo srang rnams la// sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams ste gza' lag spen pa du ba gdengs ka sdig pa gzhu dang mda'// de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams ma lus phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po
234b7(rgyud): kye/ 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin 'gyur te 'dir yang rin chen kun gyis gang ba'o// sa gzhi gang zhig la gnas dpag bsam shing dang bcud dang mchog gi bcud dang rdul phran las byung ba'i// sman
234b8(rgyud): dang gzhan yang bcud kyi dbang po mtha' dag nad 'joms de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong bar// gang zhig tha mal pa yi rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo dang lcags su mthong bar 'gyur// yi dgas rnam
235a1(rgyud): kyis tshul me dang dmyal bar gnas pa'i mi yis kun na gcod dang 'bugs pa'o// 'di rnams dgrol ba'i don du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i dbang po las kyi sa la 'jug pa ni// mngal du
235a2(rgyud): 'dzin par mdzad ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed par mdzad pa dang // bdud dang nyon mongs ma lus bcom nas sa stengs gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni// skye
235a3(rgyud): ma'i sprul pa mdzad de slar yang bcom ldan 'das gyur de nyid dag pa'i skye las gshegs pa'o// de ltar dag pa rgyal ba'i sku las skyes pa zhig pas med pa srid pa gsum la gnas pa yis// sems
235a4(rgyud): can ku don du thams cad gtong ba'i rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyis bcings par byas pa min// de ltar 'jig rten dbang po bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas las las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye// sems can rnam
235a5(rgyud): kyi lam ster ba dang dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa lha gzhan cung zad yod pa yin// gang zhig rnams kyi chos ni bdag gzhan lus po mngon par 'joms dang rang gi bud med la rdzas chags// bu dang me yi
235a6(rgyud): sbyin bsreg dang ni 'brel pa shi ba rnams la zas gtor ba yis mtho ris thob// mchod sbyin don du phyugs rnams gsad dang yul du bsad par gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten 'gro ba dang // khrus gnas su ni lus
235a7(rgyud): mchongs pa lngas mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba'i chos de rnams kyis bde ster min// pa dngo ma dag gang yin khyod kyi bu mchog tu mo sngon dang chung ma sring mo rnams dang ni// rje ba rogs po'i sde tshan rnams kyis 'chib
235a8(rgyud): 'joms pa min ste zab mo'i lam nyid kho nas so// de nas nyi ma khyod kyis nga yi tshig mnyan gyis la thub ma lus rigs gcig 'jug par gyis// gang gi phyir na drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir/ 
235b1(rgyud): nga yis byin gyis brlabs par thar par 'gro// lus la dbyug pas bsnun pa'i sdug bsngal gang tshe yin pa de ni dbyug pa'i nyes pa yin zhe na// 'di ni dbyug pa min ste lag pa bsnun pas 'dir ni kun nas lag
235b2(rgyud): pa'i nyes pa yin zhe na// sems kyis bskyod pas 'di yang min ste sems kyang sdang ba'i khro ba'i sems kyis bskul bar nges pa yis// de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba rnams kyi dgra bzhin byang chub sems
235b3(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis bsad par bya// 'dod chags la ni zhe sdang la sogs nyes pa 'byung bas lha mi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dus las// de phyir de rnams rtsa nas dbyung ba'i don du mtha' dag rgyal sras
235b4(rgyud): rnams kyis 'dod pa sbyin par mdzad// de phyir sbyin pa'i rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu rab tu ster bsra bsod nams tshogs ni 'dir// rgyal ba rnams la rgyun du skyes pa 'jig rten gsum gyi
235b5(rgyud): gnyen skye dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed// 'dod chags gang gis sems can rnams ni nye bar 'jig par 'gyur ste de yis skyob pa rnam grol 'gyur// sems can rnams kyis gang zhig
235b6(rgyud): nyi ma so so'i dus su bsrung mdzad skyob par rnams kyis ster bar mdzad// sems can rnams kyi rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed rgyal ba rnams kyis bsrung bar mdzad// des na rgyal mchog spyod
235b7(rgyud): pa 'di ni lha dang klu dang lha min rnams kyis spyad par dka' bar 'gyur// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang yon tan dang ni yid dang blo dang nga rgyal dang ni srog/ gzugs sogs dang ni mig sogs dang
235b8(rgyud): ni yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams so// de rnams phyugs dang bcas pa'i mi rnams khyab byed rigs chen dang ni chu ngu rnams ni gang // rgyal po dang bcas mi rnams gong ma
236a1(rgyud): rigs kyis khengs pa'i nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs chen yin// mA k+Shi sa dang ni ra ma la ni chu ste tud tha ka nyid me ru rab tu 'gyur ba'o// tsa la rlung dang ra sa ka ni 'dres
236a2(rgyud): pa'i khams ni sa sa ga dang 'tshal dag nyid kyis drug/ kA k+Shi ka si mu zi ldong ros pa bla rnams ni mnyam pa nam mkha' bskyod pa me chu rnams// gtsag ni sa ste gang zhig ze cha rgya mtsho skyes dang kha
236a3(rgyud): ru tshwa dang thal cha rnams// / sa sogs skye gnas rnams ste na ba sa ra ma ya bag k+Sha ra sa rdzi k+Sha ra tshwal dang // ka tsa lo rna k+Sha ra de rnams mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi
236a4(rgyud): rang bzhin no// cong za'i chu ni sa ste ri bong can chu chu dang chu tshon mar gyur dug gi chu nyid dang // gzhan yang gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin rlung dang stong pa dag gi rang bzhin rnams su 'gyur ba'o// 
236a5(rgyud): mu zi ser po sa yi khams dang sa thu sring gi dug gnag rnams ni chu dang me dang rlung // ka la ku ta stong pa zhes bya gzhan yang nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga rnams brjod par bya// de rnams srog chags
236a6(rgyud): gzugs dang 'bras bu mgo bo dung la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs// de rnams lcagaso nyid drug ste lhung tsher rnams pa bzhi dang slar yang khab long lcags kyang de bzhin no// 
236a7(rgyud): 'dir ni grub dang ma grub bcud nyid rnam pa gnyis kyis 'bugs dang mi 'bugs pa ru 'gyur ba ste// grub pas lcags la 'bugs par byed cing gzhan yang zos pas de yi lus la 'bugs/ 
236a8(rgyud): par byed pa'o// gang zhig 'bugs med pa yi bcud la bzhu zhing dag par byas pas bcud du rab tu 'gyur ba ni// lcags la 'bugs pa dang ni rjes su 'bugs shing rul pa'i
236b1(rgyud): lcags rnams spangs pas nad rnams ma lus 'joms// dang por me la de nyid seng pa tsam gyis rim pas zhu nas du bas rang bzhin 'gro ba ste/ sgra dang mchongs nas 'gro dang slar
236b2(rgyud): yang rab tu de nyid g.yo dang g.yo ba med pa rnams su 'gyur/ sgra dang ldan pa mdab mas 'bugs par 'gyur zhing mchongs pa kha bcad pa yis 'bugs te g.yo ba ni// mdung gi
236b3(rgyud): phug pas 'bugs te dag pa gsum du 'gyur zhing slar yang g.yo med dag par byas pa'o// sman bzangs rnams dang 'ju byed stobs kyis lcags rnams thams cad rab tu zhu bar
236b4(rgyud): gyur nas stobs ldan 'gyur/ 'dir ni gang la de rnams med nas stengs gnas su de nyid gang gis 'ching bar byed par 'gyur// bcings pas mkha' spyod nyid du 'gyur te sla/ 
236b5(rgyud): yang de bzhin zos pas 'chi ba 'jig par 'gyur ba ste// sa yi bdag po rnams la ye shes med na bcud kyi dbang po 'di nyid rab tu 'bad pas sgrub// de rnams rdzas ni dpag tu
236b6(rgyud): med pas glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnams don du zad par 'gyur ba ste// gang zhig gser 'gyur don du mi bsreg pa dang chos kyi don du mi ster brlag gyur mi bdag kyi// gang zhig rdzas
236b7(rgyud): rnams sdig pa'i don du brlag par byed pa'i phyir na de ni sdig pas bcings pa'o// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can don du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad pa'o// 
236b8(rgyud): gang zhig zangs ma'i mdab ma nyid la byugs pa tsam gyis dri ma 'phral du 'joms pa de nyid sman// bsod nams ldan pas sa la mthong ste nad rnams ma lus 'joms shing lcags rig
237a1(rgyud): 'ju bar byed pa'o// gang zhig gzhan rnams kyis kyang nges par lo yi dus kyis 'dir ni rab tu 'gyur ba 'ching ba ste// bdug pas yang dag bstim pa'i
237a2(rgyud): sbyor ba rnams kyis stong 'bugs pa ste de las lhag par mi 'gyur ro// k+Sha ra rnams kyis tshogs dang bsgyur ba'i tshigs rnams shin du rtsub pa'i sman du gyur pa ma lus la// 
237a3(rgyud): sangs pos rab tu mnan cing rgyun du de nyid rnams la mnye ba dang ni bdug par bya ba'o// dka ra mo rnams kyis dngul gyi don du 'gyur te me tog kus mas sa bon dag par dag par
237a4(rgyud): byed// gnyis 'tshegs so ha dza na 'ching bu byi na a sA kan dang dug rnams snum gyi nang du mnye// chu shring tse kra ka sogs thal bar rta dang glang chen mi rnams chu yis lan bdun bsang
237a5(rgyud): byas la/ k+Sha ra rnon po ma lus pa dang slar yang nye ba'i dngul chu sbyangs pa rnams dang bsre bar bya// me yis yang dang yang du 'dug pa lan brgya'i bar du mgo bo dang ni bskams
237a6(rgyud): par bya ba dang // de ltar dung gi bye ma dag kyang lan brgyar 'dug ste mu zi nyid kyang bsgong zhing bskam pa'o// lcags rnams 'ju bar byed pa'i phyir nai bi Da zhes su brjod pa 'di
237a7(rgyud): ni dngul chu'i brgyad char 'gyur// nub brgyad par du khyogs kyi steng du 'dug pa dngul chu'i dbus su gzhug pa ji srid zhu ba'i bar// bskol bas shin du dri ma med par 'gyur
237a8(rgyud): zhing stobs dang ldan ste mnye ba dang ni 'dug pa las// lcags gcig bzhu bar gyur pas nyi mi ri bang can gyi gzugs kyis lcags kyur thams cad sbyar bar 'gyur// de yis kun la
237b1(rgyud): khyab cing dag byed rims kyis 'joms ste zha nye tshon mo sngangs dang spra tshil bcas// de lto ma gang zhig dngul chu'i las rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bya ba rnams// 
237b2(rgyud): dus gzhan rnams kyis bcings pas gsal dang lci ba 'khregs pas nyes pa thams cad grol bar byed pa ni// de yis nad dang 'chi ba bcas dang mchog gi lus dang dbul dang sdug bsngal
237b3(rgyud): thams cad 'joms pa'o// 5/ gser gyi pad ma khru phyed pa las nor gyi mdab ma dang ldan dbus kyi lte ba'i za 'bru la/ dag pa'i rdo rje dang ni dbang po gshin rje nor sbyin rnams su in
237b4(rgyud): 'dra pad ma chu shel dang // nub tu rin chen ka ra ke ta ste me dang bden bral dbang ldan rnams su lcags dang zangs dang dngul// rlung gi mdab mar gser ste dang ni lhang tse ra las
237b5(rgyud): byung gdan ni lte ba'i steng du dgod pa'o// de yi steng du gser las byung ba'i 'dzam b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne ler bcas dang mchog sbyin mdzad// mA rab ma rnams
237b6(rgyud): la gser las byung ba 'am ni dngul byung lha mo brgyad rnams chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag/ sangs rgyas rin chen nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ldan cod pan dbang por gnod sbyin mo rnams de
237b7(rgyud): dang mtshungs/ haM ha la sogs thung dang ring ba'i yi ge brgyad kyi rim pas phyogs 'tshams mdab ma rnams lnga'o// me tog dri sogs de ngul gyi snod du nyin zhag so so'i thun mtshams
237b8(rgyud): gsum du mchod par bya// thog mthar oM dang swA hA'i dbus su dzaM b+ha la dang de ltar dza len dra ya'i sngags 'di yis// rab tu dga' zhing dang ba'i yid kyis smra ba bsrung ba'i don du chu/ 
238a1(rgyud): sbyin bya'o rgyal po kye// de ltar bsrung ba'i cho gas 'byung po'i mgon dang klu'i mgon po dag gis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// so phag k+Sha ra sgyur ba'i sde tshan rnams kyis
238a2(rgyud): nyi ma bcu ru dngul chu mnye zhing bdug par bya// blangs ste snyigs mar gnas la slar yang de nyid du ni dus rnams kun du krugs par bya ba dang / yang ni snyigs ma de la dngul chu gang tshe zhugs// 
238a3(rgyud): na shi bas de yang de ni bzhu bar bya// dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za zhing de bzhin gzhan rnams kun gyi skye gnas kyang ni za bar byed// zha nye rnon po ra ga na zangs dang sprin skyes rnams dang gzhan
238a4(rgyud): yang zhing skyes rnam par dag pa rnams// cha mnyam pa dang gcig spangs dang ni dngul chu dag gi bya bar lhang tser dkar po skyes dang chen mo sdings// dang po'i drug bcu'i cha'i bza' ba nyid
238a5(rgyud): ste de nas gzhan yang cha re rnams kyis 'phel bya ba// ji srid rkang pa'i cha'i bar nyid du ni rab tu sbyin ste de las lhag pa ro sbyin mi bya// zla ba phyed pa cig tu bzhu bas rnam par dag
238a6(rgyud): pa 'di la sa bon nyis 'gyur zhes pa ste// de ltar gnyis dang gsum dang brgyad 'gyur rnams ni bi da sa bzhu zhing slar yang bzhu bar 'gyur ba 'di// dngul chu zhu bar gyur pa
238a7(rgyud): 'di ni gzhan yang nyin mtshan brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i bdug pa bya// reg rdo rje dang ni sman bzangs rnam la lcags nyid me la gnas dang kha bral ba yis bzhu bar bya// lhang rtser ba yi
238a8(rgyud): lcags kyis brgyad 'gyur stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ste de zhu ba las brgyad 'gyur ro// de nas sa bon brgyad 'gyur nyid ste gzhan yang de las rin chen rdo rje brgyad du 'gyur ba'o// de
238b1(rgyud): ltar rin po che dang lcags dang nye ba'i dngul rnams me yi dbus su bzhu bar bya ba ni/ de ltar khol ba'i bar du rab tu yin ste de yis 'bum phrag du mu ra rab tu 'bigs par 'gyur// reg
238b2(rgyud): rdo dang ni sman dag med na mchog gi bi Das mnye dang bdug pa rnams kyis bzhu ba ni/ 'di nyid g.yo ba med pa'i bar nyid dag par 'gyur te de nyid gser dang mnyam par byas pa de/ 
238b3(rgyud): gzhan yang gser dang dngul chu dag la til mar blugs ste bzhu ba dang ni rdzas kyi snod nyid du// brgyad cha'i dngul chu zha nye dang zhugs gser nyid nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur bar du 'bad
238b4(rgyud): pas blug par bya// gser dang rnon po zha nye zangs rnams zha nyid rA da ra dang ldong ros mu zi gsad par bya// gser gyi don ste dngul gyi bya bar dngul dang chen mo sdings dang lcang rtser ma
238b5(rgyud): k+Shi ldong ros so// de dang mnyam pa'i k+Sha ra dang ni bi Da cha rnams nye ba'i dngul chu lcags dang mnyam pa la// 'khris pa bsgyur ba rnams kyis nyin mtshan bcu ru mnye bar byas ste de nas rdo/ 
238b6(rgyud): dbus blugs par bya// sa 'og bcu ste zla ba drug tu steng du mi yis dus rnams kun du gzhug par bya'o// dngul chu'i sgra dang bcas pa dag pa bcu drug cha yis zangs nyid 'bugs par 'gyur/ 
238b7(rgyud): ste de nas yang // zangs ma zla ba gcig gis gser du 'gyur te gser 'gyur mkhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur// dag pas zas la bug pa dngul gyi brgyad cha byin pas dngul
238b8(rgyud): du yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba'o// sa gzhi gang zhig rnams la rdo rnams 'bras bu'i gzugs dang dung dang mgo bo la sogs gzugs 'dra ba// de nyid rnams kyi skye gnas de nyid rnams la
239a1(rgyud): sbyin ste mar dang sbrang ldan sdud pa drag tu bzhu// slar yang k+Sha ra'i tshogs rnams byin la ji srid dag pa'i bar du sbyang bar bya'o// bcud mkhan po yis lcags kyi skye gnas
239a2(rgyud): shes nas de nyid kyis ni nyis 'gyur yang dge ba zhu bar bya// 'bras bu gsum po che mnyam bskol ba'i chu yis nyin mtshan bdun du khong pa dag par byas pa dang // nges par sman gyis bsad
239a3(rgyud): pa'i lcags phyed dang ni mar dang sbrang rtsi dngul chu dang ldan pa rnams dang // ba lang 'o ma gsar dang rgan dang sa lu zla ba phyed kyis dbus su mi yis bza' zhing btung // lo ma dang ni skyur dang cha
239a4(rgyud): dang nya dang mar khu me rnams bzhu ba lus nges rnam par spang bar bya// stong phug pa dang de las brgya yis bsgyur dang bye ba phug gi bar du shes par bya ba ni// nyin mtshan so so'i dus su nas dang yungs
239a5(rgyud): dkar tshad dang tha ma skye che'i tshad tsam bza' bar bya// khang zangs sa 'og khang par grang pa dang ni rlung dang nyi ma'i 'di rnams bral bar gyur pa ru// dbu ma 'di yis zla drug rnams kyis gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar
239a6(rgyud): bral ba'i lha yi lus su 'gyur// ka ra ko tau dang de ba da dang tsha ba gsum dang 'bre ha ti dang nim pa ki ran ta// bskol ba'i khu nyin mtshan gsum du mthong bas 'ju bar 'gyur ste dang pa'i bar du snang bar
239a7(rgyud): bya// de ltar zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me yi chu dang dug chu rdo chu ba la ta ka'i chu// dri ngan spu ming shi la bi Sha ka la sha ka dang ste gzhan yang chal pa la ba rnams sngags// gang zhig zos pas dug
239a8(rgyud): ltar shin du rmongs pa ster bar 'gyur ba'i sman nyid de rnams ma lus pa// phyi mar byas pa de nyid cung zad tsam dang mar dang snang rtsi ldan pa de bzhin bza' bar bya// sems can ma phyugs gang zhig rnam
239b1(rgyud): kyis sman de zos pas gsal bar gyur na dngos grub ster ba min// de rnams gang zhig rnams la mchog tu 'jigs byed mchi ste de yis rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rdzir 'gyur// mu zi dngul chu
239b2(rgyud): mnyam pas Da Da u dpal lam ni sa la'i mdab ma ud pa la sa ri rnams// khab long lcags kyi snod du lcags kyi tun bus nyin mtshan gsum du yang dag mnye bar byas pa dang // gang
239b3(rgyud): zhig zla ba drug gi nyon mtshan so so'i dus su tang ka'i rkang pa'i tshad kyis za byed pa// mdze la sogs pa'i nad dang gnyer ma dang ni rgas pa bral nas de nyid brgyad nyis lo lon bzhin/ 
239b4(rgyud): baM ga ni dang a ka sa dang dug phye ki ri tsi na nus rab tu g.yo ba'i dngul chu gsod/ sman gzhan rnams kyis bsad dang a ru ra dang g+ha na dzA dang gser dang khab long lcags mnyam rnams
239b5(rgyud): sngar gsungs pa yi khab long lcags kyi snod du dri ma bral dang srog dang bcas pa'i dngul chu dag/ cha gnyis bsres pa sdang drug ma nu ra ba dang ni chur khus gnyer ma sba dkar
239b6(rgyud): bcas pa 'joms par byed/ de yi stobs kyi lus kyi dngos grub rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba zla ba drug dang gnyis dang gcig/ nyin mtshan mi bdag dang ni bcu dang bdun
239b7(rgyud): bdun dang gsum dang nyon mtshan gcig dang skad cig rnams kyis so// las dang ye shes dang ni 'jig pa'i dus dang rnam par bral ba'i dam pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ni// skyes
239b8(rgyud): skyes bu dman dang 'bring dang dam pa skyes pa snga ma dge ba byas pa'i rjes su 'breng ba'o// 'khri shing dang ni ljon shing lugs las bzlog dang nyin mtshan sa sa'o/ 
240a1(rgyud): dus su gang du dud 'gro brtsod pa dang // der ni mi yi mar khu pad ma'i sdong bu dag gi mar me ral gri la bzhag gter gsal 'gyur// gnas der 'byung po'i
240a2(rgyud): bdag po'i sngags ni nyin mtshan so so'i dus su rab tu bzla bar bya ba ni// ji srid snang ba byin gyis bar ste de nas sngags pa rnams kyis bskor na rdzas kyi dngos grub 'gyur// / dang por skye gnas
240a3(rgyud): drug la rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje sngags kyis byin gyis brlab cing bsgrub par bya// gnod sbyin mo rnams la ni sgrub par byas nas slar yangs yi steng du zhing sgra bsgrub par bya// klu mo rnams la bsgrub par bya// 
240a4(rgyud): nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang ni bcud len sman rnams bsgrub par bya// mkha' 'gro ma rnams la ni bsgrub pa byas na mchog tu 'jigs byed lha ma yin rnams bsgrub par bya// 'dod chags la sogs rnam
240a5(rgyud): la bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pas bsgrub bya// du ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par byas nas 'chi ba 'jigs byed dbus ma rnams ni bsgrub par bya// srog la sogs la bsgrub pa
240a6(rgyud): byas nas ri bong 'dzin dkar zhu ba las ni thig le rnams bsgrub bya// dam pa'i bde la bsgrub pa byas nas lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyal ba'i sku ni kun 'gro bsgrub par bya// sems can rnams la
240a7(rgyud): 'chi ster gang zhig 'chi ba med par kun gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// gang zhig bgrod par bya min 'dod pa'i dngos grub srod gsum gnas su de nyid bsam gtan
240a8(rgyud): nyid kyis thob// ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' de yang nges par rnyed sa bde bas byin brlabs rdo rje pad ma ru// de lta bas na de bzhin rdo rje can gyis srog chags rnams la rgyun du bde mnyam
240b1(rgyud): 'bras bu ster/ sgra gcan dus me'i zla nyi bzhin dang sa dang chu dang byin za dang ni rlung dang stong pa rnams/ nges par lnga ru bstan ste gza' tshogs gyur pa gzhan rnams
240b2(rgyud): drug dang de nas gzhan yang lhun po yi// phyogs kyi gling rnams rnam pa bzhi ru rab tu 'gyur ste phyi rol du ni yul lnga rnams su brjod// snying stobs la sogs pa rnams yon
240b3(rgyud): tan gsum dang gzhan yang de ltar lus kyi dbus su bzhin te// dang por pad mar rnam shes dang ni dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi la sogs bzhi dang de nas yang // rus pa la sogs
240b4(rgyud): gang zhig ma lus pa rnams lnga ste de nas mig la sogs pa drug nyid do// lag pa dag dang rkang pa dag ni bzhi ste lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams kyang lnga// de nas nyid la tshigs
240b5(rgyud): gyur gsum ste rim pa 'di yis kun la ma lus pa la rig par bya// / rab tu dbye ba rnams kyis sa bdag de nyid ro la ros bsgyur nyi ma rnams dang nyi shu dang // drug bcu'i dbye
240b6(rgyud): bas mi rnams cha shas bcas pa'i lus gnas rnams la bug po drug dang zla ba'i grangs// de rnams thams cad bsdus par gyur na dgu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi dang lnga bcu'i srog rgyu
240b7(rgyud): ba// gang zhig gza' rnams la ni rab tu rgyu ba de yang gzhan la rnal 'byor ma'i rgyu bar gsungs// // ye shes nam mkha' gnyis su nges ste slar yang 'drir ni theg pa dkon mchog
240b8(rgyud): rtsa ba rnams la gsum// nyon mongs bdud dang tshangs pa'i gnas dang de ltar gzhan yang nges ste rdzu 'phrul rkang dang zag pa dang // mi 'jigs pa rnams dang ni bden pa rnams dang de las
241a1(rgyud): gzhan dang slar yang dran pa nyer gzhag dang // bsdu ba'i dngos dang yang dag spong ba bzhi rnams rgyal ba'i bdag mo'i rdo rje dang ni bsgom bya rnams// mngon shes lnga dang
241a2(rgyud): stobs dang dbang po lta ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchog gi rigs kyi spyan rnams lnga// de ltar phung po dbang po yul bcas pa dang rjes su dran la drug ste byang chub yan lag mchod// bdun dang gzhan yang
241a3(rgyud): skyabs bzangs yan lag brgyad rnams so sor ston dang rnam par thar dang gzugs can brgyad// bug pa zhes bya nges par gsungs rab yan lag dgu dang gzhan yang phyogs kyi tshan gyi sa rnams dang // 
241a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang dbang bcu rnams dang sbyangs dang rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyis// skye ba dang ni nges par log ste de bzhin dgu pa nyis 'gyur sangs rgyas chos rnams ma// 
241a5(rgyud): 'dres dang // mtshan rnams sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnams dang gzhan yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpe byad brgyad bcu tham pa yi// de ltar lus la khyab bdag dam pa'i gzhi rnams ma lus sngags pa rnams kyis sgom
241a6(rgyud): brgyad bya ba'o// // zla ba gzugs dag gcig ste gshin rje lag pa mig dang zung dang phyogs dang bgrod pa rnams ni gnyis// 'jig rten dang ni dus dang yon tan me rnams gsum ste rgya mtsho dus dang rig byed gsung
241a7(rgyud): rnams bzhi// mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams su gyur pa lnga ste nges par ro dang 'tshams dag drug nyid do// gza' dang ri dang thub pa rnams ni bdun gyi grangs ste de bzhin klu dang nor lha dag ni brgyad// rtsa dang bug/ 
241a8(rgyud): pa 'dzin byed gter rnams nges par dgu ste phyogs nyid bcu dang drag po bcu gcig yin// nyi ma yan lag me dang ma nu gnas dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis la sogs re res 'phel// skyon ni bcwo brgyad
241b1(rgyud): yin te de bzhin gzhan yang rgyal mchog ma lus pa rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de nyid yan lag nyi shu lnga ste gnyis skye zhes bsngags gnyis lha gsum bcu nyid du 'gyur ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du ni nges par rdo rje ca/ 
241b2(rgyud): gyis rdo rje'i tshig rnams sbas pa las// srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i don du dang po sangs rgyas rgyud du ma lus mngon sum gsungs pa yis// de phyir 'jig rten pa'i rgyud kyi bla ma ma lus ma tshang med pa 'jig rten la
241b3(rgyud): 'das pa// dpal ldan dang po sangs rgyas rgyud du rgyal ba mchog gi dang po mngon par brjod byed zla ba zad kyi// gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa ste sgra dang dri dang ro yang med// reg bya/ 
241b4(rgyud): dang ni gzugs med sems dang rang bzhin skyes bu med ste bcings dang grol dang byed po med// sa bon gsal dang dus rnams med cing srid gsum mtha' dag sdug bsngal bde ba'i rang bzhin med pa yi// mya
241b5(rgyud): ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med pa byed po dang bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// gnag dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang ni skyes bu dpe med kun du 'gro dang smra ba med pa dang / rna ba dang ni sna dang kha
241b6(rgyud): kha dang mig dang mgo bo rnams dang lag rkang rtag par kun nas gnas// 'byung ba'i mtha' ste sems can kun gyi mgon po srid gsum 'dzin pa 'dzin par byed pa rgyu rnams rgyu// rig
241b7(rgyud): ma'i gtso bo rnal 'byor go bya bde ba dam pa'i gnas ste dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal// bskyed mdzad stobs ldan gzugs can dri med klog dang mtshungs pa nyi ma bcu gnyis dang mnyam
241b8(rgyud): gzi byin can// ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi gan su yang dag 'gro ba tsheg drag de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong bang 'dzin pa las
242a1(rgyud): 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bo'i steng gnas pa'i// bdud brtsis 'chi ba bshigs nas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems nyid tsam te gags kyi gzugs
242a2(rgyud): la lha yis yongs su bskor ba bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can// skyes bu dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ste rang bas nyams myong gdug pa rnams la gdug byed pa// gang gis las rnams gang dang gang rnams rang gi/ 
242a3(rgyud): yid kyis cho ga bzhin byas de yi 'bras bu ster// 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum bskyed byed rdo rje sems dpa' la ni phyag 'tshal lo// gcig dang du ma yang ni gcig la mnyam dang mi mnyam pa
242a4(rgyud): yang mtshungs ste g.yas dang g.yon mdun dang rgyab// steng dang 'og rnams nges par kun nas dkar dang sngon po ldong khu kha dog chen po sna tshogs gzugs// thung ring shin du ring ba'i yon tan bral zhing yon tan dang bcas bud
242a5(rgyud): med skyes par snang na yang // skyes pa bud med min pa gang zhig kun gyi rten cig b+ha ga mchog nyid de la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i 'jig rten rnams su nyon mongs rnams bral dpal ldan bla ma gang dag rdo rje 'dzin ni nga // de la nyes
242a6(rgyud): pa byed pa'i srog chags rnams ni nges par 'dir ni dmyal bar 'gyur ste ngo mtshar med// de mnyes pa yis bdag mnyes ste de la khro bo'i me chen byed na bdag la khro ba yi// sems can rnams la de yis bde mnyam 'bras bu'i
242a7(rgyud): thar pa ster bas phyag bya mchod bya sras rnams kyis// dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal bzangs pad mar dus gsum rnams la phyag ni mi 'tshal ba las sdig can gang // dus gsum rnams su sna tshogs me tog rnam pa mang pos maN+Dal ni
242a8(rgyud): byed de las rmongs pa gang // myur bar bde ba ster bar bla ma skyo ba bskyed par byed pa gang zhig mnar med pa ru 'gro/ shes rab ye shes thob po gang na mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs gang mi spong ba de nyams pa yin// su zhig nyams
242b1(rgyud): na gang zhig rtsa gsum pa la rlung rnams dpag med dus su gsod med nyams pa'o// dpa' bo gang na mnyam dang mi mnyam lam du srog dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams gsod byed gang // sbyin bdag gang na dpal ldan bla ma rnams
242b2(rgyud): la rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs gang 'bul rnams// dman pa gang na slu byed rang snying nyon mongs pa yi sems kyis mgugs payi g.yo rgyu can rnams gang // dpal ldan chos kyi 'khor lor kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gdan
242b3(rgyud): de la ni sangs rgyas nyer bzhugs la// lha mchog rnams kyis btud nas mi yi bdag po zla bas zhus pas de nyid lha dang mi yi bla ma yis// khong du chud nas sems can kun gyi don rgyur rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas de nyid
242b4(rgyud): gsungs// de yang a li ka li dang ldan sdus brgyud dang ni nga yis nyi ma khyod la gtad do kye// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa las nga yis dus kyi 'khor lo me tog phreng ba 'dzin bsdebs pa// pad ma dkar po khyod kyis sngags
242b5(rgyud): pa rnams la nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'dzin 'di nyid bstan par gyis// nyi ma dang bcas thub rigs rnams kyis 'di yis ji lta ba bzhin shes rab ye shes nges par thob gyur cig/ de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid gsum la
242b6(rgyud): gnas sems can rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur bar shog/ nyi ma khyod dam mi yi bdag po srid pa gzhan du dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor kho na las 'dir ni// bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa mi yi bdag po 'jam dbyangs nyid dang de la dga'
242b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba yi// dpal nyid sgron ma pad dkar mtha' dag yon tan gter gyur 'jig rten mgon po pad ma'i phyag mtshan can// ud pal la yi sdong bu bdag gzhan snga ma'i srid par thams cad ji lta ba bzhin nges par ltos// bdag dang
242b8(rgyud): gzhan rnams kun gyi srid pa snga ma'i ud pal sdong bu ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas ni// nyi ma dang bcas thub dbang rnams kyis dbu brgyan bcas pa'i dbu yis rigs cig zhabs kyi pad ma la// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar te btud nas smras
243a1(rgyud): @/ thub pa'i rigs rnams mi zad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las// gdon phyir ye shes lam la mchog gi snying rje yis ni 'god par byed pa ston pa gcig tu kye// bkres dang gzhon pa nyid kyang khyod ste ma lus rgyal sras dang sgo
243a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyang khyod// bud med dang 'dus pa dang tshangs par spyod dang mchog gi snying rjes 'jig rten gnyen dang gshin rje gshed// khyod ni zhi dang thog gi mchog ste khyod nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dang ni bdud kyi bdud// 
243a3(rgyud): grol ba yang ni khyod ste 'gro ba smin bya'i don du srid pa 'dir 'jug pa yang grags pa khyod nyi ma// bdag dang bram ze'i thub pa'i rigs rnams kun gyis zhabs kyi drung du phyag byas lhung ba dang // sems can ma lus bsgral ba'i rgyu
243a4(rgyud): dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa stengs gsal por bsgrags par mdzad// dpal ldan ka la pa ru nyi mtshungs rigs cig rigs la sa yi bdag pos phyag byas pa yang khyod// mi zad 'khor bar 'jigs pas khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad ma la
243a5(rgyud): ni skyabs su lhag par mchis pa dang // dpyid zla ra ba tha chungs nya ba'i mtshan mo 'das nas nyin mor rab tu zhugs pa'i dus nyid la// sna tshogs bdag pos byin gyi brlabs kyis nyi ma thub pa'i skye bor bcas pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub
243a6(rgyud): thob/ bdag gi sems kyi rdo rjes stengs ma lus song bas sems can rnams kyis thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur ltar// dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid pa rnam gsum sems can rnams kyi don la 'gro ba byed par shog/ mchog gi snying rjes
243a7(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don rnams mdzad pa po yis rgyud kyi don rnams bstan mdzad nas// rab mchog yon tan kun gyi gtor ldan sras po pad ma dkar po nyid la bka' stsal gnang ba ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag tshangs pa nges par glegs pas
243a8(rgyud): la gnas byas pa 'di la 'jig rten gnyen// khyod kyis dang por nges par rgya che 'grel pa gyis la de nas mchog gi go 'phang 'gro bar mdzod// steng na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs gyur rnams dang lha min
243b1(rgyud): ma lus rnams// mchog tu 'jigs mdzad mi yi 'jig rten phyogs mtshams la gnas khro rgyal btsun mor bcas pas srin po rnams// sa 'og tu ni gdengs ka'i dbang po gang zhig rnams kyis 'jigs byed ma rungs thams cad
243b2(rgyud): 'ching bar byed// de rnams kun gyis nyin mtshan so so'i dus su 'jig rten mi shes ma lus skyong bar 'gyur ba'o// // sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs pa gang zhig bdag nyid kyis kyang bstan// ma
243b3(rgyud): lus bsdus rgyud dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha ru gyur pa yis// thabs dang shes rab rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje de nyid rna pa bcu drug ldan bsdus pa yi// bsod nams de yis sems can rnams kyis mi 'gyur/ 
243b4(rgyud): mchog gi bde ba thob byed de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las// bsdus pa dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor lo ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo rgyud kyi rgyal po
243b5(rgyud): rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po sa man ta shri dang / sgra bsgyur bla ma rA lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar chos dbyings dkyil lo/ 
243b6(rgyud): dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dege dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha dang dmyas nyid ces gang thos pa// rgyal mchog pho brang sha b+ha lar grags ka la pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng ge yi// gdan bzhugs rgyal pos
243b7(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung 'gyur zhes sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang po dang // zla ba nyi ma sgra can me lha sa stengs lha yul nam mkhor bsod nams sdig las byung // mi rnams
243b8(rgyud): pha rol srid par yi dgas dmyal ba gang zhing bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can// rig byed pa dang thob pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba 'di ni brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun la sogs pa dag dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang de/ 
244a1(rgyud): skyes la/ sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pa 'dzin pa 'dzin par 'gyur// thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za yi mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang
244a2(rgyud): lha las sa stengs 'di lhung de ni bden pa ste// bzang po tshangs par dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rig byed zhi byed khyab 'jug ches bla ma// sha yi kha zas bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// rdzogs sangs
244a3(rgyud): rgyas kyis bcwo lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can las sangs rgyas byang chub ni// sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gis bza' yis bsrung mi bya// srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid
244a4(rgyud): kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'dir nyams pa// yan lag lnga yi srog gcod 'gyur gyis nam mkha' tsam gyi srog chags rnams kyi byed po min// srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la longs spyod cing // 
244a5(rgyud): skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srod A rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jigs par 'gyur// seng ge sbrul dang ne le stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yid rang
244a6(rgyud): gsum gyis 'gyur// dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro la rjes su tshol byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro/ dge slong nad pa sman pas sha bsten na yang bya khra rnams
244a7(rgyud): kyis bsad pa dang // pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams// dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcur
244a8(rgyud): ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi glu min// sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su 'gyur// srog chags yi dgas la sogs kyi gnas dka' thug khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du// gzhan gyi khyim dang
244b1(rgyud): chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen bdun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang // 'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta
244b2(rgyud): tho yor ka la ba dang rang gzhan bral ba rdo yi tho yor phung por 'gyur// sa stengs gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam bral legs par sad
244b3(rgyud): las shes// sham b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams// 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyis rnam 'gyur ste// longs spyod byed pa rnam par
244b4(rgyud): rig pa tsam ste rang bzhin bral zhing rtog med de rnams kyis// longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad gyur pa// zla ba nyi ma sgra can ma dang mun pa gcig tu snang bar byed pa yang // sa sogs dri sogs
244b5(rgyud): mig lta rtso dang gzhu dang char pa klog dang rlung rtso drug pa gnyis// de yi lus lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba gnyis// de rnams longs spyod byed pa srog chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis brlang ba// phyi
244b6(rgyud): yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung // sbrul sku longs sku 'ang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi pa las ni rab tu byung // khong stong min zhing cig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam
244b7(rgyud): gyis gsum rtso thim par 'gyur// de bzhin sum sogs gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur// phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa sdug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog/ rnam par shes
244b8(rgyud): pa srog de de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar rtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gonas// gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sog/ 
245a1(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa// yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa du ni sred pa yang // las ni 'du byed srid pa 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos
245a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal ni/ rnam shes la sogs rnam pa ltar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang yin// gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med po'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing
245a3(rgyud): las me to// me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las// de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med/ 
245a4(rgyud): pa nam mkha' tsam las byung ba'ang med pa nyid las de yi phyir// srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min// sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa stong zhing byang
245a5(rgyud): chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid// gang zhig de dag byed pa po 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris// de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan 'pho mini phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni// mar ma la
245a6(rgyud): thon rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon sbyar// gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las byung ngo zhes pa bden// chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs
245a7(rgyud): rnams ste// phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir// gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yi gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma min la
245a8(rgyud): bdag gzhan la phan phun 'tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa// dngos min dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad dka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyes
245b1(rgyud): zhing khyab pa spros pa med// dpe med so so rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun su chog/ blo ldan chen por
245b2(rgyud): gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyu gyur 'khor gyi dbubad / gsung man shi 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'di na bdag
245b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// gang zhig sems can rnams la smin pa'i rgyur gyur lo lar me bzhi gsal bar snang ba dang // slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba// rnam pa du ma 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi
245b4(rgyud): thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms// phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa'i don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum spyod las rnam par grol mkha' dang mnyam par
245b5(rgyud): gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam pa ni mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med// mi man
245b6(rgyud): pa'i bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku cig rgyal ba rnam yul phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su// zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa stengs nas/ 
245b7(rgyud): mkhar rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun du ni nam mkhar bzhugs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srogs chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pI/ 
245b8(rgyud): mthus// khu ba khrag rig pa yi pad mar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung // de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan// yul gyi yon tan las byung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku du ma'i/ 
246a1(rgyud): @#/ khams la rab brten pa// skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni cig tu gsang ba'i zhal brgya pa// rig pa 'dzin ni
246a2(rgyud): dbang po la sogs dang ni yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la// de las tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra
246a3(rgyud): bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga dang gsul yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rgyas btab de yis des// gcig gis
246a4(rgyud): du ma'i khams la gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i sor mo tshogs rnams gang zhig tu// thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin
246a5(rgyud): yon tan yang ni 'jig medo rdul gyi phung po ste// srog gis rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin kyang ni 'jig pa med pa srog gi khams// khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni rdul yin las ni srog chags phung po yi// 
246a6(rgyud): de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i 'bras bus gzhan du// rang gi las kyi phung po lhur longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs par byed// de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges pa/ 
246a7(rgyud): brgya yis las kyi phung po zad par min// cer bu pa ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bsreg byed me ni 'ga' zhog gis// dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems dang lus
246a8(rgyud): ngag las// pad ma khyab byed snying po'i ze 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po bsgom par byed// de dbus lus po sbas partse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod
246b1(rgyud): gyur mchog gi go 'phangs 'di ni brgya byin rgyal pos mchod 'os pa// yon tan 'di ni bsregs lugs zabs ma lus las kyi phung po bsreg par 'gyur bar mthong // gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur
246b2(rgyud): pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan
246b3(rgyud): du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ni ldog par 'gyur bas de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos
246b4(rgyud): kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig dkar po bsam gtan las/ 
246b5(rgyud): ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan bu tshe la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod
246b6(rgyud): nams 'phel// de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pa log par g.yes pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyi 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa
246b7(rgyud): la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan
246b8(rgyud): du gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhig stong nyid ye shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos med byed po sgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni/ 
247a1(rgyud): mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' med na byed pa gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig/ sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa byas rnams kun du rnam par
247a2(rgyud): 'phel/ rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams long ma sdud par 'jig pa min// so so sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs bcu ldan pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs// mtshan mo du/ 
247a3(rgyud): ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkhar mar me la sogs pos// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa'i dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong // bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin du
247a4(rgyud): sems gtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par song // srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi zla bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le byed// 
247a5(rgyud): rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs la zla ba'i bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mang 'phro bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bo dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur// nam mkha' ltas pas gti mug rnam
247a6(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur te stong pa nyid mthong bas// nang gi bdag nyid blta lnga 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so// yan lag med pa ltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med de
247a7(rgyud): ba yis// sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa'i tshangs pa'i gsungs las so// sreg dang brtsol ba ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral bas dkyil 'khor yang
247a8(rgyud): dag pa// gsang ba lte ba snying kha mo grin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin zung re// khu ba gyen du sngo zhing khrag dang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum dang
247b1(rgyud): bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid// khyim la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gi lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtog shes pas sangs rgyas
247b2(rgyud): spyan de gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral bral ba rnam dag bzhi pa shes rab can du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// 
247b3(rgyud): rgyu mthun dag pa khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lus kyi sa bon khu ba pa ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa'i snying kha sgra bcas bde ba mgon
247b4(rgyud): pipo 'khor ba 'jig/ gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor bar byed pa rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu grwar
247b5(rgyud): 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shus bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag med gang gi rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug la rdo rje sems
247b6(rgyud): snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral sa la yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma 'grib par yang // sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte
247b7(rgyud): ba 'jug rings te// gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams// gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang // gzugs kyi phung
247b8(rgyud): po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyis// dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po sogs// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams
248a1(rgyud): kyang sngon po la sogs de rnams so// gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur gang zhig khro bo pad ma mthar byed/ 
248a2(rgyud): do// sgra can dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khro bo bgyeg thar byed pa ste// 'jug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag
248a3(rgyud): gnyis dges rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste// srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dge ba rdo rje byin sa zhe sdang 'joms pa byang chub sems// dgas pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'joms pa
248a4(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pa tshangs pa bden pa dang bcas dam tshig sems// ston pa'i sras lnga lte bar srog rlung bkag pas
248a5(rgyud): dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar bkag pa rdo rje gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan
248a6(rgyud): thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras// lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum bcu// 
248a7(rgyud): rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag 'thil sor tshigs dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur/ 
248a8(rgyud): bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor mo rnams la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor brgyad// mgrin par sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnam gsum 'gyur te drug bcu rtsa bzhi lte blo/ 
248b1(rgyud): 'khor lo ru/ gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bo dkar po de 'dir gsang ba dkar po che// 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lha// dus kyi drug bcus lhag dang bcas pa'i
248b2(rgyud): brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de'ang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zla ba'i cha shas sum bcu nam mkha' sdengs can zla ba'i rtse na zla bzang
248b3(rgyud): po rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje'i myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje chu dang bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yi lhag par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshams kyis gdong dang lag pa rkang pa'i
248b4(rgyud): sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la// mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng go ste// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan
248b5(rgyud): gsum pa// dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthus las byung // der ni 'ga' zhig khams ni de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sho d+ha
248b6(rgyud): rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyis ni gnas// srog chags so so sangs rgyas lha yul bar snang sa stengs rang rang gnas su rtse bor gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pa'i 'gyur la yul dang yul
248b7(rgyud): can bsgrub byed rdo rje bzlas pa yin// rang byin brlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pas kyang // bdud
248b8(rgyud): rnams yang dog bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa rim pA gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu'i lam dang sprin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid
249a1(rgyud): tsam min la brtags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo // bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyi// bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sa stengs bsod
249a2(rgyud): nams tshul khrim rnam par dman// stobs bcu mchog dang ldan par rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dge gnas pas ste// brten par bya ba'i lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas sgrub
249a3(rgyud): pa min// bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba brdung zhing lag pa bcings pa yi// bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangos
