249a4(rgyud): rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// de ni shin du dri zhim me tog dri dang spros dang mar me dang ni lha bshos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis
249a5(rgyud): bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dge nas// sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa stengs par snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su sgrog gi gsang sngags gang zhig
249a6(rgyud): ni zla ba gcig la nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun pa dbyer med bzlas// steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bral nas srog rlung gang pas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas// grub par 'gyur te/ 
249a7(rgyud): ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur nam mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa ste// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po gtong ba'i
249a8(rgyud): gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri bral klog byed cing // tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bo khyer ba mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu kha ru// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral nas rdo rje sems de par bgyu
249b1(rgyud): shin du skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas long mi spyod// yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longs spyod min// sha dag sems kyis byin na gang zhig sha'i
249b2(rgyud): dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spong min// sbyin pa de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe rlung rigs cis mi 'gyur// byams pas dka' thub mchog gi tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang 'tshong khyin / 
249b3(rgyud): du 'gro/ nyin byed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes nyo'i don du kha rnams kyi tshong 'dus sku// dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro/ chang nyo bud med rnams kyis dri ma gsum bral
249b4(rgyud): a ba d+hU ti rmang rigs cis ma yin// gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni cig pa nyid du dam 'cha' la// gang tshe tan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min// gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la
249b5(rgyud): tan tshigs dang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de'i dam bcas nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bcas bum pa lta bur byas ste shin du brtso bas byung ba'i phyir// nam mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mo rtag nges
249b6(rgyud): par grub// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro bzhin lnga pa sgra yang ni ma yin// de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa stengs par snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni// sna bas don rnams rab tu gtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnams
249b7(rgyud): rtag pa nyid yin lo// gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa stengs par snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis// rna ba don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal bya
249b8(rgyud): gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bu gar gnas// mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa cig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar rtag par spro'i
250a1(rgyud): ku cor 'gyur min nam// rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min// dngos po byed pa'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan las gnas pas ni
250a2(rgyud): rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'di ni byas pas ste// byas pa nyid dang gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos mi mthun pa de phyir byas pa rnams/ 
250a3(rgyud): ni yod par 'gyur ba cig shos de med do// gang zhig mngon par gsal ba'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin// mun par thim par gyur pa gang dge de yis mngon par gsal byas de yi 'bras
250a4(rgyud): bun+di ma yin// sgra dang don dag gal te cig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba de bzhin 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang cig pa nyid// stong pa sgra dang ldan par
250a5(rgyud): 'gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum po sgra med 'gyur// gang gis nam mkha' stong pa nyid nas brtan dang g.yo ba 'gro des na med pa nyid// gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dang chos mi mthun las grub
250a6(rgyud): 'gyur na// de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgras me ni sman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur// nam mkhar sa stengs dag tu gza' bar rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni ma rnams dang // lha dang srin po rnams dang rang gi rigs
250a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas lha mini klu// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don cig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig du yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra cig gis// dngos
250a8(rgyud): med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu las grub pas na// dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub// mo gsham bu mo nam mkha' tsam lnga kye pa nam mkhar 'gyur la
250b1(rgyud): bu ldan las skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin du phra ba'i rdul phrin phu po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyab par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min// gal te lhan cig rab tu 'jig par
250b2(rgyud): 'gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang byi me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min// srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs ni lha rnams
250b3(rgyud): te/ sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnam na lnga der ni mthong ma ni yod ces drag/ srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po
250b4(rgyud): spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur// srog chags gzugs gzhan klog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du
250b5(rgyud): rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te// srin por nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro/ srog chags srog dang lhan cig bems po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la
250b6(rgyud): rtso rab ldan pa// srid pa gsum bcu rtsa gsum rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis cig pu kho na 'gro/ cig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni// nam mkha' las 'das mi
250b7(rgyud): gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung med na sems med na// srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag
250b8(rgyud): tu las kyi 'brel pas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyi'i bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang // phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung ba nas// ther zug pa yang 'gyur// 
251a1(rgyud): nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur yang gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med// ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa
251a2(rgyud): skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni rigs dag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur
251a3(rgyud): phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag dang byas pa yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang me dang chu dang nam mkha'i khams// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang sgra dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung
251a4(rgyud): por 'gyur ba min// rnam par shes las la 'bras bu'i dngos po rab byung ba las min zhing med dang 'dren pas min// sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin la sogs pa 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min// rkang dang rus pa chub
251a5(rgyud): sha dang khu ba khrag tshil lpags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// de ni lus min slar yang srid pa gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam po de nyid
251a6(rgyud): de/ 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig pa tsam du// de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na/ 
251a7(rgyud): de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir// gang zhig 'di yi ma rig blo bur pa ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig ma ni// sngon du rnam rig rnam par dag par lhan skyes bems po yang ni rig par rnam dag 'gyur// bems po ma
251a8(rgyud): lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs pa ru 'gyur// bye brag grub ni ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon
251b1(rgyud): nang na myu gu sogs ci phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te rgyal rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin// thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la// dra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba lnga
251b2(rgyud): kyang 'gro ba srid pa rdul phran phung po mni// rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min// gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur pa de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur/ 
251b3(rgyud): 'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran de rdul kyang // sdud dang bskyed pa dang bral nas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas// phra rab rdul rnams cha rnams cha shas drug la slar yang gang gi/ 
251b4(rgyud): cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas cha yis nam mkha' khams 'di gang dar cis mi 'grub// phul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med tshad ma dag gi bsgrub byar gyur pa min// cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang man
251b5(rgyud): la rdul phran phung po che med min// dngul chus zangs ma rig cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gis nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur man// phyi rol dngos
251b6(rgyud): po'i gzugs ni gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min// rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grags// gang phyir dmu long mig med yid kyis de ni mig
251b7(rgyud): dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pa phyi rol gzugs te gzugs las yin te bag chags min// gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos ma
251b8(rgyud): yin/ sna nang bcas pas gang zhig dri'i rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin// lce yi nad can ro ma myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed// rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba
252a1(rgyud): tshad med bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yi tshad ma yis// drag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas/ 
252a2(rgyud): rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung // 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad
252a3(rgyud): ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bu'i rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni nam mkha' sa stengs dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnas
252a4(rgyud): khro bo rnams dang srin po sha'i dam tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs
252a5(rgyud): pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin// gang gis de rtog sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas ste// gang gis sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams
252a6(rgyud): dang byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral pa stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang // tshul khrims la sogs gang zhig yul dang bral po'i rnam pa kun du mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs
252a7(rgyud): ldan nyon thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min// gang zhig gzugs la sogs pa khams drug de ni yul drug kyang de rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang
252a8(rgyud): dri la sogs pa drug/ stong pa snang dang mun pa rnam gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa// snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags yin// 'phags pa'i yul gyi
252b1(rgyud): rgyal po bder gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po// klu grub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing // nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha'i dam tshig ston pa
252b2(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung // ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhin thod pa chang 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ka dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang
252b3(rgyud): snod cing te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun du rgyug pas stengs na bza' sngon po can// sha yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o// gos can na ti mchog
252b4(rgyud): ni bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur// ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhun nus nag
252b5(rgyud): po'i khrag 'thung byed// sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams yong mi 'gyur// mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms pa// gang gis mi
252b6(rgyud): gris rnam rtog yod kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min// de rnams bzang po'i thibs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni// log par g.yem pa dge ba rnams ni rnam par bral bas/ 
252b7(rgyud): skye ba 'di nyid la ni grub par 'gyur// skyes bu mtho rigs gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yi mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis// de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos
252b8(rgyud): nornam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyogs kyi sha yi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis smras par 'gyur// khro bo dbang po srin po'i da
253a1(rgyud): // sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bsgos pa'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal
253a2(rgyud): brtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster ba 'gro bar 'gyur// gang la bsgral pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dgra/ 
253a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing // sem can slu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed// lha rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu
253a4(rgyud): ma byed/ sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha cig tu yang bdag gzugs 'jigs par mi byed ston par byed// long ba brlag phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lha'i 'jigs byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung // bde byed
253a5(rgyud): kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis mthungs par 'gyur// nya dang rus sbal phagu rgod mI yi seng ge lha ma yin rnams rlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ri dgas la sogs 'o ma
253a6(rgyud): nags tshal dgon goH'jug gis mi bza'// sa gsum bla mas yi dwags mkha' 'gro rnams ni sbyin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos ra ma'i chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog
253a7(rgyud): gzugs su byas// 'jigs bde med pas skyabs seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kaur mi ri yis sha yi tshad du sum bcu stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed
253a8(rgyud): cing lha dang klu yi dbang po dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rlig par byos// lha bshos 'bras chan bu la zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa'o thug sha kar rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po rnam la phyugs kyi shau ya~M
253b1(rgyud): gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang // sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la// khrus bcas sbrang rtsi 'o mar gsar za zhing tsan dan me tog dag gis mgon por
253b2(rgyud): bcas pa mchod// gang gis chung sogs mchod pa de dang lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min// srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan zla ba seng ges spyad// mdung can pa dang dri
253b3(rgyud): ba ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te khyo mo lnga lnga yang // gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod nang gi chu yis gtsang sbra an tra la sogs yul// srin d+hu'i yul na ba lang sha zo kha ba can ri gnyis skyes rgyal
253b4(rgyud): po mi rnams chang 'thung zhing // ga re rtsom he n+tu sha ma kha bar me yi se ren rta glang sha// de srid bstan dang mi sha za ba lo po skar yul bung bu rnga mo khyi yi sha/ bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yulo 'khor
253b5(rgyud): chen po kAr rna ra yi yul// nyan dang mtshan gyi dus su rmangs rigs la sogs chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung // bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtogs 'jig par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis/ 
253b6(rgyud): bshad kyi// khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa pi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pa drog shi ma dag bu'i chung mar ma nyid bag mar len pa nges par kho kha'i yul// rug mer spun zla'i tsha mor
253b7(rgyud): len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mor ring gi bus// so re me dong tsam pa ka la sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang mas yin// spun zla bu mo len pa yul 'khor chen po kar na ta la sogs par ro// ma ya tshi me chung mar len pa
253b8(rgyud): maMmi la yang ste khol mo li la ra ra'i yul// bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med lnga pa ru ku la na ta re go stag rigs de na yul// skyes pa'i yul bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs
254a1(rgyud): byed gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min// sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i lus can phru gu sha dag slong ngar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig byed pa dra// 
254a2(rgyud): srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed dag/ de gnyis mtho ris don du mi dad ba lang gsod cing ba gar dkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems sun 'byin pa rab tu mkhas
254a3(rgyud): pa rnams ba lang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba bA ga mchog tu dkrugs pa rta yi po rtags bcad pa la// khu ba khrag gis rnam par bsgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed// de lta'i sha yi
254a4(rgyud): spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyis grub// nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i dan Di mtho ris rnam par nyams// pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tsho ba byed cing khyim pa mchod
254a5(rgyud): sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod// dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms gtso yod// dan Di dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gyegs par 'gyur te de yang gang
254a6(rgyud): gi phyir// shes par grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro/ lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid blagal te sha zos pa las nyes pa mi bskyed no// bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi
254a7(rgyud): klu yi ches dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu// khyab 'jog la sogs mchod phyir 'dir rnams nyi mar bram ze rnams kyi ci phyir sha mi bza'// pha la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams
254a8(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs rgyud rnam par spong // bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregasas// gnas dang gnas su rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing
254b1(rgyud): chang bu dag ster byed pa su zhig ni// su zhig ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang rnam par bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan zhugs pa// bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yis pa la mchod par rig byed las grub
254b2(rgyud): na/ bram ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de'i tshe shi ba la yang ma zhugs gnod par 'gyur// gang gi pha dag yi dgas skye dge'i dbang gis yi dgas skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges pa'i bu yis byin pa'i chang bu len par
254b3(rgyud): 'gyur la chu yang len par byed// tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi mi lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed bskyed pa lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur/ 
254b4(rgyud): zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo phebs bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba gza' de ni// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jig pa 'joms pa ci yis lha ma yin rnams drag/ gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs
254b5(rgyud): kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba// gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor yug rtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min// lha la sogs pa lha'i de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshangs pa
254b6(rgyud): gzugs sna tshogs pa nam mkha' tsam kyang seng ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa nyid yin te// yi dgas la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman// sa dang chu dang me'i lus can sa dang / 
254b7(rgyud): bar snang dag tu kha dog drag sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis bzung bya'i kha dog gzugs// dri ni sna yi bzung bya 'dir ni lce yi ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tshig las
254b8(rgyud): gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog gi'i tshad ma yis// gzugs ming de yis sa dang bar snang de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min// mon bsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkho'i rgyu tsam
255a1(rgyud): yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin ze rlung rnams nam mkha' ro yi ye shes dbang po gnyis// bram ze sogs kyis mthong gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mar+g+ha/ 
255a2(rgyud): mo mar me med na yang // bya ba la sogs phyogs dang 'tshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur// srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang // bram ze/ 
255a3(rgyud): la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar nas skar ma ma lus kyang // bya rog srin bya lce spyang khyi rnam 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston// bram ze shi nas yi dgas gyur pa rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas
255a4(rgyud): rig bed 'don par byed// sprin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du song ba so bag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par bad// blo dang ldan pa'i spod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par gyur pa'i yi dgas spod las ltos// mun pa
255a5(rgyud): gsal bar min par gyur las mun las kha ta de yi bshad pa las byung ba// mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed bskyed byed des na mes pa'i kha dang mchod par 'os// ba lang rgyab dong ra'i kha dang gnyis skyes
255a6(rgyud): bong bu'i rkang pa bud med bA gar phyag byed cing // khams rnams stong pa gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa ldan pa gang zhig bram ze rnams// sgra med yi ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du
255a7(rgyud): gyur pa las// rlung las me las me lus chu mini chu las sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams// zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/ bsod nams sdig par
255a8(rgyud): mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'byung // mo bsham bu'i thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi ltar phra// nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang
255b1(rgyud): bral zhing yon tan med med pa nam mkha'i rtags// rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po de rnams so// gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha' sa stengs zhi ba'i grub mthar
255b2(rgyud): ldan/ gang zhig de'i nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnams gsum ldan lam ldan 'gyur rgur mo 'jigs byed ma// de ni nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings khyil pa can// nam mkha'i
255b3(rgyud): mtha' can thig le phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma// mchu 'phyangs skam pa'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa bskyed byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma// gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rigs
255b4(rgyud): las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma// rig pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa'i stor ba'i dbang gis 'bigs// ma gsal bya rog ra yi gzhu la 'dir na
255b5(rgyud): rang gi yon tan rus rbal spu yis byas// nam mkha' me tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhu gang dga'abigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal te skye dang 'jig rgyu sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kor 'gyur na// 
255b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min// 'dir na thub pa'i tshig las srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde
255b7(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur// gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha'i dam tshig can gyis bsgrubs// grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan gyis de rnams nges par
255b8(rgyud): 'bebs par byed// stag la sogs pa 'ges la tshul me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon cha sogs kyis min// sngags kyi the brang la sogs pa mi 'khor yug rtogs par rje ba'i bya ba byed// byang chub sems dpa'
256a1(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrub na// gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster// bskal ngan dang nad kyi
256a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'tsho ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed// seng ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur// byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sog
256a3(rgyud): lam ni dge bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs// dbu ma'i dag pa gcig pu ba ga krugs pa grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang/ 
256a4(rgyud): chub shing las gzhan du min// sha yaM dam tshig can gyi grub pa'i 'byung ba'i yi dgas sa gzhir shing gcig las na gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos
256a5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pas phran tshogs las la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas lhas 'jug bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo
256a6(rgyud): bskor bar ston// grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pa sha yaM dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo'o la ston byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min// grub pa rnam
256a7(rgyud): kyi dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs lnga sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// zhing gi drag po'i dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston// rgyal po'i
256a8(rgyud): rgyal srid lha khang sa stengs las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo gzhag par gyur las thar pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar rab
256b1(rgyud): tu 'jug par 'gyur gyis gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin// sha yi kha zas longs spyod spyod pas slar yang srid pa gzhan
256b2(rgyud): du lha min rigs su skye// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigs su 'di skye'o// mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro// mgo zlum dang
256b3(rgyud): ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro// sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs// sems
256b4(rgyud): can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig pa nam mkha' tsam pos ston// sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams kyis bstan pa lha rten gang // g.yul du/ 
256b5(rgyud): zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshigs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jigs par byed// de rnams rigs gcig gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden dang brtsang ska rab tu 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma
256b6(rgyud): spong zhing bka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten/ khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang // srog dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma ri la shar bar
256b7(rgyud): gyur nas lan lnga phyag byed cing // sa stengs lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs drag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skye ba// drag po'i g.yul ngor pa ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la
256b8(rgyud): rgyal po ni/ rgyal rigs thab mo min pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yas 'dzags byed lasags mchod nas su// sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa'i gdung ni 'chad pa 'byung // 
257a1(rgyud): / grub pa bya zhing dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can// dge slong klu grub zhes bya yon tan ma lus byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// slob
257a2(rgyud): dpon 'od bstan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang de ltar rab grags kyang kye ma de lta na'ang dam par gyur pas rmongs pa yod// dge bcu lam gyis grub
257a3(rgyud): par gyur pa 'phags po lha dang zla ba'i nam bza' rta dbyangs dang // phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba pad ma'i myu gu zhes// pa go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po
257a4(rgyud): in dra b+hU ti dang // de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yan lag drug
257a5(rgyud): deyi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyis// gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// nyi ma gang du tshangs pa sa bon nye bar 'jig par 'gyur ba des na dus phyi mar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na
257a6(rgyud): 'dir ni g.yul ngor kAk+Sho dang ni mu stegs 'jigs par 'gyur// thung dang ring dang lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// oM sogs ma ning stobs bcu'i gsung
257a7(rgyud): ste nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir ro// ring dang thung dang mtshungs pa gang du a ko ring po phyugs dag tshig las 'gyur// de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod// thog mAr lo nas
257a8(rgyud): nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba rtsen rtsi na yi dbang phyug 'byung // de yi bka' yis yi dgas dbang bskur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sgur mor byini brlabs la// phyi nas sa steng son pa'i gnas dang
257b1(rgyud): zhing gi lha gang drug bcu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi// mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed// der ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas mkha' la sogs pa 'phags pa'i yul// 
257b2(rgyud): klaklo rnams dang lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshogs skye dgu rnams ni der gzhag nas// bde la bkod de kal ba nas lha
257b3(rgyud): gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya// nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus san pa yi lo yi tshod// slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klo 'jug te ji srid bcwo brgyad lo la bsgyur dang bcas pa'i
257b4(rgyud): bar yang nas ying du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams bzhug par bya ba nyid// ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams// phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lhanan
257b5(rgyud): mkha' sa gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba lang sogs// sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams
257b6(rgyud): sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod// slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas bsrung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod// sngon du khrus byas gos gyon snga drogaso
257b7(rgyud): spyod blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du gdon// klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan mo bya ba 'gyur// slar yang de lo bsrung bar bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang bya// zho dang 'bras
257b8(rgyud): tshon nyi mar rta dang glang po'i rto dang 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mig dmar bza' lhag me tog bcud dang bcas pa 'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi rtor ma lha'i bla ma'o thug shaka gyis// ba wa sangs
258a1(rgyud): la zas dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de skyon la// nyi ma slar yang phyogs dang glang po rnams kyi gtor ma khu ba 'bras chan gyis// glang po rta mchog rnams kyi zhi dang rgyas pa'i don
258a2(rgyud): du sbyin srog la sogs gzar// 'bru dang mar gsar 'o ma dur ba mda' shing yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung // sbyin bsreg rjes la dung phor gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta dang glang po khrus bya'o// yi dgas
258a3(rgyud): la sogs gtor ma sran chan sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur// srin po la sogs yung kAr dang ni rdo rje phuraro bus phyogs 'tshams rtogs par phur bus gdag/ slob dpon gyis ni bsrung ba lnga yi/ 
258a4(rgyud): cho gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang ging gis yul mtha' bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i mi dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad ma lnga yi
258a5(rgyud): bskor/ gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyor zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol du// gang zhig zur rnams dar sbyangs bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams de las rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur// rgyal chen
258a6(rgyud): phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri rgyal phyogs dang 'tshams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phyeng du 'gyur// pado ma'i ge gsar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do// chu skyes mngab
258a7(rgyud): ming bcu 'a khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis par gsum par de// de ltar pad ma gnyis la m+b+ha n+d+he b+ha'i snying po chu skyes med pa ma chen por rnams gnyis der// klu rnams zung gi bar du phrogs pa
258a8(rgyud): 'tshams kyi mdab mar bar du de bzhin lha dang lha ma yin// gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams// bsrung 'khor 'dir ni thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur to khrag dang gis
258b1(rgyud): rnams kyi bri// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis bsrung ba lnga sogs bsrung 'khor gsungs pa yin// bud med bu 'dod pa dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyed rgyam bar 'gyur// nad pa nad las grol ba
258b2(rgyud): 'gyur ste sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur// skyes pa bud med rnams kyi 'bras bu ster 'gyur sngon gyi bsod nams mthus// bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i lam gyi mchod las
258b3(rgyud): nam mkha' sogs las mini// bram ze gang zhig 'chang 'thung 'gyur dang gcer bu pa 'am ral pa can nam dbyug gu can// dge tshul dang na tshigs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral ba grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams// sum bcu
258b4(rgyud): dam tshig can gyi mi'i dbang pos de rnams yul du bskrad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyi dge dang mi dge'i las byas bcu drug bcu'i cha shas rgyal po yin// yugs sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrog pa spyad na ngan pa dmyal/ 
258b5(rgyud): ba'i 'bras ster me la btso bar byed// gang du yul na bdud ris de med mig gdug dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin// rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams kyis// 
258b6(rgyud): skal ba bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lho yul sa stong grub pa rig pa 'dzin// sa stengs ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po// bzod pas tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan
258b7(rgyud): du brtson pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel// shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid
258b8(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje'o// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i khams rnams/ 
259a1(rgyud): da ni brdzun gyi tshig la de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo bA gar bzhugs ces pa// 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam par bral ba rdo rje sems dpa' la gzhan min// tshang
259a2(rgyud): pa la sogs lha rnams sa stengs dmyal ba'i dmyal ba sa 'dir zhi ba la sogs kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa la sogs bsod
259a3(rgyud): nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa stengs dag na lhung bar 'gyur// srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de la thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la'ang rang rang ma yin brdzun
259a4(rgyud): tshig 'jam pa brnyan pas bdag nyid drung du khrid par byed// tshangs pa stong pa ston par byed cing bdag gi lag pa ril bu yod pa long zhig pu zhes brjod// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin du snyan pI/ 
259a5(rgyud): tshig gis bdag drung khrid // nam mkha' tsam zhig ston cing bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa long zhig pu zhes gsungs// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong
259a6(rgyud): gsal bar mdzad// de rnams de yi sangs rgyas nyid na thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden ma yin// gang zhig bskal pa dpag tu med pa byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pa
259a7(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to// mo bsham bu ni lus med ma lus med la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnas
259a8(rgyud): srog gi nam mkha' me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas klog cing dgod// srog chags bya rog ra min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor// srog chags
259b1(rgyud): gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa stengs 'chi ba'i tshe mi ltung // rgyud kyi rgyal por stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs rgyas pa'i gang zhig lam bstan pa// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang
259b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa'i lha klu lA ma yin// khro bo srin po'i sha yi dam tshig ldan dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// de kun saM b+ha la zhes bya ba rgyal mchog bzhugs// der ni nyi ma bdag gis bton// 
259b3(rgyud): dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams brtul mdzad pa// de kun saM b+ha la yi dpal ldan ka la'i skyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi// don chen gser gyi khang pa'i sgo/ 
259b4(rgyud): yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas bris// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng ge khri la bzhugs pa stobs mnga' ba yi mdzad spyod gsungs// / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud kyi snying po
259b5(rgyud): rdzogas+ho// shAkya'i dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// #rgya gar skad du/ se ka u de sha/ bod skad du/ dbang mdor bstan pa/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo
259b6(rgyud): zla ba bzang pos gsol pa// ston pa dbang ni rnam bdun dang // rnam gsum de ni bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das grub phyir// mdor bsdus pa ni bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
259b7(rgyud): stsal pa/ nyon cig zla bzang dbang gi don// rnam bdun rnam gsum mchog dang ni// rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol ba yang // bsdus par yang ni khyod la bshad// rgyud la mdor bsdus rnam gsum dang // rgyas par
259b8(rgyud): bshad pa gsum du 'gyur// rab tu mdor mdor bstan bstan tshe// so sor rgyas par bshad pa gzhan// rab tu mdor ston rgyas bshad de// rgyud kyi bsdus pa brjod pa yin// mdor bstan 'di nyid rgyas
260a1(rgyud): bshad ni bka' 'grel tshig ni 'joms byed pa// mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad ni// 'grel bshad don kun bsdus byed pa// de yang mngon shes thob rnams kyis// bya ba yin gyis mkhas
260a2(rgyud): gzhan min// de bzhin mtha' drug rnams kyis bdag/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang // byang chub rnam bzhi phung po dang // khams dang skye mched rigs drug dang // 'jig rten khams sogs brjod pa ste// 
260a3(rgyud): le'u lnga yis dag pa ni// dus kyi 'khor lo'i mngon brjod do// bden gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas yin// gang yang dang po'i dbang bdun no// byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa ste// 'jig rten kun rdzob rnam pa gsum
260a4(rgyud): bzhi pa dag ni don dam nyid// chos rnams bden pa gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa d+ma bstan ste// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang // don dam nyid kyis bden pas so// chu dang cod pan dar sbyangs dang // rdo rje dril bu
260a5(rgyud): brtul zhugs che// ming dang rjes gnang bcas pa ste// rnam bdun dbang po rgyal po kye// lus ngag yid ni dag byed pa// mngon par dbang ni gnyis gnyis te// rjes gnang ye shes dog pa yin// gzhan yang
260a6(rgyud): khams sogs yang dag dag/ chu yi khams rnams dag par byed// cod pan gyis ni phung po dag/ drar sbyangs pha rol phyin pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gsung rgyun mi 'chad ni// nyi ma
260a7(rgyud): gcig tu dag pa yis// rdo rje brtul zhugs mi 'pho ba// yul dang dbang po dag pa'o// ming ni bya mos pa la sogs dag/ gnang ba sangs rgyas nyid du dag/ dbang bdun po ni 'di yin te// dkyil
260a8(rgyud): 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par bya// bum pa dang ni gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes mngon brjod pa// slar yang shes rab chen po ni// de yi ye shes mngon par brjod// 'gyur dang 'gyur zhing
260b1(rgyud): de nas 'thun// de nas gzhan ni rgyu 'thun pa// mngon par dbang bskur rim gsum gyis// lus ngag yid ni dag byed pa// bzhi pa yang ni dgu pa'i bdag/ shes rab yang na nu ma ni// reg pas byung / 
260b2(rgyud): chub sems 'pho bde// gang phyir byis pas bde thob pa// dkar 'dzin gyis ni de dbang bskur// gsang ba mnyes las yun rings skyes// byang chub sems 'pho bde ba ste// gang phyir gsang bas bde thob
260b3(rgyud): paHdar ma de la gsang dbang bskor// yun rings gsang ba mnyes lngas skyes// rdo rje rtse mor 'thun las skyes// gang phyir rgan pa 'thun gyur pa// shes rab ye shes de dbang bskur// phyag rgya che la rjes
260b4(rgyud): chags pas// rgyu 'thun las skyes bde ba gang // gang phyir rgyu 'thun nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya chen pos de dbang bskur// skyob pa thams cad bskyed mdzad pa// skye dgu'i bdag por de shes bya// rdo rje sems
260b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' che// mi 'gyur gnyis med byang chub sems// dam tshig sems dpa' 'di yin te// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnam bzhi pa// dus kyi 'khor lo 'di brjod do// rnal 'byor rnams la thar ster ba'o// 
260b6(rgyud): 'di nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni// ma bsam pa yi snang ba dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma ste// shes rab gzugs ni mkha' mnyam dang // yod dang med la rnam 'das pa'i// sems kyi rkyen gyi don rnams dang / 
260b7(rgyud): rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun du yongs su spangs pa'o// dub smig rgyu me khyer dang // mar me 'bar dang zla nyi dang // mun tshan cha shas thig le che// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'od gsal ba'o// mig
260b8(rgyud): gnyis ma phye ma gtsums pas// gang zhig stong par ma brtags par// rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur// gzugs de rtag tu bsgom par bya// med pa'i gzugs la sgom par ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyi
261a1(rgyud): / de sgom min/ stong par ma brtags mthong ba'i phyir// sems la dngos dang dngos min med// ji ltar me long kra las ni// dngos med las skyes bu mos mthong // mkha' la de nyid rnal
261a2(rgyud): 'byor pas// 'das dang ma 'ongs chos de bzhin// de med pa yis dngos yod min// dngos po med pa'i don yod phyir// dngos po med pa'i don yod pa// rmi lam sgyu ma mig 'phrul mtshungs// chos can med
261a3(rgyud): pa las ni chos// skye ba 'di nyid mthong ba la// yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i// re ba thams cad rdzogs par brjod// gzhon nu ma yi kra las ni// ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong // nyi tshe ba yi mig gnyis
261a4(rgyud): kyis// bskyod de sgrub pa po yi mthong // gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na// bdag gis gdod pa cis mi mthong // 'on te med pa'i gzugs mthong na// ri bong rwa ni ji ltar min// mig gzhan gyis ni mi mthong
261a5(rgyud): zhing / bdag gi mig gis kyang mi mthong // ma skyes pa ni mthong ba min// gzhon nu ma yi bu bzhin no// gzugs mthong de yi 'og tu ni// steng dang 'og tu rtsa gsum la// lus ngag sems ni dgag pa'i phyir// 
261a6(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par srog stsol bya// nyi zla sgra gtson dri chen dang // dri chu sa bon 'bab pa'i lam// chu me stong pa sa rlung dang // ye shes khams kyi rigs pa yin// gang rnams nyi zla mun can ni// lus ngag sems
261a7(rgyud): kyi rtsa rnams te// srog dang thur sel rim pa yis// dri chen dri chu sa bon 'bab// thabs kyi sku ni zla ba ste// shes rab gsung ni nyin byed do// shes rab sku ni dri chen rtsa// dri chu 'bab pa'i gtso mo'i gsung // steng dang
261a8(rgyud): 'og gi cha gnyis ni// sa bon 'bab dang mun can nam// thabs kyi thugs ni mun pa can// sa bon 'bab ma shes rab kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// steng 'og rigs ni drug yin no// thabs dang
261b1(rgyud): shes rab sku dngos kyis// lus can kun la yang dag gnas// lus ngag rtsa las 'chi ltas min// mun can sa bon 'bab ma las// skye dang 'chi dang gnas pa yin// skye dang 'chi ba'i dus dang ni// 'khrig las
261b2(rgyud): sa bon 'bab pa'o// nyi ma 'pho dang mnyam pa la// mun can ma ni steng du 'bab// dus sbyor 'byung ba'i mngon 'tshams su// dbus ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bab// rkang pa dang bcwo lnga bcu drug/ 'byung 'jug dbug/ 
261b3(rgyud): so mi dbang kye// bdun bcu rtsa lngas lhag pa yi// drug brgya nyin dang mtshan mo'o// gang yang drug brgyas lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rtsa las ni// 'di yis dman pa de rnams 'bab
261b4(rgyud): phyogs gsum dang bcas lo gsum ni// lo brgya yis ni dbu mar 'gyur// steng du g.yas dang g.yon par ni// nyi zla lug dang ser skya gzhan// chu dang me yi rang bzhin te// pad ma rin chen 'dzin par brjod// 'og
261b5(rgyud): tu dri chen dri chu 'bab// sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin ste// dbus ma dang ni g.yon pa'i rtsa// 'khor lo rol gri 'dzin par 'dod// steng du dbus ma 'og ma'i g.yas// sgra gcan dang ni sa bon 'bab// stong pa ye shes rang bzhin
261b6(rgyud): ste rdor 'dzin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzhung // zla ba'i lam las dri chen rtsa// nyi las dri chu 'bab ma gtso// skye 'chi mnyam dang 'dod chags la// sgra gtsun sa bon 'bab ma'o// gang zhig lte steng kun 'dar ma// mun 'bab shin
261b7(rgyud): du yid bzang ste// gang 'og nam mkha' gdang de ni// sa bon 'bab ma dung can ma// lte ba'i pad ma snying mgrin dang // dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la// su chu me rlung stong pa ni// bsdud pa yis ni 'bab po'o// gshegs
261b8(rgyud): pa dang ni byon pa des// skyed pa yis na sa la 'jug/ lte ba las ni lte ba'i dbus// kun dar ma ni gshegs dang byon// lte gsang nor bu'i pad ma la// lus dge sems ni 'bab ma ste// gshegs pa dang ni byon ma de// 
262a1(rgyud): / bskud dang bskyed pa Ti gzugs can ma// skyes bu kun la dung can ma// thur sel rlung ni 'bab par byed// 'di ni bud med bde ba yis// sa bon dus su khrag 'bab ma// thabs dang shes rab sku dngos
262a2(rgyud): kyis steng du g.yas dang g.yon pa ro// 'og tu dri chen dri chu 'bab// rdul dang sa bon 'bab pa'o// rdul 'bab phyir na gtum mo ste// sa bon 'bab phyir nam mkha' stong // bud med steng du rigs ngan ma// skyes bu kun
262a3(rgyud): la kun dAr brjod// rtag par g.yon pa'i rtsa las ni// rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga// g.yas pa'i rtsa las sogs te// dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba'i pad ma mdab ma la// dkyil 'khor drug bcu'i
262a4(rgyud): rim pa bzhin// dus sbyor g.yas dang g.yon pa la// lug sogs khyu mchog la sogs so// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas// steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung // dkyil 'khor re re dbyug gu ni// sa sogs sna bug gnyis
262a5(rgyud): pa'o/ drug bcur bcos pa'i sum brgya'i dbugs// rtsa ni rim pas 'bab pa'o// stong dang brgya'i dbugs rnams ni// rtsa lnga po yis de rnams 'bab// rtsa ni drug bcu nyan mtshan du// lus kyi dkyil 'khor
262a6(rgyud): zhes bya'o// mdab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar// g.yas dang g.yon du rim pas rlung // g.yon dang rtag par mkha' sogs te// g.yas la sa sogs gzhan ma'o// g.yon du srid pa rnam shes tshogs// g.yas
262a7(rgyud): su sa sogs sdud pa'o// nub dang shar du sna dang rlung // phan tshun thabs dang shes rab ste// mthe bong dang ni ming med kyis// gang gi kha la dbang bskur ro// g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan tshun thabs
262a8(rgyud): dang shes rab ste// 'dzub mo dang ni gung mo gnyis// gang phyir ral gri 'gyur las so// phyag rgya zla ba phyed pa'i tshul// mche ba thu chung dri drug ste// stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu// phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po// sor
262b1(rgyud): mo rnams ni phan tshun du// dkyil 'khor bcu ni yang dag 'byor// spyi bor thal sbyar ba yis// gri gug dang bcas rtse gcig po// skyed pa dang ni bsdud byed pa// mnyam pa de yang dbus ma'i rtsar// phung po khams
262b2(rgyud): dang rdo rje gsum// dbus mar song na cig tu 'gyur// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gogs nas// dri chen dri chu'i rtsa 'gag go/ sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gogs pa na// steng 'og sa bon mi 'bab po// krol na 'di rnams grol bar 'gyur/ 
262b3(rgyud): bskyed pa'am ni bsdud byed pa// srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis// rtsa rnams kun spyod 'di yin no// g.yas pa'am ni g.yon pa la// nyin mtshan bzhi dang de bzhin lnga// rlung ni lhag par 'bab pa na// de nas lo gsu
262b4(rgyud): gyis 'chi 'gyur// lnga phyogs tshes dang ni nyi shu dang // de nyid rim pa cig gis lhag/ nyi ma sum bcu gsum gnas pas// g.yas pa'i nyi mar mi 'dod pa'o// gsum gnyis cig mnyam zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyi ma/ 
262b5(rgyud): ni/ tshes phyogs lnga dang yon tan gnyis// gcig gis lus can tsher 'gror 'gyur// rtsa ba nas ni gcig gis lcags// g.yon nas zla ba 'byung bar 'gyur// lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yi// dbus ma la ni 'chi bar 'byung // 
262b6(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mi mnyam nyin mtshan gyis// de yi dkyil 'khor skye bar 'gyur// phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa'i phyir// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod ni// dkyil 'khor lnga ni 'bab 'gyur na// gzhan du na ni 'chi ba min// 'chi ltas/ 
262b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid shes byas la// srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya// kun spangs go 'phangs rten byas la// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// nyi zla 'gro ba gzhom pa'i phyir// brtag par rdo rje spang bar bya// gzhan du na ni kun spangs rtsar// srog/ 
262b8(rgyud): gi rlung ni 'jug par med// 'og tu dung can thur sel ni// de ma zhugs na 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba bru ba 'di nyid ni// rnal 'byor rnams la dga' bas 'gyur// gtsug tor steng gi pad ma las// shu kra byung na dga' ba yin// mgrin pa// 
263a1(rgyud): @snying khar mchog dga' ba// de nas dga' bral dga' bral 'gyur// sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba la// gal te gsang ba'i pad mar song // gsang gnas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dga' mi 'pho ba
263a2(rgyud): rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// chags chen mi 'gyur mnga' bdag go/ dga' bral las ni bde 'pho ga // mya ngan 'das la bde bar gnas// sa bon zla ba gtsug tor shar// gsang ba'i chu skyes dga' la rdzogs// cha ni bcu
263a3(rgyud): drug ma gang de// rdo rje nor bu pad rtser song // de 'og 'pho ba dus yin te// nag po'i tshes cig 'og nas song // stong las dga' ba bral ba yis// nyi ma mdzod skur 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi cha ni bcu drug ma// gtsug tor pad mar
263a4(rgyud): song pa na// 'di ni zla ba zad par brjod// 'dod chags bde ba bral phyir ro// lus can thams cad 'chi ba na// zla ba bdud rtsi thur du 'gro// steng du nyi rdul sgra gcan dang // rnam shes srid pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bas zla bas bdud rtsi
263a5(rgyud): steng / 'gro bar bya'o rgyal po kye// 'og tu nyi rdul sgra gcan dang // rnam shes mi 'gyur bde ba'o// mdzod spu chu skyes sangs rgyas kun// zla ba bdud rtsi nya yin no// nyi rdul gnam stong gsang ba la// gtsug tor nor bu de gnyis cha// ston
263a6(rgyud): pa rdo rje'i tshig 'di ni// lus can rnams la phyin ci log/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yis// khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor bu thugs dang gsang bar gsung // lte bar sku ni bde chen phyir// dag pa'i sku las spro ba ni
263a7(rgyud): chos dang long skyo sprul pa 'di// 'og tu thabs 'gyur rgyal po kye// steng du shes rab dag tu 'gyur// dpral bar sku yi rdo rje yi ni// mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje ni// sbrul sogs 'di rnams
263a8(rgyud): sprul par mdzad// phung po khams rnams spro bar ni// sgrib med pas ni bde ba'o// las kyi phyag rgya snyom 'jug dang // ye shes phyag rgya sog da grag/ phyag rgya chen po cig sbyor bas// 'phel bA 'gyur ba mi 'gyur ba'o// 'phel ba la ni
263b1(rgyud): 'phel ba med// zad pa la ni zad pa med// nub pa la ni nub pa med// sher ba la ni shar ba med// gsal ba la ni gsal ba med// btsums pa la ni btsums pa med// skyes pa la ni skyes pa med// grol ba la ni grol ba med// mi gnas
263b2(rgyud): pa la gnas pa med// dngos po la ni dngos med min// 'gyur ba la ni 'gyur ba med// mi 'gyur la ni mi 'gyur med// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ni// rgyu ma 'byung dang zad bzhin no// 'byung ba zad par mi 'gyur te// rang bzhin gyi
263b3(rgyud): ni skye ba med// dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid cig/ sna tshogs 'di ni mtshan nyid bral// rang gi shes rab las mkhyud sems// pad ma rdo rje nor bur song // de la zla ba 'thun 'gyur ba// mi 'gyur sgom pa rgyu 'thun pa'o// lus ngag seMs/ 
263b4(rgyud): kyi rtse rnams la// lus ngag sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum ni bsdus pa yi// dung can ma ni ye shes sgom// mgo bo las ni rim pa yi// shes rab chags pas thig le zhu// rdzogs pa'i go 'phang zhugs rnas la// don dam par ni bcing bar bya/ 
263b5(rgyud): rim pa 'di ltar zla ba shar// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyin mo bzung ba rdzogs pa ste// zla ba tshad pa rdzogs pa min// de bzhin rim pas ye shes 'char// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs la sogs bcom rdzogs pa// ye shes/ 
263b6(rgyud): chad pa rdzog pa min// dbus su ri bong gyis mtshan pa// nyal ri bong can mi gnas// 'khor ba'i bgra chags kyis mtshan pa// mi 'gyur ba de la de bzhin seMs// skye ba dang ni 'jig pa'i phyogs// yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas// de yi dbus su rdzogs pa gang // rdzogs pa de
263b7(rgyud): ni rab mi gnas// skad cig gis ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa la ni g.yo mi 'gyur// gang zhig rdo rje nor bus saM// skad cig thams cad de rdzogs byed// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// dkar mir pa la ye mi 'gro// gnyis med rdzogs pa la gnas min// phyog
263b8(rgyud): gnyis pa yi dbus su gnas// gtsug tor wa ni byung ba ste/ rdo rje nor bu rdzogs pa 'gyur/ dge 'bral bcas pas cha bcom pa// rdo rje nas ni rdog par bcom// slar yang gtsug tor la byung ba/ slar yang rdo rje nor bu rdzogs/ dga' blar bcas pra cha bcom pa/ lus can ye shre bcom pa min/ 
264a1(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'di// rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brjod par bya// gzhan ma dngos pa'i mtha' kun ni// bskyed pa dang ni sdud byed rgyu// srid gnas mya ngan 'das par gshegs// de nas slar yang srid
264a2(rgyud): par byon// rang phyogs gnyis la zla bzhin dang // bgrod pa gnyis la nyi bzhin no// rdzogs la mi g.yo ba 'di ni// mi 'gyur skad cig gis zos pa'o// dbugs stong nyi khri drug brgya yis// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzog
264a3(rgyud): so// phyogs gnyis yang dag mnan pa ni// sa yi phyogs kyis yongs su rdzogs// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba'o// rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis// rdzogs nas gnyis su med pa mchog
264a4(rgyud): cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par sems// rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba// don cig gnyis su med pa'i sems// don dam par ni mi nyams pa// rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs sems gyur nas// kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa min// chags
264a5(rgyud): bral dang po chags pa che// rdo rje yan lag mi 'gyur che// phyogs gnyis pa yi bag chags kyis// yongs su gang ba ma 'dres pa// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu bo'i chu// zhugs nas chu de dang mnyam 'gyur// de bzhin du ni dngos po'i
264a6(rgyud): tshogs/ 'gyur ba de dang mi 'gyur mnyam// ji ltar khams kyi tshogs 'di ni// sa bon gyis zos ro nya 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin nyid du ni// 'bras bu'i dus su sangs rgyas spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshogs kyis ni// 
264a7(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba zos na// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin rang 'dzin// mchog tu mi 'gyur nyid du 'gyur// mtsharwa ma'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal na// ro bcud chen po yang dag gnas// gzhan du nad pas rig min la// dug rdzog
264a8(rgyud): gnas skabs gyur pa ni// dbang po sgo yi yul ma yin// de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor nor bu// gzhan du dam pa bde reg min// sems ni rdzogs pa'i cha gyur na// dbang po'i sgo yi yul la min// ji ltar lcags kyi phyogs cig na
264b1(rgyud): / robacud chen po yang dag gnas// lcags la drag po mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed// de bzhin du ni phyog gcig na// mi 'gyur bde ba yang dag gan// sems ni 'dod chag mes gdungs na// kun nas kun tu 'bigs pa byed// de ltar phug pa'i
264b2(rgyud): lcag la ni// gang du'ang ni dri ma med// de bzhin phug pa'i seMs la ni// gang du'ang bag chags yod pa min// gser nyid du ni lcags gyur na// me yis dri ma med pa 'gyur// de bzhin sems ni yang dang yang // 'dod chag me yis dri med 'gyur/ nor bu chen po rdo la reg rab
264b3(rgyud): / tu gsel bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin mi 'gyur ba des reg na// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'dir mang smras cishig dgo// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa kyang // lcags ni kun du 'big pa la// ro yi nus pas bsam mi khyab// don dam pa ni ye shes dngos// rtog pa yang
264b4(rgyud): ni smos ci dgos/ blo bur dri mas g.yog pa yi/ sems ni kun tu 'big pa yi// sas la blo bur dri ma med// sems las yun rings dus su min// sems las ma rtogs skye ba'ang min// sems la zad med gnas pa'ang man// gal te 'di ni blo bur na// de ltar sngon du dri
264b5(rgyud): med sems// de phyir de la srid min gang // gal te sems las ma gtogs 'ongs// de ltar nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs// gal te sems la rtag gnas na// de ltar zas kyi dri ma ni// bcud kyi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// de yid
264b6(rgyud): nyid nyams pa med// de bzhin sems kyi dri ma 'di// stong nyid sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// dri med thabs kyis yang dag gnas// de yi ye shes nyes pa med// ji ltar bcud kyis lcags phug pa// lcags nyid du'ang 'gyur te// de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sngag
264b7(rgyud): bsngal nyid du 'gyur ma yin// chags bral las ni khyad sdig med// bde bas bsod nams mchog med do// de bas mi 'gyur ba de sems ni// rtag tu phigs bya rgyal po kye// chags las dam rtog bde ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi sgra nus min// lang 'tsho bde ba thob na nus// 
264b8(rgyud): rang gi bde ba thob pa 'gyur// de bzhin ting nge 'dzin bral ba'i// bde ba brjod pa mi nus te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis mi 'gyur thob// rnal 'byor pa nas rang gi rig mi 'gyur skyes ba de the tsom med// thas cad mkhyen phra ma rig pa/ yid kyi bde med chag bral ba// de ltar nam yang mi bya'o// 
265a1(rgyud): 'pho ba las ni chags bral 'gyur// chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// sdug bsngal las ni skyes bu'i khams// zad pas 'chi ba zhes su brjod// shi las de rnams slar yang srid// srid pa
265a2(rgyud): la ni spyir 'chi 'pho'o// de ltar chags bral byung ba yis// sems can du ni srid pa med// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'pho ba'i bde ba spangs par bya// gang gis srid pa'i 'ching ba las// mi 'gyur ba de 'gyur
265a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa'o// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos chags can yang // chags bral bar na mi 'dod do// bdag gis bstan pa'i rgyud las ni// rnal 'byor pa yi sdug bsngal 'dod// sa bon mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu mi 'gyur/ 
265a4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// rten ni 'pho ba thob pa las// rten byed chags bral nyid du 'gyur// rten dang brten pa'i 'brel pa ni// ji srid mi 'gyur nyid du 'gyur// sems kyis mi 'gyur nyid thob bo// rten dang brten pa'i 'brel pa med// mi
265a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba las skyes pa'i sku// mdzod spu'i 'khor lo smon pa las// a li ka lI'i sbyor ba yis// hUM yig mi 'dod rgyal po kye// stong pa las byung gzugs ni rgyu// 'bras bu mi 'gyur las skyes pa de// 'bras bu rgyu la rgyas gdab cing
265a6(rgyud): 'bras bu rgyu la rgyus rgyas gdeb// stong nyid gzung 'dzin rgyu yin te// 'bras bu snying rjes mi 'gyur 'dzin// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems su de brjod do// mya ngan 'das dang bral ba'i sems// 'khor ba las ni 'dra
265a7(rgyud): mi 'gyur// rtag dang chad las nges par grol// de nyid sbyor ba gnyis med gzhan// dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir// gzugs la dngos po yod pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// mi 'gyur ba la dngos med min// 
265a8(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med yang dag sbyor// rdo rje rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog/ gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol// me long la ni phra bzhin no// srid par gzugs ni mo 'ong ste// 'gyur med mi 'gro mya ngan 'das/ phan tshun pa
265b1(rgyud): ni ni ba ni ma ning gis ni go 'phang mchog / rgyu las shes rab ma skyes te// shes rab rgyul 'bras bu 'byung // rgyu las shes rab ma skyes phyir// shes rab las skyes rgyu skyes min// de phyir rgyu skyes yo shes man// shes rab ye shes ma/ 
265b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'bras bu dang ni rgyu yis ni// phan tshun du ni rgyas gangad ba med// gang zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu kun// de ni rten cing 'brel las byung // phan tshun 'khyud pa'i gzugs dag ni// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// shes rab kun la
265b3(rgyud): ngan 'das// mchog tu 'gyur ba med pa skyes// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par grol// phan tshun rgya yis btab pa med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'o// shes bya'i gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// phyi yi shes bya rnam dbye yi phyir// rang gi
265b4(rgyud): sems las de gzhan min// de phyir rang gis rang la ni// gang yang rgyas gang ba nus ma yin// ral gri so yi ring la ni// rol gri chen pos gcod dam ci// mo go sham bu mos sbyor ba yis// rmi lam bde bar 'gyur ba ltar// namakha'
265b5(rgyud): las byung gzugs la ni// sten pas gzugs la de bzhin no// lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab bcas// 'di ni thebs min shes rab min// kun nas kun du yongs su rdzogs// sgrib pa dag ni thams cad spangs// nam mkha' lta bur gro// 
265b6(rgyud): pa med yul dang dbang pos spangs pa nyid// kun du 'byung po kun la gnas// mi chod ma phyed spangs pa nyid// 'di ni rang byung rdo rje sems// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad
265b7(rgyud): dga' bar mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang zhing // nyon mongs zad mdzad dga' chen po// dam tshig chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje rnal 'byor khro bo che// lha ma ni khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che/ 
265b8(rgyud): 'pho ba'i chags pa sol bar mdzad// don chen bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir// rdo rje mi phyed zhes su gsungs// sems dpa' srid pa gsum cig pa// mchog tu mi 'gyur dag tu brjod// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde gang ba// sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzob nyid
266a1(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// sems dpa' byang chub rnam par gnas// de phyir mi g.yo byang chub sems// nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs// zhes
266a2(rgyud): chen po dgra chen po// dam tshig zla ba'i bdud rtsi dkar// 'pho med de ni za ba'o// rigs pa 'dis ni dam tshig sems// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// rdo rje thams cad gcig pu nyid// khro bo'i gzug/ 
266a3(rgyud): can bdud rnams la// khro bo chen po dgra chen po// mi 'gyur chen po bde thabs kyis// nam yang sems can don mi 'dor// sems sgrol ba yi ser sna che// 'gyur ba'i ser sna sel bar mdzad// mi 'gyur ye shes tshor ba 'di// rnam pa drug
266a4(rgyud): po dag tu brjod// rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang // 'du shes phung po'i rigs de rnams// ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa// rim pa ji bzhin rlung dang chu// yid dang mig dang rna ba lus// sna dang lce ni de bzhin no// sgra dang ro dang chos kyi
266a5(rgyud): dbyings// dri dang reg bya gzugs dag ste// rigs drug po ni yongs su dag/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// dbang gi bsgrub pa 'di nyid ni// mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub pa ste// rtswa dang rigs su yang dag ldan// bsdus par
266a6(rgyud): bshad pa zla ba kye// 'jig rten khams la sogs pa le'u lnga las// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi bsgrub pa'i mdor bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // kha che'i ma hA paN+Di ta so man tha dad / bod kyi lo ts+tsha wa chen po 'phyo dge/ 
266a7(rgyud): slong dge ba shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ she ka pra kri ya/ bod skad du/ dbang gi rab tu byed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// phab
266a8(rgyud): pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying dang spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang // gsang ba rnams su bsrung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gis rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis// slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos
266b1(rgyud): ser skon zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul shugs rnams ni sbyin bya brtag pa ru// gsod dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud
266b2(rgyud): med rnams yang de bzhin gzhan nor 'chang mthung dag kyang ste// 'khor bI rdo zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams// gang zhig ga gi dusu 'byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla de'i ming gis rab tu sbyin byas
266b3(rgyud): pa'i// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yi srid pa 'jig pa 'joms pas khyed rnams kyis kyang skyang par gyis// rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med
266b4(rgyud): skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni bsad mi bya// grags dang rje bo dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la mkhu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyi yongs su 'chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul
266b5(rgyud): shugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i pad ma'i kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te// dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad ma'i kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni 'dor/ 
266b6(rgyud): gnas gyur gang du me tog lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su nges so mi bdag kye// phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam sum 'dir ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin// klu rnams kyis sam bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bu
266b7(rgyud): pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa 'am// sa las byung ba rnams su rin chen sman dang ldan dang dri ldan rnams kyis khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar sbyangs nyid// rdo rje
266b8(rgyud): dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul shugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyangs par bya// ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin// rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu byin nas
267a1(rgyud): @mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams ston par bya// rdo rje'i rigs su nges par srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang // rin chen du ni gzhan ner 'phrog dang mchog gi pad
267a2(rgyud): mu'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog/ 'khor lo chang dang mor me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin du bsten par bya ba'o// gri gug du ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha'i pad ma
267a3(rgyud): smad mi bya// sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin la si khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min// rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges// chu yi sgrol ma la sog
267a4(rgyud): lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar sbyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul shugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis byams pa sogs su sbyong // rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i
267a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa// de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin// dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bskur na dge ba'i dbang gis
267a6(rgyud): sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gro ba'o// phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges pargya rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid
267a7(rgyud): du 'gyur ba'o// 'gro ba g.yo sgyu yi dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur// gal te buM
267a8(rgyud): pa dang ni gsang bar brtul shugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin// gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya// rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su
267b1(rgyud): 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o// rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis ni dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum pa nges par
267b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'// grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri// phung po nyon mongs pa
267b3(rgyud): las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dag pa'o// rgyu yis byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster ba rtog pa gang yin drag po'o// dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur te/ 
267b4(rgyud): dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan// bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas rnams kyi'o// phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lha dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste// de nas mkhyud bya rnams
267b5(rgyud): rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g.yo ba la sogs pa// nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung po lha min rigs// dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba
267b6(rgyud): dang gzhan ni sgom pa'i don du'o// gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod// ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o// mtha'
267b7(rgyud): dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyar bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya// rgyal ba dbang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir// rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser
267b8(rgyud): zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus sbyang bya nyid ni tshogs byas la// slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya/ 
268a1(rgyud): nyid/ phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin na de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang // skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g.yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang // khro ldan khengs shing
268a2(rgyud): 'dod la chags dang brdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan laganyi dang ma nyams pa// de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin du 'bad par bla mas spang bya mi'i dbang po// sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam// 
268a3(rgyud): tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya// 'gro ba rnams kyis rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni ma 'khrug par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid// yan lag mchog la glang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin bzhun
268a4(rgyud): yang dag 'dzag pa nyid// oM Ta dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig ler thar pa gsum gyi mthar// snang reg 'dus dang gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs pa yis de ltar ro// 
268a5(rgyud): dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste// phyis nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o// 'bar ba yang dag rol
268a6(rgyud): pas rdo rje las ni pad mar thig le 'dzag pa khyad par dga' ba'o// oM Ta rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o// 'dod de dga' dang g.yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis
268a7(rgyud): ni de yi sbyor ba cig/ gang nus pa dang skye bar nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o// 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dong ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o// oM Ta dang ni sgra tsam nyid dang
268a8(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid dang rnams pa bzhi pa'o// sems kyi bsam par bya ba ma ste reg par bya zhi mkhyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin du bde ba de bzhin ma mo// 
268b1(rgyud): thig le lhung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do// de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos// chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung
268b2(rgyud): dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste// de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o// chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o// phyag rgya
268b3(rgyud): rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o// rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste// de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so// bzhi pa ni gsum
268b4(rgyud): pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smos pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so// 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig shes rab kyis ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzha
268b5(rgyud): yang bdud rtsi myong dang mkhyud pa'o// shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang // de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o// gang
268b6(rgyud): zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa// las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g.yeng byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas// yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub
268b7(rgyud): rgyur ni rgyal mchog bskyed byed phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni// gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ba// lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus
268b8(rgyud): kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas// sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges// ma lus rgyal sras rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnam
269a1(rgyud): kyis bsten byas na/ ye shes snang ba de nyid shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsreg pa dang // chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster
269a2(rgyud): bar byed/ shes rab ye shes pa zhes sems kyi snang ba nyid de de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o// dbang 'dir zhugs pa'i gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges// de nas bde ba 'dzag pa
269a3(rgyud): med pa lhan cig skyes par 'gyur med zhi ba mya ngan 'das par reg/ des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o// nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzums pa dang ni rdo rje'i laM
269a4(rgyud): du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis// stong pa las ni du ba mig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang // 'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku
269a5(rgyud): ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o// chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse gcig gnas pa'i lta bas lta bar bya ba ni// ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yi
269a6(rgyud): so// der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu na nyi ma bzhin du med pa'i sna tshogs mdog/ yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no// sku mthong gyur nas nyin mtshan so so'i dus su srog/ 
269a7(rgyud): gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang // brtul shugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gi reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o// ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mtho
269a8(rgyud): ba'i bas chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo// mtha' dang 'bar ba'i dbus dang khyad par lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang // gnyid dang / 
269b1(rgyud): brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdongad ma ngag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa// de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tsom med// bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing
269b2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis// sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu men gsher ba med pa'i phyir// me yi rnam par snang yang me men rlung gi gzugs
269b3(rgyud): su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min// rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyi/ 
269b4(rgyud): sgra tsam thig le ma dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa// srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad mar bcas dang pad ma rdo rje ldan pa yis// dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'dug pa
269b5(rgyud): yang dag 'dus pas yul dang yul can med par 'gyur ba dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzung dang de rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang chen po'o// dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa g.yas
269b6(rgyud): dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang // phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba rdo rje yang dag bsad pa dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du pad ma rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad mas gsor ba yis// sa bon ma btang de ni
269b7(rgyud): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do// sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rang la 'gyur ba'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste sbyong ba mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du// rnam pa/ 
269b8(rgyud): kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o// mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir// 'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gab rdzogs pa'i
270a1(rgyud): gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te oM Ta las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas
270a2(rgyud): ngag rim pa yis// gsung dang thugs ste lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed// g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsungs// gnyid
270a3(rgyud): ni nges par chos kyi thugs te tu brgya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms// yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim pa yis// gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam
270a4(rgyud): gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru bskyed par byed// sa dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu brgya'i rang bzhin rnams// lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam pa rgyu dang yul la bskyod
270a5(rgyud): pa med pa'i sems thim pa// ye shes gnas dang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni// sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba yi// de ltar sems
270a6(rgyud): ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le dbus// khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po'i rnams kyi bsrung bar bya ba ni// rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi/ 
270a7(rgyud): gi bde ba bskyed byed sa bon thig le btang na thar pa ga la 'gyur// de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul shugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spangs par bya// dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sum bcu
270a8(rgyud): lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang du byed pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po sa man ta shri dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
270b1(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma aR+tha se ba/ bod skad du/ don dam pa'i bsnyen pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum ye shes nyi ma dpal ldan shAkya seng ge la ni spyi gtsug gis phyag 'tshal lo// mgon
270b2(rgyud): po byams pa dang bcas 'jam dpal yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje 'chang dang grags pa la// bstan drug 'dod pa sna tshogs dang ni rtog ge la sogs rnams kyis rtogs pa ma yin pa'i// don dam bsnyen pa blo dman mi gang de la mdor bsdus
270b3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dod spangs bdag gis bshad// kun mkhyen gyis gsungs rdo rje theg par nges par ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob dpon ngag gi rjes su 'brang // de phyir 'dod pa'i slob mas bla ma gser bzhin du// yongs su rtogs bani// 
270b4(rgyud): pa la ngan 'gro'i bag kyang med// rdo rje sems dpa' yab khyod rnam par spangs nas ni// gang du 'byung 'gyur khyab 'jug tshangs pa drag po dang // zla nyi sgra gcan gza' dang skar ma la sogs pa// 'jig rten blun po'i lam ni rmongs pa len
270b5(rgyud): byed kyi tshad mas nges par dman pa 'jig rten pa yi ngag/ rnam pa sna tshogs lta ba'i chos kyi dbye ba ni// rig byed dang gzhan rtog ge dran pas tha dad pa// 'dzangs pa'i skye bo 'jig rten 'di ru len nam ci// gang phyir kun mkhyen
