292b4(rgyud): bden pa'i don// med do zhes pas log par lta// dkon mchog yod kyi yon tan med// snga phyi yod kyi rgyu 'bras med// chos can yod kyi chos nyid med// log par lta ba du ma 'byung // don la the tsom yid gnyis kyis// nges pa'i
292b5(rgyud): shes pa bzlog pa'ang yod// yang na ci yang ma shes pas// don rtogs shes rab 'gal ba yod// de nas lta ba re res kyang // mchog tu lta zhing dag par 'dod// de dang 'thun pa'i tshul khrims dang // brtul shugs la yang de
292b6(rgyud): bzhin 'dod// lta ba de yi nga rgyal dang // chags dang mi mthun khong khro skye// gzhan yang 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug ser sna nga rgyal dang // phrag dog la sogs nyon mongs kyis// sems nyid 'od gsal chos sku la// 
292b7(rgyud): sgrib par byed do zla bzad kye// shes bya'i sgrib pa gang zhe na// yul dang yul can gnyis med la// bzung 'dzin tha dad zhen pas 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// bden gnyis so sor brtags pas 'khrul// brjod
292b8(rgyud): bya brjod byed stong pa las// don dang yi ger zhen pas 'khrul// snang ba stong pa dbyer med la// sdang stong tha dad brtags pas 'khrul// chos kun gdod nas spros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad zhen nas 'khrul// sems nyid rang bzhin
293a1(rgyud): @#// 'od gsal la// yod med zhes brjod 'das pa ste// sgro dang skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// ming gzugs bral ba'i chos rnams la// mtshan mar 'dzin pa sgrib pa yin// 'khor 'das ye nas mnyam nyid
293a2(rgyud): la/ dman kyang gya nom zhen pa yis// dgag sgrub yul du zhen nas 'khrul// shes bya yul du zhen pa yis// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la// sgrib par byed do zla bzang kye// de la snyoms 'jug sgrib pa ni// bas gtan
293a3(rgyud): / gzugs med dran sogs la// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag pa'am// de la langs pa'i 'du shes kyis// sgom pa po dang bsgom bya dang // sgom pa'i mtshan mas zhen na 'khrul// 'od gsal phyag rgya chen po la// sgrib pa 'gyur/ 
293a4(rgyud): ro rgyal po kye// zla ba bzang po yang nyon cig/ nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// shes bya kun las ma rmongs pas// nor bu me long gser gos pa'i// 'dam dang g.ya' dang dri ma rnams// rgan pos gzhon nu la sgo nas// legs
293a5(rgyud): bar sbyar ba ji bzhin du// bla mas slob ma la bstan nas// legs par sbyang thabs ngas bshad kyis// rtse gcig gus pa'i tshul gyis nyon// de'ang ma yis shes par bya// mtshan nyid rtag dang 'brel pa yis// bsnyen pa'i
293a6(rgyud): phan 'dogs bya ba'o// mtshan nyid rtag pa lag pa ste// slob ma bla ma'i mtshan nyid do// 'brel pa mig gis shes bya ste// slob ma dang ni bla mas so// bya ba dag la zung yin te// slob mas bsnyen bkur gyisgra mnyes bya// 
293a7(rgyud): bla mas yon tan gyis phan gdags// rgyal pos bsnyen bkur bya ba yang // rdzas dang yo byad ri bong can// bya ba sgrub pa lag pa ste// thos bsam byed pa me yin no// sgom pa chu bo'i sems can la// phan pa sgrub pa
293a8(rgyud): mda' yi ni// chos 'chad mchog gi bsnyen bkur te// grags phyir min no mi bdag kye// de ltar mnyes byed slob ma la// bla mas brtse bas phan 'dogs bya// tshar gcad rjes bzung nges par 'byung // tshar gcad me
293b1(rgyud): ste sgrub mtha' stobs// byin rlabs sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// rjes gzung me yin 'thun par bstan// khyad par bstan dang sun dbyung ngo // nges par 'byung ba rgya mtsho ste// zla ba dbang gis smin par bya// lag pa rgyud kyis shes// 
293b2(rgyud): rab bskyed// man ngag mi mthun sel byed dang // yon tan bde lag ston byed me// bdud las bzlog pa chu bo ste// rnyed sogs phyir min rgyal po kye// de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa yis// sgyu ma lta bu'i blo sbyangs na// sgyu ma lta bu'i
293b3(rgyud): don rtogs nas// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'grub// zla ba bzang pos yang gsol pa// kye ma sems can las kyis bcings// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs su nub// skye rgan 'chi'i rba la g.yengs// mi shes mun pa'i dmag
293b4(rgyud): tu 'thibs// 'dod chags 'dod pa'i 'dam la bying // zhe sdang me yis rang rgyud bsregs// ser sna'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// phrag dog lu gu brgyud kyis bsdams// nga rgyal ri bo mthon pos non// rdo rje'i chog de shin du/ 
293b5(rgyud): rlung rgyud kyi dgongs pa ma shes pas// rdo rje'i chog de ma khrol na// khyed kyi mkhyen dang mthu stobs dang // thugs rjes su la ci zhig bgyi// khyed ni sems can kun gyi pha// bdag ni sems can kun gyi ma// gsar gyi/ 
293b6(rgyud): maN+Dal 'dis mchod kyis// ston pas bdag la gsal por gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // sha za srin po maM la sogs// mu stegs nyan thos kyis mi shes// rgyal/ 
293b7(rgyud): po zla ba bzang po yas// dris pa de la bdag dga'o// mtshan nyid brtag cing 'brel pa gzhug/ bsnyen bkur phan 'dogs rdo rje'i tshig/ legs par spro la ngas bshad kyis// rgyal po rtse gcig gus pas nyon// dang
293b8(rgyud): po slob dpon dam tshig can// rdo rje theg pa la gnas cing // de nyid sgom zhing 'dod pa chung // chags sogs dri bral bzod brtson 'grus// lam zhugs slob ma lam ster byed// dmyal bas 'jigs 'joms tshangs par
294a1(rgyud): @spyod// bdud 'joms rdo rje dbyug pa de// sra stengs rdo rje 'dzin par grags// brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// snying brtser
294a2(rgyud): ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas// de nyid bcu na yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// sngags nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba shes// rab tu zhi zhing dbang po dul// de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa// bla ma
294a3(rgyud): slos brten par bya// bla ma ngan pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nga rgyal khros pa dam tshig bral// rdzas la brkam zhing thos pa med// slob ma slu ba'i don du gnyer// mchog tu bde ba'i glo 'phang nyams// longs spyod la chags das
294a4(rgyud): ma bskur// bag med pa dang tshig rtsub bcas// dbang po'i don du 'dod la dga'o// slob ma byang chub don gnyer bas// dmyal ba bzhin du spang bar bya// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub dag/ slob dpon zhal gyi rjes// 
294a5(rgyud): 'brang bas// ma lus rdo rje theg pa ru// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// de phyir slob mas bla ma rnams// bsregs gcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags na sdig pa ni// cung zad gos
294a6(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// gnas dang dus dang lha dang sngags// bgrang phreng phyag rgya sbyin bsreg dang // dkyil 'khor bum pa'i de nyid dang // dbang bskur dang ni rab gnas kyi// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa'i// gsum las dge slong/ 
294a7(rgyud): mchog yin te// 'bring ni dge tshul du brjod do// khyim na gnas pa tha mar gsungs// brtse med 'gro dang ma rungs pa// khengs dang chags sngar mi bsdams pa// rang bstod par yang mi bya'o// bla ma slob ma blo ldan pas// de bani/ 
294a8(rgyud): bla mas slob ma yang // de bzhin dbang mchog thob bya'i phyir// rdo rje slob dpon de bzhin gshegs// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pas// dus gsum du ni mngon phyag 'tshal// de nas zla bzang gis zhus pa// lnga
294b1(rgyud): brgya tha mar gyur pa'i tshe// yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma nyung // skyon yon 'dres shing skyon ldan mang // de tshe bla ma ji ltar bzung // ston pa'i bka' stsal snyigs ma'i tshe// slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung // skyon ni nam yang ma yin no// 
294b2(rgyud): yon tan bzung bas dngos grub 'gyur// skyon brjod pas ni dngos grub med// chu la 'o ma rang zhugs pa// de ston nas ni ngad pas 'thung // de ltar bla ma'i yon tan bzung // til dang sregs ma 'dres pa la// sregs ma dag
294b3(rgyud): la khro med dang // til btus nas ni khu byug za// de ltar bla ma'i yon tan bzung // ji ltar khAm mkhan mkhas pa yis// til sogs mar khu 'jur ba bzhin// bla ma'i yon tan bzhur la bzung // skyer mos 'cho la nya len
294b4(rgyud): bzhin// bla ma'i yon tan rnam pa bzung // sa thob ma rtogs khyim pa ni// bla ma ru ni mi bya'o// de las thos pa yongs shes na// rtags can nyid kyis bya ba yin// sa thob ma rtogs slob dpon ni// khyim gnas gang tshe mchod/ 
294b5(rgyud): pa na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// ma gus par ni 'gyur ba yin// gtsug lag khang sogs rab gnas ni// rtags can gyis ni rtag tu bya// de gsum gyi ni phyogs gcig tu// gos dkar can gyis bya ba min
294b6(rgyud): khyim pa gtsug lag khang dkor spyod// gzhan gyi g.yog dang zhing las dang // tshong dang dam chos 'tshong ba dang // rmongs te sa skyengs rdor 'dzin min// dge slong gos dmar can dag la// ngo tsha med cing rang bzhin ngan// yugs sa
294b7(rgyud): mos kyang phyag byas mchod// sangs rgyas pa yi lam nyams pas// 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bye ba ste// de yang sa stengs rdor 'dzin min// de phyir mi yi bdag po kye// bla ma goso dmar can stan bya// spyir ni rgan pa rnam pa bzhi// 
294b8(rgyud): ye shes thos pa khrims dang sa// longs spyod rgan pa rgyal po yin// sngags pa rnams ni dbang gyis te// rab byung 'dul khrims kyis rgan no// slob dpon gos dmar can yin na// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// slob dpon mchog
295a1(rgyud): @#/ te gus pas mchod// rgyal po sogs kyis bkur bar bya// mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dge slong sangs rgyas bstan pa yi// ljon shing bskyed byed rna ba yin// dge chos bde 'phel yal ga yin// gdung ba
295a2(rgyud): bsil byed lo 'dab yin// yid rab dang byed me tog ste// dgos 'dod tshom byed 'bras bu yin// mi shes mun sel sgron me ste// 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog dpa' bo yin// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skyams byed ma// bdud dag 'a'o// 
295a3(rgyud): byed rgyal po'i dpung // yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas pas// kun gyis bkur bsti mchod cing bstod// dad gus mos pas phyag 'tshal lo// gtsug lag khang sogs sti gnas su// gos dmar can gyis bzung bar bya// dge
295a4(rgyud): slong dge tshul phas pham nas// gal te phyir bcos mi byed na// dri la gos dkar byin nas kyang // rgyal po'i nyes pas gnas nas bskrad// gos dkar can gyi gtsug lag khang // nam yang bzung ba ma yin no// mchod rten
295a5(rgyud): la sogs rab gnas na// dge slong gis ni rtag tu bya// gos dkar can gyis byas gyur na// sangs rgyas bstan dang theg chen la// smod cing brnyas par gyur pa yin// dge slong med na dge tshul gyis// de med gos dkar
295a6(rgyud): can gyis bya// khyim nas thos pa rgan gyur na// de la thos pa spangs zhes bya// me tog maN+Dal legs bshams nas// dam chos la sogs mdun brdar te// khyim pa'am 'on te gsar bu la// 'jig rten byo ba spang bI
295a7(rgyud): phyir/ brtul shugs 'dzin pas blo phyag bya// chos 'chad ma gtogs dus kun du// ba dan stab pa dang mngon du ldang // nor gyi bya ba bsnyen bkur sogs// brtul shugs can gyis kun bya ste// phyag bya dam pa
295a8(rgyud): min la spyad// khyim nas thos pa med po ni// nam yang bkur ba ma yin no// de bzhin gos dmar gang zhig mthong // stag gzig dang ni zhe sdang 'gyur// kla klo'i chos dang sangs rgyas la// de bzhin gos dkar
295b1(rgyud): dag la dga'// gtong dang tshul khrims dag la brtson// yon tan can shes thar don gnyer// rgyud la gos dang sems don gnyer// de nyid thos pa shin du skyed// rnyed sogs 'dod pa'i slob dpon nam// dkon mchog gtsug
295b2(rgyud): lag khang gi dkor// gang zag gcig gis longs spyad pa// dge ba bcu yi lam nyams pa// gdug pa can gyi grogs spangs pa'i// slob mas bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing // tho mi mtshams na snod ldan pas// bla ma mkhas
295b3(rgyud): pas bsten par bya// rig sogs yon tan gzhan la rnyas// bud med la dga' nor la brkam// gzhan la phrag dog rang la bstod// bla ma la khro rgyab kyis phyogs// bla ma'i rig ma rdzas la zhen// dag sogs bya ba la mi
295b4(rgyud): 'jug/ sems can rab spu snying rje med// gdug pa dang 'grogs g.yem la dga'// byas pa mi gzo gsar 'grogs byed// thos la mi brtson slob ma ni// bla ma mkhas pas bdud ngan spangs// slob mas bla ma mnyen
295b5(rgyud): par bya// zas nor tshig snyan pho nya bya// khad kyis bya ba gzhan yang zhu// de rjes ji ltar bsgo bar bya// bla ma'i gros dang skyam par bya// bdag nyid phebs par blo gtad bca'// gzhan la re ba dor nas ni// blon pos rgyal
295b6(rgyud): po la bya bzhin// dad mos gus pas dam chos zhu// khri mun dong nas thar 'dod gang // sgron mes yid ra ba dang byed bzhin// 'degs byed mgu byed gsol 'debs ltar// 'khor ba'i khri mun thar 'dod gang // chos sgron// 
295b7(rgyud): yid rab dang 'byed cing // ston byed mnyes byed gsol gdab bya// chu rgal gru mthong dga' 'gyur cing // gnyan pa mgu byed gsol bde bas ltar// thar 'dod chos mthong dga' ba dang // bla ma mnyes byas gsol gdab
295b8(rgyud): bya nad pa sman la brkam byed cing // sman po mgu byed gsol 'debs ltar// slob mas chos la brkam bya zhing // bla mo mnyes byed gsol gdab bya// rgyal la rlangs kyis ji lta bar// 'dod don bdud rtsi zhu bar bya// 
296a1(rgyud): / grags phyir min no mo bdag kye// ji ltar 'khor lo bsgyur ba dag/ rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis// 'khor la ji ltar phan 'dogs lhur// zas gos rta dang glang po sogs// ji ltar 'kho ba'i yo byad dang / du / 
296a2(rgyud): rig ma dbang sogs sbyin// mi bdag snod du gyur par bya// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sogs// 'khor 'das skyon yon rab bstan zhing // sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs bshad bya// mos par bya'o mi bdag kye// 
296a3(rgyud): gdul bya byin sogs dran sogs kyis// byang chub phyogs la rab bkod de// dkar po dge ba'i chos rnams kun// bsgrub par bya'o mi bdag kye// khyu mchog gzhan gyis sna drangs nas// ba glang tshogs rnams tshim byed/ 
296a4(rgyud): ltar Tag shes gnyen rang gis thog drangs nas// sbyar bar bya'o zla bzang kye// rta dang glang po ma he sogs// rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i shing rta la// bla ma dgos pa'i rgyur 'bul lo// gser dngul zangs lugs mu tig dang // 
296a5(rgyud): nor bu be dur+ya la sogs// ser sna med par 'bul bar bya// 'bras sogs 'bru yi bang mdzod dang // shing thog sogs kyang dbul bar bya// khang bzangs zhing dang ldum ra dang // bskyed shing sogs kyang gus par dbul// dar
296a6(rgyud): za ba ras yug la sogs pa'i// na bza' kha dog sna tshogs dbul// dza ti ga pur gur gum sogs// sman bzang dang bas dbul bar bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// sil snyan sogs kyang gus pas mchod// bu dang bu mo/ 
296a7(rgyud): chung ma yang // phrag dog med par dga' bar dbul// ji ltar 'kho ba'i yo byad rnams// rgyal pos bla ma mnyes par byos// pho nya bzo dang so nam dang // gzim cha sku gnye gdan bstab sogs// gzhin 'dzum mos pas kun byaste
296a8(rgyud): mdor na bla ma'i bya ba dag/ gsong por zhus la bsgrub par bya// bla ma mngon sum bzhugs bzhin du// ma zhus bya ba brnyas par 'gyur// gshes gnyen nye bar mi gnas na// rigs par ji ltar nye bar sgrub// ji ltar thos pa'i
296b1(rgyud): dag la dga'// gtong dang tshul khrims dag la brtson// yon tan can shes thar don gnyer// rgyud la gus dang sems don gnyer// de nyid thos pa shin du sbed// rnyed sogs 'dod pa'i slob dpon nam// dkon mchog gtsug
296b2(rgyud): lag khang gi dkor// gang zag gcig gis longs spyad pa// dge ba bcu yi lam nyams pa// gdug pa can gyi grogs spangs pa'i// slob mas bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing // tho mi mtshams na snod ldan pas// bla ma mkhas
296b3(rgyud): pas bsnyen par bya// rig sogs yon tan gzhan la rnyas// bud med la dga' nor la brkam// gzhan la phrag dog rang la bstod// bla ma la khro rgyab kyis phyogs// bla ma'i rig ma rdzas la zhen// dag sogs bya ba la mi
296b4(rgyud): 'jug/ sems can rab spu snying rje med// gdug pa dang 'grogs g.yem la dga'// byas pa mi gzo gsar 'grogs byed// thos la mi brtson slob ma ni// bla ma mkhas pas bdud ngan spangs// slob mas bla ma mnyen
296b5(rgyud): par bya// zas nor tshig snyan pho nya bya// khad kyis bya ba gzhan yang zhu// de rjes ji ltar bsgo bar bya// bla ma'i gros dang skyam par bya// bdag nyid phebs par blo gtad bca'// gzhan la re ba dor nas ni// blon pos rgyal
296b6(rgyud): po la bya bzhin// dad mos gus pas dam chos zhu// khri mun dong nas thar 'dod gang // sgron mes yid ra ba dang byed bzhin// 'degs byed mgu byed gsol 'debs ltar// 'khor ba'i khri mun thar 'dod gang // chos sgron
296b7(rgyud): yid rab dang 'byed cing // ston byed mnyes byed gsol gdag bya// chu rgal gru mthong dga' 'gyur cing // gnyan pa mgu byed gsol 'debs ltar// thar 'dod chos mthong dga' ba dang // bla ma mnyes byas gsol gdab/ 
296b8(rgyud): bya/ nad pa sman la brkam byed cing // sman po mgu byed gsol 'debs ltar// slob mas chos la brkam bya zhing // bla ma mnyes byed gsol gdab bya// rgyal la rlangs kyis ji lta bar// 'dod don bdud rtsi zhu bar bya// 
297a1(rgyud): @rgyas chen po ni// 'jig rten khams na yod pa min// de la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang // mi rtog pas ni srid pa gcod// mkhu bar byed na rnal 'byor pa// ngu 'bod la sogs dmyal chen 'gro// de phyir sems// 
297a2(rgyud): ni rnam dag pas// rtogs dang ma gtogs skye bo la// sgo gsum 'gal bar mi bya zhing // kun nas phan pa cher bskyed la// bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya// bla ma'i drin gyis thob pa yis// rgyud lung man ngag sbyin par bya// 
297a3(rgyud): chos 'chad ma gtogs sems can la// phan 'dogs mchog 'gyur gang yang med// ji ltar 'khor lo bsgyur ba la// rgyal sras brgya mang yod mod kyang // mtshan dang mi ldan rgyal po yi// gdung brgyud sobs par mi nus na// 
297a4(rgyud): sras kyi 'du shes ga la 'byung // mtshan ldan gdung so ba nus pa la// yid rang shin du dges pa ltar// bla ma slob ma stong yod kyang // chos 'chad gdung sob mi nus na// bu yaMs bya ba ma byas pas// sras kyi thu bor mi 'gyur// 
297a5(rgyud): des na bla ma dam pa yi// thugs la dgos pa'i thabs med do// rgyal ba mnyes par ga la 'gyur// bstan la bya ba ji ltar byas// dam chos gzhan la ston byed na// 'jig rten mi shes mun pa yi// smag rum sel byed
297a6(rgyud): sgron ma yin// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// 'dren par byed pa'i lugs kyu yin// sems can sdug bsngal rba rlabs las// 'don byed zhags pa'i mchog yin no// nyon mongs chu sgrol gru da zam// ser sna'i
297a7(rgyud): mdud 'gro la thur ma yin// zhe sdang me gsod chu bo'i rgyun// rnam rtog bud shing bsreg byed me// shes rab ye shes me gsos shing // thar pa'i sa bon bskyed byed pa// sangs rgyas bskyed par byed pa'i ma// phan byed
297a8(rgyud): sgrub byed pashes dang gro gA/ bsam gtan zas ster sring mo yin// bdud bzhi las grol dpa' bo yin// dri ma 'khrud byed chu rgyun yin// bla ma mnyes byed bsnyen bkur yin// sangs rgyas dgongs pa skong byed yin// 
297b1(rgyud): stong gsum skye bo grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas dad pas mchod pa bas// sems can gcig la snying rje ba// tshogs bcad gcig brjod khyad par 'phags// sems can gang ga klung skyed dang // gling bar mun pas 'thoms/ 
297b2(rgyud): pa la// sgron mos gsal bar byas pa bas// skad cig byams pas chos bstan mchog/ stong gsum nor bus bkang byas nas// dbul po gang la byin pa bas// tshigs bcad gcig byin de don che// blo ldan dam chos 'chad
297b3(rgyud): / tshe yang / bla ma'i slob ma slob mar min// gnad la byin na nges pa med// sgo ba thob na bsnyen bkur mchog/ bskos tshe mi ston bka' las 'das// na dang mi nus nyes pa med// brel na bsnyad la skabs tshe bshad// des ni bla ma'i
297b4(rgyud): thugs tshim 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan la bya ba byas// bdag gzhan don rdzogs cis mi 'gyur// des na chos 'chad bsnyen bkur gyis// bla ma mnyes byed mi bdag kye// 'dir rnams smos pas ci zhig bya// bla ma'i thug dge
297b5(rgyud): thams cad bya// mi dgras thams cad spangs par bya// 'jig rten don gnyer kha cig ni// phag g.yos log pa'i gnyen bkur na// rims sogs nad chen gyi sgra shi nas// gshin rje'i pho nyas lag khrid nas// lugs bsregs
297b6(rgyud): khyad pa'i nang bcug ste// khro tshur 'tshed sogs dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal tshor ba drag po myong // de las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs dpag med 'byung // de phyir g.yo rgyu kun sbyangs la// dang gus mo/ 
297b7(rgyud): pas bshes gnyen bsten// dad pas nor bu chu dang mtshungs// mi dge sdig sems dngas par byed// gus pa'i nor bu gser len mtshungs// dkar po 'am chos kun dngas par byed// mos pa'i rin chen 'byung gnas
297b8(rgyud): yin// dge chos dpag mad 'byung ba'i gnas// de ltar bla ma mnyes byas nas// yon tan rgya cheni rnyed par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nor bu yang // ded dpon bla ma mnyes las byung // 'bras bu sku gsuM smin padra/ 
298a1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i bla ma mnyes las byung // gzhan don phrin las ljon shing yang // sa bon bla ma mnyes las byung // byang chub skams sar thon pa yang // gnyan pa bla ma mnyes las byung // mi shes mun pa dngas
298a2(rgyud): pa yang / nyi ma bla ma mnyes las byung // 'khor ba'i mtsho la thon pa yang // lcags kyu bla ma mnyes las byung // nyon mongs nad las sos pa yang // sman pa bla ma mnyes pas byung // ngan song dang nas thon pa yang // zhags// 
298a3(rgyud): pa bla ma mnyes pas byung // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan rang spangs thob yon tan kun// bla ma dam pa mnyes las byung // 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid yang // bla ma mnyes las yang dag byung // rigs
298a4(rgyud): rus longs spyod kha dog dang // gzugs 'khor phun sum tshogs gyur pa// de kun bla ma mnyes las byung // rnyed dang bkur bsti grags pa dang // tshe rang nad med gnod pa med// 'jig rten phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal// 
298a5(rgyud): rgyal po bla mo mnyes las byung // bla ma med pa'i sngon rol nas// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// bskul pa stong gi sangs rgyas kyang // bla ma dag la brten nas 'byung // bla ma mnyes par mi byed gang // bskul pa bye/ 
298a6(rgyud): bar tshogs bsags cing // shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs dang // he ru ka las ring gyur cing // don gyi de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// lha mis 'byor pa las ring 'gyur// bla ma brnyas shing rgyab phyogs na// shin du 'jigs
298a7(rgyud): pa'i dmyal bsrungs kyis// mtshon cha du ma sdigs byed cing // drag cing rtsub pa'i sgra bsgrogs cing // sog le 'bar ba'i gshog la sogs// sdug bsngal mi zad myong bar 'gyur// bskal pa stong bsags dge ba yang / 
298a8(rgyud): bla ma lo khros 'dzad par 'gyur// gling dbar mun pa chen po sogs// dud 'gro sdug bsngal chen po dang // yi dgas sdug bsngal ci yod rnams// bla ma ma mnyes pa las byung // bla ma'i sku la khros brnyas na// kha dog
298b1(rgyud): gzugs zhan gzhin mi sdug/ stobs chung nad mang gnod pa mang // brdeg rtsog rtse ba'i yul du 'gyur// bla ma'i gsung la khang khros na// lcags dgra spobs la ma rtags dang // mi snyan brjod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// bla ma'i dru / 
298b2(rgyud): la khros gyur na// smyo 'bo ge dran nyams dbang po dgod// lta ba ngan lhung bsam gtan nyams// mnar sems pa yi yul du 'gyur// yid kyis nyes spyad de gsungs mtshungs// zla ba bzang pos yang zhus pa// yon tan ldan pa'i blo
298b3(rgyud): ma la/ dad gus bsnyen bkur mnyes byed kyang // mtshan nyid ngan pa'i bla ma de// rnyed don gnyer sogs skyon meng bas// bdag gi nor sogs la gnod pas// khro zhing spang bar cis mi bya// bla ma ngan pa bdud bzhin du// spongs// 
298b4(rgyud): cig ston pas ma gsungs sam// dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas kyis// zla ba bzang la bka' stsal pa// las dang po pa'i gang zag gis// dpa' bo bla ma rtags nas ni// skyon ldan spang la yon tan bzung // las goms pa yi/ 
298b5(rgyud): gang zag gis// bag dang ldan pas gnyi ka bzung // las smin pa yi gang zag gyis// bla ma ngan pa bzung na yang // de yi dge ba 'phel bar 'byung // dang po'i las can yin mod kyi// bla ma mkhas pa med gyur na// yon tan gnyi/ 
298b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'am// chos ston nus pa gcig kyang bzung // de las tshig rkang gcig thos na// srog la bab kyang spang mi bya// bla ma mnyes dang ma mnyes las// phan yon nyes dmigs cher bstan to// de la bsnyen bkur cis mi bya/ 
298b7(rgyud): bdag la bla ma drin khyab pas// bla ma mnyes pa cis mi bya// bla ma dkon mchog gsum yin pas// de la mchod pa cis mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas pa na// rtsa ba'i ltung ba ris can// nyams na rdo rje dmyal bar ltung // sru
298b8(rgyud): na rdo rje 'chang chen thob// de phyir bla ma mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas gsung ra ba las 'das nas// rlung chu tsam cig khyad bsod na// mig gis ngan song gnas 'gro zhing // bzlog na mtho ras bde thob na// bla ma mchog la// 
299a1(rgyud): / smos ci dgos// dam tshig cig pa las khros na// me yis dmyal sogs sdug bsngal zhing // byams na 'phags pa'i bde thob na// phan 'dogs bla mA l+yAg smos// mi gtsang srin bu lha yis// sems can
299a2(rgyud): dman pa blos spangs na// chu bo sdug bsngal ma bskyed cing // byams pas bde ba'i mchog bskyed na// bla ma spangs dang mnyes byas pas// sdug bsngal bde ba de lta min// kun da byang chub sems spangs na// ngu 'bod/ 
299a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas// bsrung na zag med bde thob ni// rtsa ba'i bla ma lta ci zhig/ phyi rol pa sogs blo gros ngan// smad na ro yis bde gshegs ri// zhe mi sdang na nye 'gyur nas// yon tan mnga' la smos ci dgos
299a4(rgyud): snod min sngags sogs mi gsang ri// lkug sogs sdug bsngal cher bskyed pa'i// nyams rtogs dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// gsang na de rnams cher 'phel na// bla ma'i skyon 'thol gsang ci smos// gzugs sogs
299a5(rgyud): phung po la brnyas na// gdengs ka bder gshegs kun brnyas cing // mchod pa rgyal ba kun mchod na// lha'i nga rgyal mi 'bral ba'i// bla ma'i phung po som nyi dang // dag pa'i chos la the tsom na// bu ga mchog gi la nyams
299a6(rgyud): cing / the tsom zad pas mchog rnyed na// bla ma yon tan chos nyid la// the tsom yod med cis mi mtshungs// gdug pa can la byams byed na// phyogs kyis bdud kyi gnyen yin cing // tshar gcad bdud kyi bshed yin na// sgo
299a7(rgyud): dpon la khros spong byed na// de las gdug pa gzhan du yod// rang sems gdug pa tshar gcang bya// ming sogs bral ba der rtogs na// drag pos 'khor bar 'ching gyur cing // mi rtog 'khor ba grol gyur na// bla marang
299a8(rgyud): bzhin skyon bral ba// skyon rtog mi rtog de lta min// dang po las kyis sar gnas gang // dad ldan sems sun phyung na yang // nyi ma bskal par chos mi mjal// sgro bskyed dge chos mi mjal na// bla ma'i thugs sun byung / 
299b1(rgyud): dang // spro bskyed khyad par smos ci dgos// dam rdzas rnyed nas mi bsten na// me zla dngos grub nyams gyur cing // bsten na thun mong mchog rnyes na// dam tshig rtsa ba bla ma dag/ spang bsten byed pa lta ci smos// tha mal bud med smad pas/ 
299b2(rgyud): dang / ma bu zag med bde bral zhing // bstod na yon tan bde ba ster na// snying rje gsum gyis rgyud bskul nas// skyon med brtson pas chos ston pa'i// slob dpon smad dang bstod pa la// nyes dmigs phan yon cis mi 'byung // gzhan
299b3(rgyud): yang bstan par bya ba ni// gzhin 'dzums gsong por smra ba dang // yid ches bag ldan gus pa yis// bla ma nyin gcig mnyes byas na// bskal pa bye ba ther 'bum du// byas dang byed gtsug yid rang ba'i// sdig chen bcom na sangs
299b4(rgyud): rgyas 'gyur// de las bzlog na de snyed kyi// dge ba bcom nas dmyal bar lhung // soms dang zla ba bzang po kye// dan pha ga ru tra ma mthong ngam// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs dang // a mo li ka'i 'dres brtsal dang // sa bsrung rdzing
299b5(rgyud): bu rnga chen dang // sa gtol shing tog phun sum tshogs// 'phrul dga' la sogs 'dod yon gyis// 'byor pa bde ba ji snyed pa// bshes gnyen mnyes pas 'byung bar 'gyur// de las bzlog na dmyal sogs kyi// sdug bsngal
299b6(rgyud): tshor ba drag po 'byung // zla ba bzang po mi snyam 'am// nyi zla bram ze'i tshul la ltos// bsam gtan gzugs med bde ba dang // nam mkha' mdzod dang mkha' spyod sogs// bla ma'i gdan bstab sogs las byung // de las
299b7(rgyud): bzlog na smyo dgod dang // ngan song sdug bsngal mi zad 'byung // zla bzang de la mi snyam 'am// seng ge bag yod bag med smros// grub pa brgyad dang phrin las bzhi// mngon shes spyan lnga rdzu 'phrul gyis// gzhan don phrin las/ 
299b8(rgyud): byed pa yang // bla ma'i gzhed pa sgrub las byung // de las bzlog na lang ka yi// srin bu gnod sbyin sogs skye ste// sems can mang po brlag byas nas// mthar ni sems can dmyal bar 'gyur// zla ba bzang pos mi shes sam/ 
300a1(rgyud): @// ser s+ya b+ha ra te la ltos// rigs gzugs kha dog lus kyi 'od// shing las bdud rtsi 'dod 'jo' ba// 'jigs med g.yog bzang grogs ldan dang // tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs// bla ma bsnyen bkur
300a2(rgyud): byas la byung // de las bzlog na shan pa'i rigs// mdog ngan longs spyod chung ba dang // kha dman grogs 'khor med par skye// rgyal po the tsom mi za 'am// lha lum nags kyi sgron ma dang // rigs ngan rdul phyag ma mthong
300a3(rgyud): ngam/ mang smos ci dgos 'jig rten dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i dpal 'byor kun// dge ba'i bshes la rag las pas// sna tshogs thabs kyi mnyes par bya// mkhu bar mi bya mi bdag kye// sa bdag gzhan dang
300a4(rgyud): bstan par bya// bu gcig pa la ma bzhin du// bdag la bla ma snying brtse bas// de yi bka' ni rab skyong bya// 'khor bar mi bya spang mi bya// mkhu bar mI bya ga sha mi bya// bla ma zos la brkam chags pas// bdag gi/ 
300a5(rgyud): zas la gnod 'gyur bas// khro zhing spang bar bya zhe na// ko sa la rgyal po'i 'byor pa yang // zon dron tshangs gcig byin pas byung // btsun mo'i 'byor pa'ang de 'dra na// gal te slong ba med pa na// de yi
300a6(rgyud): 'byor pa ji ltar byung // de phyir slong ba phan byed na// bla ma zas kyis mnyes byas na// 'byor pa phun tshegs lta ci smos// phan 'dogs la khro ji ltar rigs// bla ma longs spyod dron gnyer bas// pU dag gi longs
300a7(rgyud): spyod 'dzad zhe na// tshong dpon zil gyis mi non pa// 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa kun// phal pa'i skye bo la byin pas// thams cad mkhyen pa rnyes gyur na// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ster byed pa'i// bla ma phan
300a8(rgyud): 'dogs cis ma yin// bla ma bya ba mi 'gyur bas// bdag gis spyad par mi nus pa'i// ngal dub bskyed pas khro zhe na// legs par pha rol phyin pa yis// mtshor zhugs ye shes bla med thob// tshong pas
300b1(rgyud): desten nor bu rnyed// 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub 'gyur na// bla ma'i bya ba sgrub 'gyur cing // bshes gnyen sten nu smos ci dgos// bla ma 'khor gyis 'phongs 'gyur bas// bu dang gnyen du na 'brel zhe na// thus
300b2(rgyud): cad sgrol gyis rang gi bu// mi sdug mtshan can bram ze la// byin pas bram ze phan btags na// bshes gnyen ji ltar phan 'dogs min// bla mas 'khrig pa'i bde chags pas// khyim thab tshor ba spangs zhe na/ 
300b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i mchod pa bla na med// rgyud kyi rgyal po thos pa dang // dbang bskur ba yi bla ma la// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa dang // phrag dog med par chung ma yang // rab dga' yid kyis sbyin byas nas// zag med bde
300b4(rgyud): ba mchog gi 'bras// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid phrag dog sems yod na// gsang ba'i dbang bskur yod mi 'gyur// chung ma sdems byed rmongs pa yi// mi de dmyal bar nye bar 'gro// de phyir rdo rje mchod
300b5(rgyud): ba dag/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yis// bsod nams don du bud med dag/ zla ba ltar dkar gzhin bzangs ma// mig ni ud pal rgyas 'dra ma// lha yi dri bzangs rjes bsgoms nas// dngas pas slob dpon
300b6(rgyud): la ni dbul// rgyal po zla ba'i 'byor pa yang // thams cad mkhyen po'i ye shes bdag/ bram ze btsun mos mchod pas byung // bram zes phan btegs gang ji bzhin// bla ma'i drin gyis cis mi khyab// bla ma 'dod
300b7(rgyud): chen sgo ba mang // bdag gi srog la gzan ce na// bkres pa tsam la dud 'gro yi// srog btang lus po byin pa yis// zla 'od lta bu'i lam sbyangs te// mtshan dpes brgyan pa'i sku brnyes na// slong med bde ba ji ltar// 
300b8(rgyud): 'grub phan ster mchog gyur bla ma la// srog byin bsod nams lta ci smos// khro gtum rma khrag 'byin cen// byams pa'i stobs kyis khrag zags nas// gnod sbyin tshim byas thub pa yis// zag med bdud/ 
301a1(rgyud): rtsis tshim gyur na// bla ma bdud rtsis ci mi ster// bla ma tshig rtsu ba zhe sdang bas// khro zhing langs la 'gro zhe na// e la'i shing mdapa la khros pas// bsam gtan spangs nas klur skyes na// khro bI
301a2(rgyud): mkhyen pa dpag med mnga'// zug na sdug bsngal zug rngu 'byung // mal stan bzang po nyal gyur dang // khro ba'i zug rngus sdug bsngal bsdus// grags pa rnyed sogs dpal las nyams// zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin
301a3(rgyud): du// 'byor pa 'grib cing rgud pa 'phel// lha mi'i bde ba phun tshegs kun// 'phrog byed khro ba dag po yin// gser sogs nor bus lus brgyan cing // lha yi gos sogs mdzes 'dod dang // khro ba'i me yis sbyin bsreg
301a4(rgyud): na// skye bo su yi yid du 'ong // khro ba mdzes pa'i rgyan 'phrog 'dra// bla ma la khros skad cig grangs// bskal par bsags pa'i dge ba bcom nas// de rnyed bskal par dmyal sogs kyi// sdug bsngal tshor ba drug
301a5(rgyud): bo spyo// sha gnyer ba yi dgra bos kyang // de bas lhag pa ci byar yod// khro ba'i nad chen mazhin// lus ngag sems la bde skabs med// bzod pa'i spyan gyis chom gyur no// de la sdug bsngal gral srid// khro ba
301a6(rgyud): lhag pa'i sdig ci yod// bzod las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog med// khro ba nang gi da grar shos nas// bcom na dug rnams thams cad choms// de phyir bzod gus nges pa yis// bla ma sten bya mi bdag kye/ 
301a7(rgyud): mdzad la ma gos sgo gsum gyis// gnod byed par ni 'gro zhe na// 'jig rten skye dgus bshes gnyen te// rkyen dang ldan pas rjes su bsgrogs// de las gnod chen ci byar yod// da yau rnam smin khung
301a8(rgyud): theg gam// bla ma thos dang mi ldan pas// yon tan bskyed phyir 'gro zhe na// bden na bla ma la gus pas// gzhin 'dzum legs par 'das pa yis// drung du sdud la zhu bar bya// bla mas legs par byas ma/ 
301b1(rgyud): bya la// yon tan 'phel na dgos la btang // yon tan 'phel phyir mi gtong na// phrag dog can de bdud kyi bu// zas nor gyis mchod gus byas la// bdag nyid thos pa bskyed phyir 'gro// dmyal sogs sdug bsngal
301b2(rgyud): mi bzod pas// sems kyis nam yang spang mi bya// gzhan du nyams par gyur srid na// snyan par bral la drung du bzhag/ gal te mi nyan gzug par smra// shin du dri sku kha yi smra// nad pa mi 'dod bzhin byin na// nad
301b3(rgyud): sogs sman pa phan 'dogs bzhin// bla ma phan 'dogs chen po yin// de yi bka' 'das dmyal bar lhung // de ltar mi shes rmongs chen dag/ nad pa sman pa sman spong ltar// bla ma des gsungs spong byed do// khro gtum/ 
301b4(rgyud): mche gtsigs mig bgrad pa'i// 'jigs pa gshin rje'i lag khrid nas// mtshon chas 'debs cing dmyal bsrungs la// gtad nas 'tshod tshe ci byar yod// bla ma'i gsung dran gyi hud 'gyod// lcags bsregs skam
301b5(rgyud): pas kha ka la nas// khro chu tho lum 'bar ba ldugs// de tshe bdag la skyabs med do// kye ma ho bdag ni bdud kyis brlag/ sangs rgyas bstun la rab zhugs pas// rku 'phrog tshing drang zhing las dag/ tshul min rang la
301b6(rgyud): spyad dgos pas// thams cad dbul bya min zhe na// dbang po drug las yid dbang dbul// lag gnyis dang ni rkang pa gnyis// khog gnyis mgo dang yan lag drug/ dbang po mchog ni mgo bo dbul// de bzhin/ 
301b7(rgyud): longs spyod thams kyi// bla ma la ni drug cha dbul// de yi 'bras bu bsam mi khyab// lhag ma chos dang mi 'gal bar// bdag nyid kyis ni longs spyod do// rang rig ye shes rgyal po de// gdod nas bkur 'os yin// 
301b8(rgyud): mod kyang // ma rig 'khor ba'i rmangs su phab// sdug bsngal kun gyis a thang chad// rang nas rgyal sa ngo sprad pas// bkur bsti'i bde bas dbugs 'byin pa'i// blon po'i mchog gyur bla ma la// mi gus drin dang mi bzod
302a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gang mos mi 'jigs sam// skor bskor ba myong la ltos// mdor na rgud dang phun tshogs bde// mdza' bo'i bu mo myong ba yang // lus bskyed ma la rten byas na// dpal 'byor kun ster bshes
302a2(rgyud): gnyen la// khro zhing phyir phyogs rmongs chen yin// rgyal po yang ni bstan par bya// lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas thugs rje dpag med pas// phrin las bsam yas dpag tu med// mkhyen stobs spru
302a3(rgyud): pa dpag med 'byung // sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du// ji ltar mos pa'i gzugs su ston// nga nyid lnga brgya tha ma'i tshe// byis pa'i gzugs kyis dam chos ston// de tshe de la gus pa bskyed// gus pa'i 'dod bI den/ 
302a4(rgyud): mchog 'grub// ma gus byas na 'bras mi 'byung // ngan song gsum gyis sdug bsngal bskyed// 'khor bzhi bde bar zhen pa la// nga nyid mi rtag sdug bsngal ston// sgyu ma rmi lam mig rgyu 'dra// brag cha gzugs
302a5(rgyud): brnyan dri za'i grong // glog 'dra ri gzar 'bab chu 'dra// zil pa chu bur na zhun 'dra// chos kun mig 'phrul lta bur ston// 'dod pa'i 'dam la 'byar ba la// 'dod pa mo 'dra mtshon cha 'dra// rlung 'dra gcan zan 'du
302a6(rgyud): pa 'dra// sbrul 'dra tsher ma mi gtsang rlabs// srin po kyi ma'i 'bras bu 'dra// grags pa mtha' yas 'dra bar ston// bud med bu sogs chags pa la// nga nyid lu gu rgyud 'drar ston// sgom 'dra zhag smra ba bzhar rtsi 'dra// 
302a7(rgyud): gling gi srin mo 'dra ba ston// dngos por lta ba'i sems can la// chos kun nam mkha' lta bur ston// cang shes stong par lta ba la// myug gu sa bon la ji bzhin// rgyu 'bras thabs la thabs byung ston// sna tshogs/ 
302a8(rgyud): thabs su zhen pa la// nga nyid sgyu ma rmi 'drar ston// chu zla dri za mig rgyu 'dra// mig yor brag cha me long 'dra// nam mkha' 'ja' tshon 'dra bar ston// de phyir slob dpon sangs rgyas nyid// sa stangs chos ni de la ston// 
302b1(rgyud): pa'o// dge 'dun der gnas sems can rjes su brtse// de 'ang rnam gnyis nyan thos gong ma'o// dge sbyong pa dang dge slong ma dang ni// dge bsnyen ma te nyan thos dge 'dun no// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dang // 
302b2(rgyud): ni// lhan skyes bde dga' dge bsnyen nam// bsod nams ye shes rgyur ni sna tshogs sbyin// dkar ba'i ston mo la sogs nyan thos la// mchog tu bde byed rnal 'byor ci 'dod sbyin// sbyin bdagra ster dga'i sems
302b3(rgyud): dang brtse sems kyis// de yi tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas mchog bde yi// gnas su skye ba 'di nyi ni 'gro// nyan thos rmongs pa gang zhig slob dpon la// smod par byed cing spong bor byed po dag/ de ni mnar med par ni/ 
302b4(rgyud): dmyal bar 'gro// mchog tu 'jigs byed bgegs kyi mgon pos gsod// mchog gi bde ba yi ni dge slong ma// kun du rgyu dang mgo reg ral pa can// gcer bu dang ni thos pa klog la dga'// pan+ti ta la khong
302b5(rgyud): khros lam la nyams// phung po drug la khros na bde gshegs drug la khros// khams drug lha mo drug la skye mched dag/ bcu gnyis las khros sems dpa' sems ma la// las kyi dbang po drug la yul drug la/ 
302b6(rgyud): khros na khro bo khro mo sgo skyong la// bkur bstis mnyes byas de la mnyes byas pas// 'gal ba spangs la bkur bstis mnyes par bya// tha mal snang bas dkon mchog min zhe na// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i mgon
302b7(rgyud): dang skyabs yin te// slob dpon mgon skyabs ci yi phyir mi mdzad// chos ni sems can kun la phan pa ste// dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mi 'gyur ram// dge 'dun phan pa'i byang chub sgrub pa yin// bla// 
302b8(rgyud): ma phan pa'i bya ba cis mi sgrub// dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan dpag med pas// bla ma laM yang yon tan de snyed do// dkon mchog bla med yon tan rin po che// dad mos kun gyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ 
303a1(rgyud): mtho dma' yongs la skyob mdzad 'gro ba'i mgon// mchod gnas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum 'dus gcig tu 'gyur ba yi// bla ma la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su
303a2(rgyud): mchi/ de bzhin mchod cing bshags la rjes yid rang // 'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan mi 'da' gsol// dge ba bsngo zhing lam bstan sems bskyed bya// de la sgyu ma lta bu'i blos byas nas// de yi bsod nams bsam
303a3(rgyud): yas dpag tu med// chu zla lta bu'i rdo rje slob dpon la// rmi lam lta bu'i slob ma gus ldan gyis// sgyu ma lta bu'i yon gyis bsnyen bkur nas// sgra rlon lta bu'i gsung gis chos bstan pas// 'ja' tshon mig yor lta bu'i
303a4(rgyud): don rtogs nas// sna tshogs sprul pa lta bu'i phrin las kyis// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i sems can rnams// mig rgyu lta bu srid pa'i tshu las sgrol// de phyir bla ma mnyes bya mi bdag kye// rgyal po zla ba bzang po de dges nas
303a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal thul sbyar gus pas mdun sdad nas// 'dzum mdzad zla rgyas lta bu'i zhal mnga' bas// mkhyen ldan ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas bla ma dag/ 'das par gyur na bsnyen bkur yul
303a6(rgyud): med pas// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi thabs mchis sam ci// khyed kyi thugs rje rgyun 'tshed ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// zla ba bzang po brtse cig yid kyis nyon// nga ni sngon gyi smon lam mo 'dis
303a7(rgyud): bas// sems can rnams kyang 'dor bar ji ltar rigs// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma 'dras pa'i tshe// gdung ba'i sems kyis mchi ma byung gyur na// phra rags rdul dang mnyam pa'i grangs snyed kyi// bskal par bsags
303a8(rgyud): ba'i sdig chen byang gyur te// ma 'ongs dus su zhabs drung skye bar 'gyur// gdan khri legs bshams steng du pur gzhag nas// chu gtsang argas sku khrus legs gsol na// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i sdig
303b1(rgyud): byang nas// zag med chos sku rdul bral thob par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu'i sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i// bum bzang kha rgyan mgul chings mdzes pa yi// lnga tshan lngas brgyan sman bzangs bsgos pa'i nus/ 
303b2(rgyud): khrus gsol bas ni pha rol phyin pa bcu// rdzogs phyir mi mthun bcu spangs sa bcu yi// yon tan kun rdzogs 'gro ba'i mgon por 'gyur// chu dang mchod yon dri mchog spos bzangs dang // me tog 'bras bu ro bcud
303b3(rgyud): ma smad pa// mar me lha bshos gos te rnam bcu yis// mchod na 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i sa thob nas// skye bo mang po thar pa'i lam la 'god// tsan dan shing sogs til mar sogs kyis bsgos// zag med ye shes
303b4(rgyud): me la bzhu byas pas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par mchod// gdug ha dang rgyal mtshan rol mo 'phran la sogs// dung dang rnga chen dril bu sogs kyi mchod// mchod pa bcu dang bkra shis tshigs bcad bsngag
303b5(rgyud): bskal pa thor 'bum bsags pa'i las dag las// zag mod chos sku thob nas gzugs sku yi// snod ba skyes nas srid gsum sdug bsngal sgrol// na bza' sku khrus gsol ba mchod rten bzhengs// rab tu gan
303b6(rgyud): pa bya zhing mchod pa dbul// phra rab rdul snyed 'khor lo bsgyur ba thob// mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'i sku thob 'gyur// gser rim be dUr+ya sogs rin chen nam// tsan dan shing po jim pa 'dre gu dang // ri mo
303b7(rgyud): lus grub 'dra' bag legs byas nas// rgyan drug gis brgyan gdan khri legs bshams te// rgyan drug mdzes pa'i rgyab yol logs par bcas// sku la mdzes pa'i brgyan drug legs bkod nas/ 
303b8(rgyud): rab gnas cho ga bzhin du legs byas te// mdun du mchod rdzas ji bzhin legs bshams nas// sngar bshad phyag 'tshal lo sogs bcu byas la// de dang mtshungs pa'i dge ba 'ga' mi rnyed// de tshe bla ma'i yon tan dran pa dang / 
304a1(rgyud): drin mdzad pa rnam thar byin brlabs dang // rnam pa cha lugs rjes su dran byas nas// dad mos gus shing shin du gdung ba yis// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'dod pa'i blos// yang dang / 
304a2(rgyud): yang du gsol ba rtag tu gtab// des ni ma 'ongs 'khor gyi gtso bor 'gyur// 'bags dang dam tshig nyams pa sor chud cing // bar tshod zhi zhing sgrib gsum ma lus byang // tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas 'gro ba
304a3(rgyud): 'dren par 'gyur// nye du 'brel pa shul na gnas pa yis// gshin gyi don du dge ba gang byas pa'i// rnaM pA sbyin pa ma phyir be'u bzhin// gang du skyes pa de yi rjes su 'brang // de bzhin mos gus ldan pa slob
304a4(rgyud): ma yas/ bla ma 'das nas gdung ba'i mchod byas nas// dge ba'i rnam smin bla ma'i rjes 'brang ste// thugs kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs gyur cing // slob mas bla ma'i rnam thar snyogs par 'gyur// bla ma 'dra/ 
304a5(rgyud): pa'i lo zla tshes grangs dag/ nges par bzung ste mchod pa byas gyur na// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i sdig bcom nas// shin du mi bzang gshin rje'i grong las thar// stong gsum skye bo mig bral srog
304a6(rgyud): nyams la// mig dang srog byin pas kyang dper mi phod// de snyed skye bo dgra bcom la bkod na// bskal par mchod pa'i dge ba dper mi bzod// bskal pa grangs med bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang / mun pa nyi ma/ 
304a7(rgyud): ji bzhin ma lus sel// stong gsum skye bo snyed kyi rgyal po la// mchod cing bsnyen bkur bskal par byas dang mtshungs// stong gsum rdul dang mnyam pa'i dmus long dang // mnar med dmyal sogs sdug
304a8(rgyud): bsngal gzir ba la// mig byin nad sogs bsal bas char mi phod// 'dra 'bag brgya rtsa bzhengs nas mchod byas na// sngar bstan bsod nams de dag 'bum 'gyur 'byung // nga ni 'khrul pa kun sbed/ 
304b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa rgyas// des bstan pa yang som nyi za 'gyur ba'i// rmongs chen de ni bdud kyi gnyen yin no// dkon mchog spangs te mu stegs cis ma yin// skur pa 'debs te dmyal bar lhung gyur nas// btso
304b2(rgyud): rlarlug sdug bsngal mi 'byung smrar yod dam// 'on te nga bas mkhyen pa khyed che 'am// yan sangs rgyas sems can rab slu 'am// mi sred skyon te spangs la yid ches bskyed// som nyi zad nas yid rab dang 'byed na// 
304b3(rgyud): nor bu sbur len sbur ma ji bzhin du// dge ba'i skur ma gos pa gang ji bzhin// des ni bsod nams mi zad gter chen te// rgyal po de ni bdud kyi dgra yin no// de rjes zla bzang gis zhus pa// gdan ni rgyan drug
304b4(rgyud): ji lta bu/ don gyi rnam dag ma 'tshal bas// shin du gsal bar bdag la gsungs// ston pas bka' stsal rgyal po kye// khri gdan dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// khri gdong rdo rje yang dag spong // khri rkang rdzu 'phrul rkang
304b5(rgyud): pa bzhi/ khri rmang phyogs 'tshams dbang po stobs// ba gam byang chub yan lag bdun// lan kan pa/  rim 'phags rim brgyad// byang chub phyogs bdun nor bu'i khri// mi 'jigs seng ge glang po stobs// spobs
304b6(rgyud): sogs rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// dbang bcu rma bya smon gnas shes// shang shing 'digs byed gyad kyi gdan// ka li nyi ma shes rab e// don dam mtshon byed nyi ma'i gdan// a li yab dang paM yig thabs// kun rdzob
304b7(rgyud): mtshon byed zla ba'i gdan// rnam thar gsum brgyad stong pa nyid// bcu drug rtogs pas sgrib gsum gyi// ma gos mdzes byed pad ma'i gdan// tshad mod sgyu ma'i dngos po bzhi// sems can kun la phra la sogs// 
304b8(rgyud): sems brgyad dar gyi bad+mod kyi gdan// yid 'ong gdan khri mdzes gshams kyi// zla ba bzang pos yang gsol pa// rgyab yol rgyan drug ji lta bur// de yi rnam par dag pa gang // ston pas bdag la gsong por gsung/ 
305a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zla ba bzang po yang nyon// pha rol phyin drug la rten nas// dus gsum bder gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas// de phyir pha rol phyin drug rgyun// rnam drug ma
305a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyab yol bca'// zang zing skyabs dang chos kyi sbyin// phongs 'jigs mi shes rgud pa las// sgrol mdzad klu phrug ta ra na// chos sdud don byed sdom tshul khrims// rang gzhan gnyis kyi 'dod don la// dbang phyug
305a3(rgyud): ri dgas sha ra na// dang len mi nyams chos la bzod// phal pa gnod byed grub mtha' yi// bla ma glang po g+hu ru na// ma zhan mi skyo mi zhum brtson// snyoms las sgyid lugs dag la brnyas// 'joms byed dge sdig
305a4(rgyud): bya ra rna/ zhi lhag zung 'brel rtse gcig ston// ting 'dzin gzungs dang mngon shes kyi// grong khyer chu srin pu ra rna// ji ltar ji snyed 'od gsal shes// nyon mongs shes bya snyoms 'jug ldan// snying rje bya khyud / 
305a5(rgyud): ru rna// ji ltar mdzes pa'i rim pa yi// rgyab yol bca'o zla bzang kye// zla ba bzang pos yang gsol pa// sku yi rgyan drug ji lta bur// de yi rnam pa dag pa gang // bcom ldan bdag la gsal bar zhu// dang po'i
305a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bka' stsal pa// mi yi bdag po nga la nyon// bla ma spyi gtsug snyan mgul rgyan// yan lag ske rags tshangs skud rgyan// re re mtshan nyid legs par bris// nga ni brtse dang mkhyen par ldan// rgyan drug
305a7(rgyud): rnam dag legs par bshad// kye ho dang po'o sangs rgyas mchog/ spyi bor rus pa'i rgyan mdzes pa// rdo rje zla ba thod pa dkar// sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgyas btatra pa// 'khor lo rtsibs drug rtse mo ru// thod pa drug
305a8(rgyud): gis dbu bskor ba// mu tig phreng 'dra'i 'khor lo ris// dra ba dra phyed do shal ris// chun 'phyang nor bu'i zla ra tshags// mu tig star la rgyus pa 'dra// me long dril bu ar ka 'phyangs// rna bar rus pa'i rgyan// 
305b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa rgyas// des bstan pa yang som nyi za 'gyur ba'i// rmongs chen de ni bdud kyi gnyen yin no// dkon mchog spangs te mu stegs cis ma yin// skur pa 'debs te dmyal bar lhung gyur nas// btso
305b2(rgyud): rlug sdug bsngal mi 'byung smrar yod dam// 'on te nga bas mkhyen pa khyed che 'am// yan sangs rgyas sems can rab slu bam// mi sred skyon te spangs la yid ches bskyed// som nyi zad nas yid rab dang 'byed na// 
305b3(rgyud): nor bu sbur len sbur ma ji bzhin du// dge ba'i sbur ma gos pa gang ji bzhin// des ni bsod nams mi zad gter chen te// rgyal po de ni bdud kyi dgra yin no// de rjes zla bzang gis zhus pa// gdan ni rgyan drug/ 
305b4(rgyud): ji lta bu don gyi rnam dag ma 'tshal bas// shin du gsal bar bdag la gsungs// ston pas bka' stsal rgyal po kye// khri gdan dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// khri gdong rdo rje yang dag slong // khri rkang rdzu 'phrul rkang
305b5(rgyud): kha bzhi/ khri rmang phyogs 'tshams dbang po stobs// ba gam byang chub yan lag bdun// lan kAn pang rim 'phags rim brgyad// byang chub phyogs bdun nor bu'i khri// mi 'jigs seng ge glang po stobs// spobs
305b6(rgyud): sogs rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// dbang bcu rma bya smon gnas shes// shang shang 'degs byed gyad kyi gdan// ka li nyi ma shes rab e// don dam mtshon byed nyi ma'i gdan// a li yab dang po yig thabs// kun rdzob
305b7(rgyud): mtshon byed zla ba'i gdan// rnam thar gsum brgyad stong pa nyid// bcu drug rtogs pas sgrib gsum gyi// ma gos mdzes byed pad ma'i gdan// tshad mod sgyu ma'i dngos po bzhi// sems can kun la pha la sogs// 
305b8(rgyud): sems brgyad dar gyi brjod kyi gdan// yid 'ong gdan khri mdzes gshams kyi// zla ba bzang pos yang gsol pa// rgyab yol rgyan drug ji lta bur// de yi rnam par dag pa gang // ston pas bdag la gsong po gsu/ 
306a1(rgyud): @'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i brda// kun rtog ye shes mtshon pa'i rgyan// mgul du rus pa'i rgyas btab pa// mgrin po longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsar// 'dzin pa'i sbyor bas goms pa yis// tshor ba/ 
306a2(rgyud): phung po gnas 'gyur te// rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru gsal// ma chags pa yi sbyin pa rdzogs// ser sna gnas su dag pa'i brda// mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan pa'i rgyan// yan lag rus pa'i rgyas btab pa// lte ba sbrul bI 'khor
306a3(rgyud): lo'i rtsar/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba goms pa yis// gzugs kyi phung po'i gnas 'gyur nas// rnam par snang mdzad sku ru gsal// khro ba med pa'i bzod pa rdzogs// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i brda// chos dbyings ye shes
306a4(rgyud): mtshon pa'i rgyan// rkyed pa rus pa'i rgyas btab pa// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsar// srog rtsol sbyor ba'i goms pa yis// 'du byed phung po'i gnas 'gyur nas// don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal// le lo med pa'i
306a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus rdzogs// phrag dog gnas su dag pa'i brda// bya grub ye shes mtshon pa'i rgyan// sau ral rus pa'i rgyas btab pa// gsang gnas ye shes 'khor lo'i rtser// so sor sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// ye
306a6(rgyud): shes phung po gnas 'gyur nas// rdo rje 'chang gi sku ru gsal// rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab rdzogs// nga rgyal gnas su dag pa'i brda// gnyis med ye shes mtshon pa'i rgyan// rgyan ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ 
306a7(rgyud): nang rtags phyi ru shar ba yin// dar ma sha khrag rgyas pa 'dra// rgyud la yon tan rdzogs pa yi// skyeg mo chas su zhugs pa 'dra// yang dag don la mi 'da' bas// rgyal po ka rtags phyag rgya 'dra// mi bdag rtog
306a8(rgyud): dang pyod pa dang // ye shes phrin las ma 'dres chos// bcwo brgyad rgyan gyis mdzes pa yi// 'dra 'bam dang gus mos pas mchod// zla ba bzang po yang nyon cig/ rdo rje slob dpon brtse ldan pas// thog med mun dus// 
306b1(rgyud): bsgribs pa yi// lta ngan sna tshogs kyis dkrugs pa'i// sems can khams la phan gdadugs phyir// rigs pa grub mtha' tshar bcad bya// rig byed rang byung nam mkha' bzhin// rtag cing kun la khyab par 'dod// 
306b2(rgyud): bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs rmongs// tshangs pa'i kha dang lag pa brla// bol gong gnyis la skye gnas yin// rta yi mchod sbyin las gzhan pa'o// chos med tshangs pas bstan pa yin// byed pa po'i dge sdig las// 'das
306b3(rgyud): dang so so rang bzhin dang // rdul mun snying stobs yon tan dang // stong nyid nyams pa'i chos can dang // bde sdug rgyu 'bras ster byed do// yod pa khyab 'jug gis bstan to// khyab 'jug gis bstan lam drug dang // nam mkha'i
306b4(rgyud): khams sogs de nyid lnga// ye shes khams dang sngags kyi lus// a li ka li'i de kho na// mchog dga' lasogs rig pa dag/ bdag gi de nyid gzugs sogs bzhi// lus ngag sems sogs lam gsum 'gro// de rnams
306b5(rgyud): de rnams skye dus bdag dang 'grogs// 'das pa'i dngos rnams 'chi ba'i tshe// gtong zhing khu 'dzag bde ba yi// gnas skabs kun gzhi byed pa dang // bcu gnyis khyim mang lo zla dang // bgrod pa dus gsum dus bzhi drug/ 
306b6(rgyud): zla ba zla phyed nyi ma dang // dbyug gu la sogs nges par yod// dbang phyug zhi bas bstan pa yin// dbang phyug las ni rnam smin med// rdul mun snying stobs yon tan med// dri sogs yul dang 'byung ba med// a ru ra dang bu
306b7(rgyud): ram sogs// 'tshogs na myos pa'i nus pa 'byung // bral na nus pa ga la srid// de bzhin rdul mun snying stobs dang // dri sogs 'byung ba bral ba'i tshe// me sha thal ba rlung khyer bzhin// slar 'tsho ba dag ga la yod// de
306b8(rgyud): med pa na 'chi ba'i mthar// las kyi 'bras bu med par ni// rgyang phan lha yi bla mas bstan// rgyu ba sems can mi rgyu snod// byed pa po ra ma nas byas// de mgu ma mgu mtho ris dang // dmyal ba sogs su 'dren par byed// 
307a1(rgyud): stag gzigs ra ma na yis bstan// dus gsum po dang rdzas drug gi/ srog dus nam mkha' rtags pa'i rdzas// gang zag bsod nams sdig mi rtog/ byed pa'i srog yod med pa dang // 'dzag sdom
307a2(rgyud): 'dor dang 'chi ba dang // grol dang 'gro dang 'ong ba yi// gnas kyi rnam gzhag cha dgu dang // sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // 'bru yi lus te srog yod drug/ khams kyi zas dang ldan pa'i lus// 'od kyi lus dang 'byung // 
307a3(rgyud): ba'i lus// rdzus skyes lpags pa'i lus dang lnga// srog spong po yi lus yin no// mi 'tshe ba dang tshig bden smra// byin na mi len tshangs par spyod// thams cad gtong dang brtul zhugs lnga// spyod lam tshig dang rtsol ba
307a4(rgyud): dang // len dang sems gzhag pas bsdams lnga// dmyal ba byol song mi dang lha// thar pa'i gnas te 'gro ba lnga// lhan skyes blo gros thos pa dang // dus gsum shes dang yid tsam byed// bsrog byed me ste ye shes lnga/ 
307a5(rgyud): spyod lam bde ba sum bcu las// brtul zhugs lnga dang bsdoms pa lnga// lus ngag yid kyi gsang ba'o// sreg ni lus kyi tshad tsam brtags// 'di rnams thar pa'i sa yin ces// thar pa steng du dpag tshad ni// 'bru
307a6(rgyud): phrog bzhi bcu rtsa ldan// gdugs kyi rnam pa lta bu yod// rgyal po gcer bu pa yi bstan// rig byed rang byung ma yin te// rkan gi sgra yis de na brjod phyir// ma grub zhe na tshangs pa yis// gdong bzhi sgra don gsal byas
307a7(rgyud): brdzun// sgra don tha dad yin zhe na// me spros ci phyir kha mi 'tshig/ bum pa brjod tshe rnam pa 'am// khar bum tsa yi phyir mi 'byung // rig byed dngos por med pas na// rig par bya ba tshan chen// tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi nas
307a8(rgyud): brjod pas// drang srong phyug pa dag sogs thos nas// sgrub cing gzhan la ston pa brdzun// bden na ma 'ongs don spyod pas// 'das sogs tshangs pa'i ston pa yod// rig byed nam mkha' dang mtshungs yin// kha yi
307b1(rgyud): dbye bas sgra brjod phyir// phyogs gcig gnyis skyes khas brjod phyir// rgyal po rig byed kun khyab yin// khyab na thams cad kyis brjod 'gyur// 'dod na dmangs sogs mi brjod pas// mkhas pas rig byed
307b2(rgyud): tshad min ces/ skye dgu'i rigs bzhi ma nges te// tshangs pa gcig las skyes pa'i phyir// pha gcig gI ni bu bzhin du// kha lag sogs dbye tha dad na// u dum bA ra'i me tog dang // yal ga rtsa ba'i 'bras bu yang // 
307b3(rgyud): dbye ba med bzhi ni skye dgu yang // bram ze'i kha las skyes sogs kyis// rigs bzhi rtag par gnas zhe na// sems can thams cad dmyal ltung 'gyur// ma grub zhe na bram ze mo// tshangs pa'i kha nas cis mi skye// srid
307b4(rgyud): mo bag mar blangs po yis// kla glo chos ni 'jug par 'gyur// des ni rang gi rigs nyams te// me yi dmyal bar cis mi 'gro// phyug bsad pas ni mtho ris min// srog bcod dmyal ba'i rgyu yin phyir// ma gru bzhin a me
307b5(rgyud): yis// mchog sbyin 'bras bu su ka shes// gsum phyung tshig las thos pa yin// khyod kyis phyug ni sngon bsad de// khrag gi 'bram bu byas pa yis// gal te mtho ris nyid 'gro na// su zhig dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// 
307b6(rgyud): 'dod na ngan 'gro med 'gyur bas// mtho ris sgrub la ba pad mi dgos// de phyir mchod sbyin don med 'gyur// bden na dug la sman skyes 'gyur// nim pa shing las dgum 'brum dang // pa la sha las 'dam skyes 'byung // de
307b7(rgyud): phyir phyugs kyi mchod sbyin gyis// bde ba thob pa bdud kyi tshig/ gal te bdag gi kun khyab na// gnyen mdun bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang // rtag na 'dod pa'i gnas snun pa'i// mngal sogs gnas skabs ci phyir 'gro// 
307b8(rgyud): bdag dpya dang bcas gyur na// gnyid log rmongs pa ji ltar 'gyur// de phyir khyab dang rtag pa dang // bya ba bdeng bcas bdag 'od min// byed po bdag cas log pa'i lam// las la byed pa yod ce na// bdag gam gzhan
308a1(rgyud): med rang bzhin blal// de phyir byed las sems can la// bde ster sdug bsngal 'jigs 'joms min// sngon gyi dge sdig las byas pas// de yang sdug bsngal ster bar 'gyur// dbang phyug kun gyi
308a2(rgyud): byed pa na// 'gro kun las yin longs spyod med// 'u rang don la cis mi 'byung // las byed dbang phyug ma yin no// kun gyi byed pa de mi 'gyur// las med dbang phyug gis byed na// gzhan gyi spyod sbyor zos pa na// 
308a3(rgyud): gzhan dag skom pas 'chi bar 'gyur// min te byed mkhan byed pa'o// gang bya las byas dris min pa'i// las kyi 'bras bu yod min na// ji ltar bum pa'i byed po bzhin// las gang byed pa po yod na// las
308a4(rgyud): kyi 'bras bu longs spyod pas// byed po rang dbang can mi 'gyur// byed po gzhan bskul byed gyur na// gzhan la rag las byed po min// de phyir dbang phyug byed po man// srog chags rnams kyis dge mi dge'i/ 
308a5(rgyud): las kyi 'bras bu stor bar gsungs// 'byung ba gcig tu gyur pa las// dbang po dang bcas rnam shes na// shing las rnam shes dang bcas 'gyur// 'byung ba 'dus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir// shing las sems
308a6(rgyud): bskyed mi nus na// 'o na 'byung 'dus nus pa brdzun// a ru ra dang bu ram dang // 'bru sogs phabs dang legs sbyar bas// chang gi nus pa 'byung ba bzhin// 'byung ba bzhi 'dus gyur pa la// dbang po lnga dang rnam
308a7(rgyud): shes drug/ dri sogs yul la yongs spyod na// de phyir chad par lta ba'i tshig/ bde ba ster min sdug bsngal bskyed// mchog gi lam nyams rgyal po kye// rgyu dang mi rgyu byed pos min// rdul bral sems sogs/ 
308a8(rgyud): 'das min phyir// rdzas rnams med par byed 'gyur na// yul dang bral ba'i byed pa po// mngon sum rjes dpago tshad mas min// rdul phran tshogs las thams cad 'byung // sems can lus la skye shi 'byung stag
308b1(rgyud): gzig 'dod pa tsam gyis min// byed po dga' bas bde thob na// byed po tshad mas ma grub phyir// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyun chad 'gyur// srog ni lus kyi tshad tsam mis/ lus kun la ni ma khyab phyir// ma grub/ 
308b2(rgyud): zhe na rkang lag sogs// bcad na ci phyir srog mi 'chad// rtag na lus ni rdul phran las// skyes na rags par ci phyir 'gyur// 'khor ba las grol 'jig rten gyi// stang du thar pa thob pa dang // khams gsum
308b3(rgyud): rdul phran las grub phyir// srog ni 'dus tshad brtag pa yin// lus drug sogs kyang srog brtags na// nags khrod shing sogs srog ldan pas// bde sdug nyams su myong bar 'gyur// gang zag kun la srog/ 
308b4(rgyud): gcig na// tsan dan bsregs na kun tshig 'gyur// gang zag re la srog re na// dur shing brtub na dum bur 'gyur// gcig la gnas na dum bu kun// ldum rar btsugaso na so sor skye// de rnams srog ni gang nas
308b5(rgyud): btsa'// tshangs sogs tshad ma'i skyes bu na// des brjod pa ni tshad ma min// de phyir rig byed tshad mar 'gyur// 'dod na mchod sbyin chad pa yin// yin na mi phyugs 'tshe ba tshad// 'dod na dmyal ba'i 'jigs
308b6(rgyud): ster ba'i// sdig pa tshad ma chen por 'gyur// des rmongs pa yi tshig dag gis// rgyal po mi shes pa rnams slus// zla bzang rten cing 'brel 'byung te// zla ba chu shel la chu 'dzag/ me long nang du gzugs
308b7(rgyud): brnyan dang / gzhan gyis skyur rtsi zos pa yis// gzhan gyis lce la chu 'dzag dang // rang sgras khron par sgra rnyan dang // sa bon las ni myu gu dang // khab len rdo yi ljags rnams len// byed pos bya bar 'dod ma yin// / 
308b8(rgyud): rten sde das dri de/ dridag su sus kyang spu pa 'id/  byi dag / bdag ni mi da nga slong ba mad/ na 'bres dngong po nus pa ni// srid gsum lus kyang sprul pa min// de phyir bsam pa dpag tu med// bdag ni med la srid pa yod// byed pa med/ 
309a1(rgyud): la rgyu 'bras yod// 'gro ba po med thar pa yod// bcings pa yod de bcings bya med// dngos po med la dngos med yod// skar me gcig dang bral ba yod// dngos po med la dngos po yod// 
309a2(rgyud): ni bden pa'i tshig 'di dag/ lha klu dri za tshig bsdus pas// gnod cing 'joms par mi nus so// rgyal po chos ni sems can la// phan dang yun dang bral ba ste// 'tsho ba rig byed tshad ma dag/ mchog dang bde
309a3(rgyud): ba'i 'bras ster min// dus kun du ni sdug bsngal ster// legs par byas nas rmongs tshogs kyang // bde byed sems can bde rjes chags// dri phyir gcig tu sems can gyi// don bya rgyal po yid kyis ni// 
309a4(rgyud): rang bzhin med par bsgom par byos// gang zag byed po'i bdag med cing // rtag par mi smra mi bdag min// khur khur po'i gang zag yod// bye brag smra bas bstan pa yin// lus su son pa'i gang zag nyis// 
309a5(rgyud): phyi nang gnyis na ma dmigs phyir// nang na zhen pa rnam shes sam// rnam shes ma yin rang bzhin smros// shes pa'o zhe na bum pa yis// shes dgra snam bu'i shes pa skye// de phyir gang zag rtag pa med// 
309a6(rgyud): shos min zhe na bde ba dang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong mi 'gyur// phyi rol zhe na dngos po 'am// 'on te dngos po med pa yin// dang po rdul phran las ri bo// myu gu sa bon las grub phyir// gang+gA zag mi rtag/ 
309a7(rgyud): dngos med na// ri bong ra yang gang zag 'gyur// phyi rol bden pa'i don med cing // shes pa'i rnam pa rjod byed pa// rgya dang rgya yi 'bur bzhin du// kun du yang dag don du smra// don dam pa yi rig pa med// mar
309a8(rgyud): me snum zad ji lta bar// 'khrul pa zad nas mya ngan 'das// mdo sde las ni bstan pa yin// rnam pa bstod byed bden smra na// phyi rol pa dang cis mi mtshungs// kun rdzob zhe na de la yang // gzhan rgos bstod
309b1(rgyud): byed thub pa med// thogs med rnam par shes pa'i gzugs// myang 'das thob te rgyun chad na// sangs rgyas rnam mkhyen min par 'gyur// thog ma med pa'i lus bral na// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mi ston pas// / 
309b2(rgyud): so so yang dag rig pa yi// chos ston pa yang med par 'gyur// spyan lnga mngon shes la sogs brdzun// rnam shes la gzhan chos med ces// srid pa gsum po ma lus la// rnam par shes pa nyid du smra// chos
309b3(rgyud): kun thams cad skad cig la// skye dang 'jig pa byed do zhes// rnal 'byor spyod pa pa yis bstan// rnaM she don dam yod pa min// gcig dang du mar bral ba'i phyir// shes pa las gzhan gzugs med na// mi
309b4(rgyud): shes gzugs las ji ltar snang // ma rig bgo chags kyis zhe na// ma rig pa 'di khams gsum gyi// mtshan nyid du ni mi 'gyur ro// 'dod na de tshe 'khor ba yang // myang 'das mtshan nyid can du 'gyur// shes
309b5(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa ni// ma rig pa ni ma yin no// ma rig 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid ni// ma rig nam yang nyams med 'gyur// shes pa ma rig tsam nyid phyir// khams gsum shes min dam cha nyams// chos
309b6(rgyud): kun skad cigo skye 'jig na// de yi gnas pa dang bral lo// gnas pa med dang skye 'jig na// ri bong ra yang skye 'jig 'gyur// skye gnas gnas kyin gnas nas 'jig/ 'jig las skye bar skyon med na// 
309b7(rgyud): skye 'jig gnas pa gcig mi 'gyur// ma grub zhe na gnas pa'i tshe// skye 'jig med lnga skye ba'i tshe// gnas 'jig med pa 'jig pa'i tshe// skye dang gnas pa mi 'grub ste// dper na skyo rgas 'chi ba yang // 
309b8(rgyud): skad cig ma la mi rdzogs bzhin// skye 'jig skad cig gis zhe na// 'ogogs las skye 'am ma 'gags skye// 'gags las mar me gzhan skye 'gyur// ma 'gags pa las gzhon skye na// mar me ma
310a1(rgyud): 'gags skye 'phreng ltar// shes pa phreng ba bzhin du 'gyur// 'o na shes pa gang zhe na// gcig drang du mar bral ba'i phyir// chos kun rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan
310a2(rgyud): pa'i// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang // dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dag/ gnyis su me pa'i 'jig rten du// mkhyen rtsi nus par ldan pas 'jug/ ji ltar chu nang zla ba dang // bden min brdzun pa min pa
310a3(rgyud): lhur// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsalal rnyog pa med// bzung du med cing 'phrog tu med// rgyu dang lus la kun du byung // de bzhin nyid las dris par skyes// nam mkha'i sprul pa'i me
310a4(rgyud): tog bzhin// yod pa ma yin med pa min// gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin// mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba// de nyid dbu ma mkhas pa yi// stong pa snying rje dbyer med sgra// shes dang shes bya gci/ 
310a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i// dus kyi 'khor lo bde chen po// dkyil 'khor gsum mchog phyag 'tshal lo// mi yi bdag po de yang nyon// thog med las kyis dkrugs pa yis// shin du khro zhing rdum pa las// zhi bas
310a6(rgyud): phan par mi 'gyur bas// shin du snying rje cher bskyed la// srid gsum sdug bsngal sel ba'i blos// 'khrul 'khor stobs kyis tshar bcad bya// skyegs dang mda' dang mda' bo che// brdeg mda' ral gri chu/ 
310a7(rgyud): gri dang / shing rta dpung gi 'khor l-i dang // mar nag 'khrul 'khor la sogs kyis// pha rol rdzong rnams gzhom par bya// sgra gcan gza' bdun klu brgyad dang // rnal 'byor ma dang gnod sbyin mo// drag po'i
310a8(rgyud): stobs dang 'grogs par bya// me nas rlung du son pa yi// reg stobs can spang bar bya// sa 'og ral gri 'khrul 'khor sogs// rang gi rdzong rnams bsrung bar bya// gal te 'dun par ma gyur na// rdo rje shugs
310b1(rgyud): dang dri za dang // ro langs gnod sbyin chen po dang // bya khyung chen po la sogs kyi// byin brlabs sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// rengs dang rmongs sogs pa yi las// tshar bcad phan gdags bya'o kye// ri dang gling
310b2(rgyud): dang rgya mtsho dang // me dang rlung dang khor yug rnams// nam mkha' rdul phran 'dus las grub// chu las lan tshwa ji bzhin du// snod kyi 'jig rten thog mar byung // lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal
310b3(rgyud): ba rnams// khu khrag rnam shes khams drug dag/ sgong nga'i nang nas sgong skyes bzhin// ma yi mngal dang las la grub// kha cig rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// de dag dge dang mi dge rnams// lo zla zla phyed tsha grangs/ 
310b4(rgyud): dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ra hu dang // rnal 'byor ma sogs stobs las byung // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug dag/ rdul dang mun pa snying stobs dag/ brtan g.yo bde sdug bskyed par byed// 'di dag dus kyi
310b5(rgyud): 'khor lor gsungs// nges brjod rig byed nub zhal nas// mchog snyan tshig srid bsrung rnams// g.yon zhal shar gyi zhal nas gsungs// rdzogs ldan gnyis ldan gsum ldan dong // rtsod ldan rgyab zhal sogs
310b6(rgyud): dbye bas// bye brag smra ba g.yon zhal nas// g.yas pa'i zhal nas mdo sde pa// shar zhal rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa// nub kyi zhal nas dbu ma gsungs// rgyab rdza bram ze rgyal rmang rigs// g.yon zhal shar
310b7(rgyud): gyi zhal nas gsungs// rgyab g.yon g.yas dang shar zhal nas// gnas brtan phal chen mang pos bkur// thams cad yod par smra bar gsungs// shar nub mi dang byol song rnams// g.yas zhal lha dang
310b8(rgyud): 'byung po rnams// g.yon na dmyal ba lha ma yin// g.yon na bya ba lnga sogs rgyud// g.yas nas rnal 'byor rgyud rnams gsungs// shar gyi zhal nas shes rab rgyud// nub nas rnal 'byor rje rigs rgyud/ 'dod/ 
311a1(rgyud): 'thun par snun pa yis// skyes bu tshong la bzud pa ltar// nga yi bstan la rims kyis gzhug/ phyi nang gzhan gsum khyim 'phro dang // e waM yi ge sgrub pa dang // rgyu thabs 'bras bu'i khyad par
311a2(rgyud): gyis// lhag par mos pa nyid du bya// gzhan gyis rtag pa'i 'dod pa rnams// lung rigs nyams rtogs gis sun phyung // dbu ma phyag rgya chen po'i lam// gzhon nu ma la pra pha ba bzhin// rnam pa kun gyi
311a3(rgyud): mchog ldan pa'i// stong pa nyid kyi lam bstan nas// yang dag lam la gzung bar bya// so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin dang // sbyor ba
311a4(rgyud): yan lag drug bsgoms te// mtshan mo nyin mo rnal 'byor gyis// sdug bsngal la sogs rtags rdzogs nas// dbu ma nam mkha'i thig le ru// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// stong nyid spros bral chos
311a5(rgyud): kyi sku// sna tshogs thabs kyis sbrul skur snang // gsung ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gsung dbyangs ston// ji ltar cong rong sgra snyan dang // bu mo gzhon la me long nang // pra brgyad
311a6(rgyud): phab pa bzhin du snang // rnam pa kun du rang gi sems// rnam rtog dngos po'i rang bzhin de// gzhan lus sems ni yod ma yin// gdod nas lhan cig skyes pa'i sku// dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas te// rgyu
311a7(rgyud): med gdod nas lhun gyis grub// mtshan dpes brgyan pa'i bde chen sku// dad gus brtson 'grus ldan pa yis// 'jig rten bya ba kun 'phangs nas// sems can khams rnams sbrel ba'i blos// nyin
311a8(rgyud): mtshan gcig la ma mthong na// de tshang yis brdzun tshig shor// 'phral du yid ches 'byung ba'i lam// ur mo las ni me bzhin du// slob dpon dam tshig gtsang ma las// shes par bya'o mi bdag kye// 
311b1(rgyud): mi yi bdag po de yang nyon// dbang bdun byis pa 'jug pa ste// bum pa gsang ba shes rab dbang // bzhi pa sku bzhi'i bdag nyid do// 'byor ldan a ba d+hU ti pa// snying rje'i 'od zer gyis dbang bskur// 
311b2(rgyud): byis pa 'jug pa'i dbang bdun dang // gong ma shes rab ye shes dbang bskur bya// gsum pa de bzhin yang bzhi pa// mtshon byed dpe yi ye shes kyis// mtshon bya don gyi ye shes mtshon// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde
311b3(rgyud): bo che// lhan cig skyes dga'i skad cig ma// rdo rje slob dpon bdag po'i dbang // gong mchog dbang 'byor ldan la// mdor bstan rab dbye las shes bya// bla ma yon gyis mnyes byed cing // mkha' 'gro chags
311b4(rgyud): kyis tshim byed na'o// de ltar mi byed 'byor ldan la'o// nam yang dbang ni sbyin mi bya// a ba d+hU ti pa lo ni// bla ma Da ki mchod la sbyin// yang na mchod pa med gyur kyang // bla ma'i tshig gis dbang bskur sbyin/ 
311b5(rgyud): dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor bstan par bya// de bzhin sngags chos rnal 'byor bstan// lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba che// nam mkha'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang sbyin// 'od zer snying/ 
311b6(rgyud): rje'i dbang bskur dag/ hUM yig snying kha'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams spros nas// bde gshegs rnams la dbang bskur zhu// sems can khams rnams mdun du bsdu// sangs rgyas
311b7(rgyud): thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// bdag la dbang mchog bskur bar mdzod// zag med bde bas byin gyis rlobs// bdag ni dga' bas dbugs byin nas// sems can rnams la snying brtse bas// nyon mongs
311b8(rgyud): dri ma ma lus 'khrud// sems can sgrib gsum dag gyur cing // rdo rje 'chang gi sku thob nas// rang rang gnas su gtang byas te// so sor bde bas tshim par bya// de ltar dbang bskur thams cad dang // tshogs
312a1(rgyud): @/ mos rtogs dag skye mtha' dang // sangs rgyas sa la rim bzhin te// mtshan nyid rjes 'thun rtags pa'i dbang // dbang bdun mos tshogs dngos rjes 'thun// bum pa rtogs mos dngos rjes 'thun// 
312a2(rgyud): tshogs las btags pa gsang dbang ni// dag rtogs byis pa dngos rjes 'thun// btags pa gong ma mchog gi dbang // sangs rgyas skye dag rtogs bris pa// mtshan nyid shin du rjes 'thun dang // rjes 'thun cung
312a3(rgyud): zad btogs pa'i dbang // 'og ma 'og mar dbang bskur bas// dbang thob gong ma'i sar 'gyur ro// de ltar dbang sbyin smin par bya// zla ba bzang po de yang nyon// rdo rje theg par rab zhugs na// mtshams med lnga po
312a4(rgyud): byas gyur kyang // tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de rigs dgongs pa gtsor bstan yin// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // rdo rje theg par zhugs tsam gyis// rdo rje 'chang las ring 'gyur zhes// dgongs min
312a5(rgyud): khyod kyis srog chags bsad// gzhan gyi nor 'phrog bud med blang // brdzun smra ji bzhin min pa'i sgra// srog gcod ma byin len brdzun dang // bud med rten spong ji bzhin sgra// myu gu sa bon las ji bzhin// bdag gI/ 
312a6(rgyud): sdig dge las byas pas// bde sdug bdag gis nyams su myong // theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhes// drang don las med rnam smin med// theg pa med cing byang chub med// chos kun bdag med stong tu zhes// de rigs
312a7(rgyud): nges pa'i don du brjod// rgyud kun mtha' drug mtshan nyid can// mi bdag re re 'ong drug drug ste// sum bcu rtsa drug mtshan nyid ldan// rtsod ldan 'das pa'i dus la ltos// rdzogs ldan da lta'i dus la ltos// dbang po rno ltos dgo/ 
312a8(rgyud): bajug/ log srid log phyir le lo dang // don gzhan le lo rigs chad dang // dbang po rtul lces dgongs min drug/ snying rjes sgrol ba'i zhing bcu sogs// don gzhan don chen nyon mongs can// gzhan don la ltos ji bzhin min/ 
312b1(rgyud): po phan yon brjod pa za ba// nyes dmigs nyan thos rgyu 'bras la// ltos dang bcas pas sgra ji bzhin// mu sgrogs don dam kun rdzob dang // rang bzhin nyan rang rten 'brel la// ltos dang bcas pa'i drang don drug/ bdag lnga bzlog
312b2(rgyud): dang ngo bo nyid/ kun rdzob chos nyid chad par lta// don dam la sogs nges don drug/ de dag bshad tshul bzhin shes bya// yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don// rgyud kun mtha' drug tshul bzhi ste// dus
312b3(rgyud): ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin// shes bya'i mtshan nyid 'gro 'khor lo// dus 'khor rgyal po'i dkor mdzod la// rgyu thabs 'bras bu'i rgyu gsum gyis// rmangs logs bag gam lugs ris bskor// phyi nang gsang gsuM sgo
312b4(rgyud): lcags bcug/ rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rdo rje skad// mchog tu rnying ba'i gser sgom gdams// lde mig mtha' drug tshul bzhin byed// rig pa bzhi yi sgo nang bzhugs// sgo drug rin chen them skas 'dzags// sku bzhi yid bzhin
312b5(rgyud): nor bu blangs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub kyis// gdul bya tshim bya mi bdag kye// rgyud kun la yang des shes bya// nga ni shin du brtser ldan pas// khyod la legs par bstan pa yi// rgyud rnams kun du rab sbas pa'i// rdo rje'i
312b6(rgyud): tshig 'byed lde mig 'dis// slob ma sdu ba nyid du bya// zla ba bzang po yang nyon cig/ de ltar rgyud kyi shes bskyed nas// nad la sman bzangs ji bzhin du// gnyen po'i man ngag sbyin par bya// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa
312b7(rgyud): ltar// gnas 'gyur ba yi man ngag bstan// dug la sngags kyis bya ba bzhin// dug lnga lam khyer man ngag sbyin// dug sbrul 'bar ba'i 'dud pa ltar// mtshan ma rang grol man ngag ston// gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog
312b8(rgyud): mazhin kyi dbang po rang log man ngag bzhin// gser bum til gyi sgron me ltar// rang rig rang gsal man ngag bzhin// gzhin nus bde ba myong ji bzhin// brjod mi shes pas gdams pa bzhin// nam mkha' khams
313a1(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin ltar// mtha' dbus spros bral chen pos bstan// lus dag bskyed pa dag dag bzlas// sems ni dag phyir rdzogs pa'i rim// sgo gsum dag dbye dam tshig sbyin// mi yi
313a2(rgyud): dbang po de yang nyon// bsam gtan lam las bzlog byed bdud// shes rab gsum bskyod bar chad bdud// chags sogs nyon mongs bskyed byed bdud// rnam rtog 'phros g.yeng bskyed byed bdud// 
313a3(rgyud): nga rgyal khengs rlom bskyed byed bdun// de skyes bdud kyis yongs su brlag/ mkhas pas shes na dgra bzhin du// dpung tshogs shin du cher bskyed la// bzlog par bya'o mi bdag kye// de ltar nges bstan
313a4(rgyud): rim pa yis// rgyal po 'dod pa cis mi tshim// de skad tsam cig shes pas kyang // shes bya kun la rmongs mi 'gyur// de ltar sgrub pa'i blo ldan dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa rab mnyes nas// 'gro ba
313a5(rgyud): 'dren pa'i snying brtse ba'i// sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// yid rang dang zhing gus pa yis// nga la phyag 'tshal skyabs su song // zla ba bzang po de dges nA// 
313a6(rgyud): shin du yid rab dang byed cing // lus dang ba spu rab g.yo nas// thal sbyar spri bor bzhag nas kyang // lan bdun bskor zhing gus phyag 'tshal// e ma a l-i la ho kye// bdag ni dga' bas dbyugs
313a7(rgyud): phyung ngo // sems can rnams kyang dbugs phyung bas// thugs rje'i mgon po nyid la bstod// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pas// khyod ni ston pa bla na med// sems can kun gyi mgon gyur pas// 
313a8(rgyud): khyod ni sems can kun gyi pha// sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir// khyod ni sems can kun gyi ma// sems can kun gyi grogs byed pas// khyod ni bshes dang gnyen gyi mchog/ chos rnams kun la
313b1(rgyud): spron med pas// nam mkha' da 'i rang bzhin lta// mi rtog ste shes chen bI yis// chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung na thams cad ma byin pa'i skad// mi bzang dbyangs ni so so gas pa// 
313b2(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byang gyi rte brgyan pa kyai// longs spyong swa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bsam pa'i don gyis no// sna tshogs nor du ji lta bar// mos pa se so'i swa ru gsal// sprul pa'i skal phyag
313b3(rgyud): tshal lo// ma bac+doMs spyod na lhun gyis grubo// m+b+hi bur nyes pa dang bral zhing / zag med yon tan kun rdzogs pa// ngo'i nyid sku la phyag gang la// sku bzhi'i ba ga nyid ni ba ste// mi mchog ma chu
313b4(rgyud): ldan tsog skyes// A dza yi gI de dag nyid gyi/ dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// ka yig rgyud ni zhi ba ste// de nyid la ni stobs lnga ro nyid// tsa yig gis ni g.yo ba'i sems// kra yi ga~M gis na
313b5(rgyud): ram pas bcings// dus ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid de// shes bya'i/ mtshan nyid 'ag 'khor lo// phya nang gzhan gsum bdag nyid can// bus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal// rtag tu khyad la skabs su mchi
313b6(rgyud): dal dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po nas phyung pa/ gtso byer bla ma'i yon tan bzung ba zhes bya ba/ la pa dum bre'u rgyud rdzogs s+ho// / 
313b7(rgyud): kAr phyogs kyi paN+Di tA/ khyod kyi phyogs kyi lo ts+tsha rgya bong gnyis kyi skyes gcig po// mnyag chen po ts+tsha grags pa'i// mkhas pa sangs rgyas grags pas bsgyud
313b8(rgyud): sa ston lo ts+tsha ba lA ga nang / bla ma se la dus 'khor 'a 'od ma la/ swa ngas 'khor ba shAkya dang phu mdzes dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan/ de gnyis pa la bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas rje
